# language_name:        Nyankore
# closest_ISO_639-3:    nyn
# Glottocode:			nyan1307
# ISO_15924:            Latn
# year_short:           1989
# year_long:            
# vernacular_title:     
# english_title:        The New Testament in Nyankore
# URL:                  http://www.bible.is/NYNBSU/Matt/1

# notes:                
40001001	Okutondoora akarande k'obuzaare bwa Yesu Kristo , mwene Daudi , mwene Aburahamu .
40001002	Aburahamu akazaara Isaaka , Isaaka yaazaara Yakobo , Yakobo yaazaara Yuda n'abarumuna ,
40001003	Yuda yaazaara Perezi na Zeera ahari Tamari , Perezi yaazaara Hezirooni , Hezirooni yaazaara Ramu ,
40001004	Ramu yaazaara Aminadabu , Aminadabu yaazaara Nahashooni , Nahashooni yaazaara Saalimoni ,
40001005	Saalimoni yaazaara Boazi ahari Rahabu , Boazi yaazaara Obedi ahari Ruuti , Obedi yaazaara Yese ,
40001006	kandi Yese yaazaara Daudi omugabe . Daudi akazaara Solomooni ahari muka Uriya ,
40001007	Solomooni yaazaara Rehoboamu , Rehoboamu yaazaara Abiya , Abiya yaazaara Asa ,
40001008	Asa yaazaara Yehoshafaati , Yehoshafaati yaazaara Yoramu , Yoramu yaazaara Uziya ,
40001009	Uziya yaazaara Yotamu , Yotamu yaazaara Ahazi , Ahazi yaazaara Hezekiya ,
40001010	Hezekiya yaazaara Manaase , Manaase yaazaara Amosi ,
40001011	Amosi yaazaara Yosiya , kandi Yosiya yaazaara Yekoniya n'abarumuna omu biro by'okutwarwa Babulooni bari enkwatwa .
40001012	Bwanyima y'okutwarwa Babulooni , Yekoniya akazaara Sheyalitieli , Shealitieli yaazaara Zerubabeeli ,
40001013	Zerubabeeli yaazaara Abiudi , Abiudi yaazaara Eliyakimu , Eliyakimu yaazaara Azoori ,
40001014	Azoori yaazaara Zadoki , Zadoki yaazaara Akimu , Akimu yaazaara Eliudi ,
40001015	Eliudi yaazaara Eleazaari , Eleazaari yaazara Mataani , Mataani yaazaara Yakobo ,
40001016	kandi Yakobo yaazaara Yosefu , iba wa Mariya nyina wa Yesu orikwetwa Kristo .
40001017	N'ahabw'ekyo enzaaro za baishenkurubo zikakuratana ziti : ikumi na ina okwiha ahari Aburahamu okuhitsya ahari Daudi , ikumi na ina okwiha ahari Daudi okuhitsya aha kutwarwa Babulooni bari enkwatwa ; kandi ikumi na ina okwiha aha kutwarwa Babulooni bari enkwatwa okuhitsya ahari Kristo .
40001018	Oku nikwo Yesu Kristo yaazairwe . Mariya nyina akaba naagambwa Yosefu obugyenyi . Ku yaabaire atakamutaahize , yaareebwa aine enda ahabwa Mutima Orikwera .
40001019	Yosefu iba , ahabw'okuba omuntu ohikiriire , tiyaayenda kumuhemura , yaacuma enaama y'okwita obugyenyi bwesherekye .
40001020	Ku yaabaire akiri omu mitima y'okukikora , maraika wa Nyakubaho yaamubonekyera omu kirooto , yaamugira ati : Yosefu mwene Daudi , otatiina kutwara Mariya owaawe kuba omukazi waawe , ahabw'okuba enda ei abakire n'ahabwa Mutima Orikwera .
40001021	Aryazaara omwana omwojo , omwete Yesu , ahabw'okuba niwe arijuna abantu be ebibi byabo .
40001022	Ebyo byona bikabaho kuhikiiriza ebi Nyakubaho yaagambiise omurangi ati :
40001023	Reeba , omwishiki oshugaine aryabaka enda , azaare omwana omwojo , eiziina rye aryayetwa Emanueli , ( eririkumanyisa ngu Ruhanga ari hamwe naitwe ) .
40001024	Yosefu ku yaasisiimukire , yaakora nk'oku maraika yaamuragiire ; yaataasya omukazi we ,
40001025	kwonka tiyaateerana nawe okuhitsya obu onu yaazaire omwana omwojo ; haza Yosefu yaayeta ogwo mwana Yesu .
40002001	Yesu ku yaazaariirwe Beetelehemu ey'omuri Buyudaaya , omu busingye bwa Herode omugabe , abashaija abanyabwengye baaruga burugwa-izooba , baija Yerusalemu .
40002002	Baabuuza bati : Omugabe w'Abayudaaya ozairwe ari nkahi ? Manya ku tureebire enyonyoozi ye burugwa-izooba , twaija kumuramya .
40002003	Omugabe Herode ku yaakihuriire , yaayemereza omutima , we n'ab'omuri Yerusalemu boona .
40002004	Yaateerana abahongyerezi abakuru boona hamwe n'abahangu b'eiteeka , yaababuuza omwanya ogu Kristo arizaarirwamu .
40002005	Baamugarukamu bati : Ni Beetelehemu ey'omuri Buyudaaya ; ahabw'okuba egyo niyo omurangi yaahandiikireho ati :
40002006	Naiwe Beetelehemu , ey'omu kyanga kya Buyudaaya , tiiwe orikuhereerukayo omu bakuru ba Bayudaaya ; ahabw'okuba omuriiwe nimwo omwebembezi ariruga , akaba omuriisa w'abantu bangye Abaisiraeli .
40002007	Herode nikwo kweta abo banyabwengye kumureeba omu mubonano , akababuuza obunaku obu baareebeiremu egyo nyonyoozi ,
40002008	kandi akaboohereza Beetelehemu naabagira ati : Mugyende mubuuririze gye eby'ogwo mwana , haza ku muraamureebe , mummanyise , naanye nze kumuramya .
40002009	Ku baaherize kuhurira ebi omugabe yaagamba , baimutsya orugyendo ; kandi enyonyoozi , ei baabaire baareebire neereetwa burugwa-izooba , yaabeebembera okuhitsya obu yaayemereire omu mwanya ogu omwana yaabaire arimu .
40002010	Ku baagireebire , baashemererwa munonga .
40002011	Batyo baataaha omu nju , baareeba omwana na Mariya nyina . Baatsimba amaju , baamuramya , reero baakomoorora emitwaro yaabo , baamutoijera ebiconco ; ezaabu n'obubaani n'obunyanunga .
40002012	Ku baahabwirwe Ruhanga omu kirooto okutaraba ahari Herode , baatoora ogundi muhanda , baagaruka owaabo .
40002013	Mbwenu abo banyabwengye ku baaherize kugyenda , maraika wa Nyakubaho yaabonekyera Yosefu omu kirooto , yaamugira ati : Imuka otware omwana na nyina , ohungire Misiri , ogumeyo okuhitsya obu ndikugambira ; ahabw'okuba Herode naayenda kusherura omwana kumwita .
40002014	Yosefu atyo aimuka , atwara omwana na nyina , ekyo kiro abahungiza Misiri ;
40002015	bagumayo okuhitsya obu Herode yaafiire . Ekyo kikahikiiriza eki Nyakubaho yaagambiise omurangi ati : Nkeeta omwana wangye kuruga Misiri .
40002016	Herode ku yaamanyire ngu abo banyabwengye bamureebize , yaagira ekiniga kingi , yaaragiira kwita abaana aboojo boona ab'omuri Beetelehemu n'omu byanga ebigyehinguririize , abahikize emyaka ebiri y'obukuru n'abatakagihikize , naihirira aha bunaku obu abanyabwengye baamugambiiremu .
40002017	Obwo nibwo ebigambo ebyagambirwe Yeremiya omurangi byahikiiriziibwe , ebirikugira biti :
40002018	Eiraka rikahurirwa omuri Raama ry'okuganya n'okucura munonga ; Rakeeli naaririra abaana be , atakyenda kuyaagirwa , ahabw'okuba boona bahwaireho .
40002019	Herode ku yaafiire , maraika wa Nyakubaho yaabonekyera Yosefu omu kirooto omuri Misiri , yaamugira ati :
40002020	Imuka otware omwana na nyina ogarukye omu nsi ya Isiraeli ; ahabw'okuba ababaire nibenda kwita omwana bafiire .
40002021	Yosefu nikwo kwimuka , akatwara omwana na nyina , akagaruka omu nsi ya Isiraeli .
40002022	Kwonka ku yaamanyire ngu Arikelao ahunguriire Herode ishe , kandi ku niwe mugabe wa Buyudaaya , yaatiina kugarukayo ; reero ku yaahaburiirwe omu kirooto , yaakuba yaaza omu ishaza rya Galilaaya .
40002023	Yaatuura omu kirorero ekirikwetwa Nazareeti , ngu ekyagambirwe abarangi kibone kuhikiirira , ekirikugira kiti : Aryayetwa Omunyanazareeti .
40003001	Omu biro ebyo Yohaana Omubatizi akaija naarangirira omu ihamba rya Buyudaaya ati :
40003002	Mwegarukyemu , ahabw'okuba obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru buri haihi .
40003003	Yohaana ogwo niwe ou Isaaya omurangi yaagambireho , ati : Hariho eiraka ry'orikwamuriza omu ihamba , ati : Mutebeekanisize Mukama omuhanda , muringaanize otuhanda twe .
40003004	Yohaana ogwo akaba ajwara ekijwaro ky'ebyoya by'engamira , ayezirikisa orukoba rw'oruhu ; ebyokurya bye biri enzigye n'obwoki bw'omu ishwa .
40003005	Aba Yerusalemu na Buyudaaya yoona n'ab'omu byanga byona ebiri haihi n'omugyera Yorudaani baija ahu ari ,
40003006	yaababatiriza omu mugyera Yorudaani nibaatura ebibi byabo .
40003007	Kwonka Yohaana , ku yaareebire Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo baingi nibaija kubatizibwa , yaabagira ati : Imwe baana b'empiri ' mwe , n'oha obahabwire kuhunga ekiniga ekirikwenda kwija ?
40003008	Mbwenu ku muraabe mwegarukiremu , nimukyorekyere omu mitwarize yaanyu ,
40003009	kandi murekye kweraata nimwegambaho muti : Twine Aburahamu , niwe tataitwe . Manya nyowe nimbagambira nti : Ruhanga amabaare aga naabaasa kugaihiramu Aburahamu abaijukuru .
40003010	Na hati empango etairwe aha mizi y'emiti ; n'ahabw'ekyo omuti gwona ogutarikwana bijuma birungi , nigutemwa , nigunagwa omu muriro .
40003011	Nyowe nimbabatiza n'amaizi ahabw'okwegarukamu , kwonka ogwo orikuunyija enyima , nankiza obushoboorozi , kandi tinshemereire kumukwatira nkaito , we aryabatiza na Mutima Orikwera n'omu muriro .
40003012	Orugari rwe rw'okuheheeza rumuri omu ngaro ; naija kuboneza embuga ye , ahunikye engano ze omu kitara ; reero ebishushunga abyotsye omu muriro ogutaraara .
40003013	Bwanyima Yesu akaruga Galilaaya , yaija Yorudaani kubatizibwa Yohaana .
40003014	Kwonka Yohaana yaayenda kumwangira naamugira ati : Manya niinye naakwetengire ngu ombatize , kandi mbwenu niinye waijaho !
40003015	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Mbwenu ikiriza kibe kityo . Manya tushemereire kuhikiiriza byona ebi Ruhanga arikutwendeza kukora . Yohaana atyo amwikiriza .
40003016	Yesu , ku yaaherize kubatizibwa , ahonaaho yaajabuka omu maizi , eiguru ryakinguuka , yaareeba Mutima wa Ruhanga naashuuma nk'enkombe naamwijaho ,
40003017	kandi eiraka ryayema omu iguru , nirigira riti : Ogu n'Omwana wangye ou nkunda , kandi ou nshemerererwa munonga .
40004001	Bwanyima Yesu akatwarwa Mutima omu ihamba kwohibwa Sitaane .
40004002	Ku yaamazire ebiro makumi ana naayesiibyakwo kandi naayeraazakwo , yaagira enjara .
40004003	Mpaho omwohi yaija , yaamugira ati : Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga , ragiira amabaare aga gahindukye emigaati .
40004004	Kwonka we yaagarukamu ati : Kikahandiikwa ngu : Omuntu tatungwa byokurya byonka , kureka kandi atungwa n'ekigambo kyona ekiruga ahari Ruhanga .
40004005	Bwanyima Sitaane yaamutwara omu rurembo orurikwera , yaamwemereza aha itungu rya Nyaruju ,
40004006	yaamugira ati : Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga , yerekyere , oyenagye ahansi ; ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa ngu : Aryakukwatsa baamaraika be , kandi ngu : Baryakutega emikono , ngu orekye kuhonda ekigyere kyawe aha ibaare .
40004007	Yesu amugira ati : Kandi kikahandiikwa ngu : Otaryosya Mukama Ruhanga waawe .
40004008	Bwanyima Sitaane yaamutwara aha rushozi ruraingwa munonga , yaamworeka obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi n'ekitiinwa kyabwo ;
40004009	yaamugira ati : Ebi byona niinyija kubikuha , ku orantsimbire amaju , wandamya .
40004010	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Rugaho , Sitaane ! Manya kikahandiikwa ngu : Ogume oramye Mukama Ruhanga waawe , kandi we wenka obe niwe waaheereza .
40004011	Sitaane atyo amurugaho ; baamaraika baija bamuheereza .
40004012	Yesu , ku yaahuriire ngu bakwatsire Yohaana , yaagaruka Galilaaya .
40004013	Ku yaarugire Nazareeti , yaagyenda yaaguma Kafarinaumu , ekirorero ky'aha mwegyego gw'enyanja , ahagati y'ebyanga bya Zebuluuni na Nafutaali .
40004014	Ekyo kyahikiiriza eki Isaaya omurangi yaagambire ati :
40004015	Ensi ya Zebuluuni n'ensi ya Nafutaali ey'aha muhanda ogurikuza aha nyanja , obuseeri bwa Yorudaani , Galilaaya ey'Abanyamahanga
40004016	abantu abaabaire batuura omu mwirima baakiirwe omushana mwingi ; n'abaabaire batwire omu nsi y'ekibunda kya rufu ; omushana gubajweraire .
40004017	Okwiha obwo Yesu yaatandika kurangirira naagira ati : Mwegarukyemu , ahabw'okuba obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru buri haihi .
40004018	Yesu , ku yaabaire naagyendagyenda aha rubaju rw'enyanja ya Galilaaya , yaareeba enyina-emwe ibiri , Simooni orikwetwa Petero , na Andereya omurumuna , nibatambika akatimba omu nyanja ; ahabw'okuba bakaba bari abajubi .
40004019	Yaabagira ati : Mwije munkuratire niinyija kubahindura abajubi b'abantu .
40004020	Nabo ahonaaho baatsigaho akatimba kaabo , baamukuratira .
40004021	Ku yairiire omu maisho kakye , yaareeba abandi babiri enyina-emwe , Yakobo mwene Zebedaayo na Yohaana omurumuna , bari omu bwato na Zebedaayo ishebo , nibashumikanisa obutimba bwabo ; nabo yaabeeta .
40004022	Ahonaaho baatsigaho obwato na ishebo , baamukuratira .
40004023	Yesu akagyendagyenda omuri Galilaaya yoona naayegyesa omu mateeraniro gaabo , naarangirira Amakuru Marungi g'obukama bwa Ruhanga , naakiza ibara ndwara n'obusaasi bwona omu bantu .
40004024	Okurangaanwa kwe kwabuga omuri Siriya yoona , baamureetera boona abaabaire barwaire , n'abaine obusaasi bw'emiringo etari emwe , n'abatembirwe ebyago n'ebigwantsimbo , n'abazingazingirwe ; haza yaabakiza .
40004025	Reero ebimbuuro by'abantu , abaarugire Galilaaya , Dekapoli Yerusalemu , Buyudaaya na seeri ya Yorudaani , baamukuratira .
40005001	Yesu , ku yaareebire ebimbuuro by'abantu , yainamuka omu rushozi , yaashutama ahansi ; abatendekwa be baija baamuhika .
40005002	Mpaho yaatandika kubeegyesa naagira ati :
40005003	Baine omugisha abakyene omu mutima , ahabw'okuba obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru n'obwabo .
40005004	Baine omugisha abarikuganya , ahabw'okuba baryahuumurizibwa .
40005005	Baine omugisha abacureezi , ahabw'okuba nibo baritunga ensi .
40005006	Baine omugisha abagira enjara n'eiriho kukora ebi Ruhanga akunda , ahabw'okuba baryahaaga .
40005007	Baine omugisha abanyambabazi , ahabw'okuba nabo baryazigirirwa .
40005008	Baine omugisha ab'emitima eshemeire , ahabw'okuba baryareeba Ruhanga .
40005009	Baine omugisha abagarukanisa abantu bakagira obusingye , ahabw'okuba baryayetwa abaana ba Ruhanga .
40005010	Baine omugisha abahiiganisibwa nibaturwa okukora ebi Ruhanga akunda , ahabw'okuba obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru n'obwabo .
40005011	Imwe mwine omugisha abantu ku baribahiiganisa , kandi ku baribabeiherera ekintu kyona ekibi nibabantura .
40005012	Mushemererwe kandi munanukye , ahabw'okuba ekihembo kyanyu omu iguru ni kihango ; manya nikwo baahiiganiise batyo abarangi abaababandiize .
40005013	Imwe muri omwonyo gw'ensi ; beitu omwonyo ku gwakuhwamu ensha , egyo nsha ekaagarurwamu eta ? Guba gutakiine mugasho , kureka okunagwa aheeru , abantu bakaguribatiirira .
40005014	Imwe muri omushana ogujwera ensi . Manya orurembo orwombekirwe aha kibungo tirweshereka .
40005015	Kandi abantu tibahemba tabaaza bakagijuumikira ekiibo , kureka bagita aha kikondo , ngu emurikire boona abari omu nju .
40005016	Mbwenu omushana gwanyu gugume gujwere gutyo abantu , babone kureeba ebirungi ebi murikukora , bahimbise Shoimwe ow'omu iguru .
40005017	Mutateekateeka ngu nkaija kwihaho eby'eiteeka n'eby'abarangi ; tindaizire kubiihaho kureka okubihikiiriza .
40005018	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Eiguru n'ensi ku biriba bikiriho , tiharigira kanyuguta nobu kaakuba akatoonyezo na kamwe akariruga omu iteeka , ebyo byona bitakahikiiriziibwe .
40005019	Weena orihenda ekiragiro kimwe ahari ebyo , nangwa nobu kyakuba kiri kikye okukira ebindi , kandi yaayorekyerera atyo abandi , aryayetwa orikuhereerukayo omu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru ; kwonka oribyorobera , akabyegyesa abandi , aryayetwa mukuru omu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru .
40005020	Nikyo ndikubagambirira nti : Okuhikiirira kwanyu ku kuriba kutakizire okw'abahangu b'eiteeka n'okw'Abafarisaayo , timuritaaha mu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru n'akakye .
40005021	Mukahurira ku aba ira baagambiirwe bati : Otariita ; kandi weena oriita aryaba ow'okucwerwa orubanja .
40005022	Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti : Weena origwerwa kubi mwene waabo , aryacwerwa orubanja ; weena orijuma mwene waabo ati : Rwata ! aryatwarwa omu ishengyero ; kandi weena orimugira ati : Kifeera ' we ! aryanagwa okuzimu omu muriro .
40005023	N'ahabw'ekyo , ku oraabe oreetsire omutoijo gwawe aha itambiro , waijuka ku mwene waanyu aine eki arikufa naiwe ,
40005024	tsigaho omutoijo gwawe omu maisho g'eitambiro , ogyende , obanze ogarukane na mwene waanyu , bwanyima ogarukye , oheyo omutoijo gwawe .
40005025	Rahuka kugarukana n'orikukutabaariza nimukiza omu iramuriro , orikukutabaariza atakaakuhayo aha muramuzi , omuramuzi akakukwatsa omukuru w'ekihome , n'onu akakigwigatiramu .
40005026	Buzimazima ninkugambira nti : Torikirugamu okuhitsya obu oriihura akasente koona akakitsigaireyo .
40005027	Mukahurira ku kyagambirwe kiti : Otarishambana .
40005028	Kwonka nimbagambira nti : Weena orikureeba omukazi akamwetenga , biri ashambaine nawe omu mutima .
40005029	Mbwenu eriisho ryawe rya buryo ku riraabe nirikureetera kukora ekibi , riihemu , orinagye ; haakiri iwe okufeerwa orugingo rwawe rumwe , okukira omubiri gwawe gwona okunagwa okuzimu omu muriro .
40005030	Omukono gwawe gwa buryo ku guraabe nigukureetera kukora ekibi , gutemeho , ogunagye ; haakiri okufeerwa orugingo rwawe , okukira omubiri gwawe gwona okunagwa okuzimu omu muriro .
40005031	Kandi kikagambwa kiti : Weena orikushenda omukazi we , amuhe ebaruha y'okumushenda .
40005032	Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti : Weena oshenda omukazi we , atamutuzire bushambani , aba amureeteire kushambana ; kandi weena oshwera oshenzirwe , biri ashambaine .
40005033	Mukahurira ku kyagambiirwe aba ira kiti : Otarirahira ebishuba , kureka ngu ohikiiririze Nyakubaho ebi orahiire .
40005034	Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti : Otarirahira n'akakye , nobu ryakuba eiguru , ahabw'okuba n'ekitebe kya Ruhanga eky'obugabe ,
40005035	nari shi okurahira ensi , ahabw'okuba n'endibatiro ye , nainga Yerusalemu , ahabw'okuba n'orurembo rw'omugabe mukuru .
40005036	Kandi otarirahira omutwe gwawe , ahabw'okuba torikubaasa kweza rushokye rumwe nari okurwiraguza .
40005037	Kureka eki muraagambe kibe , eego , nari ngaaha ; kyona ekirenzya ahari ebyo kiruga aha Mubi .
40005038	Mukahurira ku kyagambirwe kiti : Eriisho ririhwe eriisho n'eriino ririhwe eriino .
40005039	Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti : Otaryangira omubi . Kureka weena orikuteera oruhi omushaya gwa buryo , omuhindurire n'ogundi .
40005040	Kandi weena oryenda kukutabaariza , yaakwaka ekanzu yaawe , murekye atware n'omunagiro gwawe .
40005041	Na weena orikugyemesereza kugyenda nawe kilomita emwe , gyenda nawe kilomita ibiri .
40005042	Oraakushabe , omuhe ; kandi oraayende kukweguzaho , otarimwehuzya .
40005043	Mukahurira ku kyagambirwe kiti : Kunda mutaahi waawe , oyangye omuzigu waawe .
40005044	Kwonka nyowe nimbagambira nti : Mukunde abazigu baanyu , mushabire abarikubahiiganisa ,
40005045	mubone kuba abaana ba Shoimwe ori omu iguru ; ahabw'okuba we ajwisiza omushana ababi n'abarungi , kandi agwisiza enjura abahikiriire n'abatahikiriire .
40005046	Mbwenu ku muraakunde abarikubakunda , nimuba mutungire bihembo ki ? Abashorooza b'omushoro nabo tikwo bagira ?
40005047	Kandi ku muraabe nimuramutsya beene waanyu bonka , abandi nimuba nimubakiza ki ? N'Abanyamahanga tikwo bagira ?
40005048	N'ahabw'ekyo nu , mube abahikiire kimwe , nka Shoimwe ow'omu iguru oku ari ohikiire kimwe .
40006001	Mwerinde , murekye kukora eby'okuhikiirira byanyu omu maisho g'abantu , ngu babareebe ; ku muraakore mutyo , Shoimwe ori omu iguru taribaha bihembo .
40006002	N'ahabw'ekyo ku oraagume waagabira abooro , orekye kukirangirira nk'oku endyarya zigira omu mateeraniro n'omu bihandagazi , ngu zibone kusiimwa abantu . Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ziba zaatungire ebihembo byazo .
40006003	Ku oraabe noogabira abooro , omukono gwawe gwa bumosho gurekye kumanya eki ogwa buryo gurikukora ,
40006004	okugaba kwawe kubone kuba okw'omu mubonano , na Shoimwe oreeba eby'omu mubonano aryakuha ebihembo .
40006005	Kandi ku muraabe nimushaba Ruhanga , mutariba nk'endyarya ezikunda kushaba zeemereire omu mateeraniro n'omu nteeraniro z'emihanda , ngu zibone kureebwa abantu . Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ziba zaatungire ebihembo byazo .
40006006	Mbwenu ku oraaze kushaba , otaahe omu kishengye kyawe , okingye orwigi , oshabe Shoimwe ow'omu mubonano ; kandi Shoimwe ogwo oreeba eby'omu mubonano , aryakuha ebihembo .
40006007	Haza ku muraabe nimushaba Ruhanga , murekye kurandagatana nk'oku Abanyamahanga bagira . Manya bo bateekateeka ngu nibaija kuhurirwa ahabw'ebigambo byabo bingi .
40006008	Mutaba nkabo ; ahabw'okuba Shoimwe aba naamanya ebi murikwetenga mutakamushabire .
40006009	Mugume nu mushabe muti : Tataitwe ow'omu iguru , eiziina ryawe ritiinwe ;
40006010	obukama bwawe bwije ; ebi okunda bikorwe omu nsi , nk'oku bikorwa omu iguru .
40006011	Otuhe eri izooba egabo yaitu y'obutoosha .
40006012	Otusaasire ebibi byaitu , nkaitwe okutusaasira abatushaagiza .
40006013	Otatureka tukoohibwa , kureka otujune Omubi .
40006014	Manya ku murisaasira abantu ebibi byabo , naimwe Shoimwe ow'omu iguru aryabasaasira ;
40006015	kwonka ku muriba mutasaasiire bantu bibi byabo , na Shoimwe ow'omu iguru taribasaasira byanyu .
40006016	Kandi ku muryesiibyakwo , mutariiririmba ahamaisho nk'endyarya , ahabw'okuba zeekokootsa ahamaisho , ngu abantu bareebe oku zeesiibizekwo . Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ziba zaatungire ebihembo byazo .
40006017	Kwonka iwe , ku oraayesiibyekwo , guma oyesiigye amajuta omu mutwe , onaabe ahamaisho ,
40006018	abantu barekye kumanya ku oyesiibizekwo , kureka kimanywe Shoimwe ow'omu mubonano ; kandi Shoimwe ogwo , oreeba eby'omu mubonano , aryakuha ebihembo .
40006019	Mutaryebiikira eitungo omu nsi , ei ebiyenje n'omukyereenyo birisiisira , n'ei abashuma bafumurira , bakariiba ;
40006020	kureka mwebiikire eitungo omu iguru , ei ebiyenje nari omukyereenyo bitarisiisira , n'ei abashuma batafumurira bakariiba .
40006021	Manya ahu eitungo ryawe riri , n'omutima gwawe niho guba .
40006022	Eriisho niryo rumuri rw'omubiri . N'ahabw'ekyo eriisho ryawe ku riba rihuriire , omubiri gwawe gwona gubugwa okuhweza ;
40006023	kwonka eriisho ryawe ku riba rirwaire , omubiri gwawe gwona gutimba omwirima . Mbwenu shi , okuhweza okukurimu ku kuraabe kuri omwirima , omwirima ogwo ka ni mwingi !
40006024	Tihariho obaasa kuheereza abakama babiri ; ahabw'okuba aryayangaho omwe , akunde ondi ; nari aryahamira ahari omwe , agaye ondi . Manya timurikubaasa kuheereza Ruhanga kandi n'eitungo .
40006025	Nikyo ndikugambirira nti : Mutaryemerereza omutima eby'amagara gaanyu , ebi muraarye , nari ebi muraanywe , nainga eby'emibiri yaanyu ebi muraajware . Mbwenu shi , amagara tigarikukira ebyokurya , n'omubiri tigurikukira ebijwaro ?
40006026	Mureebere aha nyonyi z'omu kaabunga ; tizibiba , tizigyesha , kandi tizihunika mu bitara , haza kunu Shoimwe ow'omu iguru aziriisa . Mbwenu imwe timurikuzikira ?
40006027	Omuriimwe hariho owaakubaasa kwongyera aha myaka y'amagara ge , nobu yaakwemereza omutima ata ?
40006028	Mbwenu nimwemerereza ki omutima ahabw'eby'okujwara ? Muteekateekye aha birabyo by'omu ishwa oku bikura ; tibikora mirimo kandi tibyogosha .
40006029	Manya nimbagambira nti : Nangwa na Solomooni , omu kitiinwa kye kyona , taraizihiirwe bijwaro nka kimwe aharibyo .
40006030	Mbwenu Ruhanga ku araabe ajweka atyo obunyaatsi bw'omu ishwa , oburiho eri izooba nyencakare bukanagwa omu kikoomi , kaashwa imwe bantu ' mwe , abaine okwikiriza kukye !
40006031	N'ahabw'ekyo mutaryemereza omutima nimugira muti : Turyarya ki ? nari : Turyanywa ki ? nainga : Turyajwara ki ?
40006032	Manya ebyo byona nibyo Abanyamahanga baitanira ; kandi Shoimwe ow'omu iguru naamanya ku murikubyetenga byona .
40006033	Mbwenu mubanze mumarire omutima aha by'obukama bwe n'aha bi arikwenda ; haza ebyo byona biryabongyerwaho .
40006034	N'ahabw'ekyo mutaryemerereza omutima ebya nyencakare , ahabw'okuba nyencakare eryayeyemerereza yonka omutima . Reka buri kiro kihwe n'amaganya gaakyo .
40007001	Mutaricwa orubanja , naimwe mutakaarucwerwa .
40007002	Manya nk'oku mucwera abandi orubanja , naimwe nikwo murirucwerwa ; kandi endengo ei murengyeramu abandi , naimwe niyo murirengyerwamu .
40007003	Ahabw'enki nooreeba akatokoozi akari omu riisho rya mwene sho , haza kunu otarikureeba mpimbi eri omu ryawe ?
40007004	Nari shi noobaasa ota kugira mwene sho oti : Ka nkwihe akatokoozi omu riisho , haza kunu empimbi eri omu ryawe ?
40007005	Iwe ndyarya ' we , banza oyeihe empimbi omu riisho , haza obone kuhweza gye kwiha akatokoozi omu rya mwene sho .
40007006	Mutariha embwa ekintu ekyeziibwe kandi mutaritambikira empunu amahunde gaanyu , zitakaagaribatiirira , zikabahindukana , zikabagaashuura .
40007007	Mushabe , muryaheebwa ; musherure muryazoora ; mwiguze , muryaigurirwa .
40007008	Manya weena oshaba aheebwa , n'osherura azoora , n'oiguza aigurirwa .
40007009	Ni muntu ki omuriimwe , ou omwana we yaakushaba omugaati , onu akamuha eibaare ?
40007010	Nari akimushaba ekyenyanja , onu akamuha enjoka ?
40007011	Mbwenu imwe ababi , ku muraabe nimumanya kuha abaana baanyu ebirungi , Shoimwe ow'omu iguru k'arikizaho kuha ebirungi abarikumushaba !
40007012	Reero nu , byona ebi mwakwenzire abantu babagirire , naimwe mube nikwo mwabagirira ; ahabw'okuba ekyo nikyo eiteeka n'abarangi bimanyisa .
40007013	Mutaahire omu irembo erifunzire ; ahabw'okuba abatoora omuhanda ogurikuza omu kucwekyerera baraba omu irembo erigarami , kandi ogwo muhanda gwanguhi , n'abagutoora baba baingi ;
40007014	kwonka abatoora omuhanda ogurikuza omu magara baraba omu irembo erifunzire , kandi ogwo muhanda gugumire , n'abaguzoora baba bakye .
40007015	Mwerinde abarangi b'ebishuba ababaizira nibashusha entaama , kwonka omunda bari emishega erikushonshomera .
40007016	Muryabamanyira aha mitwarize yaabo . Ebyo , emizaabibu ekaashoromwa aha matojo , nari emitiini aha bushebashebe ?
40007017	Manya omuti gwona omurungi gwana ebijuma birungi , kwonka omuti omubi gwana ebijuma bibi .
40007018	Omuti murungi tigubaasa kwana bijuma bibi , n'omuti mubi tigubaasa kwana bijuma birungi .
40007019	Omuti gwona ogutaana bijuma birungi gutemwa , gunagwa omu muriro .
40007020	N'ahabw'ekyo muryabamanyira aha mitwarize yaabo .
40007021	Ti weena ogira ati : Mukama wangye , Mukama wangye , ngu niwe aritaaha mu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru , kureka ogwo okora ebi Tata ow'omu iguru akunda .
40007022	Aha izooba eryo baingi baryangira bati : Mukama waitu , Mukama waitu , beitu shi titurarangire ebiribaho omu iziina ryawe , tukabinga ebyago omu iziina ryawe , kandi tukakora eby'okutangaaza omu iziina ryawe ?
40007023	Reero naanye ndyabagambira butunu nti : Tinkabamanyaga ; mundugyeho , imwe nkozi z'ebibi ' mwe !
40007024	N'ahabw'ekyo , weena ohurira ebigambo byangye akabikuratira , aryaba nk'omunyabwengye owaayombekire enju ye aha rukiri ;
40007025	bwanyima enjura ku yaagwire , emitunga yaahimintika , eihunga ryahoorera , byona byateera egyo nju , kwonka tiyaakumbagara , ahabw'okuba ekaba eyombekirwe aha rukiri .
40007026	Kandi weena ohurira ebigambo byangye ebi , atabikuratire , aryaba nk'omushema owaayombekire enju ye aha musheenyi ;
40007027	bwanyima enjura ku yaagwire , emitunga yaahimintika , eihunga ryaija , byona byateera egyo nju , yaakumbagara , yaasheenyagurikira kimwe .
40007028	Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo bigambo , ebimbuuro by'abantu baatangaarira emyegyeseze ye ,
40007029	ahabw'okuba akabeegyesa aine obushoboorozi , atari nk'abahangu baabo b'eiteeka .
40008001	Yesu ku yaashuumire naaruga aha rushozi , enyanja y'abantu yaamukuratira .
40008002	Mpaho omubembe yaija ahu ari , yaajuumara omu maisho ge , yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , ku oraabe nookisiima , noobaasa kunshemeza .
40008003	Yesu yaagorora omukono yaamukoraho naagira ati : Eego , ninkisiima , shemera ! Ahonaaho yaakira ebibembe , yaashemera .
40008004	Bwanyima Yesu yaamugira ati : Otagira n'omwe ou waakigambira ; kureka irooko , oyeyorekye omuhongyerezi , oheyo omutoijo ogu Musa yaaragiire , kuhamiza abantu .
40008005	Yesu ku yaataahire ati omuri Kafarinaumu , haija omukuru w'abaserukare igana , yaamweshengyereza ,
40008006	naagira ati : Mukama wangye , omuheereza wangye abyami omuka azingazingirwe , naahururwa munonga .
40008007	Yesu yaamugira ati : Naaza kwija , mmukize .
40008008	Omukuru w'abaserukare igana yaamugarukamu ati : Mukama wangye , timpikire kukutaasya omwangye ; kwonka gira eki waagamba , haza omuheereza wangye naija kukira .
40008009	Manya naanye ndi omutegyekwa , kandi nyine abaserukare abu ndikutegyeka . Ku ndikugambira omwe nti : Gyenda , agyenda ; n'ondiijo nti : Ija , aija ; n'omuheereza wangye nti : Kora eki , akikora .
40008010	Yesu ku yaahuriire ekyo , yaatangaara , yaagira abamukuratiire , ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira ku ntakareebaga muntu n'omwe omuri Isiraeli oine okwikiriza nk'oku .
40008011	Nimbagambira nti : Baingi baryaruga burugwa-izooba na burengyerwa-izooba , bashutame aha bugyenyi hamwe na Aburahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo , omu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru ;
40008012	kwonka abaazairwe kuba ab'obukama obwo babingirwe aheeru omu mwirima , ei abantu bariririra , bakanena enshaya .
40008013	Mpaho Yesu agira ogwo mukuru w'abaserukare igana , ati : Irooko ogyende ; kibe nk'oku waikiriza . Kandi ogwo muheereza yaakira omuri ako kaanya .
40008014	Bwanyima Yesu , ku yaataahire omwa Petero , yaashanga nyinazaara wa Petero abyami , arwaire omushwija .
40008015	Yaamukora aha mukono , omushwija gwamurugaho ; yaimuka , yaamuheereza .
40008016	Ogwo mwabazyo baamureetera baingi abaabaire batembirwe ebyago ; ebyo byago yaabibingisa ekigambo , kandi yaakiza boona abaabaire barwaire .
40008017	Ekyo kyahikiiriza eki Isaaya omurangi yaagambire ati : We wenka akatwara eminyangararo yaitu , yaayekorera endwara zaitu .
40008018	Yesu , ku yaareebire ekimbuuro ky'abantu bamwehinguririize , yaaragiira abatendekwa kwambuka seeri .
40008019	Reero haija omuhangu w'eiteeka , yaamugira ati : Mwegyesa , niinyija kukukuratira ahu oraaze hoona .
40008020	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Zaamuha zigira amaaya , n'enyonyi z'omu kaabunga zigira ebyashuri , kwonka Omwana w'omuntu tagira butaaho .
40008021	Ondiijo aha batendekwa yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , ndeka , mbanze nze kuziika tata .
40008022	Kwonka Yesu yaamugira ati : Nkuratira ; orekye abafiire babe nibo baaziika abafu baabo .
40008023	Yesu ku yaagiire omu bwato , abatendekwa be baamukuratira .
40008024	Haza haija eihunga ringi aha nyanja , ebingonzi byayenda kurengyera aha bwato ; obwo we agwejegyeire .
40008025	Batyo baija , baamusisiimura nibagira bati : Mukama waitu , tujune twafa !
40008026	Yaababuuza ati : Imwe bantu b'okwikiriza kukye ' mwe , nimutiinira ki ? Atyo aimuka , akabukira omuyaga n'enyanja ; habaho obucureera bwingi .
40008027	Abantu batangaara nibagira bati : Mbwenu ogu ni muntu ki , orikuhurirwa nobu byakuba omuyaga n'enyanja !
40008028	Yesu , ku yaahikire seeri omu nsi y'Abageraseene , yaabuganwa abatembirwe ebyago babiri nibaruga omu bituuro . Abo bantu bakaba bari ab'akabi , hatariho orikuraba omuri ogwo muhanda .
40008029	Mpaho baaborooga bati : Noofa ki naitwe , iwe Mwana wa Ruhanga ! Oizire kutwita kubi obunaku butakahikire ?
40008030	Reero obwo hakaba hariho omukumbi gw'empunu nyingi , niziriira hangahari nabo .
40008031	Ebyo byago byamweshengyereza biti : Ku oraatubingye , otwohereze omuri ogwo mukumbi gw'empunu .
40008032	Nawe abigira ati : Nimwirooko ! Bityo bibarugaho , bitaaha omuri ezo mpunu . Ogwo mukumbi gwona guhiringitira aha nengo , gugwa omu nyanja gurohamamu .
40008033	Bwanyima abariisa b'ezo mpunu baahunga , baaza omu rurembo , baateekyerereza abaamwo byona , n'ebyaba aha baaba batembirwe ebyago .
40008034	Mpaho ab'orurembo boona baija kubugana Yesu : ku baamureebire , baamweshengyereza kubarugira omu kyanga .
40009001	Yesu ku yaagiire omu bwato , yaayambuka , yaahika omu rurembo rw'owaabo .
40009002	Omuri ago magingo baamureetera ozingazingirwe abyami aha katanda . Yesu , ku yaareebire baine okwikiriza , yaagambira ozingazingirwe ati : Guma , mwana wangye ; waasaasirwa ebibi byawe .
40009003	Reero bamwe aha bahangu b'eiteeka baagambirana bati : Ogu muntu yaarogota .
40009004	Kwonka Yesu ahabw'okumanya ebiteekateeko byabo , yaababuuza ati : Nimuteekateekyera ki ebitahikire omu mitima yaanyu ?
40009005	Mbwenu ekirikurahuka ni kiiha , okugira nti ; Waasaasirwa ebibi byawe , nari okugira nti : Imuka , ogyende ?
40009006	Mbwenu , ka mboorekye ku Omwana w'omuntu aine obushoboorozi omu nsi kusaasira ebibi . Atyo agambira ozingazingirwe ati : Imuka , oiheho akatanda kaawe , otaahe .
40009007	Onu aimuka , ataaha .
40009008	Ekimbuuro ky'abantu ku kyakireebire , kyatiina , kyahimbisa Ruhanga owaahaire abantu obushoboorozi burikwingana butyo .
40009009	Yesu , ku yaabaire naarugayo , yaareeba omushaija orikwetwa Matayo , ashutami omu ihoorezo ry'omushoro ; yaamugira ati : Nkuratira . N'onu yaimuka , yaamukuratira .
40009010	Mpaho Yesu ku yaabaire ari omwa Matayo naarya , abashorooza b'omushoro baingi n'abasiisi baija , baashutama nawe aha meeza hamwe n'abatendekwa be .
40009011	Abafarisaayo ku baakireebire , baagira abatendekwa be bati : Ahabw'enki omwegyesa waanyu naarya n'abashorooza b'omushoro kandi n'abasiisi ?
40009012	Yesu ku akihurira , abagira ati : Abahuriire tibo beetenga omufumu , kureka abarwaire .
40009013	Mbwenu mugyende mwegye amakuru g'eki : Eki nyenda n'embabazi ti bitambo ; manya tindaizire kweta bahikiriire , kureka abasiisi .
40009014	Bwanyima abatendekwa ba Yohaana baija ahari Yesu , baamubuuza bati : Ahabw'enki itwe n'Abafarisaayo twesiibyakwo , haza abatendekwa baawe bateesiibyakwo ?
40009015	Yesu yaabagira ati : Abakwe bakaaganya kishwera akibaine ? Kwonka obunaku buryahika , kishwera abaihweho , haza obwo nibwo baryesiibyakwo .
40009016	Kandi tihariho muntu oteera ekiremu ky'omwenda musya aha kijwaro kikuru ; ahabw'okuba ekyo kiremu kitaagura ekyo kijwaro , haza ekitaaguka kihanguha .
40009017	Kandi na viino y'omutahe teshukwa mu furebe nkuru ; ku kyakuba kwo , efurebe zikaabaruka , viino esheeheka , n'efurebe zisiisikara ; kureka viino y'omutahe eshukwa omu furebe nsya , haza byombi birama .
40009018	Yesu ku yaabaire naakibagambira atyo , haija omutegyeki , yaamutsimbira amaju , yaamugira ati : Muhara wangye yaafa ; ija , omuteho engaro , akire .
40009019	Yesu atyo aimuka , amukurata hamwe n'abatendekwa be .
40009020	Mpaho haija omukazi owaabaire amazire emyaka ikumi n'ebiri arwaire ekyejwiso ; amureetwa enyima , akora aha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye ;
40009021	ahabw'okuba akateekateeka ati : Nobu naakukora aha kijwaro kye kwonka , nkaakira .
40009022	Yesu atyo ahinduka , amureeba , amugira ati : Huumura , mwana wangye ; okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza . Ahonaaho ogwo mukazi akira .
40009023	Yesu , ku yaahikire omu nju y'ogwo mutegyeki , yaareeba abarikuteera emikuri n'ekimbuuro ky'abatu nikirabanamu ,
40009024	yaagira ati : Murugyeho ; manya omwishiki tafiire , agwejegyeire . Batyo baamushekyerera .
40009025	Ku baaherize kushohoza abantu , yaataahamu , yaakwata ogwo mwishiki omukono , ogwo mwishiki yaimuka .
40009026	Enkuru egyo yaabuga omuri ekyo kyanga kyona .
40009027	Yesu ku yaabaire naarugayo naahingura , abashaija babiri empumi baamukuratira nibamuhoogyera bati : Mwene Daudi , tugirire embabazi !
40009028	Ku yaataahire omu nju , ezo mpumi zaamuhika ; Yesu yaazibuuza ati : Nimwikiriza ku ekyo ndikubaasa kukikora ? Baamugarukamu bati : Eego , Mukama waitu .
40009029	Mpaho yaabakora ahamaisho naagira ati : Ka kibakorerwe nk'oku mwaikiriza .
40009030	Amaisho gaabo gatyo gaahumuuka . Bwanyima Yesu yaabeehanangiriza munonga , ati : Mwerinde hatagira owaakimanya .
40009031	Kwonka bo ku baagyenzire , baamurangaana omuri ekyo kyanga kyona .
40009032	Ku baabaire nibarugayo , abantu baamureetera ekiteta ekiriho ekyago .
40009033	Ekyo kyago ku kyabingirwe , ekiteta kyagamba ; abantu baatangaara , baagira bati : Ekyo tikikareebwaga omuri Isiraeli .
40009034	Kwonka Abafarisaayo baagira bati : Manya ebyago naabibingisa obushoboorozi bwa mukama waabyo .
40009035	Kandi Yesu akagyenda naaraba omu ndembo zoona n'omu birorero , naayegyesa omu mateeraniro gaabo , naarangirira Amakuru Marungi g'obukama bwa Ruhanga , kandi naakiza endwara zoona n'obumuga bwona .
40009036	Bwanyima ku yaareebire ebimbuuro by'abantu , yaabagirira esaasi ahabw'okuba bakaba bashobeirwe , bataine kihwera , bari nk'entaama zitaine muriisa .
40009037	Nawe nikwo kugira abatendekwa be ati : Eby'okugyesha ni bingi , kwonka abagyesi ni bakye ;
40009038	n'ahabw'ekyo mushabe Mukama w'eigyesha ayohereze abakozi omu by'okugyesha bye .
40010001	Yesu akeeta abatendekwa be ikumi na babiri , yaabaha obushoboorozi bw'okubinga ebyago n'okukiza endwara yoona n'obumuga bwona .
40010002	Aga nigo maziina g'entumwa ikumi na ibiri : ow'okubanza ni Simooni oyetwa Petero , na Andereya omurumuna ; Yakobo mwene Zebedaayo , na Yohaana omurumuna ;
40010003	Filipo na Baritolomaayo ; Tomasi na Matayo omushorooza w'omushoro ; Yakobo mwene Alufaayo , na Tadaayo ;
40010004	Simooni enkunzi y'eihanga , na Yuda owa Kariota , owaamureebize .
40010005	Eikumi na babiri abo Yesu akabatuma naabaragiira ati : Mutariza ei Abanyamahanga bari , kandi mutaritaaha omu rurembo rwona orw'Abasamariya .
40010006	Haakiri muze omu ntaama ezaabuzire ez'ab'omu ruganda rwa Isiraeli .
40010007	Kandi ku muraabe nimugyenda , murangirire nimugira muti : Obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru buri haihi .
40010008	Mukize abarwaire , muzoore abafiire , mushemeze ababembe , mubingye ebyago . Mukaheerwa busha , naimwe muheere busha .
40010009	Mutaringyendana omu mifuko yaanyu ezaabu nari efeeza nainga omuringa ;
40010010	nobu yaakuba efurebe omu rugyendo rwanyu , nainga amakanzu abiri , nari enkaito nobu yaakuba enkoni ; ahabw'okuba omukozi ashemereire kuheebwa eby'okumutunga .
40010011	Ekirorero kyona nari ekyaro eki muraazemu , mubanze mubuuririze omuntu waamwo oshemereire , mumuraarire okuhitsya obu murirugayo .
40010012	Ku muraataahe omu nju , mugire muti : Nimukagire obusingye !
40010013	Abantu b'omuri egyo nju ku baraabaakiire , endamutsyo yaanyu y'okubendeza obusingye ebagumeho . Kwonka ku baraayangye kubaakiira , egyo ndamutsyo yaanyu mugigarukane .
40010014	Omuntu weena oraayangye kubaakiira , nari yaayanga kuhurira ebi murikugamba , ku muriba nimuruga omuri egyo nju nari ekirorero , mukunkumure omucuucu gw'aha bigyere byanyu .
40010015	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , ekifubiro kya Sodoma na Gomora kiryayemerwa okukira eky'ekyo kirorero .
40010016	Reeba , nimbatuma muri nk'entaama eziri ahagati y'emishega ; n'ahabw'ekyo mube enyabwengye nk'enjoka , n'abataine kabi nk'enkombe .
40010017	Mwerinde abantu , ahabw'okuba baryabahayo omu mashengyero , babaasire omu mateeraniro gaabo ,
40010018	babakurubanire omu maisho g'abategyeki abakuru n'ag'abagabe nibabantura , mubone kuba baakareebi aharibo n'aha Banyamahanga .
40010019	Ku baribahayo , mutaryemereza omutima oku muryetonganira n'eki murigamba , ahabw'okuba muryaheebwa eki murigamba omuri ako kaanya .
40010020	Manya tiimwe murigamba , kureka Mutima wa Shoimwe niwe aribagambisa .
40010021	Mukuru w'omuntu aryahayo omurumuna kwitwa , na ishe w'omwana aheyo omwana we ; kandi abaana baryaimukiiriza abazaire baabo , babaitise ;
40010022	naimwe muryayangwa boona ahabwangye . Kwonka origumisiriza akahika aha muheru , niwe arijunwa .
40010023	Mbwenu ku baribahiiganisiza omu kirorero kimwe , muhungire omu kindi ; buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Timuribuga birorero bya Isiraeli byona Omwana w'omuntu atakaizire .
40010024	Manya omutendekwa takira mwegyesa we , n'omuhuuku takira mukama we .
40010025	Kikaananura omutendekwa yaaba nk'omwegyesa we , n'omuhuuku yaaba nka mukama we . Nyineeka ku baraabe bamweetsire Beelizebuli , ab'eka ye baryashura ki !
40010026	N'ahabw'ekyo mutaribatiina ; ahabw'okuba tihariho kishwekirwe ekitarishuuruurwa , nari ekisherekirwe ekitarimanywa .
40010027	Eki ndibagambirira omu mubonano mukigambire aharikuhweza ; eki murikuhurira nibagambirana omu kutu , mukigambire aha mutwe gw'enju .
40010028	Kandi murekye kutiina abarikwita omubiri , kwonka batarikubaasa kwita magara g'omutima . Haakiri mutiine Ogwo orikubaasa kucwekyereza byombi , amagara g'omutima n'omubiri okuzimu omu muriro .
40010029	Hari ebiteerankumba bibiri tibigura sente emwe ? kwonka tihariho kimwe aharibyo ekigwa ahansi Shoimwe atenzire .
40010030	Nangwa n'eishokye ry'aha mutwe gwanyu ryona rikabarwa .
40010031	Mbwenu nu , mutatiina ; muri ab'obuguzi okukira ebiteerankumba bingi .
40010032	N'ahabw'ekyo weena orikuunyemera omu maisho g'abantu , naanye ndyamwemera omu maisho ga Tata ow'omu iguru ;
40010033	kwonka weena orikuunyoga omu maisho g'abantu , naanye ndyamwogyera omu maisho ga Tata ow'omu iguru .
40010034	Mutateekateeka ngu nkaija kureeta obusingye omu nsi ; tindaizire kureeta busingye , kureka rurara .
40010035	Manya nkaija kureetera omwojo kurwanisa ishe , omwishiki kurwanisa nyina , omukaamwana kurwanisa nyinazaara ;
40010036	ahabw'okuba abazigu b'omuntu baryaba ab'omu ka ye .
40010037	Okunda ishe nari nyina kubankiza , tanshemereire ; n'ogwo okunda omutabani nari omuhara kubankiza , tanshemereire ;
40010038	kandi otakiriza musharaba gwe akankurata , tanshemereire .
40010039	Weena okiza amagara ge , aryagafeerwa , kandi weena ohayo amagara ge ahabwangye , aryagagarurirwa .
40010040	Weena obaakiira , biri niinye ayakiire ; kandi weena onyakiira , biri ayakiire owantumire .
40010041	Weena oyakiira omurangi ngu ahabw'okuba n'omurangi , aryaheebwa ebihembo by'omurangi ; kandi oyakiira omuntu ohikiriire ahabw'okuba ngu n'ohikiriire , aryaheebwa ebihembo by'ohikiriire .
40010042	Na weena orikuha omwe ahari aba abato , nobu kyakuba ekikopo ky'amaizi garikufuka , ngu ahabw'okuba nankuratira , buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Taribura kihembo kye .
40011001	Bwanyima Yesu , ku yaaherize kuhabura abatendekwa be ikumi na babiri oku baraatwaze , yaarugayo , yaaza kwegyesa n'okurangirira omu ndembo zaabo .
40011002	Mbwenu Yohaana , ku yaabaire ari omu kihome , yaahurira ebi Kristo arikukora , yaamutumaho abatendekwa be ,
40011003	naamugira ati : Niiwe ogwo otuura ori ow'okwija , nari tutegyereze ondiijo ?
40011004	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Nimwirooko mugambire Yohaana ebi mwahurira n'ebi mwareeba , muti :
40011005	Empumi nizihumuuka , ebirema nibigyenda , ababembe nibashemezibwa , ebifamatu nibihurira , abafiire nibazoorwa , n'abooro nibarangirirwa Amakuru Marungi .
40011006	Otarikumbangaanisaho n'omuhiirwa .
40011007	Ezo ntumwa ku zaabaire zaarugaho , Yesu yaatandika kugambira ebimbuuro by'abantu ahari Yohaana , ati : Mukaza omu ihamba kureebayo ki ? Orubingo orurikutengyetsibwa omuyaga ?
40011008	Mbwenu shi , mukaza kureebayo ki ? Omuntu ojwaire ebirikunekaneka ? Manya abajwara ebirikunekaneka bashangwa omu bikaari by'abagabe .
40011009	Mbwenu shi mukagiirayo ki ? Kureeba omurangi ? Eego , nimbagambira nti : Nangwa naakira omurangi .
40011010	Niwe ogwo ou kyahandiikirweho kiti : Reeba , nintuma entumwa yangye kukubandizayo , ekutebeekanisize omuhanda .
40011011	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Omu barazairwe abakazi , tihariho orikukira Yohaana Omubatizi ; kwonka orikuhereerukayo omu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru naamukira .
40011012	Okwiha omu biro bya Yohaana Omubatizi okuhitsya aga magingo , obukama obwo bwitanirwa , kandi ababwitanira nibo babunyaga .
40011013	Manya abarangi boona n'eiteeka bikaranga okuhitsya ahari Yohaana ;
40011014	kandi ku muraabe nimwenda kukiikiriza , Yohaana ogwo niwe Eliya owaabaire ari ow'okwija .
40011015	Oine amatu agarikuhurira , ahurire .
40011016	Mbwenu abantu b'obusingye obu nkaabashushanisa na ki ? Bari nk'abaana abashutami omu katare , abarikweta bagyenzi baabo bati :
40011017	Tubateereire esheegu , timwazina ; twabateerera emiruura , timwayemaamaata .
40011018	Manya Yohaana ku yaizire atarikurya kandi atarikunywa , baagira bati : Aine ekyago .
40011019	Omwana w'omuntu we ku yaizire naarya , naanywa , baagira bati : N'omunyamururu , n'omusinzi kandi munywani w'abashorooza b'omushoro n'abasiisi . Manya obwengye bwa Ruhanga ebi bukora nibyo bihamya ku buhikire .
40011020	Mpaho yaatandika kuhana endembo ezi yaakizire kukoreramu eby'amaani , ahabw'okuba tizireegarukiremu , ati :
40011021	Iwe Koraziini ' we , oryakareeba ! Naiwe Beetisaida , oryakareeba ! Manya eby'amaani ebyakoreirwe omuriimwe , kuri byakoreirwe omuri Tuuro na Sidoni , abaamwo bakaabaire baayegarukiremu kare , bajwaire ebiguniya , beesiigire eiju .
40011022	Kandi nimbagambira nti : Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , ebifubiro bya Tuuro na Sidoni biryayemerwa okukira ebyanyu .
40011023	Naiwe Kafarinaumu , mbwenu noogira ngu oryatunguurwa ohikye ahaiguru ? Ngaaha , oryabandikwa , ohikye okuzimu owa Nyamuteza ! Manya eby'amaani ebyakoreirwe omuriiwe , kuri byakoreirwe omuri Sodoma , ekaagumireho okuhitsya n'eri izooba .
40011024	Kandi hoona ninkugambira nti : Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , ekifubiro ky'ensi ya Sodoma kiryayemerwa okukira ekyawe .
40011025	Omu bunaku obwo Yesu akagira ati : Taata , Mukama w'eiguru n'ensi , ninkusiima ahabw'okuba ebintu ebyo okabishereka abanyabwengye n'abarikwetegyereza , waabishuuruurira abaana bato .
40011026	Eego , Taata , ekyo nikyo waasiimire .
40011027	Byona nkabikwatsibwa Taata , kandi tihariho omanya Mwana kureka Taata , nobu yaakuba omanya Taata kureka Mwana , n'ou Mwana asiima kumumushuuruurira .
40011028	Yaimwe abaruhire n'abaremereirwe , nimwije ahariinye , mbaruhuure .
40011029	Mwekorere omugamba gwangye , muunyegyereho ; ahabw'okuba nintwaza gye , haza ndi omucureezi omu mutima ; nibwo muraatungire amagara gaanyu ekihuumuro .
40011030	Ahabw'okuba omugamba gwangye gwanguhi , n'omutwaro gwangye tigurikuremeera .
40012001	Omu bunaku obwo Yesu , ku yaabaire naaraba omu misiri y'engano ahari Sabato , abatendekwa be baagira enjara , baatandika kucwa obushiisha bw'engano n'okuburya .
40012002	Abafarisaayo ku baakireebire , baamugira bati : Reeba , abatendekwa baawe nibakora ekitarikwikirizibwa iteeka ahari Sabato .
40012003	Nawe abagira ati : Beitu timukashomaga eki Daudi yaakozire , obu yaagira enjara n'abu yaabaire aine ?
40012004	Manya akataaha omu nju ya Ruhanga , yaarya emigaati etoijeirwe Ruhanga , eyaabaire neezire we n'abu yaabaire aine kugirya , kureka abahongyerezi bonka .
40012005	Nari timukashomaga mu iteeka , oku ahari Sabato abahongyerezi bashiisha Sabato omuri Nyaruju , haza batagire rubanja ?
40012006	Kwonka nimbagambira ku aha hariho orikukira Nyaruju .
40012007	Kandi kuri mwaba nimumanya amakuru g'ekirikugira kiti : Eki nyenda n'embabazi , ti bitambo , timwakusingisiriize bataine rubanja .
40012008	Manya Omwana w'omuntu niwe mukama wa Sabato .
40012009	Atyo Yesu yaarugayo , yaataaha omu iteeraniro ryabo .
40012010	Haashangwa harimu omuntu okokootsire omukono . Baamubuuza bati : Nikiikirizibwa eiteeka okukiza omuntu ahari Sabato ? Baamubuuza batyo , ngu babone kumutabaariza .
40012011	Nawe yaababuuza ati : N'oha omuriimwe owaakuba aine entaama emwe , reero ekigwa omu iziba ahari Sabato , atagikwate akagiihamu ?
40012012	Mbwenu omuntu tarikukira munonga entaama ? N'ahabw'ekyo nikiikirizibwa okukora eby'embabazi ahari Sabato .
40012013	Atyo yaagira ogwo muntu ati : Gorora omukono gwawe . N'onu yaagugorora , gwakira , gwaba nk'ogundi .
40012014	Kwonka Abafarisaayo baashohora , baahanuura oku baraamwite .
40012015	Yesu ku akimanya , arugayo . Abantu baingi bamukuratira , haza abakiza boona ,
40012016	kwonka we , abeehanangiriza kutamubuzya mu bantu .
40012017	Ekyo kihikiiriza ekyagambirwe omurangi Isaaya ati :
40012018	Ogu n'omuheereza wangye , ou naatooraine , ou nkunda kandi ou nshemerererwa . Ndyamutamu Mutima wangye , amanyise Abanyamahanga eby'oburyo .
40012019	Taritongana nobu kwakuba okuyomba , kandi tihariho orihurira eiraka rye omu nguuto .
40012020	Orubingo oruhendekire tarirucwa , n'orumuri rurikwaka kubi tariruraaza , okuhitsya obu arisingura ahabw'okukora ebihikire .
40012021	Kandi Abanyamahanga boona baryagira amatsiko omu iziina rye .
40012022	Bwanyima bakareetera Yesu omuntu oriho ekyago , owaabaire ari empumi kandi ekiteta , yaamukiza ; ogwo muntu yaahweza kandi yaagamba .
40012023	Abantu boona baashoberwa , baagira bati : Beitu ogu t'akaaba Omwana wa Daudi ?
40012024	Kwonka Abafarisaayo ku baakihuriire , baagira bati : Manya ogu muntu taine kindi eki arikubingisa ebyago , kureka obushoboorozi bwa Beelizebuli omukuru waabyo bwonka .
40012025	Yesu ku amanya ebiteekateeko byabo , abagira ati : Obugabe bwona obwebaganisamu , buba buri obw'okuhwerekyerera ; kandi tihariho rurembo nari enju ebyebaganisamu bikagumaho .
40012026	Manya Sitaane ku arikubinga Sitaane , biri ayebaganiisemu ; mbwenu shi obwo , obugabe bwe buryagumaho buta ?
40012027	Ku ndaabe nimbingisa ebyago Beelizebuli , abaana baanyu bo nibagibingisa oha ? N'ahabw'ekyo nibo baraabamare empaka .
40012028	Kwonka ku ndaabe nimbingisa ebyago Mutima wa Ruhanga , biri obwo obukama bwa Ruhanga bubahikireho .
40012029	Nari omuntu naabaasa ata kutaaha omu nju y'ow'amaani kunyaga ebintu bye atabandize kumukoma , haza akabona kwayira kimwe enju ye ?
40012030	Otakwatanisa naanye aba omuzigu wangye , kandi otataaruura naanye ataataanisa .
40012031	N'ahabw'ekyo nimbagambira nti : Abantu baryasaasirwa ekibi kyona n'okurogota kwona , kwonka orirogota ahari Mutima tarisaasirwa ,
40012032	na weena origamba kubi aha Mwana w'omuntu , aryasaasirwa ; kwonka origamba kubi ahari Mutima Orikwera , tarisaasirwa omu busingye obu n'omu busingye oburiija .
40012033	Omuti ku orikuguhindura murungi , ebijuma byagwo nibiba birungi ; nari omuti ku orikuguhindura mubi , n'ebijuma byagwo nibiba bibi ; manya omuti gumanyirwa aha bijuma byagwo .
40012034	Imwe baana b'empiri ' mwe , ebigambo byanyu nibibaasa bita kuba birungi , haza muri babi ? Manya ebiijwire omutima , nibyo akanwa kagamba .
40012035	Omuntu murungi aiha ebirungi aha birungi bye ebi abiikire , n'omuntu mubi ebibi abiiha aha bibi bye ebi abiikire .
40012036	N'ahabw'ekyo nimbagambira nti : Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , abantu baryayetonganira buri kigambo kyona eki bagambira eryo .
40012037	Manya ebigambo byawe nibyo birikwihisaho orubanja , kandi hoona nibyo birikureetera kusingwa orubanja .
40012038	Bwanyima abamwe aha bahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo baamugira bati : Mwegyesa , nitwenda otworekye akamanyiso .
40012039	Nawe yaabagarukamu ati : Abantu b'obusingye obu , ababi kandi abarikuhampuka , nibenda akamanyiso ; kwonka tihariho kamanyiso akaraaboorekwe , kureka aka Yona omurangi .
40012040	Nk'oku Yona yaamazire amazooba ashatu n'ebiro bishatu omu nda y'ekyenyanja rwakaraara , n'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo arimara amazooba ashatu n'ebiro bishatu omu nda y'ensi .
40012041	Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , aba Nineeve baryayemerera n'ab'obusingye obu , babasingise orubanja ; ahabw'okuba Yona ku yaabarangiriire , baayegarukamu ; kwonka reeba , aha hariho orikukira Yona .
40012042	Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , omugabekazi w'omu bukiizi-bwa-buryo aryayemerera n'ab'obusingye obu , abasingise orubanja , ahabw'okuba we akaruga aha muheru gw'ensi , yaija kuhurira eby'obwengye bwa Solomooni ; kandi reeba , aha hariho orikukira Solomooni .
40012043	Ekyago , ku kiruga omu muntu , kizengyerera omu byanga bitarimu maizi nikisherura ah'okutuura . Ku hakiburira ,
40012044	kigira kiti : Ka ngarukye omwangye omu naarugire . Kwonka ku kihikamu , kyashanga egyo nju erimu busha , eyeyereirwe kandi etegwirwe ,
40012045	kityo kigyenda , kireeta ebindi byago mushanju ebibi okukikira . Mpaho bitaahamu , bigumamu ; ogwo muntu omuheru gwe guba mubi okukira oku yaabaire ari obw'okubanza . Nikwo kiriba kityo n'aha b'obusingye obu obubi .
40012046	Ku yaabaire naakigambira abantu , haija nyina n'abarumuna , baayemerera aheeru , nibenda kugamba nawe .
40012047	Haabaho owaamugira ati : Reeba , nyoko na barumuna baawe beemereire aheeru , baine eki barikwenda kukugambira .
40012048	Kwonka we agarukamu owaamugambira , ati : Maawe n'oha , na barumuna bangye ni baahi ?
40012049	Atyo agorora omukono agworekyeize abatendekwa be , agira ati : Maawe na barumuna bangye nibo aba !
40012050	Ahabw'okuba weena okora ebi Tata ow'omu iguru akunda , niwe murumuna wangye , niwe munyaanyazi kandi niwe maawe .
40013001	Eryo izooba Yesu akaruga omu nju , yaashohora , yaashutama aha rubaju rw'enyanja .
40013002	Ebimbuuro bingi by'abantu byateeranira ahu ari , nawe nikwo kuza omu bwato akabushutamamu ; reero ekimbuuro kyona kikeemerera aha nkungu .
40013003	Atyo akabagambira bingi omu nfumu , naagira ati : Omubibi akashohora kubiba .
40013004	Ku yaabaire naabiba , embibo ezimwe zaaragara aha rubaju rw'omuhanda , enyonyi zaija , zaazirya .
40013005	Ezimwe zaagwa aha rukiri ahataine itaka ringi , ahonaaho zaamera ahabwa itaka kutaba ringi .
40013006	Kwonka eizooba ku ryaturukire , zaababuka , kandi ahabw'okushangwa zitaine mizi , zaayoma .
40013007	Ezindi mbimbo zaagwa omu mahwa ; ago mahwa gaakura , gaazinyuruza .
40013008	Ezindi zaagwa aha itaka rirungi , zaayera ; ezimwe enjuma igana , ezindi makumi mukaaga , n'ezindi makumi ashatu .
40013009	Oine amatu agarikuhurira , ahurire .
40013010	Bwanyima abatendekwa baija , baabuuza Yesu bati : Ahabw'enki noobagambira omu nfumu ?
40013011	Yaabagarukamu ati : Imwe mukaheebwa okumanya amabanga g'obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru , kwonka bo tibarakihairwe .
40013012	Manya oine , aryaheebwa ebirikukiraho ; kwonka otaine , aryayakwa nangwa n'eki aine .
40013013	Eki ndikubagambirira omu nfumu , n'ahabw'okuba bareeba , kwonka tibeetegyereza ; bahurikiza , kwonka tibahurira kandi tibashoboorokyerwa .
40013014	Buzimazima ekyo nikihikiiriza omuribo eki Isaaya yaarangire naagira ati : Okuhurira kwo muryahurira , kwonka timurishoboorokyerwa ; okureeba kwo muryareeba , kwonka timuryetegyereza .
40013015	Ahabw'okuba emitima y'ab'eihanga eri ebaire ebitsire , amatu gaabo nigahurira kubi , n'amaisho gaabo bagahumiize , ngu batakaahwezesa ago maisho gaabo , bakahuriza amatu gaabo , bakeetegyereseza emitima yaabo , bakampindukira , nkabakiza .
40013016	Kwonka imwe muhiiriirwe ahabw'okuba amaisho gaanyu nigareeba , n'amatu gaanyu nigahurira .
40013017	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Abarangi baingi n'abahikiriire baingi bakeetenga kureeba ebi murikureeba , kwonka tibarabireebire ; n'okuhurira ebi murikuhurira , kwonka tibarabihuriire .
40013018	Nimuhurire nu eby'enfumu y'omubibi .
40013019	Omuntu weena ku ahurira ekigambo ky'obukama bwa Ruhanga ataakishoboorokyerwa , mpaho omubi aija ashahura ekyabibwa omu mutima gwe ; ezo nizo mbibo ezaabibirwe aha rubaju rw'omuhanda .
40013020	Ezaabibirwe aha itaka ry'aha rukiri , niwe ogwo ohurira ekigambo , akakiikiriza ahonaaho ashemereirwe ;
40013021	nobu aba ataine mizi , ayehangaana akaanya kakye ; kwonka ku habaho enaku nari okuhiiganisibwa ahabw'ekyo kigambo , ahonaaho agwera kimwe .
40013022	Ezaabibirwe omu mahwa , niwe ogwo ohurira ekigambo , kwonka okwemerereza omutima eby'ensi n'ebinuriirizi by'obutungi kunyuruza ekyo kigambo , kibura kwana .
40013023	Ezaabibirwe aha itaka erirungi , niwe ogwo ohurira ekigambo , akakyetegyereza ; haza akaana ebyana , omwe igana , ondi makumi mukaaga , n'ondi makumi ashatu .
40013024	Kandi Yesu akabacwera endiijo nfumu ati : Obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru nibushushanisibwa n'omuntu owaabibire embibo nungi omu musiri gwe ;
40013025	kwonka abantu ku baabaire bagwejegyeire , omuzigu yaija , yaabiba enkyenzi omu ngano , haza yaayegyendera .
40013026	Bwanyima embibo ku zaashebukire , zaaba obushiisha , enkyenzi nazo zaareebeka .
40013027	Abakozi ba nyineeka baija , baamugira bati : Mukama waitu , beitu shi , torabibire embibo nungi omu musiri gwawe ? Mbwenu gwihire hi enkyenzi ?
40013028	Abagira ati : Omuzigu niwe akikozire . Abo bakozi bamugira bati : Mbwenu shi , nooyenda ngu tugyende tuzomberemu ?
40013029	Kwonka we abagira ati : Ngaaha ; mutakaaba nimuzomberamu , mukakuuriramu engano .
40013030	Nimubirekye byombi bikure kumwe okuhitsya aha igyesha ; reero omu igyesha ndyagambira abagyesi nti : Mubanze murundaane enkyenzi , muzikome enganda , zookibwe , haza engano muzihunikye omu kitara kyangye .
40013031	Yesu akabacwera endiijo nfumu naagira ati : Obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru buri nk'enjuma y'embibo ya karidaari , ei omuntu yaatwaire akabiba omu kibanja kye :
40013032	haza eri nkye okukira embibo zoona ; kwonka ku ekura , ekira ebishaka byona , erugwamu omuti , enyonyi z'omu kaabunga ziija zaarika omu mataagi gaagwo .
40013033	Yesu akabacwera endiijo nfumu ati : Obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru buri nk'ekitumbisa eki omukazi yaakwatsire , akakijwanzya omu ncuro ishatu z'esaano okuhitsya obu yoona yaatumbire .
40013034	Ebyo byona Yesu akabigambira ebimbuuro by'abantu omu nfumu ; kandi kwo tarabagambiire kintu kyona atakirabize mu nfumu .
40013035	Ekyo kyaba eky'okuhikiiriza eki omurangi yaagambire ati : Ndyabacwera enfumu ningamba nabo , ngambe butunu ebyasherekirwe okwiha ensi yaaba kuhangwa .
40013036	Bwanyima Yesu akaruga ahu ebimbuuro by'abantu byabaire biri , yaataaha omu nju . Abatendekwa be baamuhika , baamugira bati : Tushoboororere amakuru g'enfumu y'enkyenzi z'omu musiri .
40013037	Yaabagarukamu ati : Obiba embibo nungi n'Omwana w'omuntu ;
40013038	omusiri niyo nsi , kandi embibo nungi nibo b'obukama ; enkyenzi nibo b'omubi ,
40013039	reero omuzigu owaazibibire ni Sitaane ; eigyesha nibwo bunaku obu ensi erihweraho , kandi abagyesi nibo baamaraika .
40013040	Nk'oku enkyenzi zirundaanwa , zikookibwa , nikwo kiriba n'aha kuhwaho kw'ensi .
40013041	Omwana w'omuntu aryatuma baamaraika be , baihe omu bukama bwe ebirikuteeza entsibo byona n'enkozi z'ebibi zoona ;
40013042	babinagye omu kikoomi ky'omuriro , ei abantu bariririra bakanena enshaya ;
40013043	reero abahikiriire bakengyengyeta nk'eizooba omu bukama bwa Ishebo . Oine amatu agarikuhurira , ahurire .
40013044	Obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru buri nk'eky'obuguzi bwingi ekyasherekirwe omu musiri , eki omuntu yaagwireho akakishweka eitaka ; mpaho ahabw'okushemererwa akagyenda , akatunda byona ebi aine , akagura ogwo musiri .
40013045	Kandi obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru nibushusha nk'omushuubuzi orikusherura amahunde marungi ,
40013046	owaagwire ahari rimwe ery'obuguzi bwingi , akagyenda , akatunda byona ebi aine , akarigura .
40013047	Obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru kandi buri nk'akatimba akaatambikirwe omu nyanja , kakakwata ebyenyanja ebya ibara muringo ;
40013048	ku kaijwire , abantu baakanyurura , baakahitsya aha nkungu , baashutama , baatooranamu ebirungi , baabita omu bitukuru , haza ebibi baabinaga .
40013049	Nikwo kiriba kityo n'aha kuhwaho kw'ensi . Baamaraika baryaija , baihe enkozi z'ebibi omu bahikiriire ,
40013050	bazinagye omu kikoomi ky'omuriro ahu abantu bariririra bakanena enshaya .
40013051	Bwanyima Yesu yaababuuza ati : Mbwenu ebyo byona mwabyetegyereza ? Baamugarukamu bati : Eego .
40013052	Nawe yaabagira ati : N'ahabw'ekyo omuhangu w'eiteeka weena , otendekirwe ahabw'obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru , ari nka nyineeka oiha omu ibiikiro rye ebisya n'ebikuru .
40013053	Yesu ku yaaherize ezo nfumu , yaarugayo ,
40013054	yaaza omu kyanga ky'owaabo , yaabeegyeseza omu iteeraniro ryabo ; baatangaara baagira bati : Beitu ogu muntu akaiha hi obu bwengye n'eby'amaani ebi arikukora ?
40013055	Ogu ti mutabani w'omubaizi ? Nyina tiwe arikwetwa Mariya ? N'abarumuna ti Yakobo na Yosefu na Simooni na Yuda ?
40013056	Na banyaanya boona tibari hamwe naitwe ? Mbwenu ebyo byona , ogu muntu akabiiha hi ?
40013057	Batyo baamubangaanisa . Kwonka Yesu yaabagira ati : Omurangi ahandi hoona aheebwa ekitiinwa , kureka omu kyanga ky'owaabo n'omu ka ye .
40013058	Kandi ahabw'okutaikiriza kwabo , tiyaakorerayo by'amaani bingi .
40014001	Omu bunaku obwo ow'eishaza Herode akahurira okurangaanwa kwa Yesu ;
40014002	yaagira abagaragwa be ati : Manya ogwo ni Yohaana Omubatizi azookire omu bafiire ; nikyo eby'amaani ebyo birikukorerwa omuriwe .
40014003	Ahabw'okuba Herode ogwo akaba aherize kukwata Yohaana , yaamuboha , yaamuta omu kihome ahabwa Herodiya muka Filipo mwene ishe ;
40014004	ahabw'okuba Yohaana akaba amugambiire ati : Omu iteeka tikihikire , iwe okumuhindura omukazi waawe .
40014005	Ekyo nobu kyamureeteire kwenda kumwita , kwonka akatiina abantu , ahabw'okuba bakaba nibateekateeka Yohaana kuba omurangi .
40014006	Kwonka ekiro ky'okwijuka okuzaarwa kwa Herode ku kyahikire , muhara wa Herodiya yaazinira omu maisho g'abari aha bugyenyi , yaagwisa gye Herode ;
40014007	ekyo kyamureetera kurahira naamuraganisa kumuha eki araamushabe kyona .
40014008	N'onu ku yaahabwirwe nyina , yaamugira ati : Mpeera omuri oru rucuba omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatizi .
40014009	Ekyo omugabe kimusaasa ; kwonka ahabw'okushangwa yaarahiire , n'ahabw'abagyenyi be , aragiira ku bagumuha ;
40014010	atuma , batemaho Yohaana omutwe omu kihome ,
40014011	bagureetera omu rucuba , baguha ogwo mwishiki , nawe agutwarira nyina .
40014012	Abatendekwa be baija , batwara omuntumbi gwe , baguziika , batyo bagyenda , babigambira Yesu .
40014013	Yesu ku yaakihuriire , yaarugayo ari omu bwato , yaaza omu mwanya gwekiikire kwehereera . Abantu baingi ku baakihuriire , baaruga omu birorero , baamukurata nibagyendesa ebigyere .
40014014	Ku yaarugire omu bwato , yaareeba ebimbuuro by'abantu , yaabagirira esaasi , yaakiza abarwaire baabo .
40014015	Ku bwabaire bwaba omwabazyo , abatendekwa baija ahu ari , baamugira bati : Aha n'eihamba , n'obwire bwaizire ; ragiira abantu baze omu byaro kweshakira ebyokurya .
40014016	Yesu agira ati : Batagyenda ; mube niimwe mwabaha ebyokurya .
40014017	Bamugira bati : Aha twineho emigaati etaano yonka n'ebyenyanja bibiri .
40014018	Nawe abagira ati : Mubindeetere aha .
40014019	Atyo aragiira ebimbuuro by'abantu kushutama aha kanyaatsi ; mpaho ayakiira egyo migaati etaano n'ebyo byenyanja bibiri , areeba ahaiguru , asiima , abicwamu , aha abatendekwa egyo migaati , nabo bagiha ebimbuuro by'abantu .
40014020	Boona barya , bahaaga . Bwanyima batorotoora oburagarika obwatsigaraho , bwijuza ebitenga ikumi na bibiri .
40014021	Kandi abaariire bakaba bari abashaija nk'enkumi itaano , otabariiremu bakazi na baana .
40014022	Ahonaaho Yesu aragiira abatendekwa kuza omu bwato kumubandiza seeri , obwo we naakiragiira ebimbuuro by'abantu kugyenda .
40014023	Ku yaaherize kuraga ebyo bimbuuro , yainamuka omu rushozi wenka kushaba . Omwabazyo ku gwakiikire , yaashangwa ariyo wenka .
40014024	Haza ago magingo , obwato bukaba bwagiire hare , entambwe nyingi kuruga aha nkungu , nibuzongibwa ebingonzi ; ahabw'okuba omuyaga gukabareetwa omu maisho .
40014025	Aha kisisiimuko kya kana eky'ekiro , yaabaizira naagyendesa amaguru aha nyanja .
40014026	Reero abatendekwa ku baamureebire naagyendera aha nyanja , baatiina munonga , baagira bati : N'omuzimu ! Batyo baaborooga ahabw'okutiina .
40014027	Ahonaaho Yesu yaabagambira ati : Muhuumure , niinye ; mutatiina !
40014028	Petero amugarukamu ati : Mukama wangye , ku oraabe ori iwe , ndagiira , ngyendere aha maizi , nkuhikye .
40014029	Nawe amugira ati : Ija . Petero atyo aruga omu bwato , agyendesa amaguru aha maizi , aizira Yesu .
40014030	Kwonka ku areeba omuyaga gwaba mwingi , atiina , atandika kumirwa , aborooga ati : Mukama wangye , njuna .
40014031	Ahonaaho Yesu agorora omukono , amukwata , amugira ati : Iwe muntu w'okwikiriza kukye ' we , ahabw'enki waabangaanisa ?
40014032	Ku bahika omu bwato , omuyaga gutuuza .
40014033	Abari omu bwato bamuramya nibagira bati : Buzimazima ori Omwana wa Ruhanga .
40014034	Ku baaherize kwambuka , baahika seeri , Genesareeti .
40014035	Abantu b'omuri ekyo kyanga ku baamumanyire , baatuma omuri egyo nsi yoona , baamureetera boona abarwaire ;
40014036	baamweshengyereza ngu nangwa bakore aha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye ; haza boona abaagukozireho baakira .
40015001	Bwanyima Abafarisaayo n'abahangu b'eiteeka bakaruga Yerusalemu , baija ahari Yesu , baamubuuza bati :
40015002	Ahabw'enki abatendekwa baawe batarikukuratira omugyenzo gw'aba ira ? Manya nibarya batanaabire mu ngaro .
40015003	Yaabagarukamu ati : Ahabw'enki naimwe nimuhenda ekiragiro kya Ruhanga ahabw'emigyenzo yaanyu ?
40015004	Manya Ruhanga akagira ati : Otiine shoimwe na nyoko ; kandi ati : Weena orijuma ishe nari nyina , aitwe .
40015005	Kwonka imwe mugira muti : Weena orikugambira ishe nari nyina ati : Eki naakukuhaire kukugasira naakitoijera Ruhanga ; biri obwo naaba atakigyemwa kutiina ishe nari nyina .
40015006	Mutyo ahabw'emigyenzo yaanyu , ekigambo kya Ruhanga mukihundura busha .
40015007	Imwe ndyarya ' mwe ! Isaaya ka yaabarangireho gye , obu yaagira ati :
40015008	Ab'eihanga eri nibampaisisa ekitiinwa eminwa yaabo , haza emitima yaabo endi hare .
40015009	Bandamiza busha ahabw'okuba beegyesa ebyatairweho abantu , oti n'enyegyesa y'ebyatairweho Ruhanga .
40015010	Atyo Yesu ayeta ekimbuuro ky'abantu kuteeranira ahu ari , abagira ati : Nimutegye amatu kandi mwetegyereze .
40015011	Ekitaaha omu kanwa tikyo kishiisha omuntu , kureka ekiruga omu kanwa nikyo kishiisha omuntu .
40015012	Bwanyima abatendekwa be baija , baamugira bati : Noomanya Abafarisaayo ku baaguubwa kubi ahabw'okuhurira eki waagamba ?
40015013	Yaabagarukamu ati : Ekibyairwe kyona eki Tata ow'omu iguru atarabyaire , kiryakuurwa .
40015014	Mubarekye ; n'abeebembezi empumi abarikwebembera ezindi mpumi . Manya empumi ku eyebembera endi , zombi zigwa omu kiina .
40015015	Petero amugira ati : tushoboororere egyo nfumu .
40015016	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Biri naimwe timukeetegyereize ?
40015017	Timurikumanya ku kyona ekiza omu kanwa kirabamu , kikataaha omunda haza kikoogamu ?
40015018	Kwonka ekireetwa omu kanwa kiba nikiruga omu mutima ; haza ekyo nikyo kishiisha omuntu .
40015019	Ahabw'okuba omu mutima nimwo haruga ebiteekateeko bibi : obwitsi , obushambani n'ebikwatiraine nabwo , okwiba , okubeiherera ondi , n'okugambuura ;
40015020	ebyo nibyo bishiisha omuntu ; kwonka okurya otanaabire mu ngaro tikushiisha muntu .
40015021	Bwanyima Yesu ku yaarugireyo , yaaza omu kyanga ekiherereire Tuuro na Sidoni .
40015022	Mpaho haija omukazi Omunyakanaani naaruga omuri ekyo kyanga , yaayamuza naagira ati : Mukama wangye , mwene Daudi , ngirira embabazi ! Muhara wangye atembirwe ekyago , kimuri kubi .
40015023	Kwonka we tiyaagira ki yaamugarukamu . Abatendekwa be baija , baamweshengyereza nibagira bati : Mubingye , ahabw'okuba naatwitsa orwari .
40015024	Yaabagarukamu ati : Manya nyowe tindatumirwe handi , kureka omu ntaama ezaabuzire ez'ab'omu ruganda rwa Isiraeli .
40015025	Kwonka ogwo mukazi aija , amutsimbira amaju , amugira ati : Mukama wangye , mpwera .
40015026	Nawe amugarukamu ati : Tikihikire kukiriza ebyokurya by'abaana kubitambikira embwa .
40015027	Ogwo mukazi amugira ati : Eego , Mukama wangye , kwonka n'embwa zirya oburagarika oburuga aha meeza ya mukama waazo .
40015028	Yesu nawe amugarukamu ati : Mukazi ' we , ebishi okwikiriza kwawe ni kuhango ! Ka kikukorerwe nk'oku orikwenda . Ago magingo muhara we akira .
40015029	Yesu ku yaarugireyo , yaagyenda naaraba aha mwegyeego gw'enyanja ya Galilaaya . Atyo yainamuka omu kibungo , yaashutamayo .
40015030	Ebimbuuro by'abantu baateeranira ahu ari , bamureeteire ebirema n'ebimuga n'empumi n'ebiteta n'abandi baingi , baabahitsya haihi n'ebigyere bye , yaabakiza .
40015031	Abaabaire bateeraniire aho baatangaara nibareeba ebiteta nibigamba , ebimuga bikiriire kimwe , ebirema nibigyenda n'empumi nizireeba ; batyo baahimbisa Ruhanga wa Isiraeli .
40015032	Bwanyima Yesu akeeta abatendekwa be , yaabagira ati : Eki kimbuuro ky'abantu , ka kyanyitsa esaasi ! Manya bamazire naanye ebiro bishatu bataine ki barikurya , kandi tindikwenda kuboohereza n'enjara , batakaagwera enshazi omu muhanda .
40015033	Abatendekwa be baamugira bati : Mbwenu omuri eri ihamba nitwiha hi ebyokurya by'okuriisa abantu abarikwingana bati , bakahaaga ?
40015034	Yesu nikwo kubabuuza ati : Mwineho emigaati engahi ? Banu bati : Ni mushanju n'otwenyanja tukye .
40015035	Atyo aragiira abantu kushutama ahansi .
40015036	Akwata egyo migaati mushanju n'ebyo byenyanja ; ku aheza kusiima , abicwamu obucweka , abikwatsa abatendekwa be , nabo babiha abantu .
40015037	Boona barya , bahaaga ; reero batorotoora oburagarika obwashaaga , bwijuza ebitenga mushanju .
40015038	Obwo abaariire bakaba bari abashaija enkumi ina , otabariiremu bakazi na baana .
40015039	Ku aheza kuraga abo bantu , aragara omu bwato , aza omu kyanga kya Magadala .
40016001	Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo bakaija kutega Yesu , baamushaba ku abooreka akamanyiso akarikuruga ahari Ruhanga .
40016002	Nawe yaabagarukamu ati : Ku buba buri omu mwabazyo mugira muti : Nihaija kugira entsya nungi , ahabw'okuba eiguru niritukura .
40016003	Kandi omu kasheeshe , muti : Eri izooba nihaija kugira eihunga , ahabw'okuba eiguru niritukura kandi ryairirimba . Nimumanya kurengyerera nimwihirira aha kureeba eiguru oku ririkushusha , kwonka timurikubaasa kukyenga eby'obunaku obu nimwihirira aha bumanyiso .
40016004	Abantu b'obu busingye ababi abarikuhampuka nibenda akamanyiso ; kwonka tihariho kamanyiso karaaboorekwe , kureka aka Yona . Atyo abatsigaho , agyenda .
40016005	Abatendekwa obu baahika seeri , bakaba beebirwe kugyendana omugaati .
40016006	Yesu yaabagira ati : Nimureebe kandi mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo .
40016007	Baagambirana bonka bati : Manya titwareeta migaati .
40016008	Kwonka Yesu akimanya , abagira ati : Imwe bantu b'okwikiriza kukye ' mwe , ahabw'enki nimugambirana mwenka , ngu timwine migaati ?
40016009	Timukeetegyereize ? Timurikwijuka emigaati eri etaano ei mwagaburiire abantu enkumi itaano , n'omubaro gw'ebitenga ebi mwarundaine ?
40016010	Nari emigaati eri omushanju ei mwagaburiire abantu enkumi ina , n'oku mwarundaine ebitenga bingi ?
40016011	Ahabw'enki nimuremwa kwetegyereza ku ntaagamba ha by'emigaati ? Mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo .
40016012	Batyo barugaho bashoboorokyerwa ku ataabagambira kwerinda kitumbisa ky'omugaati , kureka ebi Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo barikwegyesa .
40016013	Yesu , ku yaahikire omu kyanga kya Kaisaariya-Filipi , yaabuuza abatendekwa be ati : Beitu Omwana w'omuntu , abantu bagira ngu n'oha ?
40016014	Baamugarukamu bati : Abamwe bagira ngu ni Yohaana Omubatizi , abandi ngu ni Eliya , kandi abandi , ngu ni Yeremiya , nari omwe aha barangi .
40016015	Agaruka agira ati : Kwonka shi imwe , nimugira ngu ndi oha ?
40016016	Simooni Petero amugarukamu ati : Ori Kristo , Omwana wa Ruhanga ohuriire .
40016017	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Simooni mwene Yona , oine omugisha ; ahabw'okuba owaakikushuuruurira ti muntu nyabuntu , kureka Tata ori omu iguru .
40016018	Naanye ninkugambira nti : Niiwe Petero kandi ahari orwo rukiri , niho ndyombeka ekigombe ky'abaikiriza bangye , n'amaani ga rufu tigarikibaasa .
40016019	Ndyakuha ebikomoorozo by'obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru ; kyona eki orikoma omu nsi , kiryakomwa n'omu iguru ; kandi kyona eki orikomoorora omu nsi , kiryakomoororwa n'omu iguru .
40016020	Atyo ayehanangiriza munonga abatendekwa be kutagira muntu weena ou baagambira ku ari Kristo .
40016021	Okwiha obwo Yesu yaatandika kumanyisa abatendekwa be ku ari ow'okuza Yerusalemu kubonabonesibwa munonga abakuru omu ihanga n'abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka ; aitwe , kandi aha kiro kya kashatu azookye .
40016022	Mpaho Petero amwekiikana , atandika kumuteisa naagira ati : Nikikabure , Mukama wangye ! Ekyo kitarikubaho .
40016023	Kwonka Yesu ahinduka , agira Petero ati : Iwe Sitaane ' we , ngaruka enyima ! Ori ekirikuteeza entsibo , ahabw'okuba ebi orikuteekateeka ti bya Ruhanga , kureka n'eby'abantu .
40016024	Bwanyima Yesu akagambira abatendekwa be ati : Omuntu weena orikwenda kunkuratira , ayeyogye , ayekorere omusharaba gwe , haza ankuratire .
40016025	Ahabw'okuba weena okiza amagara ge , aryagafeerwa ; kwonka weena ohayo amagara ge ahabwangye , aryagagarurirwa .
40016026	Mbwenu omuntu kiryamugasira ki okukubuura ensi yoona haza akafeerwa amagara ge ? Nari omuntu akaahayo kintu ki kucungura amagara ge ?
40016027	Manya Omwana w'omuntu aryaizira omu kitiinwa kya Ishe hamwe na bamaraika be , azimuurire ibara muntu naihirira aha bi yaakozire .
40016028	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Hariho abeemereire aha abatarifa batakareebire Mwana w'omuntu naija ari omugabe .
40017001	Ku haahingwireho ebiro mukaaga , Yesu yaatwara Petero na Yakobo na Yohaana omurumuna , yaabatembya orushozi ruraingwa bonka .
40017002	Reero yaahinduka okundi omu maisho gaabo ; ahamaisho ge haamurinkana nk'eizooba , n'ebijwaro bye byayangashana nk'orubaare .
40017003	Ahonaaho Musa na Eliya baababonekyera nibagaaniira nawe .
40017004	Petero yaagira Yesu ati : Mukama wangye , ka ni kirungi itwe okushangwa turi aha ! Ku oraabe nookisiima , ka nyombekye aha obuju bushatu , kamwe kabe akaawe , akandi kabe aka Musa n'akandi aka Eliya .
40017005	Ku yaabaire naakigamba , ahonaaho haija ekicu kirikwengyengyeta , kyabashweka , n'eiraka ryayema omuri ekyo kicu nirigira riti : Ogu n'Omwana wangye ou nkunda , kandi onnanura ; mumuhurire .
40017006	Abatendekwa ku bahurira eryo iraka , bagwa bajuumaire , batiinire munonga .
40017007	Kwonka Yesu aija , abakoraho , abagira ati : Nimwimukye , murekye kutiina .
40017008	Haza ku bainamwire amaisho , tibaagira ondi weena ou baareeba kureka Yesu wenka .
40017009	Ku baabaire nibashuuma nibaruga aha rushozi , Yesu yaabeehanangiriza ati : Mutagira ou mwagambira eki mwayorekwa , okuhitsya obu Omwana w'omuntu arizooka omu bafiire .
40017010	Abatendekwa be nabo bamubuuza bati : Mbwenu shi ahabw'enki abahangu b'eiteeka bagira bati : Eliya niwe aribanza kwija ?
40017011	Yaabagarukamu ati : Eliya kwo n'ow'okwija , kandi aryagarura ebintu byona aha buteeka .
40017012	Mbwenu nimbagambira ku Eliya araherize kwija , kwonka abantu tibaramumanyire , haza baamukora nk'oku baayenzire . N'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo barimubonabonesa .
40017013	Aho niho abatendekwa baihire kumanya ku arikubagambira ebya Yohaana
40017014	Ku baahikire ekimbuuro ky'abantu , omushaija yaija , yaamutsimbira amaju , yaamugira ati :
40017015	Mukama wangye , girira mutabani wangye embabazi , ahabw'okuba n'omugwi w'entsimbo kandi nizimwita kubi . Manya kaingi ayetuura omu muriro , kandi kaingi ayenaga omu maizi .
40017016	Ku mmureeteire abatendekwa baawe , baaremwa kumukiza .
40017017	Yesu yaagarukamu ati : Imwe bantu b'obusingye obu abatarikwikiriza kandi abarikwehabagiza , ndyahitsya hi okuguma naimwe ? Ndyahitsya hi okubagumisiririza ? Nimumundeetere aha .
40017018	Yesu akabukira ekyago , kimurugaho ; ogwo mwojo akira ahonaaho .
40017019	Bwanyima abatendekwa baija ahari Yesu bwesherekye , baamubuuza bati : Ahabw'enki itwe turemirwe kukibinga ?
40017020	Nawe yaabagarukamu ati : N'ahabw'okwikiriza kwanyu kukye . Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Kuri mwine okwikiriza okurikwingana embibo ya karidaari , mwaba nimwija kugambira orushozi oru , muti : Ruga aha , oze hariya , haza rurugaho ; kandi tihariho kintu kyona ekiribarema .
40017021	Kwonka ekyago ky'omuringo ogwo tikibingwa kindi kyona , kureka okushaba n'okwesiibyakwo .
40017022	Ku baabaire bari omuri Galilaaya , Yesu yaabagambira ati : Omwana w'omuntu naija kurekurirwa abantu ,
40017023	bamwite , kwonka azookye aha kiro kya kashatu . Haza ekyo kyabasaasa munonga .
40017024	Ku baahikire Kafarinaumu , abashorooza b'omushoro gwa Nyaruju ogwa buri mwaka , baija ahari Petero , baamubuuza bati : Omwegyesa waanyu tashora ?
40017025	Yaabagarukamu ati : Eego , ashora . Ku yaataahire omu nju , Yesu yaaba niwe yaamutanga kumubuuza ati : Simooni , nooteekateeka ota ? Abagabe b'omu nsi omushoro nari empooza babiiha ahari baahi ? Aha baana baabo nari aha bandi bantu ?
40017026	Onu ku amugarukamu ati : Aha bandi ; Yesu amugira ati : N'ahabw'ekyo abaana baabo tikibakwaitseho .
40017027	Kwonka ahabw'okutenda kugwisa kubi abo bashorooza , irooko oze aha nyanja , otambikyemu eirobo , haza ekyenyanja ekiraabanze kukwatwa , ku oraakyashamure akanwa , noija kushangamu empiiha ; ogitware , ogibahe ahabwangye n'ahabwawe .
40018001	Omu bunaku obwo abatendekwa bakaija ahari Yesu , baamubuuza bati : Omu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru , omukuru n'oha ?
40018002	Atyo ayeta omwana muto , amuta ahagati yaabo ,
40018003	abagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ku muriba mutahindukire , mukaba nk'abaana bato , timuritaaha mu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru .
40018004	Weena oryecureeza akaba nk'omwana ogu omuto , niwe mukuru omu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru .
40018005	Weena oyakiira omwana muto nk'ogu ahabwangye , biri niinye ayakiire ;
40018006	kwonka oriteeza entsibo omwe aha baana bato aba abarikuunyikiriza , akabareetera kushiisha , haakiri abohwe orubengo omu maraka , arohwe okuzimu omu nyanja .
40018007	Ebishi ensi eryakareeba ahabw'ebirikuteeza entsibo ! Manya byo tibiribura kwija , kwonka oribireeta aryakareeba .
40018008	Omukono gwawe nari ekigyere kyawe ku biraabe nibikureetera kukora ekibi , bitemeho , obinagye . Haakiri otaahe omu magara ori ekimuga nari ekirema , okukira okunagwa omu muriro ogutarihwaho oine emikono yombi nari ebigyere byombi .
40018009	Kandi eriisho ryawe ku riraabe nirikureetera kukora ekibi , riihemu , orinagye . Haakiri iwe okutaaha omu magara oine eriisho rimwe , okukira okunagwa okuzimu omu muriro oine amaisho gombi .
40018010	Mwerinde mutarigira ou mwagaya aha baana bato aba ; ahabw'okuba nimbagambira nti : Omu iguru baamaraika baabo batuura nibareeba Tata ori omu iguru ahamaisho .
40018011	[ Manya Omwana w'omuntu akaija kujuna ekyabuzire ] .
40018012	Mbwenu imwe nimuteekateeka muta ? Omuntu ku yaakuba aine entaama igana , emwe aharizo yaabura , takaatsigaho makumi mwenda na mwenda omu nshozi , akaza kusherura eyaabura ?
40018013	Kandi ku agizoora , buzimazima nimbagambira , agishemerererwa munonga okukira ziri makumi mwenda na mwenda ezitakaburaga .
40018014	Na Tata ow'omu iguru nikwo atarikwenda omwe aha baana bato aba kuhwerekyerera .
40018015	Mwene waanyu ku araakushaagize , gyenda omuteise muri mwembi . Ku araakworobere , biri waagarukana na mwene sho .
40018016	Kwonka ku araayangye kukworobera , twara ondiijo nari abandi babiri , kyona eki muraagambe kibone kuhamibwa obujurizi bwa baamushinja babiri nari bashatu .
40018017	Ku araayangye kuboorobera , gambira ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ; nabwo ku araayangire ekyo kigombe , murekye , omutwaze nk'omukaafiiri nari nk'omushorooza w'omushoro .
40018018	Buzima nimbagambira nti : Kyona eki murikoma omu nsi , kiryakomwa n'omu iguru ; na kyona eki murikomoorora omu nsi , kiryakomoororwa n'omu iguru .
40018019	Kandi nimbagambira nti : Babiri omuriimwe ku bariikirizana omu nsi aha kintu eki barikushaba , Tata ow'omu iguru aryakibakorera .
40018020	Manya ahu ababiri nari abashatu baba bateeraniire ahabwangye , naanye mba ndi ahagati yaabo .
40018021	Bwanyima Petero akaija yaabuuza Yesu nti : Mukama wangye , mwene tata ku araagume yanshaagize , mmusaasire kangahi ? Mpitsye emirundi mushanju ?
40018022	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Tindikukugira nti : Ogarukire aha mirundi mushanju , kureka makumi mushanju emirundi mushanju .
40018023	Mbwenu obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru nibushushanisibwa omugabe owaayenzire kushoboorora ebintu bye n'abagaragwa be .
40018024	Ku yaatandikire kubariirira , baamureeteraho omwe owaabaire aine eibanja rye rya shilingi obukaikuru makumi mukaaga na mukaaga .
40018025	Ku yaaremirwe kuziihura , mukama we yaaragiira ku bamugura hamwe n'omukazi we n'abaana na byona ebi yaabaire aine , ngu abone kwihura .
40018026	Mpaho ogwo mugaragwa amukwata amaguru naamweshengyereza ati : Mukama wangye , ngumisiririza , niinyija kukwihura , mpeze eibanja .
40018027	Mukama w'ogwo mugaragwa atyo amugirira esaasi , amurekura , amusaasira n'eryo ibanja .
40018028	Kwonka ogwo mugaragwa , ku ashohora ati , abugabugana n'omugaragwa ondi mugyenzi we , ou yaabaire naihuza shilingi igana ; tahwama amuta aha munigo , amugira ati : Nyihura .
40018029	Ogwo mugaragwa mugyenzi we ajuumara ahansi , amweshengyereza ati : Ngumisiririza , niinyija kukwihura .
40018030	Onu ayanga , amutwara , amutaisa omu kihome , okuhitsya obu ariihura eryo ibanja .
40018031	Abagaragwa bagyenzi be ku bareeba ekyabaho , baguubwa kubi munonga ; bagyenda bateekyerereza mukama waabo byona ebyabaho .
40018032	Mukama we atyo amweta , amugira ati : Iwe mugaragwa mubi ' we ! Ka nkusaasiire eibanja eryo ryona ahabw'okuunyeshengyereza ;
40018033	mbwenu naiwe tokugiriire mbabazi omugaragwa mugyenzi waawe nk'oku nzikugiriire ?
40018034	Atyo mukama we amugirira ekiniga , amuha ab'okumubonabonesa , okuhitsya obu araihure eibanja ryona .
40018035	Nikwo Tata ow'omu iguru naimwe aribagira atyo , buri omwe omuriimwe yaaba atasaasiire mugyenzi we aihire aha mutima .
40019001	Yesu , ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo bigambo , yaaruga Galilaaya , yaaza omu kyanga kya Buyudaaya seeri ya Yorudaani .
40019002	Ebimbuuro by'abantu byamukuratayo , nawe yaabakiza .
40019003	Reero Abafarisaayo baija ahu ari , baamutega nibamubuuza bati : Omu iteeka nikiikirizibwa omuntu kushenda omukazi we , yaaba aine eki arikumutura kyona ?
40019004	Nawe abagarukamu ati : Timukashomaga ku Omuhangi okwiha omu kutandika , yaabahangire omushaija n'omukazi ?
40019005	Atyo abagira ati : Nikyo omuntu atsigiraho ishe na nyina , akahamira aha mukazi we , bombi bakaba omubiri gumwe .
40019006	Mpaho baba batakiri babiri , kureka omwe . N'ahabw'ekyo eki Ruhanga yaateeraine , hatarigira omuntu owaakitaanisa .
40019007	Nabo baamubuuza bati : Ahabw'enki Musa yaaragiire kuha ebaruha y'okushenda , omushaija yaaza kushenda omukazi we ?
40019008	Yaabagarukamu ati : Ahabw'obugangaazi bw'emitima yaanyu Musa nikyo yaabaikiririize kushenda abakazi baanyu , kwonka omu kutandika tikwo kyabaire kiri .
