40019009	Kandi nimbagambira nti : Weena oshenda omukazi we , atamutuzire bushambani , haza akashwera ondiijo , biri ashambaine .
40019010	Abatendekwa baagira Yesu bati : Eby'omushaija n'omukazi we ku biraabe biri bityo , haakiri omuntu okutashwera .
40019011	Kwonka we yaabagira ati : Ekyo ti boona abarikubaasa kukyemera , kureka abaakihairwe .
40019012	Manya hariho abashaahu abaazairwe batyo ; hariho abashaahu abaagizirwe kwo abantu ; kandi hariho n'abashaahu abaayegizire kwo ahabw'obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru . Ekyo , orikubaasa kukyemera , akyemere .
40019013	Bwanyima bakareetera Yesu abaana bato ngu abateho engaro , abashabire . Abatendekwa be baakabukira abaabareetsire ;
40019014	kwonka yaabagira ati : Murekye abaana bato baije bampikye , mutabazibira ; ahabw'okuba abari nk'abo , obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru n'obwabo .
40019015	Atyo abataho engaro , agyenda .
40019016	Hakaija omushaija , yaabuuza Yesu ati : Mwegyesa , nkaakora kirungi ki , nkabona kutunga amagara agatahwaho ?
40019017	Yesu yaamugira ati : Nombuuriza ki ekirungi ? Manya omurungi n'omwe : Ku oraabe nooyenda amagara , kuratira ebiragiro .
40019018	Yaamugira ati : Ni biiha ? Na Yesu amugira ati : Otariita , otarishambana , otariiba , otariha obwamushinja bw'ebishuba ,
40019019	otiine shoimwe na nyoko , kandi okunde mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda .
40019020	Ogwo mutsigazi amugira ati : Ebyo byona ntuura nimbihitsya ; mbwenu shi ekindi nimburwaho ki ?
40019021	Yesu amugira ati : Ku oraabe nooyenda kuba ohikiire kimwe , irooko otunde ebi otungire ; ebiraabirugyemu obihe abooro , mbwenu obwo oryagira eitungo omu iguru ; haza oije onkuratire .
40019022	Ogwo mutsigazi ku yaakihuriire , yaagyenda aine obujune , ahabw'okuba akaba aine eitungo ringi .
40019023	Yesu nikwo kugambira abatendekwa be ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ka kigumire omutungi kutaaha omu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru !
40019024	Kandi nimbagambira nti : Nikirahukira engamira kuraba omu kahengyere k'empitirizo , okukira omutungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
40019025	Ekyo abatendekwa ku baakihuriire , baatangaara munonga nibagira bati : Mbwenu shi , n'oha orikubaasa kujunwa ?
40019026	Mpaho Yesu abatsimba eriisho , abagira ati : Ekyo aha bantu tikirikubaasika , kwonka ahari Ruhanga byona nibibaasika .
40019027	Petero nawe nikwo kugarukamu akabuuza Yesu ati : Reeba , itwe tukatsigaho byona , twakukuratira ; mbwenu , turyatunga ki ?
40019028	Yesu abagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Omu bunaku obu ebintu byona birihinduka bisya , Omwana w'omuntu ku arishutama aha kitebe kye eky'obugabe eky'ekitiinwa , naimwe abankuratiire muryashutama aha bitebe by'obugabe ikumi na bibiri , mucwere enganda za Isiraeli ikumi na ibiri orubanja .
40019029	Kandi weena owaatsigireho amaju , nari beene ishe , nari banyaanya , nari ishe , nari nyina , nari abaana , nari ebibanja , ahabwangye , aryazimuurirwa emirundi mingi , kandi atungye amagara agatahwaho .
40019030	Kwonka baingi ab'okubanza baryaba ab'okuhereeruka n'ab'okuhereeruka baryaba ab'okubanza .
40020001	Obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru nibushusha nka nyineeka owaagurukire kare omu kasheeshe kuguriirira ab'okukora omu musiri gwe gw'emizaabibu .
40020002	Ku yaaherize kuragaana nabo shilingi emwe eizooba rimwe , yaaboohereza omu musiri gwe gw'emizaabibu .
40020003	Aha shaaha ya kashatu yaashohora , yaareeba abandi beemereire omu kajagiro , bataine ki barikukora ;
40020004	yaabagira ati : Naimwe muze omu musiri gw'emizaabibu , niinyija kubaha ekibashemereire . Batyo baazayo .
40020005	Aha shaaha ya mukaaga n'eya mwenda agaruka ashohora , nabwo atwaza atyo .
40020006	Kandi aha shaaha nka ikumi n'emwe ashohora , ashanga abandi beemereire ; ababuuza ati : Ahabw'enki musiibire aha mwemereire mutaine ki murikukora ?
40020007	Bamugurakamu bati : N'ahabw'okuba tihaine waatuguriirira . Nawe abagira ati : Naimwe nimwirooko muze omu musiri gw'emizaabibu .
40020008	Omwabazyo ku gwakiikire , mukama w'omusiri gw'emizaabibu yaagira omubiiki we ati : Yeta abakozi , obaihure ebihembo byabo , nootandikira aha baahereeruka , noohereza aha baabanza .
40020009	Mbwenu abaaguririirwe aha shaaha ya ikumi n'emwe ku baizire , buri omwe yaaheebwa shilingi emwe .
40020010	Reero abaabandize ku baizire , baateekateeka ngu nibaija kuheebwa ebirikukiraho ; kwonka buri omwe omuribo yaaheebwa shilingi emwe .
40020011	Ku baabaire nibagiheebwa , baayetomboitera nyineeka ,
40020012	bati : Aba abaakorera eshaaha emwe yonka , waabainganisa naitwe abaarenzya eizooba nitwecurenga , nitwitwa omushana .
40020013	Nawe agarukamu omwe aharibo , naagira ati : Mugyenzi wangye , tiinyine ki naakushaagiza ; kandi shi tiwaaragaana naanye shilingi emwe ?
40020014	Twara eyaawe , ogyende ; ogu owaahereeruka nyowe ninsiima kumuha nk'oku naakuha .
40020015	Mbwenu shi , haine orikunzibira kukora ebyangye nk'oku ndikwenda ? Nari shi , nonteera ekitsyori kuntura obufura bwangye ?
40020016	Nikwo ab'okuhereeruka bariba batyo ab'okubanza , n'ab'okubanza bakaba ab'okuhereeruka .
40020017	Kandi Yesu , ku yaabaire nainamuka Yerusalemu , yaata abatendekwa be ikumi na babiri hangahari nibakigyenda , yaabagira ati :
40020018	Reeba , nitwinamuka Yerusalemu ; kandi Omwana w'omuntu naija kurekurirwa abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka , bamucwere orubanja rw'okwitwa ;
40020019	kandi bamurekurire Abanyamahanga kushungisibwa n'okwashwa n'okubambwa aha musharaba ; haza aha kiro kya kashatu azookye omu bafiire .
40020020	Bwanyima nyina wa beene Zebedaayo akaija n'abatabani ahari Yesu , yaamutsimbira amaju aine eki arikumushaba .
40020021	Yesu yaamubuuza ati : Nooyenda ki ? Nonu yaamugarukamu ati : Ragiira abatabani bangye aba bombi bashutame , omwe aha rubaju rwawe rwa buryo n'ondiijo aha rwa bumosho omu bukama bwawe .
40020022	Kwonka Yesu yaagarukamu ati : Timurikumanya ki murikushaba . Ebyo nimubaasa kunywa ekikopo eki ndikwija kunywa ? Baamugarukamu bati : Nitubaasa .
40020023	Nawe yaabagira ati : Ekikopo kyangye kyo nimwija kukinywa ; kwonka okushutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo n'aha rwa bumosho , tiinye nkugaba , kureka Tata niwe akuha abu yaakuteekateekyeire .
40020024	Reero abandi eikumi , ku baakihuriire , baagwerwa kubi ezo nyina-emwe ;
40020025	Yesu nikwo kubeeta , akabagira ati : Nimumanya ku abategyeki b'Abanyamahanga babategyekyesa eikama , kandi n'abakuru baabo ku babaragiiza obushoboorozi .
40020026	Ekyo omuriimwe tikwo kiriba ; kwonka weena orikwenda kuba mukuru omuriimwe , abe omuheereza waanyu ;
40020027	kandi weena orikwenda kuba ow'okubanza omuriimwe , abe omuhuuku waanyu ;
40020028	nk'oku Omwana w'omuntu ataraizire kuheerezibwa , kureka okuheereza n'okuhayo amagara ge kuba ekarabo ya baingi .
40020029	Ku baabaire nibaruga Yeriko , ekimbuuro ky'abantu kyamukuratira .
40020030	Reero abashaija babiri empumi abaabaire bashutami aha rubaju rw'omuhanda ku baahuriire Yesu naahingura , baayamuza nibagira bati : Mukama waitu , omwana wa Daudi , tugirire embabazi !
40020031	Ekyo kimbuuro ky'abantu kyabakabukira ngu bahuname ; kwonka bo baayamuza okukiraho bati : Mukama waitu , omwana wa Daudi , tugirire embabazi !
40020032	Mpaho Yesu ayemerera , abeeta , naababuuza ati : Nimwenda ngu mbakorere ki ?
40020033	Banu bamugira bati : Mukama waitu , nitwenda ngu amaisho gaitu gahumuukye .
40020034	Yesu atyo abagirira esaasi , akore ahamaisho gaabo ; ahonaaho bahumuuka , bamukuratira .
40021001	Ku bairiire haihi na Yerusalemu , baahika Beetifaagye , aha Rushozi rw'Emioliva , Yesu yaatuma abatendekwa be babiri ,
40021002	yaabagira ati : Nimwirooko muze omu kyaro ekibari omu maisho ; ku muraakihikyemu muti , nimwija kushanga endogoya etsibikire , n'omwana gwayo ; muzitsibure , muzindeetere .
40021003	Ku haraabeho owaababuuza , mumugire muti : Mukama naazenda ; nawe naija kuzoohereza ahonaaho .
40021004	Ekyo kikabaho kuhikiiriza ekyagambirwe omurangi naagira ati :
40021005	Mugambire ab'omuri Siyooni , muti : Reeba , Mukama waawe naija ah'ori , acureire kandi atembire endogoya omwana gwayo omuto .
40021006	Batyo abo batendekwa bagyenda , batwaza nk'oku Yesu yaabaragiira ;
40021007	bareeta egyo ndogoya n'omwana gwayo , bazaaraho eminagiro yaabo , Yesu ashutamaho .
40021008	Baingi omuribo baayarira eminagiro yaabo omu nguuto , n'abandi baatema amataagi g'emiti , baagaariramu .
40021009	Ebimbuuro by'abantu abamwebembeire n'abamukuratiire baayamuza nibagira bati : Hosaana mwene Daudi ! Ogwo orikwija omu iziina rya Nyakubaho ahimbisibwe ! Hosaana , Iwe ori ahaiguru owa Herebe !
40021010	Ku yaataahire ati omuri Yerusalemu , orurembo rwona rwajagarara nirugira ruti : Beitu ogu n'oha ?
40021011	Ebimbuuro by'abantu baagarukamu bati : Ogu ni Yesu omurangi owa Nazareeti ey'omuri Galilaaya .
40021012	Bwanyima Yesu yaataaha omuri Nyaruju , yaabingamu abaabaire nibatundiramu n'abarikuguriramu ; yaajuumika emeeza z'abaabaire nibahingisa empiiha , n'ebitebe by'abarikugurizamu enkombe ;
40021013	yaabagira ati : Kikahandiikwa kiti : Enju yangye eryayetwa ey'okushabiramu . Mbwenu imwe , mugihindwire eryaya ry'abambuzi !
40021014	Empumi n'abarema nabo bakaija ahu ari omuri Nyaruju , yaabakiza .
40021015	Kwonka abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abahangu b'eiteeka , ku baareebire eby'okutangaaza ebi yaakora , n'abaana nibateeera omuri Nyaruju akaari bati : Hosaana mwene Daudi ! baagira ekiniga kingi ;
40021016	baamugira bati : Beitu ebyo , ohuriire ebi aba barikugamba ? Na Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Eego , imwe shi timukashomaga ekirikugira kiti : Okarabya okuhimbisa okuhikire omu kanwa k'abaana bato n'abarikwonka ?
40021017	Atyo yaabatsigaho , yaaruga omuri orwo rurembo , yaaza Beetaniya , yaaraarayo .
40021018	Omu kasheeshe Yesu , ku yaabaire naagaruka omu rurembo , yaagira enjara .
40021019	Ku areeba omutiini aha rubaju rw'omuhanda , agyenda aguhika , ashanga gutariho kantu , kureka amababi gonka . Atyo agugira ati : Kabure okwana obundi ! Ogwo mutiini gwoma ahonaaho .
40021020	Abatendekwa ku bagureeba , batangaara nibagira bati : Beitu ogu mutiini gwarahuka guta kwoma ?
40021021	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Kuri mwine okwikiriza mutarikubangaanisa , timurikwija kukora ekyakorwa aha mutiini kyonka ; nangwa nobu mwakugira orushozi oru muti : Tsinduka ogwe omu nyanja , kikaaba kwo .
40021022	Kyona ekimurikushaba nimweshengyereza mwine okwikiriza , muryakiheebwa .
40021023	Yesu ku yaataahire omuri Nyaruju , abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru omu ihanga baija ahu ari naayegyesa , baamubuuza bati : Ni bushoboorozi ki oburikukukoresa ebi , kandi n'oha owaabukuhaire ?
40021024	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Naanye ka mbabuuze ekibuuzo ; ku muraakigarukyemu nibwo ndaabagambire ahi naihire obushoboorozi oburikunkoresa ebyo .
40021025	Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga hi ? Ahari Ruhanga nari omu bantu ? Baahakana bonka na bonka nibagira bati : Ku turaagire tuti : Kukaruga ahari Ruhanga , naija kutugira ati : Ahabw'enki mutaramwikiriize ?
40021026	Kandi ku turaagire tuti : Kukaruga omu bantu , nitutiina eki kimbuuro ky'abantu ; ahabw'okuba boona nibahamya ku Yohaana yaabaire ari omurangi .
40021027	Nabo nikwo kugarukamu Yesu bati : Titurikumanya . Nawe abagira ati : Naanye tindikwija kubagambira obushoboorozi oburikunkoresa ebyo .
40021028	Mbwenu nimuteekateeka muta ? Omushaija akaba aine abatabani babiri . Yaaza aha w'okubanza , yaamugira ati : Mwana wangye , eri izooba irooko okore omu musiri gw'emizaabibu .
40021029	Onu amugarukamu ati : Naayangire ! Kwonka bwanyima ayegarukamu , azayo .
40021030	Mpaho aza aha wa kabiri , amugambira bimwe na biri . Onu amugarukamu ati : Eego , mukama wangye ; kwonka tazayo .
40021031	Mbwenu ahari abo ababiri , owaakozire eki ishe arikwenda n'oha ? Baamugarukamu bati : Ow'okubanza . Yesu nikwo kubagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Abashorooza b'omushoro na baamaraaya baaza kubatanga omu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
40021032	Manya Yohaana akabaijamu naakuratira ebi Ruhanga akunda , mwayanga kumwikiriza ; kwonka abashorooza b'omushoro na baamaraaya bo baamwikiriza ; kandi hoona ekyo nobu mwakireebire , bwanyima timureegarukiremu mukamwikiriza .
40021033	Nimuhurire endiijo nfumu . Hakaba hariho omuntu nyineeka , owaahingire omusiri gw'emizaabibu , akaguzitirira orugo , akagurimamu einyuukiro rya viino , akagwombekamu omunaara , akagutsigira abashengi , atyo akaza eihanga .
40021034	Obunaku bw'ebijuma kwera ku bwahikire , yaatuma abaheereza be ahari abo bashengi kumutwekyera ebijuma .
40021035	Kwonka abo bashengi baakwata abo baheereza be ; omwe baamuteera , ondi baamwita , n'ondiijo baamuteera amabaare .
40021036	Yaagaruka yaatuma abandi baheereza baingi okukira abaabandize , nabo baabakuratsa bari .
40021037	Bwanyima yaabatumaho omutabani , naagira ati : Shana omwana wangye bakaamugirira enshoni .
40021038	Kwonka abo bashengi , ku baareebire ogwo mwana , baagambirana bati : Manya ogu niwe muhunguzi ; nimwije tumwite , obuhunguzi bwe bube obwaitu .
40021039	Batyo baamukwata , baamwozya omuri ogwo musiri gw'emizaabibu , baamwita .
40021040	Mbwenu mukama w'ogwo musiri gw'emizaabibu ku ariija , abo bashengi aryabagira ata ?
40021041	Baamugarukamu bati : Abo bainazi aryabacwekyereza , bafe n'obusaasi ; reero ogwo musiri gw'emizaabibu agutemu abandi abarimuganurira ebijuma omu bunaku bwabyo .
40021042	Yesu nawe yaabagira ati : Timukashomaga ekyahandiikirwe ? Ka nikigira kiti : Eibaare eri abombeki baayangire niryo ryahindukire obuhamizo bw'enju . Ekyo kikakorwa Nyakubaho , kandi nikitutangaaza okukireeba .
40021043	N'ahabw'ekyo nimbagambira nti : Obukama bwa Ruhanga buryabaakwa , buheebwe eihanga eririkwana ebyana byabwo .
40021044	[ Weena origwa ahari eryo ibaare aryacwanyagurika ; kandi weena ou ririgwera , riryamucwa obusaasingo . ]
40021045	Abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'Abafarisaayo ku baahuriire ezo nfumu ze , baamanya ku nibo arikurengyeza .
40021046	Kwonka ku baayenzire kumukwata , baatiina egyo nyanja y'abantu , ahabw'okuba bakaba nibamuhamya ku ari omurangi .
40022001	Kandi Yesu akagaruka yaabacwera enfumu naagira ati :
40022002	Obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru nibushushanisibwa n'omugabe owaateekyeire omutabani obugyenyi naashwera ;
40022003	akaragiira abaheereza be kweta abaayeetsirwe ahari obwo bugyenyi , kwonka baayanga kwija .
40022004	Akagaruka akatuma abandi baheereza , naagira ati : Mugambire abeetsirwe aha bugyenyi muti : Reeba , naateekateekire obugyenyi , enimi zangye na zaakaberera zangye zituukwirwe ; byona byeteekateekire , nimwije mutaahe obugyenyi .
40022005	Kwonka bo ekyo tibaakyetaho , baagyenda , omwe omu kibanja kye , n'ondiijo omu by'obushuubuzi bwe ;
40022006	abaatsigaraho baakwata abo baheereza , baabahemura , babaita .
40022007	Omugabe yaagira ekiniga , yaayohereza engabo ze , zaahwerekyereza abo baitsi , zaayotsya orurembo rwabo .
40022008	Bwanyima yaagira abaheereza be ati : Eby'obugyenyi byeteekateekire , kwonka abeetsirwe tibabusheemereire .
40022009	Mbwenu nimwirooko muze omu nteeraniro z'emihanda ; abu muraashangyeyo boona mubeete aha bugyenyi bw'obushwere .
40022010	Abo baheereza batyo bagyenda , baza omu bihandagazi , barundaana boona abu baagwaho , ababi n'abarungi ; ekishengye ky'okutaahiramu obugyenyi kiijura abagyenyi .
40022011	Kwonka omugabe ku ataahamu kureeba abagyenyi , ashangamu omuntu otajwaire kijwaro ky'obugyenyi ;
40022012	amubuuza ati : Mugyenzi wangye , omu waataahamu ota , otajwaire kijwaro ky'obugyenyi ? Onu abura eky'okugarukamu .
40022013	Omugabe nikwo kugira abagaragwa be ati : Mumubohe emikono n'amaguru , mumunagye aheeru omu mwirima , ahariba okurira n'okunena enshaya .
40022014	Manya abeetsirwe ni baingi , kwonka abatoorainwe ni bakye .
40022015	Reero Abafarisaayo bakagyenda , baahanuura oku baraamutegye omu bi araagambe .
40022016	Batyo baamutumaho abatendekwa baabo hamwe n'ab'ekigombe ky'aba Herode , nibamubuuza bati : Mwegyesa , nitumanya ku oba ow'amazima , ku oyegyesa omu mazima eby'omuhanda gwa Ruhanga , kandi ku oteeta ha muntu weena , ahabw'okuba toreebera ha bukuru bw'omuntu .
40022017	Tugambire eki orikuteekateeka . Mbwenu itwe , okuha Kaisaari omushoro kihikire , nari tikihikire ?
40022018	Kwonka Yesu ahabw'okumanya eitima ryabo , abagira ati : Nimuntegyera ki , imwe ndyarya ' mwe ?
40022019	Nimuunyorekye empiiha ei mushora . Batyo baagimureetera .
40022020	Yesu nawe nikwo kubabuuza ati : Ekishushani eki n'ebihandiikirweho n'eby'oha ?
40022021	Bamugarukamu bati : N'ebya Kaisaari . Nawe abagira ati : Mbwenu nu ebya Kaisaari mubihe Kaisaari , n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga .
40022022	Ekyo ku bakihurira , batangaara , bamurugaho , bagyenda .
40022023	Eryo izooba Abasadukaayo bamwe , abagira ngu abafa tibazooka , bakaija ahari Yesu , baamubuuza
40022024	bati : Mwegyesa , Musa akagira ati : Omuntu ku yaakufa atatsigire mwana , omurumuna ahungure omukazi we , abone kuzaarira mukuru we abaana .
40022025	Mbwenu omuriitwe hakaba harimu enyina-emwe mushanju . Ow'omujigaijo akashwera , kwonka yaafa , kandi ahabw'okuba encwekye , omukazi we yaamutsigira omurumuna .
40022026	Ow'omushubiro n'owa kashatu okuhitsya aha wa mushanju , boona baaba batyo .
40022027	Aha muheru gwabo boona omukazi yaafa .
40022028	Mbwenu omu kuzooka aryaba muka oha ahari abo omushanju ? Ahabw'okuba boona bakamushwera .
40022029	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Muhabire ahabw'okutamanya Ebyahandiikirwe , nobu gaakuba amaani ga Ruhanga .
40022030	Manya omu kuzooka , abantu tibarishwera kandi tibarishwerwa , kureka baryaba bari nka baamaraika omu iguru .
40022031	Reero aha kikwatiraine n'okuzooka kw'abafiire , imwe timukashomaga eki Ruhanga yaabagambiire ati :
40022032	Ndi Ruhanga wa Aburahamu , Ruhanga wa Isaaka , kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobo ? Biri ti Ruhanga w'abafiire , kureka n'ow'abahuriire .
40022033	Ekyo ebimbuuro by'abantu ku byakihuriire , baatangaarira okwegyesa kwe .
40022034	Abafarisaayo , ku baahuriire oku Yesu ahunamize Abasadukaayo , baayeteerana .
40022035	Omwe aharibo , omwegyesa w'eiteeka , yaamutega naamubuuza ati :
40022036	Mwegyesa , omu iteeka , ekiragiro ekikuru ni kiiha ?
40022037	Nawe yaamugarukamu ati : Kunda Mukama Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona n'amagara gaawe goona n'obwengye bwawe bwona .
40022038	Ekyo nikyo kiragiro ekikuru kandi eky'okubanza .
40022039	Reero ekya kabiri ekirikushushana nakyo n'eki : Kunda mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda .
40022040	Aha biragiro ebyo byombi , ebindi byona eby'omu iteeka n'eby'Abarangi niho bihamiza .
40022041	Abafarisaayo ku baabaire bateeraniire hamwe , Yesu yaababuuza ekibuuzo eki ,
40022042	ati : Kristo nimumuteekateekaho muta ? Aba omwana w'oha ? Baamugarukamu bati : Ni mwene Daudi .
40022043	Nawe yaabagira ati : Mbwenu shi Daudi , obu yaagambisibwa Mutima Orikwera , taramwetsire Mukama we ? Obu yaagira ati :
40022044	Nyakubaho akagambira Mukama wangye , ati : Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo , okuhitsya obu ndigira abazigu baawe endibatiro y'ebigyere byawe .
40022045	Mbwenu nu Daudi , naamweta Mukama , kandi shi naabaasa ata kuba omwana we ?
40022046	Haabura owaabaasa kugira eki yaamugarukamu , haza okwiha eryo izooba tihaagira waayehanga kumubuuza obundi .
40023001	Kandi Yesu akagambira ebimbuuro by'abantu hamwe n'abatendekwa be ati :
40023002	Abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo bari omu mwanya gwa Musa ;
40023003	n'ahabw'ekyo mugume mukore kandi mukuratire byona ebi barikubagambira , kwonka mutakora ebi barikukora ; ahabw'okuba ebi bagamba tibyo bakora .
40023004	Bakoma emitwaro erikuremeera , etarikubaasa kwemerwa , bagyekoreza abantu aha mabega , haza bo batarikwenda kugitenzyaho n'orukumu rwabo .
40023005	Ebi bakora byona benda ngu bareebwe abantu . Bahangusya filakiteeri zaabo , n'okuraisya ebijwengye by'emyenda yaabo ;
40023006	kandi aha magyenyi bakunda emyanya y'ekitiinwa , n'okushutama omu bitebe by'abakuru omu mateeraniro ,
40023007	n'okutangirirwa omu butare , n'abantu okubeeta mwegyesa .
40023008	Kwonka imwe timuri b'okwetwa mwegyesa , ahabw'okuba mugira omwegyesa omwe , kandi mwena muri eishe-emwe .
40023009	Mbwenu omu nsi mutarigira ou mwayeta shoimwe , ahabw'okuba mwine Shoimwe omwe ow'omu iguru .
40023010	Kandi mutaryetwa abakama , ahabw'okuba mukama waanyu n'omwe , niwe Kristo .
40023011	Orikukira obukuru omuriimwe aryaba omuheereza waanyu .
40023012	Weena orikwetunguura aryabundikwa ; kandi weena orikwebundika aryatunguurwa .
40023013	Muryakareeba , imwe abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo endyarya ! Ahabw'okuba mukingira abantu , ngu batataaha mu bukama bw'Ow'omu iguru . Manya imwe timubutaahamu , kandi abarikwenda kubutaahamu mubazibira .
40023014	[ Muryakareeba , imwe abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo endyarya ! Ahabw'okuba munyaga amaju g'abafaakazi , kandi murandagatana nimushaba ; nikyo muricwererwa orubanja orurikukiraho . ]
40023015	Muryakareeba , imwe abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo endyarya ! Ahabw'okuba muzengurukana omu mayanja n'omu mahanga , ngu mukaabona ow'okuhindura kutaaha omu diini yaanyu ; haza akigitaahamu , mumuhindura ow'okunagwa okuzimu omu muriro okukira imwe kabiri .
40023016	Muryakareeba , imwe beebembezi mpumi ' mwe , abagira muti : Omuntu ku arikurahira Nyaruju , tikiine ki kirikumwitsa ; kwonka ku arikurahira ezaabu y'omuri Nyaruju , naaba naagyemwa kuhikiiriza eki yaarahira .
40023017	Imwe bashema ' mwe empumi ! Ekikuru ni kiiha , ezaabu nari Nyaruju eyeza egyo zaabu ?
40023018	Mwongyera mugira muti : Omuntu ku arikurahira eitambiro , tikiine ki kirikumwitsa , kwonka ku arikurahira ekitoizirwe ekiri aha itambiro , naaba naagyemwa kuhikiiriza eki yaarahira .
40023019	Imwe mpumi ' mwe ! Ekikuru ni kiiha , ekitoizirwe nari eitambiro erikyeza ?
40023020	N'ahabw'ekyo orahira eitambiro , biri arirahiire na byona ebiririho ;
40023021	kandi n'orahira Nyaruju , biri agirahiire ataireho n'Ogwo ogituuramu .
40023022	N'orahira eiguru , biri aba arahiire ekitebe kya Ruhanga eky'obugabe hamwe n'Ogwo okishutamiho .
40023023	Muryakareeba , imwe abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo endyarya ! Ahabw'okuba mutoija kimwe kya ikumi ky'ebishaka ebireetera emboga kugira omuranzi n'ebizinuza , na buri ruganda rwabyo rwona , haza mwehuzya ebikuru ebiri omu iteeka : obwinganisa n'embabazi n'okwikiriza ; ebyo nibyo mwakukozire mutarekire na biri .
40023024	Imwe beebembezi ' mwe empumi , abakyenena tinshengyeera , mukamirakwo engamira !
40023025	Muryakareeba , imwe abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo endyarya ! Ahabw'okuba mushemeza enyima y'ekikopo n'ey'eshuhaani haza omunda mwijwire okweyendeza n'obunyagi .
40023026	Imwe Bafarisaayo ' mwe empumi , mukaabandize mushemeza ekikopo n'eshuhaani omunda , haza enyima ebone kushemera .
40023027	Muryakareeba , imwe abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo endyarya ! Ahabw'okuba muri nk'ebituuro bisiigirwe einoni , ebireebeka gye eruguru , haza omunda biijwire amagufa g'abafu n'obujunde .
40023028	Naimwe aheeru nikwo mureebeka omu bantu oti muri abahikiriire , haza omunda mwijwire oburyarya n'obubi .
40023029	Muryakareeba , imwe abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo endyarya ! Ahabw'okuba mwombeka ebituuro by'abarangi kandi mwengyengyetsa ebiijutsyo by'abahikiriire ,
40023030	obwo nimugira muti : Kuri twabaire turiho omu biro bya bataataitwe , titwakukwataniise nabo omu kusheesha eshagama y'abarangi .
40023031	Obwo nu muba nimweshinja ku muri batabani b'abaitsire abarangi .
40023032	Nimwirooko nu mumariire eki baashoimwe baatandikire .
40023033	Imwe njoka ' mwe ! Imwe baana b'empiri ' mwe ! Muryakira muta okucwerwa orubanja rw'okunagwa okuzimu omu muriro ?
40023034	Reeba , ndyabatumaho abarangi n'abanyabwengye n'abahangu b'eiteeka ; bamwe omuri bo muryabaita , abandi mubabambe , kandi abandi mubaasire omu mateeraniro gaanyu ; muryabahiiganisa , barugye omu rurembo , bahungire omu rundi ;
40023035	eshagama yoona ey'abahikiriire ei mwaseesire ahansi ebone imwe kubatukurira ; okwiha aha shagama ya Abeeli ohikiriire , okuhitsya aha ya Zekariya mwene Barakiya , ou mwaitiire ahagati y'omwanya ogurikwera n'eitambiro .
40023036	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ebyo byona biryagwera ab'oruzaaro oru .
40023037	Yerusalemu , Yerusalemu , iwe oita abarangi , okateera amabaare abakutumirweho ! Ni kangahi obu naayenzire kuteerana hamwe abaana baawe nk'oku enkoko erundaana obwana bwayo , ekabubumbatira omu mapapa , kwonka okanga !
40023038	Reeba , enju yaanyu yaaza kutsigara eri omushaka .
40023039	Mbwenu nimbagambira nti : Timurindeeba bundi , okuhitsya obu murigira muti : Orikwija omu iziina rya Nyakubaho ahimbisibwe !
40024001	Yesu akaruga omuri Nyaruju ; ku yaabaire naagyenda , abatendekwa be baamworeka oku Nyaruju yaayombekirwe .
40024002	Kwonka we yaabagarukamu ati : Ebi byona nimubireeba ? Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Tiharitsigara ibaare na rimwe eritungamiire erindi eritarisheenyagurwa .
40024003	Yesu ku yaabaire ashutami aha Rushozi rw'Emioliva , abatendekwa be baija , baamubuuza omu mubonano bati : Tugambire ahu ebyo biribeeraho , n'akamanyiso k'okwija kwawe , kandi n'ak'okuhwaho kw'ensi .
40024004	Yesu nawe abagarukamu ati : Mwerinde , hatarigira n'omwe owaabahabisa .
40024005	Manya baryaija baingi nibaanyeyeterera nibagira bati : Niinye Kristo ; haza bahabise baingi .
40024006	Kandi muryahurira engamba n'emibuuro yaazo ; haza mutaryekanga , ahabw'okuba ebyo n'eby'okubaho ; kwonka emperu yo eryaba etakahikire .
40024007	Manya eihanga riryateera erindi ihanga , n'obugabe buteere obundi , kandi habeho enjara n'emitsitsa omu myanya mingi ;
40024008	kwonka ebyo byona biryaba biri entandikiro y'eby'obusaasi .
40024009	Obwo baryabahayo okubonabonesibwa , babaite ; muryayangwa amahanga goona ahabw'eiziina ryangye .
40024010	Reero baingi baryagwa , bareebyane kandi bangane .
40024011	Haryaimuka abarangi baingi b'ebishuba bahabise baingi .
40024012	Mpaho ahabw'obugomi kukanya , okukunda bw'abaingi kuryahora .
40024013	Kwonka origumisiriza akahika aha muheru , niwe arijunwa .
40024014	Kandi Amakuru Marungi g'obukama bwa Ruhanga garyarangirirwa omu nsi yoona , kuhamiza amahanga goona ; haza obwo emperu ehikye .
40024015	Mpaho ku murireeba ekirikuzira ekirikuhwerekyereza , ekyagambirwe Daniyeli omurangi , kyemereire omu mwanya ogurikwera-orikushoma ayetegyereze -
40024016	obwo abariba bari omuri Buyudaaya bahungire aha nshozi ;
40024017	oriba ori aha mutwe gw'enju ataritemburuka kugira eki yaiha omu nju ;
40024018	n'oriba ori omu musiri atarigaruka omuka kwenda omunagiro gwe .
40024019	Ebishi bambe , abariba baine enda n'abarikwontsya omu biro ebyo baryagwerwa akagwe !
40024020	Mushabe , okuhunga kwanyu kutaribaho mu biro by'embeho nari ahari Sabato .
40024021	Manya haryabaho eby'obusaasi bwingi ebitakabahoga , ensi yaaba kuhangwa n'okuhitsya hati , kandi ebitaribaho bundi .
40024022	Ebyo biro kuri Ruhanga atarabicwireho , tihaakurokokireho muntu n'omwe ; kwonka ahabw'entoore ze , ebyo biro biryacuubwaho .
40024023	Haza omuntu ku aribagira ati : Reeba , Kristo ari aha , nari , ari hariya , mutariikiriza ;
40024024	ahabw'okuba haryaimuka Ba-Kristo b'ebishuba n'abarangi b'ebishuba , bakore obumanyiso bukuru n'eby'okutangaaza kuhabisa nangwa n'abatoorainwe , kyaba nikibaasika .
40024025	Reeba , naabagambira bitakabaireho .
40024026	N'ahabw'ekyo ku baribagira bati : Reeba , nguriya omu ihamba , mutarizayo ; kandi ku barigira bati : Reeba , ngugwo omu nju , mutariikiriza .
40024027	Manya nk'oku omurabyo gurabiza burugwa-izooba gukahika burengyerwa-izooba , n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo kuriba .
40024028	Ahu omutumbi guri , niho amahungu gateeranira .
40024029	Eby'obusaasi eby'omu biro ebyo ku birihwa biti , eizooba riryatimba omwirima , n'okwezi kuryazima , n'enyonyoozi ziryahanantuka omu iguru zigwe , n'eby'amaani eby'omu iguru bitengyeetsibwe .
40024030	Reero obwo akamanyiso k'Omwana w'omuntu karyareebeka omu iguru , enganda zoona ez'omu nsi zicure , zireebe Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bicu by'eiguru , aine obushoboorozi n'ekitiinisa kingi .
40024031	Haza aryatuma baamaraika be , baije nibateera enzamba y'eiraka rihango , bataaruure abatoorainwe be nibabaiha omu mbaju ina ezi emiyaga ereetwamu , okwiha aha muheru gw'eiguru okuta aha gundi .
40024032	Mureebere aha mutiini ; eitaagi ryagwo ku ryoroba , ryatooka amababi , mumanya ku ekyanda kiri haihi .
40024033	Naimwe nu nikwo kiri ; ku murireeba ebyo byona , mumanye ku ari haihi , ku yaahikire aha marembo .
40024034	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ab'obusingye obu tibarihwaho , ebyo byona bitakabaireho .
40024035	Eiguru n'ensi biryahwaho , kwonka ebigambo byangye tibirihwaho .
40024036	Manya eby'ekyo kiro n'obwo bunaku tihariho orikubimanya , nobu baakuba baamaraika b'omu iguru , nangwa nobu yaakuba Mwana , kureka Ishe wenka .
40024037	Nk'oku kyabaire omu biro bya Noa , n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo kuriba .
40024038	Manya abantu b'omu biro ebyabandiize omwegyemure bakaba nibarya , nibanywa , nibashwera kandi nibashwerwa , okuhitsya aha kiro eki Noa yaataahiireho omu bwato
40024039	Haza bo tibarakimanyire okuhitsya obu omwegyemure gwaizire , gukabakukumba ; n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo kuriba .
40024040	Obwo abashaija babiri ku bariba bari omu musiri , omwe aryatwarwa , ondi atsigweho .
40024041	Abakazi babiri baryaba nibasa kumwe aha rubengo , omwe aryatwarwa , ondi atsigweho .
40024042	N'ahabw'ekyo mugume nimureeba , ahabw'okuba timurikumanya kiro ki Mukama waanyu ariiziraho .
40024043	Mwetegyereze eki , Nyineeka ku yaakuba naamanya amagingo ga nyekiro agu omushuma araiziremu , akaaguma naareeba kuzibira enju ye kufumurwa ,
40024044	N'ahabw'ekyo naimwe mugume mweteekateekire , ahabw'okuba timurikumanya bunaku obu Omwana w'omuntu ariiziramu .
40024045	Mbwenu ni mutsigire ki omwesigwa kandi ow'obwengye , ou mukama we yaatsigiire ab'omu ka ye kubaha ebyokurya omu bunaku buhikire ?
40024046	Ogwo mutsigire ou mukama we ariija akashanga naakora atyo n'omuhiirwa .
40024047	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Aryamuha obushoboorozi aha bi atungire byona .
40024048	Kwonka ogwo mutsigire ku yaakuba mubi , yaagira ati : Mukama wangye yaasiibayo ;
40024049	atyo akatandika kuteera bagyenzi be , reero akarya kandi akanywa n'abasinzi ;
40024050	mukama w'ogwo mutsigire aryaija aha kiro ki onu atamwetegyeireho , n'aha shaaha ei atarikumanya ,
40024051	haza aryamufubira munonga , amute hamwe n'endyarya , ei abantu bariririra bakanena enshaya .
40025001	Omu bunaku obwo , obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru buryashushanisibwa n'abaishiki ikumi , abaagyenzire n'amatabaaza gaabo kuza kubugana kishwera .
40025002	Bataano ahari bo bakaba bari abashema , kandi abataano bari abanyabwengye .
40025003	Ahabw'okuba abashema ku baatwaire amatabaaza gaabo , tibaagyenda na gandi majuta ;
40025004	kwonka abanyabwengye bo baatwara amatabaaza gaabo hamwe n'ecupa zirimu amajuta .
40025005	Kishwera ku yaatwireho kwija , boona baahungira , baagwejegyera .
40025006	Mbwenu omu itumbi haabaho okwamuza bati : Reeba , kishwera yaija ! Nimushohore tuze kumubugana .
40025007	Batyo abaishiki boona baimuka , baashemeza amatabaaza gaabo .
40025008	Reero abashema baagira abanyabwengye bati : Mutuhe aha majuta gaanyu , ahabw'okuba amatabaaza gaitu gaaza kuraara .
40025009	Abanyabwengye baabagarukamu bati : Nooshusha oti tigarikwija kutumarira , itwe naimwe ; haakiri muze omu batunzi , mugeegurire .
40025010	Banu ku baabaire nibakiza kugagura , kishwera yaija , bari abaabaire beeteekateekire , baataaha nawe omu nju aha bugyenyi , orwigi rwakingwa .
40025011	Bwanyima abaishiki abo abandi baija , baagira bati : Mukama waitu , mukama waitu , twigurireho !
40025012	We yaabagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira , tindikubamanya .
40025013	N'ahabw'ekyo nu , mugume nimureeba , ahabw'okuba timurikumanya kiro , nobu yaakuba eshaaha .
40025014	Kandi obukama bw'Ow'omu iguru buri nk'omuntu owaabaire naayenda kuza eihanga , akeeta abaheereza be , akabatsigira ebintu bye .
40025015	Omwe akamuha shilingi obukumi bushatu , ondi akakumi n'enkumi ibiri , n'ondiijo enkumi mukaaga , nka buri omwe oku yaabaire naabaasa ; bwanyima atyo akagyenda .
40025016	Owaatungire shilingi obukumi bushatu tahwama , agyenda azishuubuza , ashaazyamu ezindi obukumi bushatu .
40025017	N'owaatungire akakumi n'enkumi ibiri nawe atyo ashaazyamu ezindi kakumi n'enkumi ibiri .
40025018	Kwonka owaatungire shilingi enkumi mukaaga agyenda , atimba ekiina , asherekamu ezo mpiiha za mukama we .
40025019	Mbwenu ku haahingwireho omwanya muraingwa , mukama w'abo baaheereza yaagaruka , yaabara nabo ebi yaabatsigiire .
40025020	Owaatungire shilingi obukumi bushatu , yaija omu maisho ge areetsire ezindi obukumi bushatu , yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , okampa shilingi obukumi bushatu ; mbwenu nzishaagizemu ezindi obukumi bushatu .
40025021	Mukama we yaamugarukamu ati : Yebare , muheereza murungi orikwesigwa ! Obaire omwesigwa omu bikye , naanye ndyakuha obushoboorozi , otegyekye ebingi ; shemererwa hamwe na mukama waawe .
40025022	N'owaatungire akakumi n'enkumi ibiri yaija omu maisho ge , yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , okampa shilingi kakumi n'enkumi ibiri , mbwenu nzishaagizemu ezindi kakumi n'enkumi ibiri .
40025023	Mukama we yaamugira ati : Yebare , muheereza murungi orikwesigwa ! Obaire omwesigwa omuri bikye , naanye ndyakuha obushoboorozi , otegyekye ebingi ; shemererwa hamwe na mukama waawe .
40025024	Reero owaatungire shilingi enkumi mukaaga yaija omu maisho ge , yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , nkakumanya ku ori omuntu ogumire , ogyesha ebi otabibire , kandi ohunika ebi otaheheerize ;
40025025	n'ahabw'ekyo nkatiina , naagyenda naashereka shilingi zaawe enkumi mukaaga omu itaka . Mbwenu shilingi zaawe nzizi , ozitware .
40025026	Mukama we nawe amugarukamu ati : Iwe muheereza mubi ' we , kandi omweremwa ! Okamanya ku ngyesha ebi ntarabibire , nkahunika ebi ntaheheerize ?
40025027	Okaabaire obiikize empiiha zangye abashuubuzi b'empiiha , haza nkiija ntunga ezangye hamwe n'amagoba gaazo .
40025028	N'ahabw'ekyo mumwakye ezo mpiiha , muzihe oine obukumi mukaaga .
40025029	Manya weena oine aryaheebwa , kandi atungye bishaagaane ; kwonka otaine , n'aku aine aryakaakwa .
40025030	Haza ogu muheereza otaine mugasho , mumunagye aheeru omu mwirima , ah'abantu bariririra bakanena enshaya .
40025031	Omwana w'omuntu ku ariizira omu kitiinisa kye aine baamaraika be boona , aryashutama aha kitebe kye eky'obugabe eky'ekitiinwa .
40025032	Reero ab'amahanga goona baryateeranirwa omu maisho ge , abashoroore nk'oku omuriisa ashoroora entaama omu mbuzi .
40025033	Haza entaama azite aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo , kwonka embuzi azite aha rwa bumosho .
40025034	Bwanyima omugabe aryagira abari aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo , ati : Imwe , abu Tata yaahaire omugisha , nimwije murye obukama obwabateekateekyeirwe okwiha ensi yaaba kuhangwa ;
40025035	ahabw'okuba nkaba nyine enjara , mwampa ekyokurya ; nkaba nyine eiriho , mwampa ekyokunywa ; nkaba ndi omugyenyi , mwankunira ;
40025036	nkaba njwaire busha , mwanjweka ; nkaba ndwaire , mwantaayaayira ; nkaba ndi omu kihome , mwanshuura .
40025037	Mpaho abahikiriire baryamugarukamu bati : Mukama waitu , tukakureeba ryari oine enjara , haza tukakuriisa ; nainga oine eiriho , haza tukakuha ekyokunywa ?
40025038	Tukakureeba ryari ori omugyenyi , tukakukunira ; nari ojwaire , busha , tukakujweka ?
40025039	Kandi tukakureeba ryari orwaire , nari ori omu kihome , haza tukakushuura ?
40025040	Omugabe nawe aryabagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Nk'oku mwabikoreire omwe aha banyaruganda abarikuhereerukayo , biri niinye mwabikoreire .
40025041	Bwanyima aryagambira abari aha rubaju rwe rwa bumosho , ati : Mundugyeho , imwe abakyeenirwe , muze omu muriro ogutahwaho , ogwateekateekyeirwe Sitaane na baamaraika be ;
40025042	ahabw'okuba nkaba nyine enjara , timwampa kyokurya ; nkaba nyine eiriho , timwampa kyokunywa ;
40025043	nkaba ndi omugyenyi , timwankunira ; nkaba njwaire busha , timwanjweka ; nkaba ndwaire kandi ndi omu kihome , timwanshuura .
40025044	Nabo baryamugarukamu bati : Mukama waitu , tukakureeba ryari oine enjara , nari oine eiriho , nari ori omugyenyi , nari ojwaire busha , nari orwaire , nainga ori omu kihome , haza tutagire eki twakukorera ?
40025045	Reero nawe aryabagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Nk'oku mutarabikoreire omwe ahari abo abarikuhereerukayo biri timurabinkoreire .
40025046	Mpaho abo baryaza omu kubonabonesibwa okutarihwaho , kwonka abahikiriire bo baze omu magara agatahwaho .
40026001	Yesu , ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo byona , yaagira abatendekwa be ati :
40026002	Nimumanya ngu ku haraahingureho ebiro bibiri , nihaija kubaho ekiro ky'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho , kandi Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo kubambwa aha musharaba .
40026003	Omuri obwo bunaku abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abakuru omu ihanga baateeranira omu ka y'omuhongyerezi omukuru , owaabaire naayetwa Kayaafa ;
40026004	boona hamwe baacuma enaama y'okukwata Yesu n'obwengye kumwita .
40026005	Kwonka baagira bati : Ekyo kitabaho omu biro by'obugyenyi , abantu batakaajagarara .
40026006	Mbwenu Yesu ku yaabaire ari Beetaniya , omwa Simooni omubembe ,
40026007	ari aha meeza , omukazi yaamwijaho aine akacupa k'eibaare ry'omwengyengye , akarimu amajuta g'omugaju ag'obuguzi bwingi ; yaagamushuka aha mutwe .
40026008	Abatendekwa , ku baakireebire , baaguubwa kubi nibagira bati : Mbwenu aga gaafa ki ?
40026009	Nangwa aga majuta g'omugaju gakaabaire gatunzirwemu eky'obuguzi bwingi , haza kigabirwa abooro .
40026010	Kwonka Yesu ahabw'okukimanya , abagira ati : Ogu mukazi nimumugangiza ki ? Eki yankorera ka ni kirungi !
40026011	Imwe obutoosha abooro mutuura nabo , kwonka nyowe timuriguma naanye obutoosha .
40026012	Manya obu yaaba naashuka amajuta g'omugaju aga aha mubiri gwangye , yaaba naakora eky'okunziikisa .
40026013	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ahu Amakuru Marungi aga garirangirirwa omu nsi yoona , eki ogu mukazi yaakora kiryagambwaho okumwijuka .
40026014	Bwanyima omwe ahari ikumi na babiri , orikwetwa Yuda owa Kariota , akaza omu bahongyerezi abakuru ,
40026015	yaabagira ati : Mbwenu nimwija kumpa ki , ku ndaamubahe ? Batyo baamuha ebicweka by'efeeza makumi ashatu .
40026016	Okwiha obwo yaasherura oburyo oku araamureebye .
40026017	Aha kiro ky'okubanza eky'Obugyenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe , abatendekwa bakaija ahari Yesu , baamubuuza bati : Nooyenda tukuteekateekyere hi , ahu oraariire Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho ?
40026018	Yaabagira ati : Nimwirooko muze omu rurembo , owa nanka , mumugire muti : Omwegyesa yaagira ati : Obunaku bwangye buri haihi ; niinyija kukorera Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho omwawe hamwe n'abatendekwa bangye .
40026019	Batyo abatendekwa baatwaza nk'oku Yesu yaabaragiira ; baatebeekanisizayo eby'obwo Bugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho .
40026020	Omwabazyo ku gwakiikire , Yesu yaaza aha meeza hamwe n'abatendekwa be ikumi na babiri .
40026021	Mbwenu ku baabaire nibarya , yaagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Omwe omuriimwe naija kundeebya .
40026022	Ekyo kyabasaasa munonga , baatandika kumubuuza omwe omwe bati : Niinye , Mukama wangye ?
40026023	Yaabagarukamu ati : Owaaba naakoza naanye omu shohaani niwe arandeebye .
40026024	Omwana w'omuntu naija kuba nk'oku kyamuhandiikirweho ; kwonka ogwo muntu orikumureebya , aryakareeba ! Nangwa ogwo muntu kuri atarazairwe .
40026025	Yuda owaamureebize nikwo kumubuuza ati : Mwegyesa , niinye ? Yaamugarukamu ati : Kiri nk'oku waagamba .
40026026	Mbwenu ku baabaire nibarya , Yesu yaakwata omugaati , yaasiima , yaagucwamu , yaaguha abatendekwa be naagira ati : Nimutoore , murye ; ogu n'omubiri gwangye .
40026027	Bwanyima yaakwata ekikopo ; ku yaaherize kusiima , yaakibaha naagira ati : Mwena mukinyweho ;
40026028	ahabw'okuba egi n'eshagama yangye ey'endagaano ensya , eraasheeshwe ahabwa baingi , ngu basaasirwe ebibi .
40026029	Nimbagambira nti : Tindinywa bundi ha kirugire omu mizaabibu , okuhitsya obu ndikinywa busya hamwe naimwe omu bukama bwa Tata .
40026030	Ku baaherize kweshongora ekyeshongoro , baashohora , baaza omu Rushozi rw'Emioliva .
40026031	Mpaho Yesu yaabagira ati : Mwena eki kiro nimwija kumpemukaho ; ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa ngu : Ndyateera omuriisa , entaama z'obusyo zitaataane .
40026032	Kwonka ku ndaaheze kuzooka omu bafiire , niinyija kubeebembera ninza Galilaaya .
40026033	Petero yaahiga naamugira ati : Boona nobu baraakuhemukyeho , nyowe tindikwija kukuhemukaho n'akakye !
40026034	Yesu yaamugira ati : Buzimazima ninkugambira nti : Eki kiro rushaaki ku eraabe etakagambire , nooba waanyogire kashatu .
40026035	Petero yaamugarukamu ati : Nobu naakuba ndi ow'okufa naiwe , nikikabure tindikwija kukwoga . N'abandi batendekwa boona baahiga batyo .
40026036	Bwanyima Yesu yaagyenda nabo omu musiri ogurikwetwa Getesemaane ; yaagira abatendekwa be ati : Mube muri aha , nze kuriya kushaba .
40026037	Atyo atwara Petero na batabani ba Zebedaayo bombi , atandika kugira enaku n'obujune .
40026038	Bwanyima abagira ati : Omutima gwangye gwine enaku z'okuunyita ! Mugume aha nimureeba hamwe naanye .
40026039	Atyo airirayo omu maisho kakye , ajuumara ahansi , ashaba ati : Taata , ku kiraabe nikibaasika , orekye ekikopo eki kimpingure ! Kwonka kitaba nkaanye oku ndikwenda , kureka nkaiwe oku orikwenda .
40026040	Ku aija aha batendekwa be abo , ashanga bagwejegyeire ; agira Petero ati : Ebyo timwabaasa kureeba naanye eshaaha emwe ?
40026041	Mureebe kandi mushabe , mutakaagwa omu kwohibwa ; manya omutima nigwenda , kwonka omubiri n'omweremwa .
40026042	Atyo agarukayo obwa kabiri , ashaba ati : Taata , ekikopo eki ku kiraabe kitarikubaasa kuhingura ntakinywaire , eki orikwenda kibe nikyo kyakorwa .
40026043	Kandi agaruka aija , ashanga bagwejegyeire , ahabw'okuba amaisho gaabo gakaba garembire .
40026044	Mpaho abatsigaho obwa kabiri , agyenda , ashaba obwa kashatu naagamba ebigambo nka biri .
40026045	Bwanyima agaruka ahari abo batendekwa be , abagira ati : Mbwenu mugumizemu mugwejegyere , muhuumure . Reeba , obunaku bwahika Omwana w'omuntu kuheebwayo omu mikono y'abasiisi .
40026046	Nimwimukye , tugyende ! Reeba , orikundeebya ari haihi .
40026047	Ku yaabaire naakigamba , haija Yuda , omwe ahari ikumi na babiri hamwe n'ekimbuuro ky'abantu bakwaitse zaarurara n'ebikoni , boohereziibwe abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru omu ihanga .
40026048	Egyo ndeebya ekaba yaabahaire akamanyiso , neegira eti : Ou ndaanywegyere , niwe ogwo ; mumukwate .
40026049	Ahonaaho ogwo mureebya ahika Yesu , amugira ati : Kagire obusingye , Mwegyesa ! Atyo amunywegyera .
40026050	Kwonka Yesu amugira ati : Mugyenzi wangye , kora eki oiziriire ! Reero abo bahika Yesu , bamutaho engaro , bamukwata .
40026051	Mpaho omwe ahari abo abaabaire bari hamwe na Yesu , asyorayo rurara ye , agitemesa omuheereza w'omuhongyerezi omukuru , amucwaho okutu .
40026052	Bwanyima Yesu amugira ati : Garura rurara yaawe omu kyobate kyayo ; ahabw'okuba abakwata rurara baryaitwa rurara .
40026053	Nooteekateeka , ngu tindikubaasa kushaba Tata , akaanyoherereza ahonaaho emigogo y'engabo za baamaraika ikumi n'ebiri n'okukiraho ?
40026054	Mbwenu ebyahandiikirwe ebirikugira ngu n'eky'okuba kityo , bikaahikiiriziibwe bita ?
40026055	Omuri ako kaanya Yesu agira egyo migogo y'abantu ati : Beitu obu murikuunyizira na zaarurara n'ebikoni kunkwata , ndi omwambuzi ? Buri izooba ka naabaire nshutama omuri Nyaruju niinyegyesa , haza mutankwate .
40026056	Manya eki kyona kyabaho , ngu ebyahandiikirwe abarangi bibone kuhikiirizibwa . Ago magingo abatendekwa be boona bamutsigaho , bahunga .
40026057	Bwanyima abaakwatsire Yesu baamutwarira Kayaafa omuhongyerezi omukuru , ahu abahandiiki n'abakuru omu ihanga baabaire bateeraniire .
40026058	Obwo Petero akaba amukuratiire amuri hareho , okuhitsya obu baahikire omu kibuga ky'omuhongyerezi omukuru ; atyo nawe akakitaahamu , akashutama n'abambari kureeba ahi biraaherere .
40026059	Obwo abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'eishengyero ryona bakaba nibasherura obwamushinja bw'ebishuba bw'okwomesereza Yesu , ngu babone kumwitisa ;
40026060	kwonka tibaabubona , nobu haraabe haizire baamushinja baingi b'ebishuba . Bwanyima haija baamushinja b'ebishuba babiri , baagira bati :
40026061	Ogu muntu akagira ati : Nimbaasa kusheenya Nyaruju ya Ruhanga , haza ngarukye ngyombekye omu biro bishatu .
40026062	Omuhongyerezi omukuru nikwo kwemerera , akamubuuza ati : Toine ki orikugarukamu ? Mbwenu aba bantu nibakushinja ki ?
40026063	Kwonka Yesu aguma ahunami . Omuhongyerezi omukuru nikwo kumugira ati : Ninkurahiza Ruhanga ohuriire , tugambire ku oraabe niiwe ori Kristo Omwana wa Ruhanga .
40026064	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Waakigamba ; kandi buzima nimbagambira nti : Okwiha hati muryareeba Omwana w'omuntu ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo orw'Ow'obushoboorozi , naizira omu bicu by'omu iguru .
40026065	Omuhongyerezi omukuru nikwo kutaagura ebijwaro bye , akagira ati : Yaarogota ! Mbwenu nitukyendera ki baamushinja abandi ? Manya mwayehuririra oku yaarogota !
40026066	Mbwenu nimuteekateeka muta ? Baamugarukamu bati : Ashemereire kufa !
40026067	Batyo bamucwera amacwante ahamaisho , bamuteera entomi , n'abandi empi ,
40026068	nibamugira bati : Iwe Kristo , turagurire ! N'oha owaakuteera ?
40026069	Obwo Petero akaba ashutami aheeru omu kibuga . Omuzaana aija , amugira ati : Naiwe waaba ori hamwe na Yesu owa Galilaaya .
40026070	Kwonka we ayehakanira omu maisho ga boona , ati : Tindikumanya ki orikugamba .
40026071	Ku yaarugireyo , yaahika aha irembo , ondiijo muzaana amureeba , agambira abeemereire aho ati : Ogu mushaija yaaba ari hamwe na Yesu owa Nazareeti .
40026072	Onu agaruka ayehakana , ataireho n'okurahira ati : Ogwo muntu tindikumumanya .
40026073	Ku haahingwireho akaanya kakye , abeemereire aho baahika Petero , baamugira ati : Buzimazima naiwe ori ow'omuri bari , ahabw'okuba emigambire yaawe neekworeka butunu .
40026074	Mpaho atandika kwekyeena n'okurahira , ati : Ogwo muntu tindikumanya . Ahonaaho enkoko egamba .
40026075	Petero nikwo kwijuka eki Yesu yaagamba naagira ati : Enkoko ku eraabe atakagambire , nooba waanyogire kashatu . Atyo ashohora , arira munonga .
40027001	Mbwenu ku bwaseesire , abahongyerezi abakuru boona hamwe n'abakuru omu ihanga baahanuura oku baraite Yesu .
40027002	Baamuboha , baamutwara , baamuhayo ahari Pilaato omutegyeki omukuru .
40027003	Mpaho Yuda owaamureebize , ku yaareebire Yesu yaacwerwa orubanja kumusinga , yaayefuuza , yaagarurira abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru omu ihanga ebyo bicweka by'efeeza makumi ashatu ,
40027004	naagira ati : Ncumwire okureebya omuntu ori mwere kwitwa . Baamugira bati : Itwe shi , ekyo kitukwatiire ki ? Orwemarire !
40027005	Nawe atyo atambika ebyo bicweka by'efeeza omuri Nyaruju , ashohora , agyenda , ayehanika .
40027006	Kwonka abahongyerezi abakuru baihaho ebyo bicweka by'efeeza , bagira bati : Tikihikire kubita omu ibiikiro , ahabw'okuba n'empiiha z'eshagama .
40027007	Batyo bahanuura , baziguramu ekibanja ky'omunogoozi w'enyungu , kuguma nibaziikamu abanyamahanga .
40027008	N'ahabw'ekyo ekyo kibanja kikaguma nikyetwa Ekibanja ky'Eshagama n'okuhitsya hati .
40027009	Kityo kyahikiirizibwa ekyagambirwe Yeremiya omurangi naagira ati : Bakatwara ebicweka by'efeeza makumi ashatu , nibwo buguzi bw'ogwo ou bamwe aha Baisiraeli baaramwire ;
40027010	baabihayo ahabw'ekibanja ky'omunogoozi w'enyungu , nk'oku Mukama yandagiire .
40027011	Reero Yesu yaayemerera omu maisho g'omutegyeki omukuru ; ogwo mutegyeki yaamubuuza ati : Weeza , ori omugabe w'Abayudaaya ? Yesu amugarukamu ati : Waakigamba .
40027012	Kwonka ku yaatabaariziibwe abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru omu ihanga , tiyaagira ki yaagarukamu .
40027013	Pilaato nikwo kumubuuza ati : Torikuhurira ebi barikukushinja ku biri bingi ?
40027014	Kwonka tiyaagira ki yaamugarukamu na kimwe omu bi baamutabaariize ; ekyo kyatangaaza munonga ogwo mutegyeki .
40027015	Mbwenu ahari ibara bugyenyi nk'obwo , ogwo mutegyeki akaba amanyiriire kurekurira abantu embohe emwe ei barikwenda .
40027016	Obwo bakaba baine embohe rurangaanwa erikwetwa Baraba .
40027017	Ku baabaire bateeraine , Pilaato yaababuuza ati : Mbwenu n'oha ou murikwenda mbarekurire ? Baraba , nari Yesu orikwetwa Kristo ?
40027018	Ahabw'okuba akaba naamanya ku baamuhaireyo ahabwa eihari .
40027019	Ekindi , ku yaabaire ashutami aha kitebe ky'okucweraho emanja , omukazi we yaamutumaho ati : Otagira eki waakora ogwo muntu ohikiriire ; ahabw'okuba ebi mmurootsireho nyekiro binsaasize munonga .
40027020	Kwonka abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru omu ihanga baayosya abantu kushaba Baraba n'okwita Yesu .
40027021	Reero omutegyeki omukuru omu kubagarukamu yaabagira ati : Ahari abo bombi , nimwenda mbarekurire oha ? Bamugira bati : Baraba .
40027022	Pilaato nawe yaababuuza ati : Mbwenu shi , ngire nta Yesu orikwetwa Kristo ? Boona bati : Abambwe aha musharaba !
40027023	Nawe ati : Ahanki ? Akozire kibi ki ? Kwonka bo baakizaho kuyomba bati : Abambwe aha musharaba !
40027024	Pilaato ku yaareebire ataine ku araagire , kandi ku harikwija kubaho akajagararo , yaihayo amaizi , yaanaabira engaro omu maisho g'abantu naagamba ati : Nyowe ndi mwere aha shagama y'ogu muntu ohikiriire ; murwemarire !
40027025	Abantu boona baagarukamu bati : Eshagama ye ebe niitwe yaatukurira n'abaana baitu .
40027026	Atyo abarekurira Baraba ; kandi ku aheza kuteeza Yesu ebyasha , amuhayo kubambwa aha musharaba .
40027027	Bwanyima abaserukare b'ogwo mutegyeki omukuru baatwara Yesu omu ishengyero , baateeranirayo eihe ryona ery'abaserukare ,
40027028	baamujuura ebijwaro bye , baamujweka omunagiro gurikutukura .
40027029	Reero baazinga ekirunga ky'amahwa , baakimuta aha mutwe , baamukwatsa orubingo omu mukono gwe gwa buryo , baamutsimbira amaju nibamushungisa bati : Singa , Mugabe w'Abayudaaya !
40027030	Batyo baamucwera amacwante , baakwata orwo rubingo , baarumuteeza aha mutwe .
40027031	Ku baaherize kumushungisa , baamujuura ogwo munagiro , baamujweka ebye , baamutwara kumubamba aha musharaba .
40027032	Ku baabaire nibashohora , baabugana omushaija owa Kureene orikwetwa Simooni ; baamugyema kwekorera omusharaba gwa Yesu .
40027033	Ku baahikire omu mwanya ogurikwetwa Gologota , amakuru ngu omwanya gw'Empanga y'Omutwe ,
40027034	baamuha viino etimbwirwemu endurwe ngu aginywe ; kwonka ku yaagirorizeho ; yaayanga kuginywa .
40027035	Kandi ku baaherize kumubamba aha musharaba , baabagana ebijwaro bye nibabiteerera enteenyu .
40027036	Bwanyima baashutama , baaguma aho bamuhangire amaisho .
40027037	Reero ahaiguru y'omutwe gwe , baataho ekihandiiko ky'orubanja rwe ekirikushomwa kiti : OGU NI YESU , OMUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA .
40027038	Akabambwa hamwe n'abambuzi babiri , omwe aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo , n'ondiijo aha rwa bumosho .
40027039	Reero abarikuhingura baajuma Yesu nibamuha mutinzi ,
40027040	nibagira bati : Iwe osheenya Nyaruju , okagaruka okagyombeka omu biro bishatu , mbwenu yejune ! Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga otemburukye , orugye aha musharaba !
40027041	Abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abahangu b'eiteeka n'abakuru omu ihanga nabo baamushungisa batyo nibagira bati :
40027042	Ku yaajunire abandi , mbwenu k'ataabaasa kwejuna ! Ogwo mugabe wa Isiraeli , hati naatemburukye aha musharaba , haza tumwikirize !
40027043	Tiwe ayesiga Ruhanga ; mbwenu hati amurokore , ku araabe naamukunda ! Manya agizire ati : Ndi Omwana wa Ruhanga !
40027044	N'abambuzi abaabambirwe nawe nabo baamujuma batyo .
40027045	Okwiha aha shaaha ya mukaaga ensi yoona ekashwekwa omwirima okuhitsya aha shaaha ya mwenda .
40027046	Kandi nk'aha shaaha ya mwenda , Yesu yaahooga n'eiraka rihango , ati : Eli , Eli , lama sabakitaani ? amakuru ngu : Ruhanga wangye , Ruhanga wangye , ahabw'enki wantsigaho ?
40027047	Bamwe aha baabaire beemereire aho , ku baakihuriire , baagira bati : Manya naayeta Eliya !
40027048	Omwe aharibo ahonaaho yairuka , yaakwata ekyangu , yaakijabika omu viino y'encenku yaakishokamu orubingo , yaakimuha kukinyuunyuuta .
40027049	Kwonka abandi baagira bati : Reka , tureebe Eliya ku araabe naija kumujuna !
40027050	Atyo Yesu agaruka agamba n'eiraka rihango , ahayo amagara ge .
40027051	Ago magingo omukingo gwa Nyaruju gutemukamu emitanda ebiri , okwiha eruguru okuhika ahansi ; ensi etengyeeta , enkiri zaatika ,
40027052	ebituuro biiguka , n'emitumbi mingi y'abarikwera abaabaire bagwejegyeire ehimbuuka .
40027053	Bwanyima Yesu ku yaaherize kuzooka omu bafiire , abarikwera abo baaruga omu bituuro , baataaha omu rurembo orurikwera , baabonekyera baingi .
40027054	Omukuru w'abaserukare igana hamwe n'abu yaabaire aine nibarinda Yesu , ku baareebire omutsitsa n'ebyabaho , baatiina munonga , baagira bati : Buzimazima ogu abaire ari Omwana wa Ruhanga !
40027055	Reero aho hakaba hariho abakazi baingi nibareebera hangahari . Abo bakazi bakaba barugire Galilaaya na Yesu , bamushendekyereize nibamuheereza ;
40027056	barimu Mariya Magadaleena , na Mariya nyina wa Yakobo na Yosefu , kandi na nyina wa beene Zebedaayo .
40027057	Omwabazyo ku gwakiikire , haija omushaija omutungi owa Arimataaya , orikwetwa Yosefu , owaabaire nawe ari omutendekwa wa Yesu .
40027058	Yaaza ahari Pilaato , yaamushaba omutumbi gwa Yesu . Pilaato nawe yaaragiira ku bagumuha .
40027059	Yosefu ogwo yaihaho ogwo mutumbi , yaaguzinga omu mwenda gwa kitaani ogutaine burofa ,
40027060	yaaguta omu kituuro kye ekisya eki yaabaire ashorogotoroire omu rukiri ; bwanyima yaakumbagaza orubengo ruhango aha munwa gwakyo , atyo yaagyenda .
40027061	Obwo hakaba hariho Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya ondiijo , bashutami omu maisho g'ekyo kituuro .
40027062	Eizooba ryakuratsireho , niryo eryo eryakuratiire ekiro ky'Okweteguura , abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'Abafarisaayo bakateeranira omu maisho ga Pilaato ,
40027063	baamugira bati : Mukama waitu , nitwijuka ku ogwo mubeihi , obu yaabaire akihuriire , yaagizire ati : Ku harihinguraho ebiro bishatu , ndyazooka omu bafiire .
40027064	N'ahabw'ekyo ragiira barindire kimwe ekituuro okuhitsya aha kiro kya kashatu , abatendekwa be batakaija bakamwiba , bakagambira abantu bati : Azookire omu bafiire . Haza obwo , okuhabisa okuraahereerukye nikwija kuba kubi okukira okwabandize .
40027065	Pilaato yaabagarukamu ati : Mwine abarinzi ; nimwirooko mukirinde nk'oku murikubaasa .
40027066	Batyo bagyenda , bahamiza kimwe ekyo kituuro , bata enzibuuro aha ibaare , bataho n'abarinzi .
40028001	Bwanyima Sabato ku yaahwaire , aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki , omushekye ku gwabaire nigujuguta , Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya ondiijo baaza kureeba ekituuro .
40028002	Reero haabaho omutsitsa gw'amaani ; maraika wa Nyakubaho yaashuuma naaruga omu iguru , yaija yaakumbagaza eibaare , yaarishutamaho .
40028003	Enshusha ye akaba ari nk'omurabyo , n'ebijwaro bye nibyera nk'orubaare .
40028004	Abarinzi ahabw'okumutiina baatetema , baaba nk'abakabire .
40028005	Kwonka maraika yaagira abo bakazi ati : Mutatiina ; ahabw'okuba nimmanya ku murikusherura Yesu obambirwe aha musharaba .
40028006	Mbwenu aha tariho ; azookire nk'oku yaagambire . Nimwije mureebe ahu abaire arambiire .
40028007	Haza mugyende ahonaaho , mugambire abatendekwa be ku azookire omu bafiire , kandi ku yaabeebembera naaza Galilaaya ; okwo niyo muraamureebere . Reeba , naabagambira .
40028008	Batyo baruga aha kituuro nibeehuuta baine obwoba n'okushemererwa kwingi , bairuka kugambira abatendekwa be .
40028009	Ago magingo Yesu ababugana , abagira ati : Nimukagire obusingye ! Nabo baija , bamukwata amaguru , bamuramya .
40028010	Yesu nawe abagira ati : Mutatiina , mugyende , mugambire beene waitu baze Galilaaya ; niyo barandeebere .
40028011	Abo bakazi ku baabaire nibakigyenda , bamwe aha barinzi baaza omu rurembo , baagambira abahongyerezi abakuru ebyabaho byona .
40028012	Reero ku baaherize kuteerana hamwe n'abakuru omu ihanga n'okuhanuura nabo , baaha abaserukare empiiha nyingi ,
40028013	baabagira bati : Mugambire abantu muti : Abatendekwa be baizire nyekiro , baamwiba tugwejegyeire .
40028014	Haza ekyo omutegyeki omukuru ku araakihurire , nitwija kumwikirizisa , tubaihe omu kabi .
40028015	Nabo batyo batwara ezo mpiiha , bakora nk'oku bahabwirwe . Haza egyo nkuru yaabuga omu Bayudaaya n'okuhitsya eri izooba .
40028016	Omu bunaku obwo abatendekwa ikumi n'omwe baza Galilaaya aha rushozi oru Yesu yaabaire abaragiriire .
40028017	Haza ku baamureebire , baamuramya ; kwonka abandi baabangaanisa .
40028018	Mpaho Yesu ku yaizire , yaabagira ati : Nkaheebwa obushoboorozi bwona omu iguru n'omu nsi .
40028019	Mbwenu mugyende muhindure abantu b'omu mahanga goona abatendekwa , nimubabatiza omu iziina rya Taata n'erya Mwana n'erya Mutima Orikwera ,
40028020	nimubeegyesa kukuratira byona ebi naabaragiire . Mumanye ku ndi hamwe naimwe ebiro byona okuhitsya obu obusingye bw'ensi egi burihwaho .
41001001	Oku nikwo Amakuru Marungi ga Yesu Kristo , Omwana wa Ruhanga , gaatandikire .
41001002	Kikahandiikwa omu kitabo kya Isaaya omurangi , ngu : Reeba , nintuma entumwa yangye kukubandizayo , niyo erikutebeekanisiza omuhanda .
41001003	Hariho orikwamuriza omu ihamba , ati : Mutebeekanisize Mukama omuhanda , mugorore otuhanda twe .
41001004	Nikyo Yohaana Omubatizi yaareebekyeire omu ihamba , akarangirira abantu ngu beegarukyemu , babatizibwe , babone kusaasirwa ebibi .
41001005	Abantu b'omuri Buyudaaya yoona n'ab'omuri Yerusalemu boona bakamushangayo ; yaababatiriza omu mugyera Yorudaani nibaatura ebibi byabo .
41001006	Yohaana ogwo akaba ajwara ekijwaro ky'ebyoya by'engamira , akyezirikisa orukoba , kandi ekyokurya kye kiri enzigye n'obwoki bw'omu ishwa .
41001007	Ku yaabaire aba naarangirira , agira ati : Hariho onkuratiire orikunkiza obushoboorozi , ou ntashemereire kwinama kukomoorora orukoba rw'enkaito ze .
41001008	Manya nyowe mbabatiize n'amaizi , kwonka we aryababatiza na Mutima Orikwera .
41001009	Omu biro ebyo Yesu akaija naaruga Nazareeti ey'omuri Galilaaya ; Yohaana yaamubatiriza omu mugyera Yorudaani .
41001010	Ku yaabaire yaajabuka ati omu maizi , yaareeba eiguru ryakinguuka , kandi na Mutima naamushuumaho nk'enkombe .
41001011	Reero eiraka ryayema omu iguru riti : Niiwe Mwana wangye ou nkunda , kandi ou nshemerererwa munonga .
41001012	Ahonaaho ebyo ku byahwaire , Mutima yaamutwara omu ihamba .
41001013	Yaamarayo ebiro makumi ana naayohibwa Sitaane ; obwo ari ahagati y'enyamaishwa , kandi baamaraika nibamugaragira .
41001014	Ku baaherize kukwata Yohaana , Yesu yaaza Galilaaya , yaarangirirayo Amakuru Marungi ga Ruhanga ,
41001015	yaagira ati : Obunaku buhikire , obukama bwa Ruhanga bwiriire haihi ; mwegarukyemu , mwikirize Amakuru Marungi .
41001016	Yesu ku yaabaire naaraba aha rubaju rw'enyanja ya Galilaaya , yaareeba Simooni na Andereya omurumuna nibatambika akatimba omu nyanja , ahabw'okuba bakaba bari abajubi .
41001017	Yesu nikwo kubagira ati : Nimwije munkuratire , niinyija kubahindura abajubi b'abantu .
41001018	Batyo ahonaaho baatsigaho obutimba bwabo , baamukuratira .
41001019	Ku yaagyenzireho omu maisho akaanya kakye , yaareeba Yakobo mwene Zebedaayo na Yohaana omurumuna , nabo bari omu bwato nibashumikanisa obutimba bwabo .
41001020	Ahonaaho yaabeeta ; baatsigaho Zebedaayo ishebo omu bwato hamwe n'abakozi be , baamukuratira .
41001021	Ku baagiire Kafarinaumu aha izooba rya Sabato , Yesu yaaza omu iteeraniro , yaatandika kwegyesa .
41001022	Baatangaarira munonga emyegyeseze ye , ahabw'okuba akabeegyesa aine obushoboorozi , atari nk'abahangu b'eiteeka .
41001023	Obwo omuri eryo iteeraniro hakaba harimu omushaija otembirwe ekyago ;
41001024	yaaborooga ati : Yesu owa Nazareeti , noofa ki naitwe ? Oizire kutucwekyereza ? Ninkumanya , ori Orikwera wa Ruhanga .
41001025	Yesu yaakikabukira , ati : Hunama , omurugyeho !
41001026	Ekyo kyago kyamutuura ahansi , kyamutetemya , kyamurugaho nikiborooga .
41001027	Abantu baatangaara , nibabuuzana bati : Beitu eki n'enki ? Ka n'enyegyesa nsya erimu obushoboorozi ! Naaragiira n'ebyago , bimuhurira .
41001028	Ahonaaho okurangaanwa kwe kwabuga hoona omu byanga ebyehinguririize Galilaaya .
41001029	Yesu ku yaarugire omu iteeraniro , yaagyenda na Yakobo na Yohaana , baaza omwa Simooni na Andereya .
41001030	Obwo nyinazaara wa Simooni akaba ari omu kitanda arwaire omushwija . Ku yaahikireho ati , baamumugambira ;
41001031	yaagyenda , yaamuhikaho , yaamukwata omukono , yaamwimutsya ; omushwija gwamurugaho , yaatandika kubaheereza .
41001032	Ogwo mwabazyo , eizooba ryaheza kurenga , bakamureetera boona abaabaire barwaire n'abatembirwe ebyago n'emizimu .
41001033	Ab'omu kirorero kyona baija nibamiganira aha irembo .
41001034	Yaakiza baingi abaabaire barwaire endwara zitari zimwe , yaabinga ebyago bingi ; kandi tiyaabiikiriza kugamba , ahabw'okuba bikaba nibimumanya .
41001035	Ku bwabaire butakaseesire , Yesu yaimuka , yaaruga omu nju , yaaza aheekiikire , yaashabirayo .
41001036	Simooni na bagyenzi be baaza kumusherura .
41001037	Ku baamugwireho , baagira bati : Abantu boona nibakusherura .
41001038	Nawe yaabagarukamu ati : Ka tuze ahandi omu bindi birorero ebiri haihi , nayo nyegyeseyo ; ahabw'okuba ekyo nikyo kyandeetsire .
41001039	Atyo araba omuri Galilaaya yoona , naarangirira omu mateeraniro gaabo , kandi naabinga ebyago .
41001040	Bwanyima omubembe yaamwetuurira , yaamweshengyereza , amutsimbiire amaju naamugira ati : Ku oraabe nookisiima , noobaasa kunshemeza .
41001041	Yesu yaamugirira esaasi , yaagorora omukono , yaamukoraho naagira ati : Eego , ninkisiima ; shemera .
41001042	Ebibembe byamurugaho ahonaaho , yaashemera .
41001043	Yesu yaamwohereza juba , kandi yaamwehanangiriza munonga ,
41001044	naamugira ati : Otagira ou waakigambira ; kwonka irooko oyeyorekye omuhongyerezi , kandi ahabw'okushemezibwa kwawe , oheyo eki Musa yaaragiire , kuhamiza abantu .
41001045	Kwonka ogwo mushaija agyenda , atandika kukigambira weena ou yaabanda , n'okukibuzya hoona . Haza ekyo kyareetera Yesu okutabaasa kutaaha bundi omu birorero butunu , kureka yaaguma aheeru omu ihamba . Abantu baaruga oku n'oku baamushangayo .
41002001	Ku haahingwireho ebiro , Yesu yaagaruka Kafarinaumu , reero enkuru yaabuga , kyamanywa ku ari omuka owaabo .
41002002	Abantu baateerana baingi , baabura omwanya nangwa n'aha muryango , obwo naabarangirira ekigambo kya Mukama .
41002003	Omuri ago magingo , haija abantu bamureeteire ozingazingirwe , aheekirwe abashaija bana .
41002004	Ku baabuzire ah'okumumuhikiza ahabw'obwingi bw'abantu , baashakaarura aha mutwe gw'enju eruguru y'ahi Yesu yaabaire ari . Ku baaherize kufumuraho ekihengyere , baashuumizaho akatanda aku ozingazingirwe yaabaire agaramiho .
41002005	Yesu , ku yaareebire baine okwikiriza , yaagambira ozingazingirwe ati : Mwana wangye , waasaasirwa ebibi byawe .
41002006	Obwo bamwe aha bahangu b'eiteeka abaabaire bashutami aho baayeebuuza bati :
41002007	Ogu mushaija ekirikumugambisa kityo ni ki ? Ka naarogota ! N'oha orikubaasa kusaasira ebibi kureka Ruhanga wenka ?
41002008	Yesu , ahabw'okumanya ebi barikuteekateeka , ahonaaho yaabagira ati : Ahabw'enki nimwebuuza mutyo ?
41002009	Mbwenu ekirikurahuka ni kiiha , okugira ozingazingirwe nti : Waasaasirwa ebibi byawe ; nari okugira nti : Imuka , oiheho akatanda kaawe , ogyende ?
41002010	Mbwenu ka mboorekye ku Omwana w'omuntu aine obushoboorozi omu nsi kusaasira ebibi . Atyo agambira ozingazingirwe ati :
41002011	Ninkuragiira , imuka , oiheho akatanda kaawe , otaahe .
41002012	Ogwo mushaija yaimuka , ahonaaho yaihaho akatanda ke , yaagyenda boona nibamureeba ; haza baatangaara , baahimbisa Ruhanga nibagira bati : Eki tikikareebwaga !
41002013	Bwanyima Yesu yaagaruka , yaaza aha rubaju rw'enyanja ; abantu boona baamuteeraniraho , nawe yaabeegyesa .
41002014	Ku yaabaire naahingura , yaareeba Leevi mwene Alufaayo ashutami omu ihoorezo ; yaamugira ati : Nkuratira . N'onu yaimuka yaamukuratira .
41002015	Mbwenu Yesu ku yaabaire ari omwa Leevi , naarya , abashorooza b'omushoro baingi n'abasiisi bakaba bashutami nawe aha meeza hamwe n'abatendekwa be ; ahabw'okuba bakaba bariho baingi abaabaire nibamukuratira .
41002016	Abahangu b'eiteeka ab'omu Bafarisaayo , ku baamureebire naarya n'abasiisi n'abashorooza b'omushoro , baagambira abatendekwa be bati : Ahabw'enki naarya kandi naanywa hamwe n'abashorooza b'omushoro n'abasiisi ?
41002017	Yesu , ku yaakihuriire , yaabagarukamu ati : Abahuriire tibo beetenga omufumu , kureka abarwaire . Manya tindaizire kweta bahikiriire , kureka abasiisi .
41002018	Eizooba rimwe abatendekwa ba Yohaana n'Abafarisaayo , ku baabaire nibeesiibyakwo , abantu baija , baabuuza Yesu bati : Ahanki abatendekwa ba Yohaana n'ab'Afarisaayo beesiibyakwo , haza abaawe bateesiibyakwo ?
41002019	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Nimugira ngu abakwe beesiibyakwo kishwera akibaine ? Manya ku baba bakiri hamwe nawe , tibeesiibyakwo .
41002020	Kwonka obunaku buryahika , kishwera abaihweho ; haza obwo nibwo baryesiibyakwo .
41002021	Tihariho muntu oteera ekiremu kisya aha mwenda mukuru . Ku yaakukikora , kikaagutaagura , n'ekitaaguka kyongyera kuhanguka .
41002022	Kandi tihariho muntu oshuka viino y'omutahe omu furebe nkuru . Ku akikora , egyo viino ezibarura , afeerwa atyo byombi viino n'efurebe . Manya viino y'omutahe eshukwa omu furebe nsya .
41002023	Obundi ahari Sabato Yesu akaba naaraba omu misiri y'engano ; abatendekwa be baatandika kucwa obushiisha nibahingura .
41002024	Abafarisaayo nikwo kumugira bati : Beitu , ahabw'enki abatendekwa baawe nibakora ekitarikwikirizibwa iteeka ahari Sabato ?
41002025	Yaabagarukamu ati : Timukashomaga eki Daudi yaakozire ashobeirwe , obu we n'abu yaabaire aine baagizire enjara ?
41002026	Kandi timurikwijuka oku yaataahire omu nju ya Ruhanga , Abiyataari ari omuhongyerezi omukuru , akarya emigaati ehongyeirwe Ruhanga , eyaabaire eikirizibwa kuriibwa abahongyerezi bonka , kandi n'oku yaagihaireho n'abu yaabaire aine ?
41002027	Ayongyera abagira ati : Manya Sabato ekateebwaho ahabw'omuntu , ti muntu habwa Sabato .
41002028	N'ahabw'ekyo Omwana w'omuntu ni mukama wa Sabato nayo .
41003001	Yesu akagaruka yaataaha omu iteeraniro ; haashangwa harimu omuntu okokootsire omukono .
41003002	Baaguma bamutaireho eriisho , kureeba yaaba araamukize ahari Sabato , babone kugira eki baraiheho kumurega .
41003003	Yaagira ogwo muntu okokootsire omukono ati : Ija aha ahagati .
41003004	Bwanyima yaababuuza ati : Nikiikirizibwa eiteeka ahari Sabato kukora ebirungi , nari okukora ebibi ? Okukiza amagara , nari okugahwerekyereza ? Kwonka bo baafa mamigye .
41003005	Yaababuzyamu amaisho abainiire ekiniga , yaabasaasibwa ahabw'okureeba emitima yaabo egangaire etyo . Nikwo kugira ogwo mushaija , ati : Gorora omukono gwawe . Onu yaagugorora , gwakira .
41003006	Abafarisaayo baashohora , ahonaaho baatandika kumucumira enaama mbi n'ab'ekigombe ky'aba Herode , nibahanuura oku baraamwite .
41003007	Yesu yaarugayo n'abatendekwa be , yaaza aha rubaju rw'enyanja ; abantu baingi munonga , abaarugire Galilaaya , baamukuratayo ; kandi abandi baingi abaarugire Buyudaaya ,
41003008	na Yerusalemu , na Idumaaya , n'obuseeri bwa Yorudaani , n'ab'ebirorero ebyehinguririize Tuuro na Sidoni , abaabaire baahuriire byona ebi akozire , baamwijaho .
41003009	Yaashaba abatendekwa be kumutungira obwato ahabw'okutenda bantu baingi kumumiga .
41003010	Manya akaba akirize abantu baingi . Boona abaabaire nibagangibwa endwara z'emiringo yoona bakaba nibahimintika kumukoraho .
41003011	Kandi n'abaabaire bariho ebyago , ku baabaire bamureeba , bamugwa omu maguru , baborooga bati : Ori Omwana wa Ruhanga .
41003012	Kwonka we abeehanangiriza munonga kutamubuzya mu bantu .
41003013	Bwanyima Yesu akainamuka omu rushozi , yaayeta abu yaayenzire ; batyo baija ahu ari .
41003014	Yaabatooranamu ikumi na babiri kuguma nawe n'okubatuma kurangirira Amakuru Marungi ;
41003015	kandi yaabaha obushoboorozi bw'okubinga ebyago .
41003016	Nibo aba , Simooni ou yaayetsire Petero ,
41003017	Yakobo mwene Zebedaayo na Yohaana murumuna wa Yakobo , bombi abu yaayetsire Boneregye , amakuru gaaryo ngu , abaana abarikuhinda makuba ;
41003018	taho Andereya , Filipo , Baritolomaayo , Matayo , Tomasi , Yakobo mwene Alufaayo , Tadaayo , Simooni enkunzi y'eihanga ,
41003019	na Yuda owa Kariota , owaabaire ari ow'okumureebya . Bwanyima yaataaha omuka owaabo ,
41003020	kandi ekimbuuro ky'abantu nabwo kyateerana , n'ahabw'ekyo Yesu n'abatendekwa be tibaabaasa na kurya .
41003021	Abaabo , ku baakihuriire , baija kumutwara , ahabw'okuba bakaba nibagira ngu ashazire .
41003022	Abahangu b'eiteeka abaarugire Yerusalemu bakaba nibagira ngu aine Beelizebuli , kandi ngu ebyago naabibingisa obushoboorozi bwa Beelizebuli ogwo , omukuru waabyo .
41003023	Atyo yaabeeta kwija ahu ari , yaabagambira , yaabacwera enfumu , ati : Sitaane naabaasa ata kubinga Sitaane ?
41003024	Manya obugabe , ku bwebaganisamu , tibugumaho ;
41003025	n'eka , ku eyebaganisamu , tegira bu ehamire .
41003026	Mbwenu Sitaane ku araabe ayerwaniise , akeetaanisamu tarikubaasa kugumaho , biri omuheru gwe gwahika .
41003027	Manya tihariho n'omwe obaasa kutaaha omu nju y'omuntu w'amaani , akanyaga ebye atabandize kumuboha , reero akabona kwaya eby'omu nju ye .
41003028	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ebibi byona ebi abantu bakora , otaireho n'eby'okurogota , baryabisaasirwa .
41003029	Kwonka orirogota ahari Mutima Orikwera tarisaasirwa ebiro byona , ahabw'okuba aryaguma asingirwe orubanja rw'ekibi ekitarimurugaho .
41003030	Ekyo akakigamba ahabw'okuba bakagira ngu ariho ekyago .
41003031	Nyina na barumuna ba Yesu bakaija , baaguma beemereire aheeru , baamutumaho nibamweta .
41003032	Obwo omutwe gw'abantu ku gwabaire gushutami gumwehinguririize , abaatumirwe nikwo kumugira bati : Reeba , nyoko na barumuna baawe bari aheeru nibakwenda .
41003033	Yaagarukamu ati : Maawe n'oha , na barumuna bangye ni baahi ?
41003034	Atyo yaabuzya amaisho omu baabaire bashutami bamwehinguririize , yaagira ati : Maawe na barumuna bangye n'aba !
41003035	Weena okora eki Ruhanga akunda , niwe murumuna wangye , niwe munyaanyazi , kandi niwe maawe .
41004001	Yesu kandi akatandika kwegyeseza aha rubaju rw'enyanja . Ekimbuuro kihango ky'abantu kyateeranira ahu ari , nawe nikwo kuza omu bwato akabushutamamu buri omu nyanja ; obwo ekimbuuro kyona kiri aha nkungu aha rubaju rw'enyanja .
41004002	Yaabeegyesa bingi naabacwera enfumu ; kandi omuri okwo kwegyesa , yaabagira ati :
41004003	Nimutegye amatu ! Omubibi akashohora kubiba .
41004004	Ku yaabaire naabiba , embibo ezimwe zaaragara aha rubaju rw'omuhanda ; enyonyi zaija zaazirya .
41004005	Ezimwe zaagwa aha itaka ry'aha rukiri , ahataine itaka ringi ; zaamera ahonaaho ahabw'okutagira itaka ringi .
41004006	Kwonka eizooba ku ryaturukire , zaababuka , kandi n'ahabw'okushangwa zitaine mizi , zaayoma .
41004007	Ezindi mbimbo zaagwa omu mahwa ; ago mahwa gaakura , gaazinyuruza , tizaayera .
41004008	Kandi ezindi zaagwa aha itaka rirungi ; zaamera , zaakura gye , zaayera ; emwe yaahitsya enjuma makumi ashatu , endi makumi mukaaga , n'endiijo igana .
41004009	Mpaho yaabagira ati : Oine amatu agarikuhurira , ahurire .
41004010	Yesu ku yaabaire ari wenka , eikumi na babiri hamwe n'abandi abaabaire bagyenda nawe , baamubuuza amakuru g'ezo nfumu .
41004011	Yaabagira ati : Manya imwe mukaatirwa eibanga ry'obukama bwa Ruhanga , kwonka ab'aheeru byona babigambirwa omu nfumu ,
41004012	ngu okureeba kwo bareebe , kwonka bateetegyereza ; n'okuhurikiza kwo bahurikize , kwonka batashoboorokyerwa , ngu batakaahinduka bakasaasirwa .
41004013	Atyo Yesu abagira ati : Ebyo egi nfumu timwagyetegyereza ? Mbwenu shi , ezindi nfumu muryazimanya muta ?
41004014	Eki omubibi abiba n'ekigambo kya Ruhanga .
41004015	Ez'aha rubaju rw'omuhanda , ahu ekigambo kibibwa , nibo bantu abaheza bati kukihurira , Sitaane akaija , akabaihamu ekyo kigambo kyababibwamu .
41004016	N'ezaabibirwe aha itaka ry'aha rukiri , nibo bantu abahurira ekyo kigambo , bakakiikiriza ahonaaho bashemereirwe ;
41004017	nobu baba bataine mizi , beehangaana akaanya kakye . Kwonka ku habaho enaku , nari okuhiiganisibwa ahabw'ekyo kigambo , ahonaaho bagwera kimwe .
41004018	Kandi ezaabibirwe omu mahwa , nibo abo abahurira ekigambo ,
41004019	kwonka okwemerereza omutima eby'ensi , obutungi , n'okururuuhira ebindi bintu , binyuruza ekyo kigambo , kibura kwana .
41004020	Reero ezaabibirwe aha itaka erirungi , nibo abo abahurira ekigambo , bakakiikiriza , haza buri mbibo ekabaanira ebyana , abamwe makumi ashatu , abandi makumi mukaaga , n'abandi igana .
41004021	Kandi akabagambira ati : Etabaaza ereetwa kujuumikirwa ekiibo , nari shi kuteebwa omu nda y'ekitanda ? Kureka timurikugita aha kikondo ?
41004022	Manya tihariho kisherekirwe ekitarishuuruurwa , nobu kyakuba eky'omubonano ekitarigambwa butunu .
41004023	Oine amatu agarikuhurira , ahurire .
41004024	Yesu akongyera yaabagira ati : Mwetegyereze ebi murikuhurira . Endengo ei murengamu , naimwe niyo murirengyerwamu kandi mukongyerwaho .
41004025	Manya oine , aryaheebwa ebirikukiraho , kwonka otaine , aryayakwa nangwa n'eki aine .
41004026	Kandi yaabagira ati : Obukama bwa Ruhanga buri nk'oku omuntu abiba embibo omu itaka ,
41004027	akagwejegyera kandi akasisiimuka nyekiro na nyomushana ; obwo , embibo neemera , neekura , haza we atarikumanya mimerere yaayo na mikurire yaayo .
41004028	Eitaka niryo rimeza ryonka embibo ; habanza akababi , hataho obushiisha , hakurataho okwera .
41004029	Ogwo musiri ku gwera , ahonaaho aimuka , agutamu engyeso ahabw'okuba eigyesha ryahika .
41004030	Kandi akagira ati : Mbwenu obukama bwa Ruhanga nibushusha ki ? Tukaabugyeragyeranisa na nfumu ki ?
41004031	Buri nk'enjuma y'embibo ya karidaari ; eba nkye okukira embibo zoona ez'omu nsi , omu bunaku obu bagibibiramu .
41004032	Ku eheza kubibwa , ekura , erugamu ekishaka ekirikukira ebindi byona , haza kitantamura amataagi mahango ; enyonyi z'omu kaabunga zibona kuhuumurira omu kicuucu kyakyo .
41004033	Yesu akaba abagambira ekigambo kya Ruhanga naakirabya omu nfumu nyingi nk'ezo , nk'oku baabaire babaasa kushoboorokyerwa ;
41004034	kandi tarabagambiire kintu kyona atakirabize mu nfumu ; kureka abatendekwa be , ku yaabaire aba ari hamwe nabo bonka , abashoboororera byona .
41004035	Aha izooba eryo omwabazyo ku gwabaire nigukiika , Yesu yaabagira ati : Ka twambukye seeri .
41004036	Batyo baatsigaho ekimbuuro ky'abantu , baagyenda nawe omu bwato obu yaabaire arimu ; kandi n'agandi maato gaagyenda nawe .
41004037	Bwanyima haija eihunga ringi , ebingonzi byayeshuka omu bwato , bwabura hakye kwijura ;
41004038	obwo we ari aha isinga , ayeshegwire omushego agwejegyeire . Baamusisiimura , baamugira bati : Mwegyesa , k'ohugireho ! Manya twaza kufa !
41004039	Atyo akanguka omu turo , akabukira ogwo muyaga , agambira enyanja ati : Cureera ! Omuyaga gutuuza ; hagira obucureera bwingi .
41004040	Bwanyima abagira ati : Ahabw'enki nimutiina mutyo ? Biri timwine kwikiriza ?
41004041	Batyo baitwa obwoba , bagambirana bati : Mbwenu ogu ni muntu ki , ou omuyaga n'enyanja birikuhurira ?
41005001	Batyo baayambuka enyanja , baahika seeri omu nsi y'Abageraseene .
41005002	Yesu ku yaabaire yaaruga ati omu bwato , omushaija oriho ekyago yaamwizira naaruga omu bituuro .
41005003	Ogwo mushaija akaba atuura omu bituuro , hatakiriho muntu weena orikubaasa kumurinda , nobu kwakuba okumubohesa orujegyere .
41005004	Manya kaingi bakaba baamuboheise emihama n'enjegyere ; kwonka ezo njegyere azigutura , n'emihama agicwa ; kandi hakaba hatariho muntu weena orikubaasa kumucureeza .
41005005	Obutoosha nyomushana na nyekiro akaba aborooga , ayeshaza amabaare , obwo ari omu bituuro n'omu nshozi .
41005006	Ku yaareebeire Yesu hare , yairuka yaayerambika omu maisho ge ,
41005007	yaaborooga n'eiraka rihango ati : Noofa ki naanye , iwe Yesu Omwana wa Ruhanga Rukiraboona ? Ninkurahiza Ruhanga , otaanyita kubi !
41005008	Ahabw'okuba Yesu akaba yaaheza kukigira ati : Iwe kyago ' we , ruga ahari ogu muntu !
41005009	Yesu nikwo kukibuuza ati : Eiziina ryawe ori oha ? Nakyo kimugarukamu kiti : Eiziina ryangye ndi Eihe , ahabw'okuba turi baingi .
41005010	Mpaho yaamweshengyereza munonga okutabibinga muri ekyo kyanga .
41005011	Obwo hakaba hariho omukumbi muhango gw'empunu niguriira omu rukiizi ;
41005012	ebyo byago byamweshengyereza biti : Twohereze omuri ezo mpunu , tube nizo twazamu .
41005013	Atyo Yesu abiikiriza . Ebyo byago bimurugaho , bitaaha omu mpunu . Omukumbi gwazo , ogurikuhika empunu nk'enkumi ibiri , guhiringitira aha nengo , gugwa omu nyanja , gurohama .
41005014	Abariisa b'ezo mpunu baahunga , baabiteekyerereza ab'omuri ekyo kirorero n'ab'omu byaro ; abantu baahurura kureeba ebyabaho .
41005015	Ku baahikire ahari Yesu , baashanga ogwo muntu waarugwaho ekyago ari aho ashutami , ajwaire , aine obwengye , kandi ari ori , owaabaire ariho eryo ihe ; baatiina munonga .
41005016	Abaabireebire , ku baabateekyerereize ebyaba ahari ogwo muntu w'ebyago , n'oku ezo mpunu zaaba ,
41005017	baayeshengyereza Yesu kubarugira omu kyanga .
41005018	Ku yaabaire naaza omu bwato , omushaija owaabaire ariho ebyago yaamushaba ku amwikiriza kuguma nawe .
41005019	Yesu yaamwangira ; kureka yaamugira ati : Irooko otaahe omuka omu baanyu , obagambire byona ebi Mukama akukoreire ahabw'embabazi ze .
41005020	Ogwo mushaija atyo agyenda , atandika kubuzya omuri Dekapoli byona ebi Yesu amukoreire ; abantu boona batangaara .
41005021	Yesu , ku yaayambukire omu bwato , yaahika seeri . Ekimbuuro ky'abantu baingi baamuteeraniraho ; yaaguma aha rubaju rw'enyanja .
41005022	Mpaho haija omwe aha bakuru b'eiteeraniro , orikwetwa Yairo . Ku yaamuhikire , yaamukwata amaguru ;
41005023	yaamweshengyereza , naamugira ati : Kahara kangye n'ak'okufa . Ija okanteereho engaro , kakire , kagire amagara .
41005024	Mpaho Yesu yaagyenda nawe . Abantu baingi baamukuratira nibamumiganiraho .
41005025	Kandi hakaba hariho omukazi owaabaire arwariire ekyejwiso emyaka ikumi n'ebiri ;
41005026	amazire omwanya muhango naashaasha , naaraguza aha bafumu baingi , aherize ebye byona , kwonka ataine muraaro , kureka okwongyera kuba kubi .
41005027	Akaba yaahuriire eby'enkuru ya Yesu , yaija naayogyerera omu bantu enyima ye , yaakora aha kijwaro kye ;
41005028	ahabw'okuba akateekateeka omu mutima gwe ati : Ku naakukora nangwa aha bijwaro bye , nkaakira .
41005029	Omuri ako kaanya ekyejwiso kye kyayoma ; yaayehurira akiriire kimwe endwara ye .
41005030	Yesu , ku yaahuriire ati amaani gaamurugamu , yaahindukira ahagati y'ekimbuuro ky'abantu yaabuuza ati : N'oha owaakora aha bijwaro byangye ?
41005031	Abatendekwa be baamugarukamu bati : Nooreeba ekimbuuro ky'abantu nikikumiganiraho , haza ogira oti : N'oha owankoraho ?
41005032	Kwonka we yaagumizamu naamagamaga kureeba owaakikora .
41005033	Omukazi , ahabw'okumanya ekyamubaho , yaija atiinire kandi naatetema , yaamujuumara omu maisho , yaamugambira amazima ataine ki arikumushereka .
41005034	Onu yaamugira ati : Mwana wangye , okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza , gyenda n'obusingye , okire endwara yaawe .
41005035	Ku yaabaire naakigamba ebyo , haija abantu abarikuruga ow'ogwo mukuru w'eiteeraniro , baamubikira bati : Muhara waawe yaafa . Mbwenu Omwegyesa nookimuruhiza ki ?
41005036	Yesu ekyo tiyaakyetaho , yaagambira ogwo mukuru w'eiteeraniro ati : Otatiina , fa okwikiriza .
41005037	Kandi tiyaikiriza muntu weena kugyenda nawe , kureka Petero na Yakobo na Yohaana murumuna wa Yakobo .
41005038	Ku baahikire aha nju y'ogwo mukuru , Yesu yaareeba oku abantu barikurabanamu nibacura , nibaborooga munonga .
41005039	Yaataahamu , yaabagira ati : Nimurabaniramu ki , kandi nimurizibwa ki ? Omwana tafiire , agwejegyeire .
41005040	Batyo baamushekyerera . Atyo boona abashohoza , aguma na ishe w'omwana na nyina n'abu yaija nabo , aza ahu omwana abyami .
41005041	Amukwata omukono , amugira ati Tarita kumi ; amakuru ngu Kaishiki ' we , ninkugambira nti : Imuka .
41005042	Ogwo mwishiki aimuka ahonaaho , atandika kugyenda ; haza akaba aine emyaka ikumi n'ebiri y'obukuru . Ku baareebire ekyo , engaro baazita aha munwa .
41005043	Yaabeehanangiririza kimwe okutagira muntu weena ou baakigambira , kandi yaabaragiira ku bamuha ekyokurya .
41006001	Yesu , ku yaarugire omuri ekyo kyanga , yaaza omu ky'owaabo ; abatendekwa be baagyenda nawe .
41006002	Sabato ku yaahikire , yaatandika kwegyesa omu iteeraniro ; baingi munonga ku baamuhuriire , baamutangaarira , nibagira bati : Ogu muntu ebi byona akabiiha hi ? Ni bwengye ki obu yaahairwe obumubaasisa kukora eby'amaani ebi ?
41006003	Beitu ogu t'omubaizi , mutabani wa Mariya , mukuru wa Yakobo na Yose na Yuda na Simooni ? Na banyaanya tibari aha , titubaine ? Batyo baamuteeraho entsibo .
41006004	Yesu nikwo kubagira ati : Omurangi , ahandi hoona aheebwa ekitiinwa , kureka omu kyanga ky'owaabo , omu baabo n'omu ka ye .
41006005	N'ahabw'ekyo tiyaabaasa kukorerayo by'amaani , kureka okukiza abarwaire bakye naabataho engaro .
41006006	Yaatangaara ahabw'okutaikiriza kwabo . Mpaho yaagyenda naaraba omu byaro naayegyesa .
