41006007	Bwanyima yaayeeta eikumi na babiri , yaatandika kubatuma babiri babiri , naabaha obushoboorozi bw'okubinga ebyago .
41006008	Yaabaragiira okutatwara kintu kyona omu rugyendo , yaaba ntanda , yaaba ndyanga , nobu zaakuba empiiha omu mifuko yaabo , kureka enkoni ;
41006009	kandi bagyende bajwaire enkaito , kwonka batajwara ekanzu ya kabiri .
41006010	Yaagaruka yaabagira ati : Enju ei muraataahemu , mugigumemu okuhitsya obu murirugayo .
41006011	Kandi ahi baraayangye kubaakiira n'okuhurira ebi murikugamba , ku muraaze kurugayo , mukunkumure omucuucu gw'aha bigyere byanyu , gube akamanyiso k'okubashinja .
41006012	Batyo baagyenda , baarangirira eby'okwegarukamu ,
41006013	baabinga ebyago bingi , kandi baasiiga amajuta abarwaire baingi , baabakiza .
41006014	Omugabe Herode akahurira ebya Yesu , ahabw'okuba eiziina rye rikaba nirirangaanwa . Obwo abamwe nibagira bati : Yohaana Omubatizi azookire omu bafiire ; nikyo eby'amaani ebyo birikukorerwa omuriwe .
41006015	Abandi bati : Ni Eliya . Kandi abandi bati : N'omurangi nk'omwe aha barangi aba ira .
41006016	Kwonka Herode ku yaakihuriire , yaagira ati : Manya ogwo ni Yohaana ou naatemireho omutwe , azookire omu bafiire .
41006017	Herode ogwo niwe yaaragiire bakakwata Yohaana , bakamubohera omu kihome ahabwa Herodiya muka Filipo mwene ishe , ou Herode ogwo yaabaire ahindwire omukazi we .
41006018	Ahabw'okuba Yohaana akaba agambiire Herode ati : Omu iteeka tikihikire , iwe okushwera muka mwene sho .
41006019	Okwiha obwo Herodiya yaamugirira enziika , yaayenda kumwita kwonka tiyaabaasa ;
41006020	ahabw'okuba Herode akaba naatiina Yohaana , ahabw'okumumanya ku ari omuntu ohikiriire kandi orikwera ; yaaguma amurinzire kutaitwa . Kandi ku yaabaire ahurira ebi arikumugambira , acuramirirwa , kwonka shi amuhurira ashemereirwe .
41006021	Bwanyima Herodiya akabona oburyo bw'okukikora , ahabw'okuba Herode aha izooba rw'okwijuka okuzaarwa kwe , akateekyera abaami b'omu kikaari kye n'abakuru b'amahe n'abakungu b'omuri Galilaaya obugyenyi .
41006022	Muhara wa Herodiya ogwo , ku yaizire , yaazina , yaasiimwa Herode n'abagyenyi be . Omugabe nikwo kugambira ogwo mwishiki ati : Nshaba kyona eki orikwenda , niinyija kukikuha .
41006023	Yaarahira naamugira ati : Niinyija kukuha kyona eki oraashabe , nobu kyakuba ekicweka ky'obugabe bwangye .
41006024	Omwishiki yaashohora , yaabuuza nyina ati : Mmushabe ki ? Onu ati : Omushabe omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatizi .
41006025	Omwishiki yairuka , yaagaruka ow'omugabe , yaamushaba ati : Niinyenda hati obu , ompe omutwe gwa Yohaana Omubatizi omu rucuba .
41006026	Ekyo kyasaasa munonga omugabe ; kwonka ahabw'okushangwa yaarahiire n'ahabw'abagyenyi be , yaashoberwa oku araarekye kukora eki yaamugambira .
41006027	Omugabe nikwo kutuma ahonaaho omwe aha barinzi , akamuragiira kureeta omutwe gwa Yohaana . Omuserukare atyo agyenda , amutemeraho omutwe omu kihome ,
41006028	agureeta omu rucuba , aguha omwishiki ; omwishiki nawe aguha nyina .
41006029	Abatendekwa ba Yohaana ku baakihuriire , baija , baatwara omutumbi gwe , baaguta omu kituuro .
41006030	Abatendekwa bakagaruka ahari Yesu , baamugambira byona ebi baakozire n'ebi baayegyeise .
41006031	Nawe yaabagira ati : Nimwirooko , muze omu mwanya gwehereire , muhuumureho ; ahabw'okuba obwo abantu baingi bakaba nibaija kandi nibagyenda , abatendekwa bataine mwanya nobu gwakuba ogw'okurya .
41006032	Batyo baatemba obwato , baaza omu mwanya gwekiikire kwehereera .
41006033	Kwonka abantu baingi baabareeba nibagyenda , baabamanya ; baaruga omu birorero byona , bairuka baabatangayo .
41006034	Ku yaarugire omu bwato , yaareeba ekimbuuro ky'abantu , yaabagirira esaasi , ahabw'okuba bakaba bari nk'entaama zitaine muriisa ; atyo yaatandika kubeegyesa bingi .
41006035	Mbwenu obwo bukaba buri haihi kwira , abatendekwa be baija ahu ari , baamugira bati : Aha n'eihamba , kandi buri haihi kwira ,
41006036	n'ahabw'ekyo boohereze , baze kweshakira ebyokurya omu byanga n'omu byaro ebyehinguririizeho .
41006037	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Mube niimwe mwabaha ebyokurya . Nabo baamugira bati : Mbwenu shi , tugyende tubagurire emigaati ya shilingi magana abiri , tugibahe , bagirye ?
41006038	Nawe ati : Mwineho emigaati engahi ? Nimwirooko mugireebe . Ku baayetegyereize , baamugira bati : Twine etaano n'ebyenyanja bibiri .
41006039	Mpaho Yesu yaabaragiira kubashutamya boona aha kanyaatsi kabisi omu miteeko .
41006040	Batyo baashutama omu miteeko y'abantu igana igana , n'eya makumi ataano ataano .
41006041	Atyo akwata egyo migaati etaano , n'ebyo byenyanja bibiri , aimutsya amaisho , areeba ahaiguru , asiima ; egyo migaati agicwamu ebicweka , agiha abatendekwa be kugigaburira abo bantu ; n'ebyenyanja byombi abibaganisiza atyo boona .
41006042	Boona barya , bahaaga .
41006043	Bwanyima batorotoora oburagarika bw'emigaati n'obucweka bw'ebyenyanja , bwijuza ebitenga ikumi na bibiri .
41006044	Boona abaariire egyo migaati bakaba bari abashaija enkumi itaano .
41006045	Ahonaaho Yesu yaaragiira abatendekwa be kuza omu bwato kumubandiza seeri Beetisaida ; obwo we naakiragiira ekimbuuro ky'abantu kugyenda .
41006046	Ku yaaherize kubaraga , yaaza omu rushozi kushaba .
41006047	Omwabazyo ku gwakiikire , obwato bwashangwa bwagiire hare omu nyanja , kandi we atsigaire wenka aha nkungu .
41006048	Ku yaabareebire nibafa kubi nibagoya obwato , omuyaga gubareetsirwe omu maisho , nk'aha kisisiimuko kya kana eky'ekiro , yaabaizira naagyendesa amaguru aha nyanja . Akaba naayenda kubahingura ,
41006049	kwonka ku baamureebire naagyendera aha nyanja , baateekateeka ngu n'omuzimu , baaborooga ;
41006050	ahabw'okuba boona bakamureeba , baatiina munonga . Kwonka we ahonaaho yaabaakura naabagira ati : Muhuumure , niinye ; mutatiina !
41006051	Atyo yaaza omu bwato , yaabashangamu ; omuyaga gwatuuza . Baatangaarira kimwe ,
41006052	ahabw'okuba bakaba batakashoboorokyeirwe eby'egyo migaati ; manya emitima yaabo ekaba ekikingiirwe .
41006053	Ku baaherize kwambuka , baahika Genesareeti ; baatsibika obwato aha nkungu .
41006054	Ku baabaire baaruga bati omu bwato , ahonaaho abantu baamumanya ,
41006055	baatandika kwegaba ebirari omu byanga byona ebiherereireho , baareeta abarwaire babaheekire aha butanda , nibabamushangisa hoona ahi baabaire bahurira ari .
41006056	Kandi ei yaabaire aza yoona , yaaba mu byaro , yaaba mu birorero , yaaba mu byanga , bakaba babyamya abarwaire ahu abantu baateeranira , bamweshengyereza ngu nangwa bakore aha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye ; haza boona abaabaire bagukoraho bakira .
41007001	Abafarisaayo n'abahangu b'eiteeka abamwe abaabaire barugire Yerusalemu , bakateeranira ahu ari ;
41007002	baareeba bamwe aha batendekwa be nibariisa engaro ziteeziibwe , nikwo kugira ngu ezihagaire .
41007003	Ahabw'okuba okwihirira omu micwe ya baishenkurubo , Abafarisaayo n'Abayudaaya boona bakaba batarya bateerize ngaro ;
41007004	kandi ku baabaire baruga omu katare , bakaba batarya batabandize kwejabika omu maizi . Bakaba bagira n'endi migyenzo y'akarande , ekwatiraine n'okwozya ebikopo n'enyungu n'eshuhaani z'omuringa .
41007005	Nikyo Abafarisaayo n'abahangu b'eiteeka baamubuuriize bati : Ahabw'enki abatendekwa baawe batarikukuratira mugyenzo gw'aba ira , nibariisa engaro ziteeziibwe ?
41007006	Yaabagarukamu ati : Imwe ndyarya ' mwe , ebishi , Isaaya akahika obu yaabarangaho omu kyahandiikirwe eki , ati : Ab'eihanga eri bampaisisa ekitiinwa eminwa yaabo , haza emitima yaabo endi hare .
41007007	Bandamiza busha , ahabw'okuba beegyesa ebyatairweho abantu , oti n'enyegyesa y'ebyatairweho Ruhanga .
41007008	Manya mwitwa okwehuzya ebiragiro bya Ruhanga , mukahamira aha by'emigyenzo y'abantu .
41007009	Yesu yaayongyera yaabagira ati : Ka mwine obwengye bw'okwangiramu ebiragiro bya Ruhanga , ngu mubone kugumyaho eby'emigyenzo yaanyu !
41007010	Ahabw'okuba Musa akagira ati : Otiine shoimwe na nyoko ; kandi ati : Weena orijuma ishe nari nyina , aitwe .
41007011	Kwonka imwe mugira muti : Omuntu ku arikugira ishe nari nyina ati : Eki naakukuhaire kukugasira ni Koribaani , amakuru ngu , ekitoijeirwe Ruhanga ;
41007012	biri obwo muba mutakimwikiriza kugira eki yaakorera ishe nari nyina .
41007013	Mutyo muhindura busha eki Ruhanga yaagambire ahabw'emigyenzo yaanyu y'akarande ; kandi n'ebindi bingi nikwo mubitwaza .
41007014	Kandi Yesu akagaruka yaayeeta abantu , yaabagira ati : Mwena nimuntegye amatu , kandi mwetegyereze .
41007015	Tihariho kiruga aheeru y'omuntu , kikamutaahamu , kikamuhagaza ; kureka ekimurugamu nikyo kimuhagaza .
41007016	[ Oine amatu agarikuhurira , ahurire ! ]
41007017	Ku yaarugire omu bantu , yaagaruka omu nju ; abatendekwa be baamubuuza eby'egyo nfumu .
41007018	Yaabagarukamu ati : Biri naimwe timukeetegyereize ? Timurikumanya ku ekitaaha omu muntu kirugire aheeru kitamuhagaza ,
41007019	ahabw'okuba tikiza mu mutima gwe , kureka omunda , haza kikoogamu ? Akagamba atyo , naahamya ku ebyokurya byona biba birungi .
41007020	Yaagumizamu ati : Manya ekiruga omu muntu nikyo kimuhagaza ;
41007021	ahabw'okuba omu mitima y'abantu nimwo haruga ebiteekateeko bibi , obushambani bw'abatashweire n'abatashweirwe , okwiba , okwita omuntu , okushambana na muka nanka nari na iba nanka ;
41007022	omururu , eitima , obugobya , ebikwatiraine n'obushambani , eihari , okubeiherera ondi , amaryo n'obufamutima .
41007023	Ebyo bibi byona nibyo biruga omunda , bikashiisha omuntu .
41007024	Yesu akaimuka , yaarugayo , yaaza omu kyanga ekiherereire Tuuro . Ku yaahikireyo , yaataaha omu nju , atarikwenda ngu bamanye ahu ari , kwonka shi tarabaasize kuhingura atamanyirwe .
41007025	Omukazi owaabaire aine akahara kariho ekyago , ku yaamuhuriire ati , yaija , yaamukwata amaguru .
41007026	Ogwo mukazi akaba ari Omuguriiki , enzaarwa ya Sirofenikiya . Yaamweshengyereza ku amubingira ekyago aha muhara .
41007027	Na Yesu yaamugira ati : Okaarekire abaana baba nibo baabanza kugaburirwa ; ahabw'okuba tikihikire kukiriza ebyokurya by'abaana , okabitambikira embwa .
41007028	Ogwo mukazi yaamugarukamu ati : Eego , Mukama wangye ; kwonka embwa ezibunzire omunda y'emeeza , zirya oburagarika bw'ebyokurya by'abaana .
41007029	Yesu yaamugira ati : Ahabw'ekyo eki waagamba , yetaahire oshemereirwe ; muhara waawe yaarugwaho ekyago .
41007030	Ogwo mukazi atyo agaruka omuka , ashanga omwana abyami aha kitanda , ekyago kyamurugireho .
41007031	Bwanyima Yesu akagaruka naaruga omu nsi ya Tuuro , yaatoora ogwa Sidoni , yaahika aha Nyanja ya Galilaaya naaraba omu kyanga kya Dekapoli .
41007032	Okwo niyo baamureeteire omushaija ekifamatu orikuhebebera ; bakamweshengyereza ku amutaho engaro .
41007033	Yaamwiha omu kimbuuro ky'abantu , yaamwekiikana , yaamuta enkumu omu matu , yaamusiiga amacwante aha rurimi ;
41007034	yaareeba ahaiguru , yaatsinda , yaamugira ati : Efata , ekirikumanyisa ngu , Iguka !
41007035	Amatu ge gatyo gaiguka , n'akareka k'orurimi rwe kaarekuka , yaagamba gye .
41007036	Kandi Yesu yaabaragiira kutagira u baakigambira ; kwonka ei yaagarukiire kubazibira , niyo baagarukiire kukibuzya .
41007037	Baatangaara munonga , nibagira bati : Byona naabikora gye ; naahuriza ebifamatu , kandi naagambisa ebiteta !
41008001	Omu biro ebyo ekimbuuro ky'abantu kikagaruka kyateerana , kwonka baabura ekyokurya . Yesu yaayeta abatendekwa be , yaabagira ati :
41008002	Eki kimbuuro ky'abantu ka kyanyitsa esaasi , ahabw'okuba bamazire naanye ebiro bishatu bataine ki barikurya .
41008003	Ku ndaboohereze owaabo n'enjara , nibaija kugwera enshazi omu muhanda ; kandi abamwe omuribo barugire hare munonga .
41008004	Abatendekwa be baamugarukamu bati : N'oha owaakubaasa kutunga ebyokurya by'okuriisa aba bantu omu ihamba nk'eri ?
41008005	Nawe nikwo kubabuuza ati : Mwineho emigaati engahi ? Banu bati : Ni mushanju .
41008006	Atyo aragiira ekyo kimbuuro ky'abantu kushutama ahansi ; akwata egyo migaati mushanju ; ku aheza kusiima , agicwamu ebicweka , agiha abatendekwa be kugigabura ; nabo bagigaburira abo bantu .
41008007	Kandi bakaba baineho obwenyanja bukye ; ku aheza kubuha omugisha , nabwo abaragiira kubugabura .
41008008	Barya , baiguta ; bwanyima barundaana oburagarika obwatsigaraho , bwijuza ebitenga mushanju .
41008009	Obwo bakaba bari abantu nk'enkumi ina .
41008010	Mpaho aboohereza ; kandi nawe tahwama , atemba omu bwato n'abatendekwa be , baza omu nsi ya Dalumanuta .
41008011	Abafarisaayo bakaija , baatandika kuhakana na Yesu nibamushaba akamanyiso karikuruga ahari Ruhanga nibamutega .
41008012	Atyo atsinda munonga , abagira ati : Ahabw'enki ab'obusingye obu nibenda akamanyiso ? Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ab'obusingye obu tibarikwija kworekwa kamanyiso na kamwe .
41008013	Reero abatsigaho , agaruka atemba obwato , ayambuka seeri .
41008014	Mbwenu abatendekwa obwo bakaba beebirwe kutwara entanda , kureka omu bwato bakaba bainemu omugaati gumwe gwonka .
41008015	Yesu yaabeehanangiriza ati : Nyaabura ' mwe , muteho omutima , mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafarisaayo n'ekya Herode .
41008016	Baagambirana bonka bati : Titwine mugaati .
41008017	Yesu ku yaakimanyire , yaababuuza ati : Ahabw'enki nimugaaniira eky'okutagira mugaati ? Biri kwo timukeetegyereize nobu kwakuba okukyenga ? Emitima yaanyu ekigangaire ?
41008018	Ka mwine amaisho , ahanki mutarikureeba ? Ka mwine amatu , ahanki mutarikuhurira ? Nari shi , timurikwijuka ?
41008019	Obu naacwamu emigaati etaano nkagigaburira abantu enkumi itaano , obwo mukarundaana oburagarika bwijwire ebitenga bingahi ? Bagarukamu bati : Ikumi na bibiri .
41008020	Kandi shi , obu naacwamu emigaati mushanju nkagigaburira abantu enkumi ina , obwo mukarundaana oburagarika bwijwire ebitenga bingahi ? Bagarukamu bati : Mushanju .
41008021	Arugaho ababuuza ati : Na hati timukeetegyereize ?
41008022	Bakahika Beetisaida ; abantu baareetera Yesu omushaija ohumire , baamushaba kumukoraho .
41008023	Yaakwata egyo mpumi omukono , yaagitwara aheeru y'ekyaro ; ku yaamusiigire amacwante omu maisho , yaamutaho engaro , yaamubuuza ati : Oine eki orikureeba ?
41008024	Ogwo mushaija yaabuuruura , yaagarukamu ati : Nindeeba abantu barikushusha emiti , nibagyenda .
41008025	Atyo agaruka amuta engaro aha maisho ge ; onu ahweza gye , akira , areebera kimwe ebintu byona .
41008026	Yesu amwohereza kutaaha owaabo , amugira ati : Nangwa n'omuri eki kyaro otazamu .
41008027	Yesu akarugayo n'abatendekwa be , yaaza omu byaro by'omuri Kaisaariya-Filipi . Ku baabaire nibagyenda , yaabuuza abatendekwa be ati : Beitu abantu baanyeta oha ?
41008028	Baamugarukamu bati : Abamwe nibagira ngu ori Yohaana Omubatizi , abandi ngu Eliya n'abandi ngu ori omwe aha barangi aba ira .
41008029	Ayongyera kubabuuza ati : Kwonka shi imwe , nimugira ngu ndi oha ? Petero amugarukamu ati : Ori Kristo .
41008030	Atyo Abeehanangiririza kimwe okutagira muntu weena ou baamumugambira .
41008031	Yesu atandika kubeegyesa ku Omwana w'omuntu ari ow'okubonabonesibwa munonga , akoogwa abakuru omu ihanga n'abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka , akaitwa , kwonka hakihwaho ebiro bishatu akazooka .
41008032	Ebyo byona akabigamba butunu . Bwanyima Petero yaamuta hangahari , yaatandika kumuhana .
41008033	Kwonka Yesu ku yaahindukire , yaareeba abatendekwa be , yaakabukira Petero ati : Iwe Sitaane ' we , ngaruka enyima ; ahabw'okuba ebi orikuteekateeka ti bya Ruhanga , kureka n'eby'abantu .
41008034	Yesu akeeta ekimbuuro ky'abantu hamwe n'abatendekwa be , yaabagira ati : Omuntu weena orikwenda kunkuratira , ayeyogye , ayekorere omusharaba gwe , ankuratire .
41008035	Ahabw'okuba weena orikwenda kukiza amagara ge , aryagafeerwa ; kandi weena orihayo amagara ge ahabwangye n'ahabw'Amakuru Marungi , aryagagarurirwa .
41008036	Mbwenu omuntu nikimugasira ki kukubuura ensi yoona , haza akafeerwa amagara ge ?
41008037	Kandi buzimazima , omuntu akaahayo kintu ki kucungura amagara ge ?
41008038	Manya omuntu weena oriitwa enshoni ahabwangye n'ahabw'ebigambo byangye omu b'obusingye obu abarikuhampuka kandi abarikukora ebibi , Omwana w'omuntu nawe ku ariija aine ekitiinisa kya Ishe , ashagatiirwe baamaraika abarikwera , nikwo arimutwaza .
41009001	Kandi yaabagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Hariho abeemereire aha , abatarihikwaho kufa batakareebire bukama bwa Ruhanga nibwija n'obushoboorozi .
41009002	Ku haahingwireho ebiro mukaaga , Yesu yaatwara Petero na Yakobo na Yohaana , yaabatembya orushozi ruraingwa kwehereera ; reero yaahinduka okundi omu maisho gaabo ;
41009003	ebijwaro bye byayera nibimurinkana okukira oku omwozya w'emyenda weena omu nsi yaakubaasize kubyeza .
41009004	Kandi Eliya na Musa baababonekyera , nibagaaniira na Yesu .
41009005	Petero nikwo kugambira Yesu ati : Mwegyesa , ka ni kirungi itwe okushangwa turi aha ; mbwenu ka twombekye obuju bushatu : kamwe kabe akaawe , akandi kabe aka Musa , n'akandi aka Eliya .
41009006	Obwo akaba atarikumanya ki arikugamba , ahabw'okuba bakaba batiinire munonga .
41009007	Mpaho ekicu kyaija , kyabasangira , kandi eiraka ryayema omuri ekyo kicu , ryagira riti : Ogu n'Omwana wangye ou nkunda ; mumuhurire .
41009008	Ahonaaho ku baamagamagire , tibaareeba muntu ondi weena , kureka Yesu wenka .
41009009	Ku baabaire nibashuuma , nibaruga aha rushozi , Yesu yaabeehanangiriza kutagambira muntu weena ebi baareeba , okuhitsya obu Omwana w'omuntu arizooka omu bafiire .
41009010	Nabo ekyo baakyerinda , baayebuuza eki okuzooka omu bafiire kurikumanyisa .
41009011	Baarugaho baamubuuza bati : Ahabw'enki abahangu b'eiteeka bagira ngu , Eliya niwe w'okubanza kwija ?
41009012	Yaabagarukamu ati : N'eky'amazima ; Eliya n'ow'okubanza kwija , akagarura ebintu byona omu buteeka ; kwonka shi ahabw'enki kyahandiikirwe aha Mwana w'omuntu , ngu aryabonabonesibwa munonga , kandi agaywe ?
41009013	Kwonka ka mbagambire ku Eliya araherize kwija , kandi ku baamutwarize oku baayenzire , nk'oku Ebyahandiikirwe byamugambireho .
41009014	Ku baagarukire , baahika abandi batendekwa , baareeba ekimbuuro ky'abantu baingi kibashagatiire , n'abahangu b'eiteeka bamwe nibabahakanisa .
41009015	Ahonaaho ekimbuuro ky'abantu kyona ku kyamureebire kiti , kyatangaara munonga , kyairuka nikimwizira kumutangirira .
41009016	Nawe nikwo kubabuuza ati : Mwaba nimuhakana ki nabo ?
41009017	Omwe ahari abo bantu yaamugarukamu ati : Mwegyesa , naakureetera mutabani wangye ngugu , ariho ekyago ekimureeteire kuba ekiteta .
41009018	Ku kirikumukwata , kimutuura ahansi ; areeta eifuro omu kanwa , anena amaino , agangaara ; mbwenu ku nshabire abatendekwa baawe kukibinga , baaremwa .
41009019	Yesu omu kubagarukamu , yaabagira ati : Imwe ab'obusingye obutarikwikiriza ; ndyahitsya hi okuguma naimwe ? Ndyahitsya hi okubagumisiririza ? Nimumundeetere .
41009020	Batyo baamumureetera . Ahonaaho ekyago ku kyareebire Yesu , kyasikankura ogwo mwojo , yaagwa ahansi , yaagumaho naayekuringa , eifuro nirimureetwa omu kanwa .
41009021	Yesu yaabuuza ishe ati : Amazire mwanya ki akwatsirwe ? Onu ati : Okwiha omu buto ;
41009022	kandi kaingi kimunaga omu muriro n'omu maizi , ngu kimwite . Mbwenu ku oraabe oine eki orikubaasa kukora , tugirire embabazi , otuhwere .
41009023	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Ku oraabe noobaasa ? Manya byona bibaasikira oine okwikiriza .
41009024	Ahonaaho ishe w'omwana agamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Eego , niinyikiriza , mbwenu ntambira okutaikiriza kwangye !
41009025	Yesu , ku areeba abantu baingi nibamumiganiraho , akabukira ekyo kyago , ati : Iwe kyago ' we ekifamatu kandi ekiteta , ninkuragiira omurugyeho , otamugarukaho obundi .
41009026	Mpaho kimusikankura kubi munonga , kimurugaho nikiborooga ; omwojo ashusha nk'ofiire ; baingi bagira ngu yaafa .
41009027	Kwonka Yesu amukwata omukono , amwimutsya ; onu ayemerera .
41009028	Yesu ku yaataahire omu nju , abatendekwa be baamubuuza mpora , bati : Ahabw'enki itwe turemirwe kukibinga ?
41009029	Yaabagarukamu ati : Manya eky'omuringo nk'ogwo tikibingwa kindi , kureka okushaba n'okwesiibyakwo .
41009030	Ku baarugire aho , baagyenda nibaraba omuri Galilaaya . Yesu tiyaayenda muntu weena ku akimanya ,
41009031	ahabw'okuba akaba naayegyesa abatendekwa be , naabagambira ati : Omwana w'omuntu naija kurekurirwa abantu , bamwite ; haza ku haraahingureho ebiro bishatu aitsirwe , azookye omu bafiire .
41009032	Kwonka bo eki yaabagambiire tibarakyetegyereize , kandi baatiina kukimubuuza .
41009033	Bwanyima bakahika Kafarinaumu . Yesu ku yaabaire ari omu nju , yaababuuza ati : Ekintu eki mwaba nimuhakanaho omu muhanda , ni ki ?
41009034	Kwonka baahunama , ahabw'okuba bakaba nibahakana bonka , ngu omukuru omuribo n'oha ?
41009035	Nawe nikwo kushutama , akeeta eikumi na babiri kwija ahu ari , akabagira ati : Omuntu weena orikwenda kuba ow'okubanza , abe niwe yaaba ow'aha muheru , kandi abe omuheereza wa boona .
41009036	Atyo akwata omwana muto , amuta ahagati yaabo , amukiikira , abagira ati :
41009037	Weena oyakiira omu iziina ryangye omwe aha baana bato nk'ogu , biri niinye ayakiire ; kandi weena onyakiira , biri tiinye aba ayakiire , kureka ogwo owantumire .
41009038	Yohaana akamugira ati : Mwegyesa , tureebire omuntu naabinga ebyago omu iziina ryawe ; twamuzibira ahabw'okuba tarikutukuratira .
41009039	kwonka yaagira ati : Murekye kumuzibira ; ahabw'okuba tihariho muntu n'omwe okora eby'amahano omu iziina ryangye , kandi akangambaho kubi .
41009040	Manya weena otarikuturwanisa , biri n'ow'ab'orubaju rwaitu .
41009041	Weena orikubaha ekikopo ky'amaizi g'okunywa ahabw'okuba muri aba Kristo , buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Tariburira kimwe kihembo kye .
41009042	Kwonka weena orikuteeza entsibo omwe aha baana aba abato barikuunyikiriza , akabagwisa , haakiri abohwe orubengo omu maraka , anagwe omu nyanja .
41009043	Kandi omukono gwawe ku guraabe nigukureetera kukora ekibi , gutemeho ; haakiri iwe okutaaha omu magara agatahwaho ori ekimuga , okukira okugira emikono yombi okagyenda nayo okuzimu omu muriro ogutaraara .
41009044	Niyo enyogori z'abaayo zitafa , n'omuriro gwayo gutaraara .
41009045	Ekigyere kyawe ku kiraabe nikikureetera kukora ekibi , kitemeho ; haakiri iwe okutaaha omu magara agatahwaho ori ekirema , okukira okugira ebigyere byombi okanagwa nabyo okuzimu omu muriro .
41009046	[ Niyo enyogori z'abaayo zitafa , n'ei omuriro gwayo gutaraara . ]
41009047	Kandi eriisho ryawe ku riraabe nirikureetera kukora ekibi , riihemu ; haakiri iwe okutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga oine eriisho rimwe , okukira okugira amaisho gombi okanagwa nago okuzimu omu muriro ,
41009048	ei enyogori z'abaayo zitafa , n'ei omuriro gwayo gutaraara .
41009049	Buri muntu aryateebwamu omuriro nk'oku bata omwonyo omu byokurya .
41009050	Omwonyo guba murungi ; beitu ku gwakuhwamu ensha , okaagigaruramu ota ? Mwerungyemu omwonyo , kandi mugirirane obusingye .
41010001	Yesu , ku yaarugire okwo , yaaza omu kyanga kya Buyudaaya na seeri ya Yorudaani . Ebimbuuro by'abantu byagaruka byamuteeraniraho ; nawe yaabeegyesa nk'okwe .
41010002	Abafarisaayo bamwe baamuhika , baamubuuza nibamutega bati : Omu iteeka nikiikirizibwa omushaija kushenda omukazi we ?
41010003	Nawe yaabagarukamu ati : Imwe Musa akabaragiira ata ?
41010004	Baamugira bati : Musa akaikiriza omushaija kuhandiika ebaruha y'okushenda omukazi we , ngu babone kutaanira kimwe .
41010005	Yesu nikwo kubagira ati : Manya eki yaabahandiikiriire ekyo kiragiro , n'ahabw'okugangaara kw'emitima yaanyu ;
41010006	kwonka okwiha omu kutandika kw'okuhangwa , Ruhanga akabahanga omushaija n'omukazi .
41010007	Nikyo omuntu atsigiraho ishe na nyina , akahamira aha mukazi we ,
41010008	bombi bakaba omubiri gumwe ; baba batakiri babiri kureka omwe .
41010009	N'ahabw'ekyo eki Ruhanga yaateeraine , hatarigira omuntu owaakitaanisa .
41010010	Ku yaagarukire omu nju , abatendekwa be baayongyera kukimubuuza ;
41010011	nawe yaabagira ati : Omushaija orikushenda omukazi we , akashwera ondi , aha mukazi we ogwo naaba ashambaine .
41010012	N'omukazi orikwangana , akashwerwa ondi mushaija , nawe biri ashambaine .
41010013	Abantu bakareetera Yesu abaana bato ngu abakwateho ; abatendekwa be baabakabukira .
41010014	Yesu ku yaakireebire , kyamugwisa kubi munonga , atyo yaabagira ati : Murekye abaana bato baije , bampikye , mutabazibira ; ahabw'okuba abari nk'abo obukama bwa Ruhanga n'obwabo .
41010015	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena otarikwikiriza bukama bwa Ruhanga nk'omwana muto taributaahamu .
41010016	Atyo yaababumbatira , yaabaha omugisha naabataho engaro .
41010017	Yesu ku yaabaire naimutsya orugyendo , omushaija yaija nairuka , yaamutsimbira amaju , yaamubuuza ati : Mwegyesa murungi , nkaakora ki nkabona kutunga amagara agatahwaho ?
41010018	Yesu yaamugira ati : Noonyetera ki murungi ? Manya tihabaho murungi , kureka Ruhanga wenka .
41010019	Noomanya ebiragiro ku bigira biti : Otariita , otarishambana , otariiba , otariha obwamushinja bw'ebishuba , otariryangatanisa , otiine shoimwe na nyoko .
41010020	Onu yaamugarukamu ati : Mwegyesa , ebyo byona ntuura nimbihitsya okwiha omu buto bwangye .
41010021	Yesu nikwo kumutsimba eriisho , akamukunda , akamugira ati : Mbwenu nooburwaho ekintu kimwe . Irooko , otunde ebi oine ; ebiraabirugyemu , obihe abooro ; mbwenu obwo oryatunga eitungo omu iguru ; haza oije onkuratire .
41010022	Onu ku ahurira ebyo , ahinduriza ahamaisho , agyenda aine obujune , ahabw'okuba akaba aine eitungo ringi .
41010023	Yesu nikwo kubabuzyamu amaisho , akagambira abatendekwa be ati : Ka kigumire abatungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga !
41010024	Abatendekwa be batangaarira ebyo bigambo ; kwonka Yesu agumizamu abagira ati : Baana ' mwe , ka kigumire abeesiga obutungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga !
41010025	Manya nikirahukira engamira kuraba omu kahengyere k'empitirizo , okukira omutungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
41010026	Kwonka bo baatangaara okukiraho ; baagambirana bati : Mbwenu shi , n'oha orikubaasa kujunwa ?
41010027	Yesu nikwo kubatsimba eriisho , akabagira ati : Aha bantu tikirikubaasika , kwonka ahari Ruhanga tikwo kiri ; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga abaasa byona .
41010028	Petero atyo amubuuza ati : Reeba , itwe tukatsigaho byona , twakukuratira !
41010029	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Tihariho muntu owaatsigireho eka ye , nari abarumuna , nari banyaanya , nari ishe , nari abaana be , nainga ebibanja ahabwangye n'ahabw'Amakuru Marungi ,
41010030	otarizimuurirwa maju n'abarumuna na banyaanya na baanyina n'abaana n'ebibanja emirundi igana n'okukiraho omu busingye obu , otaireho n'okuhiiganisibwa , kwonka omu busingye oburiija akatunga amagara agatahwaho .
41010031	Manya baingi ab'okubanza baryaba ab'okuhereeruka , kandi ab'okuhereeruka baryaba ab'okubanza .
41010032	Ku baabaire bari omu muhanda nibainamuka Yerusalemu , Yesu abeebembeire , abatendekwa be baatangaara , kandi n'abandi abaabaire babakuratiire baatiina . Yaagaruka yaata eikumi na babiri hangahari , yaatandika kubagambira ebirikwija kumubaho ,
41010033	ati : Reeba , nitwinamuka Yerusalemu , kandi Omwana w'omuntu naija kuheebwayo aha bahongyerezi abakuru n'aha bahangu b'eiteeka , bamucwere orubanja rw'okwitwa , bamurekurire Abanyamahanga .
41010034	Reero bamushungise , bamucwere amacwante , kandi bamwite ; haza ku haraahingureho ebiro bishatu , azookye omu bafiire .
41010035	Yakobo na Yohaana beene Zebedaayo , bakamuhika , baamugira bati : Mwegyesa , nitukweshengyereza , otukorere kyona eki turaakushabe .
41010036	Yaabagarukamu ati : Mbwenu nimwenda ngu mbakorere ki ?
41010037	Baamugira bati : Ku oriba waahikire omu kitiinwa kyawe , otwikirize , omwe akushutame aha rubaju rwa buryo , ondi aha rwa bumosho .
41010038	Yesu yaabagira ati : Timurikumanya ki murikushaba . Ebyo nimubaasa kunywa ekikopo eki ndaanywe , n'okubatizibwa oku ndaabatizibwe ?
41010039	Baamugarukamu bati : Nitubaasa . Yesu yaabagira ati : Eego , ekikopo eki ndaanywe , naimwe muryakinywa , n'okubatizibwa oku ndaabatizibwe , naimwe muryakubatizibwa .
41010040	Kwonka okushutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo nari aha rwa bumosho , ti kwangye kukugaba , kureka n'okw'abo abaakuteekateekyeirwe .
41010041	Reero abandi eikumi ku baakihuriire , baagwerwa kubi Yakobo na Yohaana ;
41010042	Yesu nikwo kubeeta , akabagira ati : Nimumanya ku abeetwa abategyeki b'Abanyamahanga babategyekyesa eikama , kandi n'abakuru baabo babaragiirisa obushoboorozi .
41010043	Kwonka tikwo kiri omuriimwe . Weena orikwenda kuba mukuru omuriimwe , abe omuheereza waanyu ,
41010044	kandi omuriimwe orikwenda kuba ow'okubanza , abe omuhuuku wa boona .
41010045	Manya Omwana w'omuntu taraizire kuheerezibwa , kureka okuheereza , n'okuhayo amagara ge kuba ekarabo ya baingi .
41010046	Bakataaha Yeriko ; Yesu ku yaabaire naarugayo aine abatendekwa be n'ekimbuuro ky'abantu , baashanga Baritimaayo mwene Timaayo , omusheegi empumi ashutami aha rubaju rw'omuhanda .
41010047	Ku yaahuriire ngu ni Yesu owa Nazareeti , yaatandika kwamuza ati : Yesu , mwene Daudi , ngirira embabazi !
41010048	Baingi baamukabukira nibamugambira ngu ahuname ; kwonka we yaayamuza okukiraho ati : Mwene Daudi , ngirira embabazi !
41010049	Yesu yaayemerera , yaagira ati : Nimumwete , aije . Batyo baayeta egyo mpumi , baagigira bati : Guma ; imuka , reeba , naakweta .
41010050	Atyo anaga omunagiro gwe , abandaituka , ahika ahari Yesu .
41010051	Yesu amubuuza ati : Nooyenda ngu nkukorere ki ? Egyo mpumi emugarukamu eti : Mukama wangye , niinyenda ngu ndeebe .
41010052	Yesu amugira ati : Yegyendere ; okwikiriza kwawe kwakukiza . Ahonaaho areeba , agyenda amukuratiire omu muhanda .
41011001	Ku baiririire Yerusalemu , baahika Beetifaagye na Beetaniya , haihi n'Orushozi rw'Emioliva , Yesu yaatuma babiri aha batendekwa be ,
41011002	yaabagira ati : Nimwirooko muze omu kyaro ekibari omumaisho . Ku muraakihikyemu muti , nimwija kureeba omwana gw'endogoya ogutakatembwahoga muntu , gutsibikire ; mugutsibure , mugureete .
41011003	Ku haraagire owaababuuza ati : Nimugutsiburira ki ? Mumugire muti : Mukama naagwenda kandi naija kugukugarurira juba .
41011004	Mpaho baagyenda , baashanga omwana gw'endogoya gutsibikire haihi n'eirembo aha muhanda rugyendwa ; baagutsibura .
41011005	Abantu abaabaire beemereire aho baababuuza bati : Nimukora ki okutsibura ogwo mwana gw'endogoya ?
41011006	Banu baabagambira ebi Yesu yaabatuma ; nabo baabareka baagyenda .
41011007	Batyo baareetera Yesu ogwo mwana gw'endogoya , baagutaho eminagiro yaabo ; yaagushutamaho .
41011008	Abantu baingi baayarira emyenda yaabo omu muhanda , abandi amataagi gayumbize agu baacwire omu misiri .
41011009	Kandi boona abaabaire beebembeire , na boona abaabaire bari enyima , baateera akaari bati : Hosaana ! Ogwo orikwija omu iziina rya Nyakubaho ahimbisibwe !
41011010	Obugabe bwa tatenkuriitwe Daudi oburikwija , nabwo buheebwe omugisha ! Hosaana , iwe ori ahaiguru owa Herebe !
41011011	Atyo Yesu ahika omuri Yerusalemu , ataaha omuri Nyaruju ku aheza kwetegyereza ebyamwo byona , bushangwa bwaizire , ashohora aza Beetaniya hamwe n'eikumi na babiri .
41011012	Eizooba ryakuratsireho , ku baabaire nibaruga Beetaniya , yaagira enjara .
41011013	Ku yaareebeire hangahari omutiini gwine amababi , yaaza kureeba yaaba guriho ebijuma . Kwonka ku yaaguhikire , yaashanga gutaine kindi kureka amababi gonka , ahabw'okuba bukaba butari bunaku obu emitiini eyaniramu .
41011014	Atyo agugira ati : Nihakabure owaarya aha bijuma byawe obundi ! N'abatendekwa be baamuhurira naagugira atyo .
41011015	Ku baahikire Yerusalemu , Yesu yaataaha omuri Nyaruju , yaatandika kubingamu abaabaire nibatundiramu n'abarikuguriramu ; yaajumika emeeza z'abaabaire nibahingisa empiiha , n'ebitebe by'abarikuguza enkombe ;
41011016	kandi tiyaikiriza muntu weena kuraba omuri Nyaruju aine eki ayekoreire .
41011017	Atyo abeegyesa naabagira ati : Beitu shi tikirahandiikirwe ngu : Enju yangye eryayetwa ey'okushabirwamu ab'amahanga goona ? Mbwenu imwe , ka mugihindwire eryaya ry'abambuzi !
41011018	Ekyo ku kyagwire abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka omu kutu , baateeraho kusherura oburyo bw'okumukwata ; kwonka baamutiina , ahabw'okuba abantu bakaba nibatangaarira ebi arikwegyesa .
41011019	Omwabazyo ku gwakiikire , Yesu n'abatendekwa be baaruga omu rurembo .
41011020	Omu kasheeshe ku baabaire nibahingura , baareeba omutiini guri gwomeire kimwe n'emizi .
41011021	Petero yaijuka , yaagira Yesu ati : Mwegyesa , reeba omutiini ogu okyeenire , gwomire !
41011022	Yesu yaagarukamu ati : Mugume mwesigye Ruhanga .
41011023	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Omuntu weena ku yaakugambira orushozi oru ati : Tsinduka , oyenagye omu nyanja , ataine kubangaanisa mu mutima gwe , kwonka naikiriza ku eki yaagamba kirikwija kubakwo , kiryamukorerwa .
41011024	N'ahabw'ekyo nimbagambira nti : Kyona eki murishaba nimweshengyereza , mwikirize ngu muryakitunga , haza kwo muryakiheebwa .
41011025	Kandi ku muriba mwemereire nimushaba , mwaba mwine eki murikufa n'omuntu weena , mumusaasire ; Shoimwe ow'omu iguru abone naimwe kubasaasira ebibi byanyu .
41011026	[ Kwonka mu muraabe mutasaasiire , Shoimwe ow'omu iguru naimwe taribasaasira bibi byanyu . ]
41011027	Ku baagarukire Yerusalemu , Yesu yaagyendagyenda omuri Nyaruju ; abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka n'abakuru omu ihanga baija ahu ari ,
41011028	baamugira bati : Ni bushoboorozi ki oburikukukoresa ebi ? Nari n'oha owaakuhaire obwo bushoboorozi obu orikukoresa ?
41011029	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Naanye ka mbabuuze ekibuuzo kimwe ; ku murangarukyemu , naanye niinyija kubagambira ahi naihire obushoboorozi oburikunkoresa ebyo .
41011030	Mbwenu okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga ahari Ruhanga nari omu bantu ? Nimungarukyemu .
41011031	Batyo bakihakanaho bonka bati : Ku turaagire tuti : Kukaruga ahari Ruhanga , naija kutugira ati : Kandi shi , mukangira ki kumwikiriza ?
41011032	Mbwenu shi tugire ngu , kukaruga omu bantu ? Baatiina abantu , ahabw'okuba boona bakaba nibaikiriza ku buzimazima Yohaana yaabaire ari omurangi .
41011033	Nabo nikwo kugarukamu Yesu bati : Titurikumanya . Yesu nawe nikwo kubagira ati : Naanye tindikwija kubagambira obushoboorozi oburikunkoresa ebyo .
41012001	Kandi Yesu akagumizamu yaabagambira naabacwera enfumu egi , ati : Omuntu akahinga omusiri gw'emizaabibu , yaaguzitirira orugo , yaagurimamu einyuukiro rya viino , yaagwombekamu omunaara , yaagutsigira abashengi ; atyo yaataaha eihanga .
41012002	Obunaku ku bwahikire , yaatuma omuheereza we ahari abo bashengi , ngu bamutwekyere ebijuma by'emizaabibu .
41012003	Kwonka bo baamukwata , baamuteera , baamubinga engaro nsha .
41012004	Yaagaruka yaabatumaho ondi muheereza ; ogwo nawe baamuhutaaza omutwe , baamuhemagura .
41012005	Kandi yaabatumaho ondiijo , ogwo baamwita ; n'abandi baingi , abamwe baabaasha , abandi baabaita .
41012006	Akaba akitsigaizeho omwe , niwe mutabani omukundwa ; aha muheru gwa boona , yaamubatumaho , naagira ati : Shana mutabani wangye bakaamugirira enshoni .
41012007	Kwonka abo bashengi baagambirana bati : Manya ogu niwe muhunguzi ; nimwije tumwite , obuhunguzi bube obwaitu .
41012008	Batyo baamukwata , baamwita , baamunaga aheeru y'ogwo musiri .
41012009	Mbwenu mukama w'ogwo musiri gw'emizaabibu aryakora ki ? Aryaija , acwekyereze abo bashengi , reero omusiri gw'emizaabibu agutemu abandi .
41012010	Hari timukashomaga ekyahandiikirwe ? Ku nikigira kiti : Eibaare eri abombeki baayangire , niryo ryahindukire obuhamizo .
41012011	Ekyo kikakorwa Nyakubaho , kandi nikitutangaaza okukireeba .
41012012	Ku baakyengire egyo nfumu ku nibo erikurengyeza , baayenda kumukwata , kwonka baatiina enyanja y'abantu ; batyo baamutsigaho baayegyendera .
41012013	Kandi Yesu bakamutumaho Abafarisaayo bamwe n'ab'ekigombe ky'aba Herode kumutega omu bi arikugamba .
41012014	Baija baamugira bati : Mwegyesa , nitumanya ku oba ow'amazima , ku oteeta ha muntu weena , ahabw'okuba toreebera ha bukuru bw'omuntu , kureka oyegyesa omu mazima eby'omuhanda gwa Ruhanga . Mbwenu itwe okuha Kaisaari omushoro , kihikire nari tikihikire ?
41012015	Mwbenu shi , tuguhe nari turereere ? Yesu ahabw'okumanya oburyarya bwabo , abagira ati : Ahabw'enki nimuntega ? Nimumpe empiiha , ngireebe .
41012016	Batyo baagireeta ; nawe yaabagira ati : Ekishushani eki n'ebihandiikirweho n'eby'oha ? Baamugarukamu bati : N'ebya Kaisaari .
41012017	Nawe nikwo kubagira ati : Ebya Kaisaari mubihe Kaisaari , n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga . Batyo baamutangaarira munonga .
41012018	Bwanyima Abasadukaayo , abagira ngu abafa tibazooka , bakaija ahari Yesu , baamubuuza bati :
41012019	Mwegyesa , Musa akatuteeraho ekihandiiko ekirikugira ngu , mukuru w'omuntu ku yaakufa ari encwekye , omurumuna ahungure ogwo mufaakazi , azaarire mukuru we abaana .
41012020	Mbwenu hakaba hariho enyina-emwe mushanju ; ow'omujigaijo yaashwera omukazi , kwonka yaafa bucwekye .
41012021	Ow'omushubiro yaahungura ogwo mufaakazi , nawe yaafa atatsigire baana ; n'owa kashatu atyo ;
41012022	boona omushanju baafa bucwekye . Aha muheru gwa boona , omukazi nawe yaafa .
41012023	Mbwenu aha kuzooka kw'abafiire , ku barizooka , ahari abo aryaba muka oha ? Ahabw'okuba boona omushanju bakamushwera .
41012024	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Ekibahabisa ti ahabw'okuba mutarikumanya Ebyahandiikirwe , nobu gaakuba amaani ga Ruhanga ?
41012025	Manya abafiire ku barizooka , abantu tibarishwera kandi tibarishwerwa , kureka baryaba bari nka baamaraika omu iguru .
41012026	Kandi ebirikukwata aha by'okuzooka kw'abafiire , timukashomaga mu kitabo kya Musa , ekicweka ekirikugamba aha by'orushaka ruri , oku Ruhanga yaamugizire ati : Ndi Ruhanga wa Aburahamu , Ruhanga wa Isaaka , kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobo ?
41012027	Biri ti Ruhanga w'abafiire , kureka n'ow'abahuriire . Muhabiire kimwe !
41012028	Omwe aha bahangu b'eiteeka , owaabahuriire nibahakana , akeetegyereza oku Yesu yaabagarukiremu gye , akaija yaamubuuza ati : Omu biragiro byona , ekikuru ni kiiha ?
41012029	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Ekikuru n'eki : Iwe Isiraeli , hurira ! Mukama Ruhanga waitu niwe Mukama wenka .
41012030	Guma okunde Mukama Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona , n'amagara gaawe goona , n'obwengye bwawe bwona , n'amaani gaawe goona .
41012031	Ekya kabiri n'eki : Kunda mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda . Tihariho kiragiro ekirikukira ebyo .
41012032	Omuhangu w'eiteeka yaamugira ati : Mwegyesa , waagamba gye , eki waagamba n'eky'amazima okugira ngu , Mukama Ruhanga n'omwe kandi tihariho ondi ;
41012033	kandi ngu , okumukunda n'omutima gwona , n'obwengye bwona , n'amaani goona , kandi n'okukunda mutaahi we nk'oku ayekunda . Ekyo nikikirira hare ekihongwa ekicwekize kyona , nari ekindi kitambo .
41012034	Yesu , ku yaamureebire yaagarukamu n'okwetegyereza , yaamugira ati : Obukama bwa Ruhanga toburi hare . Okwiha obwo tihaagira muntu n'omwe owaayehanga kumubuuza obundi .
41012035	Bwanyima Yesu , ku yaabaire naayegyesa omuri Nyaruju , yaagira ati : Abahangu b'eiteeka baiha hi okugira ngu , Kristo ni mwene Daudi ?
41012036	Haza kunu Daudi , obu yaagambisibwa Mutima Orikwera , yaagizire ati : Nyakubaho akagambira Mukama wangye ati : Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo , okuhitsya obu ndigira abazigu baawe endibatiro y'ebigyere byawe .
41012037	Daudi nyakabara ku araabe naamweta Mukama , kandi shi naabaasa ata kuba omwana we ? Ekimbuuro ky'abantu abaabaire bamuhurikiize kyashemerererwa ebi yaagambire .
41012038	Yesu ku yaabaire naayegyesa , yaagira ati : Mwerinde abahangu b'eiteeka , abakunda kugyenda bajwaire amakanzu maraingwa , n'okutangirirwa omu butare ,
41012039	n'okushutama omu bitebe by'abakuru omu mateeraniro , n'omu myanya y'ebitiinwa aha magyenyi .
41012040	Nibo abo abanyaga eby'abafaakazi , kandi bakashaba nibarandagatana , ngu abantu babareebe . Baryacwerwa orubanja orurikukira orw'abandi !
41012041	Yesu ku yaashutamire ahashungaine n'eibiikiro rya Nyaruju , yaareeba abantu nibaritamu empiiha zaabo z'emitoijo ; kandi abatungi baingi nibatamu nyingi munonga .
41012042	Bwanyima haija omufaakazi omworo , yaatamu obusente bubiri , oburikwingana shilingi emwe .
41012043	Mpaho Yesu yaayeeta abatendekwa be , yaabagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira ku omufaakazi ogu omworo yaatamu bingi okukira abandi boona abaata omu ibiikiro .
41012044	Manya bo baatamu ebibashaagire ; kwonka we akakye aku yaaba aine niko yaanagamu , haza kari eitungo rye heza .
41013001	Yesu ku yaabaire naaruga omuri Nyaruju , omwe aha batendekwa be yaamugira ati : Mwegyesa , reeba . Ebishi , aga mabaare n'ebi byombeko nibitangaaza !
41013002	Yesu yaamugira ati : Ebi byombeko bihango nimubireeba ? Tiharitsigara ibaare na rimwe eritungamiire erindi eritarisheenyagurwa .
41013003	Kandi Yesu ku yaabaire ashutami aha Rushozi rw'Emioliva ahashungaine na Nyaruju , Petero na Yakobo na Yohaana na Andereya baamubuuza omu mubonano bati :
41013004	Tugambire ahu ebyo biribeeraho , kandi n'akamanyiso akarituhamiza ku ebyo biri haihi kuhikiirira ?
41013005	Yesu nikwo kutandika kubagambira ati : Mwerinde hatarigira omuntu weena owaabahabisa .
41013006	Manya baingi baryaija nibaanyeyeterera nibagira ngu , Niinye ; haza bahabise baingi .
41013007	Ku murihurira engamba n'emibuuro yaazo , mutaryekanga , ahabw'okuba ebyo n'eby'okubaho ; kwonka emperu eryaba etakahikire .
41013008	Manya obwo eihanga riryateera erindi , n'obugabe buteere obundi . Haryabaho emitsitsa oku n'oku , hataahe enjara nyingi ; haza ebyo biryaba biri entandikiro y'eby'obusaasi .
41013009	Kwonka imwe , mwerinde ; baryabahayo omu mashengyero , babateerere omu mateeraniro ; babeemereze omu maisho g'abategyeki abakuru n'ag'abagabe nibabantura , mube baakareebi bangye aharibo .
41013010	Kwonka Amakuru Marungi garyabanza garangirirwe omu mahanga goona .
41013011	Kandi ku baribatwara kubahayo , mutaryemereza omutima ahabw'eki murigamba , kwonka eki muriheebwa omuri ago magingo mube nikyo mwagamba ; manya tiimwe murigamba , kureka Mutima Orikwera .
41013012	Mukuru w'omuntu aryahayo omurumuna kwitwa , na ishe w'omwana aheyo omwana we , n'abaana baimukiirire abazaire baabo , babaitise .
41013013	Muryayangwa abantu boona ahabwangye ; kwonka origumisiriza akahika aha muheru , niwe arijunwa .
41013014	Ku murireeba ekirikuzira ekirikuhwerekyereza kyemereziibwe ahi kitakugiire -- orikushoma ebi ayetegyereze -- obwo abariba bari omuri Buyudaaya bahungire aha nshozi ;
41013015	oriba ori aha mutwe gw'enju , ataritemburuka kuza omu nju kwihamu ebye ;
41013016	n'oriba ori omu musiri , atarigaruka omuka kwihayo omunagiro gwe .
41013017	Ebishi bambe , abariba baine enda n'abarikwontsya omu biro ebyo baryagwerwa akagwe !
41013018	Mushabe ebyo bitakaabaho mu biro by'embeho .
41013019	Manya omu biro ebyo haryabaho eby'obusaasi ebitakabahoga , okwiha aha kutandika kw'ensi ei Ruhanga yaahangire n'okuhitsya hati , kandi ebitaribaho bundi .
41013020	Kuri Nyakubaho ataracwire ha biro ebyo , tihaakubaireho n'omwe owaakurokokire ; kwonka ahabw'entoore ze , ebyo biro akabicwaho .
41013021	Omu bunaku obwo ku harigira owaabagambira ati : Reeba , Kristo ari aha , nari , ari hariya , mutariikiriza ;
41013022	ahabw'okuba haryaimuka Ba-Kristo b'ebishuba n'abarangi b'ebishuba , bakore obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza , kuhabisa nangwa n'abatoorainwe , kyaba nikibaasika .
41013023	N'ahabw'ekyo naimwe mwerinde ; ebyo byona naabibagambira bitakabaireho .
41013024	Kwonka omu biro ebyo , eby'obusaasi ku biriheza kuhwaho , eizooba riryazima , n'okwezi tikuryaka ,
41013025	enyonyoozi ziryahanantuka omu iguru zigwe , n'eby'amaani eby'omu iguru bitengyeetsibwe .
41013026	Obwo baryareeba Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu bicu , aine obushoboorozi n'ekitiinisa kingi .
41013027	Haza aryatuma baamaraika be kutaaruura entoore ze nibaziiha omu mbaju ina ezi emiyaga ereetwamu , okwiha aha muheru gw'ensi okuta ahu eiguru rigarukira .
41013028	Mureebere aha mutiini ; eitaagi ryagwo ku ryoroba ryatooka amababi , mumanya ku ekyanda kiri haihi .
41013029	Naimwe nu nikwo kiri , ku murireeba ebyo nibibaho , mumanye ku ari haihi , ku yaahikire aha marembo .
41013030	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ab'obusingye obu tibarihwaho ebyo byona bitakabaireho .
41013031	Eiguru n'ensi biryahwaho , kwonka ebigambo byangye tibirihwaho .
41013032	Mbwenu eby'ekiro ekyo n'obunaku bwakyo tihariho orikubimanya , nobu baakuba baamaraika b'omu iguru , nobu yaakuba Mwana , kureka Ishe wenka .
41013033	Mwerinde , mugume nimureeba , kandi mushabe , ahabw'okuba timurikumanya ahu obunaku obwo burihikira .
41013034	Buri nk'omuntu orikuza eihanga ; akiba naaruga omu ka , akagitsigira abaheereza be , buri omwe akamuha omurimo , kandi akaragiira omukumiirizi kuguma naareeba .
41013035	N'ahabw'ekyo mugume nimureeba , ahabw'okuba timurikumanya bunaku bu nyineeka ariiziramu , yaaba mu mwabazyo , nari mu itumbi , nari enkoko nizigamba , nainga omushekye nigujuguta ;
41013036	atakaija kitaraariire , akabashanga mugwejegyeire .
41013037	Kandi eki ndikubagambira , ninkigambira n'abandi boona , nti : Mugume nimureeba !
41014001	Ku haabaire hatsigaireyo ebiro bibiri ekiro ky'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho n'obw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe kuhika , abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka baasherura oburyo bu baraakwatiremu Yesu kitamanyirwe , bakamwita .
41014002	Kwonka baagira bati : Ekyo kitabaho omu biro by'amagyenyi , ngu hatakaabaho akajagararo omu bantu .
41014003	Yesu , ku yaabaire ari Beetaniya , omwa Simooni omubembe , ari aha meeza , omukazi yaamwijaho aine akacupa k'eibaare ry'omwengyengye , akarimu amajuta g'obuguzi bwingi , gooteize omugaju gw'obunyanunga ; yaayata egyo cupa , yaagamushuka omu mutwe .
41014004	Bamwe aha baabaire bariho baagambirana bagwirwe kubi , bati : Mbwenu aga majuta g'omugaju gaafa ki ?
41014005	Nangwa kuri gaatundwa , gakarugamu shilingi magana ashatu n'okukiraho , haza zikagabirwa abooro ! Batyo baagirira ogwo mukazi ekiniga .
41014006	Kwonka Yesu yaabagira ati : Mumurekye ; nimumugangiza ki ? Manya eki yankorera ni kirungi ,
41014007	ahabw'okuba imwe obutoosha abooro mutuura nabo , kandi nimubaasa kubakorera eby'embabazi mwaba nimwenda ; kwonka nyowe timuriguma naanye obutoosha .
41014008	Yankorera eki arikubaasa ; yaasiiga amajuta g'omugaju omubiri gwangye kugutebeekanisiza okuziikwa .
41014009	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ahu amakuru Marungi aga garirangirirwa omu nsi yoona , eki ogu mukazi yaakora kiryagambwaho okumwijuka .
41014010	Yuda owa Kariota , omwe ahari ikumi na babiri , akaza aha bahongyerezi abakuru kubamanyisa oku araamubahe .
41014011	Ku baakihuriire , baashemererwa munonga , baamuraganisa kumuha empiiha ; nawe yaasherura oburyo bw'okumurebya .
41014012	Aha kiro ky'okubanza ky'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho , eki baabaire batambiraho omwana gw'entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho , abatendekwa ba Yesu bakamubuuza bati : Nooyenda tuze kukuteekateekyera hi , ahu oraariire Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho ?
41014013	Atyo yaatuma babiri aha batendekwa be naabagira ati : Nimwirooko muze omu rurembo ; nimwija kubuganayo omushaija oyekoreire enyungu y'amaizi ; mumukurate .
41014014	Haza mugambire mukama w'enju ei araataahemu , muti : Omwegyesa yaakutumaho ati : Ekishengye kyangye ky'abagyenyi kiri nkahi , eki ndaariiremu Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho hamwe n'abatendekwa bangye ?
41014015	Ogwo mushaija naija kubooreka ekishengye kihango ky'omuri kaanyinaabiri , ekitegwirwe gye , kandi ekirimu byona ebirikwetengwa ; okwo mube niyo mwatuteguurira .
41014016	Abatendekwa baagyenda , baataaha omu rurembo , baashanga byona biri nk'oku yaabagambira ; baatebeekanisizayo eby'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho .
41014017	Omwabazyo ku gwakiikire , Yesu yaija n'eikumi na babiri .
41014018	Mbwenu ku baabaire bari aha meeza nibarya , Yesu yaagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Omwe omuriimwe orikurya naanye naija kundeebya .
41014019	Mpaho baatandika kushaasha , baamubuuza nibakuratana bati : Mbwenu shi , niinye ?
41014020	Yaabagarukamu ati : N'omwe omuriimwe eikumi na babiri orikukoza naanye omu shohaani .
41014021	Manya Omwana w'omuntu naija kuba nk'oku kyamuhandiikirweho , kwonka ogwo muntu orikumureebya aryakareeba ! Nangwa ogwo muntu kuri atarazairwe !
41014022	Mbwenu ku baabaire nibarya , Yesu yaakwata omugaati , yaasiima , yaagucwamu , yaagubaha naagamba ati : Nimutoore ; ogu n'omubiri gwangye .
41014023	Bwanyima yaakwata ekikopo ; ku yaaherize kusiima , yaakibaha ; boona baanywaho .
41014024	Yaabagira ati : Egi n'eshagama yangye ey'endagaano ensya , eraasheeshwe ahabwa baingi .
41014025	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Tindinywa bundi ha kirugire omu mizaabibu , okuhitsya obu ndikinywa kiri kisya omu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
41014026	Ku baaherize kweshongora ekyeshongoro , baaza omu Rushozi rw'Emioliva .
41014027	Mpaho Yesu yaabagira ati : Mwena nimwija kumpemukaho , ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa ngu : Ndyateera omuriisa , entaama zitaataane .
41014028	Kwonka ku ndaaheze kuzooka omu bafiire , niinyija kubeebembera ninza Galilaaya .
41014029	Petero nikwo kuhiga ati : Boona nobu baraakuhemukyeho , kwonka nyowe tindikwija kukuhemukaho !
41014030	Yesu nawe nikwo kumugira ati : Buzimazima ninkugambira nti : Iwe , eri izooba , eki kiro , enkoko ku eraabe etakagambire kabiri , nooba waanyogire kashatu .
41014031	Kwonka we yaagumizamu naahiga ati : Nobu kuraabe okufa naiwe , nikikabure , tindikwija kukwoga . N'abandi boona baahiga batyo .
41014032	Bakahika omu musiri ogurikwetwa Getesemaane . Yesu yaagambira abatendekwa be ati : Mube mushutami aha , mbe ninshaba .
41014033	Atyo yaatwara Petero na Yakobo na Yohaana ; yaatandika kugira obwoba bwingi n'okushoberwa .
41014034	Yaabagira ati : Omutima gwangye gwine enaku z'okuunyita ; mugume aha nimureeba .
41014035	Atyo airirayo omu maisho kakye , ajuumara ahansi , ashaba ngu ku kyakuba nikibaasika , egyo shaaha emuhingura .
41014036	Kandi agira ati : Abba , Taata , byona nibikubaasikira . Mbwenu nyihaho eki kikopo ; kwonka kitaba nkaanye oku ndikwenda , kureka nkaiwe oku orikwenda .
41014037	Ku yaizire , yaashanga bagwejegyeire ; yaagira Petero ati : Simooni , ogwejegyeire ? Tiwaabaasa kureeba naanye eshaaha emwe ?
41014038	Mureebe kandi mushabe , mutakaagwa omu kwohibwa ; manya omutima nigwenda , kwonka omubiri n'omweremwa .
41014039	Atyo agarukayo , ashaba naagamba ebigambo bimwe nka biri .
41014040	Kwonka ku agaruka , ashanga bagwejegyeire , ahabw'okuba amaisho gaabo gakaba garembire ; babura eki baamugarukamu .
41014041	Ku agaruka omurundi gwa kashatu , abagira ati : Mbwenu mugumizemu mugwejegyere , muhuumure . Ekyo nikimara ; obunaku bwahika Omwana w'omuntu kurekurirwa abasiisi .
41014042	Nimwimukye , tugyende . Reeba , orikundeebya ari haihi !
41014043	Yesu ku yaabaire naakigamba , haija Yuda , omwe ahari ikumi na babiri , hamwe n'ekimbuuro ky'abantu , bakwaitse zaarurara n'ebikoni , boohereziibwe abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka n'abakuru omu ihanga .
41014044	Obwo egyo ndeebya ekaba yaabahaire akamanyiso neegira eti : Ou ndaanywegyere , biri niwe ogwo , mumukwate , mumutware mumurinzire .
41014045	Mbwenu ogwo mureebya ku aija , ahonaaho ahika Yesu , amugira ati : Mwegyesa ! Atyo amunywegyera .
41014046	Reero abo bamutaho engaro , bamukwata .
41014047	Mpaho omwe aha baabaire beemereire aho , asyorayo rurara ye , atema omuheereza w'omuhongyerezi omukuru , amucwaho okutu .
41014048	Bwanyima Yesu abagira ati : Beitu shi , obu murikuunyizira na zaarurara n'ebikoni kunkwata , ndi omwambuzi ?
41014049	Buri izooba ka naabaire mba haihi naimwe niinyegyesa omuri Nyaruju , haza mutankwate . Manya eki kyabaho ngu Ebyahandiikirwe bibone kuhikiirizibwa .
41014050	Ago magingo abatendekwa be bamutsigaho , boona bahunga .
41014051	Omutsigazi omwe amukuratira ajwaire omwenda gwa kitaani gwonka bamukwata ;
41014052	kwonka we abeesikura , abatsigira ogwo mwenda , ahunga ajwaire busha .
41014053	Mpaho baatwara Yesu aha muhongyerezi omukuru ; abahongyerezi abakuru boona hamwe n'abakuru omu ihanga n'abahangu b'eiteeka baateeranirayo .
41014054	Obwo Petero akaba amukuratiire , amuri hareho , okuhitsya obu baahikire omu kibuga ky'omuhongyerezi omukuru , akashutama n'abarinzi , akoota omuriro .
41014055	Obwo abahongyerezi abakuru n'eishengyero ryona bakaba nibasherura obwamushinja bw'okwomesereza Yesu , ngu babone kumwitisa , kwonka tibaabubona .
41014056	Manya baingi bakaba nibamwomesereza n'obwamushinja bw'ebishuba , kwonka butarikukwatirana .
41014057	Bwanyima abamwe baayemerera , baamwomesereza nibamubeiherera bati :
41014058	Tukamuhurira naagira ati : Ndyasheenya Nyaruju egi eyaayombekirwe emikono y'abantu , haza nyombekye endi omu biro bishatu , etombekirwe mikono y'abantu .
41014059	Hoona obwo nabwo obwamushinja bwabo tiburakwatiraine .
41014060	Omuhongyerezi omukuru nikwo kwemerera ahagati , akabuuza Yesu ati : Toine ki orikugarukamu omuri ebi aba bantu barikukwomesereza ?
41014061	Kwonka we yaahunama , tiyaamugarukamu n'akakye . Ogwo muhongyerezi nikwo kugaruka kumubuuza ati : Niiwe Kristo , Omwana w'Ogwo ohimbisibwa ?
41014062	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Eego , niinye ; kandi nimbagambira nti : Muryareeba Omwana w'omuntu ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'Ow'obushoboorozi , naizira omu bicu by'omu iguru .
41014063	Omuhongyerezi omukuru nikwo kutaagura ebijwaro bye , akagira ati : Mbwenu shi , nitukyendera ki baamushinja abandi ?
41014064	Manya mwayehuririra oku yaarogota ! Mbwenu nimuteekateeka muta ? Boona baamucwera orubanja bati : Ashemereire kufa .
41014065	Abamwe baatandika kumucwera amacwante n'okumukoma aha maisho , n'okumuteera entomi , nibamugira bati Ragura ! Abarinzi nabo baamuteera empi .
41014066	Petero ku yaabaire ari eifo omu kibuga , omwe aha bazaana b'omuhongyerezi omukuru yaija ,
41014067	yaareeba Petero ari aho naayota ; yaamutsimba eriisho , yaamugira ati : Naiwe waaba ori hamwe na Yesu Omunyanazareeti .
41014068	Kwonka we ayehakana ati : Eki orikugamba tindikukimanya , nobu kwakuba okukyetegyereza . Atyo ashohora naatoora ogw'eirembo ; haza enkoko egamba .
41014069	Ogwo muzaana amureeba , agaruka agambira abari aho ati : Ogu muntu ni mugyenzi waabo .
41014070	Kwonka nabwo ayehakana . Ku haahingwireho akaanya kakye , abeemereire aho nabo baagambira Petero bati : Buzimazima ori ow'omuri bari , ahabw'okuba ori Omunyagalilaaya .
41014071	Kwonka atandika kwekyeena n'okurahira ati : Ogwo muntu ou murikugamba , nyowe tindikumumanya .
41014072	Ahonaaho enkoko ashubiirira . Petero nikwo kwijuka eki Yesu yaamugambira ati : Enkoko ku eraabe etakagambire kabiri , nooba waanyogire kashatu . Atyo ahimintika emiziga , arira munonga .
41015001	Ku bwabaire nibutaagurikana , abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abakuru omu ihanga , n'abahangu b'eiteeka , n'eishengyero ryona , baahanuura ; bwanyima baaboha Yesu , baamutwara , baamuha Pilaato .
41015002	Pilaato amubuuza ati : Weeza ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya ? Onu amugarukamu ati : Waakigamba .
41015003	Abahongyerezi abakuru bamutabaariza bingi .
41015004	Pilaato agaruka amubuuza ati : Toine ki orikugarukamu n'akakye ? Reeba ebi baakutabaariza ku biri bingi .
41015005	Nabwo Yesu tamugarukamu ; ekyo kitangaaza Pilaato .
41015006	Mbwenu ahari ibara bugyenyi nk'obwo , Pilaato akaba amanyiriire kubarekurira embohe ei baabaire bamushaba .
41015007	Obwo , omuntu orikwetwa Baraba akaba abohirwe hamwe n'abagomi abaitiire abantu omu kajagararo .
41015008	Ekimbuuro ky'abantu ku kyagiire kushaba Pilaato kubakorera eki ashangwa abakorera ,
41015009	Pilaato yaabagarukamu naababuuza ati : Nimwenda ngu mbarekurire Omugabe w'Abayudaaya ?
41015010	Ahabw'okuba akaba naamanya ku abahongyerezi abakuru bamuhaireyo ahabwa eihari .
41015011	Abahongyerezi abakuru nikwo kwimukiiriza ekimbuuro ky'abantu , ngu haakiri abarekurire Baraba .
41015012	Bwanyima Pilaato agaruka ababuuza ati : Mwbenu shi ou murikweta Omugabe w'Abayudaaya nimwenda ngu mmugire nta ?
41015013	Kwonka bo baagaruka baayomba nibamugarukamu bati : Mubambe aha musharaba !
41015014	Pilaato nikwo kubabuuza ati : Ahanki ? Akozire kibi ki ? Kwonka bo bayomba munonga okukiraho bati : Mubambe aha musharaba !
41015015	Mpaho Pilaato ahabw'okwenda kugwisa gye abantu , abarekurira Baraba ; kandi ku aheza kuragiira kuteera Yesu ebyasha , amuhayo kubambwa aha musharaba .
41015016	Abaserukare nikwo kutwara Yesu , bakamuta omu kibuga ky'omu kikaari ky'ogwo mutegyeki ; bakeeta eihe ryabo ryona , rikateeranira hamwe .
41015017	Bakamujweka omwenda gwa bujwa , bakazinga ekirunga ky'amahwa , bakakimujweka omu mutwe .
41015018	Bakatandika kumutangirira bati : Singa , Mugabe w'Abayudaaya !
41015019	Bakamuteera orubingo omu mutwe , bakamucwera amacwante , bakatsimba amaju nibamuramya .
41015020	Ku baaherize kumushungisa batyo , baamujuura ogwo mwenda gwa bujwa , baamujweka ebye ; baamushohoza nibaza kumubamba aha musharaba .
41015021	Mpaho baabugana omuhinguzi Simooni owa Kureene , ishe Alekisandero na Ruufo , owaabaire naaruga omu kyaro ; baamugyema kumwekorerera omusharaba .
41015022	Batyo baahitsya Yesu omu mwanya ogurikwetwa Gologota , amakuru gaakyo ngu , omwanya gw'Empanga y'Omutwe .
41015023	Baamuha viino etimbwirwemu entsinda , kwonka yaagyanga .
41015024	Bwanyima baamubamba aha musharaba ; baabagana ebijwaro bye nibabiteerera enteenyu , kumanya eki buri omwe araatware .
41015025	Obu baamubamba aha musharaba zikaba ziri shaaha ishatu .
41015026	Ekihandiiko ekirikumanyisa eki baamutuzire , kikaba nikigira kiti : OMUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA .
41015027	Kandi bakamubamba aha musharaba n'abambuzi babiri , omwe aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo , n'ondi aha rwa bumosho .
41015028	[ Ekyahandiikirwe kyabona kuhikiirira , ekirikugira kiti : Akabarirwa hamwe n'enkozi z'ebibi . ]
41015029	Abaabaire nibarabaho bakamutsyorera , nibamuha mutinzi , nibagira bati : Otyo ! Iwe orikusheenya Nyaruju okagaruka okagyombeka omu biro bishatu ,
41015030	mbwenu yejune , orugye aha musharaba !
41015031	Abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abahangu b'eiteeka nabo baamushungisa nibagambirana bati : Ku yaajunire abandi ; mbwenu k'ataabaasa kwejune !
41015032	Kristo ogwo , Omugabe wa Isiraeli , hati naatemburukye aha musharaba tukireebe , haza tumwikirize ! N'abu yaabaire abambirwe nabo , baaba nikwo baamujuma .
41015033	Eshaaha mukaaga ku zaahikire , ensi yoona yaashwekwa omwirima , okuhitsya aha shaaha ya mwenda .
41015034	Kandi aha shaaha ya mwenda , Yesu yaahooga ati : Eloi , Eloi , lama sabakitaani ? Ekirikumanyisa ngu , Ruhanga wangye , Ruhanga wangye , ahabw'enki wantsigaho ?
41015035	Bamwe aha baabaire beemereire aho , ku baakihuriire , baagira bati : Nimuhurire , naayeta Eliya !
41015036	Omwe aharibo yairuka , yaajabika ekyangu omu viino y'encenku ; yaakishokamu orubingo , yaakimuha kukinyuunyuuta , naagira ati : Murekye tureebe Eliya yaaba naija kumuhanura !
41015037	Mpaho Yesu ku yaaherize kuborooga n'eiraka rihango , gwahwamu .
41015038	Reero omukingo gwa Nyaruju gwatemukamu emitanda ebiri okwiha aha mutwe okuta ahansi .
41015039	Omukuru w'abaserukare igana , owaabaire amwemereire omu maisho , ku yaareebire yaitsya atyo ogw'aha muheru , yaagira ati : Buzimazima ogu muntu abaire ari Omwana wa Ruhanga !
41015040	Hakaba hariho abakazi abaabaire nibareebera hangahari ; omuribo harimu Mariya Magadaleena , na Mariya nyina wa Yakobo omuto na Yose , na Saalome ,
41015041	abaabaire bamukuratira akiri Galilaaya nibamuheereza , kandi hakaba hariho n'abandi bakazi baingi abaabaire baizire nawe Yerusalemu .
41015042	Omwabazyo ku gwakiikire , haza riri eizooba ry'Okweteguura , niryo ryebembera Sabato ,
41015043	Yosefu owa Arimataaya omuhanuuzi mukuru w'eishengyero , nawe owaabaire ategyereize obukama bwa Ruhanga , yaayetuurira Pilaato n'obumanzi , yaamushaba omutumbi gwa Yesu .
41015044	Pilaato kyamutangaaza okuhurira ngu yaafiire ; nikwo kweta omukuru w'abaserukare igana , akamubuuza ku araabe buzimazima yaafiire .
41015045	Ku yaaherize kumanyisibwa ku yaafiire , yaikiriza Yosefu kutwara omutumbi .
41015046	Mpaho onu yaagura omwenda gwa kitaani , yaahanura Yesu , yaamuzinga omuri ogwo mwenda , yaamuta omu kituuro ekyabaire kishorogotoroirwe omu rukiri ; bwanyima yaakumbagaza eibaare , yaarikinga aha munwa gwakyo .
41015047	Haza Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya nyina wa Yose baareeba ahi yaamuta .
41016001	Sabato ku yaahwaire , Mariya Magadaleena na Mariya nyina wa Yakobo na Saalome baagura eby'omugaju by'okuza kumusiiga .
41016002	Omu kasheeshe munonga aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki , baaza aha kituuro eizooba ryaturukire ;
41016003	baagambirana bati : N'oha oraatukumbagarize eibaare kuriiha aha munwa gw'ekituuro ?
41016004	Ku baanagireyo amaisho , baareeba eibaare , eryabaire riri rihango munonga , rikumbagaziibwe .
41016005	Ku baataahire omu kituuro , baareeba omutsigazi ojwaire ekanzu erikwera , ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo ; baatangaara .
41016006	Kwonka we yaabagira ati : Murekye kutangaara , manya nimusherura Yesu owa Nazareeti obambirwe aha musharaba . Azookire , tari aha ; nimureebe ahi babaire bamutaire .
41016007	Mbwenu nimwirooko , mugambire abatendekwa be na Petero , ku yaabeebembera kuza Galilaaya ; niyo muraamureebere nk'oku yaabagambiire .
41016008	Abo bakazi baashohora , baaruga aha kituuro , bairuka baine orutetema kandi nibatangaara ; haza tibaagira muntu weena ou baakigambira , ahabw'okuba bakaba bahahaire omutima .
41016009	[ Yesu , ku yaazookire omu kasheeshe , aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki , yaabanza kubonekyera Mariya Magadaleena , ou yaabaire abingireho ebyago mushanju .
41016010	Nawe yaagyenda , yaabigambira abu Yesu yaabaire atuura nabo , abaabaire nibacura , nibarira .
41016011	Kwonka ku yaabagambiire ngu ahuriire , kandi ngu yaamureeba , tibaikiriza .
41016012	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Yesu yaayeyoreka babiri ahari bo abaabaire nibaza omu kyaro , naashusha okundi .
41016013	Abo nabo baagarukayo , baabigambira abandi ; kwonka nabo tibaabaikiriza .
41016014	Bwanyima yaayeyoreka eikumi n'omwe nibarya . Yaabajuukirira ahabw'okutaikiriza n'okugangaaza emitima , ahabw'okuba tibaraikiriize by'abaamureebire aherize kuzooka omu bafiire .
41016015	Kandi yaabagira ati : Mugeyende omu nsi yoona , murangirire ebihangirwe byona Amakuru Marungi .
41016016	Oriikiriza akabatizibwa , aryajunwa ; kandi otariikiriza , aryasingwa orubanja .
41016017	Obu nibwo bumanyiso obu abaikiriza barimanyirwaho : baryabinga ebyago omu iziina ryangye , baryagamba endimi nsya ;
41016018	baryakwata enjoka , kandi ku barinywa ekirikwita kyona tikiribakora kubi ; baryata engaro aha barwaire , bakire .
41016019	Mpaho Mukama Yesu , ku yaaherize kugamba nabo , yaatwarwa omu iguru , yaashutama aha rubaju rwa buryo orwa Ruhanga .
41016020	Nabo baagyenda , baarangirira hoona , Mukama naakorera hamwe nabo kandi naahamya obutumwa bwabo n'obumanyiso obwabaire bukuratana nabwo . Amiina . ] [ Abahandiiki abamwe tibatamu mishororongo . Kandi abandi bahandiiki omu mwanya gw'emishorongo egyo bahendera Mariko n'ebigambo ebi : Abo bakazi , byona ebi baagambiirwe , baagyenda baabiteekyerereza Petero na bagyenzi be omu bigufu . Ebyo ku byahwaire , Yesu wenka yaatuma abo batendekwa be kurangirira hoonahoona amakuru ge agarikwera kandi agahuriire ag'okujunwa kw'ebiro n'ebiro . ]
42001001	Ow'ekitiinwa Teofilo , abantu baingi bakateeraho kuhandiika ebyabaireho omuriitwe .
42001002	Haza ebyo bakabiiha aha bi twagambiirwe abaabyereebeire n'agaabo okwiha obu byatandika , kandi bakatumwa kubirangirira .
42001003	Mbwenu naanye , ku naaherize kubicondooza byona okwiha aha kutandika , naasiima kubikuhandiikira nk'oku byakurataine ,
42001004	ngu obone kumanya ebi waayegyesiibwe ku biri eby'amazima .
42001005	Omu busingye bwa Herode omugabe wa Buyudaaya , hakaba hariho omuhongyerezi orikwetwa Zekariya ow'ab'omu rubu rwa Abiiya , n'omukazi we ow'omuri baijukuru ba Arooni , owaabaire naayetwa Elisaabeeti .
42001006	Bombi bakaba bari abahikiriire omu maisho ga Ruhanga , nibahikiiriza ebiragiro bya Nyakubaho byona n'ebyateirweho , bataine kamogo .
42001007	Kwonka bakaba bari encwekye , ahabw'okuba Elisaabeeti akaba ari engumba , kandi bombi bakaba baakuzire .
42001008	Mbwenu ku rwabaire ruri orubu rw'abahongyerezi abu Zekariya yaabaire arimu , Zekariya ogwo akaba naakorera Ruhanga omurimo gwe ogw'obuhongyerezi .
42001009	Obwo yaakwatwa enteenyu nk'oku omugyenzo gw'abahongyerezi gwabaire guri , kutaaha omu mwanya ogurikwera ogwa Nyakubaho kwotereramu obubaani .
42001010	Omuri ago magingo g'okwotereramu obubaani , ekimbuuro ky'abantu abarikuramya kikaba kiri aheeru nikishaba .
42001011	Mpaho maraika wa Nyakubaho yaamubonekyera , ayemereire aha rubaju rwa buryo orw'eitambiro eryotererwaho obubaani .
42001012	Zekariya ku yaamureebire , yaayekanga aitsirwe obwoba .
42001013	Kwonka maraika yaamugira ati : Zekariya , huumura . Manya eki otuura nooshaba kiikiriziibwe ; omukazi waawe Elisaabeeti aryakuzaarira omwana omwojo , omwete Yohaana .
42001014	Aryakureetera okushemererwa n'okunanuka , kandi ku arizaarwa , baingi baryayesiima ,
42001015	ahabw'okuba aryaba mukuru omu maisho ga Nyakubaho . Tarinywa viino nobu kyakuba ekirikusinza kyona . Aryaijura Mutima Orikwera akiri omunda ya nyina ,
42001016	kandi aryagarura Abaisiraeli baingi ahari Mukama Ruhanga waabo .
42001017	Aryamwebembera aine omutima n'amaani nk'ebya Eliya , ahindure emitima y'abazaire , ngu bagarukane n'abaana baabo , kandi ahindure abagomi , babone kugira obwengye bw'abahikiriire , atyo atebeekanisize Mukama abantu abamweteekateekyeire .
42001018	Zekariya nikwo kubuuza maraika ati : Nyowe ekyo ninkihamiza hi ? Ndi omugurusi kandi omukazi wangye akaikwire .
42001019	Maraika yaamugarukamu ati : Manya niinye Gaaburieli ogaragira Ruhanga . Mbwenu naatumwa kugamba naiwe n'okukumanyisa egyo nkuru nungi .
42001020	Kwonka hati nk'oku otaikiriza bi naakugambira , ebirihikiirira omu bunaku bwabyo obwatairweho , waaza kwigarwa akanwa , obure agagamba okuhitsya obu ebyo biribaho .
42001021	Omuri ago magingo abantu bakaguma bategyereize Zekariya , nibatangaara okureeba yaasiiba munonga omu mwanya ogurikwera .
42001022	Ku yaashohoire , tiyaabaasa kugamba nabo , baamanyiraho ku yaabonekyererwayo ; kwonka we yaaguma naakoresa obumanyiso , orurimi rugobirwe .
42001023	Orubu rwe rw'okuheereza ku rwahwaire , yaagaruka omuka .
42001024	Ku haahingwireho akaanya , omukazi we Elisaabeeti yaabaka enda , yaamara ameezi ataano atarikureebwa naagira ati :
42001025	Eki nikyo Mukama ankoreire obu asiimire kuunyihaho ekihemu omu bantu .
42001026	Elisaabeeti ku yaabaire ahikize ameezi mukaaga aine enda , maraika Gaaburieli yaatumwa Ruhanga omu rurembo rw'omuri Galilaaya orurikwetwa Nazareeti ,
42001027	aha mwishiki oshugaine , owaabaire ari ow'okuhingirwa omushaija orikwetwa Yosefu , ow'oruganda rwa Daudi . Omwishiki ogwo akaba naayetwa Mariya .
42001028	Maraika ku yaizire ahu ari , yaamugira ati : Shemererwa , iwe omutetsibwa buzima , Nyakubaho ari naiwe !
42001029	Mariya ebigambo ebyo byamuhuruutura omutima , yaayebuuza eki yaamuramukiza atyo .
42001030	Maraika nikwo kumugira ati : Mariya , huumura ! Manya ohairwe obutetsi ahari Ruhanga .
42001031	Reeba , noija kubaka enda , ozaare omwana omwojo , omwete Yesu .
42001032	Aryaba mukuru , ayetwe Omwana wa Rukiraboona . Mukama Ruhanga aryamuha engoma ya Daudi ishenkuru ;
42001033	ategyekye ab'oruzaaro rwa Yakobo obusingye bwona , n'obugabe bwe tiburihwaho .
42001034	Mariya yaabuuza maraika ati : Ekyo nikibaasika kita , nyowe ntaine mushaija ?
42001035	Maraika yaamugarukamu ati : Mutima Orikwera aryakwijaho , n'amaani ga Rukiraboona gakusangire . N'ahabw'ekyo ogwo mwana aryaba Orikwera , ayetwe Omwana wa Ruhanga .
42001036	Kandi reeba , na Elisaabeeti , ow'oruganda rwanyu ou babaire beeta engumba , hati omu bukaikuru bwe aine enda y'omwana omwojo y'ameezi mukaaga .
42001037	Manya tihariho kitabaasika ahari Ruhanga .
42001038	Mariya nikwo kugira ati : Reeba , ndi omuzaana wa Nyakubaho , ka kibe nk'oku waagamba . Mpaho maraika amutsigaho .
42001039	Omu bunaku obwo Mariya akaimuka , yaayehuuta , yaaza omu kyaro eky'omu nsi y'ebibungo omuri Buyudaaya .
42001040	Yaataaha omwa Zekariya , yaaramutsya Elisaabeeti .
42001041	Elisaabeeti ku yaahuriire ati Mariya naamuramutsya , omwana yaagurukaguruka omu nda ye . Elisaabeeti yaijura Mutima Orikwera .
42001042	Obwo yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Oine omugisha okukira abakazi boona , n'omwana w'omu nda yaawe aine omugisha !
42001043	Mbwenu nyowe kyandugira hi nyina wa Mukama wangye okunzindukira ?
42001044	Reeba , ku naahurira nti nondamutsya , omwana w'omu nda yangye yaagurukaguruka ahabw'okushemererwa .
42001045	Buzimazima owaikiriize ebi Ruhanga yaamuraganiise ngu biryahikiirira , aine omugisha !
42001046	Mpaho Mariya agira ati : Amagara gangye nigahimbisa Nyakubaho ,
42001047	n'omutima gwangye nigwesingiriza omuri Ruhanga omujuni wangye ,
42001048	ahabw'okuba areebire obucureezi bw'omuzaana we ! Mbwenu okwiha hati ab'obusingye bwona baryaguma baanyete ow'omugisha ,
42001049	ahabw'okuba Omushoboorozi wa byona ankoreire bikuru . Eiziina rye n'eririkwera .
42001050	Embabazi ze azigirira abamutiina obusingye bwona .
42001051	Omukono gwe agukoreise eby'amaani ; yaataataana ab'emitima eyetunguura .
42001052	Ab'obushoboorozi abaihire aha bitebe , yaatunguura abacureezi .
42001053	Abaine enjara yaabaigutsa ebirungi , abatungi yaababinga engaro nsha .
42001054	Ahweraire Isiraeli omugaragwa we , naijuka embabazi ze ,
42001055	nk'oku yaaraganiise baatatenkuriitwe , Aburahamu n'abaijukuru obusingye bwona !
42001056	Mariya akaguma na Elisaabeeti ameezi nk'ashatu , bwanyima yaagaruka owaabo .
42001057	Ebiro bya Elisaabeeti ku byahikire , yaazaara omwana omwojo .
42001058	Bataahi be n'abanyabuzaare ku baahuriire oku Nyakubaho amugiriire embabazi nyingi , baashemererwa hamwe nawe .
42001059	Omwana ku yaahikize ebiro munaana , baija kumushara ; bakaba nibenda kumweta Zekariya , eiziina rya ishe ;
42001060	kwonka nyina yaabangira naagira ati : Ngaaha , ayetwe Yohaana .
42001061	Baamugarukamu bati : Ka hatariho n'omwe omu ruganda rwanyu oyetwa eryo iziina .
42001062	Batyo baabuzisa ishe engaro oku arikwenda ogwo mwana ayetwe .
42001063	Ishe yaabashaba eky'okuhandiikaho ; yaahandiika ati : Eiziina rye ni Yohaana . Boona baatangaara .
42001064	Omuri ako kaanya orurimi rwe rwakomooroka , yaatandika kugamba kandi yaahimbisa Ruhanga .
42001065	Bataahi baabo boona baakwatwa obwoba ; ebyabaireho byona byagambwa omu nsi ya Buyudaaya yoona ey'ebibungo .
42001066	Boona abaabihuriire baabigumya aha mutima nibeebuuza bati : Beitu ogu mwana aryarugamu muntu ki ? Kandi buzimazima amaani ga Nyakubaho gakaguma nawe .
42001067	Zekariya ishe akaijura Mutima Orikwera , yaaranga ati :
42001068	Mukama Ruhanga wa Isiraeli ahimbisibwe , ahabw'okuba aizire kujuna abantu be .
42001069	Atwimukiize Omujuni w'obushoboorozi omu b'oruzaaro rwa Daudi omugaragwa we ,
42001070	nk'oku ira yaaraganisiize omu barangi be abarikwera ,
42001071	ngu aryatujuna abazigu , atwihe omu mikono y'abarikutwanga boona .
42001072	Eki akikozire kworeka embabazi ezi yaaraganiise baatatenkuriitwe , n'okwijuka endagaano ye erikwera .
42001073	Endahiro ei yaarahiire Aburahamu tataitwe ,
42001074	ngu atwihe omu mikono y'abazigu baitu , tubone kumuheereza tutaine bwoba ,
42001075	nitwera kandi tuhikiriire omu maisho ge , ebiro by'amagara gaitu byona .
42001076	Naiwe mwana ' we , oryayetwa omurangi wa Rukiraboona , ahabw'okuba niiwe oryebembera Mukama kumutebeekanisiza omuhanda ,
42001077	n'okumanyisa abantu be okujunwa oku batunga baasaasirwa ebibi byabo .
42001078	Ruhanga waitu ahabw'embabazi ze enyingi , aryatureetera omushekye gujugute ,
42001079	gumurikire abari omu mwirima n'omu kibunda kya rufu , n'okushoronzya ebigyere byaitu omu muhanda gw'obusingye .
42001080	Omwana ogwo akaguma naakura , yaahama omu mutima , kandi yaatuura omu ihamba okuhitsya obu yaayeyorekire Isiraeli .
42002001	Omu biro ebyo Kaisaari-Augusto akashohoza ekiragiro , ngu abantu b'omu nsi yoona beehandiikise .
42002002	Okwehandiikisa okwo okw'okubanza kukabaho obu Kwirinio yaabaire ari omutegyeki wa Siriya .
42002003	Mpaho buri omwe yaaza omu rurembo rw'owaabo kuhandiikwa .
42002004	Na Yosefu yaaruga omuri Nazareeti ey'omuri Galilaaya , yainamuka Buyudaaya , omu rurembo rwa Daudi orurikwetwa Beetelehemu , ahabw'okuba akaba ari ow'oruzaaro rwa Daudi kandi ow'omuryango gwe .
42002005	Yaazayo kwehandiikisa na Mariya , ou yaabaire naagamba obugyenyi , aine enda .
42002006	Ku baabaire bakiri okwo , obunaku bwe bw'okuzaara bwahika .
42002007	Yaazaara omwana omwojo omujigaijo , yaamushembashemba omu twenda , yaamubyamya omu kaato k'ente ahabw'okuburirwa omwanya omu nju y'abagyenyi .
42002008	Omu nsi egyo hakaba hariyo abariisa , abaabaire baraara omu ishwa , barinzire entaama zaabo nibaihaihana .
42002009	Maraika wa Nyakubaho akababonekyera , n'ekitiinwa kya Nyakubaho kyabaakira kibeehinguririize ; baatiina munonga .
42002010	Kwonka maraika yaabagira ati : Muhuumure ! Manya naabaijanira enkuru nungi , eraareetere abantu boona okushemererwa kwingi .
42002011	Eri izooba omujuni , niwe Kristo Mukama , yaabazaarirwa omu rurembo rwa Daudi .
42002012	Eki nikyo kiraababeere akamanyiso : nimwija kushanga omwereere ashembashembirwe omu twenda abyami omu kaato k'ente .
42002013	Ahonaaho hamwe na maraika ogwo hakabaho ekimbuuro kihango kya baamaraika , baahimbisa Ruhanga nibeeshongora bati :
42002014	Ruhanga aheebwe ekitiinwa ahaiguru owa Herebe ! N'abantu abu asiima bagire obusingye omu nsi !
42002015	Baamaraika , ku baaherize kubarugaho , baagaruka omu iguru ; abariisa baagambirana bati : Ka tuze Beetelehemu , tureebe ekyo ekyabaho , eki Nyakubaho yaatumanyisa .
42002016	Batyo baayehuuta , baahika ahi Mariya na Yosefu baabaire bari , baashanga omwereere abyami omu kaato k'ente .
42002017	Ku baamureebire , baagaruka baabaruura ebi baagambirwa ahariwe ,
42002018	kandi boona abaakihuriire baatangaarira ebi abo bariisa baabagambira .
42002019	Kwonka Mariya akagumya ebyo bigambo aha mutima naabiteekateekaho munonga .
42002020	Mpaho abariisa baagarukayo nibaha Ruhanga ekitiinwa , kandi nibamuhimbisa ahabwa byona ebi bahuriire n'ebi bareebire , ahabw'okuba buzimazima bikaba nk'oku babigambiirwe .
42002021	Ekiro kya munaana ku kyahikire , obunaku bw'omwana kusharwa bwahika , baamweta eiziina Yesu , eri maraika yaamwetsire atakabakirwe .
42002022	Obunaku bwabo bw'okwezibwa ku bwahikire , nk'oku kyaragiirwe omu iteeka rya Musa , baamwinamura Yerusalemu kumuhongyera Nyakubaho ,
42002023	nibakuratira ekyahandiikirwe omu iteeka rya Nyakubaho , ekirikugira kiti : Buri kiigura-nda kyona ekishaija n'eky'okuhongyerwa Nyakubaho ;
42002024	kandi n'okuhayo ekiraatambwe , amaiba abiri nari obwana bw'enkombe bubiri , nk'oku kirikuragiirwa omu iteeka rya Nyakubaho .
42002025	Mbwenu obwo omuri Yerusalemu hakaba harimu omushaija orikwetwa Simeoni , omuntu ohikiriire kandi orikukunda Ruhanga . Akaba atuura ategyereize obunaku obu Isiraeli erihuumurizibwamu , kandi na Mutima Orikwera amuriho .
42002026	Mutima Orikwera akaba amushuuruuriire , ngu tarifa atakareebire Kristo wa Mukama .
42002027	Akaija omuri Yerusalemu amurikiirwe Mutima ogwo ; kandi abazaire ku baareetsiremu omwana Yesu kumukorera nk'oku eiteeka ririkuragiira ,
42002028	yaamwakiira , yaamukiikira omu mikono , yaahimbisa Ruhanga naagira ati :
42002029	Nyakubaho wangye , mbwenu waaza kureka omuheereza waawe agyende n'obusingye nk'oku waaraganiise .
42002030	Ahabw'okuba naayereebera okujuna kwawe ,
42002031	oku waateekateekire kureebwa amahanga goona ,
42002032	kuba omushana gw'okumurikira Abanyamahanga , n'okuba ekitiinwa ky'abantu baawe Abaisiraeli .
42002033	Ishe na nyina w'omwana ku baabaire nibatangaarira ebyabaire nibimugambwaho ,
42002034	Simeoni yaabaha omugisha , yaagira Mariya nyina ati : Omwana ogu akateebwaho , ngu baingi omuri Isiraeli bagwe , kandi baingi baimukye . Akateebwaho kuba akamanyiso aku batariikiriza ,
42002035	ngu ebiteekateeko by'abaingi bibone kushuuruuka ; kandi naiwe rurara eryakucumita omutima .
42002036	Reero hakaba hariho omurangikazi Ana , muhara wa Fanueli , ow'omu ruganda rwa Asheri , owaabaire akaikwire munonga . Ebiro bye eby'obuhangare ku byahwaire ,
42002037	yaamara emyaka mushanju ashweirwe , atakabaire mufaakazi . Mbwenu obwo akaba ahikize emyaka makumi munaana n'ena y'obukuru , kandi akaba ataruga muri Nyaruju , naahereza Ruhanga nyomushana na nyekiro , ataireho okwesiibyakwo n'okushaba .
42002038	Ku yaizire omuri ako kaanya , yaatandika kuhimbisa Ruhanga ; eby'ogwo mwana yaabigambira boona abaabaire batuura bategyereize okucungurwa kwa Yerusalemu .
42002039	Ku baaherize kukora byona nk'oku eiteeka rya Nyakubaho ryabaire riragiira , baagaruka Galilaaya omu rurembo rw'owaabo orwa Nazareeti .
42002040	Okwiha obwo omwana yaakura , yaagira amaani n'obwengye bwingi , naasiimwa Ruhanga .
42002041	Buri mwaka abazaire ba Yesu bakaba baza Yerusalemu aha Bugyenyi bw'okwijuka Okuhingurwaho .
42002042	Ku yaahikize emyaka ikumi n'ebiri , bainamuka kuza ahari obwo bugyenyi nk'obutoosha .
42002043	Ku baabaire nibagaruka owaabo nibaruga aha bugyenyi , ogwo mwana Yesu yaatsigara Yerusalemu abazaire be batakimanyire .
42002044	Baateekateeka ngu , shana ari omu kimbuuro ky'abandi bagyenzi . Ku baaherize kugyenda eizooba ryona , baaza kumusherura omu banyabuzaare n'omu bamanyi .
42002045	Ku baaremirwe kumubona , baakuba , baagaruka Yerusalemu nibamusherura hoonahoona .
42002046	Ku haahingwireho ebiro bishatu , baamushanga omuri Nyaruju ashutami ahagati y'abeegyesa abakuru , abategire okutu kandi naababuuza .
42002047	Boona abaamuhuriire baatangaarira obwengye bwe n'oku arikubagarukamu .
42002048	Abazaire be ku baamureebire , baatangaara . Nyina yaamugira ati : Mwana wangye , otutuzire ki ? Reeba oku sho naanye tufiire kubi nitukusherura .
42002049	Nawe abagarukamu ati : Mubaire nimunsherurira ki ? Timurikumanya ku nshemereire kwehenengyera ebya Tata ?
42002050	Kwonka bo tibaashoboorokyerwa makuru g'eki yaagamba .
42002051	Atyo yaashuuma nabo , baaza Nazareeti , yaaguma naabahurira . Nyina yaagumya ebyo byona aha mutima .
42002052	Na Yesu yaayeyongyera kukura omu bwengye n'omu mubiri , naasiimwa Ruhanga n'abantu .
42003001	Omu mwaka gwa ikumi n'etaano ogw'omu busingye bwa Tiberio-Kaisaari , Pontio Pilaato obu yaabaire ari omutegyeki wa Buyudaaya , Herode ari ow'eishaza rya Galilaaya , na Filipo mwene ishe ari ow'eishaza ry'ebyanga bya Ituraaya na Turakoniiti , Lusaniya ari ow'eishaza rya Abileene ,
42003002	kandi Anasi na Kayaafa bari abahongyerezi abakuru , ekigambo kya Ruhanga kikaizira Yohaana mwene Zekariya omu ihamba .
42003003	Yaagyenda naaraba omu nsi yoona ehereeraine na Yorudaani , naarangirira abantu , ngu beegarukyemu , babatizibwe , babone kusaasirwa ebibi .
42003004	Manya kikahandiikwa omu kitabo ky'ebyagambirwe omurangi Isaaya , ngu : Hariho orikwamuriza omu ihamba , ati : Mutebeekanisize Mukama omuhanda , mugorore otuhanda twe .
42003005	Ekyetwa oruhanga kiijuzibwe , orushozi rwona n'ekibungo kyona bibandikwe , emihanda ekiikami egororwe , enguuto ezitaringaniire ziringaanizibwe
42003006	haza abantu boona bareebe okujuna kwa Ruhanga .
42003007	Abantu baingi bakaija ahari Yohaana ngu ababatize ; nawe nikwo kubagira ati : Imwe baana b'empiri ' mwe , n'oha obahabwire kuhunga ekiniga ekirikwenda kwija ?
42003008	Mbwenu , ku muraabe mwegarukiremu , nimukyorekyere omu mitwarize yaanyu , kandi murekye kweraata nimwegambaho muti : Niho twine Aburahamu tataitwe . Manya nimbagambira nti : Ruhanga amabaare aga naabaasa kugaihiramu Aburahamu abaijukuru .
42003009	Nangwa na hati empango etairwe aha mizi y'emiti . N'ahabw'ekyo omuti gwona ogutarikwana bijuma birungi nigwija kutemwa , gunagwe omu muriro .
42003010	Abantu nikwo kumubuuza bati : Mbwenu shi , tukore ki ?
42003011	Yaabagarukamu ati : Oraabe aine amakanzu abiri aheho otariine , n'oine ebyokurya atwaze atyo .
42003012	Abashorooza b'omushoro abaizire kubatizibwa nabo baamugira bati : Mwegyesa , itwe tugire tuta ?
42003013	Yaabagambira ati : Mutarishorooza ebirikukira ebi mwaragiirwe .
42003014	Abaserukare nabo baamubuuza bati : Mbwenu itwe nootugambaho ki ? Tushemereire kutwaza tuta ? Yaabagarukamu ati : Mutarinyaga abantu nimubabeiherera nari nimubatakisa , kureka mumarwe ebihembo byanyu .
42003015	Abantu ku baabaire bategyereize n'ekihika nibateekateeka ahari Yohaana , ngu shana niwe Kristo ,
42003016	Yohaana yaabagambirira hamwe boona ati : Nyowe nimbabatiza n'amaizi , kwonka hariho ondi orikunkiza obushoboorozi orikwenda kwija , ou ntashemereire kukomoorora orukoba rw'enkaito ze . We aryababatiza na Mutima Orikwera kandi n'omuriro .
42003017	Orugari rwe rw'okuheheeza rumuri omu ngaro ; naija kweyerera embuga ye n'okuhunika engano ye omu kitara kye ; reero ebishushunga abyotsye omu muriro ogutaraara .
42003018	Hariho n'ebindi bingi ebi yaayehanangiriize abantu naabagambira amakuru marungi .
42003019	Kwonka ow'eishaza Herode ou Yohaana yaabaire ateisize ahabwa Herodiya muka mwene ishe , n'ahabw'ebindi bicumuro ebi yaabaire akozire ,
