42003020	ahari ebyo byona akongyeraho n'eky'okuta Yohaana ogwo mu kihome .
42003021	Abantu boona ku baaherize kubatizibwa , Yesu nawe yaabatizibwa . Ku yaabaire naashaba , eiguru ryakinguuka ,
42003022	Mutima Orikwera yaamushuumaho naashusha nk'enkombe , kandi eiraka ryayema omu iguru nirigira riti : Niiwe Mwana wangye ou nkunda , kandi ou nshemerererwa munonga .
42003023	Yesu akatandika obutumwa bwe aine emyaka nka makumi ashatu y'obukuru , kandi akaba naateekateekwaho kuba mwene Yosefu , Yosefu mwene Heeli ,
42003024	Heeli mwene Matati , Matati mwene Leevi , Leevi mwene Meleki , Meleki mwene Yanai , Yanai mwene Yosefu ,
42003025	Yosefu mwene Matatiya , Matatiya mwene Amosi , Amosi mwene Nahumu , Nahumu mwene Esili , Esili mwene Nagayi ,
42003026	Nagayi mwene Maati , Maati mwene Matatiya , Matatiya mwene Semei , Semei mwene Yoseki , Yoseki mwene Yooda ,
42003027	Yooda mwene Yoana , Yoana mwene Reesa , Reesa mwene Zerubabeeli , Zerubabeeli mwene Shealitieli , Shealitieli mwene Neeri ,
42003028	Neeri mwene Meleki , Meleki mwene Adi , Adi mwene Koosamu , Koosamu mwene Elimoodamu , Elimoodamu mwene Eri ,
42003029	Eri mwene Yoshua , Yoshua mwene Eliezeeri , Eliezeeri mwene Yorimu , Yorimu mwene Matati , Matati mwene Leevi ,
42003030	Leevi mwene Simeoni , Simeoni mwene Yuda , Yuda mwene Yosefu , Yosefu mwene Yonani , Yonani mwene Eliyakimu ,
42003031	Eliyakimu mwene Melea , Melea mwene Menaani , Menaani mwene Matata ; Matata mwene Natani , Natani mwene Daudi ,
42003032	Daudi mwene Yese , Yese mwene Obedi , Obedi mwene Boazi , Boazi mwene Sala , Sala mwene Nahashooni ,
42003033	Nahashooni mwene Aminadabu , Aminadabu mwene Adimini , Adimini mwene Arini , Arini mwene Hezirooni , Hezirooni mwene Perezi , Perezi mwene Yuda ,
42003034	Yuda mwene Yakobo , Yakobo mwene Isaaka , Isaaka mwene Aburahamu , Aburahamu mwene Teera , Teera mwene Nahori
42003035	Nahori mwene Serugi , Serugi mwene Reu , Reu mwene Pelegi , Pelegi mwene Eberi , Eberi mwene Sheela ,
42003036	Sheela mwene Kainaani , Kainaani mwene Arifakisaadi , Arifakisadi mwene Sheemu , Sheemu mwene Noa , Noa mwene Lameki ,
42003037	Lameki mwene Metusela , Metuseela mwene Enoka , Enoka mwene Kainaani ,
42003038	Kainaani mwene Enosi , Enosi mwene Seeti , Seeti mwene Adamu , na Adamu owa Ruhanga .
42004001	Yesu akaruga Yorudaani , aijwire Mutima Orikwera owaamutwaire omu ihamba ;
42004002	yaamarayo ebiro makumi ana naayohibwa Sitaane . Ebiro ebyo byona akaba ataine ki arikurya ; aha muheru yaagira enjara .
42004003	Sitaane nikwo kumugira ati : Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga , ragiira eri ibaare rihindukye ekyokurya .
42004004	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Kikahandiikwa ngu : Omuntu tatungwa byokurya byonka .
42004005	Mpaho Sitaane amutwara ahatunguukire munonga ; omu kaanya kakye amworeka obugabe bwona obw'omu nsi ,
42004006	amugira ati : Niinyija kukuha ekitiinwa kyabwo n'obushoboorozi bw'okubutegyeka , ahabw'okuba nkabuheebwa kandi mbuha ou ndikwenda .
42004007	Mbwenu ku orandamye , byona nibiija kuba ebyawe .
42004008	Kwonka Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Kikahandiikwa ngu : Ogume oramye Mukama Ruhanga waawe , kandi we wenka obe niwe waaheereza .
42004009	Bwanyima yaamutwara Yerusalemu , yaamwemereza aha itungu rya Nyaruju , yaamugira ati : Ku oraabe ori Omwana wa Ruhanga , yerekyere oyenagye ahansi ,
42004010	ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa ngu : Aryakukwatsa baamaraika be bakurinde .
42004011	Kandi ngu : Baryakutega emikono , ngu orekye kuhonda ekigyere kyawe aha ibaare .
42004012	Kwonka Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Kikagambwa ngu : Otaryosya Mukama Ruhanga waawe .
42004013	Sitaane ku yaamazireyo ebyo byosyo byona , yaamurugaho , kugaruka obundi bunaku .
42004014	Yesu akagaruka Galilaaya aine amaani ga Mutima ; okurangaanwa kwe kwabuga hoona ;
42004015	yaayegyesa omu mateeraniro gaabo , buri omwe yaamusiima .
42004016	Yesu akahika Nazareeti ei yaakuriire , yaataaha omu iteeraniro ryabo aha izooba rya Sabato , nk'oku yaabaire atwaza . Yaayemerera kushoma ekitabo ,
42004017	baamukwtsa ekitabo kya Isaaya omurangi . Ku yaakikuburiire , yaashanga ahahandiikirwe hati :
42004018	Mutima wa Nyakubaho ari ahariinye , ahabw'okuba akampaasirira nansiiga amajuta . Yantuma kugambira abooro amakuru marungi , okurangira enkwatwa okurekurwa , n'empumi okuhumuurwa , n'okuseetura abasiitagwirwe ,
42004019	n'okuranga omwaka ogu Nyakubaho arigiriramu embabazi .
42004020	Atyo Yesu yaakuba ekyo kitabo , yaakigarurira omuheereza , yaashutama . Boona abaabaire bari omu iteeraniro baamuhanga amaisho .
42004021	Nawe yaatandika kubagambira ati : Ekyahandiikirwe ekyo eki mwahurira , eri izooba kyahikiirizibwa .
42004022	Boona baamusiimira kimwe kandi baatangaarira ebigambo by'embabazi ebi yaagamba . Baabuuzana bati : Kwokwo , ogu ni mutabani wa Yosefu ?
42004023	Kwonka we yaabagarukamu ati : Timurikwija kubura kundengyeza muti : Iwe mufumu ' we , banza oyetambire ; kandi n'okungira ngu : Tukahurira byona ebi waakoreire Kafarinaumu , mbwenu obikorere n'aha omu kyanga kyawe .
42004024	Yaagumizamu ati : Nimbagambirira kimwe ku hatariho murangi osiimwa omu nsi y'owaabo .
42004025	Buzimazima nimbahamiza ku haabaire hariho abafaakazi baingi omuri Isiraeli omu biro bya Eliya , obu eiguru ritaragwisize njura kumara emyaka eshatu n'ameezi mukaaga , ensi yoona ekateerwa enjara mpango ;
42004026	kwonka Eliya ogwo taratumirwe hari omwe omuribo , kureka akatumwa aha mufaakazi wa Sarepita , ekirorero ky'omuri Sidoni .
42004027	Kandi omu biro bya Elisha hakaba hariho ababembe baingi omuri Isiraeli , kwonka tihariho n'omwe omuribo owaatambiirwe , kureka Naamani Omunyasiriya .
42004028	Ku baahuriire ekyo , buri omwe omu iteeraniro ekiniga kyamuzingiza .
42004029	Baimuka nibamukurubana , baamushohoza omu rurembo rwabo , baamuhitsya aha ndeebareebo y'ekibungo eki baabaire bombekireho orurembo rwabo , ngu bamukumbagarize aha nengo ;
42004030	kwonka we yaaboogamu , yaayegyendera .
42004031	Yesu akashuuma , yaaza Kafarinaumu , ekirorero ky'omuri Galilaaya , ahari Sabato yaabeegyesa .
42004032	Baatangaarira munonga emyegyeseze ye , ahabw'okuba akagambisa obushoboorozi .
42004033	Omu iteeraniro eryo hakaba harimu omushaija owaabaire ariho ekyago . Ekyo kyago kyamuboroozya kiti :
42004034	Iwe Yesu owa Nazareeti , noofa ki naitwe ? Oizire kutucwekyereza ? Ninkumanya ku ori Orikwera owa Ruhanga .
42004035	Yesu yaakikabukira ati : Igara akanwa , omurugyeho ! Mpaho ekyo kyago kyamutuura ahansi omu maisho g'abantu , kyamurugaho kitamukozire kubi .
42004036	Boona baatangaara nibagambirana bati : Ebishi , ebigambo bye tibyekuratiire ! Naaragiiza amaani n'obushoboorozi ebyago , haza bishohora .
42004037	Okurangaanwa kwe kwabuga omu nsi zoona ezeehinguririizeho .
42004038	Yesu ku yaarugire omu iteeraniro eryo , yaaza omwa Simooni . Obwo nyinazaara wa Simooni akaba arwaire omushwija mwingi , baamushaba kugira eki yaamukorera .
42004039	Ku yaamwinamireho , yaakabukira ogwo mushwija , gwamurugaho . Ahonaaho ogwo mukazi yaimuka , yaatandika kubaheereza .
42004040	Eizooba ku ryabaire nirirengarenga , boona abaabaire baine abaabo abarwaire endwara zitari zimwe , baabamureetera , yaabakiza naabataho engaro .
42004041	Kandi n'ebyago bikaruga aha bantu baingi nibiborooga biti : Ori Omwana wa Ruhanga . Kwonka yaabikabukira , tiyaabiikiriza kugamba , ahabw'okuba bikaba nibimanya ku ari Kristo .
42004042	Ku bwaseesire , Yesu yaaruga omu nju , yaaza omu mwanya ogutarimu bantu . Ekimbuuro ky'abantu kyaza kumusherura ; ku baamuhikire , baayenda kumuzibira kubarugaho ;
42004043	kwonka yaabagarukamu ati : Nyowe ndi ow'okubuzya Amakuru Marungi g'obukama bwa Ruhanga n'omu zindi ndembo , ahabw'okuba ekyo nikyo naatumirwe kukora .
42004044	Atyo yaagumizamu naayegyesa omu mateeraniro ga Buyudaaya .
42005001	Eizooba rimwe Yesu akaba ayemereire haihi n'enyanja ya Genesareeti , aine ekimbuuro ky'abantu nikimumiganiraho kuhurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga .
42005002	Yaanaga amaisho , yaareeba amaato abiri gari haihi n'enkungu y'enyanja . Abajubi bakaba bagarugiremu niboozya obutimba bwabo .
42005003	Yaaza omu bwato bumwe obwabaire buri obwa Simooni , yaamushaba ku abwirizayo kakye kuruga aha nkungu . Atyo yaabushutamamu , yaayegyesa abantu .
42005004	Ku yaaherize kwegyesa , yaagira Simooni ati : Nimwirire ahagati y'enyanja , mutegye obutimba bwanyu mubone kukwatsa .
42005005	Simooni yaamugarukamu ati : Mwegyesa , turaire nitwehenenga , twabura eki twakwatsa ; kwonka ahabw'eki waagamba ka ntegye obutimba .
42005006	Ku baakozire batyo , baakwatsa ebyenyanja bingi munonga , obutimba bwabo bwatandika kucweka ;
42005007	batyo baayetesa engaro bagyenzi baabo abaabaire bari omu bundi bwato , kwija kubakwatsa . Baija baijuza ago maato gombi , gaabura hakye kumirwa .
42005008	Simooni Petero ku yaakireebire , yaajuumara aha bigyere bya Yesu naagira ati : Mukama wangye , ndeka , manya ndi omusiisi !
42005009	Ahabw'okuba we n'abu yaabaire aine boona bakagwa omu katangaaro , ahabw'ebyenyanja bingi ebi baakwatsire ,
42005010	kandi Yakobo na Yohaana beene Zebedaayo , bagyenzi ba Simooni , nabo bakatangaara . Mpaho Yesu yaagambira Simooni ati : Otatiina ; okwiha hati noija kuguma noojuba abantu .
42005011	Ku baahikize amaato gaabo aha nkungu , baatsigaho byona , baamukuratira .
42005012	Yesu ku yaabaire ari omu kirorero kimwe , haija omushaija obembire weena . Ku yaareebire Yesu , yaajuumara yaamweshengyereza ati : Mukama wangye , ku oraabe nookisiima , noobaasa kunshemeza .
42005013	Yesu yaagorora omukono , yaamukoraho naagira ati : Eego ninkisiima , shemera . Ahonaaho ebibembe byamurugaho .
42005014	Yaamuragiira ati : Otagira ou waakigambira , kureka irooko oyeyorekye omuhogyerezi , kandi ahabw'okushemezibwa kwawe ohongye eki Musa yaaragiire kuhamiza abantu .
42005015	Okurangaanwa kwe kwagumizamu nikubuga ; ebimbuuro by'abantu byaguma nibiteerana kuhurira ebi arikugamba n'okutambirwa endwara zaabo .
42005016	Kwonka we obundi akaba abatsigaho , aza omu mwanya ogwehereire kushaba .
42005017	Eizooba rimwe , Yesu ku yaabaire naayegyesa , omu baabaire nibamuhurira hakaba harimu Abafarisaayo n'abahangu b'eiteeka , abaarugire omu buri kyaro eky'omuri Galilaaya na Buyudaaya na Yerusalemu ; kandi amaani ga Nyakubaho gakaba gamurimu kukiza abantu .
42005018	Omuri ago magingo haija abashaija baheekire aha katanda omuntu ozingazingirwe . Baamiganisa kumutaasyamu , ngu bamurambikye omu maisho ge .
42005019	Ku baabuzire ah'okumurabya ahabw'okufundaana kw'abantu , baatemba aha mutwe gw'enju , baahiga amategura baamurabyaho nibamushuumiza aha katanda ke , baamuhitsya ahagati y'abantu omu maisho ga Yesu .
42005020	Ku yaareebire baine okwikiriza , yaagira ati : Muntu ' we , waasaasirwa ebibi byawe .
42005021	Abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo baatandika kwebuuza nibagira bati : Ni muntu ki ogu orikurogota ? N'oha orikubaasa kusaasira ebibi , kureka Ruhanga wenka ?
42005022	Yesu yaamanya ebiteekateeko byabo , yaabagarukamu ati : Nimwetomboitera ki mutyo omu mitima yaanyu ?
42005023	Mbwenu ekirikurahuka ni kiiha ? Okugira nti : Waasaasirwa ebibi byawe , nari okugira nti : Imuka ogyende .
42005024	Mbwenu ka mboorekye ku Omwana w'omuntu aine obushoboorozi omu nsi kusaasira ebibi . Atyo yaagambire ozingazingirwe ati : Ninkuragiira , imuka oiheho ekitanda kyawe , otaahe .
42005025	Ahonaaho yaimuka boona bagamutaireho , yaihaho eki yaabaire arambiireho , yaataaha omuka naahimbisa Ruhanga .
42005026	Boona baashoberwa , kandi baahimbisa Ruhanga bagwire omu katangaaro batiinire , nibagira bati : Eri izooba twareeba ekitakareebwaga .
42005027	Ekyo ku kyahwaire , Yesu yaashohora , yaareeba omushorooza w'omushoro orikwetwa Leevi ashutami omu ishoroorezo ry'omushoro ; yaamugira ati : Nkuratira !
42005028	N'onu yaatsigaho byona , yaimuka yaamukuratira .
42005029	Bwanyima Leevi ogwo yaamuteekyera obugyenyi bwingi omu nju ye ; kandi omu baayetsirwe hakaba harimu abashorooza b'omushoro baingi n'abandi bari hamwe nabo aha meeza .
42005030	Abafarisaayo n'abahangu b'eiteeka ab'omu kigombe kyabo , nikwo kwetomboitera abatendekwa be bati : Ahabw'enki nimurya n'abashorooza b'omushoro n'abasiisi kandi nimunywa nabo ?
42005031	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Abahuriire tibo beetenga omufumu , kureka abarwaire .
42005032	Tindaizire kweta bahikiriire , kureka abasiisi ngu beegarukyemu .
42005033	Bwanyima bakagambira Yesu bati : Abatendekwa ba Yohaana kaingi beesiibyakwo kandi bashaba , n'abatendekwa b'Abafarisaayo nikwo okwo ; kwonka abaawe batuura nibarya kandi nibanywa .
42005034	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Nimubaasa muta kusiibyakwo abakwe , kishwera akibaine ?
42005035	Kwonka obunaku buryahika , kishwera abaihweho ; haza obwo nibwo baryesiibyakwo .
42005036	Kandi yaabacwera enfumu ezi , ati : Tihariho muntu otaagura ekiremu aha mwenda musya akakiteera aha mukuru . Ku yaakukikora , takaataagura mwenda musya kwonka , kureka n'ekiremu eki yaiha aha musya tikikaizihira mukuru .
42005037	Kandi tihariho muntu oshuka viino nsya omu furebe nkuru . Ku yaakukikora , viino egyo ekaabarura ezo furebe , eyatika , nazo zisiisikara .
42005038	Manya viino nsya eba ey'okushukwa omu furebe nsya .
42005039	Kandi tihariho oba yaanywaire viino enkuru akenda ensya , kureka agira ti : Enkuru niyo nungi .
42006001	Ahari Sabato emwe Yesu akaba naaraba omu misiri y'engano ; abatendekwa be baacwa obushiisha , baabujungirira omu ngaro , baaburya .
42006002	Bamwe aha Bafarisaayo baagira bati : Ahabw'enki nimukora ekitarikwikirizibwa iteeka ahari Sabato ?
42006003	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Beitu timukashomaga eki Daudi yaakozire , obu yaagira enjara , we n'abu yaabaire aine ?
42006004	Oku yaataahire omu nju ya Ruhanga akaihayo emigaati emutoijairwe , akagirya kandi akahaho n'abu yaabaire aine ? Haza egyo migaati yaabaire eikirizibwa kuriibwa abahongyerezi bonka .
42006005	Atyo yaabagambira ati : Omwana w'omuntu niwe mukama wa Sabato .
42006006	Ahari Sabato endiijo Yesu akataaha omu iteeraniro , yaatandika kwegyesa , kandi hakaba harimu omushaija okokootsire omukono gwa buryo .
42006007	Abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo bakaba bamutaireho eriisho kureeba yaaba yaakukiza omuntu ahari Sabato , ngu babone kugira oburyo bw'okumurega .
42006008	Kwonka we yaamanya ebi barikuteekateeka , yaagira ogwo mushaija okokootsire omukono , ati : Imuka oyemerere aha . Yaija yaayemereraho .
42006009	Yesu nikwo kubagira ati : Ka mbabuuze : Nikiikirizibwa eiteeka ahari Sabato okukora ebirungi , nari okukora ebibi ; okukiza amagara nari okugacwekyereza ?
42006010	Boona yaabarabyamu amaisho , yaagambira ogwo muntu ati : Gorora omukono gwawe . Onu yaagugorora , gwakira .
42006011	Kwonka bari baagira ekiniga kingi , baatandika kucwa obwengye oku baraagire Yesu .
42006012	Omu biro ebyo Yesu akaza omu rushozi kushaba ; yaaseesezayo ekiro naashaba Ruhanga .
42006013	Ku bwaseesire , yaayeeta abatendekwa be , yaatooranamu ikumi na babiri , yaabeeta entumwa .
42006014	Nibo aba : Simooni ou yaayetsire Petero na Andereya omurumuna , Yakobo , Yohaana , Filipo , Baritolomaayo ,
42006015	Matayo , Tomasi , Yakobo mwene Alufaayo , Simooni ou baakubize nkunzi y'eihanga ,
42006016	Yuda mwene Yakobo , na Yuda owa Kariota owaamureebize .
42006017	Bwanyima Yesu yaashuuma nabo , yaayemerera aharinganiire , yaashangayo abandi batendekwa be baingi bateeraniireyo hamwe n'ekimbuuro ky'abantu abaarugire omu byanga bya Buyudaaya byona na Yerusalemu , n'omu myegyeego ya Tuuro na Sidoni , abaizire kuhurira ebi arikugamba n'okutambirwa endwara .
42006018	Abantu abaabaire nibaitwa kubi ebyago nabo yaabakiza .
42006019	Kandi buri omwe omuri ekyo kumbuuro ky'abantu akaba naamigana kumukoraho , ahabw'okuba amaani gakaba gamurugamu , gakiza boona .
42006020	Yesu akahindukira abatendekwa be , yaagira ati : Mwine omugisha , imwe abooro , ahabw'okuba obukama bwa Ruhanga n'obwanyu .
42006021	Mwine omugisha , imwe abaine enjara hati , ahabw'okuba muryahaaga . Mwine omugisha , imwe abarikurira hati , ahabw'okuba muryasheka .
42006022	Muhiiriirwe , abantu ku baribanga , baababinga , baabajuma , baabacamura nibabeeta enkozi z'ebibi , nibabatura Omwana w'omuntu .
42006023	Aha kiro ekyo mushemererwe kandi mwemurikye , ahabw'okuba ekihembo kyanyu omu iguru ni kihango . Manya okwo nikwo baishebo baagizire batyo abarangi .
42006024	Kwonka bambe , imwe abatungi , muryakareeba , ahabw'okuba hati mujarami !
42006025	Muryakareeba imwe abaigutsi hati , ahabw'okuba muryaitwa enjara ! Muryakareeba imwe abarikusheka hati , ahabw'okuba muryacura , murire !
42006026	Muryakareeba abantu ku baribagamba gye ! Manya okwo nikwo baishebo baatwarize abarangi b'ebishuba .
42006027	Mbwenu imwe abantegire amatu , nimbagambira nti : Mukunde abazigu baanyu , mukore gye abarikubanga .
42006028	Abarikubakyeena mubashabire emigisha , mushabire n'abarikubatwaza kubi .
42006029	Oraakuteere oruhi rw'omushaya omutegye n'ogwa kabiri ; oraatware omunagiro gwawe otamwima n'ekanzu .
42006030	Oraakushabe weena omuhe , kandi n'oraakusikureho ekyawe otarikimwenza .
42006031	Nk'oku mwenda abandi ngu babatwaze , naimwe mube nikwo mwabatwaza .
42006032	Ku muraakunde abarikubakunda , nimuba nimusiimwaho ki ? Nangwa n'abasiisi bakunda ababakunda .
42006033	Ku muraabe nimukora gye ababakora gye nimuba nimwenda kusiimwaho ki ? Nangwa n'abasiisi nikwo batwaza .
42006034	Ku muraaguze abu mwineho amatsiko kugira eki mwabatungaho nimuba nimwenda kusiimwaho ki ? Nangwa n'abasiisi nikwo baguza bagyenzi baabo , ngu ebi baabaguza babibagarurire nk'oku bibaire nibingana .
42006035	Haakiri mukunde abazigu baanyu , mukore ebirungi , kandi muguze mutaine matsiko g'okuzimuurirwa , ngu nabo nyentsya babaguze . Obwo nibwo muritunga ekihembo kihango , mukaba abaana ba Rukiraboona , ahabw'okuba we aba ow'embabazi aha ntasiima n'enkozi z'ebibi .
42006036	Mube ab'embabazi nka Shoimwe oku ari ow'embabazi .
42006037	Mutaricwa orubanja , naimwe nibwo mutarirucwerwa ; mutarisingisiriza , naimwe nibwo mutarisingisirizibwa ; musaasire , naimwe muryasaasirwa .
42006038	Mugabe , naimwe muryaheebwa . Endengo eijwire eigatiirwe , eshekyeziibwe kandi erikusheesheka , niyo erishukwa omu kikondooro kyanyu ; ahabw'okuba endengo ei murirengamu , naimwe niyo murirengyerwamu .
42006039	Kandi Yesu akabacwera enfumu egi , ati : Empumi neebaasa eta kwebembera endiijo ? Zombi tizirigwa omu kiina ?
42006040	Omutendekwa takira mutendeki we ; kwonka omutendekwa ku aba yaaherize kutendekwa gye , aba nk'omutendeki we .
42006041	Ahabw'enki nooreeba akatokoozi akari omu riisho rya mwene sho , haza kunu otarikureeba mpimbi eri omu ryawe ?
42006042	Noobaasa ota kugira mwene sho oti : Mwene tata ka nkwihe akatokoozi akari omu riisho ryawe , haza kunu otarikureeba mpimbi eri omu ryawe ? Iwe ndyarya ' we , banza oyeihe empimbi omu riisho , haza obone kuhweza gye kwiha akatokoozi akari omu riisho rya mwene sho .
42006043	Tihariho muti murungi ogwana ebijuma bibi , nari omuti mubi ogwana ebijuma birungi .
42006044	Manya omuti gumanyirwa aha bijuma byagwo . Abantu tibashoroma mitiini ha minyinya , nari emizaabibu aha bushebashebe .
42006045	Omuntu omurungi aiha ebirungi aha birungi ebi agira omu mutima gwe , n'omuntu mubi aiha ebibi aha bibi ebi agira omu mutima gwe . Manya ebiijwire omutima nibyo akanwa kagamba .
42006046	Muunyetera ki muti Mukama wangye , Mukama wangye , haza mutakora bi ngamba ?
42006047	Weena oija ahi ndi , akatega okutu ebi ndikugamba , akabikora , ka mboorekye ou arikushusha .
42006048	Naashusha omuntu owaagiire kwombeka enju ye , akatimba , akahika okuzimu , akahamiza omusingi aha rukiri . Omugyera ku gwashandaire , gwahimintikira ahari egyo nju , kwonka tigwabaasa kugitengyeetsa , ahabw'okuba ekaba eyombekirwe gye .
42006049	Kwonka ohurira ebi ndikugamba atabikore , naashusha omuntu owaayombekire enju ye aha itaka etaine musingi . Omugyera ku gwagihimintikiireho , ahonaaho yaakumbagara . Ebishi , egyo nju ekatsindama !
42007001	Yesu , ku yaaherize kugambira abantu ebyo byona , yaaza Kafarinaumu .
42007002	Omukuru w'abaserukare igana waayo akaba aine omuheereza we omushongore , owaabaire arwaire ari haihi kufa .
42007003	Omuserukare ogwo , ku yaahuriire ebya Yesu , yaamutumaho abamwe omu bakuru b'Abayudaaya kwija kutambira omuheereza we .
42007004	Ku baahikire ahari Yesu , baamweshengyereza munonga bati : Oshemereire kukimukorera ,
42007005	ahabw'okuba akunda eihanga ryaitu , kandi niwe yaatwombekyeire eiteeraniro ryaitu .
42007006	Atyo Yesu agyenda nabo . Akiba ari haihi kuhika eka , ogwo mukuru w'abaserukare igana amutumaho banywani be ati : Mukama wangye , reka kweruhiza busha , ahabw'okuba timpikire kukutaasya omwangye .
42007007	Kandi ekyo nikyo kyanzibira kwija okwo kukwehikira ; kwonka gira eki waagamba , omuheereza wangye akire .
42007008	Manya naanye ndi omutegyekwa , kandi nyine abaserukare abu ndikutegyeka . Ku ndikugambira omwe nti : Gyenda , agyenda ; n'ondiijo nti : Ija , aija ; n'omuheereza wangye nti : Kora eki , akikora .
42007009	Yesu ku yaahuriire ekyo , yaamutangaarira , yaahinduka yaagambira ekimbuuro ky'abantu abamukuratiire ati : Nimbagambira ku ntakareebaga kwikiriza nk'oku , nobu haakuba omuri Isiraeli !
42007010	Abaabaire batumirwe , ku baagarukire omuka , baashanga ogwo muheereza yaakizire .
42007011	Ku haahingwireho omwanya mukye , Yesu yaaza omu rurembo orurikwetwa Naini aine abatendekwa be n'ekimbuuro ky'abantu .
42007012	Ku yaabaire nairirira eirembo ryarwo , yaabugana abeekoreire omutumbi gwa mutabani w'omufaakazi , omwana we omwe nyamunegyere , nibagushohoza kuguziika . Kandi abantu baingi ab'omu rurembo orwo bakaba beezingiriire ogwo mukazi .
42007013	Mukama ku yaamureebire , yaamugirira esaasi , yaamugira eti : Reka kurira .
42007014	Atyo yaija yaakora aha ki baabaire baguheekireho ; abagwekoreire baayemerera . Yaagira ati : Iwe mutsigazi ' we , ninkuragiira , imuka !
42007015	Ogwo owaabaire afiire yaashutama , yaatandika kugamba . Yesu yaamugarurira nyina .
42007016	Boona baakwatwa obwoba , baahimbisa Ruhanga nibagira bati : Omuriitwe haimukiremu omurangi mukuru ! Kandi bati : Ruhanga aizire kujuna abantu be !
42007017	Enkuru egyo yaabuga hoona omuri Buyudaaya n'omu nsi zoona ezigihereire .
42007018	Abatendekwa ba Yohaana bakamuteekyerereza ebyo byona .
42007019	Nawe nikwo kweta babiri omuribo , akabatuma ahari Mukama kumubuuza bati : Niiwe ogwo otuura ori ow'okwija , nari tutegyereze ondiijo ?
42007020	Abantu abo ku baahikire Yesu , baamugira bati : Yohaana Omubatizi yaatukutumaho kukubuuza tuti : Niiwe ogwo otuura ori ow'okwija , nari tutegyereze ondiijo ?
42007021	Omuri ago magingo Yesu yaakiza abantu baingi endwara n'obusaasi n'okunigwa ebyago ; kandi n'empumi nyingi yaazihumuura .
42007022	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Nimwirooko mugambire Yohaana ebi mwareeba n'ebi mwahurira muti : empumi nizihumuuka , ebirema nibigyenda , ababembe nibashemezibwa , ebifamatu nibihurira , abafiire nibazoorwa , n'abooro nibarangirirwa amakuru marungi .
42007023	Otarikumbangaanisa aine omugisha .
42007024	Entumwa za Yohaana ku zaagarukireyo , Yesu yaatandika kugambira ekimbuuro ky'abantu ahari Yohaana ogwo , ati : Mukaza omu ihamba kureebayo ki ? Orubingo orurikutengyeetsibwa omuyaga ?
42007025	Mbwenu shi , mukaza kureebayo ki ? Omuntu ojwaire ebirikunekaneka ? Manya abajwara ebirikunekaneka bakajarama bashangwa omu bikaari by'abagabe .
42007026	Mbwenu shi , mukaza kureebayo ki ? Omurangi ? Eego , nimbagambira nti , nangwa naakira omurangi .
42007027	Niwe ogwo ou kyahandiikirweho ngu : Reeba , nintuma entumwa yangye kukubandizayo , ekutebeekanisize omuhanda .
42007028	Nimbagambira nti : Omu baazairwe abakazi , tihariho n'omwe orikukira Yohaana ; kwonka orikuhereerukayo omu bukama bwa Ruhanga naamukira .
42007029	Abantu boona hamwe n'abashorooza b'omushoro , abaabaire baabatiziibwe Yohaana , ku baamuhuriire , baikiriza eki Ruhanga arikubenza .
42007030	Kwonka Abafarisaayo n'abahangu b'eiteeka abaayangire ku ababatiza , baahakanisa enaama ya Ruhanga ei yaabaire abacumiire .
42007031	Mbwenu abantu b'obusingye obu nkaabashushanisa na ki ?
42007032	Bari nk'abaana abashutami omu katare , abarikwetana bati : Tubateereire esheegu , timwazina ; twabateerera emiruura , timwayemaamaata .
42007033	Manya Yohaana Omubatizi ku yaizire atarikurya mugaati , atarikunywa viino , mwagira muti : Aine ekyago .
42007034	Kandi Omwana w'omuntu we ku yaizire naarya , naanywa , mwagira muti : N'omunyamururu , omusinzi kandi munywani w'abashorooza b'omushoro n'abasiisi .
42007035	Manya obwengye bwa Ruhanga , boona ababwikiriza nibo bahamya ku buhikire .
42007036	Omwe omu Bafarisaayo akeeta Yesu owe kurya nawe . Ku yaahikire ow'Omufarisaayo ogwo , yaashutama kurya .
42007037	Haija omukazi owaabaire ari mubi rurangaanwa omuri ekyo kirorero . Akaba yaahuriire ku Yesu ashutami aha byokurya omw'Omufarisaayo ; yaija n'akacupa k'eibaare ry'omwengyengye , akarimu amajuta g'omugaju .
42007038	Ogwo mukazi yaamuguma enyima naarira ; amarira nigaitururikira aha bigyere bye , yaabiragarisa eishokye rye , yaabinywegyera , yaabisiiga ago majuta .
42007039	Omufarisaayo owaamwetsire , ku yaakireebire , yaateekateeka ati : Ogu muntu , kuri ari omurangi , akaamanyire ogu mukazi orikumukoraho , n'oku ari omusiisi rurangaanwa .
42007040	Yesu nikwo kumugira ati : Simooni , nyine eki ndikwenda kukugambira . Onu ati : Kingambire , Mwegyesa .
42007041	Yesu ati : Hakaba haribo omuntu orikuguza empiiha ; abantu babiri baashangwa baine eibanja rye , omwe erya shilingi magana ataano , n'ondiijo erya makumi ataano .
42007042	Mbwenu bombi ku baaremirwe kumwihura , yaabasaasira . Ahari abo bombi , n'oha owaakizire kumukunda ?
42007043	Simooni yaamugarukamu ati : Ningira ngu n'ogwo owaasaasiirwe enyingi . Yesu ati : Eego , eki waagamba kihikire .
42007044	Mpaho yaahinduka yaareeba omukazi , yaagira ati : Simooni , nooreeba ogu mukazi ? Ku naija omwawe , tiwampa twizi tw'ebigyere ; kwonka we ebigyere byangye yaabifukunkuriraho amarira ge , kandi yaabiragarisa eishokye rye .
42007045	Iwe tiwaanywegyera , kwonka we , naaba kwija , agumire naanywegyera ebigyere .
42007046	Iwe tiwantoonyeza kajuta ha mutwe , kwonka we ebigyere byangye yaabisiiga amajuta g'omugaju .
42007047	N'ahabw'ekyo ninkugambira nti : Yaasaasirwa ebibi bye bingi , ahabw'okuba yaayoreka rukundo ye empango . Manya osaasirwa bikye agira rukundo nkye .
42007048	Mpaho agambira ogwo mukazi ati : Waasaasirwa ebibi byawe .
42007049	Abaabaire bari nawe aha meeza baatandika kwetomboita bati : Ogu ni muntu ki orikubaasa nangwa n'okusaasira ebibi ?
42007050	Kwonka Yesu yaagira ogwo mukazi ati : Okwikiriza kwawe kwakujuna ; gyenda n'obusingye .
42008001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Yesu yaagyenda naaraba omu birorero n'omu byaro naayegyesa kandi naarangirira Amakuru Marungi g'obukama bwa Ruhanga . Obwo akaba aine eikumi na babiri ,
42008002	hamwe n'abakazi abaabaire batambiirwe ebyago n'endwara , barimu Mariya owaabaire naayetwa Magadaleena , owaihirweho ebyago mushanju ,
42008003	na Yoana muka Kuuza omureeberezi w'ebya Herode , na Susaana , n'abandi baingi abaabaire babaha eby'okubahwera nibakora aha byabo .
42008004	Abantu baingi ku baayeteeraniire ahi Yesu yaabaire ari nibaruga omuri buri kirorero , yaabacwera enfumu egi , ati :
42008005	Omubibi akashohora kubiba embibo ze . Ku yaabaire naabiba , ezimwe zaaragara aha rubaju rw'omuhanda , zaaribatiirirwa , enyonyi z'omu kaabunga zaazirya .
42008006	Ezindi zaagwa aha rukiri , ku zaamezire , zaayoma ahabw'okuburwa amaizi .
42008007	Ezindi mbibo zaagwa omu mahwa , gaakura nazo , gaazinyuruza ;
42008008	n'ezindi zaagwa aha itaka rirungi , zaakura , zaayera zaakanya emirundi igana . Ku yaabaire naagwisa , yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Oine amatu agarikuhurira , ahurire .
42008009	Abatendekwa be baamubuuza amakuru g'egyo nfumu .
42008010	Nawe yaabagira ati : Imwe mukaatirwa eibanga ry'obukama bwa Ruhanga , kwonka abandi babigambirwa omu nfumu , ngu bareebe , kwonka bateetegyereza , bahurire , kwonka batashoboorokyerwa .
42008011	Mbwenu aga nigo makuru g'egyo nfumu . Embibo nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga .
42008012	Ezaaragaire aha rubaju rw'omuhanda nibo bantu abakihurira , Sitaane akaija , akaiha ekyo kigambo omu mitima yaabo , ngu barekye kwikiriza bakajunwa .
42008013	Ezaabibirwe aha rukiri nibo bantu abahurira ekyo kigambo , bakakiikiriza bashemereirwe ; kwonka ahabw'okutagira mizi bakiikiriza akaanya kakye , bwanyima ku boohibwa , bagwa .
42008014	Ezaagwire omu mahwa nibo bantu abakihurira , kwonka omu magara gaabo bakanyuruzibwa okwemereza omutima n'eby'obutungi n'eby'amashemererwa g'amagara aga , haza bakabura kukagata omu mutima .
42008015	Reero ezaagwire omu itaka rirungi nibo bantu abahurira ekyo kigambo , bakakigumya omu mutima murungi kandi ogw'amazima , haza ahabw'okugumisiriza bakaana ebyana .
42008016	Tihariho n'omwe ohemba etabaaza , akagijuumikira ekiibo , nari akagita omunda y'ekitanda ; kureka agita aha kikondo , ngu ehwezese abarikutaaha omu nju .
42008017	Manya tihariho kisherekirwe ekitaryorekwa , nari eky'omu naama ekitarimanywa kikareebwa butunu .
42008018	N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde oku muraahurire , ahabw'okuba weena oine , aryaheebwa ebirikukiraho , kwonka otaine , nangwa n'eki arikuteekateeka ngu aine , aryakyakwa .
42008019	Nyina wa Yesu na barumuna be bakaija nibamuronda , kwonka tibaabaasa kumuhika ahabw'akamigano k'abantu .
42008020	Baamutumaho bati : Nyoko na barumuna baawe beemereire aheeru nibenda kukureeba .
42008021	We yaabagarukamu ati : Maawe na barumuna bangye nibo abo abahurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga , bakakihitsya .
42008022	Eizooba rimwe Yesu akaza omu bwato n'abatendekwa be , yaabagira ati : Ka twambukye seeri y'enyanja . Batyo baagyenda .
42008023	Ku baabaire nibakyambuka , yaagwejegyera . Omuyaga gw'amaani gwatabangura enyanja , amaizi gaatandika kweshuka omu bwato , baagwa omu kabi .
42008024	Mpaho baamuhika , baamusisiimura bati : Mwegyesa , Mwegyesa , twafa ! Atyo akanguka omu turo , akabukira ogwo muyaga n'okutabanguka kw'amaizi , biikaikana , hacureera .
42008025	Reero abagira ati : Mbwenu okwikiriza kwanyu kuri nkahi ? Baitwa obwoba , baatangaara , baagambirana bati : Beitu ogu ni muntu ki orikuragiira omuyaga n'enyanja bikamuhurira ?
42008026	Ku baayambukire , baahika omu nsi y'Abanyageraseene eshungaine na Galilaaya .
42008027	Yesu ku yaabaire yaaribata ati aha nkungu , yaizirwa omushaija oriho ebyago naaruga omu kirorero ky'aho . Ogwo mushaija akaba amazire omwanya muraingwa ataine ki ajwaire , kandi akaba atakiraara mu nju , kureka omu bituuro .
42008028	Ku yaareebire ati Yesu , yaaborooga , yaamugwa omu maguru , yaayamuza munonga ati : Iwe Yesu , Omwana wa Ruhanga Rukiraboona , noofa ki naanye ? Naakweshengyereza , otaanyita kubi .
42008029	Eki yaagambiire atyo , n'ahabw'okuba Yesu akaba yaaragiire ekyo kyago kumurugaho . Manya kaingi kikaba kimuniga , abantu bamubohesa enjegyere n'emihama kumurinda ; kwonka obutoosha acwa ebi bamuboheise , kimurariza omu ihamba .
42008030	Yesu nikwo kukibuuza ati : Eiziina ryawe ori oha ? Nakyo kiti : Niinye Ihe ; ahabw'okuba ebyago bingi bikaba bimutaahiremu .
42008031	Mpaho byayeshengyereza Yesu kutabiragiira kuza okuzimu owa Nyamuteza .
42008032	Mbwenu obwo hakaba hariho omukumbi gw'empunu nyingi niziriira omu kibungo . Ebyo byago byayeshengyereza Yesu kubiikiriza kuba nizo byazamu . Nawe yaabiikiriza .
42008033	Byaruga ahari ogwo muntu , byataaha omuri ezo mpunu ; ogwo mukumbi gwahiringitira aha nengo , gwagwa omu nyanja , gwarohama .
42008034	Bwanyima abariisa b'ezo mpunu , ku baareebire ebyabaho , baahunga , baabiteekyerereza ab'omu rurembo n'ab'omu byaro .
42008035	Abantu baahurura kureeba ekyabaho . Ku baahikire Yesu , baashanga ogwo mushaija owaarugirweho ebyago ashutami aha bigyere bya Yesu , ajwaire kandi aine obwengye ; baatiina munonga .
42008036	Abaabaire bariho baabateekyerereza oku ogwo mushaija owaabaire ariho ebyago yaakizibwa .
42008037	Abageraseene boona emitima ebahwa omunda , beeshengyereza Yesu kubarugira omu nsi . Nawe aza omu bwato , agarukayo .
42008038	Ku yaabaire atakagyenzire , omuntu ori owaihirweho ebyago yaamushaba ku amwikiriza kuguma nawe ; kwonka we yaamwangira naamugira ati :
42008039	Garuka owaawe , omanyise byona ebi Ruhanga yaakukorera ! Ogwo muntu nikwo kugyenda akabuzya omu kirorero kyona ebi Yesu yaamukorera .
42008040	Yesu ku yaabaire naagarukayo , yaatangirirwa enyanja y'abantu , ahabw'okuba boona bakaba bariyo bamutegyereize .
42008041	Omuri ago magingo haija omushaija orikwetwa Yairo , owaabaire ari omukuru w'eiteeraniro . Yaakwata Yesu amaguru naamweshengyereza kuza owe ,
42008042	ahabw'okuba akaba aine omuhara omwe wenka , ow'emyaka nka ikumi n'ebiri y'obukuru , owaabaire ari haihi kufa . Reero Yesu ku yaabaire naazayo , abantu baingi baamumigisiriza , bamuturukire oku n'oku .
42008043	Mbwenu obwo hakaba hariho omukazi owaabaire amazire emyaka ikumi n'ebiri arwaire ekyejwiso , amariire ebye byona omu bafumu , kwonka bambe , hatariho n'omwe owaabasize kumutambira .
42008044	Yaamureetwa enyima , yaakora aha mukugiro gw'ekijwaro kye ; ahonaaho ekyejwiso kyakira .
42008045	Yesu nikwo kubuuza ati : Beitu n'oha owankoraho ? Boona baayehakana ku bataamukoraho . Petero na bagyenzi be nikwo kumigira bati : Mwegyesa , manya enyanja y'abantu ekwehinguririize , niyo erikukumiga .
42008046	Kwonka Yesu yaagira ati : Haine owankoraho , ahabw'okuba naahurira amaani gandugamu .
42008047	Omukazi ku yaareebire yaamanywa , yaarugayo naatetema , yaamujuumara omu maisho , yaagambira ahagati y'abantu eki yaamukoreraho , n'oku yaatambirwa omuri ako kaanya .
42008048	Onu amugira ati : Mwana wangye , okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza ; gyenda n'obusingye .
42008049	Yesu ku yaabaire naakigamba , haija omuntu owaaruga omu nju y'omukuru w'eiteeraniro aizire kumubikira ; agira ati : Muhara waawe yaafa , otagaruka kurusya Omwegyesa .
42008050	Kwonka Yesu nawe akihurira , amugambira ati : Otatiina , fa okwikiriza , omwana naija kukira .
42008051	Ku yaahikire aha nju , tiyaikiriza muntu weena kutaahamu nawe , kureka Petero , Yohaana , Yakobo hamwe na ishe w'omwana na nyina .
42008052	Boona bakaba nibarira nibamucurira . Kwonka Yesu yaabagira ati : Murekyere aho kurira ; tafiire , agwejegyeire .
42008053	Batyo baamushekyerera , ahabw'okuba bakaba nibamanya ku afiire .
42008054	Kwonka we amukwata omukono , amugira ati : Mwana ' we , imuka .
42008055	Ahimbuuka , ahonaaho abandaituka . Atyo Yesu abaragiira kumuha ekyokurya .
42008056	Abazaire be baatangaara munonga ; kwonka abeehanangiriza kutagira u baagambira ekyabaho .
42009001	Yesu akeeta eikumi na babiri , yaabaha amaani n'obushoboorozi bw'okubinga ebyago byona n'okutamba endwara .
42009002	Atyo yaaboohereza kuza kurangirira eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga n'okukiza abarwaire .
42009003	Yaabagira ati : Mutagira eki mwagyendana , yaaba nkoni , eshaho , omugaati nari empiiha , kandi hatagira owaatwara ekanzu ibiri .
42009004	Enju ei muraataahemu mugigumemu okuhitsya obu muraarugyeyo .
42009005	Kandi abaraayangye kubaakiira , ku muraaze kuruga omu kirorero kyabo , mukunkumure omucuucu gw'aha bigyere , gubabeere mushinja .
42009006	Batyo baimutsya orugyendo , baaruga omu kyaro baaza omu kindi nibagamba Amakuru Marungi , kandi nibakiza abantu ei baabaire nibaza yoona .
42009007	Omu biro ebyo , ow'eishaza Herode , ku yaahuriire byona ebyabaire nibikorwa , yaarimbagirirwa , ahabw'okuba abantu bamwe bakaba nibagira ngu Yohaana azookire omu bafiire .
42009008	Abandi ngu , Eliya niwe agarukire kuboneka , n'abandi ngu , omwe aha barangi aba ira niwe ahimbuukire .
42009009	Kwonka Herode yaagira ati : Yohaana ? Ka naamutemireho omutwe . Mbwenu ogwo n'oha ou ndikuhuriraho ebyo ? Nikyo yaayetengyeire munonga kumureeba .
42009010	Entumwa ku zaagarukire , zaateekyerereza Yesu byona ebi zaakozire . Bwanyima yaagyenda nabo , baaza omu rurembo orurikwetwa Beetisaida kwehereera .
42009011	Kwonka ekimbuuro ky'abantu ku kyabimanyire , kyamukurata . Yaabaakiira gye , yaabagambira eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga ; kandi abaabaire nibenda kutambirwa yaabakiza .
42009012	Ku bwabaire bwaba omu mwabazyo munonga , eikumi na babiri baija ahu ari , baamugira bati : Ragiira abantu bagyende , baze omu byaro n'omu byanga ebiri haihi , kusherura oburaaro n'ebyokurya . Manya aha ahi turi n'eihamba .
42009013	Yaabagarukamu ati : Mube niimwe mwabaha ebyokurya . Banu bati : Titwine kindi okwihaho emigaati etaano n'ebyenyanja bibiri . Kureka shana , waaba nooyenda ngu tuze kugurira abantu aba boona ebyokurya .
42009014	Abo bantu bakaba bari nk'enkumi itaano . Kwonka we yaaragiira abatendekwa be ati : Nimubashutamye omu miteeko y'abantu makumi ataano ataano .
42009015	Baaba nikwo baagira , baabashutamya boona .
42009016	Mpaho yaakwata egyo migaati etaano n'ebyo byenyanja bibiri , yaareeba ahaiguru , yaabisiimira , yaabicwamu , yaabikwatsa abatendekwa be kubigaburira abantu .
42009017	Boona baarya , baahaaga . Ku baatorotoire oburagarika obwatsigaireho , bwaijuza ebitenga ikumi na bibiri .
42009018	Eizooba rimwe Yesu wenka ku yaabaire naashaba , abatendekwa be bari aho , yaababuuza ati : Beitu abantu bagira ngu mba oha ?
42009019	Baamugarukamu bati : Ngu ori Yohaana Omubatizi , abandi ngu ori Eliya , kandi abandi ngu ori omwe aha barangi aba ira ozookire omu bafiire .
42009020	Agaruka agira ati : Kwonka shi , imwe nimugira ngu ndi oha ? Petero amugarukamu ati : Ori Kristo wa Ruhanga .
42009021	Yesu akabeehanangiriza munonga kutagira u baakigambira .
42009022	Yaabagira ati : Omwana w'omuntu n'ow'okubonabonesibwa munonga ; aryayangwa abakuru b'eihanga n'abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka , aitwe , kwonka aha kiro kya kashatu azookye .
42009023	Kandi Yesu yaagambira boona ati : Omuntu weena orikwenda kunkuratira , ayeyogye , ayekorere omusharaba gwe buri izooba , haza ankuratire .
42009024	Manya weena orikwenda kukiza amagara ge , aryagabuza ; kwonka weena orikubuza amagara ge ahabwangye , aryagakiza .
42009025	Mbwenu omuntu kiryamugasira ki okukubuura ensi yoona , haza akafeerwa nari akahwerekyereza amagara ge ?
42009026	Omuntu weena oriitwa enshoni ahabwangye n'ahabw'ebigambo byangye , nawe Omwana w'omuntu nikwo arimutwaza , ku ariizira omu kitiinwa kye n'ekya Ishe n'ekya baamaraika abarikwera .
42009027	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Hariho abeemereire aha abatarihikwaho kufa batakareebire bukama bwa Ruhanga .
42009028	Ku haahingwireho ebiro nka munaana Yesu aherize kugamba ekyo , yaatwara Petero na Yohaana na Yakobo , yaatemba orushozi kuza kushaba .
42009029	Ku yaabaire naashaba , ahamaisho ge haahinduka , n'ebijwaro bye byayera nibimwamwatikana .
42009030	Ago magingo baayecura abashaija babiri , Musa na Eliya ,
42009031	abaababonekyeire baine ekitiinwa , nibagaaniira nawe aha kufa kwe oku yaabaire arangariire kuhikiiririza Yerusalemu .
42009032	Petero na bagyenzi be bakaba baitsirwe oturo nibagwagwana ; kwonka ku baakangukireyo , baamureeba aijwire ekitiinwa , n'abo bashaija bombi beemereire nawe .
42009033	Abo ku baabaire nibakimurugaho , Petero yaagira Yesu ati : Mwegyesa , ka ni kirungi itwe okushangwa turi aha ! Mbwenu ka twombekye otuju tushatu , kamwe kabe akaawe , akandi aka Musa , n'akandi aka Eliya . Obwo akaba atarikumanya ki arikugamba .
42009034	Ku yaabaire naakigamba , haija ekicu kyabasangira . Ku kyabashwekire , abatendekwa baatiina .
42009035	Eiraka ryayema omuri ekyo kicu nirigira riti : Ogu n'Omwana wangye entoore , mumuhurire .
42009036	Eryo iraka ku ryaherize kugamba , baashanga Yesu ari wenka . Abo batendekwa baahunama ; omuri obwo bunaku tibaagira n'omwe ou baakigambira .
42009037	Aha izooba eryakuratsireho , ku baabaire nibaruga aha rushozi , enyanja y'abantu yaija kubugana Yesu .
42009038	Ku baamuhikire , omwe omuribo yaamuhoogyera n'eiraka rihango , ati : Mwegyesa , ninkweshengyereza , ndeebera mutabani wangye , niwe mwana wangye wenka .
42009039	Ahonaaho ekyago ku kimubakura kiti , aborooga , kimusikankura , areeta eifuro ; tikirahuka kumurugaho , kwonka ku kimurugaho , kimutsiga anoganogokire .
42009040	Nyeshengyereize abatendekwa baawe kukibinga , tibaabaasa .
42009041	Yesu yaamugarukamu naagira ati : Imwe bantu ab'obusingye obu abatarikwikiriza kandi abarikwehabagiza , ndyahitsya hi okuguma naimwe n'okubagumisiririza ? Reeta aha mutabani waawe .
42009042	Omwojo ku yaabaire naakiizira Yesu ekyago kyamutuura ahansi nikimusikankura . Yesu yaakabukira ekyo kyago , yaakiza ogwo mwojo kandi yaamugarurira ishe .
42009043	Abantu boona baatangaarira obukuru bwa Ruhanga obutakareebwaga . Boona ku baabaire nibakitangaarira ebi Yesu yaakora , Yesu yaagambira abatendekwa be ati :
42009044	Imwe mushemereire kuguma nimwijuka ebigambo ebi : Omwana w'omuntu naija kurekurirwa abantu .
42009045	Kwonka bo ekyo eki yaabagambiire tibarakyetegyereize . Kikaba kibasherekirwe , ngu batakaamanya amakuru gaakyo , kandi nabo baatiina kumubuuza eki yaaheza kugamba .
42009046	Abatendekwa bakatandika kuhakana bonka na bonka , ngu omuribo omukuru n'oha ?
42009047	Yesu yaamanya ebiri omu mitima yaabo , yaakwata omwana muto , yaamwehitsya aha rubaju ,
42009048	yaabagira ati : Weena orikwakiira ahabwangye omwana ogu omuto , biri niinye ayakiire . Kandi weena orikuunyakiira , biri ayakiire ogwo owantumire . Manya orikuhereerukayo omuriimwe niwe mukuru .
42009049	Yohaana akagira ati : Mwegyesa , tureebire omuntu naabinga ebyago omu iziina ryawe , twamuzibira , ahabw'okuba ti mukuratizi hamwe naitwe .
42009050	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Timwakumuzibiire . Manya otarikubarwanisa biri n'ow'orubaju rwanyu .
42009051	Obunaku bwa Yesu bw'okutwarwa omu iguru ku bwairiire haihi , yaamariirira kuza Yerusalemu ,
42009052	yaayohereza entumwa kumwebembera . Batyo baimutsya orugyendo , baaza omu kyaro kya Samariya kumuteguurira ,
42009053	kwonka abaayo baayanga kumwakiira , ngu ahabw'okuba akaba naaza Yerusalemu .
42009054	Abatendekwa be , Yakobo na Yohaana , ku baakireebire , baamugira bati : Mukama waitu , nooyenda ngu turagiire omuriro gurugye omu iguru gubacwekyereze ?
42009055	Atyo yaahinduka yaabateisa .
42009056	Mpaho baaza omu kindi kyaro .
42009057	Ku baabaire nibagyenda , baabugana omushaija , yaagira Yesu ati : Niinyija kukukuratira ahu oraaze hoona .
42009058	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Zaamuha zigira amaaya , n'enyonyi z'omu kaabunga zigira ebyashuri , kwonka Omwana w'omuntu tagira n'ah'okuta orubaju .
42009059	Yesu yaagira ondiijo ati : Nkuratira ! Onu yaamugarukamu ati : Ndeka mbanze nze kuziika tata .
42009060	Yesu ati : Reka abafiire babe nibo baaziika abafu baabo ; ekyawe n'okugyenda okabuzya amakuru g'obukama bwa Ruhanga .
42009061	N'ondiijo yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , niinyija kukukuratira , kwonka banza ondekye nze kuragana n'ab'owaitu .
42009062	Yesu yaamugira ati : Tihariho n'omwe okwata ekyoma ky'okuhingisa , akahinga naareeba enyima , oshemereire obukama bwa Ruhanga .
42010001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Mukama yaatoorana abandi batendekwa makumi mushanju na babiri , yaaboohereza babiri babiri kumubandiza omu birorero byona n'omu myanya yoona , ei yaabaire naaza kutaayaayira .
42010002	Yaabagira ati : Eby'okugyesha ni bingi , kwonka abakozi ni bakye ; n'ahabw'ekyo mushabe Mukama w'eigyesha ayohereze abakozi omu by'okugyesha bye .
42010003	Mbwenu nimwirooko ; reeba , nimbatuma muri nk'abaana b'entaama abari omu mishega .
42010004	Mutatwara omufuko , nobu yaakuba efurebe nari enkaito ; kandi omu muhanda mutagira ou mwaramutsya .
42010005	Enju yoona ei muraataahemu , mubanze mugire muti : Obusigye bube ahari egi ka .
42010006	Egyo nju ku eraabe erimu omuntu w'obusingye , endamutsyo yaanyu y'obusingye neija kumugumaho . Kwonka ku araabe atarimu , egyo ndamutsyo yaanyu y'obusingye mugigarukane .
42010007	Mugume omuri egyo nju nimurya kandi nimunywa ebi baraabahe , ahabw'okuba omukozi ashemereire kuheebwa ebihembo bye . Mutariruga omu nju kuraara omu ndiijo .
42010008	Ebirorero byona ebi murihikamu bakabaakiira gye , murye eki baabata omu maisho .
42010009	Mukize abarwaire baamwo kandi mugire muti : Obukama bwa Ruhanga bwabahika haihi .
42010010	Kwonka ku muraagume mwahika omuri ibara kirorero , baayanga kubaakiira , mushohore muze omu nguuto zaakyo , mugire muti :
42010011	Twabatsigaho . Nangwa n'omucuucu gw'eki kirorero kyanyu , ogutukwaitse aha bigyere , ogu twayeragazaho , gubatuntumukire ; kwonka mumanyire kimwe ku obukama bwa Ruhanga bwabahika haihi .
42010012	Nimbagambira nti : Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , ekifubiro kya Sodoma kiryayemerwa okukira eky'ekyo kirorero .
42010013	Iwe Koraziini ' we , oryakareeba ! Naiwe Beetisaida , oryakareeba ! Ahabw'okuba eby'okutangaaza ebyakoreirwe omuriimwe , kuri byakoreirwe omuri Tuuro na Sidoni , abaamwo bakaabaire baayegarukiremu kare bajwaire ebiguniya , bashutami omu iju .
42010014	Kandi hoona aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , ebifubiro bya Tuuro na Sidoni biryayemerwa okukira ebyanyu .
42010015	Kandi naiwe Kafarinaumu , mbwenu noogira ngu oryatunguurwa ohikye ahaiguru ? Ngaaha , oryabandikwa , ohikye okuzimu owa Nyamuteza .
42010016	Weena obahurira , biri niinye ahuriire ; n'oyanga kubahurira , biri niinye ayangiire ; kandi abo abanga kumpurira , biri bangire kuhurira Ogwo owantumire .
42010017	Amakumi mushanju na babiri bakagaruka bashemereirwe munonga , baagira bati : Mukama , ku turikukoresa eiziina ryawe , nangwa n'ebyago nibitworobera .
42010018	Yaabagarukamu ati : Ndeebire Sitaane naagwa , naahanantuka omu iguru nk'omurabyo .
42010019	Reeba , mbahaire obushoboorozi bw'okusingyeera enjoka n'ebinyabushegu , n'okuribatiirira amaani g'omuzigu goona ; tihariho kintu kyona ekiribakora kubi .
42010020	Kwonka muteekiita ahabw'ebyago kuboorobera ; kureka mushemererwe ahabw'okuba amaziina gaanyu gahandiikirwe omu iguru .
42010021	Omuri ako kaanya Yesu ku yaaijuziibwe Mutima Orikwera okushemererwa , yaagira ati : Taata , Mukama w'eiguru n'ensi , ninkusiima ahabw'okuba ebintu ebyo okabishereka abanyabwengye n'abarikwetegyereza , waabishuuruurira abaana bato . Eego , Taata , ekyo nikyo waasiimire .
42010022	Byona nkabikwatsibwa Tata , kandi tihariho omanya Mwana kureka Taata , nobu yaakuba omanya Taata kureka Mwana , n'ou Mwana asiima kumumushuuruurira .
42010023	Bwanyima yaahindukira abatendekwa be , yaabagambira omu mubonano ati : Baine omugisha abu amaisho gaabo garikureeba ebi murikureeba !
42010024	Manya nimbagambira nti : Abarangi baingi n'abagabe bakenda kureeba ebi murikureeba , kwonka tibarabireebire , n'okuhurira ebi murikuhurira , kwonka tibarabihuriire .
42010025	Hakaba hariho omwegyesa w'eiteeka , owaimukire akamubuuza naamutega , ati : Mwegyesa , nkaakora ki okutunga amagara agatahwaho ?
42010026	Nawe yaamugarukamu ati : Omu iteeka kikahandiikwa kita ? Oshomamu ki ?
42010027	Ndi we ati : Kunda Mukama Ruhanga waawe n'omutima gwawe gwona , n'amagara gaawe goona , n'amaani gaawe goona , n'obwengye bwawe bwona , kandi na mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda ,
42010028	Yesu yaamugira ati : Waagarukamu gye ; kora otyo , nibwo oraatungye ago magara .
42010029	Kwonka omushaija ogwo ahabw'okwenda kweyeza , yaabuuza Yesu ati : Mutaahi wangye n'oha ?
42010030	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Eizooba rimwe omushaija akaba naaruga Yerusalemu naaza Yeriko , yaagwa omu bambuzi , baamucwijura byona ebi yaabaire aine , baamuteera baatsiga ari haihi n'okufa .
42010031	Omuri ago magingo omuhongyerezi nawe yaareetwa ogwo muhanda naashuuma ; ku yaareebire ogwo mushaija , yaamuraba hangahari .
42010032	Kandi n'Omuleevi nikwo atyo , ku yaahikire omuri ogwo mwanya , nawe yaamureeba yaamuraba hangahari .
42010033	Kwonka Omusamariya omugyenzi , ku yaamugwireho , yaamureeba ari atyo , yaamugirira esaasi .
42010034	Yaamuhika , obuhuta bwe yaabwomooza amajuta na viino , yaabushemba . Atyo yaamukiriza yaamuta aha ndogoya ye ei yaabaire atembire , yaamutwara omu nju y'abagyenyi , yaamurwaza .
42010035	Ku bwaseesire yaihayo shilingi ibiri , yaazikwatsa mukama w'egyo nju , yaamugira ati : Murwaze , ku ndaagarukye , eki oraayongyereho kyona , niinyija kukiihura .
42010036	Noogira ngu ahari abo bonshatu , n'oha owaayorekire ku ari mutaahi w'ogwo mushaija owaagwire omu bambuzi ?
42010037	Onu ati : N'owaamugiriire esaasi . Yesu yaamugira ati : Irooko naiwe otwaze otyo .
42010038	Ku baabaire nibakigyenda , Yesu yaahika omu kyaro , omukazi orikwetwa Marita yaamutaasya omwe .
42010039	Akaba aine omurumuna orikwetwa Mariya . Mariya ogwo yaashutama haihi n'ebigyere bya Mukama , yaaguma naahurira ebi arikugamba .
42010040	Reero Marita , owaabaire naarabanisibwamu ebi yaabaire naakora , yaagira ati : Mukama , torikureeba ku murumuna wangye arikunnagiirira nkaheereza nyenka ? Naakweshengyereza , mugambire ankwatse .
42010041	Kwonka Mukama yaamugarukamu ati : Marita , Marita , oyemereize omutima noofa kubi n'ebintu bingi ;
42010042	haza ekirikwetengwa kiri kimwe kyonka . Mariya we yaatoorana omugabo ogurikukira oburungi ogutarimwakwa .
42011001	Yesu akaba ari omu mwanya gumwe naashaba ; ku yaaherize , omwe aha batendekwa be yaamugira ati : Mukama , twegyese okushaba nk'oku Yohaana yaayegyeise abatendekwa be .
42011002	Nawe yaabagambira ati : Ku muraabe nimushaba mugire muti : Taata , eiziina ryawe ritiinwe , obukama bwawe bwije ;
42011003	otuhe buri izooba egabo yaitu y'obutoosha ;
42011004	otusaasire ebibi byaitu , ahabw'okuba naitwe tusaasire weena otwineho eibanja ; otatureka tukoohibwa .
42011005	Kandi akabagambira ati : Omwe omuriimwe ku yaakuba aine mugyenzi we , yaaza owe omu itumbi kumushaba ati :
42011006	Mugyenzi wangye , nguza emigaati eshatu , ahabw'okuba munywani wangye nibwo arikwija naaruga omu rugyendo , haza tiinyine ky'okumuha .
42011007	Nyineeka ogwo yaamugarukiramu omu nju , ati : Otanganzya , naaherize kukinga , nyowe n'abaana bangye twabyamire , tinkiine gaimuka kugikuha .
42011008	Nimbagambira nti : Ogwo mushaija nobu araabe atarikwenda kwimuka kugimuha ahabw'omukago , kwonka ahabw'okugumizamu naamweshengyereza , naija kurugaho aimukye , ahe munywani we ogwo byona ebi arikwenda .
42011009	Naanye nimbagambira nti : Mushabe , muryaheebwa ; musherure , muryazoora ; mwiguze , muryaigurirwa .
42011010	Ahabw'okuba weena oshaba , aheebwa ; osherura , azoora ; n'oiguza , aigurirwa .
42011011	Ni muzaire ki omuriimwe ou mutabani we yaakushaba ekyenyanja , onu akamuha enjoka ?
42011012	Nari owaakumushaba eihuri , akamuha ekinyabushegu ?
42011013	Mbwenu imwe ababi , ku muraabe nimumanya kuha abaana baanyu ebirungi , Shoimwe ow'omu iguru k'arikizaho kuha Mutima Orikwera abarikumushaba !
42011014	Eizooba rimwe Yesu akabinga aha muntu ekyago ekyabaire kimuhindwire ekiteta . Ekyo kyago ku kyamurugireho , ogwo muntu yaagamba ; abantu baatangaara .
42011015	Kwonka bamwe omuribo baagira bati : Ebyago naabibinga n'obushoboorozi bwa Beelizebuli mukuru waabyo .
42011016	Abandi baamutega nibamushaba akamanyiso akarikuruga ahari Ruhanga .
42011017	Kwonka we yaamanya ebiteekateeko byabo , yaabagira ati : Obugabe bwona obwebaganisamu buba buri obw'okuhwerekyerera ; n'eka ku eyetaanisamu , ekumbagara .
42011018	Na Sitaane nikwo ari atyo . Ku araabe naayebaganisamu , obugabe bwe nibugumaho buta ? Mbwenu nk'oku murikugira , ngu nyowe ebyago nimbibingisa Beelizebuli ;
42011019	biri ku ndaabe nimbibingisa Beelizebuli , abaana baanyu bo nibabibingisa oha ? N'ahabw'ekyo nibo baraabamare empaka .
42011020	Kwonka ku ndaabe nimbibingisa obushoboorozi bwa Ruhanga , biri obwo , obukama bwa Ruhanga bubahikireho .
42011021	Omuntu w'amaani oine eby'okurwanisa byona ku arinda aka ye , ebintu bye biba buhooro .
42011022	Kwonka orikumukiza emikono ku amutaahirira , yaamusingura , amunyaga eby'okurwanisa ebi yaaba naayesiga ; haza eminyago ye agibagana n'abandi .
42011023	Otakwatanisa naanye , aba omuzigu wangye , kandi otataaruura naanye , ataataanisa .
42011024	Ekyago ku kiruga omu muntu , kizengyerera omu byanga ebitarimu maizi nikisherura ah'okutuura . Ku hakiburira , kigira kiti : Ka ngarukye omwangye omu naarugire .
42011025	Kwonka ku kihikamu , kyashanga egyo nju eyeyereirwe kandi etegwirwe ,
42011026	kityo kigyenda , kireeta ebindi byago mushanju ebibi okukikira . Mpaho bitaahamu , bigumamu ; ogwo muntu omuheru gwe guba mubi okukira oku yaabaire ari bwabiso .
42011027	Yesu ku yaabaire naakigamba , omukazi ow'omu baabaire bateeraniire aho , yaimutsya eiraka ati : Enda eyaakuzaire n'amabeere agu waayonkire biine omugisha .
42011028	Kwonka we yaagarukamu ati : Abakira kugira omugisha n'abahurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga bakakyorobera .
42011029	Ebimbuuro by'abantu ku byakanyire , Yesu yaabagambira ati : Ab'obusingye obu ni babi , nibashaba akamanyiso ; kwonka tihariho kamanyiso karaaboorekwe , kureka aka Yona .
42011030	Nk'oku Yona yaabaire akamanyiso aha Banineeve , n'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo ariba aha b'obusingye obu .
42011031	Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , omugabekazi wa bukiizi-bwa-buryo aryayemerera n'ab'obusingye obu , abasingise orubanja , ahabw'okuba we akaruga aha muheru gw'ensi , yaija kuhurira eby'obwengye bwa Solomooni ; mbwenu reeba , aha hariho orikukira Solomooni .
42011032	Aha kiro ky'okucweraho orubanja , Abanineeve baryayemerera n'ab'obusingye obu , babasingise orubanja ; ahabw'okuba Yona ku yaabarangiriire , baayegarukamu ; mbwenu reeba , aha hariho orikukira Yona .
42011033	Tihariho muntu ohemba etabaaza akagita endugu nari akagijuumikira ekiibo , kureka agita aha kikondo , ngu ehwezese abarikutaaha omu nju .
42011034	Eriisho niryo rumuri rw'omubiri gwawe . Eriisho ryawe kuriba rihuriire , omubiri gwawe gwona gubugwa okuhweza ; kwonka ku riba rirwaire , omubiri gwawe nagwo gutimba omwirima .
42011035	Oyerinde nu , okuhweza oku oine kutakaaba omwirima .
42011036	N'ahabw'ekyo omubiri gwawe gwona ku guraabe gubugirwe okuhweza , kandi gutarimu ekyetwa omwirima , biri niguhwereza kimwe nk'oku etabaaza ekumurikira neeyaka .
42011037	Yesu ku yaabaire yaaheza ati kugamba , Omufarisaayo yaamweta kurya nawe owe . Onu yaataaha omu nju , yaaza aha meeza .
42011038	Ogwo Mufarisaayo ku yaakireebire , yaatangaara kureeba Yesu ataabanza kunaaba atakariire .
42011039	Kwonka Mukama yaamugambira ati : Imwe Bafarisaayo ' mwe , mushemeza enyima y'ebikopo n'eshuhaani , haza omunda mwijwire obunyagi n'obubi .
42011040	Imwe bashema ' mwe , owaahangire eby'aharuguru tiwe yaahangire n'eby'omunda ?
42011041	Haakiri abooro mubahe aha bi mwine , haza byona bibabeere ebishemeire .
42011042	Kwonka imwe Bafarisaayo ' mwe , muryakareeba ! Ahabw'okuba mutoija kimwe kya ikumi ky'ebishaka ebireetera emboga kugira omuranzi n'ebizinuza , na buri ruganda rwabyo rwona , kwonka obwinganisa n'okukunda Ruhanga mubirenzya amaisho . Ebyo nibyo mwakukozire mutarekire na kiri .
42011043	Muryakareeba , Bafarisaayo ' mwe ! Ahabw'okuba mukunda emyanya y'ekitiinwa omu mateeraniro , n'okutangirirwa omu butare .
42011044	Muryakareeba , ahabw'okuba muri nk'ebituuro bitarikureebwa , ebi abantu baribataho batabimanyire !
42011045	Omwe aha bahangu b'eiteeka amugarukamu ati : Mwegyesa , manya ku orikugamba otyo , naitwe nooba otujumire .
42011046	Onu amugira ati : Naimwe bahangu b'eiteeka ' mwe , muryakareeba ! Ahabw'okuba mwekoreza abantu emitwaro etarikubaasa kwekorerwa , haza imwe mutarikugikozaho rukumu .
42011047	Muryakareeba , imwe abombeka ebituuro by'abarangi abu baashoimwe baitsire !
42011048	Ku murikuba nimukora ekyo , nimuba nimwikiriza eki baashoimwe baakozire kandi nimukisiima . Bo bakabaita , imwe nimwombeka ebituuro byabo .
42011049	Nikyo Bwengye wa Ruhanga yaagiriire ati : Ndyabatumaho abarangi n'entumwa ; abamwe babaite nari babahiiganise ,
42011050	oruzaaro oru rubone kuturwa eshagama y'omurangi weena eyaaseesirwe , ensi yaaba kubaho ,
42011051	okwiha aha ya Abeeli okuhitsya aha ya Zekariya , ou baitiire ahagati y'eitambiro n'omwanya ogurikwera . Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ab'oruzaaro oru , egyo shagama eryabatukurira .
42011052	Muryakareeba , imwe bahangu b'eiteeka ' mwe ! Ahabw'okuba mukaiha ekikomoorozo omu rwigi rw'okumanya . Imwe mwenka timwataahamu , kandi abarikwenda kutaahamu mwabazibira .
42011053	Ku yaarugira omuri egyo nju , abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo baatandika kumuhakanisa baine ekiniga , nibateeraho kumugyema kugarukamu ebibuuzo byabo ebitarikubarwa ,
42011054	nibamutega ngu bamukwatsize omu bi arikugamba .
42012001	Omuri ago magingo abantu enkumi n'enkumi ku baabaire bateeraine nibaribatiirirana , Yesu yaatandika kugamba naabandiza aha batendekwa be , ati : Mwerinde ekitumbisa ky'Abafarisaayo , nibwo buryarya bwabo .
42012002	Manya tihariho kishwekirwe ekitarishuuruurwa , nari ekisherekirwe ekitarimanywa .
42012003	N'ahabw'ekyo kyona eki muragambiire omu mwirima kiryahurirwa nyomushana , na kyona eki murahwihwitsiize omu myanya eyekiikire kiryarangirirwa aha mitwe y'enju .
42012004	Imwe banywani bangye , nimbagambira nti : Murekye kutiina abarikwita omubiri , ahabw'okuba ku baheza , baba batakiine kindi eki baraakore .
42012005	Ka mbagambire ou muraagume nimutiina : niwe Ogwo oheza kwita , akagira n'obushoboorozi bw'okunaga okuzimu omu muriro . Weeza kwo , Ogwo mube niwe mwatiina .
42012006	Ebiteerankumba bitaano tibigurwa sente ibiri ? Kwonka shi , tihariho na kimwe ekyeba omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
42012007	Nangwa n'eishokye ry'aha mutwe gwanyu ryona rikabarwa . Timuri b'okutiina , ahabw'okuba muri ab'obuguzi bwingi okukira amagana g'ebiteerankumba .
42012008	Nimbagambira nti : Weena orikuunyemera omu maisho g'abantu n'Omwana w'omuntu aryamwemera omu maisho ga baamaraika ba Ruhanga .
42012009	Kwonka weena orikuunyoga omu maisho g'abantu , aryayogyerwa omu maisho ga baamaraika ba Ruhanga .
42012010	Weena origamba kubi aha Mwana w'omuntu aryasaasirwa , kwonka orirogota ahari Mutima Orikwera tarisaasirwa .
42012011	Ku baribatwara omu mateeraniro n'aha baramuzi n'aha b'obushoboorozi kubatonganisa , mutarishoberwa oku muryetonganira n'eki murigamba ,
42012012	ahabw'okuba omu bunaku obwo Mutima Orikwera aryabahabura eki murigamba .
42012013	Omuntu omwe omu baabaire bateeraniire aho , akagira Yesu ati : Mwegyesa , gambira mwene tata abagane naanye eby'obuhunguzi bwaitu . Yaamugarukamu ati :
42012014	Iwe mushaija ' we , n'oha owantaireho kuba ow'okubaramura , nari ow'okubabaganisiza ebi murikufa ?
42012015	Bwanyima yaabagira ati : Mureebe kandi mwerinde ekyetwa omururu kyona , manya amagara g'omuntu tigaba mu bi atungire nangwa nobu akutunga ebishaagire .
42012016	Nikwo kubacwera enfumu egi , ati : Hakaba hariho omushaija omutungi , owaabaire ashaarwire bingi omu musiri gwe .
42012017	Akateekateeka ati : Mbwenu ngire nta , ka ntaine h'okuhunika egi myaka yangye yoona ?
42012018	Atyo agira ati : Eki ndaije kukora n'eki : niinyija kusheenya ebitara byangye , nyombekye ebihango , mbe nimwo naahunika emyaka yangye yoona , nkabiikamu n'ebintu byangye .
42012019	Obwo nibwo ndaayegambire nti : Nyine enyanja y'ebintu birungi ebibiikiirwe emyaka mingi erikwija ; mbwenu ka mpuumure , ndye , nnywe , njarame .
42012020	Kwonka Ruhanga yaamugira ati : Iwe mushema ' we ! Eki kiro noija kwakwa amagara gaawe ; mbwenu ebi waayetindikiire biryaba eby'oha ?
42012021	Omuntu oyebiikira eitungo ry'eby'ensi , kwonka atarikuryebiikira ahari Ruhanga , nikwo ashusha atyo .
42012022	Atyo Yesu yaagambira abatendekwa be ati : Nikyo ndikubagambirira nti : Mutaryemerereza omutima eby'amagara gaanyu ebi muraarye , nainga ebi emibiri yaanyu eraajware ;
42012023	ahabw'okuba amagara gakira ebyokurya , n'omubiri gukira eby'okujwara .
42012024	Mureebere aha bikoona . Tibibiba kandi tibigyesha ; tibigira mabiikiro nobu byakuba ebitara ; haza kunu Ruhanga abiriisa . Imwe , ka nimukirira kimwe enyonyi !
42012025	Omuriimwe hariho owaakubaasa kwongyera aha myaka y'amagara ge , nobu yaakwemereza omutima ata ?
42012026	Ku muraabe nimuremwa kutegyeka obuntu bukye butyo , ahabw'enki nimwemereza omutima ahabw'ebindi ?
42012027	Mureebere aha birabyo , tibyogosha kandi tibiruka , kwonka nimbagambira nti : Nangwa na Solomooni omu kitiinwa kye kyona taraizihiirwe bijwaro nka kimwe aharibyo .
42012028	Mbwenu Ruhanga ku araabe ajweka atyo obunyaatsi bw'omu ishwa , oburiho eri izooba , nyencakare bukanagwa omu kikoomi , kaashwa imwe bantu ' mwe , abaine okwikiriza kukye !
42012029	Mbwenu imwe , mutarimarira omutima aha bi murirya n'aha bi murinywa , nobu kwakuba okugwemereza .
42012030	Manya ebyo byona nibyo Abanyamahanga boona baitanira , kandi Shoimwe naamanya ku murikubyetenga .
42012031	Kureka omutima mugumarire aha bukama bwe , haza ebyo byona muryabyongyerwaho .
42012032	Imwe obusyo bukye , timuri b'okutiina , ahabw'okuba Shoimwe akasiima kubaha obukama .
42012033	Mutunde ebi mwine . Ebiraabirugyemu mubihe abakyene . Mwetungire enshaho ezitarikukura , n'eitungo eritahwaho ery'omu iguru ei abashuma batashuuza , n'ebiyenje ei bitarisiisira .
42012034	Manya ahu eitungo ryanyu riri n'omutima gwanyu niho guba .
42012035	Mugume mwezirikire n'amatabaaza gaanyu nigaaka .
42012036	Mube nk'abantu abategyereize mukama waabo kugaruka naaruga aha bugyenyi bw'obushwere , abateekateekire kumwigurira yaahikaho ati naiguza .
42012037	Abaheereza abo , abu mukama waabo ariija akashanga nibareeba , baine omugisha ! Ka nkibagambire omu mazima nti : Aryayezirika , abashutamye aha meeza abaheereze .
42012038	Obundi akaija abantu baahirwayo nari enkoko nizigamba , kwonka abaheereza abu arishanga beeteekateekire baine omugisha !
42012039	Mwetegyereze eki : nyineeka ku yaakuba naamanya eshaaha ei omushuma araiziremu , takaamwikiriza kufumura enju ye .
42012040	Naimwe nu mugume mweteekateekire , ahabw'okuba timurikumanya bunaku obu Omwana w'omuntu ariiziramu .
42012041	Petero yaagira Yesu ati : Mukama , egyo nfumu ei waacwa , niitwe orikurengyeza nari n'omuntu weena ?
42012042	Mukama yaagira ati : Ni mutsigire ki omwesigwa kandi ow'obwengye , ou mukama we yaatsigiire ab'omu ka ye , kubaha endengo y'engano omu bunaku buhikire ?
42012043	Ogwo mutsigire , ou mukama we ariija akashanga naakora atyo , aine omugisha .
42012044	Ninkugambira omu mazima nti : Aryamuha obushoboorozi aha bi atungire byona .
42012045	Kwonka ogwo mutsigire ku arigira omu mutima gwe ati : Mukama wangye yaatuuraho kwija ; reero akatandika kuteera abaheereza n'abaheerezakazi , akarya , akanywa , akasinda ;
42012046	mukama w'ogwo mutsigire aryaija aha kiro ki onu atamwetegyeireho n'aha shaaha ei atarikumanya . Haza aryamufubira munonga , amugire nk'oku abateesigwa bagirwa .
42012047	Omuhuuku owaamanyire ebi mukama we arikwenda , kwonka akashangwa atakabikozire , aryateerwa eminyaafu mingi munonga .
42012048	Kwonka otarabimanyire , kandi akashangwa akozire eby'okumuteeza , aryateerwa eminyaafu mikye . Owaahairwe bingi aryabuuzibwa bingi , n'owaakwatsiibwe bingi aryayenzibwa ebirikukiraho .
42012049	Ekyandeetsire n'okutweka omuriro omu nsi . Nkaabaasibwa ki gushangwa gwayakire !
42012050	Kandi hakiriyo okubatizibwa oku nkiine kubatizibwa ; ebishi nikinsaasa okuhitsya obu kurihikiirizibwa .
42012051	Nimuteekateeka ngu nkaija kureeta obusingye omu nsi ? Nimbagambira nti : Ngaaha , kureka nkaija kutaanisa .
42012052	Ahabw'okuba okwiha hati enju erimu bataano eryayebaganisamu , abashatu barwanise ababiri n'ababiri barwanise abashatu .
42012053	Ishe w'omwana aryarwanisa omutabani , n'omutabani arwanise ishe . Nyina w'omwana aryarwanisa muhara we , nawe arwanise nyina . Nyinazaara w'omuntu aryarwanisa omukaamwana , n'onu arwanise nyinazaara .
42012054	Kandi Yesu akagambira ebimbuuro by'abantu ati : Ku mureeba ekicu kyarumbaara burengyerwa-izooba , ahonaaho mugira ngu enjura yaaza kugwa ; mpaho egwa .
42012055	Kandi omuyaga ku gureetwa bukiizi-bwa-buryo , mugira ngu nihaija kubaho omushana mwingi ; haza gubaho .
42012056	Imwe ndyarya ' mwe , ku muraabe nimumanya kurengyerera eby'aha nsi n'eby'ahaiguru , nimuremwa muta kukyengyera eby'obunaku obu ?
42012057	Ahabw'enki nimuremwa kucwamu ekihikire ?
42012058	Eky'okureeberaho : ku oraabe nooza omu iramuriro n'orikukutabaariza , teeraho kugarukana nawe mukiri omu muhanda . Kitari ekyo , naija kukukurura , akuhitsye omu maisho g'omuramuzi , omuramuzi akuhe omukuru w'ekihome , n'onu akikwigatiremu .
42012059	Ninkugambira nti : torikirugamu okuhitsya obu oriihura akasente koona akakitsigaireyo .
42013001	Omu bunaku obwo hakaija abantu , baateekyerereza Yesu eby'Abagalilaaya abu Pilaato yaitsire nibahonga ebitambo .
42013002	Ku yaahuriire ekyo , yaabagira ati : Nimuteekateeka ngu Abagalilaaya abo abaabonaboine batyo , bakaba bari abasiisi okukira abandi Bagalilaaya ?
42013003	Ngaaha , nimbagambira ngu tikwo baabaire bari . Kwonka naimwe , ku muraabe muteeteisize , muryahwerekyerera nkabo .
42013004	Nari shi , bari eikumi na munaana , abaateirwe omunaara gwa Siloamu gukabaita , nimugira ngu bakaba baine orubanja okukira abandi boona ab'omuri Yerusalemu ?
42013005	Ngaaha , nimbagambira ngu tikwo baabaire bari . Kwonka naimwe , ku muraabe muteegarukiremu , muryahwerekyerera nkabo .
42013006	Yesu akacwa enfumu egi , ati : Omuntu akaba aine omutiini agubyaire omu musiri gwe gw'emizaabibu ; yaija kugushoromaho ebijuma , kwonka yaashanga bitariho .
42013007	Yaagira omushaija owaabaire naareeberera ogwo musiri , ati : Reeba , naahitsya emyaka eshatu niinyija kusherura ebijuma ahari ogu mutiini , kwonka nshangaho busha . Guteme ; nigufiisiza busha omwanya .
42013008	Mpaho ogwo mushaija amugarukamu ati : Mukama wangye , gurekye gumare ogundi mwaka , mbanze nguhingirire , ngutemu orwezo .
42013009	Obundi omu mwaka ogurikwija gukaayana ; reero obona kugutema gwaba gutaanire .
42013010	Aha izooba rimwe erya Sabato , Yesu akaba naayegyesa omu iteeraniro rimwe .
42013011	Haashangwa hariho omukazi owaabaire amazire emyaka ikumi na munaana ariho ekyago ekyamuhendahenzire , akacweka omugongo , atabaase kwemerera burunga .
42013012	Yesu ku yaamureebire , yaamweta , yaamugira ati : Mukazi ' we , waakira obumuga .
42013013	Atyo amutaho engaro ; ahonaaho ogwo mukazi agororoka , ahimbisa Ruhanga .
42013014	Kwonka omukuru w'eiteeraniro aguubwa kubi , ngu ahabw'okuba Yesu yaakiza ahari Sabato . Mpaho agambira abari aho , ati : Hariho ebiro mukaaga ebikorerwamu . Mube nibyo mwaguma nimwiziramu kutambirwa , kutari kwija ahari Sabato .
42013015	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Ndyarya ' mwe , omuriimwe hariho otatsibura nimi ye , nari ndogoya ye kuza kugyeeshera ahari Sabato ?
42013016	Mbwenu shi ogu mukazi , muhara wa Aburahamu , ou Sitaane aboheire egi myaka ikumi na munaana , kyaba kitahikire kumubohoorora aha izooba rya Sabato ?
42013017	Ku yaagambire ekyo , abarikumuhakanisa boona baabwerabwera , kandi abantu boona baashemerererwa munonga eby'okutangaaza ebi yaabaire naakora .
42013018	Yesu akongyera kugamba ati : Obukama bwa Ruhanga nibushusha ki ? Mbwenu mbugyeragyeranise na ki ?
42013019	Buri nk'enjuma y'embibo ya karidaari , ei omuntu yaatwaire akanaga omu musiri gwe ; ekakura , ekarugamu omuti , enyonyi z'omu kaabunga zikaarika omu mataagi gaagwo .
42013020	Ekindi akagira ati : Obukama bwa Ruhanga mbushushanise na ki ?
42013021	Buri nk'ekitumbisa eki omukazi yaakwatsire , akakijwanzya omu ncuro ishatu z'esaano okuhitsya obu yoona yaatumbire .
42013022	Yesu akagyenda naayegyesa omu birorero n'omu byaro , obwo naaza Yerusalemu .
42013023	Omuntu yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , noogira ngu abakye bonka nibo barijunwa ? Yaabagira ati :
42013024	Mukore kyona eki murikubaasa kutaahira omu irembo erifunzire , ahabw'okuba nimbagambira , ngu baingi baryateeraho kutaahamu kwonka baremwe .
42013025	Nyineeka ku ariheza kwimuka yaakinga orwigi , muryashanga mwemereire aheeru nimwiguza muti : Mukama waitu , twigurireho ! Kwonka aryabagarukamu ati : Tindikumanya ahi murikuruga .
42013026	Mpaho mutandikye kwetonda muti : Ka twabaire shi turya naiwe tukanywa naiwe , nooyegyeseza omu nguuto z'owaitu .
42013027	We aryabagarukamu ati : Tindikumanya ahi murikuruga . Nimundugyeho , imwe mwena enkozi z'ebibi .
42013028	Obwo haryabaho okucura n'okunena amaino , mwareeba Aburahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo n'abarangi boona omu bukama bwa Ruhanga , kwonka imwe mubingiirwe aheeru .
42013029	Kandi abantu aba burugwa-izooba na burengyerwa-izooba , aba bukiizi-bwa-bumosho na bukiizi-bwa buryo baryaija bashutame aha bugyenyi omu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
42013030	Manya ab'okuhereeruka baryaba ab'okubanza , n'ab'okubanza babe ab'okuhereeruka .
42013031	Ago magingo bamwe omu Bafarisaayo bakaija , baagambira Yesu bati : Irooko ! Ruga aha , ahabw'okuba Herode naayenda kukwita !
42013032	Yaabagarukamu ati : Mugyende mugambire muha ngigyo , muti : Omanye ku hati na nyencakare ndikubinga ebyago n'okutamba endwara , kandi aha kiro kya kashatu mpikiirize ekyandeetsire .
42013033	Kwonka eri izooba na nyencakare na ku burisheesha ndi ow'okugumizamu , ahabw'okuba tikihikire omurangi kufeera ahatari muri Yerusalemu .
42013034	Yerusalemu , Yerusalemu , iwe oita abarangi , okateera amabaare abakutumirweho ! Ni kangahi obu naayenzire kuteerana hamwe abaana baawe , nk'oku enkoko erundaana obwana bwayo ekabubumbatira omu mapapa , kwonka mukanga !
42013035	Reeba , enju yaanyu mwaza kugitsigaramu mwenka . Kwonka nimbahamiza ku mutarindeeba bundi okuhitsya obu murigira muti : Orikwija omu iziina rya Mukama ahimbisibwe !
42014001	Mbwenu aha izooba rya Sabato , Yesu ku yaabaire agiire ow'omwe aha bakuru b'omu Bafarisaayo kurya nawe , baamugumyaho eriisho .
42014002	Kandi omu maisho ge hakaba hariho omushaija orwaire orusimba .
42014003	Yesu nikwo kubuuza abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo , ati : Nikiikirizibwa eiteeka kukiza omuntu ahari Sabato , nari tikirikwikirizibwa ?
42014004	Kwonka bo baaguma bahunami . Nawe nikwo kukwata ogwo mushaija akamukiza , akamwohereza .
42014005	Bwanyima yaabagira ati : N'oha omuriimwe ou mutabani we nari ente ye byakugwa omu iziba ahari Sabato , atabiihemu ahonaaho ?
42014006	Ekyo nakyo tibarabaasize kukigarukamu .
42014007	Yesu ku yaareebire abeetsirwe aha bugyenyi nibatangatangana emyanya mikuru , yaabacwera enfumu egi , ati :
42014008	Ku oryetwa aha bugyenyi bw'obushwere , otashutama omu mwanya gw'ekitiinwa . Obundi hakaaba heetsirwe orikukukiza eiziina ,
42014009	reero obeetsire mwembi akaija akakugira ati : Higiza ogu muntu . Otyo okagyenda noobwerabwera kuza kushutama omu mwanya gw'enyima .
42014010	Mbwenu ku oraayetwe aha bugyenyi , gyenda oshutame omu mwanya ogutari gw'ekitiinwa , ogugumemu . Nyineeka ku araije , abe niwe yaakugira ati : Munywani wangye , garuka aha . Nibwo weena oshutami naiwe aha meeza araakureebe ori ow'ekitiinwa .
42014011	Manya weena oyetunguura aryabundikwa , kandi oyebundika aryatunguurwa .
42014012	Bwanyima Yesu akagambira nyineeka ati : Ku oraateekye obugyenyi nyomushana nari nyekiro , oteeta banywani baawe , beene sho , abanyaruganda nari bataahi baawe abatungi , ngu nabo nyentsya bakwete bakuzimuurire .
42014013	Kwonka iwe , ku oriteeka obugyenyi , obweteho abooro , ebimuga , ebirema n'empumi .
42014014	Haza obwo nibwo oriheebwa omugisha , ahabw'okuba nobu baraabe batarikubaasa kukuzimuurira , enzimuurano yaawe oryagitunga abahikiriire boona baazooka .
42014015	Omwe omu baabaire bari aha bugyenyi , ku yaakihuriire , yaagira ati : Ebishi , omuntu orirya ebyokurya by'aha bugyenyi bw'omu bukama bwa Ruhanga aryaba aine omugisha !
42014016	Kwonka we yaamugira ati : Hariho omushaija owaateekire obugyenyi buhango , akeeta abantu baingi munonga .
42014017	Obunaku bw'obugyenyi ku bwahikire , yaatuma omuheereza we kugambira abaayeetsirwe ati : Nimwije , obugyenyi bwatebeekanisiibwe .
42014018	Kwonka boona baatandika kwekwatsakwatsa . Ow'okubanza yaagira ati : Nguzire ekibanja , nshemereire kuza kukireeba . Naakweshengyereza , omungambirire , ansaasire .
42014019	Ondiijo ati : Nguzire enimi ikumi zikomeraine ibiri ibiri , mbwenu ninza kuzihingisa ndeebe . Naakweshengyereza , omungambirire , ansaasire .
42014020	Ondiijo kandi ati : Nibwo ndugire kushwera , tikyambaasikira kwija .
42014021	Ogwo muheereza yaagarukayo , yaabiteekyerereza mukama we . Nyineeka nikwo kuguubwa kubi , akagira ogwo muheereza we , ati : Yehuute oze omu nguuto n'omu buhanda bw'ekirorero , ondeetere abooro , ebimuga , empumi n'ebirema .
42014022	Handi hakye omuheereza , ati : Mukama wangye , ebi wandagiira naabikora , kwonka hakiriho emyanya mingi .
42014023	Nyineeka amugambira ati : Irooko oze omu bihandagazi n'omu buhanda bw'omu ngo , ogyemesereze abantu baije , enju yangye eijure .
42014024	Kwonka nimbagambira , ngu tihariho n'omwe aha beetsirwe oraaroze aha bugyenyi bwangye .
42014025	Ebimbuuro bingi by'abantu bikakuratira Yesu naagyenda ; yaahinduka , yaabagira ati :
42014026	Omuntu weena oija ahi ndi , atangire ishe na nyina , omukazi we n'abaana , beene ishe na banyaanya , nangwa n'amagara ge , tabaasa kuba mutendekwa wangye .
42014027	Weena oteekorera musharaba gwe akankuratira , tabaasa kuba mutendekwa wangye .
42014028	N'oha omuriimwe owaakwenda kwombeka omunaara , atabanze kushutama akabariirira yaaba aine ebirikuguheza ?
42014029	Ku yaakuba atagizire atyo , yaayombeka omusingi , bwanyima yaashanga atarikubaasa kuheza ogwo murimo , abareebi bakaatandika kumushekyerera ,
42014030	bati : Eki kishaija kikatandika kwombeka , kyaremwa kuheza .
42014031	Nari ni mugabe ki owaakuhurura kuteera ondi mugabe , atabanze kushutama akareeba yaaba we n'engabo ze kakumi baakubaasa kurwanisa ow'obukumi bubiri oizire kwerwanaho ?
42014032	Ku yaakureeba atarikubaasa , akaatuma ahari ogwo mugabe akiri hare , kumubuuza eki yaakumuhongyera ngu bagarukane .
42014033	Naimwe nikwo kiri kityo . Tihariho n'omwe orikubaasa kuba omutendekwa wangye , atatsigireho byona ebi atungire .
42014034	Manya omwonyo guba murungi , beitu omwonyo ku gwakuhwamu ensha , ekaagarurwamu eta ?
42014035	Guba gutakigasira itaka , nari ekirundo ky'orwezo . Abantu bagunaga . Weena oine amatu garikuhurira , ahurire !
42015001	Abashorooza b'omushoro n'abasiisi omu bunaku obwo bakaba nibakuratira Yesu kuhurira ebi arikugamba .
42015002	Kwonka Abafarisaayo bo hamwe n'abahangu b'eiteeka ku baakireebire , baatandika kwetomboita nibagambirana bati : Reeba ogu muntu orikwehitsya abasiisi akarya nabo .
42015003	Nawe nikwo kubacwera enfumu egi , ati :
42015004	Ni muntu ki omuriimwe owaakuba aine entaama igana , hakiburaho emwe , atatsigyeho amakumi mwenda na mwenda omu iriisizo , akaza kusherura eyaabura , okuhitsya obu araagibone ?
42015005	Ku agizoora , agiheeka aha mabega ashemereirwe .
42015006	Akihika omuka , ayeta banywani be na bataahi be , abagira ati : Bagyenzi bangye , mushemererwe hamwe naanye , ahabw'okuba naabona entaama yangye ebaire eshohokire .
42015007	Na mbwenu nimbagambira ku ab'omu iguru bashemererwa batyo ahabw'omusiisi omwe owaayegarukamu , okukira abahikiriire makumi mwenda na mwenda abatarikwetenga kwegarukamu .
42015008	Nari ni mukazi ki , oine empiiha ikumi , hakiburaho emwe , atahembe tabaaza , akakukumba enju yoona , akarondera kimwe okuhitsya obu araagibone ?
42015009	Kandi ku agibona , ayeta banywani be na bataahi be , abagira ati : Bagyenzi bangye , mushemererwe naanye , ahabw'okuba empiiha yangye ebaire ebuzire naagibona .
42015010	Na mbwenu nimbagambira ku baamaraika ba Ruhanga bashemererwa batyo ahabw'omusiisi omwe owaayegarukamu .
42015011	Yesu kandi akagira ati : Hakaba hariho omushaija owaabaire aine abatabani babiri .
42015012	Omuto akashaba ishe ati : Taata , mpa omugabo gw'ebintu ebi waakundagire . Ishebo nikwo kubabaganisiza eitungo rye .
42015013	Ku haahingwireho ebiro bikye , omutabani ogwo omuto yaarundaana ebye byona , yaaza omu nsi ya hare ; okwo niyo yaashiishaguriire empiiha ze omu micwe mibi .
42015014	Ku yaabiherizeho , egyo nsi yaataasya enjara mpango , nawe yaatandika kushoberwa .
42015015	Nikwo kuza kushumbira omwe aha batungi b'omuri egyo nsi , onu akamwohereza omu iriisizo rye kuriisa empunu .
42015016	Ku yaabaire aba aziriisize , ayetenga kurya ebishushu ebi zaabaire nizirya , kwonka bambe habura owaabimuha .
42015017	Ku yaayegarukiremu , yaagira ati : Abakozi ba tata oku baingana , ka nibarya bikashaaga , haza nyowe nkaitirwa aha enjara !
42015018	Ka nyimukye , nze owa tata , mmwetuurire mmugire nti : Taata , nkacumura ahari Ruhanga n'ahariiwe .
42015019	Tinkiri w'okushemerera kwetwa omwana waawe ; ngira nk'omwe aha baheereza baawe abarikukukorera .
42015020	Atyo yaabandatuka , yaatoora ogurikuza owa ishe . Ku yaabaire akiri hare , ishe yaamuranzya , yaamugirira esaasi . Yairuka naamwizira , yaamugwa omu maizi g'enda , yaamunywegyera .
42015021	Omutabani yaamwetongyeza ati : Taata , nkacumura ahari Ruhanga n'ahariiwe . Tinkiri w'okushemerera kwetwa omwana waawe .
42015022	Kwonka ishe yaagambira abaheereza be ati : Yaimwe , nimurahukye mureete ekijwaro ekirikuhita ebindi , mukimujwekye , mumute empeta omu rukumu n'enkaito omu bigyere .
42015023	Mureete kaberera mugiite , haza tugire obugyenyi tushemererwe .
42015024	Manya mutabani wangye ogu akaba afiire , mbwenu yaazooka ; akaba azaahire , mbwenu yaazaahuuka . Mpaho obugyenyi butandika .
42015025	Mbwenu omutabani omukuru akaba atarimu , ari omu misiri . Ku yaabaire naahinguuka , yaahika haihi n'eka , yaahurira ebyeshongoro n'ebitaaguriro .
42015026	Atyo ayeta omwe omu baheereza , amubuuza ati : Beitu ebyo n'eby'enki ?
42015027	Onu ati : Manya murumuna waawe yaija , kandi shoimwe yaamwitira eri nyana kaberera , ngu ahabw'okuba yaagaruka omu ka ye buhooro kandi ahuriire .
42015028	Ogwo mwojo ku akihurira , ekiniga kyenda kumubarura , ayanga kutaaha omu nju ; ishe arugaho ashohora kumweshengyereza .
42015029	Kwonka ogwo mwana agira ishe ati : Noomanya ku mmazire emyaka egi yoona ninkuheereza , kandi ku ntakangaga kukora ebi ondagiire , haza tokampaga nangwa n'akabuzi kugira obugyenyi na bagyenzi bangye .
42015030	Mbwenu kitabani kyawe ekyo , ku kyagaruka kyaherize kushiishagura ebyawe byona na baamaraaya , waakituukurira kaberera !
42015031	Ishe amugarukamu ati : Mwana wangye , obutoosha otuura naanye ; kyona eki ntungire n'ekyawe .
42015032	Kwonka kyaba kihikire okushemererwa n'okunanuka , ahabw'okuba murumuna waawe ogu akaba afiire , mbwenu yaazooka ; akaba azaahire , mbwenu yaazaahuuka .
42016001	Kandi Yesu akagaruka yaagambira abatendekwa be ati : Hakaba hariho omushaija omutungi , oine omukuru w'eby'eka ye , ou baamumuregyeire ngu naashiishagura ebintu bye .
42016002	Yaayeta ogwo muntu , yaamugira ati : Ebi ndikukuhuriraho biri bita ? Gira , onshoboororere eby'omurimo gwawe , ahabw'okuba tokigaruka kuba mukuru w'ebyangye .
42016003	Ogwo mukuru nikwo kwebuuza ati : Manya mukama wangye yaaza kuunyaka obukuru , mbwenu ngire nta ? Mpingye ? Ka ntaine gahinga ! Nshabiirize ? Obwo shi , baryandeebesa maisho ki ?
42016004	Otyo ! Mbwenu naamanya eki ndaakore bambinga aha murimo , abantu babone kuntaasya omu maka gaabo .
42016005	Atyo ayeta omwe omwe omu baabaire baine amabanja ga mukama we . Ow'okubanza amugira ati : Oine eibanja ririkwingana ki ahari mukama wangye ?
42016006	Onu ati : Endengo igana z'amajuta . Ogwo mukuru amugira ati : Kwata orupapura rwawe oru , oru orikwihurizibwaho , oshutame ahonaaho , ohandiikye makumi ataano .
42016007	N'ondi amubuuza ati : Iwe oine eibanja ririkwingana ki ? Onu ati : Ebitenga igana by'engano . Ogwo mukuru amugira ati : Ija oiheho orupapura rwawe , ohandiikye makumi munaana .
42016008	Mukama waabo akasiima ogwo mukuru w'eby'eka ye otari mwesigwa , ahabw'okuba enyabwengye . Manya abantu b'ensi egi omu kutwazana na bagyenzi baabo nibakiza obwengye abantu b'omushana .
42016009	Kandi nimbagambira nti : Mwetungire abanyamikago n'eitungo ry'obugobya , nyentsya ku ririba ryabahwaireho , babataasye omu maka agatahwaho .
42016010	Manya oyesigwa omu bikye , ayesigwa n'omu bingi ; kandi oteesigwa mu bikye , tayesigwa n'omu bingi .
42016011	Mbwenu ku muraabe mutari beesigwa mu kukoresa eitungo ry'obugobya , n'oha oribeesiga akabakwatsa eitungo ery'amazima ?
42016012	Kandi ku muraabe mutarikwesigwa mu by'abandi , n'oha oribaha ekyanyu kukyetegyekyera ?
42016013	Tihariho muheereza obaasa kuheereza abakama babiri ; ahabw'okuba aryayangaho omwe , akunde ondi ; nari aryahamira ahari omwe , agaye ondi . Manya timurikubaasa kuheereza Ruhanga kandi n'eitungo .
42016014	Abafarisaayo abu eby'amatungo byabaire bitwaire omutima , ku baahuriire ebyo byona , baamushekyerera .
42016015	Nawe yaabagira ati : Niimwe buzima abeeyoreka abantu nk'abahikiriire , kwonka Ruhanga naamanya emitima yaanyu . Manya eki abantu bakugisiriza , Ruhanga akinuga .
42016016	Okuhitsya omu biro bya Yohaana , hakaba nihakora eby'eiteeka n'eby'abarangi ; okwiha obwo Amakuru Marungi g'obukama bwa Ruhanga gatuura nigarangirirwa , kandi buri omwe aitanira okubutaahamu .
42016017	Nikirahuka eiguru n'ensi kuhwaho , okukira akamanyiso kamwe k'aha nyuguta okuruga omu iteeka .
