42016018	Weena oshenda omukazi we akashwera ondi aba ashambaine , kandi omushaija oshwera omukazi oshenzirwe iba , biri ashambaine .
42016019	Hakaba hariho omushaija omutungi , owaabaire ajwara emyenda ya bujwa n'eya kitaani , buri izooba naarya gye ajarami .
42016020	Kandi aha irembo rye hakaba habyamaho omushaija omworo orikwetwa Lazaaro , owaabaire weena ari ebironda ;
42016021	atwire naayetenga kurya obukunkumuka burikuruga aha meeza y'ogwo mutungi . Kandi n'embwa zikaba ziija , zirigatsa ebironda bye .
42016022	Bwanyima omworo ogwo yaafa , yaatwarwa baamaraika ei Aburahamu atuura . Omutungi nawe yaafa , yaaziikwa .
42016023	Ku yaabaire ari okuzimu omu busaasi burengyesereize , yaimutsya amaisho yaareeba Aburahamu ari okwo hare , Lazaaro amuhereire .
42016024	Yaahooga munonga ati : Ai bambe , taata Aburahamu , naafa ! Ngirira esaasi , otume Lazaaro ogwo akoze enshonga y'orukumu rwe omu maizi , ahorahoze orurimi rwangye , ahabw'okuba nimpembererwa munonga omuri eki kibengye ky'omuriro .
42016025	Aburahamu yaamugarukamu ati : Mwana wangye , ijuka omu biro by'amagara gaawe ku waatungire ebirungi , Lazaaro we akatunga ebibi , mbwenu we hati obu naaruhuurwa ; iwe ori omu busaasi bwingi .
42016026	Kandi t'ekyo kyonka : ahagati yaitu hariho oruhanga orurikuzibira omuntu weena orikwenda kucwekanisa kuruga kunu kwija okwo , nari kuruga okwo kwija kunu .
42016027	Omutungi ogwo agarukamu ati : Taata , ninkweshengyereza , tuma Lazaaro owa tata ,
42016028	ahabw'okuba nyineyo barumuna bangye bataano , abagambire bukiri kare , nyentsya nabo batakaija omuri ogu mwanya gw'obuhuruzi .
42016029	Aburahamu amugira ati : Baine ebi Musa n'abarangi baayegyeise , babe nibyo baakuratira .
42016030	Omutungi ati : Ngaaha , taata Aburahamu , ku haakugira owaabahikaho naaruga omu bafiire , bakaayegarukamu .
42016031	Aburahamu amugarukamu ati : Ku baraabe batahuriire Musa n'abarangi , tibariikirizisibwa muntu weena , nobu yaakuba ozookire omu bafiire .
42017001	Yesu akagambira abatendekwa be ati : Ebirikuteeza entsibo tibiribura kubaho , kwonka obireeta aryakareeba !
42017002	Haakiri akomwe orubengo omu maraka anagwe omu nyanja , okukira okuhabisa omwe ahari aba abato .
42017003	Naimwe mwerinde ! Mwene waanyu ku araashiishe , omuhane . Ku araayeteise eki akozire , omusaasire .
42017004	Kandi ku araakushaagize emirundi mushanju omu izooba rimwe , kwonka yaakwijaho emirundi mushanju naagira ati : Naayeteisa , naiwe omusaasire .
42017005	Entumwa zikashaba Mukama ziti : Twongyere okwikiriza !
42017006	Nawe yaabagarukamu ati : Kuri mwine okwikiriza kurikwingana nangwa n'akajuma k'embibo ya karidaari , mukaaragiire omukunyu ogu , muti : Higuka , obyarwe omu nyanja , haza gubakundira .
42017007	N'oha omuriimwe oine omuheereza orikumuhingira , nari orikumuriisiza , akiija naaruga aheeru akamugira ati : Rahuka orye ebyokurya bwawe ?
42017008	Takubaire ari ow'okumugira ati : Ihura ebyokurya byangye , oyezirikye ompeereze , okuhitsya obu ndaaheze kurya n'okunywa , haza iwe obone kurya bwanyima ?
42017009	Nimugira ngu ashemereire kusiima ogwo muheereza ahabw'okukora eki yaamuragiira ?
42017010	Naimwe ku muraagume mwaheza kukora byona ebi muragiirwe , mugire muti : Turi abaheereza abataine mugasho , twakora eki turikuragiirwa kukora .
42017011	Yesu , ku yaabaire naaza Yerusalemu , yaaraba omu mwatano gwa Samariya na Galilaaya .
42017012	Ku yaabaire yaahika omu kyaro kimwe , ababembe ikumi baija kumubugana .
42017013	Baamuhoogyera beemereire hangahari nibagira bati : Yesu Omwegyesa , otugirire embabazi !
42017014	Ku yaabareebire , yaabagira ati : Mugyende mweyorekye abahongyerezi . Nabo ku baabaire nibakizayo , baashemezibwa .
42017015	Omwe omuribo ku yaareebire yaakira , yaagarukayo naasingiza Ruhanga n'eiraka rihango .
42017016	Yaajuumara aha bigyere bya Yesu , yaamusiima . Ogwo muntu akaba ari Omunyasamariya .
42017017	Ekyo kyareetera Yesu kubuuza ati : Boona eikumi tibaashemezibwa ? Omwenda gurahi ?
42017018	Nooshusha oti tihariho ondi owaagaruka kusiima Ruhanga , kureka Omunyamahanga ogu .
42017019	Atyo yaagambira ogwo mushaija ati : Imuka , oyegyendere , okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza .
42017020	Abafarisaayo ku baabuurize Yesu , ngu obukama bwa Ruhanga buryaija ryari , yaabagarukamu ati : Obukama bwa Ruhanga tibwija nibureebwa ,
42017021	kandi tiharibaho origira ati : Mbubu buri aha ! nari ati : Mburiya hariya ! Manya obukama bwa Ruhanga buri omuriimwe .
42017022	Yesu akagambira abatendekwa be ati : Obunaku buryahika , obu muryetengyeramu kureeba rimwe aha mazooba g'Omwana w'omuntu , kwonka timuririreeba .
42017023	Baryabagira bati : Nguriya , ari hariya ! Ngugu , ari aha ! Kwonka imwe mutarizayo , mutaribakurata .
42017024	Manya nk'oku omurabyo gurabya , gukamurika eiguru okwiha aha rubaju rumwe okuta aha rundi , n'okwija kw'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo kuriba .
42017025	Kwonka aryabanza kubonabonesibwa munonga n'okwangwa ab'obusingye obu .
42017026	Nk'oku kyabaire omu biro bya Noa , nikwo kiriba n'omu biro by'Omwana w'omuntu .
42017027	Abantu bakaba nibarya , nibanywa , nibashwerana , okuhitsya obu Noa yaagiire omu bwato , omwegyemure gukaija , gukabacwekyereza boona .
42017028	Kandi kiryaba nk'oku kyabaire obwa Looti . Abantu bakaba nibarya , nibanywa , nibagura , nibaguza , nibahinga kandi nibombeka .
42017029	Kwonka aha izooba eri Looti yaarugiire omuri Sodoma , Ruhanga akafukunkura omuriro n'obuganga , byaruga omu iguru byabacwekyereza boona .
42017030	Nikwo kiriba kityo aha izooba eri Omwana w'omuntu arireebekyeraho .
42017031	Eizooba eryo ku ririhika , oriba ari aha mutwe gw'enju , aine ebye omu nju , ataritemburuka kubiihamu ; n'oriba ori omu musiri , atarigaruka omuka .
42017032	Nimwijukye muka Looti .
42017033	Weena orikwenda kukiza amagara ge , aryagabuza . Kandi weena orikugabuza , aryagakiza .
42017034	Nimbagambira nti : Ekiro ekyo abantu babiri baryaba bari aha kitanda kimwe ; omwe aryatwarwa , ondi atsigweho .
42017035	Abakazi babiri baryaba nibasa kumwe ; omwe aryatwarwa , ondi atsigweho .
42017036	[ Abashaija babiri baryaba bari omu musiri ; omwe aryatwarwa , ondi atsigweho . ]
42017037	Abatendekwa nikwo kumucwa kabiri , bakamubuuza bati : Aho ni nkahi , Mukama waitu ? Nawe nikwo kubagarukamu ati : Ahu omutumbi guri , niho amahungu gateeranira .
42018001	Bwanyima Yesu akabacwera enfumu nk'oku kirikwetengwa okuguma nibashaba batarikuhwa matsiko .
42018002	Yaabagira ati : Hakaba hariho omuramuzi omu kirorero kimwe , owaabaire atatiina Ruhanga , nobu kwakuba okweta aha muntu .
42018003	Kandi omuri ekyo kirorero hakaba harimu omufaakazi , owaagumire naija ahu ari , naamweshengyereza ati : Nshoboorora n'onyemi kubi .
42018004	Ogwo muramuzi yaamara omwanya muraingwa ayangire , kwonka bwanyima yaayegarukamu ati : Nobu ndaabe ntarikutiina Ruhanga , nobu yaakuba omuntu weena ,
42018005	kwonka ahabw'omufaakazi ogu okuguma nanganzya , nshemereire kumushoboorora . Kitari ekyo naija kugumizamu nandusya .
42018006	Mukama nikwo kubagambira ati : Nimuhurire eki omuramuzi otahikiriire arikugamba .
42018007	Mbwenu shi , Ruhanga tarireeba abatoorainwe be nibakorerwa eby'oburyo , abamuhoogyera nyomushana na nyekiro , nangwa nobu yaakutuuraho kubahwera ?
42018008	Nimbahamiza nti : Aryataho omutima kureeba ngu baakorerwa ebihikire kandi juba . Mbwenu shi Omwana w'omuntu ku ariija , aryashanga omu nsi omu hakirimu okwikiriza ?
42018009	Yesu akacwa enfumu egi , naagigambira abantu bamwe abaabaire nibeemanya ku bari abahikiriire , kandi nibagaya abandi boona .
42018010	Ati : Abashaija babiri bakaza omuri Nyaruju ya Mukama kushaba ; omwe ari Omufarisaayo n'ondi ari omushorooza w'omushoro .
42018011	Omufarisaayo yaayemerera hangahari , yaashaba ati : Ai Ruhanga , ninkusiima ; ahabw'okuba nyowe tindi mwambuzi okora ebitahikire , omushambani nk'abandi bantu , kandi munomuno tindi nk'ogu mushorooza w'omushoro .
42018012	Nyesiibyakwo kabiri buri biro mushanju , kandi mpa kimwe kya ikumi eki ebi ntunga byona .
42018013	Omushorooza w'omushoro we yaayemerera hangahari okukiraho , kandi atarikwehanga kureeba ahaiguru , kureka okwemaamaata naagira ati : Ai Ruhanga , onsaasire nyowe omusiisi !
42018014	Nimbagambira nti : Ogu mushaija akagaruka owe omuka agarukaine na Ruhanga , okukira mugyenzi we ; ahabw'okuba weena oyetunguura , aryabundikwa ; kandi weena oyebundika , aryatunguurwa .
42018015	Abantu bakareetera Yesu nangwa n'abeereere , ngu abakwateho . Abatendekwa be ku baakireebire , baabakabukira .
42018016	Kwonka Yesu yaabeeta naagira ati : Murekye abaana baije bampikye , mutabazibira ; ahabw'okuba abari nk'abo , obukama bwa Ruhanga n'obwabo .
42018017	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena otarikwikiriza bukama bwa Ruhanga nk'omwana muto , taributaahamu .
42018018	Omwe omu bategyeki akabuuza Yesu ati : Mwegyesa murungi , nkaakora ki kutunga amagara agatahwaho ?
42018019	Yaamugira ati : Noonyetera ki murungi ? Manya tihariho murungi kureka Ruhanga wenka .
42018020	Noomanya ebiragiro ku bigira biti : Otarishambana , otariita , otariiba , otariha obwamushinja bw'ebishuba , otiine sho na nyoko .
42018021	Onu yaagarukamu ati : Ebyo byona ntuura nimbihitsya , okwiha omu buto bwangye .
42018022	Yesu ku yaahuriire ekyo , yaagira ati : Okibuzirweho ekintu kimwe kyonka . Tunda ebi oine byona ; ebiraabirugyemu obigabire abooro , mbwenu nibwo oritunga eitungo omu iguru ; haza oije onkuratire .
42018023	Onu ku yaahuriire ekyo , yaagira obujune , ahabw'okuba akaba ari omutungi munonga .
42018024	Yesu yaamutsimba eriisho , yaagira ati : Ka kigumire abatungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga !
42018025	Manya nikirahukira engamira kuraba omu kahengyere k'empitirizo , okukira omutungi kutaaha omu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
42018026	Abaakihuriire nikwo kugira bati : Mbwenu shi , n'oha orikubaasa kujunwa ?
42018027	Nawe yaabagarukamu ati : Ekitabaasika ha bantu , kibaasika ahari Ruhanga .
42018028	Na Petero nikwo kugira ati : Reeba , itwe tukatsigaho byona ebi twine , twakukuratira .
42018029	Yesu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Tihariho n'omwe owaatsigireho enju ye n'omukazi na beene ishe n'abazaire be , nari abaana ahabw'obukama bwa Ruhanga ,
42018030	otarizimuurirwa bingi n'okukiraho omu biro ebi , kandi omu busingye oburiija akatunga amagara agatahwaho .
42018031	Bwanyima Yesu yaata ikumi na babiri hangahari , yaabagira ati : Reeba nitwinamuka Yerusalemu , kandi kyona ekyahandiikirwe abarangi aha Mwana w'omuntu nikiija kubakwo .
42018032	Ahabw'okuba naija kuheebwayo aha Banyamahanga , reero bamushungise , bamutwaze kubi , bamucwere amacwante ;
42018033	ku baraaheze kumwasha , bamwite , haza aha kiro kya kashatu azookye omu bafiire .
42018034	Kwonka bo tibaine ki baihiremu , eki yaabagambiire kikabacuramirira , tibaamanya makuru gaakyo .
42018035	Yesu ku yaabaire nairira haihi na Yeriko , yaashangaho omushaija empumi ari aha rubaju rw'omuhanda naashabiiriza .
42018036	Egyo mpumi , ku yahuriire ebimbuuro by'abantu nibihingura , yaabuuza ekyabaho .
42018037	Baamugira bati : Yesu Omunyanazareeti naahingura .
42018038	Nawe nikwo kweta munonga ati : Yesu mwene Daudi , ngirira embabazi !
42018039	Abantu abaabaire beebembeire baamukabukira nibamugira bati : Hunama ! Kwonka we yaayongyera kwamuza ati : Mwene Daudi , ngirira embabazi !
42018040	Yesu yaayemerera , yaaragiira ku bamumureetera . Ku yaamuhikire , yaamubuuza ati :
42018041	Nooyenda ngu nkukorere ki ? Onu yaamugarukamu ati : Mukama wangye , niinyenda ngu ndeebe !
42018042	Yesu yaamugira ati : Reeba ! Okwikiriza kwawe nikwo kwakukiza .
42018043	Ahonaaho yaareeba , yaamukuratira naasiima Ruhanga , kandi boona abaakireebire baahimbisa Ruhanga .
42019001	Yesu akataaha omu rurembo Yeriko , yaagumizamu naarurabamu .
42019002	Okwo hakaba hariyo omushaija orikwetwa Zakaayo , owaabaire ari omukuru w'abashorooza b'omushoro kandi ari omutungi .
42019003	Akaba aine ekihika ky'okureeba Yesu kumumanya ; kwonka ahabw'okuba mugufu tiyaabaasa kurenzya maisho ekimbuuro ky'abantu kumureeba .
42019004	N'ahabw'ekyo yairuka , yaabarabaho , yaatemba omukunyu , ngu akaamunagaho eriisho naahingura .
42019005	Yesu ku yaahikire ahu ari , yaimutsya amaisho , yaamugira ati : Zakaayo , rahuka otemburukye . Eri izooba niinyenda kuza owaawe .
42019006	Atyo atemburuka n'obwira , amutaangirira ashemereirwe munonga .
42019007	Reero boona ku bakireeba , beetomboita bati : Yaaza kuraara omw'omusiisi .
42019008	Mpaho Zakaayo tahwama , ayemerera agira Mukama ati : Mukama wangye , niinyija kuha abooro kimwe kya kabiri ky'ebintu byangye , kandi ku ndaabe nyine ou ndagobeize , niinyija kumuriha ebye emirundi ena .
42019009	Yesu amugira ati : Eri izooba okujunwa kwaija omuri egi ka , ahabw'okuba ogu nawe ni mwene Aburahamu .
42019010	Manya Omwana w'omuntu akaija kusherura ekyabuzire n'okukijuna .
42019011	Abantu ku baabaire bakitegire Yesu amatu , yaabacwera enfumu . Mbwenu obwo akaba ari haihi na Yerusalemu , kandi abantu bakaba nibateekateeka ngu , obukama bwa Ruhanga buri haihi kwija .
42019012	Nawe nikwo kubagira ati : Omushaija w'ekitiinwa akaba naaza kuzinduka omu nsi ya hare kuheerwayo obugabe , bwanyima agarukye .
42019013	Yaayeta abaheereza be ikumi ; buri omwe yaamuha empiiha emwe y'ezaabu , haza yaabagira ati : Mugishuubuze okuhitsya obu ndigaruka .
42019014	Kwonka abantu b'eihanga rye , ahabw'okumwanga baamukuratsa entumwa nibagira bati : Titurikwenda ogu mushaija kuba omugabe waitu .
42019015	Mbwenu ku yaagarukire yaaherize kuheebwa obugabe , yaatuma abo baheereza abu yaahaire empiiha , kureeba oku buri omwe yaashaagwize .
42019016	Ow'okubanza yaagira ati : Mukama wangye empiiha yaawe emwe ngishaagwiremu ikumi .
42019017	Onu yaamugarukamu ati : Yebare muheereza wangye omurungi ! Nk'oku oyeyorekire ori omwesigwa omu bikye munonga , naakuha obushoboorozi kutegyeka ebirorero ikumi .
42019018	Owa kabiri nawe yaija yaagira ati : Mukama wangye , empiiha yaawe emwe erugiremu itaano .
42019019	Ogwo nawe yaamugira ati : Naiwe noija kutegyeka ebirorero bitaano .
42019020	Bwanyima haija ondiijo , yaagira ati : Mukama wangye , empiiha yaawe ngigi , nkagibiika gye omu kenda ka kitaani ,
42019021	ahabw'okuba nkakutiina ; naamanya ku ori omuntu enzira-busha , oyanura ebi otaanikire , ogyesha ebi otabibire .
42019022	Onu amugarukamu ati : Iwe muheereza mubi ' we , ka nkucwere orubanja niinyihirira aha bi waagamba . Biri kwo okamanya ku ndi enzira-busha , eyanura ebi etaanikire , ekagyesha ebi etabibire .
42019023	Ahabw'enki nu empiiha yangye toragibiikize bashuubuzi b'empiiha , nkiza kugaruka nkagiihayo n'amagoba gaayo ?
42019024	Atyo agambira abeemereireho , ati : Mumwakye egyo mpiiha , mugihe oine ikumi .
42019025	Nabo baamugira bati : Mukama waitu , k'aine ikumi !
42019026	Nimbagambira nti : Weena oine , aryaheebwa ebirikukiraho ; kwonka otaine , aryayakwa n'eki aine .
42019027	Mbwenu abazigu bangye , abataraanyedeize kuba omugabe waabo , mubareete aha , mubaitire omu maisho gangye .
42019028	Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo , yaabeebembera nainamuka Yerusalemu .
42019029	Mbwenu ku yairiire haihi na Beetifaagye na Beetaniya , ebihereeraine n'Orushozi orurikwetwa orw'Emioliva , yaatuma babiri aha batendekwa be ,
42019030	yaabagira ati : Nimwirooko muze omu kyaro ekibari omu maisho . Ku muraakitaahemu muti , nimwija kureeba omwana gw'endogoya gutsibikire , ogutakatembwahoga muntu . Mugutsibure , mugureeta aha .
42019031	Ku haraagire owaababuuza eki murikugutsiburira , mumugire muti : Mukama naagwenda .
42019032	Entumwa zityo zigyenda , zishanga byona biri nk'oku yaazigambira .
42019033	Ku baabaire nibatsibura ogwo mwana gw'endogoya , bakama baagwo baabagira bati : Beitu nimugutsiburira ki ?
42019034	Nabo baabagarukamu bati : Mukama naagwenda .
42019035	Batyo baagutwarira Yesu , baagutandiikaho emyenda yaabo , baagumushutamyaho .
42019036	Ku yaabaire naagyenda , abantu baayarira eminagiro yaabo ahu arikuraba .
42019037	Kandi ku yaabaire yaahika aha kashuumo k'Orushozi rw'Emioliva , ekimbuuro ky'abantendekwa be kyona kyatandika kushemererwa n'okuhimbisa Ruhanga n'eiraka rihango , ahabw'eby'okutangaaza byona ebi baareebire .
42019038	Baateera akaari bati : Ogwo Mugabe orikwija omu iziina rya Nyakubaho , ahimbisibwe ! Omu iguru nihakagire obusingye , n'ahaiguru owa Herebe neekagire ekitiinwa !
42019039	Bamwe omu Bafarisaayo bakeema ahagati y'abantu , baamugira bati : Mwegyesa , hunamya abatendekwa baawe .
42019040	Kwonka we yaabagarukamu ati : Nimbagambira , aba ku baraahuname , amabaare nigaija kwamuza .
42019041	Ku yaahikire haihi n'orurembo , yaarureeba , yaarucurira
42019042	yaagira ati : Nangwa eri izooba kuri waamanya ebyakukureetera obusingye ! Kwonka bambe , bikusherekirwe .
42019043	Manya obunaku buryahika abazigu baawe bakugote , bakwehinguririze , bakuturukye embaju zoona ;
42019044	bakutuure ahansi n'abaana b'omunda y'orugo rwawe , batakutsigiremu ibaare eritungamiire erindi , ahabw'okuba toramanyire bunaku bu Ruhanga araakwizire .
42019045	Bwanyima Yesu akataaha omuri Nyaruju , yaatandika kubingamu abaabaire nibatundiramu .
42019046	Yaabagira ati : Kikahandiikwa ngu enju yangye eryaba ey'okushabiramu ; mbwenu imwe , ka mugihindwire eryaya ry'abambuzi .
42019047	Akaba ayegyeseza omuri Nyaruju buri izooba . Abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka n'abandi bantu bakuru , abaabaire bakwataniise nabo , baacwa obwengye oku baraamwite .
42019048	Kwonka baabura oburyo bw'okukikora , ahabw'okuba abantu boona bakaba nibata omutima aha bi arikugamba .
42020001	Eizooba rimwe Yesu , ku yaabaire naayegyesa abantu omuri Nyaruju , naarangirira Amakuru Marungi , abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka baija hamwe n'abakuru omu ihanga ,
42020002	baamugambira bati : Tugambire , ni bushoboorozi ki oburikukukoresa ebi ? Nari n'oha owaabukuhaire ?
42020003	Yaabagarukamu ati : Naanye ka mbabuuze , mungambire .
42020004	Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaruga ahari Ruhanga nari omu bantu ?
42020005	Baahakana bonka nibagira bati : Ku turaagire ngu kukaruga ahari Ruhanga , naija kugira ati : Ahabw'enki mutaramwikiriize ?
42020006	Kandi ku turaagire ngu kukaruga omu bantu , abantu boona nibaija kututeera amabaare , ahabw'okuba nibahamiza kimwe ku Yohaana yaabaire ari omurangi .
42020007	Nikwo kumugarukamu bati : Titurikumanya ahi kwarugire .
42020008	Na Yesu ati : Naanye tindikwija kubagambira ahi naihire obushoboorozi oburikunkoresa ebyo .
42020009	Reero Yesu yaacwera abantu enfumu egi , ati : Omuntu akahinga omusiri gw'emizaabibu , yaagutsigira abashengi yaataaha eihanga , yaamarayo omwanya muraingwa .
42020010	Obunaku ku bwahikire , yaatuma omuheereza we ahari abo bashengi , ngu bamuhe aha bijuma by'emizaabibu . Kwonka abo bashengi baamuteera , baamubinga engaro nsha .
42020011	Yaagaruka yaatuma ondi muheereza , nawe baamwasha , baamuhemagura , baamubinga engaro nsha .
42020012	Nabwo yaayongyera yaabatumaho owa kashatu , ogwo nawe baamuhutaaza , baamujuguta aheeru .
42020013	Bwanyima mukama w'emizaabibu yaagira ati : Mbwenu nkore ki ? Ka mbatwekyere mutabani wangye omukundwa , shana bakaamugirira enshoni .
42020014	Kwonka abo bashengi ku baamureebire , baagambirana bati : Manya ogu niwe muhunguzi ; ka tumwite , obuhunguzi bube obwaitu .
42020015	Batyo baamwozya omuri ogwo musiri , baamwita . Mbwenu mukama w'ogwo musiri gw'emizaabibu aryabagira ata ?
42020016	Aryaija acwekyereze abo bashengi , reero ogwo musiri gw'emizaabibu agutemu abandi . Ekyo ku baakihuriire baagira bati : Nikikabure !
42020017	Kwonka we yaabacumita eriisho yaabagira ati : Mbwenu ekyahandiikirwe eki nikimanyisa ki ? Nikigira kiti : Eibaare eri abombeki baayangire , niryo ryahindukire obuhamizo .
42020018	Weena oriryeteeraho aryacwagacwagurika ; kandi weena ou ririgwaho , riryamucwa obusaasingo .
42020019	Abahangu b'eiteeka n'abahongyerezi abakuru ahabw'okumanya ngu egyo nfumu nibo yaabaire neerengyeza , baayenda kumukwata omuri ago magingo , kwonka baatiina abantu .
42020020	Batyo baaguma bategyereize ekindi eki baraakwatsizeho Yesu . Baayohereza ab'okumutata , abaayegizire ab'amazima , ngu babone kumukwatsiza aha ki araagambe , kibabaasise kumutwara aha w'obushoboorozi , amucwere orubanja .
42020021	Nikwo kumubuuza bati : Mwegyesa , nitumanya ebi ogamba n'ebi oyegyesa ku biba ebihikire ; ku otagira u oshoroora , kureka oyegyesa omu mazima eby'omuhanda gwa Ruhanga .
42020022	Mbwenu itwe , okuha Kaisaari omushoro , kihikire nari tikihikire ?
42020023	We ahabw'okumanya obugobya bwabo , yaagira ati :
42020024	Muunyorekye empiiha . Ekishushani eki n'ebihandiikirweho n'eby'oha ? Baamugarukamu bati : N'ebya Kaisaari .
42020025	Nawe ati : Mbwenu nu , ebya Kaisaari mubihe Kaisaari , n'ebya Ruhanga mubihe Ruhanga !
42020026	Batyo baabura eki baamukwatamu omu bi yaagambiire omu maisho g'abantu ; eki yaabagarukiremu kyabatangaaza , baahunama .
42020027	Abasadukaayo , abagira ngu abafa tibazooka , bakaija ahari Yesu ,
42020028	baamubuuza bati : Mwegyesa , Musa akatuteeraho ekihandiiko ekirikugira kiti : Mukuru w'omuntu ku yaakufa atatsigire mwana , omurumuna ahungure ogwo mufaakazi , azaarire mukuru we abaana .
42020029	Mbwenu hakaba hariho enyina-emwe mushanju . Ow'omujigaijo yaashwera omukazi , kwonka yaafa bucwekye .
42020030	Ow'omushubiro ,
42020031	bwanyima n'owa kashatu baahungura ogwo mufaakazi ; boona omushanju baamushwera batyo , baafa batatsigire baana .
42020032	Aha muheru omukazi nawe yaafa .
42020033	Mbwenu aha kuzooka , ogwo mukazi aryaba muka oha omuri abo ? Ahabw'okuba boona omushanju bakamushwera .
42020034	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Abantu b'obusingye obu bashwera kandi bashwerwa ;
42020035	kwonka abarishangwa bashemereire kuhika aha busingye oburiija n'aha kuzooka kw'abafiire , tibarishwera kandi tibarishwerwa .
42020036	Manya baryaba batakifa bundi , bari nka baamaraika kandi abaana ba Ruhanga abaine omugabo omu kuzooka .
42020037	Mbwenu ekirikugira ngu abafa bazooka , na Musa wenka akakimanyisa omu bi yaahandiikire aha byabaireho aha rushaka ruri , obu yaagamba ahari Nyakubaho , ku ari Ruhanga wa Aburahamu , Ruhanga wa Isaaka kandi Ruhanga wa Yakobo .
42020038	Biri ti Ruhanga w'abafiire , kureka n'ow'abahuriire , ahabw'okuba ahariwe abantu boona omu mazima baba abahuriire .
42020039	Abahangu b'eiteeka abamwe nikwo kumugarukamu bati : Mwegyesa , waagamba gye .
42020040	Manya bakaba batakyehanga kumubuuza ekindi kibuuzo .
42020041	Bwanyima Yesu akabagira ati : Abantu nibaiha hi okugira , ngu Kristo n'omwana wa Daudi ?
42020042	Haza kunu , Daudi wenka omu kitabo kya Zaaburi yaagizire ati : Nyakubaho akagambira Mukama wangye ati : Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo ,
42020043	okuhitsya obu ndigira abazigu baawe endibatiro y'ebigyere byawe .
42020044	Daudi aha ka naamweta Mukama , kandi shi naabaasa ata kuba omwana we ?
42020045	Kandi Yesu akagambira abatendekwa be , abantu boona bamutegire amatu , ati :
42020046	Mwerinde abahangu b'eiteeka abenda kugyenda bajwaire ekanzu ndaingwa , abakunda kutangirirwa omu butare , n'okushutama omu bitebe by'abakuru omu mateeraniro , n'omu myanya y'ekitiinwa aha magyenyi .
42020047	Banyaga eby'abafaakazi kandi bashaba Ruhanga nibarandagatana , ngu abantu babareebe . Baryacwerwa orubanja orurikukira orw'abandi .
42021001	Yesu ku yainamwire amaisho , yaareeba abatungi nibata emitoijo yaabo omu ibiikiro ;
42021002	kandi yaareeba omufaakazi omworo buzima , nawe naatamu otusente tubiri .
42021003	Atyo yaagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira ku omufaakazi ogwo omworo yaatamu bingi okukira abo boona ;
42021004	ahabw'okuba bo baahayo nibakora aha bi bashaagize , kwonka we omu bworo bwe yaatamu kyona ekyakumutungire .
42021005	Abantu bamwe , ku baabaire nibagaaniira aha bya Nyaruju , nibagamba oku yaahunzirwe n'amabaare marungi , kandi n'ebyahairweyo abantu ahabwabo , Yesu yaabagira ati :
42021006	Ebyo byona ebi murikutangaarira hati , obunaku buryahika obu hataritsigara ibaare na rimwe eritungamiire erindi eritarisheenyagurwa .
42021007	Nabo nikwo kumubuuza bati : Mwegyesa , beitu ebyo biryabaho ryari , kandi ni kamanyiso ki akaryoreka ahi biribeeraho ?
42021008	Yesu yaagarukamu ati : Mwerinde mutarihabisibwa , ahabw'okuba baingi baryaija nibaanyeyeterera , nibagira ngu , Niinye . Kandi bati : Obunaku buri haihi kuhika . Mutaribakuratira .
42021009	Mbwenu ku murihurira engamba n'okujagarazibwa obugomi mutaryekanga ahabw'okuba ebyo byona n'eby'okubanza kubaho ; kwonka emperu yo eryaba etakahikire .
42021010	Yaagumizamu ati : Eihanga riryateera erindi ihanga , n'obugabe buteere obundi .
42021011	Haryabaho emitsitsa y'amaani n'enfu nyingi n'enjara y'oku n'oku ; habeho ebirikutiinisa ebirikureebwa , kandi n'obumanyiso bukuru oburikuruga omu iguru .
42021012	Kwonka ebyo byona bitakabaireho , abantu baryabakwata , babahiiganise , babaheyo omu mateeraniro , babate omu bihome , babahitsya n'omu maisho g'abagabe n'ag'abategyeki bakuru nibabantura .
42021013	Kandi obwo nibwo muritunga omwanya gw'okuunyemera .
42021014	Eki mugume nimukiijuka ; ku mutari b'okuteekateeka bukiri kare ebi muryetonganira .
42021015	Manya niinye ndibaha ebi murigamba hamwe n'obwengye , ebi abazigu baanyu bataribaasa kwanga nari kuhakanisa .
42021016	Muryaheebwayo abazaire baanyu na beene shoimwe , abanyabuzaare na banywani baanyu ; kandi bamwe omuriimwe baryaitwa .
42021017	Abantu boona baryabanga nibabantura .
42021018	Kwonka akashokye k'aha mutwe gwanyu tikarihwerekyerera .
42021019	Omu kugumisiriza nimwo murijunira amagara gaanyu .
42021020	Ku murireeba Yerusalemu ekubirwe amahe g'abazigu , mumanye ngu eri haihi kuhwerekyerezibwa .
42021021	Abariba bari omuri Buyudaaya bahungire aha nshozi . Abariba bari omu nda y'orurembo barurugyemu , kandi abariba bari omu byaro batariruhungiramu .
42021022	Manya ebyo biryaba ebiro by'okufubirwa , ngu Ebyahandiikirwe bibone kuhikiirira .
42021023	Ebishi bambe , abariba baine enda n'abarikwontsya omu biro ebyo baryagwerwa akagwe ! Ahabw'okuba egi nsi eryagira omunyangararo mwingi kandi Ruhanga agirire abantu baamwo ekiniga kingi .
42021024	Abamwe baryaitwa rurara , n'abandi batwarwe omu mahanga goona bari enkwatwa ; kandi Yerusalemu egume neeribatiirirwa Abanyamahanga , okuhitsya obu ebiro byabo birihwaho .
42021025	Haryabaho obumanyiso aha izooba n'aha kwezi n'aha nyonyoozi . Omu nsi amahanga garyagira obusaasi bwingi , gashoberwe ahabw'okuhoorera kw'amayanja n'ebingonzi byago .
42021026	Abantu baryaitwa obwoba ahabw'okutegyereza akagwe akarigwera ensi , ahabw'okuba eby'amaani eby'omu iguru biryatengyetsibwa .
42021027	Haza obwo nibwo barireeba Omwana w'omuntu naizira omu kicu aine obushoboorozi n'ekitiinisa kingi .
42021028	Ebyo ku biritandika kubaho , mwemerere murarikye emitwe , ahabw'okuba muryaba muri haihi kucungurwa .
42021029	Kandi Yesu yaabacwera enfumu egi , ati : Mureebere aha muti gw'omutiini n'ahari ibara muti .
42021030	Ku mureeba gwatandika guti kutooka , mumanya ku ekyanda kiri haihi .
42021031	Naimwe nu nikwo kiri . Ku murireeba ebintu ebyo nibibaho , mumanye ku obukama bwa Ruhanga buri haihi .
42021032	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Obusingye obu tiburihwaho ebyo byona bitakabaireho .
42021033	Eiguru n'ensi biryahwaho , kwonka ebigambo byangye tibirihwaho .
42021034	Mwerinde , emitima yaanyu etakaasiraazibwa omururu , obusinzi n'amaganya g'eby'amagara aga , ekyo kiro kikabagwaho kitaraariire nk'orugogo .
42021035	Manya kiryaizira abantu boona abari omu nsi .
42021036	N'ahabw'ekyo mugume nimureeba , nimushaba obutoosha amaani agariboozya omuri ebyo byona ebiribaho , gakababaasisa kwemerera omu maisho g'Omwana w'omuntu .
42021037	Nyomushana Yesu akaba asiiba omuri Nyaruju naayegyesa , kandi nyekiro aza kuraara omu rushozi orurikwetwa orw'Emioliva .
42021038	Reero bukiba nibwaba , abantu boona bamushanga omuri Nyaruju kuhurira ebi arikugamba .
42022001	Obugyenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe , oburikwetwa Okuhingurwaho , bukaba buri haihi kuhika .
42022002	Obwo abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka bakaba nibasherura oburyo oku baraite Yesu , ahabw'okuba bakaba nibatiina abantu .
42022003	Mbwenu obwo Sitaane yaataaha omuri Yuda orikwetwa owa Kariota , omwe ahari ikumi na babiri .
42022004	Yaaza aha bakuru b'abahongyerezi n'ab'abarinzi ba Nyaruju , kucuma nabo enaama oku araamubahe .
42022005	Baashemererwa , baaragaana nawe kumuha empiiha ;
42022006	nawe yaikiriza . Okwiha obwo yaasherura oburyo obu araamubaheeremu , ebimbuuro by'abantu bitariho .
42022007	Ekiro ky'Obugyenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe , ekyabaire kitambirwaho omwana gw'entaama ogw'Okuhingurwaho ku kyahikire ,
42022008	Yesu yaatuma Petero na Yohaana ati : Nimwirooko mututeguurire ahi turaariire Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho .
42022009	Baamubuuza bati : Mbwenu shi , nooyenda ngu tubutebeekanisize hi ?
42022010	Yaabagira ati : Reeba , ku muraabe nimutaaha omu rurembo , nimwija kubugana omushaija oyekoreire enyungu y'amaizi .
42022011	Mumukurate omu nju ei araataahemu , kandi mugambire mukama w'enju muti : Omwegyesa yaatukutumaho ati : Ekishengye eki ndaariiremu Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho hamwe n'abatendekwa bangye kirahi ?
42022012	Ogwo mushaija naija kubooreka ekishengye kihango eky'omuri kaanyinaabiri , ekirimu byona ebirikwetengwa . Okwo mube niyo mwateguura .
42022013	Batyo baagyenda , baashanga byona biri nk'oku yaabibagambira ; baatebeekanisizayo eby'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho .
42022014	Eshaaha ku yaahikire , Yesu yaaza aha meeza hamwe n'abatendekwa be .
42022015	Yaabagira ati : Ntuura niinyetenga munonga kurya naimwe Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho obu , ntakabonabonesiibwe .
42022016	Manya nimbagambira ku ntarigaruka kuburya , okuhitsya obu burihikiirizibwa omu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
42022017	Atyo yaakwata ekikopo , yaasiima , yaagira ati : Nimutoore , munyweho mwena .
42022018	Manya nimbagambira nti : Okwiha hati tindinywa bundi ha kirugire omu mizaabibu , okuhitsya obu obukama bwa Ruhanga buriija .
42022019	Atyo yaakwata omugaati , yaasiima , yaagucwamu , yaagubaha naagamba ati : Ogu n'omubiri gwangye [ oguraaheebweyo ahabwanyu . Mugume mukore muti kuunyijukiraho .
42022020	Ku baaherize kurya , yaakwata atyo n'ekikopo , yaagamba ati : Ekikopo eki niyo ndagaano nsya ey'eshagama yangye , eraasheeshwe ahabwanyu . ]
42022021	Kwonka reeba , omukono gw'orikundeebya guri hamwe n'ogwangye aha meeza .
42022022	Manya Omwana w'omuntu naaza kuba nk'oku kyamuteekateekyeirwe , kwonka ogwo muntu orikumureebya aryakareeba !
42022023	Baatandika kubuuzana bonka , ngu n'oha omuribo owaakukikora .
42022024	Abatendekwa ba Yesu bakaimukwamu ezindi mpaka ezirikugira ngu n'oha omuribo ohikire kuba mukuru .
42022025	Mpaho yaabagira ati : omu Banyamahanga abagabe baabo nibo babategyeka ; kandi n'ababagiraho obushoboorozi beetwa enkora-birungi ;
42022026	Kwonka imwe mutariba mutyo ; kureka omukuru omuriimwe abe nk'orikukira obuto ; orikwebembera abe nk'orikuheereza .
42022027	Mbwenu shi omukuru n'oha , n'oshutami aha meeza nari n'orikuheereza . T'ogwo ari ha meeza ? Kwonka nyowe mbarimu nk'omuheereza .
42022028	Niimwe bantu abatarampemukireho mu bi naagyeziibwe .
42022029	Mbwenu naabaha obukama nk'oku Tata yaabumpaire .
42022030	Muryariira aha meeza yangye kandi munywereho , omu bukama bwangye , kandi muryashutama aha bitebe by'obugabe , mucwere enganda za Isiraeli eikumi na ibiri orubanja .
42022031	Simooni , Simooni , omanye ku imwe , Sitaane aikiriziibwe kubashungura nk'engano ;
42022032	kwonka , Iwe Simooni , nkushabiire , okwikiriza kwawe kurekye kutentebuka ; kandi ku oriheza kwegarukamu , naiwe ohamye bagyenzi baawe .
42022033	Onu amugarukamu ati : Mukama wangye , nyeteekateekire kugyenda naiwe omu kihome n'okufa naiwe .
42022034	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Petero , ninkugambira nti : Eri izooba enkoko terikwija kugamba otakeehakaine kashatu ku otarikummanya .
42022035	Yesu ababuuza ati : Ku naaboohereize mutaine mufuko na furebe na nkaito , mwine eki mwakyenire ? Baamugarukamu bati : Ngaaha !
42022036	Nawe yaabagira ati : Hati oraabe aine omufuko , agugyendane ; oraabe aine efurebe , nawe agire atyo ; oraabe ataine rurara , atunde omunagiro gwe , agigure .
42022037	Mbwenu nimbagambira ku ekyahandiikirwe ekirikugira ngu : Akaikiriza kubarirwa hamwe n'enkozi z'ebibi , kiri eky'okuhikiiririzibwa omuriinye . Manya ebyangambirweho biri haihi kuhikiirira .
42022038	Baamugira bati : Mukama waitu , reeba aha hariho zaarurara ibiri . Yaabagira ati : Ebyo ka bihwere aho !
42022039	Atyo Yesu yaimutsya , yaaza aha Rushozi rw'Emioliva nk'oku yaabaire agira , abatendekwa be bamukuratiire .
42022040	Ku baahikireyo , yaabagira ati : Mushabe , mutakaayohibwa .
42022041	Mpaho abatsigaho , aza hangahari nk'ahi eibaare rigarukira rirekyeirwe . Atsimba amaju , ashaba ati :
42022042	Taata , ku oraabe nookisiima , onyiheho eki kikopo ! Kwonka ti nkaanye oku ndikwenda , kureka eki orikwenda kibe nikyo kyakorwa .
42022043	Bwanyima maraika amubonekyera naaruga omu iguru kumugumya .
42022044	Omuri obwo busaasi burengyesereize , Yesu ayeshengyereza n'amaani ge goona ; etuutu erugaho emuragara neeshusha amatondo mahango g'eshagama .
42022045	Ku yaimukireho yaaheza kushaba , yaaza kureeba abatendekwa be , yaashanga bagwejegyeire ahabw'obujune .
42022046	Yaabagira ati : Ahabw'enki mugwejegyeire ? Nimwimukye , mushabe , mutakaagwa omu kwohibwa .
42022047	Yesu ku yaabaire naakigamba haija ekimbuuro ky'abantu kyebembeirwe omushaija orikwetwa Yuda , omwe ahari ikumi na babiri ; yaahika Yesu kumunywegyera .
42022048	Yesu nikwo kumugira ati : Yuda , haza oza kunywegyera Omwana w'omuntu noomureebya !
42022049	Abu Yesu yaabaire aine , ku baareebire byaba bityo , baamugira bati : Mukama waitu , tubatemese zaarurara ?
42022050	Omwe omuribo atyo atema omuheereza w'omuhongyerezi omukuru , amucwaho okutu kwa buryo .
42022051	Yesu ku akireeba agira ati : Murekyere aho ! Atyo akora aha kutu kw'ogwo mushaija , amukiza .
42022052	Mpaho Yesu agambira abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru b'abaserukare abarinda Nyaruju , n'abandi bakuru omu ihanga abamuhururiire , ati : Beitu obu murikuunyizira na zaarurara n'ebikoni , ndi omwambuzi ?
42022053	Buri izooba obu naabaire ntuura naimwe omuri Nyaruju ka mwabaire mutakantahoga ngaro kunkwata . Kwonka hati obu nibwo bunaku bwangye , omwirima nigwo gurikutegyeka .
42022054	Mpaho bakwata Yesu , bamutwara , bamuhitsya ow'omuhongyerezi omukuru . Petero amukuratira amuri hareho .
42022055	Ku baahembire omuriro ahagati y'ekibuga , baashutama bagwehinguriize , Petero nawe yaashutama nabo .
42022056	Ku yaabaire ashutami aha muriro omuzaana yaamutsimba eriisho , yaagira ati : Ogwo nawe abaire ari hamwe nawe .
42022057	Kwonka we yaayehakana ati : Mukazi ' we , nyowe tindikumumanya .
42022058	Ku haahingwireho akaanya kakye , ondi muntu yaamureeba , yaagira ati : Naiwe ori ow'omuribo . Kwonka Petero yaagarukamu ati : Muntu ' we , nyowe tindi w'omuribo .
42022059	Ku haahingwireho akaanya nk'ak'eshaaha emwe , n'ondiijo yaayomesereza naagira ati : Buzimazima ogu muntu yaaba ari hamwe nawe , ahabw'okuba n'Omunyagalilaaya .
42022060	Kwonka Petero agira ati : Muntu ' we , eki orikugamba ka ntarikukimanya . Ahonaaho , ku aba naakigamba , enkoko egamba .
42022061	Mukama ahinduka areeba Petero ; na Petero nikwo kwijuka eki Mukama yaamugambira ati : Eri izooba enkoko terikwija kugamba otakaanyogire kashatu .
42022062	Atyo ashohora , arira munonga .
42022063	Omu bunaku obwo abashaija abaabaire barinzire Yesu , baamushungisa , baataho n'okumuteera .
42022064	Baamushemba aha maisho , baamubuuza bati : Ragura , owaakuteera n'oha ?
42022065	Baagumizamu batyo nibamujuma munonga .
42022066	Ku bwaseesire , abakuru b'eihanga n'abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abahangu b'eiteeka baateerana , baatwara Yesu omu ishengyero ryabo , baamubuuza bati :
42022067	Ku oraabe niiwe Kristo , otugambire . Yaabagarukamu ati : Nobu ndaabagambire , timurikwija kuunyikiriza ,
42022068	kandi nobu naakubabuuza timukangarukamu .
42022069	Kwonka okwiha hati Omwana w'omuntu naija kushutama aha rubaju rwa buryo orwa Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi .
42022070	Boona nikwo kumubuuza bati : Mbwenu nikwo kugira , ngu ori Omwana wa Ruhanga ? Agarukamu ati : Nk'oku mwagamba nikwo ndi .
42022071	Mpaho baagira bati : Mbwenu shi nitukyendera ki baamushinja ? Ka twaheza kumwehuririra naakigamba !
42023001	Mpaho boona abaabaire bateeraine , baimuka , baatwara Yesu omu maisho ga Pilaato .
42023002	Baatandika kumutabaariza nibagira bati : Ogu muntu tukamushanga naagomesa eihanga ryaitu , naazibira abantu kuha Kaisaari omushoro , kandi naagira ngu niwe Kristo Omugabe .
42023003	Pilaato nikwo kumubuuza ati : Weeza ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya ? Yesu amugarukamu ati : Waakigamba .
42023004	Pilaato atyo agira abahongyerezi abakuru n'ebimbuuro by'abantu ati : Nyowe tindikureeba kirikusingisa ogu muntu orubanja .
42023005	Kwonka bo bagumizamu nibagira bati : Naimukiiriza abantu n'ebi arikwegyesa omuri Buyudaaya yoona , ebyatandikiire Galilaaya , bikarugaho bikahika n'aha .
42023006	Pilaato ku ahurira ekyo , abuuza ogwo muntu ku araabe ari Omunyagalilaaya .
42023007	Kandi ku amanya ngu n'ow'omu kyanga ekirikutegyekwa Herode , amutwekyera Herode ogwo , owaabaire nawe ari Yerusalemu omu biro ebyo .
42023008	Herode ku yaareebire Yesu , yaashemererwa munonga , ahabw'okuba akaba aramuhuriireho , kandi amazire omwanya muraingwa naayetenga kumureeba . Ekindi , akaba aine amatsiko g'okumureeba naakora obumanyiso .
42023009	Atyo yaamara omwanya naamubuuza bingi , kwonka we tiyaagira ki yaamugarukamu .
42023010	Obwo abahongyerezi abakuru n'abahangu b'eiteeka bakaba beemereire aho , nibamutabaariza n'enkaakaatira .
42023011	Mpaho Herode hamwe n'abaserukare be baamutwaza kubi nibamugaya kandi nibamushungisa . Herode amujweka bushuuti y'ekitiinwa , amugarurira Pilaato .
42023012	Eryo izooba Herode na Pilaato baakundana , haza okwiha akare baabaire batuura nibangana .
42023013	Ekyo ku kyahwaire , Pilaato yaateerana hamwe abahongyerezi abakuru , n'abategyeki n'abandi bantu ,
42023014	yaabagira ati : Mwandeetera ogu mushaija ngu naagomesa abantu . Mbwenu naamutonganisiza omu maisho gaanyu , omu bi murikumutabaariza byona , naashanga hatarimu kirikumusingisa orubanja ,
42023015	nangwa nobu yaakuba Herode , ahabw'okuba yaamutugarurira . Nk'oku murikureeba , ogu muntu taine ki akozire ekishemereire kumwitisa .
42023016	N'ahabw'ekyo naaza kumwasha , mmurekure .
42023017	[ Manya ahari ekyo kiro kikuru akaba aragiirwa kubarekurira embohe emwe . ]
42023018	Reero boona baayombera hamwe bati : Ita ogu muntu ! Oturekurire Baraba !
42023019	Ogwo mushaija akaba atairwe omu kihome ahabw'okugomesa ab'omu rurembo n'okwita abantu .
42023020	Pilaato ahabw'okwenda kurekura Yesu , yaagaruka yaagamba nabo ;
42023021	kwonka bo baayomba bati : Mubambe aha musharaba ! Mubambe aha musharaba !
42023022	Kandi yaagamba nabo obwa kashatu , ati : Ahanki ? Ogu muntu akozire kibi ki ? Nyowe tinaareeba rubanja orushemereire kumwitisa , n'ahabw'ekyo naaza kumwasha mmurekure .
42023023	Kwonka bo baagumizamu nibayomba munonga , nibagyemesereza ngu abambwe aha musharaba ; kandi orwari rwabo rwarugaho rwaremesa .
42023024	Pilaato nikwo kucwa orubanja , naagira ngu eki baashaba kibe nikyo kyakorwa .
42023025	Yaarekura ogwo muntu ou baashabire , owaabaire akomeirwe obugomi n'obwitsi , yaabaha Yesu kumukora nk'oku barikwenda .
42023026	Ku baabaire nibatwara Yesu , baakwata omushaija orikwetwa Simooni owa Kureene , owaabaire naaruga omu kyaro , baamugyema kwekorera omusharaba amukuratiire .
42023027	Ekimbuuro kihango ky'abantu kyamukuratira , hamwe n'abakazi baingi abaabaire nibamucurira nibeemaamaata .
42023028	Yesu nikwo kubahindukira akabagira ati : Imwe bahara ba Yerusalemu ' mwe , murekye kuncurira , kureka mwecurire kandi mucurire n'abaana baanyu .
42023029	Manya obunaku buryahika , obu abantu barigiriramu bati : Ka n'ab'omugisha abakazi engumba , n'ab'enda zitakazaarahoga , n'ab'amabeera gatakontsyaga !
42023030	Obwo nibwo barigambira enshozi bati : Mutugwere ! N'ebibungo bati : Mutushwekye !
42023031	Mbwenu ku baraabe nibagira bati omuti omubisi , ogwomire guryashura ki ?
42023032	Kandi hakaba hariho abandi babiri enkozi z'ebibi , abaatwairwe na Yesu kwitwa .
42023033	Ku baahikire omu mwanya ogurikwetwa Empanga y'Omutwe , baamubambira aho aha musharaba hamwe n'enkozi z'ebibi ibiri , omwe aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo n'ondi aha rwa bumosho .
42023034	Yesu yaagira ati : Taata , obasaasire ; tibarikumanya ki barikukora . Bwanyima baabagana ebijwaro bye nibabiteerera enteenyu .
42023035	Abantu bakaguma aho nibamushamaarira . Abategyeki bo baamuteerera enaku nibagira bati : Ka yaajunire abandi , mbwenu naayejune ku araabe ari Kristo entoore ya Ruhanga !
42023036	Abaserukare ku baahikire haihi , nibaza kumuha viino y'encenku , nabo baamushungisa ,
42023037	nibagira bati : Ku oraabe ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya , yejune !
42023038	Kandi ahaiguru ye hakaba hariho ekihandiiko ekirikugira kiti : OGU NIWE MUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA .
42023039	Omwe aha nkozi z'ebibi abaabaire bahanikirwe aho , yaamuseetera naagira ati : Tiiwe Kristo ? Yejune , naitwe otujune !
42023040	Kwonka mugyenzi we tahwama , amuteisa ati : Torikutiina Ruhanga n'akakye ? Manya waacwerwa orubanja rw'okufa nkawe .
42023041	Nangwa itwe kitushemereire , ahabw'okuba tutuzirwe ebi twakozire . Kwonka ogu taine kibi ki akozire .
42023042	Atyo agira ati : Yesu , ku oraahikye omu bukama bwawe , onyijukye .
42023043	Onu amugarukamu ati : Buzimazima ninkuhamiza , eri izooba noija kuba hamwe naanye omu mwanya gw'obunanukye .
42023044	Eshaaha ya mukaaga ku yaabaire eri haihi kuhika , ensi yoona yaashwekwa omwirima , eizooba ryabura kwaka okuhitsya aha shaaha ya mwenda .
42023045	Omukingo gwa Nyaruju gwatemukamu emitanda ebiri .
42023046	Yesu yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Taata , amagara gangye naagata omu mikono yaawe ! Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo , gwahwamu .
42023047	Omukuru w'abaserukare igana , ku yaareebire ekyabaho , yaahimbisa Ruhanga naagira ati : Buzimazima ogu muntu abaire ari ohikiriire !
42023048	N'abantu boona abaabaire bateeraniire aho kuroreera , ku baareebire ekyabaho , baagaruka owaabo nibeemaamaata .
42023049	Banywani be boona hamwe n'abakazi abaarugire nawe Galilaaya bamushendekyereize , bakaguma beemereire hangahari nibareeba byona ebyabaho .
42023050	Reero hakaba hariho omuntu orikwetwa Yosefu , omuhanuuzi rugambwa , omuntu murungi kandi ohikiriire ,
42023051	otaraikirizaine nabo omu bi baahanwire n'omu bi baakozire . Akaba arugire Arimataaya , ekirorero ky'Abayudaaya , kandi atwire ategyereize obukama bwa Ruhanga .
42023052	Ogwo mushaija yaaza owa Pilaato , yaamushaba omutumbi gwa Yesu .
42023053	Atyo yaaguhanura , yaaguzinga omu mwenda gwa kitaani , yaaguta omu kituuro ekyabaire kishorogotoroirwe omu ibaare , kandi ekitakaziikwamuga muntu .
42023054	Rikaba riri izooba ry'Okweteguura kandi Sabato eri haihi kuhika .
42023055	Omu bunaku obwo abakazi abaabaire barugire Galilaaya na Yesu , bakaguma nibagyenda Yosefu enyima . Baayetegyereza ekituuro n'oku omutumbi gwateebwamu .
42023056	Bwanyima baagarukayo , baatebeekanisa eby'emigaju n'obutahe . Ahari Sabato baahuumura nk'oku kyabaire nikiragiirwa .
42024001	Aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki , kare munonga omu kasheeshe , abakazi bakaza aha kituuro baine eby'emigaju ebi baabaire batebeekaniise .
42024002	Baashanga eibaare rikumbagaziibwe , riihirwe aha kituuro .
42024003	Ku baataahiremu , tibaashangamu mutumbi gwa Mukama Yesu .
42024004	Ku baabaire bakyemereire aho bashobangiriirwe , baareeba abashaija babiri abajwaire ebirikwengyengyeta babeemereire aha rubaju .
42024005	Abo bakazi baatiina munonga , baaguma bainikire emitwe ahansi . Kwonka abo bashaija babiri baabagira bati : Ahabw'enki nimusherurira ohuriire omu bafiire ? Tari aha , yaazooka .
42024006	Mwijukye eki yaabagambiire akiri Galilaaya
42024007	naagira ati : Omwana w'omuntu n'ow'okurekurirwa abasiisi kubambwa aha musharaba , kwonka aha kiro kya kashatu azookye .
42024008	Nabo baijuka ebigambo bye .
42024009	Abo bakazi ku baarugire aha kituuro , ebyo byona baabiteekyerereza eikumi n'omwe hamwe n'abandi boona .
42024010	Abakazi abo bakaba bari Mariya Magadaleena , Yoana , na Mariya nyina wa Yakobo , n'abandi bakazi abu baabaire baine , nabo baabigambira batyo entumwa .
42024011	Ebi baabagambiire byabasusira ebitaine buryo , tibaabiikiriza .
42024012	[ Kwonka Petero yaimuka , yairuka yaaza aha kituuro . Yainama , tiyaareeba kindi kureka emyenda ya kitaani . Atyo yaagaruka omu ka naatangaarira ekyabaho . ]
42024013	Eryo izooba babiri omuribo bakaba nibaza omu kyaro ekirikwetwa Emausi , nka kilomita ikumi n'emwe okuruga Yerusalemu ;
42024014	baagyenda nibagaaniira byona ebibaireho .
42024015	Ku baabaire nibakibigambaho , Yesu nyakabara yaija , yaabahika , yaagyenda nabo ;
42024016	kwonka amaisho gaabo gaakingwaho , tibaamumanya .
42024017	Yaabagira ati : Beitu ni bigambo ki ebi murikugyenda nimugaaniira ? Batyo baayemerera bacuramiriirwe .
42024018	Bwanyima omwe aharibo orikwetwa Keleopasi , amugarukamu ati : Ka n'eihano okureeba ngu omu baizire Yerusalemu , niiwe wenka otarikumanya bibaireho ebiro ebi ?
42024019	Nawe ababuuza ati : Ni biiha ? Banu bati : Ebya Yesu owa Nazareeti , owaayeyorekire ari omurangi omukuru , ahabw'ebi yaagambire n'ebi yaakozire omu maisho ga Ruhanga n'ag'abantu boona .
42024020	Mbwenu abahongyerezi baitu abakuru n'abategyeki bamuhaireyo kucwerwa orubanja rw'okwitwa , baamubamba aha musharaba .
42024021	Manya itwe tukaba twine amatsiko , ngu niwe aricungura Isiraeli . Ebyo tibigarukiire aho , hati eri n'eizooba rya kashatu okwiha ebyo bibaireho .
42024022	Abakazi bamwe ab'omuriitwe baatuhuruutura omutima nibagira ngu , ku baaza aha kituuro nibutaagurikana ,
42024023	tibaashangamu mutumbi ; baagaruka nibagira ngu nangwa na bamaraika baagira ngu ahuriire .
42024024	Kandi nu , bagyenzi baitu abamwe baaza aha kituuro , baashanga byona biri nk'oku abo bakazi baagamba . Kwonka we tibaamureeba .
42024025	Nawe nikwo kubagira ati : Imwe bashema ' mwe , abatarahukirwa kwikiriza byona ebi abarangi baagambire !
42024026	Kristo akaba atari w'okubonabonesibwa atyo , ngu abone kutaaha omu kitiinwa kye ?
42024027	Mpaho atandikira ahari Musa , ahika n'aha barangi boona , naabashoboororera ebicweka ebiri omu Byahandiikirwe ebikwatiraine nawe .
42024028	Ku baahikire haihi n'ekyaro eki baabaire nibazamu , yaashusha nk'orikwenda kugumizamu ;
42024029	kwonka bo baamugyemesereza bati : Guma naitwe ahabw'okuba bwaza kwira , n'eizooba riri haihi kurenga . Nawe nikwo kutaahamu nabo .
42024030	Ku yaabaire ari hamwe nabo aha meeza , yaakwata omugaati , yaagusiimira ; bwanyima yaagucwamu , yaagubaha !
42024031	Amaisho gaabo gaahumuuka , baamumanya ; omuri ako kacu yaababuraho .
42024032	Baagambirana bonka bati : Emitima yaitu tiyaatagata , obu yaaba naatugaaniirira turi omu muhanda , akatushoboororera Ebyahandiikirwe ?
42024033	Mpaho omuri ako kaanya baimutsya orugyendo baagaruka Yerusalemu ; baashangayo eikumi n'omwe bateeraine hamwe na bagyenzi baabo ,
42024034	abaabagizire bati : N'eky'amazima ; Mukama yaazooka , yaayeyoreka na Simooni .
42024035	Nabo nikwo kubateekyerereza ebyabaho omu muhanda , kandi n'oku baamumanyira aha kucwamu omugaati .
42024036	Ku baabaire nibakigaaniira ahari ebyo byona , Yesu yaabeemerera ahagati , yaabagira ati : Mugire obusingye .
42024037	Baakangarana baitsirwe obwoba , nibateekateeka ngu baareeba omuzimu .
42024038	Kwonka we yaabagira ati : Ahabw'enki mwemereize omutima , kandi nimubangaanisiza ki ?
42024039	Nimureebe engaro zangye n'ebigyere byangye ; buzimazima niinye . Munkwateho mwereebere ; omuzimu tigugira magufa na nyama nk'ebi murikureeba nyine .
42024040	[ Ku yaabaire naagamba ebyo , yaabooreka engaro ze n'ebigyere bye . ]
42024041	Ku baabaire batakaikiriize , baitsirwe okushemererwa n'okutangaara , yaabagira ati : Ebyo , aha mwineho akokurya ?
42024042	Batyo baamuha ekicweka ky'ekyenyanja kikazire ;
42024043	yaakyakiira , yaakirya nibamureeba .
42024044	Bwanyima Yesu yaabagira ati : Ebyo nibyo naabagambiire obu naabaire nkiri hamwe naimwe , ngu ebyampadiikirweho omu iteeka rya Musa n'omu by'abarangi n'omu bihimbano , ku byona biri eby'okuhikiirizibwa .
42024045	Atyo yaahwezesa emitima yaabo , ngu beetegyereze Ebyahandiikirwe .
42024046	Yaabagira ati : Oku nikwo kyahandiikirwe ngu , Kristo n'ow'okubonabonesibwa n'okuzooka omu bafiire aha kiro kya kashatu ;
42024047	kandi ngu okwegarukamu n'okusaasirwa ebibi birangirirwe omu mahanga goona omu iziina rye , okutandikira Yerusalemu .
42024048	Niimwe baakareebi baabyo .
42024049	Mbwenu naaza kubooherereza eki Tata yaaraganiise ; kwonka mugume omu rurembo okuhitsya obu muriheebwa amaani agarikuruga omu iguru .
42024050	Mpaho Yesu yaabeebembera , baahika haihi na Beetaniya ; atyo yaimutsya emikono , yaabaha omugisha .
42024051	Ku yaabaire naakigubaha , yaabarugaho , yaatwarwa omu iguru .
42024052	Baamuramya , bwanyima baagaruka Yerusalemu baijwire okushemererwa ;
42024053	kandi baaguma obutoosha omuri Nyaruju nibahimbisa Ruhanga .
43001001	Omu kutandika , Kigambo akaba ariho ; Kigambo akaba ari hamwe na Ruhanga , kandi Kigambo akaba ari Ruhanga .
43001002	Omu kutandika akaba ari hamwe na Ruhanga .
43001003	Ebintu byona niwe yaabireeteire kubaho ; kandi ahatari we , tihariho kintu na kimwe ekyahangirwe .
43001004	Omuriwe amagara nimwo gaabaire gari , kandi ago magara gakabeera abantu omushana .
43001005	Ogwo mushana gujwera omu mwirima , kwonka omwirima tigukaguraazaga .
43001006	Hakaba hariho omuntu orikwetwa Yohaana , owaatumirwe Ruhanga .
43001007	Ekyamureetsire n'okuba kareebi w'okuhamya omushana , ngu boona babone kwikiriza ahabwe .
43001008	We akaba atari mushana , kureka kareebi w'okuhamya omushana .
43001009	Owaabaire ari omushana gw'amazima , ogujwera abantu boona , akaba naija omu nsi .
43001010	Kigambo akaba ari omu nsi , nobu araabe niwe yaareeteire ensi egyo kubaho , kwonka egyo nsi teramumanyire .
43001011	Akaija owe , haza abe tibaamwakiira .
43001012	Kwonka abaamwakiire bakamwikiriza , akabaha obushoboorozi bw'okuba abaana ba Ruhanga ;
43001013	abatarazairwe bantu nyabuntu nari okwetenga kw'omubiri , nobu kwakuba okweyendera kw'omuntu , kureka abaazairwe Ruhanga .
43001014	Kigambo ogwo akaba omuntu , yaatuura omuriitwe aijwire embabazi n'amazima ; twareeba ekitiinwa kye ekiri nk'eky'Omwana omwe wenka owaarugire ahari Ishe .
43001015	Yohaana akamuhamya naarangirira ati : Ogu niwe naagambireho ku arikwija ankuratiire , kandi ku arikunkiza ekitiinwa , ahabw'okuba akaba ariho nyowe ntakabaireho .
43001016	Twena tukatunga embabazi ezongyereirwe aha zindi , nituziiha omu biijwire ebiri omuriwe .
43001017	Manya eiteeka rikaheebwa niriraba omuri Musa ; embabazi n'amazima byo byaija nibiraba omuri Yesu Kristo .
43001018	Okwiha iranaira tihaine orareebire Ruhanga , kureka Mwana wenka , otuura ari entoore ya Ishe , niwe yaamumanyiise abantu .
43001019	Okwo nikwo kuhamya kwa Yohaana , obu Abayudaaya baamutumaho abahongyerezi n'Abaleevi abaarugire Yerusalemu kumubuuza bati : Ori oha ?
43001020	Tarahunamire , akabagambira butunu ati : Nyowe tindi Kristo .
43001021	Baamubuuza bati : Mbwenu shi , ori Eliya ? Yaagira ati : Tindi we . Bati : Ori omurangi ori ? Yaagarukamu ati : Ngaaha .
43001022	Nabo nikwo kumugira bati : Ori oha ? Manya nitwenda eky'okugambira abatutumire .
43001023	Yohaana nawe yaagira ati : Ndi orikwamuriza omu ihamba nti : Muringaanize omuhanda gwa Mukama , nk'oku Isaaya yaarangire .
43001024	Obwo abantu abo abaabaire batumirwe Abafarisaayo ,
43001025	baayongyera kumubuuza bati : Ku oraabe otari Kristo , nainga Eliya , nari omurangi , ahabw'enki noobatiza ?
43001026	Yohaana yaabagarukamu ati : Nyowe mbatiza n'amaizi ; kwonka omuriimwe heemereiremu ou mutarikumanya ;
43001027	niwe ogwo orikuunyija enyima , kandi ou ntashemereire kukomoorora rukoba rw'enkaito ye .
43001028	Ebyo bikabaho Beetaniya seeri y'omugyera Yorudaani , ei Yohaana yaabaire naabatiriza .
43001029	Aha izooba eryakuratsireho , Yohaana ku yaareebire Yesu naamwizira , yaagira ati : Nimureebe Omwana gw'Entaama wa Ruhanga , oihaho ekibi ky'ensi .
43001030	Ogu niwe ngambireho ningira nti : Hariho omuntu orikuunyija enyima , orikunkiza ekitiinwa , ahabw'okuba akaba ariho nyowe ntakabaireho .
43001031	Nyowe nkaba ntarikumumanya ; kwonka nkaija nimbatiza n'amaizi , ngu abone kumanywa omuri Isiraeli .
43001032	Yohaana yaagaruka yaahamya ati : Ndeebire Mutima naaruga omu iguru naamushuumaho nk'enkombe , yaamugumaho .
43001033	Nyowe mbaire ntarikumumanya ; kwonka owantumire kubatiza n'amaizi , angizire ati : Omuntu ou oraareebe Mutima naamushuumaho akamugumaho , niwe ogwo orikwija kubatiza na Mutima Orikwera .
43001034	Ekyo nkireebire , kandi ndi kareebi orikuhamya ogwo ku ari Omwana wa Ruhanga .
43001035	Aha izooba eryakuratsireho , Yohaana akaba ayemereire hamwe na babiri ab'omu batendekwa be ;
43001036	ku yaareebire Yesu naahingura , yaagira ati : Nimureebe Omwana gw'Entaama wa Ruhanga !
43001037	Abatendekwa be ababiri ku baakihuriire , baakuratira Yesu .
43001038	Yesu yaahinduka , yaabareeba bamukuratiire , yaabagira ati : Nimwenda ki ? Baamugarukamu bati : Rabi , - amakuru ngu , Mwegyesa - - nooraara hi ?
43001039	Nawe yaabagira ati : Nimwije mureebeyo . Batyo baagyenda , baareeba ahi yaabaire naaraara ; baaguma nawe ekyo kiro ; obwo , eshaaha zikaba ziri nka ikumi .
43001040	Omwe ahari abo bombi abaahuriire ebi Yohaana yaagambire , bakakuratira Yesu , ni Andereya murumuna wa Simooni Petero .
43001041	Andereya yaabanza kureeba mukuru we Simooni , yaamugira ati : Tuboine Mesiya , amakuru gaakyo ngu , Kristo .
43001042	Atyo atwara Simooni , amuhitsya Yesu . Yesu amuhanga amaisho , amugira ati : Ori Simooni mwene Yohaana ? Noija kwetwa Keefa , amakuru ngu , Petero .
43001043	Eizooba eryakuratsireho , Yesu ku yaabaire naayenda kuza Galilaaya , yaabugana Filipo yaamugira ati : Nkuratira .
43001044	Filipo ogwo akaba ari owa Beetisaida , orurembo rwa Andereya na Petero .
43001045	Filipo yaareeba Natanaeli yaamugira ati : Tumuboine ou Musa yaahandiikireho omu iteeka , kandi ou abarangi baahandiikireho : niwe Yesu , mwene Yosefu owa Nazareeti .
43001046	Ndi Natanaeli ati : Nazareeti nayo erugwa ekintu kirungi ? Filipo amugarukamu ati : Ija , oyereebere .
43001047	Yesu ku yaareebire Natanaeli naamwizira , yaamugambaho ati : Reeba Omuisiraeli kashushu , otaine bugobya !
43001048	Natanaeli amugira ati : Wammanyisibwa ki ? Yesu amugarukamu ati : Filipo atakakwetsire , naakureeba ori ahansi y'omutiini .
43001049	Natanaeli ati : Mwegyesa , niiwe Mwana wa Ruhanga ! Niiwe Mugabe wa Isiraeli !
43001050	Yesu nawe ati : Waikiriza ahabw'okuba naagira ngu naakureeba ori ahansi y'omutiini ?
43001051	Agumizamu ati : Buzimazima ninkugambira nti : Oryareeba iguru rikinguukire , na baamaraika ba Ruhanga nibatemba kandi nibatemburukira aha Mwana w'omuntu .
43002001	Ku haahingwireho ebiro bishatu , haabaho obugyenyi bw'obushwere omuri Kaana eya Galilaaya ; nyina wa Yesu yaabutaaha ,
43002002	kandi Yesu n'abatendekwa be nabo baabwetwaho .
43002003	Viino ku yaahwaireho , nyina wa Yesu yaamugira ati : Viino yaabahwaho .
43002004	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Mukaikuru , noofa ki naanye ? Obunaku bwangye tibukahikire .
43002005	Kwonka nyina yaagira abaheereza ati : Kyona eki araabaragiire , mukikore .
43002006	Obwo hakaba hatairweho enjoga mpango mukaaga z'amabaare , z'okutamu amaizi g'okweyeza , nk'omugyenzo gw'Abayudaaya oku gwabaire guri ; buri emwe neijuzibwa enywero makumi abiri nari ashatu .
43002007	Yesu nikwo kugambira abaheereza ati : Nimwijuze ezo njoga amaizi . Nabo baaziijuza n'aha bunwa .
43002008	Bwanyima yaabagira ati : Hati nu nimutahe , mutwarire omugabuzi . Nabo baagira batyo .
43002009	Omugabuzi , ku yaarorizeho , yaashanga amaizi gaahindukire viino . Ahabw'okutamanya viino egyo ei yaaruga , kwonka abaheereza abaatahire amaizi bo nibakimanya , omugabuzi yaayeta kishwera ,
43002010	yaamugira ati : Omuntu weena abanza kutereka viino enungi ; abantu ku bahwa eiriho abona kureeta etari nungi ; kwonka iwe waaguma obiikire viino enungi okuhitsya hati .
43002011	Ako niko kamanyiso k'okubanza omu bi Yesu yaakozire , kikakorerwa omuri Kaana eya Galilaaya . Yaayoreka ekitiinwa kye , haza abatendekwa be baamwikiriza .
43002012	Ekyo ku kyahwaire , yaashuuma Kafarinaumu hamwe na nyina n'abarumuna n'abatendekwa be ; okwo baamarayo ebiro bikye .
43002013	Ekiro ky'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho kw'Abayudaaya ku kyabaire kiri haihi kuhika , Yesu yainamuka Yerusalemu .
43002014	Ku yaataahire omuri Nyaruju , yaashangamu abantu abarikutundiramu ente n'entaama n'enkombe , n'abarikuhingisa empiiha , bashutami nibazihingisa .
43002015	Yaagira otugoye , yaatwogoshamu omunyaafu , yaababinga omuri Nyaruju boona , hamwe n'ente n'entaama ; yaasheesha empiiha z'abarikuzihingisa , yaajuumika emeeza zaabo .
43002016	Atyo agira abarikutunda enkombe ati : Mwiheho ebi byona , murekye kuhindura enju ya Tata akajagiro .
43002017	Bwanyima abatendekwa be nikwo kwijuka ebigambo by'omu Byahandiikirwe , ebirikugira biti : Okugirira enju yaawe eihato kuryammaraho .
43002018	Abayudaaya baamugarukamu nibagira bati : Nikamanyiso ki aku orikubaasa kutworeka kuhamya ekyakukoresa ebyo ?
43002019	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Nimusheenye Nyaruju egi , haza ngiimutsye omu biro bishatu .
43002020	Abayudaaya baamugira bati : Nyaruju egi eyaamazire emyaka makumi ana na mukaaga neeyombekwa , iwe noogiimutsya omu biro bishatu !
43002021	Kwonka Nyaruju ei yaagambireho n'omubiri gwe .
43002022	Yesu ku yaazookire omu bafiire , abatendekwa be baijuka ku yaakigambire , baikiriza Ebyahandiikirwe n'ebi yaagambire .
43002023	Ebiro ebi yaamazire omuri Yerusalemu aha Bugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho , abantu baingi bakamwikiriza ahabw'okureeba obumanyiso obu yaakozire .
43002024	Kwonka Yesu we tiyaabahwerayo , ahabw'okushangwa naamanya abantu boona ,
43002025	kandi akaba atarikwetenga muntu n'omwe kumugambira eby'abantu ; ahabw'okuba we akaba naamanya ebiri omu muntu .
43003001	Hakaba hariho Omufarisaayo orikwetwa Nikodemo , omwe aha bategyeki b'Abayudaaya .
43003002	Ogwo akaija ahari Yesu nyekiro , yaamugira ati : Mwegyesa , nitumanya ku ori omwegyesa owaarugira ahari Ruhanga ; ahabw'okuba tihariho orikubaasa kukora obumanyiso obu orikukora , Ruhanga yaaba atamwine .
43003003	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Buzimazima ninkugambira nti : Omuntu , ku aba atazairwe bwa kabiri , tabaasa kureeba bukama bwa Ruhanga .
43003004	Nikodemo yaamugira ati : Omuntu naabaasa ata kuzaarwa yaakuzire ? Naabaasa kugaruka omunda ya nyina , azaarwe ?
43003005	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Buzimazima ninkugambira nti : Omuntu ku aba atazairwe maizi na Mutima , tabaasa kutaaha mu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
43003006	Manya ozaarwa omubiri aba omubiri , noozaarwa Mutima aba Mutima .
43003007	Kitakutangaaza ku ndaakugire nti : Mushemereire kuzaarwa obwa kabiri .
43003008	Omuyaga guhuuha nigugarura ei gurikwenda ; iwe ohurira endigito yaagwo , kwonka tobaasa kumanya ei gurikuruga n'ei gurikugarura ; na boona abazaarwa Mutima nikwo baba .
43003009	Nikodemo amubuuza ati : Beitu ekyo nikibaasika kita ?
43003010	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Iwe ebyo torikubimanya , haza ori omwegyesa omuri Isiraeli ?
43003011	Buzimazima ninkugambira nti : Itwe tugamba ebi turikumanya , tuhamya ebi tureebire ; kwonka imwe timwikiriza bi tubahamiza .
43003012	Ku muraabe mutarikuunyikiriza nimbagambira eby'omu nsi , muryanyikiriza muta naabagambira eby'omu iguru ?
43003013	Tihariho oragiire omu iguru , kureka ogwo owaarugireyo , niwe Mwana w'omuntu owaarugire omu iguru .
43003014	Kandi nk'oku Musa yaahanikire enjoka omu ihamba n'Omwana w'omuntu nikwo ari ow'okuhanikwa ,
43003015	reero weena orikumwikiriza , atungye amagara agatahwaho .
43003016	Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga nikwo yaakunzire atyo ensi , akahayo Omwana we omwe nyamunegyere , ngu weena orikumwikiriza atakaahwerekyerera , kureka atungye amagara agatahwaho .
43003017	Manya Ruhanga taratumire Mwana we mu nsi kugisingisa orubanja , kureka ngu ensi ejunwe ahabwe .
43003018	Weena orikwikiriza Mwana , tarikusingwa rubanja ; kwonka weena otarikwikiriza , orubanja rwamusingire , ahabw'okuba taikiriize Mwana wa Ruhanga omwe nyamunegyere .
43003019	Eki nikyo kisingisa abantu orubanja ; omushana gwizire omu nsi ; kwonka abantu baakunda omwirima okukira omushana , ahabw'okuba ebi baabaire nibakora bikaba biri bibi .
43003020	Manya enkozi y'ebibi eyanga omushana kandi egwetantara , ngu ebi erikukora bitakaareebwa .
43003021	Kwonka okora eby'amazima aza omu mushana , kworeka butunu ku ebi arikukora birikukorwa ahabw'okworobera Ruhanga .
43003022	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Yesu yaaza n'abatendekwa be omu kyanga kya Buyudaaya , yaagumayo nabo naabatiza .
43003023	Ago magingo Yohaana nawe akaba naabatiriza omuri Ainooni haihi na Saalimu , ei amaizi maingi gaabaire gari ; abantu nibazayo kubatizibwa .
43003024	Ekyo kikabaho Yohaana atakatairwe mu kihome .
43003025	Mbwenu bamwe omu batendekwa ba Yohaana bakatandika kuhakana n'Omuyudaaya aha by'okwezibwa .
43003026	Mpaho baaza ahari Yohaana , baamugira bati : Mwegyesa , omushaija owaabaire ari hamwe naiwe seeri ya Yorudaani , omuntu ori ou waagambireho noohamya , hati ariyo naabatiza , kandi abantu boona nibaza ahu ari .
43003027	Yohaana yaabagarukamu ati : Omuntu tabaasa kwetungira kintu kyona atakihairwe kuruga omu iguru .
43003028	Naimwe mwenka nimunjurira ku naagizire nti : Nyowe tindi Kristo , kureka ndi owaatumirwe kumwebembera .
43003029	Oine kishwerwa niwe kishwera ; kwonka omugambi w'obugyenyi ku aba amuri haihi , yaamutega okutu naagamba , ashemererwa yaahurira eiraka rye ; okushemererwa nk'okwo naanye nikwo nyine kandi hati kuhikire .
43003030	We n'ow'okutunguuka , nyowe ndi ow'okugaruka ahansi .
43003031	Oruga ahaiguru akira boona ; kwonka oruga omu nsi , aba ow'ensi , kandi emigambire ye eba ey'ab'ensi ; oruga omu iguru akira boona .
43003032	Agamba naahamya ebi yaareebire n'ebi yaahuriire , kwonka tihariho n'omwe oikiriza ebi agamba .
43003033	Obiikiriza ahamya ku Ruhanga ari ow'amazima .
43003034	Manya ou Ruhanga atumire agamba ebigambo bya Ruhanga byonka ; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga amuha Mutima atarikumurengyera .
43003035	Ruhanga Taata akunda Mwana , kandi byona akabimurekurira .
43003036	Weena oikiriza Mwana agira amagara agatahwaho ; kwonka oyanga kumworobera taritunga magara , kureka ekiniga kya Ruhanga kimugumaho .
43004001	Abafarisaayo bakahurira ngu Yesu naatendeka kandi naabatiza baingi okukira Yohaana ,
43004002	haza kunu Yesu we atarabatiize , kureka abatendekwa be bonka .
43004003	Mpaho Yesu ku yaakimanyire , yaaruga Buyudaaya , yaagaruka Galilaaya .
43004004	Ekyo kyamureetera kuraba omuri Samariya .
43004005	Atyo yaahika omu rurembo rwa Samariya orurikwetwa Sukaara , haihi n'eshambu ei Yakobo yaahaire omutabani Yosefu .
43004006	Okwo hakaba hariyo eiziba rya Yakobo . Yesu ku yaaruhiibwe orugyendo , yaashutama aha rubaju rw'eryo iziba . Obwo zikaba ziri eshaaha nka mukaaga .
43004007	Haija Omusamariyakazi kutaha amaizi ; Yesu yaamugira ati : Mpa otwizi nnyweho .
43004008	Obwo abatendekwa be bakaba bagiire omu rurembo kugura ebyokurya .
43004009	Omusamariyakazi yaamugira ati : K'ori Omuyudaaya , waiha hi kunshaba ekyokunywa , haza nyowe ndi Omusamariyakazi ? Ahabw'okuba Abayudaaya tibakwatanisa na Basamariya .
43004010	Yesu yaamugarukamu ati : Kuri waaba noomanya engabirano ya Ruhanga , n'orikukugira ati : Mpa ekyokunywa ; naiwe okaamushabire , nawe akuha amaizi agarimu amagara .
43004011	Ogwo mukazi amugarukamu ati : Mbwenu shi , k'otaine ky'okutahisa , n'eiziba ka ni riraingwa ; mbwenu ago maizi garimu amagara noija kugaiha hi ?
43004012	Iwe nookira tataitwe Yakobo owaatuhaire eryo iziba , eri yaabaire anywaho n'abatabani n'amasyo ge ?
43004013	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Weena onywa aga maizi , agaruka agira eiriho ;
43004014	kwonka onywa amaizi agu ndimuha , tarigira iriho bundi ; amaizi agu ndimuha garyahinduka enshuro , efumukye omuriwe , emureetere amagara agatahwaho .
43004015	Omukazi yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , mpa ahari ago maizi , ndekye kugira eiriho obundi n'okugaruka aha kutaha amaizi .
43004016	Yesu amugira ati : Irooko , oyete baro , haza ogarukye aha .
43004017	Omukazi amugarukamu ati : Manya tingira ibanye . Yesu amugira ati : Ohikire okugira oti : Tiinyine ibanye ;
43004018	ahabw'okuba nobu oraabe waashweirweho bataano , ogu ou oine hati ti baro ; eki waagamba n'eky'amazima .
43004019	Omukazi amugira ati : Mukama wangye , mbwenu naamanya ku ori omurangi .
43004020	Baatataitwe bakaba baramiza ahari oru rushozi , haza imwe mugira muti : Yerusalemu nigwo mwanya ogu omuntu weena ashemereire kuramizamu .
43004021	Ndi Yesu ati : Mukazi ' we , nyikiriza . Obunaku nibwija kuhika , mube mutakiramiza Taata ahari oru rushozi , nobu haakuba omuri Yerusalemu .
43004022	Imwe muramya eki mutarikumanya ; kwonka itwe turamya eki turikumanya ahabw'okuba okujuna kuruga omu Buyudaaya .
43004023	Kwonka obunaku buryahika , nangwa bwahikire , obu abarikuramya omu mazima , bariramya Taata omu mutima n'omu mazima , ahabw'okuba abamuramya batyo nibo Ruhanga asiima .
43004024	Ruhanga aba omutima ; n'abamuramya baba ab'okumuramiza omu mutima n'omu mazima .
43004025	Omukazi amugira ati : Nimmanya Mesiya , niwe Kristo , ku ari ow'okwija ; ku ariija , aryatumanyisa byona .
43004026	Yesu amugira ati : Manya , niinye orikugamba naiwe .
43004027	Ago magingo abatendekwa be bagaruka ; batangaara okumushanga naagaaniira n'omukazi , kwonka tihagira n'omwe owaamubuuza ati : Waaba oine eki orikwenda ? Nari ati : Waaba noogaaniirira ki nawe ?
43004028	Ogwo mukazi nikwo kutsigaho enyungu ye y'amaizi , akeehuuta naagaruka omu rurembo , akagambira abantu ati :
43004029	Nimwije mureebe omuntu owangambira byona ebi naakozire . T'akaaba Kristo ?
43004030	Abantu nikwo kuruga omu rurembo , bakaza ahi Yesu yaabaire ari .
43004031	Omuri ako kaanya abatendekwa bamweshengyereza bati : Mwegyesa , gira aku waarya .
43004032	Abagarukamu ati : Nyine ebyokurya ebi mutarikumanya .
43004033	Abatendekwa nabo nikwo kubuuzana bati : Beitu hariho owaamureetera ebyokurya ?
43004034	Kwonka Yesu abagira ati : Ebyokurya byangye n'okuhikiiriza ebi owantumire akunda , kandi n'okuhikiiriza omurimo gwe .
43004035	Imwe timurikugira ngu , hatsigaireyo ameezi ana eigyesha kuhika ? Mbwenu ka mbagambire nti : Munagye amaisho oku n'oku , mureebe emisiri oku eyezire , ku eri haihi kugyeshwa .
43004036	Na mbwenu omugyesi naaheebwa ebihembo bye , yaaherize kurundaana ebi ayerize ; haza obwo naitanira amagara agatahwaho , ngu omubibi n'omugyesi babone kushemererwa kumwe .
43004037	Nikyo enfumu egi ehikiire , erikugira eti : Omwe abiba , ondi agyesha .
43004038	Nkabatuma kushaaruura ebi mutarahendekyeire ; abandi bakabihendekyera , mbwenu imwe mwaija , mwataaha omu bi bo baafeereire kubi .
43004039	Abasamariya baingi b'omuri orwo rurembo bakamwikiriza ahabw'ebi omukazi yaabagambiire ati : Yangambira byona ebi naakozire .
43004040	Ku baamuhikire , baamushaba ku abaraarira . Yaateerayo ebiro bibiri .
43004041	Kandi ku yaagambire nabo , baingi okukiraho baikiriza ahabw'ebi yaabagambira .
43004042	Baagira ogwo mukazi bati : Hati titwakiikiriza habw'ebi waatugambira ; naitwe twamwehuririra , kandi nitumanyira kimwe ku ari Omujuni w'ensi .
43004043	Ebiro bibiri ku byahwaireho , Yesu yaimutsya orugyendo kuza Galilaaya .
43004044	We wenka akaba yaagambire butunu ati : Omurangi tagira kitiinwa omu ihanga rye .
43004045	Kwonka ku yaahikire Galilaaya , Abanyagalilaaya baamwakiira , ahabw'okureeba ebi yaakoreire Yerusalemu aha kiro kikuru , ahabw'okuba nabo bakaba bariyo .
43004046	Atyo Yesu agaruka Kaana ey'omuri Galilaaya , ei yaabaire ahinduriire amaizi viino . Okwo hakaba hariyo omukungu , ou omutabani yaabaire arwariire Kafarinaumu .
43004047	Ogwo mukungu , ku yaahuriire ngu Yesu ahikire Galilaaya naaruga Buyudaaya , yaagyenda , yaamushaba ku aija akakiza omutabani owaabaire ari haihi kufa .
43004048	Yesu yaamugira ati : Ku muba mutareebire bumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza , mwanga kwikiriza .
43004049	Ogwo mukungu amweshengyereza ati : Mukama wangye , ngirira obwira , oije omwana wangye atakafiire .
43004050	Yesu amugira ati : Irooko otaahe ; mutabani waawe yaakira . Ogwo mushaija yaikiriza eki Yesu yaamugambira , yaakwata omuhanda , yaagyenda .
43004051	Ku yaabaire naakigarukayo , abaheereza be baamubuganisa amakuru ku mutabani we ahuriire .
43004052	Ababuuza amagingo gu yaatandikiramu kukira ; bamugarukamu bati : Manya omushwija gumurugireho nyomwabazyo shaaha mushanju .
43004053	Ishe amanya ku niyo shaaha buzima , ei Yesu yaamugambiriiremu ati : Omwana waawe yaakira ; reero we n'ab'eka ye boona baikiriza .
43004054	Ako niko kamanyiso ka kabiri , aku Yesu yaakozire obu yaaruga Buyudaaya akaza Galilaaya .
43005001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , haabaho obugyenyi bw'Abayudaaya ; Yesu nawe yainamuka Yerusalemu .
43005002	Okwo omuri Yerusalemu haihi n'Eirembo ry'Entaama , hakaba hariyo ekiyanja , omu Ruheburaayo ekirikwetwa Beetisaida , kiriho amarembo ataano .
43005003	Ahari ago marembo niho abarwaire baingi munonga baabaire barambira : empumi , ebirema n'abazingazingirwe , [ bategyereize amaizi kutabanguka .
43005004	Ahabw'okuba obundi n'obundi maraika wa Nyakubaho akaba ashuuma omuri ekyo kiyanja , atabangura ago maizi , reero owaabanza kugaragaramu gaaheza kutabanguka , akira endwara yoona ei aine ] .
43005005	Mbwenu aho hakaba hariho omushaija owaabaire amazire emyaka ashatu na munaana arwaire .
43005006	Yesu ku yaamureebire arambiire aho , kandi yaamanya ku amazire omwanya muhango ari atyo , yaamubuuza ati : Nooyenda kukira ?
43005007	Ogwo murwaire yaamugarukamu ati : Mukama wangye , manya tiinyine w'okunta omu kiyanja , amaizi gaaheza kutabanguka ; ku mba ninza kuzamu , ondiijo antangamu .
43005008	Yesu amugira ati : Imuka , oiheho ekirago kyawe , ogyende .
43005009	Ahonaaho ogwo mushaija yaakira , yaihaho ekirago kye , yaagyenda . Haza obwo ekaba eri Sabato .
43005010	Abayudaaya nikwo kugira ogwo mushaija owaatambirwa bati : Hati ni Sabato , omu iteeka torikwikirizibwa kwekorera kirago kyawe .
43005011	Abagarukamu ati : Manya owantambira niwe yangira ati : Ihaho ekirago kyawe , ogyende .
43005012	Nabo bamubuuza bati : Ogwo n'oha owaakugira ati : Ihaho ekirago kyawe , ogyende ?
43005013	Kwonka kitambirwa ogwo akaba atarikumumanya , ahabw'okuba Yesu akaba yaarugire omuri abo bantu baingi abaabaire baijwire aho .
43005014	Bwanyima Yesu yaamushanga omuri Nyaruju , yaamugira ati : Reeba , waakira ; kwonka oyerinde , otarigaruka kushiisha obundi , nyentsya okahikwaho akaba akarikukira aka .
43005015	Mpaho ogwo mushaija agyenda , agambira Abayudaaya ku Yesu niwe yaamutambira .
43005016	Yesu ahabw'okukora ebintu nk'ebyo ahari Sabato , nikyo Abayudaaya baatandikiire kumuhiiganisa .
43005017	Nawe yaabagarukamu ati : Taata takarekaga kukora , kandi naanye ninkora .
43005018	Ekyo kikareetera Abayudaaya kwenda kumwita , ti habw'okuhenda ekiragiro kya Sabato kyonka , kureka n'okweta Ruhanga Ishe , akeinganisa nawe .
43005019	Yesu nikwo kubagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira , Mwana tabaasa kukora kintu ahabwe wenka , kureka akora eki areeba Taata naakora ; kandi kyona eki Taata akora , na Mwana nikyo akora .
43005020	Ahabw'okuba Taata akunda Mwana , amworeka byona ebi akora , kandi aryamworeka ebikuru nangwa ebirikukira ebyo , ebi arikora bikabatangaaza .
43005021	Nk'oku Taata azoora abafiire akabaha amagara , na Mwana nikwo aha amagara abu ayenda .
43005022	Manya Taata tacwera muntu weena rubanja , ahabw'okuba eby'okucwa emanja byona akabirekyera Mwana ,
43005023	ngu boona bahe Mwana ekitiinwa nk'oku bakiha Taata . Oyanga kuha Mwana ekitiinwa , biri ayangire kukiha Taata owaamutumire .
43005024	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena orikuhurira ebigambo byangye , akaikiriza ogwo owantumire , aine amagara agatahwaho , kandi aba atakicwerwa rubanja ; ahabw'okuba aba yaarugire omu kufa , yaataahire omu magara .
43005025	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Obunaku nibwija , nangwa bwahikire , obu abafiire barihuririramu eiraka ry'Omwana wa Ruhanga , kandi abaririhurira baryaba abahuriire .
43005026	Nk'oku Taata aba obukomooko bw'amagara , nawe nikwo yaahaire Mwana kuba obukomooko bwago ;
43005027	kandi ahabw'okuba Omwana w'omuntu , akamutaho kuba omuramuzi omukuru .
43005028	Eki kitabatangaaza ; ahabw'okuba obunaku nibwija obu abaafiire barirugiramu omu bituuro baaherize kuhurira eiraka rye ;
43005029	abaakozire ebirungi bakazookyera amagara , n'abaakozire ebibi bakazookyera okucwerwa orubanja .
43005030	Nyowe tindikubaasa kukora kintu kyona ahabwangye nyenka ; kureka ndamura nk'oku Taata andagiire , kandi okuramura kwangye kuhikire , ahabw'okuba tiinyenda kukora ebyangye ebi ndikwenda , kureka ebi owantumire arikwenda .
43005031	Kuri niinyehamya nyenka , biri okwehamya kwangye ti kw'amazima ;
43005032	kwonka hariho ondi orikumpamya akagamba ahabwangye , kandi nimmanya ku okumpamya kwe kuri okw'amazima .
43005033	Imwe mukatuma entumwa ahari Yohaana , yaahamya eby'amazima .
43005034	Tikwo kugira ngu nyine omuntu ou nyegamiire kumpamya ; kureka ebi ndikugamba n'ahabw'okwenda ngu mujunwe .
43005035	Yohaana akaba ari etabaaza ehembire erikwaka ; mwamara akaanya nimushemerererwa okwaka kwe .
43005036	Kwonka nyowe nyine obuhamya oburikukira obwa Yohaana ; ahabw'okuba emirimo ei nkora , ei Taata yampaire ngu mpitsye , niyo ehamya ku niwe yantumire .
43005037	Kandi na Taata owantumire nawe ampamya . Imwe timukahuriraga iraka rye , timukareebaga oku arikushusha ;
43005038	nikyo ekigambo kye kitahamira muriimwe , ahabw'okuba timurikwikiriza ou yaatumire .
43005039	Mushoma munonga Ebyahandiikirwe , nimuteekateeka ngu nimubiihamu amagara agatahwaho ; haza byo niinye bigambaho ;
43005040	kwonka mwanga kwija ahi ndi kutunga amagara .
43005041	Nyowe okusiimwa abantu tikwine ki kunkwatiire ,
43005042	kureka nimbamanyira kimwe ku mutakunda Ruhanga .
43005043	Nyowe nkaija omu iziina rya Taata , mwayanga kuunyikiriza ; kwonka ondiijo ku aija ahabwe wenka , mumwikiriza .
43005044	Nimubaasa muta kwikiriza mwaba nimwenda kusiimwa abantu , mutarikweta ha kusiimwa Ruhanga omwe wenka ?
43005045	Mutateekateeka ngu niinyija kubarega ahari Taata ; kureka Musa , ou mwesiga niwe abarega .
43005046	Kuri mwamwikiriize omu mazima , naanye mukaanyikiriize , ahabw'okuba niinye yaahandiikireho .
43005047	Mbwenu ku muraabe nimwanga kwikiriza ebi yaahandiikire , nimubaasa muta kwikiriza ebi ndikugamba ?
43006001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Yesu yaaza seeri y'enyanja ya Galilaaya , niyo ya Tiberiya .
43006002	Abantu baingi munonga baamukuratira , ahabw'okureeba obumanyiso obu yaakozire naakiza abarwaire .
43006003	Yesu yaatemba orushozi , yaashutamayo n'abatendekwa be .
43006004	Obugyenyi bw'Abayudaaya obw'Okuhingurwaho bukaba buri haihi kuhika .
43006005	Yesu ku yaimukize amaisho , yaareeba ebimbuuro by'abantu nibimwizira , yaagira Filipo ati : Tukaagura hi emigaati , ei aba bantu baraarye ?
43006006	Ekyo akakigambira Filipo kumureeba omunda , ahabw'okuba we akaba naamanyira kimwe eki araakore .
43006007	Filipo yaamugarukamu ati : Emigaati erikugurwa shilingi magana abiri tekaabahika , nobu omuntu yaakutungaho kakye .
43006008	Omwe omu batendekwa be , Andereya murumuna wa Simooni Petero , agira ati :
43006009	Aha hariho omwojo oine emigaati etaano ya baare n'ebyenyanja bibiri ; kwonka ebyo nibigasira ki abantu barikwingana bati ?
43006010	Yesu abagira ati : Nimubashutamye . Aho hakaba hariho akanyaatsi kaingi ; abantu barikwingana enkumi itaano baakashutamaho .
43006011	Yesu nikwo kukwata egyo migaati . Ku yaaherize kusiima , yaagigaburira abo bantu bashutami ; n'ebyenyanja nabyo yaabitwaza atyo , yaabigaburira boona nk'oku baabaire nibeetenga .
43006012	Ku baahaagire , yaagira abatendekwa be ati : Nimutooratoore oburagarika obwatsigaraho , hatagira akaaburaho .
43006013	Batyo baabutooratoora , baijuza ebitenga ikumi na bibiri oburagarika obwashaagire aha migaati etaano ya baare , ei baariire .
43006014	Abantu ku baareebire akamanyiso aku yaakora , baagira bati : Buzimazima ogu n'omurangi otuura ari ow'okwija omu nsi !
43006015	Yesu ku yaamanyire ngu nibenda kwija kumukwata n'amaani , bamuhindure omugabe , yaabanyomborokamu , yaagaruka omu rushozi wenka .
43006016	Omwabazyo ku gwahikire , abatendekwa be baashuuma aha nyanja ,
43006017	baaragara omu bwato nibambuka kuza Kafarinaumu . Obwo bukaba bwatandika kwira , kandi Yesu akaba atakabahikire .
43006018	Haabaho omuyaga mwingi , enyanja yaahinduriza .
43006019	Ku baabaire baagoyaho kilomita nka itaano nari mukaaga , baareeba Yesu naagyendera aha nyanja naizira obwato ; batyo baatiina .
43006020	Kwonka we yaabahuumuriza ati : Muhuumure ; niinye .
43006021	Batyo baayenda kumuta omu bwato kwonka ahonaaho bwahika aha nkungu ei baabaire nibaza .
43006022	Eizooba eryakuratsireho , ekimbuuro ky'abantu abaabaire batsigaire aha rundi rubaju rw'enyanja , baareeba ku hariho obwato bumwe bwonka , kandi Yesu akaba atatembire mu bwato hamwe n'abatendekwa be , kureka bakaba bagyenzire bonka .
43006023	Reero agandi maato , agarikuruga Tiberiya , gakaba gaahikire haihi n'omwanya ogu baariiriiremu emigaati , Mukama yaaheza kusiima .
43006024	Abantu , ku baareebire Yesu n'abatendekwa be batariho , baatemba ago maato , baayambuka , baaza Kafarinaumu nibasherura Yesu .
43006025	Ku baamushangire seeri y'enyanja , baamubuuza bati : Mwegyesa , kunu oizireyo ryari ?
43006026	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Timurikunsherura ahabw'okuba mureebire obumanyiso , kureka ahabw'okuba muriire emigaati , mwaiguta .
43006027	Mutarihendekyera ebyokurya ebirikuhwaho , kureka ebigumaho , bikabahitsya omu magara agatahwaho , nibyo byokurya ebi Omwana w'omuntu aribaha ; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga Taata akamutaho akamanyiso k'okumuhamya .
43006028	Mpaho baamubuuza bati : Tushemereire kugira tuta , tubone kukora emirimo ya Ruhanga ?
43006029	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Ogwo nigwo murimo gwa Ruhanga , imwe okwikiriza ogwo ou yaatumire .
43006030	Batyo bamugira bati : Mbwenu okaakora kamanyiso ki , aku twakureeba tukakwikiriza ? Okaakora kaahi ?
43006031	Baatataitwe bakarya emaanu omu ihamba ; nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu , akabaha ebyokurya ebyarugire omu iguru kubirya .
43006032	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Musa tiwe yaabahaire omugaati ogwarugire omu iguru ; kureka Tata niwe abaha omugaati gw'amazima oguruga omu iguru .
43006033	Manya omugaati gwa Ruhanga nigwo ogwo oguruga omu iguru , gukaha ensi amagara .
43006034	Nabo bamugira bati : Mukama waitu , guma otuhe ogwo mugaati .
43006035	Yesu abagira ati : Niinye mugaati ogw'amagara ; weena oija ahi ndi tarigira njara , na weena orikuunyikiriza tarigira iriho .
43006036	Nk'oku naaruga kubagambira , okundeeba mwandeebire , kwonka timurikwikiriza .
43006037	Boona abu Taata ampa , baija ahariinye ; kandi weena oija ahariinye , tindimubinga .
43006038	Ahabw'okuba tindarugire mu iguru kukora ebyangye ebi ndikweyendera , kureka okukora ebi owantumire arikwenda .
43006039	Eki owantumire arikwenda , n'okutabuza n'omwe omuri abo boona abu yankwatsize , kureka ngu mbazoore aha kiro ky'aha muheru .
43006040	Manya eki nikyo Tata ayenda , ngu weena oreeba Mwana akamwikiriza , atungye amagara agatahwaho ; kandi ndyamuzoora aha kiro ky'aha muheru .
43006041	Omuri ago magingo Abayudaaya baagambirana nibamwetomboitera ahabw'okugira ati : Niinye mugaati ogwarugire omu iguru .
43006042	Baagira bati : Buzimazima ogu ka ni Yesu , mwene Yosefu . Ka nitumanya ishe na nyina . Mbwenu naabaasa ata kugira ati : Nkaruga omu iguru ?
43006043	Yesu abagarukamu abagira ati : Murekyere aho kwetomboita .
43006044	Tihariho obaasa kwija ahariinye , atareetsirwe Taata owantumire ; kandi naanye ndyamuzoora aha kiro ky'aha mperu .
43006045	Manya kikahandiikwa omu by'abarangi , ngu : Boona baryayegyesibwa Ruhanga . Weena ohurira ebi Taata ayegyesa akabyega , aija ahi ndi .
43006046	Mutagira ngu hariho orareebire Taata , kureka ogwo oruga ahari Ruhanga , niwe yaareebire Taata .
43006047	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena oikiriza , atunga amagara agatahwaho .
43006048	Niinye mugaati gw'amagara .
43006049	Baashoimwe bakarya emaanu omu ihamba , kwonka baafa .
43006050	Ogu nigwo mugaati oguruga omu iguru , ngu weena oraagurye , arekye kufa .
43006051	Niinye mugaati ogw'amagara ogwarugire omu iguru ; weena orya ogwo mugaati , aryamereera ; kandi omugaati ogu ndiha ngu ab'omu nsi bagire amagara , nigwo mubiri wangye .
43006052	Abayudaaya nikwo kutandika kuhakana bonka na bonka bati : Omuntu ogu naabaasa ata kutuha omubiri gwe kugurya ?
