43006053	Yesu yaagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Ku murikuba mutariire mubiri gw'Omwana w'omuntu , mukanywa eshagama ye , timurikugira magara .
43006054	Orikurya omubiri gwangye , akanywa eshagama yangye , aine amagara agatahwaho , kandi ndyamuzoora aha kiro ky'aha muheru .
43006055	Manya omubiri gwangye n'ekyokurya buzima , kandi eshagama yangye n'ekyokunywa buzima .
43006056	Orikurya omubiri gwangye akanywa eshagama yangye aguma omuriinye , naanye nguma omuriwe .
43006057	Nka Taata ohuriire oku yantumire , kandi naanye oku ndi ohuriire ahabwa Taata , nikwo n'ondya ariba ohuriire ahabwangye .
43006058	Ogu nigwo mugaati oguruga omu iguru , ogutari nk'ogu baatataitwe baariire bakafa ; kwonka orikurya ogwo mugaati aryamereera .
43006059	Ebyo akabigambira omu iteeraniro ry'ekiyudaaya , naayegyeseza Kafarinaumu .
43006060	Baingi omu batendekwa be , ku baahuriire ekyo , baagira bati : Ekyo ka kigumire ; n'oha orikubaasa kukitega okutu ?
43006061	Yesu , ku amanya ngu abatendekwa be nibeetomboitera eki yaagamba , abagira ati : Ekyo kyabagwisa kubi ?
43006062	Mbwenu shi , kiryaba kita ku murireeba Omwana w'omuntu naatemba ei yaarugire ?
43006063	Manya Mutima niwe ahaisa amagara , omubiri tigwine mugasho ; ebi naabagambira ni Mutima kandi n'amagara .
43006064	Kwonka hariho bamwe omuriimwe abatarikwikiriza . Ahabw'okuba Yesu okwiha omu kutandika akamanya abatarikumwikiriza , kandi n'ogwo orimureebya .
43006065	Atyo agumizamu ati : Eki naabagambirira ntyo n'ahabw'okuba tihariho obaasa kwija ahariinye , Taata atamwikiriize .
43006066	Okwiha obwo baingi omu batendekwa be bamutsigaho , bareka kugyenda nawe .
43006067	Bwanyima Yesu yaagira eikumi na babiri ati : Ebyo naimwe nimwenda kwegyendera ?
43006068	Simooni Petero amugarukamu ati : Mukama waitu , hari itwe n'oha ou twakuzaho ? Ka niiwe oine ebigambo by'amagara agatahwaho .
43006069	Manya nitwikiriza kandi nitumanya ku ori Orikwera wa Ruhanga .
43006070	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Tiinye naabatooraine imwe , eikumi na babiri ? Kwonka omwe omuriimwe ni Sitaane !
43006071	Obwo akaba naarengyeza Yuda , mwene Simooni owa Kariota ; ahabw'okuba nobu araabe yaabaire ari omwe ahari ikumi na babiri , akaba naija kumureebya .
43007001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Yesu yaagyendagyenda naaraba omuri Galilaaya ; tiyaayenda kuraba muri Buyudaaya , ahabw'okuba Abayudaaya bakaba nibenda kumwita .
43007002	Obwo , obugyenyi bw'Abayudaaya obw'Ensiisira bukaba buri haihi kuhika .
43007003	Abarumuna baamugira bati : Ruga aha , oze Buyudaaya , abatendekwa baawe bareebe ebi orikukora .
43007004	Manya omuntu ku aba naayenda kumanywa , takora bwesherekye ; nk'oku orikukora ebi byona , okaarekire ensi yoona ebireeba .
43007005	Nangwa n'abarumuna tibaramwikiriize .
43007006	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Obunaku bwangye tibukahikire , kwonka obwanyu obutoosha butuura buriho .
43007007	Imwe ensi terikubaasa kubanga , kwonka nyowe neenyanga , ahabw'okuba ngihamiza ku ebi ekora biba bibi .
43007008	Imwe nimuze aha bugyenyi ; nyowe obwo bugyenyi tindikubuzaho , ahabw'okuba obunaku bwangye tibukahikire .
43007009	Ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , yaaguma Galilaaya .
43007010	Abarumuna ku baagiire aha bugyenyi , nawe yaazayo , butari butunu , kureka bwesherekye .
43007011	Ahari obwo bugyenyi , Abayudaaya baamurondesa abiri , nibagira bati : Ari nkahi ?
43007012	Abantu baamuhakanaho bonka na bonka ; abamwe bati : Ni murungi ; abandi bati : Ngaaha , naahabisa abantu .
43007013	Kwonka tihaagira owaamugambaho butunu , ahabw'okuba bakaba nibatiina Abayudaaya .
43007014	Obugyenyi ku bwabaire bwahika rwagati , Yesu yainamuka , yaaza omuri Nyaruju , yaayegyesa .
43007015	Abayudaaya baatangaara , nibagira bati : Ogu muntu ebi akabyega ata , haza atakeegyesibwaga ?
43007016	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Ebi ndikwegyesa ti byangye , kureka n'eby'Ogwo owantumire .
43007017	Weena orikwikiriza kukora eki Ruhanga arikwenda , naija kumanya yaaba ebi ndikwegyesa byarugire ahari Ruhanga , nari biri ebyangye ahabwangye .
43007018	Oyegyesa ebye ahabwe aba naayesherurira ekitiinwa ; kwonka osheerurira owaamutumire ekitiinwa , aba ow'amazima kandi otaine bugobya .
43007019	Owaabahaire eiteeka ti Musa ? Kwonka shi , tihariho n'omwe omuriimwe orikurikuratira . Ahabw'enki nimwenda kuunyita ?
43007020	Abantu baamugarukamu bati : Oriho Sitaane ! N'oha orikwenda kukwita ?
43007021	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Nkakora ekintu kimwe , mwena kyabatangaaza .
43007022	Musa akabateeraho omugyenzo gw'okusharwa ; tikwo kugira ngu niwe kwatandikiireho , kureka ahari baatataitwe - - naimwe nangwa obundi nimushara abantu ahari Sabato .
43007023	Mbwenu omuntu ku araabe naasharwa ahari Sabato , ngu eiteeka rya Musa ritakaahendwa , ahabw'enki nimungwerwa kubi ahabw'okukiza omubiri gw'omuntu gwona ahari Sabato ?
43007024	Murekye kucwa emanja nimureebera aha kyemerero , kureka muzicwe omu bwinganisa .
43007025	Ago magingo bamwe omu Banyayerusalemu bakabuuzana bati : Beitu ogu tiwe muntu ou barikusherura kwita ?
43007026	Mbwenu shi , k'ari aha , naagamba butunu , bataine ku baamugira ! Tugire ngu ab'obushoboorozi bamumanyire ku ari Kristo ?
43007027	Itwe ka nitumanya ei arikuruga ; kwonka Kristo ku ariija , tihariho n'omwe orimanya ei arikuruga .
43007028	Omu bunaku obwo Yesu , ku yaabaire naayegyesa omuri Nyaruju , yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Eego , nimummanya , kandi nimumanya ei naarugire . Tindaizire habwangye nyenka , kureka hariho owantumire , kandi n'ow'amazima . Kwonka imwe timurikumumanya .
43007029	Nyowe nimmumanya , ahabw'okuba niwe naarugireho , kandi niwe yantumire .
43007030	Obwo baayenda kumukwata ; kwonka tihaagira waamutaho engaro , ahabw'okuba obunaku bwe bukaba butakahikire .
43007031	Kwonka baingi omuri abo bantu baamwikiriza ; baagira bati : Kristo ku ariija , aryakora obumanyiso oburikukira obu ogu akozire ?
43007032	Abafarisaayo baahurira ebi ekimbuuro ky'abantu kirikumugambaho ; ekyarugiremu , abahongyerezi abakuru baakwatanisa nabo , baayohereza abarinzi ba Nyaruju kumukwata .
43007033	Yesu nikwo kugira ati : Nkiri hamwe naimwe okumara omwanya mukye , bwanyima ngarukye ahari Ogwo owantumire .
43007034	Muryansherura , kwonka timurimbona ; ahabw'okuba ei ndi , timurikubaasa kwijayo .
43007035	Abayudaaya nikwo kubuuzana bati : Beitu ei arikuza , ei tutaribaasa kumubona ni nkahi ? Naaza eihanga omu Bayudaaya abataataaniire omu Banyamahanga , ngu abe nibo yaayegyesa ?
43007036	Mbwenu naamanyisa ki , okugira ati : Muryansherura , kwonka timurimbona ; kandi ati : Ei ndi , timurikubaasa kwijayo ?
43007037	Aha izooba ry'aha muheru , ery'obwo bugyenyi erikuru munonga , Yesu akeemerera , yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Weena oine eiriho , aije ahariinye anywe .
43007038	Weena orikuunyikiriza , emigyera y'amaizi g'amagara eryahimintika neeruga omunda ye , nk'oku Ebyahandiikirwe birikugira .
43007039	Ekyo akakigamba ahari Mutima , ou abaamwikiriize baabaire nibaza kuheebwa . Manya Mutima akaba atakahairwe , ahabw'okuba Yesu akaba atakahimbisiibwe .
43007040	Bamwe omuri bo , ku baabihuriire , baagira bati : Buzimazima ogu niwe murangi ori .
43007041	Abandi bati : Ni Kristo . Kwonka abandi bati : Kristo naabaasa kuruga omuri Galilaaya ?
43007042	Ebyahandiikirwe tibyo birikugira , ngu Kristo n'ow'okukomooka ahari Daudi , akaruga omu rurembo rwa Beetelehemu , ei Daudi yaabaire atuura ?
43007043	Abantu baayebaganisamu batyo ahabwe .
43007044	Abamwe baayenda kumukwata ; kwonka tihariho n'omwe owaamutaireho engaro .
43007045	Abo barinzi ba Nyaruju baagaruka aha bahongyerezi abakuru n'Abafarisaayo ; banu baabagira bati : Ahabw'enki mutaamureeta ?
43007046	Nabo baagarukamu bati : Tihakabahoga muntu oragambire nkawe !
43007047	Abafarisaayo nikwo kubagarukamu bati : Naimwe mwahabisibwa mutyo ?
43007048	Hariho n'omwe omu b'obushoboorozi , nari omu Bafarisaayo oramwikiriize ?
43007049	Ekyo kimbuuro ky'abantu abateeta ha by'eiteeka , n'ekyata !
43007050	Omwe omuribo , Nikodemo , owaizire ahari Yesu bwabiso , yaabagira ati :
43007051	Ebyo , eiteeka ryaitu niritwikiriza kucwera omuntu orubanja atakeetonganiire , tukamanya eki akozire ?
43007052	Nabo nikwo kumukiniika bati : Hari naiwe ori Omunyagalilaaya ? Sherura , oreebe ku hatariho murangi oruga Galilaaya .
43007053	Batyo baagyenda , buri muntu yaataaha owaabo .
43008001	Kwonka Yesu yaatemba Orushozi rw'Emioliva .
43008002	Ku bwabaire nibutaagurukana , yaagaruka omuri Nyaruju ; abantu boona baamwijaho , yaashutama , yaabeegyesa .
43008003	Reero abahangu b'eiteeka n'Abafarisaayo baareeta omukazi ou baakwata naashambana ; baamwemereza aho omu maisho g'abantu ,
43008004	baagira Yesu bati : Mwegyesa , omukazi ogu yaakwatwa naashambana .
43008005	Kandi omu iteeka , Musa akaturagiira omuntu nk'ogwo kumuteera amabaare . Mbwenu iwe noomugambaho ki ?
43008006	Ekyo bakakimubuuza nibamutega , ngu babone eki baraamutabaarize . Kwonka Yesu yainama , yaatandika kuhandiika aha itaka n'orukumu .
43008007	Ku baagumiizemu nibamubuuza , yaajuumuuka , yaabagira ati : Omuriimwe ku haraabe hariho otakashiishaga , abe niwe yaabanza kumuteera eibaare .
43008008	Atyo agaruka ainama , agumizamu naahandiika aha itaka .
43008009	Ku baahuriire ekyo , baanyombororoka omwe omwe , nihabanza abakuru , okuhitsya obu Yesu yaatsigaireho wenka n'ogwo mukazi ayemereire aho .
43008010	Yesu yaajuumuuka , yaamugira ati : Mukazi ' we , bari nkahi ? Tihariho n'omwe owaakusingisa orubanja ?
43008011	Omukazi amugarukamu ati : Tariho , Mukama wangye . Yesu amugira ati : Naanye tindikukusingisa rubanja ; irooko , otarigarukira kushiisha obundi .
43008012	Yesu yaagaruka yaabagira ati : Niinye mushana gw'ensi ; weena onkuratira , tarigyendera mu mwirima , kureka aryagira omushana gw'amagara .
43008013	Ku yaagambire ekyo , Abafarisaayo baamugira bati : Nooyehamya wenka ; okwehamya kwawe ti kw'amazima .
43008014	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Nobu ndaabe niinyehamya , okwehamya kwangye n'okw'amazima ; ahabw'okuba nimmanya ei naarugire n'ei ndikuza . Haza imwe timurikumanya i naarugire , nari ei ndikuza .
43008015	Imwe mucwa emanja nk'abatu nyabuntu , kwonka nyowe tingira u nducwera .
43008016	Nangwa nobu naakurucwa , okucwa kwangye n'okw'amazima , ahabw'okuba tindi nyenka , kureka ndi hamwe na Taata owantumire .
43008017	Omu iteeka ryanyu kikahandiikwa , ngu obwamushinja bw'abantu babiri buba obw'amazima .
43008018	Nyowe niinyehamya , kandi Taata owantumire nawe nampamya .
43008019	Batyo bamubuuza bati : Beitu shoimwe ari nkahi ? Yesu abagarukamu ati : Timurikummanya , nangwa na Tata timurikumumanya . Kuri nimummanya , na Tata mukaamumanyire .
43008020	Ebyo akabigambira aha ibiikiro naayegyeseza omuri Nyaruju . Tihaabaho n'omwe owaamukwata , ahabw'okuba obunaku bwe bukaba butakahikire .
43008021	Yesu yaagaruka yaabagira ati : Niinyija kugyenda , haza muryansherura , kwonka muryafeera omu kibi kyanyu ; ahabw'okuba ei ndikuza timurikubaasa kwijayo .
43008022	Abayudaaya nikwo kugambirana bati : Beitu naayenda kweita ? Nikyo arikugirira ati : Ei ndikuza , timurikubaasa kwijayo ?
43008023	Yesu abagira ati : Imwe owaanyu n'omu nsi , nyowe ndi ow'omu iguru ; imwe muri ab'ensi egi , kwonka nyowe tindi waayo .
43008024	Nikyo naabagambirira nti : Muryafeera omu bibi byanyu . Buzimazima ku muraabe mutarikuunyikiriza ku ndi we , muryafeera omu bibi byanyu .
43008025	Nabo nikwo kumubuuza bati : Beitu ori oha ? Yesu abagarukamu ati : Nk'oku naabagambiire okuruga ira .
43008026	Nyine bingi eby'okubagambaho n'okubasingisa orubanja ; kwonka owantumire n'ow'amazima , kandi ebi yaanyengyeise , nibyo ndikurangirira ensi yoona .
43008027	Kwonka bo tibaamanya ku arikugamba ahari Ruhanga Taata .
43008028	Yesu nikwo kubagira ati : Ku muriheza kuhanika Omwana w'omuntu , nibwo murimanya ku ndi Ogwo , kandi ku ntarikukora byangye habwangye , kureka ebi Taata yaanyegyeise nibyo ndangirira .
43008029	Owantumire ari hamwe naanye ; kandi takantisigahoga nyenka , ahabw'okuba obutoosha nkora ebi akunda .
43008030	Ku yaabaire naakigamba ebyo , baingi baamwikiriza .
43008031	Yesu akagambira Abayudaaya abaamwikiriize ati : Ku murihamira aha kigambo kyangye , nibwo muribeera kimwe abatendekwa bangye ,
43008032	mukamanya amazima , haza amazima gakabahindura ab'obusingye .
43008033	Baamugarukamu bati : Itwe turi baijukuru ba Aburahamu , titukabaga bahuuku b'omuntu weena . Mbwenu ekyo noomanyisa ki , okugira oti : Muryaba ab'obusingye ?
43008034	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena akora ekibi aba omuhuuku waakyo .
43008035	Manya omuhuuku taguma muka ebiro byona , kureka omwana niwe agigumamu ebiro byona .
43008036	N'ahabw'ekyo Mwana ku aribahindura ab'obusingye , buzimazima muryaba ab'obusingye .
43008037	Nimmanya ku muri baijukuru ba Aburahamu ; haza kunu nimwenda kuunyita , ahabw'okuba tiinyine ki ndikubagambira ngu kyabataaha .
43008038	Nyowe ngamba ebi naareebire ahari Tata , naimwe mukora ebi mwayegire ahari shoimwe .
43008039	Baamugarukamu bati : Tataitwe ni Aburahamu . Yesu nawe abagira ati : Kuri muri abaana ba Aburahamu , mukaatwarize nka Aburahamu ;
43008040	kwonka mbwenu nimwenda kuunyita , nyowe orikubagambira eby'amazima , ebi naahuriire ahari Ruhanga ; haza kunu ekyo Aburahamu atarakikozire .
43008041	Manya ebi murikukora nibyo shoimwe yaakozire . Baagumizamu bati : Itwe tituri bizaarwa ; twine Tataitwe omwe , Ruhanga .
43008042	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Kuri noogira ngu Ruhanga niwe Shoimwe , mukankunzire , ahabw'okuba nyowe nkaija ninduga ahari Ruhanga ; kutari kugira ngu nkaija ahabw'okwekundira , kureka niwe yantumire .
43008043	Ahabw'enki ebi ndikugamba mutarikubyetegyereza ? N'ahabw'okuba nimuremwa kwemera kuhurira ekigambo kyangye .
43008044	Manya muri aba shoimwe Sitaane , nikyo mwendera kukora ebi shoimwe akunda . Okuruga iranaira atuura ari omwitsi , amazima tigagira ki gamukwatiire , ahabw'okuba omuriwe tihabamu mazima . Ku abeiha , aba naagamba nk'oku ari , ahabw'okuba aba embeihi kandi ishe w'ebishuba .
43008045	Kwonka nyowe ngamba amazima , nikyo mutarikuunyikiririza .
43008046	N'oha omuriimwe owaakuunyomesereza ekibi ? Mbwenu ku ndaabe ngamba eby'amazima , ahabw'enki mutaanyikiriza .
43008047	Manya owa Ruhanga ahurira ebigambo bya Ruhanga ; imwe eki mutabihuririra n'ahabw'okuba timuri baana ba Ruhanga .
43008048	Abayudaaya baamugarukamu bati : Tituhikire okugira ngu ori Omunyasamariya , kandi oriho ekyago ?
43008049	Yesu yaagarukamu ati : Ngaaha , tindiho kyago ; kureka nimpa Tata ekitiinwa , kwonka imwe nimungaya .
43008050	Manya tiinyesherurira kitiinwa ; hariho orikukinsherurira kandi niwe araaramure .
43008051	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena oyorobera ekigambo kyangye , tariroza ha kufa ebiro byona .
43008052	Abayudaaya baamugira bati : Hati nu twamanya ku oriho ekyago . Aburahamu akafa , n'abarangi baafa ; mbwenu noogira oti : Weena orikworobera ekigambo kyangye , tarihikwaho kufa ebiro byona .
43008053	Iwe nookira tataitwe Aburahamu owaafiire ? Abarangi shi ka baafiire ! Iwe noogira ngu ori oha ?
43008054	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Ku ndaabe niinyesherurira ekitiinwa , biri ekitiinwa kyangye ti kantu ; nyowe ekitiinwa kyangye nkiheebwa Tata , ou mugira ngu ni Ruhanga waanyu .
43008055	Timurikumumanya , kwonka nyowe nimmumanya ; kandi ku naakugira nti tindikumumanya , nkaaba omunyakishuba nkaimwe ; kwonka nyowe nimmumanya , kandi nyorobera ekigambo kye .
43008056	Shoimwe Aburahamu akashemererwa kureeba ekiro kyangye ; akakireeba kandi yaananuka .
43008057	Abayudaaya nikwo kumugira bati : Tokahikize myaka makumi ataano , haza oti , nkareeba Aburahamu !
43008058	Yesu yaabagira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Aburahamu atakabaireho , obwo nyowe ndiho .
43008059	Obwo baatorotoora amabaare kugamuteera ; kwonka Yesu ayeshereka , aruga omuri Nyaruju .
43009001	Yesu ku yaabaire naahingura , yaareeba omushaija owaazairwe ari empumi .
43009002	Abatendekwa be baamubuuza bati : Mwegyesa , ogu mushaija yaaza kuzaarwa ari empumi , owaasiisire n'oha , niwe nari n'abazaire be ?
43009003	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Tiwe yaasiisire , nobu baakuba abazaire be ; akazaarwa ari empumi , ngu ebi Ruhanga arikukora bibone kworekyerwa omuriwe .
43009004	Tushemereire kukora emirimo y'owantumire bukiri nyomushana ; reeba bwaza kwira , hatariho orikubaasa kukora .
43009005	Obu nkiri omu nsi , ndi omushana gwayo .
43009006	Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo , yaacwera aha itaka , yaaritobesa amacwante , yaarisiiga egyo mpumi omu maisho ,
43009007	yaagigira ati : Irooko , onaabe omu kiziba kya Siloamu , amakuru gaakyo ngu , otumirwe . Onu atyo agyenda , anaaba , agaruka naahweza .
43009008	Bataahi be n'abandi bantu abaabaire bamureeba naasheega , baagira bati : Beitu ogu t'ori mushaija owaabaire ashutama akasheega ?
43009009	Abamwe bati : Eego , niwe ; abandi bati : Ngaaha , kwonka naamushusha . Ogwo mushaija , ati : Manya niinye .
43009010	Nabo nikwo kumubuuza bati : Mbwenu shi , amaisho gaawe gahumuukire gata ?
43009011	Abagarukamu ati : Omushaija orikwetwa Yesu yaatoba eitaka , yaarinsiiga omu maisho , yangira ati : Irooko , onaabire omuri Siloamu ; ntyo ngyenda , nnaaba , mpweza .
43009012	Batyo bamubuuza bati : Ari nkahi ? Abagarukamu ati : Tindikumanya .
43009013	Mpaho ogwo mushaija owaabaire ari empumi , bamutwarira Abafarisaayo .
43009014	Obu Yesu yaatoba eitaka , akahumuura ogwo mushaija , ekaba eri Sabato .
43009015	Abafarisaayo nabo nikwo kumubuuza oku yaahumuuka . Nawe abagarukamu ati : Yansiiga eitaka omu maisho , naanaaba , mbwenu nimpweza .
43009016	Bamwe omu Bafarisaayo nikwo kugira bati : Ogwo muntu tatumirwe Ruhanga , ahabw'okuba tarikurinda Sabato . Abandi bati : Mbwenu omusiisi naabaasa ata kukora obumanyiso oburikwingana butyo ? Haabaho okutaikirizana .
43009017	Reero baagaruka baamubuuza bati : Ku oraabe noogira ngu niwe yaakuhumuura , mbwenu iwe noomugambaho ki ? Ogwo mushaija abagarukamu ati : N'omurangi .
43009018	Kwonka Abayudaaya tibaikiriza ngu ogwo mushaija abaire ari empumi , yaahumuuka , okuhitsya obu baayetsire abazaire be ,
43009019	bakababuuza bati : Buzimazima ogu ni mutabani waanyu , ou murikugira ngu akazaarwa ahumire ? Mbwenu shi , yaahumuuka ata ?
43009020	Abazaire be babagarukamu bati : Nitumanya ku ari mutabani waitu , kandi akazaarwa ari empumi ;
43009021	kwonka oku yaahumuuka , titurikukumanya , n'owaamuhumuura titurikumumanya . Nimumwebuurize ; ni mukuru , ayegambire .
43009022	Ekyagambiise kityo abazaire be n'okutiina Abayudaaya ; ahabw'okuba bakaba bamaririire kubinga omu iteeraniro weena oraagambe ku Yesu ari Kristo .
43009023	Ekyo nikyo kyagambiise abazaire be bati : Ni mukuru ; mumwebuurize .
43009024	Abayudaaya nikwo kugaruka kutuma kweta ogwo mushaija , bakamugira bati : Himbisa Ruhanga ! Itwe nitumanya ku ogwo mushaija ari omusiisi .
43009025	Onu abagarukamu ati : Nyowe tindikumanya yaaba ari omusiisi ; kureka kimwe kyonka eki ndikumanya , nikyo eki : mbaire ndi empumi , mbwenu nimpweza .
43009026	Bamubuuza bati : Yaakugira ata ? Amaisho gaawe yaagahumuura ata ?
43009027	Abagarukamu ati : Naaheza kubagambira , kwonka timwayenda kumpurira . Mbwenu nimwendera ki kugaruka kubihurira ? Naimwe nimwenda kuhinduka abatendekwa be ?
43009028	Batyo bamujuma nibagira bati : Niiwe ori omutendekwa we , itwe turi aba Musa .
43009029	Nitumanya Ruhanga ku yaagambire na Musa , kwonka titurikumanya i ogwo mushaija arikuruga .
43009030	Ogwo mushaija abagarukamu ati : Ka n'eky'okutangaaza okureeba mutarikumanya i arikuruga , haza kunu yampumuura amaisho !
43009031	Nitumanya ku Ruhanga atahurira basiisi , kureka omuntu weena omutiina akakora ebi akunda , niwe ahurira .
43009032	Ensi yaaba kuhangwa tikikahurirwaga , ngu harabaireho orahumwire omuntu owaazairwe ari empumi .
43009033	Ogwo muntu kuri atararugire hari Ruhanga , taine ki yaakubaasize kukora .
43009034	Nabo bamugarukamu bati : Nooyenda kutwegyesa , haza waazaariirwe omu kibi , okakikuriramu ? Batyo bamubinga .
43009035	Yesu ahurira ku baamubinga . Ku amubona amubuuza ati : Noikiriza Omwana w'omuntu ?
43009036	Onu amugarukamu ati : Mukama wangye , mungambire , n'oha , nkamwikiriza ?
43009037	Yesu amugira ati : Manya waaba waamureebire , kandi niwe arikugamba naiwe .
43009038	Onu ati : Mukama , niinyikiriza ; atyo amuramya .
43009039	Yesu nikwo kugira ati : Ekyandeetsire omu nsi n'okucwa emanja , ngu abatarikureeba bareebe , n'abarikureeba babe empumi .
43009040	Bamwe aha Bafarisaayo abaabaire bariho , ku bakihurira , bamugira bati : Ebyo naitwe turi empumi ?
43009041	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Kuri muri empumi , timwakugizire kibi ; kwonka imwe ahabw'okugira ngu nimureeba , nikyo ekibi kyanyu kirikugumiraho .
43010001	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena otaaha omu itsibikiro ry'entaama atareetsirwe irembo , kureka areetsirwe ahandi , biri n'omushuma kandi omunyagi .
43010002	Omuriisa w'entaama we areetwa eirembo ;
43010003	Omukumiirizi amwigurira ; entaama zihurira eiraka rye , kandi eze buri emwe agyeeta eiziina , atyo azishohoza .
43010004	Ku aheza kushohoza eze zoona , azeebembera , nazo zimukurata , ahabw'okuba nizimanya eiraka rye .
43010005	Ou zitarikumanya tizimukurata , kureka zimuhunga , ahabw'okuba tizirikumanya iraka ry'ab'ahandi .
43010006	Yesu akabacwera egyo nfumu , kwonka bo tibaashoboorokyerwa bi arikubagambira .
43010007	Yesu nikwo kwongyera kubagambira ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Niinye irembo ry'entaama .
43010008	Abandi boona abambandiize bakaba bari abashuma kandi abanyagi , n'entaama tizirabeetaireho .
43010009	Niinye irembo ; weena otaahamu naaraba omuriinye , ajunwa ; ataahamu , ashohora , kandi abona eiriisizo .
43010010	Omushuma tareetwa kindi , kureka okwiba n'okwita n'okucwekyereza ; nyowe nkaija ngu zitungye amagara , kandi zigire maingi munonga .
43010011	Niinye muriisa omurungi . Omuriisa omurungi ahayo amagara ge ahabw'entaama ze .
43010012	Omushumba oguririirwe , otari muriisa nari mukama waazo , ku areeba ati omushega gwaija , atsigaho entaama , ahunga ; omushega guzishahura kandi guziraza .
43010013	Ekyo akikora ahabw'okuba n'omushumba , kandi entaama tazeetaho .
43010014	Nyowe ndi omuriisa omurungi , mmanya ezangye , n'ezangye zimmanya .
43010015	Nk'oku Taata ammanya , naanye mmanya Taata ; kandi mpayo amagara gangye ahabw'entaama zangye .
43010016	Kwonka nyine ezindi ntaama , ezitari z'omu itsibikiro eri ; nazo ndi ow'okuzireeta , zihurire eiraka ryangye , haza zoona ziryaba obusyo bumwe , obwine omuriisa omwe .
43010017	Eki Taata ankundira , n'ahabw'okuba mpayo amagara gangye ngu mbone kugagarukana .
43010018	Tihariho orikubaasa kugaanyaka , niinye ngeeheerayo ; kandi nk'oku nyine obushoboorozi bw'okugahayo , nikwo nyine n'obushoboorozi bw'okugagarukana ; haza ekyo kiragiro nkakiheebwa Tata .
43010019	Ebyo bigambo bikareetera Abayudaaya kutaikirizana .
43010020	Baingi baagira bati : Ariho ekyago kandi ashazire ; mbwenu nimweruhiza ki kumuhurira ?
43010021	Abandi bati : Ebigambo nk'ebyo ti by'omuntu okwatsirwe ekyago . Mbwenu ekyago kikaabasize kuhumuura amaisho g'empumi ?
43010022	Omu bunaku obwo omuri Yerusalemu hakabaho Obugyenyi bw'Okwijuka Okwezibwa kwa Nyaruju ; bikaba biri ebiro by'embeho ;
43010023	Yesu yaagyendagyenda omuri Nyaruju omu kisasi kya Solomooni .
43010024	Abayudaaya baamwehinguririza , baamugira bati : Oryaherera hi kutugumya omu kangakaizi ? Ku oraabe niiwe Kristo , otugambire butunu .
43010025	Yesu nikwo kubagarukamu ati : Naaheza kubagambira , kwonka timurikwikiriza . Ebi ndikukora omu iziina rya Tata , nibyo birikumpamya ;
43010026	kwonka imwe timurikwikiriza , ahabw'okuba timuri ntaama zangye .
43010027	Entaama zangye zihurira eiraka ryangye , nzimanya kandi zinkuratira ;
43010028	nziha amagara agatahwaho , tiziribura n'akakye , kandi tihariho n'omwe orizinsikura .
43010029	Tata owaazimpaire naakira boona , kandi tihariho n'omwe orikubaasa kuzimusikura .
43010030	Taata naanye turi omwe .
43010031	Abayudaaya batyo baihayo amabaare kugamuteera .
43010032	Yesu nawe nikwo kubagira ati : Nkabooreka ebirungi bingi ebirikuruga ahari Taata , mwabireeba . Mbwenu ahari ebyo , eki murikwendera kunteera amabaare , ni kiiha ?
43010033	Abayudaaya bamugarukamu bati : Eki turikwendera kukuteera amabaare , ti habw'okukora ebirungi , kureka n'ahabw'okurogota ; ori omuntu nyabuntu , haza nooyegira Ruhanga .
43010034	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Tikirahandiikirwe omu iteeka ryanyu , kiti : Nkagira nti : Muri baaruhanga ?
43010035	Abo abaiziirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga , ku araabe yaabeetsire baaruhanga kandi ekyahandiikirwe kitarikubaasa kwihwaho ,
43010036	haza imwe mugira ou Taata yaayerize , akamutuma omu nsi , muti : Waarogota , ngu ahabw'okuba naagira ati : Ndi Omwana wa Ruhanga ?
43010037	Ku ndaabe ntarikukora mirimo ya Tata , murekye kuunyikiriza .
43010038	Kwonka ku ndaabe ningikora , nangwa nobu muraabe mutarikuunyikiriza , haakiri mwikirize ebi ndikukora ; haza obwo nibwo muraamanye mukashoboorokyerwa ku Taata ari omuriinye , naanye ku ndi omuriwe .
43010039	Abantu bagaruka bateeraho kumukwata , kwonka abooga omu mikono .
43010040	Atyo Yesu yaagaruka obuseeri bwa Yorudaani , ei Yohaana yaabaire abatiriza , yaagumayo .
43010041	Abantu baingi baija ahu ari ; baagira bati : Yohaana tarakozire kamanyiso , kwonka ebi yaagambire ahari ogu mushaija n'eby'amazima ;
43010042	batyo baingi omuribo baamwikiriza .
43011001	Mbwenu hakaba hariho omushaija orwaire , orikwetwa Lazaaro owa Beetaniya , ekyaro eki Mariya na mukuru we Marita baabaire batwiremu .
43011002	Mariya ogwo , munyaanya Lazaaro owaarwaire , niwe ori owaasiigire Mukama amajuta g'omugaju , akashushuza ebigyere bye eishokye rye .
43011003	Banyaanya b'ogwo murwaire nikwo kutuma ahari Yesu , bati : Mukama , ou okunda arwaire .
43011004	Yesu ku akihurira , agira ati : Endwara egi ti y'okumwita , kureka n'ey'okuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinwa n'okuhimbisisa Omwana wa Ruhanga .
43011005	Yesu nobu araabe yaabaire akunda Marita n'omurumuna na Lazaaro ,
43011006	kwonka ku yaahuriire ngu Lazaaro arwaire , yaamara ahi yaabaire ari ebindi biro bibiri ;
43011007	bwanyima yaagira abatendekwa be ati : Ka tugarukye Buyudaaya .
43011008	Abatendekwa be baamugira bati : Mwegyesa , Abayudaaya ka nibwo babaire nibenda kukuteera amabaare , mbwenu nooyenda kugarukayo ?
43011009	Yesu abagarukamu ati : Nyomushana tegira shaaha ikumi na ibiri ? Manya omuntu ku agyenda nyomushana tateera ntsibo , ahabw'okuba aba naahwezesibwa omushana gw'ensi egi .
43011010	Kwonka ku agyenda nyekiro entsibo emuteera , ahabw'okuba aba ataine mushana gw'okumuhwezesa .
43011011	Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo , yaayongyera yaagira ati : Munywani waitu Lazaaro agwejegyeire , kwonka ninza kumusisiimura .
43011012	Abatendekwa be baamugira bati : Mukama , ku araabe agwejegyeire , naija kuba gye .
43011013	Yesu we akaba naagamba aha kufa kwa Lazaaro , kwonka bo baateekateeka ngu naagamba aha kugwejegyera okw'obutoosha .
43011014	Yesu nikwo kubagambira naabeeruurira , ati : Lazaaro afiire ;
43011015	kwonka ahabwanyu ninshemererwa ahabw'okushangwa ntariyo , ngu mukaabona kwikiriza . Mbwenu ka tuze ei ari .
43011016	Mpaho Tomasi , orikwetwa Mpasha , agira abandi batendekwa ati : Naitwe ka tugyende , tufe hamwe nawe .
43011017	Yesu ku ahikayo , ashanga Lazaaro amazire ebiro bina omu kituuro .
43011018	Beetaniya ni kilomita nka ishatu okuruga Yerusalemu ,
43011019	kandi Abayudaaya baingi bakaba baizire kuyaagira Marita na Mariya ahabwa munyaanyabo .
43011020	Marita , ku yaahuriire Yesu naija , yaaza kumubugana ; Mariya we yaaguma omu nju ashutami .
43011021	Marita yaagira Yesu ati : Mukama wangye , kuri obaire ori aha , munyaanyazi takufiire ;
43011022	kwonka nimmanya ngu na hati kyona eki oraashabe Ruhanga , naija kukikuha .
43011023	Yesu amugira ati : Munyaanyako naija kuzooka .
43011024	Marita ati : nimmanya ku arizooka aha kuzooka kw'aha kiro ky'aha muheru .
43011025	Yesu ati : Niinye kuzooka , niinye magara ; onyikiriza , nobu yaakufa , aryaguma ahuriire ;
43011026	kandi weena ohuriire orikuunyikiriza , tarifa . Ekyo nookiikiriza ?
43011027	Onu ati : Eego , Mukama wangye , niinyikiriza ku ori Kristo , Omwana wa Ruhanga , otuura ari ow'okwija omu nsi .
43011028	Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo , yaagyenda , yaayeta omurumuna Mariya , yaamugambira mpora omu kutu ati : Omwegyesa ari aha , naakweta .
43011029	Mariya ku akihurira , abandaituka , aza ei ari .
43011030	Obwo Yesu akaba atakahikire mu kyaro , akiri ahi Marita yaamushangire .
43011031	Abayudaaya abaabaire bari omu nju nibayaagira Mariya , ku baareebire yaabandatuka , yaashohora , baamukuratira nibateekateeka ngu naaza aha kituuro kucuriraho .
43011032	Mariya ku yaahikire ahi Yesu yaabaire ari , yaamureeba , yaamugwa omu maguru , yaamugira ati : Mukama wangye , kuri obaire ori aha , munyaanyazi takufiire .
43011033	Yesu ku areeba Mariya naacura , n'Abayudaaya abamukuratiire nabo nibacura , nawe agira obujune omu mutima aganya ,
43011034	ababuuza ati , Mumutaire hi ? Bamugira bati : Mukama waitu , ija ohareebe .
43011035	Mpaho Yesu arira .
43011036	Abayudaaya nikwo kugira bati : Ebishi , abaire naamukunda !
43011037	Abandi bati : Ogu muntu owaahumwire empumi , takaabaasize kuzibira ogu muntu kufa ?
43011038	Yesu agaruka agira obujune , atyo ahika aha kituuro ekyabaire kiri enyanga , ekingisiibwe eibaare .
43011039	Yesu agira ati : Nimwiheho eibaare . Marita , munyaanya wa nyakufa , amugira ati : Mukama wangye , manya yaanuukire , hati n'ekiro kya kana .
43011040	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Tinaakugira nti : Ku oraikirize , noija kureeba ekitiinwa kya Ruhanga ?
43011041	Batyo baihaho eibaare . Reero Yesu aimutsya amaisho , areeba ahaiguru , agira ati : Taata , ninkusiima ahabw'okuhurira okushaba kwangye .
43011042	Nimmanya ku obutoosha ompurira . Mbwenu eki naakigamba ahabw'aba abaanyehinguririize , babone kwikiriza ku niiwe wantumire .
43011043	Ku aheza kugamba ekyo , amweta n'eiraka rihango ati : Lazaaro , shohora !
43011044	Nyakufa ogwo ashohora , azingazingirwe omu myenda emikono n'amaguru , ahamaisho hashembirwe n'omutanda . Yesu abagira ati : Mumukomoorore , mumurekye agyende .
43011045	Abayudaaya baingi abaizire na Mariya , ku baareebire eki Yesu yaakora , baamwikiriza .
43011046	Kwonka bamwe omuribo baagyenda , baagambira Abafarisaayo eki Yesu yaakora .
43011047	Abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'Abafarissayo nikwo kuteerana eishengyero , bakagira bati : Mbwenu itwe tukore ki ? Manya ogu mushaija naakora obumanyiso bwingi .
43011048	Ku turaamurekye yaagumizamu atyo , abantu boona nibaija kumwikiriza , haza Abarooma baije bacwekyereze omwanya gwaitu ogurikwera hamwe n'eihanga ryaitu .
43011049	Omwe aharibo , Kayaafa , owaabaire ari omuhongyerezi omukuru omu mwaka ogwo , yaabagira ati : Manya timwine ki murikumanya .
43011050	Timukeetegyereize ku kihikire omuntu omwe kufeera abantu boona , okukira eihanga ryona okuhwerekyerera .
43011051	Ekyo tarakigambire habwe wenka , kureka ahabw'okuba omuhongyerezi omukuru omu mwaka ogwo , akakiragura ku Yesu yaabaire ari ow'okufeera eihanga ryona ;
43011052	nangwa ritari ryo ryonka , kureka n'okurundaana hamwe abaana ba Ruhanga abaataataaniire omu mahanga .
43011053	Okwiha obwo baamariirira kumwita .
43011054	Yesu nawe nikwo kurereerera aho kugyenda butunu omu Bayudaaya ; akaruga omu kyanga ekyo , akaza omu kirorero ekirikwetwa Efuraimu , omu nsi erikwatana n'eihamba ; akagumayo n'abatendekwa be .
43011055	Ekiro ky'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho kw'Abayudaaya ku kyabaire kiri haihi kuhika , abantu baingi baaruga omu byaro bainamuka Yerusalemu kweyeza , obwo Bugyenyi butakahikire .
43011056	Baaguma nibasheruza Yesu abiri , nibabuuzana beemereire omuri Nyaruju , bati : Mbwenu nimuteekateeka muta ? Buzima kwo tarikwija ahari obu Bugyenyi ?
43011057	Obwo abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'Abafarisaayo bakaba baaragiire , ngu weena oraamanye ahu ari , abamanyise , babone kumukwata .
43012001	Ku haabaire hatsigaire ebiro mukaaga Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho kuhika , Yesu yaaza Beetaniya , ei Lazaaro , ou yaazoire omu bafiire yaabaire atuura .
43012002	Okwo baamuteekyerayo kyakiro ; Marita yaabaheereza , na Lazaaro akaba ari omu baabaire bari aha meeza na Yesu .
43012003	Mariya yaareeta kiloguramu y'amajuta g'obuguzi bwingi , gooteize omugaju gw'obunyanunga , yaagasiiga ebigyere bya Yesu , yaabishushuza eishokye rye ; enju yaataamirana omugaju gw'ago majuta .
43012004	Yuda owa Kariota , omwe aha batendekwa be , owaabaire ari ow'okumureebya , nikwo kugira ati :
43012005	Ahabw'enki amajuta g'omugaju aga gataatundwamu shilingi magana ashatu , haza zikagabirwa abooro ?
43012006	Ekyo tarakigambire habw'okusaasibwa abooro , kureka akakigamba ahabw'okuba akaba ari omushuma , kandi niwe yaabaire ahagatira enshaho y'empiiha za boona ; kwonka ebi baatamu abyekyenuuza .
43012007	Mpaho Yesu abagira ati : Mumurekye , aga majuta g'omugaju aganziikise .
43012008	Ahabw'okuba imwe obutoosha abooro mutuura nabo , kwonka nyowe timurituura naanye obutoosha .
43012009	Abayudaaya baingi ku baahuriire ngu ariyo , baija , ti habwa Yesu wenka , kureka n'ahabw'okureeba Lazaaro , ou yaabaire azoire omu bafiire .
43012010	Bwanyima abahongyerezi abakuru baamaramaza kwita na Lazaaro ,
43012011	ahabw'okuba ahabwe Abayudaaya baingi bakabarugaho , baikiriza Yesu .
43012012	Eizooba eryakuratsireho , ekimbuuro ky'abantu abaabaire baizire aha Bugyenyi , ku baahuriire Yesu naija Yerusalemu ,
43012013	baakwata amataagi g'enkindo , baaza kumutangirira , nibateera akaari bati , Hosaana ! Omugabe wa Isiraeli orikwija omu iziina rya Nyakubaho , ahimbisibwe !
43012014	Atyo Yesu areeba omwana gw'endogoya agutemba , nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu
43012015	Iwe rurembo Siyooni , otatiina ; reeba , Mukama waawe naija , atembire omwana gw'endogoya .
43012016	Omu kubanza , abatendekwa be ekyo tibarakishoboorokyeirwe ; kwonka bwanyima , Yesu ku yaaherize kuheebwa ekitiinwa , baijuka ku ekyo niwe kyahandiikirweho , kandi ku kyamukoreirwe .
43012017	Reero boona abaabaire bari hamwe nawe obu yaayeeta Lazaaro kuruga omu kituuro , akamuzoora omu bafiire , bakahamiza abandi ku baakireebire .
43012018	Ekyo kyareetera abantu baingi kwija kumubugana , ahabw'okuba bakahurira ku akozire ako kamanyiso .
43012019	Abafarisaayo nikwo kugambirana bati : Mureebe ku tutaine ky'okukora ; reeba , ensi yoona yaamukuratira .
43012020	Omu baagiire aha Bugyenyi kuramya , hakaba harimu Abaguriiki .
43012021	Abo bakaija ahari Filipo owa Beetisaida ey'omuri Galilaaya , baamugira bati : Mukama waitu , nitwenda kureeba Yesu .
43012022	Filipo yaagyenda yaabigambira Andereya ; Andereya nawe nikwo kugyenda na Filipo bakabigambira Yesu .
43012023	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Hati obunaku bwahika , Omwana w'omuntu kuhimbisibwa .
43012024	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Enjuma y'engano , ku eba etagwire mu itaka , ekajunda , eguma eri emwe yonka ; kwonka ku ejunda , eyera munonga .
43012025	Weena orikukunda amagara ge , aryagabuza ; kandi weena orikwanga amagara ge omuri egi nsi , aryagarindira amagara agatagwaho .
43012026	Omuntu weena ompeereza , ankuratire ; kandi ahi ndi hoona , n'omuheereza wangye niho ariba . Weena ompeereza , Taata aryamuha ekitiinwa .
43012027	Hati omutima gwangye tigutebeekaine . Mbwenu ekindi ngambe ki ? Ngire nti : Taata , onkize ntahikwaho obu bunaku ? Ngaaha ; manya ekyandeetsire n'okubuhikaho .
43012028	Taata , himbisisa eiziina ryawe . Mpaho eiraka ryema omu iguru , rigira riti : Ndihimbisiise kandi ndyarihimbisisa .
43012029	Abantu abaabaire beemereire aho , ku baarihuriire , baagira bati : Enkuba yaateera ; abandi bati : Maraika niwe yaaba naagamba nawe .
43012030	Yesu agarukamu ati : Eiraka eryo tiryaija habwangye , kureka ryaija ahabwanyu .
43012031	Mbwenu obu nibwo bunaku ensi kucwerwa orubanja , n'omutegyeki w'ensi egi kubingwa ;
43012032	ku ndiheza kwihwa ahansi kuhanikwa , ndyayeiririza abantu boona .
43012033	Ekyo akakigamba naamanyisa emifeeri ei arifamu .
43012034	Abantu baamugarukamu bati : Eiteeka niritumanyisa ku Kristo arigumaho ebiro byona . Mbwenu noobaasa ota kugira ngu , Omwana w'omuntu aryahanikwa ? Ogwo Mwana w'omuntu n'oha ?
43012035	Yesu nikwo kubagira ati : Obu mukiine omushana okumara akaanya kakye , mugyende nihakihweza , obwire butakabaiririire ; ogyendera omu mwirima tamanya i arikutoora .
43012036	Ku muraabe mukiine omushana , mugwikirize , nibwo muraabe abaana b'omushana . Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , yaabatsigaho , yaayeshereka .
43012037	Nobu baraabe baamureebire naakora obumanyiso bwingi , kwonka tibaramwikirize .
43012038	Ekyo kikahikiiriiza ebi omurangi Isaaya yaagambire , naagira ati : Mukama , n'oha owaikiriize ebi twagambire , kandi n'oha oroorekirwe amaani ga Mukama ?
43012039	Eki bataraikiririize n'ahabw'okuba Isaaya akagaruka yaagira ati :
43012040	Akabahumya amaisho , yaabagangaaza emitima , ngu amaisho gaabo gatakaareeba , n'emitima yaabo etakaayetegyereza , ngu batakaayegarukamu , nkabakiza .
43012041	Isaaya ekyo akakigamba obu yaareeba ekitiinwa kya Mukama , kandi ebyo akabigamba ahari Yesu .
43012042	Baingi nangwa n'abakuru nobu baamwikiriize , kwonka tibarakigambire butunu ahabw'okutiina Abafarisaayo , ngu batakaababinga omu mateeraniro .
43012043	Manya bakenda kusiimwa abantu okukira okusiimwa Ruhanga .
43012044	Yesu akagamba n'eiraka rihango ati Orikuunyikiriza , tiinye arikwikiriza , kureka Ogwo owantumire .
43012045	Kandi weena ondeeba , biri areebire Ogwo owantumire .
43012046	Nyowe nkaija omu nsi ndi omushana , ngu weena orikuunyikiriza ataguma mu mwirima .
43012047	Ohurira ebigambo byangye atabyorobere , tiinye ndimusingisa orubanja ; ahabw'okuba tindaizire kusingisa nsi rubanja , kureka okugijuna .
43012048	Orikuunyangira , akanga kwikiriza ebigambo byangye , aine orimucwera orubanja ; ebigambo ebi naagambire nibyo birimusingisa orubanja aha kiro ky'aha muheru .
43012049	Ahabw'okuba ebi naagambire tindabigambire habwangye , kureka Taata owantumire niwe yandagiire ebi ndaagambe n'ebi ndaayegyese ;
43012050	kandi nimmanya ku ebiragiro bye bihaisa amagara agatahwaho . N'ahabw'ekyo ebi Taata yangambiire , nibyo ngamba .
43013001	Ekiro ky'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho ku kyabaire kitakahikire , Yesu yaamanya obunaku bwe bw'okuruga omu nsi egi kugaruka ahari Taata ku bwahika . Akaba akunda abe ab'omu nsi , kandi yaabakundira kimwe okuhitsya aha muheru .
43013002	Ku baabaire nibarya kyakiro , na Sitaane yaaherize kuta omuri Yuda owa Kariota , mwene Simooni , ekiteekateeko ky'okumureebya ,
43013003	Yesu naamanya ku Ishe yaamurekuriire byona , nk'oku yaarugire ahari Ruhanga , kandi ku arikwija kumugarukaho ;
43013004	yaimuka , yaaruga aha meeza , yaajuura omunagiro gwe , yaakwata ekitambaara , yaakyezirika .
43013005	Yaashuka amaizi omu kinaabiro , yaatandika kunaabisa ebigyere by'abatendekwa be n'okubishushuza ekitambaara eki yaabaire ayezirikiise .
43013006	Atyo ahika ahari Simooni Petero . Onu amugira ati : Mukama wangye , hoona iwe kunnaabisa ebigyere !
43013007	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Hati eki ndikukora torikukimanya , kwonka oryakimanya bwanyima .
43013008	Petero ati : Reka ! Torinnaabisa bigyere n'akakye . Yesu amugarukamu ati : Ku ndaabe ntakunaabiise , nooba otakikwatanisa naanye .
43013009	Bwanyima Simooni Petero amugira ati : Mukama wangye , otannaabisa ebigyere byonka , kureka onnaabise n'engaro n'omutwe .
43013010	Yesu amugira ati : owaaherize kwoga , aba atakyenda kindi , kureka okunaaba ebigyere byonka , ahabw'okuba aba yaayezire weena ; naimwe nimwera , kwonka ti mwena .
43013011	Obwo akaba naamanya oraamureebye , nikyo yaagiriire ati : Timurikwera mwena .
43013012	Ku yaaherize kubanaabisa ebigyere , yaajwara ebijwaro bye , yaagaruka aha meeza , yaababuuza ati : Ekyo eki naabakorera mwakimanya ?
43013013	Muunyeta Omwegyesa kandi Mukama waanyu ; eego kihikire , nikwo ndi .
43013014	Mbwenu nyowe , Omukama kandi Omwegyesa , ku ndaabe naabanaabisa ebigyere , naimwe mushemereire kunaabisana ebigyere .
43013015	Naabaha eky'okureeberaho , ngu naimwe mutwaze nk'oku naabakorera .
43013016	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Omuheereza takira mukama we , n'entumwa tekira waagitumire .
43013017	Mbwenu ekyo mwakimanya ; ku muraakikore , nimwija kushemererwa .
43013018	Tindikubagambaho mwena ; nimmanya abu naatoraine ; kwonka ekyahandiikirwe eki n'eky'okuhikiirizibwa , ekirikugira ngu : Orikurya naanye omugaati ; niwe yampindukana .
43013019	Ekyo naakibagambira kitakabaireho , ngu ku kiraabe kyabaireho , mubone kwikiriza ku ndi Ogwo .
43013020	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena oyakiira ou ntumire , biri niinye ayakiire ; kandi weena onyakiira , biri ayakiire owantumire .
43013021	Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , yaagira obusaasi omu mutima , yaagamba ati : Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Omwe omuriimwe naija kundeebya .
43013022	Abatendekwa baareebana , batarikumanya u yaagambaho .
43013023	Omutendekwa ou Yesu yaabaire akunda , akaba ayegamiire Yesu omu kifuba .
43013024	Simooni Petero yaamusimiza , naamugira ati : Mubuuze ou arikugambaho .
43013025	Nawe nikwo kwegamira atyo Yesu akamugira ati : Mukama wangye , n'oha ?
43013026	Yesu amugarukamu ati : N'ogwo ou ndaakoreze ekitongye , nkakimuha . Atyo akoza ekitongye , akiha Yuda , mwene Simooni owa Kariota .
43013027	Ago magingo Yuda ku aheza kurya ekyo kitongye , Sitaane amutaahamu . Yesu amugira ati : Eki orikuza kukora , kirahutsye .
43013028	Omu baabaire bari aha meeza , tihaabaho n'omwe owaamanya eki yaamugambirira atyo .
43013029	Kwonka bamwe omuribo , ahabw'okumanya ku Yuda niwe yaabaire areeberera enshaho y'empiiha zaabo , baateekateeka ngu Yesu yaamugambira kugura ebirikwetengwa ahabw'obugyenyi , nari okumugambira kugira eki yaaha abooro .
43013030	Yuda , ku yaaherize ati kurya ekyo kitongye , yaashohora ; obwo bukaba bwaizire .
43013031	Ku yaaherize kugyenda , Yesu yaagira ati : Mbwenu Omwana w'omuntu yaahimbisibwa , kandi na Ruhanga nawe yaahimbisizibwa omuriwe .
43013032	Ruhanga ku araabe yaahimbisizibwa omu Mwana we , n'Omwana we naija kuhimbisizibwa omuri Ruhanga , kandi Ruhanga naija kumuhimbisisa juba .
43013033	Baana bangye , nkibaine okumara omwanya mukye . Nimwija kundonda , kwonka nk'oku naagambiire Abayudaaya , naimwe nikwo ndikubagambira hati , nti : Ei ndikuza , timurikubaasa kwijayo .
43013034	Nimbaha ekiragiro kisya nti : Mukundane . Nk'oku naabakunzire , naimwe mugume mukundane .
43013035	Ku murikundana , aho niho abantu boona baribamanyira ku muri abatendekwa bangye .
43013036	Simooni Petero nikwo kumubuuza ati : Mukama wangye , nooyenda kuza hi ? Yesu amugarukamu ati : Ei ndikuza , obwa hati torikubaasa kunkuratayo ; oryankurata bwanyima .
43013037	Petero amugira ati : Mukama wangye , ahabw'enki hati ntarikubaasa kukukuratira ? Ndi ow'okuhayo amagara gangye ahabwawe .
43013038	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Ori ow'okuhayo amagara gaawe ahabwangye ? Buzimazima ninkugambira ati : Enkoko etakagambire , noija kuba waanyogire kashatu .
43014001	Emitima yaanyu erekye kushoberwa ; mwikirize Ruhanga , kandi naanye muunyikirize .
43014002	Omwa Tata harimu emyanya mingi ; kuri kitari kwo , nkaabagambiire nti : Ninza kubateguurira omwanya ?
43014003	Ku ndiheza kuzayo n'okubateguurira omwanya , ndyagaruka , mbatware ei ndi , ngu ei ndi , naimwe mube niyo mwatuura .
43014004	Ei ndikuza nimugimanya , n'omuhanda ogurikuzayo nimugumanya .
43014005	Tomasi amubuuza ati : Mukama wangye , ka tutarikumanya ei orikuza ; omuhanda nitugumanya tuta ?
43014006	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Niinye muhanda n'amazima n'amagara ; tihariho oija ahari Taata , atarabire muriinye .
43014007	Kuri mwammanyire , na Taata mukaamumanyire ; mbwenu hati mwamumanya kandi mwamureeba .
43014008	Filipo ati : Mukama wangye , tworekye Sho , haza tuhwe ekituri aha mutima .
43014009	Yesu amugira ati : Filipo , ahi naakatuuriire naimwe , hoona tokammanyaga ? Manya ondeebire , biri areebire Taata ; mbwenu shi ekirikukugambisa oti : Tworekye Taata , ni ki ?
43014010	Torikwikiriza ku ndi omuri Taata , na Taata ku ari omuriinye ? Ebi mbagambira timbyegambira habwangye , kureka Taata ori omuriinye niwe akora ebye .
43014011	Muunyikirize ku ndi omuri Taata , na Taata ku ari omuriinye ; nari shi , muunyikirize ahabw'emirimo ei nkora .
43014012	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Weena onyikiriza , aryakora ebi nkora , nangwa akore n'ebirikukiraho , ahabw'okuba ninza owa Taata .
43014013	Kyona eki murishaba omu iziina ryangye , ndyakikora , Taata abone kuhimbisizibwa omuri Mwana .
43014014	Kyona eki murishaba omu iziina ryangye , ndyakikora .
43014015	Ku muraabe nimunkunda , mukwate ebiragiro byangye ;
43014016	naanye ndyashaba Taata , abahe Omuhwezi ondiijo , agume naimwe ebiro byona .
43014017	Niwe Mutima ow'amazima , ou ensi etabaasa kwakiira , ahabw'okuba temureeba kandi temumanya ; kwonka imwe nimumumanya , ahabw'okuba aguma naimwe kandi aryatuura omuriimwe .
43014018	Tindibatsiga muri efuuzi ; ndyagaruka ahariimwe .
43014019	Hatsigaire akaanya kakye ensi ebe etakindeeba , kwonka imwe muryandeeba ; ahabw'okuba ndi ohuriire , naimwe muryaba abahuriire .
43014020	Obwo nibwo murimanya ku ndi omuri Tata , naimwe ku muri omuriinye , naanye omuriimwe .
43014021	Weena oikiriza ebiragiro byangye akabikuratira niwe ankunda ; kandi weena onkunda , aryakundwa Taata , naanye ndyamukunda , mmweyorekye .
43014022	Yuda , otari wa Kariota , amugira ati : Mukama wangye , ekyo nikiija kuba kita okutweyoreka , oteeyorekire ensi ?
43014023	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Weena orikunkunda , aryakuratira ekigambo kyangye , na Tata aryamukunda ; twije ahu ari , tutuure nawe .
43014024	Otankunda takwata biragiro byangye ; kandi ekigambo eki ngamba tikiba kyangye habwangye , kureka kiba ekya Taata owantumire .
43014025	Ebi naabibagambira nkiri hamwe naimwe ;
43014026	kwonka Omuhwezi , Mutima Orikwera , ou Taata arituma omu iziina ryangye , niwe aribeegyesa byona ebi naabagambiire .
43014027	Nimbatsigira obusingye ; obusingye bwangye naabubaha , ntarikububaha nk'oku ensi ebuha . Emitima yaanyu erekye kushoberwa nari kutiina .
43014028	Mwahurira ningira nti : Ningyenda , kandi ndyagaruka . Kuri nimunkunda mukaashemereirwe , ahabw'okuba ninza ahari Taata , kandi Taata ogwo nankira .
43014029	Ekyo naakibagambira kitakabaireho , ngu ku kiriba kyabaireho , mwikirize .
43014030	Tinkigamba bingi naimwe , ahabw'okuba mukama w'ensi egi naija . Taanyineho bushoboorozi ;
43014031	kwonka nyowe nkora nk'oku Taata yandagiire , haza ensi ebone kumanya ku mmukunda . Nimwimukye , turugye aha .
43015001	Niinye muzaabibu gw'amazima , na Taata niwe muhingi waagwo .
43015002	Eitaagi ryona eriri omuriinye eritarikwana , aritemaho ; kandi eitaagi eririkwana , arisharira , ngu ryane ebijuma bingi okukiraho .
43015003	Mbwenu imwe mwaherize kushemezibwa ahabw'ebigambo ebi naabagambiire .
43015004	Mugume omuriinye , naanye ngume omuriimwe . Nk'oku eitaagi ritabaasa kwana ryonka , ritagumire ha muti , naimwe nikwo mutarikubaasa , mwaba mutagumire muriinye .
43015005	Niinye muzaabibu , imwe muri amataagi . Weena oguma omuriinye , naanye nkaguma omuriwe , ayana ebijuma bingi ; manya nyowe ahi ntari , timwine ki murikubaasa kukora .
43015006	Weena otaguma muriinye , anagwa nk'eitaagi eritemirwe aha muti , kandi ayoma . Amataagi nk'ago gashanguruzibwa , ganagwa omu muriro , gasya .
43015007	Ku murikuguma omuriinye , n'ebigambo byangye byaguma omuriimwe , mushabe eki murikwenda kyona , haza muryakiheebwa .
43015008	Ekihimbisisa Taata , niimwe okwana ebijuma bingi , mukahamya ku muri abatendekwa bangye .
43015009	Nk'oku Taata yankunzire , naanye nikwo naabakunzire ; mugume omuri rukundo yangye .
43015010	Ku murikuratira ebiragiro byangye , muryaguma omuri rukundo yangye , nkaanye oku naakuratiire ebiragiro bya Taata , nkaguma omuri rukundo ye .
43015011	Ebyo naabibagambira , ngu okushemererwa kwangye kube omuriimwe , kandi n'okwanyu kwijurire kimwe .
43015012	Eki nikyo kiragiro kyangye : mukundane nk'oku naabakunzire .
43015013	Tihariho ogira rukundo erikukira ey'omuntu kuhayo amagara ge ahabwa banywani be .
43015014	Imwe muri banywani bangye mwaba nimukora ebi ndikubaragiira .
43015015	Tinkibeeta bahuuku , ahabw'okuba omuhuuku tamanya ki mukama we akora ; nimbeeta banywani bangye , ahabw'okuba nkabamanyisa byona ebi Taata yangambiire .
43015016	Tiimwe mwantooraine , kureka niinye naabatooraine ; nkabataho ngu mugyende mwane ebijuma , kandi ngu ebyo bijuma bigumeho , Taata abone kubaha kyona eki murishaba omu iziina ryangye .
43015017	Eki ndikubaragiira n'eki : mugume mukundane .
43015018	Ensi ku eribanga , mumanye ku niinye yaabandize kwanga etakabangire .
43015019	Kuri muri ab'ensi , ensi ekaabakunzire ahabw'okuba abaayo ; kwonka imwe ahabw'okutaba baayo , n'ahabw'okuba naabatooraine nkagibaihamu , nikyo egyo nsi erikubangira .
43015020	Mwijukye ebi naabagambiire nti : Omuhuuku takira mukama we . Ku baraabe bampiiganiise , naimwe baryabahiiganisa ; ku baraabe baakwatsire ebi naabagambiire , n'ebyanyu baryabikwata .
43015021	Ebyo byona baryabibakora nibabantura , ahabw'okuba tibarikumanya owantumire .
43015022	Kuri ntaraizire nkabagambira , tibaakugizire rubanja ; kwonka hati tibaine ky'okwekwatsa ahabw'ekibi kyabo .
43015023	Weena onyanga , biri ayangire Taata .
43015024	Kuri ntarabakoreiremu ebitakakorwaga muntu weena , tibaakugizire rubanja ; kwonka mbwenu babireebire , haza baanyanga hamwe na Taata .
43015025	Ekyo kikabaho , ngu ekyahandiikirwe omu iteeka ryabo ekirikugira ngu : Bakaanyangira busha , kihikiirizibwe .
43015026	Omuhwezi ou ndibooherereza kuruga ahari Taata , niwe Mutima ow'amazima oruga ahariwe , ku ariija , aryahamya ebyangye ;
43015027	naimwe muryaba baakareebi bangye , ahabw'okuba okwiha aha kutandika mutuura naanye .
43016001	Ebyo naabibagambira ngu mutakaatentebuka .
43016002	Baryababinga omu mateeraniro ; kandi obunaku buhikye , obu weena oribaita ariteekateeka , ngu yaakora eki Ruhanga amuragiire .
43016003	Ebyo baryabikora , ahabw'okuba tibakamanyaga Taata nobu yaakuba nyowe .
43016004	Mbwenu ebyo byona naabibagambira , ngu obunaku bwabyo ku burihika , mumanye ku naabibagambiire . Ebyo tindabibagambiire mu kutandika , ahabw'okuba nkaba nkibaine .
43016005	Kwonka mbwenu ninza ahari Ogwo owantumire , kandi tihariho n'omwe omuriimwe orikumbuuza ati : Nooza hi ?
43016006	Mbwenu ahabw'okubagambira , emitima yaanyu yaijura obusaasi .
43016007	Nobu kiraabe kiri kityo , kwonka ka mbagambire amazima ; okugyenda kwangye niimwe kuraagasire ; manya ku ndaabe ntagyenzire , Omuhwezi ogwo tariija hariimwe ; kwonka ku ndaagyende , ndyamubooherereza .
43016008	Nawe ku ariija aryashinja abantu b'omu nsi aha bikwatiraine n'ekibi , n'okuhikiirira , kandi n'orubanja .
43016009	Aha bikwatiraine n'ekibi , ahabw'okuba tibaraanyikiriize ;
43016010	aha kuhikiirira , ahabw'okuba ninza ahari Taata , kandi timurindeeba bundi ;
43016011	aha kucwa orubanja , ahabw'okuba mukama w'ensi egi yaaherize kusingwa orubanja .
43016012	Nkiine bingi eby'okubagambira , kwonka hati timurikubaasa kubyemera .
43016013	Mutima ow'amazima ku ariija , aryabahabura , mumanye amazima goona ; ahabw'okuba tarigamba habwe wenka , kureka ebi arihurira , nibyo arigamba , kandi aryabamanyisa n'ebiriija kubaho .
43016014	Aryampimbisisa , ahabw'okuba aryaiha aha byangye , abibagambire .
43016015	Kyona eki Taata aine n'ekyangye ; nikyo naabagirira nti : Byona ebi aribagambira , aryabiiha omu byangye .
43016016	Hatsigaireyo omwanya mukye mube mutakindeeba ; kandi bwanyima y'omwanya mukye mugarukye mundeebe .
43016017	Bamwe omu batendekwa be baabuuzana bati : Ekyo eki arikutugambira ni ki ? Naagira ati : Hatsigaire omwanya mukye mube mutakindeeba ; kandi ati : Bwanyima y'omwanya mukye mugarukye mundeebe ; kandi ati : Ninza owa Taata .
43016018	Baagaruka baagira bati : Naamanyisa ki okugira ati : Hatsigaire omwanya mukye ? Ka tutarikwetegyereza ki arikumanyisa .
43016019	Yesu amanya ku barikwenda kumubuuza ; atyo abagira ati : Nimubuuzana amakuru g'eki naagamba nti : Hatsigaireyo omwanya mukye mube mutakindeeba , kandi bwanyima y'omwanya mukye mugarukye mundeebe !
43016020	Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Imwe muryarira , mucure , kwonka ensi yo eryashemererwa ; muryagira obusaasi , kwonka obusaasi bwanyu buryarugamu okushemererwa .
43016021	Omukazi , ku aba naarumwa , agira obusaasi , ahabw'okuba obunaku bwe bwahika ; kwonka ku aheza kuzaara , obwo busaasi bumweba ahabw'okushemerererwa omuntu owaazaarwa omu nsi .
43016022	Naimwe hati mwine obusaasi , kwonka ndyabareeba obundi , emitima yaanyu eshemererwe , haza okwo kushemererwa kwanyu tihaine orikubaaka .
43016023	Aha kiro ekyo timurigira ki mwambuuza . Buzimazima nimbagambira nti : Kyona eki murishaba Taata omu iziina ryangye , aryakibaha .
43016024	Okuhitsya hati timukashabaga kintu kyona omu iziina ryangye ; mushabe , muryaheebwa , haza okushemererwa kwanyu kubone kuhikira kimwe .
43016025	Ebyo byona mbaire nimbibagambira omu nfumu ; kwonka obunaku nibwija kuhika , obu ntakibagambira mu nfumu , kureka okubagambira bwerure ebikwatiraine na Taata .
43016026	Ekyo kiro ku kirihika , muryashaba omu iziina ryangye , kandi tindikugira nti ndyabashabira ahari Taata .
43016027	Manya eki Taata abakundira , n'ahabw'okuba naimwe mukankunda , kandi mwaikiriza ku naarugira ahari Ruhanga .
43016028	Nkaruga ahari Taata , naija omu nsi ; mbwenu ninduga omu nsi , ninza owa Taata .
43016029	Abatendekwa be baamugira bati : Mbwenu kwo noogamba butunu , tokicwa nfumu !
43016030	Hati twayetegyereza ku orikumanya byona , kandi ku omuntu weena atarikwetenga kukubuuza ; n'ahabw'ekyo nitwikiriza ku waarugire ahari Ruhanga .
43016031	Yesu yaabagarukamu ati : Mbwenu buzima kwo mwaikiriza ?
43016032	Reeba , obunaku nibwija kuhika , kandi kwo bwahikire , obu muraataataanisibwe , buri omwe akatoora ogwe , mukantsigaho nyenka ; kwonka shi tindi nyenka , ahabw'okuba Taata ari hamwe naanye .
43016033	Ebyo naabibagambira , ngu mugire obusingye omuriinye . Omu nsi muryareeba enaku ; kwonka mugume , nyowe ensi ngisingwire .
43017001	Yesu , ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , yainamura amaisho , yaareeba ahaiguru , yaagira ati : Taata , obunaku bwahika ; ohimbisise Omwana waawe ; nawe abone kukuhimbisisa .
43017002	Manya okamuha obushoboorozi aha bantu boona , ngu abone kuha abu waamukwatsize amagara agatahwaho .
43017003	Ago magara agatahwaho nikwo kukumanya iwe Ruhanga wenka ow'amazima , na Yesu Kristo ou waatumire .
43017004	Nyowe nkuhimbisiise omu nsi , naaheza omurimo ogu wampaire kukora .
43017005	Mbwenu Taata , obu nibwo bunaku naiwe kumpimbisisa omu maisho gaawe n'ekitiinwa eki naashangirwe nyine naiwe , ensi etakahangirwe .
43017006	Abantu abu wankwatsize noobaiha omu nsi , nkabamanyisa iziina ryawe ; bakaba bari abaawe , waabankwatsa , kandi baakuratira ekigambo kyawe .
43017007	Mbwenu hati nibamanya ku byona ebi wampaire byarugire ahariiwe ;
43017008	ahabw'okuba byona ebi wangambiire nkabibahitsyaho , baabiikiriza , baamanyira kimwe ku naarugire ahariiwe , kandi baikiriza ku niiwe wantumire .
43017009	Mbwenu nimbashabira ; tindikushabira b'ensi , kureka abo abu wankwatsize , ahabw'okuba n'abaawe .
43017010	Abangye boona n'abaawe , n'abaawe boona n'abangye , kandi nimpimbisirizibwa omuribo .
43017011	Nyowe tinkiri mu nsi , kwonka bo bagirimu , kandi niinyija ahu ori . Taata Orikwera , obarindise amaani g'eiziina ryawe eri wampaire , babe bamwe nkaitwe .
43017012	Obu naabaire nkibaine , nkabarindisa amaani g'eiziina ryawe eri wampaire ; naabarinda , tihaaburaho n'omwe , kureka ogwo owaabaire ari ow'okubura , ngu Ebyahandiikirwe bibone kuhikiirizibwa .
43017013	Mbwenu niinyija ahu ori ; ebi nimbigamba nkiri omu nsi , ngu okushemererwa kwangye kuhikiiririzibwe omuribo .
43017014	Nkabahitsyaho ekigambo kyawe ; ensi yaabanga ahabw'okuba ti b'ensi , nkaanye oku ntari waayo .
43017015	Tindikushaba ngu obaihe omu nsi , kureka abarinde Omubi .
43017016	Ti b'ensi nkaanye oku ntari waayo .
43017017	Obeezese amazima ; ekigambo kyawe nigo mazima .
43017018	Nk'oku wantumire omu nsi , naanye nikwo ndikugibatumamu .
43017019	Mbwenu niinyehayo ahabwabo , ngu nabo babone kwezibwa amazima .
43017020	Tindikushabira aba bonka , ninshabira n'abariinyikiriza ahabw'ekigambo kyabo ;
43017021	boona babe bamwe , nkaiwe Taata oku ori omuriinye , naanye omuriiwe , nabo babe nikwo baaba omuriitwe , haza ensi ebone kwikiriza ku niiwe wantumire .
43017022	Ekitiinwa eki wampaire nkibahaire , ngu babe bamwe nk'oku turi bamwe ,
43017023	nyowe omuribo , naiwe omuriinye babone kubeera kimwe bamwe , ensi emanye ku niiwe wantumire , kandi ku obakunzire nk'oku wankunzire .
43017024	Taata , niinyenda abu wankwatsize bagume naanye ahi ndi , babone kureeba ekitiinwa kyangye eki wampaire , ahabw'okuba okankunda ensi etakahangirwe .
43017025	Taata omwinganisa , ensi tekakumanyaga , kwonka nyowe nkumanya ; kandi n'aba nibamanya ku niiwe wantumire .
43017026	Nkabamanyisa eiziina ryawe , kandi ndyaguma ndimanyise , okukunda oku wankunzire kubone kuba omuribo , naanye mbe omuribo .
43018001	Yesu ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , yaagyenda n'abatendekwa be , yaayambuka akagyera ka Kedirooni ; okwo hakaba hariyo omusiri , yaaguzamu n'abatendekwa be .
43018002	Yuda owaamureebize akaba naamanya ogwo mwanya , ahabw'okuba kaingi Yesu akaba ateeranirayo n'abatendekwa be .
43018003	Mpaho yaija omuri ogwo mwanya ayebembeire ekimbuuro ky'abaserukare hamwe n'abarinzi abaayohereziibwe abahongyerezi abakuru n'Abafarisaayo , bakwaitse amatabaza n'emuri n'eby'okurwanisa .
43018004	Yesu , ahabw'okumanya byona ebirikwenda kumubaho , arugayo ababuuza ati : Nimusherura oha ?
43018005	Bamugarukamu bati : Yesu owa Nazareeti . Abagira ati : Manya niinye . Obwo Yuda owaamureebize akaba ayemereire nabo .
43018006	Yesu ku abagira ati : Niinye ; bagarura ebigyere enyima , bagwa ahansi .
43018007	Agaruka ababuuza ati : Nimusherura oha ? Bati : Yesu owa Nazareeti .
43018008	Yesu abagira ati : Manya naabagira nti : Niinye . Ku muraabe niinye murikusherura , murekye aba bagyende .
43018009	Ekyo akakigamba kuhikiiriza eki yaagambire , naagira ati : Abu wankwatsize , tindaburize n'omwe .
43018010	Simooni Petero , owaabaire aine rurara , agisyorayo , atema omuheereza w'omuhongyerezi omukuru , amucwaho okutu kwa buryo . Ogwo muheereza akaba naayetwa Maliko .
43018011	Yesu agira Petero ati : Garura rurara yaawe omu kyobate kyayo ; noogira ngu tindi w'okunywa ekikopo ki Taata yampaire ?
43018012	Omutwe gw'abaserukare n'omukuru waabo , hamwe n'abarinzi Abayudaaya , baakwata Yesu , baamuboha .
43018013	Baabanza kumutwara owa Anasi ; ahabw'okuba akaba ari ishezaara wa Kayaafa , owaabaire ari omuhongyerezi omukuru omuri ogwo mwaka .
43018014	Kayaafa ogwo niwe yaabaire ahabwire Abayudaaya ati : Ni kirungi omuntu omwe okufeera abantu boona .
43018015	Simooni Petero hamwe n'omutendekwa ondi baakurata Yesu . Kandi ogwo mutendekwa , ahabw'okumanywa omuhongyerezi omukuru , ataaha na Yesu omu kibuga ky'omuhongyerezi omukuru .
43018016	Kwonka Petero we aguma ayemereire aheeru y'eirembo . Omutendekwa , owaabaire naamanywa omuhongyerezi omukuru , nikwo kushohora , akagambira omwishiki omukumiirizi , akataasya Petero omunda .
43018017	Ogwo mwishiki omukumiirizi nikwo kubuuza Petero ati : Naiwe ori ow'omu batendekwa b'ogwo mushaija ? Onu ati : Tindi w'omuribo .
43018018	Obwo hakaba hariho embeho , abaheereza n'abarinzi bahembire omuriro gw'amakara , beemereire niboota ; Petero nawe nikwo kwemerera akoota nabo .
43018019	Omuhongyerezi omukuru abuuza Yesu aha by'abatendekwa be , n'eby'okwegyesa kwe .
43018020	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Nkaba ngambira abantu boona butunu ; nyegyeseza omu iteeraniro n'omuri Nyaruju , ahu Abayudaaya boona bateeraniire ; tinkagambaga kintu kyona omu mubonano .
43018021	Mbwenu nyowe nombuuriza ki ? Buuza abarahuriire ebi naayegyeise ; nibo barikumanya ebi naagambire .
43018022	Ku yaagambire ebyo , omwe aha barinzi abaabaire beemereire aho , yaamuteera oruhi , yaamugira ati : Haza ogarukamu otyo omuhongyerezi omukuru ?
43018023	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Ku ndaabe naagamba kubi , nyomesereza eki naashobya ; kwonka ku kiraabe kitariho , wanteerera ki ?
43018024	Bwanyima Anasi amwohereza abohirwe , ahari Kayaafa , omuhongyerezi omukuru .
43018025	Simooni Petero , ku yaabaire ayemereire naayota , baamubuuza bati : Naiwe ori ow'omu batendekwa be ? Ayehakana naagira ati : Tindi w'omuribo .
43018026	Omwe aha baheereza b'omuhongyerezi omukuru , oine obuzaare n'omushaija ou Petero yaatemireho okutu , agira ati : Tinaakureeba ori nawe omu musiri ?
43018027	Petero agaruka ayehakana ; ahonaaho enkoko egamba .
43018028	Mpaho baiha Yesu owa Kayaafa , bamutwara omu kikaari ky'omutegyeki omukuru , obwo nibutaagurikana . Kwonka bo tibaataaha muri ekyo kikaari , ngu kitakaabahagaza , bakabura kurya Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho .
43018029	Pilaato nikwo kushohora , akabashanga aheeru , akababuuza ati : Omushaija ogu nimumutabaariza ki ?
43018030	Bamugarukamu bati : Kuri atari nkozi y'ebibi titwakumukureeteire .
43018031	Pilaato ati : Nimwirooko nu , mumutware , mumucwere orubanja nk'oku eiteeka ryanyu riri . Abayudaaya bamugarukamu bati : Itwe titurikwikirizibwa kwita muntu .
43018032	Ekyo kikahikiiriza ebi Yesu yaagambire naamanyisa oku arifa .
43018033	Pilaato atyo agaruka omu kikaari , ayeta Yesu , amubuuza ati : Weeza ori Omugabe w'Abayudaaya ?
43018034	Yesu agarukamu ati : Ekyo waakibuuza ahabwawe , nainga hariho abandi abakungambiire ?
43018035	Pilaato ati : Nyowe shi ndi Omuyudaaya ? Ab'eihanga ryawe hamwe n'abahongyerezi abakuru , ka nibo baakundeetera . Okozire ki ?
43018036	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Manya obugabe bwangye ti bw'ensi egi . Obugabe bwangye kuri buri obw'ensi egi , engabo zangye zikaarwaine , ndeka kurekurirwa Abayudaaya ; kwonka obugabe bwangye kunu tiyo bukomooka .
43018037	Pilaato agira ati : Nikwo kugira nu , ngu ori omugabe ? Yesu agarukamu ati : Waakigamba ku ndi omugabe , eki naazaariirwe kandi ekyandeetsire omu nsi n'okuhamya amazima . Ow'amazima weena ahurira eiraka ryangye ,
43018038	Pilaato ati : Amazima n'enki ? Ku agamba ekyo , agaruka ashohora , ashanga Abayudaaya , abagira ati : Nyowe tindikureeba kirikusingisa omuntu ogu orubanja .
43018039	Kwonka nk'oku omucwe gwanyu guri , nshangwa mbarekurira embohe emwe aha kiro ky'Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho ; mbwenu nimwenda mbarekurire Omugabe w'Abayudaaya ?
43018040	Ku bahurira ekyo , bayomba nibagira bati : T'ogu , kureka Baraba . Baraba ogwo akaba ari omwambuzi .
43019001	Bwanyima Pilaato akaragiira ku batwara Yesu bakamwasha .
43019002	Ekyo ku kyahwaire , abaserukare baaruka ekirunga ky'amahwa , baakimuta aha mutwe , baamujweka bushuuti ya bujwa .
43019003	Baaguma nibaija ahu ari , nibagira bati : Singa , Mugabe w'Abayudaaya ! Batyo bamuteera empi .
43019004	Mpaho Pilaato agaruka ashohora , abagira ati : Reeba , naaza kumubareetera , mumanye ku ntaareeba kirikumusingisa orubanja .
43019005	Yesu atyo ashohora ajwaire ekirunga ky'amahwa na bushuuti ya bujwa . Pilaato abagira ati : Omuntu ngugu !
43019006	Abahogyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abarinzi , ku bamureeba , bayomba bati : Mubambe aha musharaba ! Mubambe aha musharaba ! Pilaato ati : Mube niimwe mwamutwara , mumubambe ; nyowe nindeeba hatariho kirikumusingisa orubanja .
43019007	Abayudaaya bati : Twine eiteeka , kandi ahabw'eiteeka n'ow'okufa , ahabw'okuba akeegira Omwana wa Ruhanga .
43019008	Pilaato ku ahurira baagamba ebyo , ayeyongyera kutiina ;
43019009	atyo agaruka omu kikaari , abuuza Yesu ati : Beitu oruga hi ? Kwonka Yesu tagira ki amugarukamu .
43019010	Pilaato nikwo kumubuuza ati : Torikwenda kugira eki wangambira ? Torikumanya ku nyine obushoboorozi kukurekura nari kukubamba aha musharaba ?
43019011	Yesu agarukamu ati : Tokungizireho bushoboorozi , kuri butarakuhairwe Ow'omu iguru ; n'ahabw'ekyo owaakundekurira niwe aine orubanja orurikukira orwawe .
43019012	Ekyo kyareetera Pilaato kusherura oburyo bw'okumurekura ; kwonka Abayudaaya baayomba bati : Ku oraamurekure , biri tori munywani wa Kaisaari ; weena oyegira omugabe , aba agomeire Kaisaari .
43019013	Pilaato ku ahurira ebyo bigambo , aragiira ku bashohoza Yesu , ashutama aha kitebe ekicwerwaho emanja , omu mwanya gurikwetwa Omwariro , omu Ruheburaayo , Gabata .
43019014	Obwo rikaba riri eizooba ry'Okweteguurira Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho , aha shaaha nka mukaaga , Pilaato agira Abayudaaya ati : Reeba Omugabe waanyu !
43019015	Bayomba bati : Mwite ! Mwite ! Mubambe aha musharaba ! Pilaato ati : Nimwenda ku mbamba Omugabe waanyu aha musharaba ? Abahongyerezi abakuru baamugarukamu bati : Itwe titwine ondi mugabe , kureka Kaisaari .
43019016	Pilaato atyo arugaho amubarekurira kubambwa aha musharaba . Batyo batwara Yesu ;
43019017	ashohora ayekoreire omusharaba gwe kuza omu mwanya ogurikwetwa ogw'Empanga y'Omutwe , omu Ruheburaayo , Gologota ,
43019018	ahi baamubambiire aha musharaba n'abandi babiri , omwe aha rubaju rumwe , ondi aha rundi , na Yesu ahagati .
43019019	Pilaato ahandiika ekirango , akita aha musharaba ; kirikugira kiti : YESU OWA NAZAREETI , OMUGABE W'ABAYUDAAYA .
43019020	Ekyo kirango kyashomwa Abayudaaya baingi , ahabw'okuba omwanya ogu Yesu yaabambirwemu gukaba gutari hare n'orurembo ; kandi kikaba kihandiikirwe omu Ruheburaayo n'omu Rulatini n'omu Ruguriiki .
43019021	Abahongyerezi abakuru b'Abayudaaya nikwo kugira Pilaato bati : Tokuhandiikire oti : Omugabe w'Abayudaaya , kureka oti : Akagira ati : Ndi Omugabe w'Abayudaaya .
43019022	Pilaato abagarukamu ati : Eki naahandiikire , naakihandiikire .
43019023	Abaserukare , ku baaherize kubamba Yesu , baatwara ebijwaro bye , baabibaganisa omu miteeko ena , buri omwe yaatwara gumwe . Ekanzu ye ekaba etabaziirwe , kureka erukirwe yoona okwiha omu maraka okuhitsya aha bigyere .
43019024	Batyo bagambirana bonka bati : tutakaagitaagura ; haakiri tugiteerere enteenyu kureeba oraabe mukama waayo . Ekyo kikabaho kuhikiiriza ekyahandiikirwe ekirikugira ngu : Bakabagana ebijwaro byangye , n'emyenda yangye baagiteerera enteenyu .
43019025	N'abo baserukare nikwo baatwarize batyo . Haihi n'omusharaba gwa Yesu hakaba heemereireho nyina na nyinento , na Mariya muka Keloopa , na Mariya Magadaleena .
43019026	Yesu ku yaareebire nyina , n'omutendekwa ou yaabaire akunda amwemereire aha rubaju , yaagira nyina ati : Mukaikuru , reeba omwana waawe !
43019027	Kandi yaagira omutendekwa ati : Reeba nyoko ! Okwiha obwo ogwo mutendekwa yaamutwara owe .
43019028	Bwanyima Yesu , ku yaamanyire ngu byona byahwa , kandi ahabw'okuhikiiriza Ebyahandiikirwe , yaagira ati : Nyine eiriho .
43019029	Aho hakaba hariho enjoga eijwire viino y'encenku ; batyo bajabika ekyangu omuri egyo ncenku , bakita aha kati k'enyaweera , bakimuta aha munwa .
43019030	Yesu ku aheza kunywa egyo ncenku , agira ati : Kyahwa . Atyo ainika omutwe , ahayo amagara ge .
43019031	Ahabw'okushangwa eizooba eryo ryabaire riri ery'Okweteguura , n'ahabw'okutenda ngu emitumbi egume aha musharaba ahari Sabato manya - - Sabato egyo ekaba eri nkuru - - Abayudaaya baashaba Pilaato , ngu babahende amaguru , n'emitumbi bagiiheho .
43019032	N'ahabw'ekyo abaserukare baija , baahenda amaguru g'omuntu w'okubanza owaabambirwe nawe , baataho ag'owa kabiri .
43019033	Ku baahikire ahari Yesu , baashanga yaafiire , tibaamuhenda maguru ;
43019034	kwonka omwe aha baserukare yaamucumita eicumu omu rubaju , ahonaaho haarugamu eshagama n'amaizi .
43019035	Owaakireebire akakihamya , haza okuhamya kwe n'okw'amazima , kandi naamanya ku eki arikugamba kiri eky'amazima , ngu naimwe mubone kwikiriza .
43019036	Manya ebyo bikabaho , ngu ekyahandiikirwe kibone kuhikiirizibwa , ekirikugira ngu : Tiharibaho igufa rye na rimwe eririhendwa .
43019037	N'ahandi ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Baryahanga amaisho ogwo ou baacumitsire .
43019038	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Yosefu owa Arimataaya , owaabaire ari omutendekwa wa Yesu , kwonka bwesherekye ahabw'okutiina Abayudaaya , yaashaba Pilaato ku amwikiriza kutwara omutumbi gwa Yesu ; Pilaato yaikiriza . Batyo baija , baagutwara .
43019039	Nikodemo owaizire ahari Yesu nyekiro omurundi ogwabandize , nawe yaija areetsire ekijwangye ky'entsinda n'enkaka , birikuhitsya oburemeezi bwa kiloguramu nka makumi mukaaga .
43019040	Baatwara omutumbi gwa Yesu , baaguzinga omu mitanda ya kitaani erimu eby'emigaju , nk'oku omugyenzo gw'okuziika kw'Abayudaaya guri .
43019041	Aha mwanya gu yaabambiirwemu , hakaba hariho omusiri ogurimu ekituuro kisya ekitakaziikwamuga muntu .
43019042	Nk'oku ryabaire riri eizooba ry'Abayudaaya ery'Okweteguura , n'ekyo kituuro kiri haihi , baaba nikyo baatamu Yesu .
43020001	Aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki , Mariya Magadaleena akaija kare aha kituuro nibutaagurikana ; yaashanga eibaare riihirwe aha kituuro .
43020002	Yaija nairuka , yaahika Simooni Petero n'omutendekwa ori ou Yesu yaabaire akunda , yaabagira ati : Baihire Mukama omu kituuro , haza titurikumanya hi bamutaire .
43020003	Petero n'ogwo mutendekwa nikwo kuza aha kituuro .
43020004	Batyo bombi bairuka , kwonka omutendekwa ori atsiga Petero , amutanga aha kituuro ;
43020005	aringuriza , areeba emyenda ya kitaani eri aho , kwonka tataahamu .
43020006	Bwanyima Simooni Petero aija amukuratiire , ataaha omu kituuro ; areeba emyenda ya kitaani eri aho ,
43020007	n'omutanda ogwabaire gumushembire guri aha kwagwo hangahari .
43020008	Bwanyima omutendekwa ori , owaabandize aha kituuro , nawe ataahamu , areeba , aikiriza .
43020009	Kwonka okuhitsya obwo bakaba batakamanyire ekyahandiikirwe ekyabaire nikigira ngu n'ow'okuzooka omu bafiire .
43020010	Batyo abo batendekwa bagaruka omuka .
43020011	Mariya ku yaabaire ari aheeru y'ekituuro naarira , yainama , yaakiringurizamu ;
43020012	yaareeba baamaraika babiri bajwaire ebirikwera , bashutami ahu omutumbi gwa Yesu gubaire guri ; omwe aha mutwe , ondi aha bigyere .
43020013	Baamugira bati : Mukazi ' we , noorizibwa ki ? Abagarukamu ati : Manya batwaire Mukama wangye , kandi tindikumanya hi bamutaire .
43020014	Ku yaagambire ekyo , yaahinduka , yaareeba Yesu ayemereire aho ; kwonka tiyaamumanya ku ari we .
43020015	Yesu amugira ati : Mukazi ' we , noorizibwa ki ? Noosherura oha ? Mariya ku ateekateeka ngu n'omuhingi w'ogwo musiri , amugira ati : Mukama wangye , ku oraabe niiwe omutwaire , ngambira ahu omutaire , ngyende mmwiheyo .
43020016	Yesu amugira ati : Mariya ! Onu ahinduka , amugira omu Ruheburaayo ati : Rabooni ! amakuru ngu Mwegyesa .
43020017	Yesu amugira ati : Otankwataho , ahabw'okuba tinkatembire mu iguru owa Taata , kwonka irooko , ogambire beene Taata , oti : Yaaza kutemba omu iguru , ahari Ishe kandi Shoimwe , ahari Ruhanga we kandi Ruhanga waanyu .
43020018	Mariya Magadaleena atyo agyenda , agambira abatendekwa ku yaareeba Mukama , kandi ku yaamugambira ebyo bigambo .
43020019	Omwabazyo gw'eryo izooba ku gwakiikire , aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki , abatendekwa ku baabaire beekingiraine ahabw'okutiina Abayudaaya , Yesu yaija , yaabeemerera ahagati , yaabagira ati : Nimukagire obusingye !
43020020	Ku aheza kubagira atyo , abooreka engaro ze n'orubaju rwe . Abatendekwa , ku bareeba Mukama , bashemererwa munonga .
43020021	Agaruka abagira ati : Nimukagire obusingye ! Nk'oku Taata yantumire , naanye nikwo ndikubatuma .
43020022	Ku yaaherize kubagambira ebyo , yaabahuuhaho omwitsyo , yaabagira ati : Nimutungye Mutima Orikwera .
43020023	Abu murikusaasira ebibi , nibabisaasirwa ; abu mutarikubisaasira nibibagumaho .
43020024	Tomasi orikwetwa Mpasha , omwe aha batendekwa eikumi na babiri , akaba atari hamwe nabo obu Yesu yaija .
43020025	Abandi batendekwa ku baamugizire bati : Twareeba Mukama ! Yaabagarukamu ati : Ku ndaabe ntareebire nkojo z'emishumaari omu biganja bye , nkakoza orukumu rwangye omuri ezo nkojo , kandi ku ndaabe ntamukozire mu rubaju n'engaro yangye , tindikwikiriza .
43020026	Ku haahingwireho ebiro munaana , abatendekwa nabwo bakaba bari omu nju , kandi na Tomasi ari hamwe nabo , Yesu yaija enyigi zikingire , yaabeemerera ahagati , yaabagira ati : Nimukagire obusingye !
43020027	Bwanyima yaagira Tomasi ati : Koza aha orukumu rwawe , oreebe ebiganja byangye . Reeta engaro yaawe , ogite omu rubaju rwangye ; orekye kuba entaikiriza kureka orikwikiriza .
43020028	Tomasi amugarukamu ati : Ai Mukama wangye kandi Ruhanga wangye !
43020029	Yesu amugira ati : Waikiriza ahabw'okuba wandeeba . Baine omugisha abaikiriza bataine ki bareebire .
43020030	Hariho obundi bumanyiso bwingi obu Yesu yaakozire , abatendekwa bakabureeba , obutarahandiikirwe omuri eki kitabo .
43020031	Kwonka obu bukahandiikwa ngu mwikirize ku Yesu ari Kristo Omwana wa Ruhanga , kandi ku muraikirize , mutungye amagara omuriwe .
43021001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Yesu yaagaruka yaayeyoreka abatendekwa be aha nyanja ya Tiberiya ; kandi ekyo kikabaho kiti :
43021002	Simooni Petero , na Tomasi oyetwa Mpasha , Natanaeli owa Kaana eya Galilaaya , na beene Zebedaayo , n'abandi batendekwa be babiri , bakaba bari hamwe .
43021003	Simooni Petero yaabagira ati : Ninza kujuba . Bamugarukamu bati : Naitwe ka tugyende naiwe . Batyo bagyenda , baza omu bwato , kwonka ekyo kiro tibagira ki baakwatsa .
43021004	Ku bwabaire nibusheesha , Yesu yaaboneka ayemereire aha nkungu ; kwonka abatendekwa be tibaamumanya ku ari we .
43021005	Atyo ababuuza ati : Boojo ' mwe , mwine eki mwakwatsire ? bamugarukamu bati : Ngaaha .
43021006	Abagira ati : Mutambikye akatimba aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'obwato , nimwija kugira eki mwakwatsa . Batyo bakatambika , kandi ahabw'ebyenyanja kuba bingi , baremwa kukakiriza kukata omu bwato .
43021007	Omutendekwa ou Yesu yaabaire akunda , agira Petero ati : Manya ni Mukama . Simooni Petero , ku ahurira ngu ni Mukama , ayezirika omwenda , ahabw'okuba akaba ajwaire busha , atyo ayejuguta omu maizi .
43021008	Abatendekwa abandi bo baizira omu bwato , nibakurura ako katimba kaijwire ebyenyanja , ahabw'okuba bakaba batari hare n'enkungu , entambwe nka igana .
43021009	Ku baahikire bati aha nkungu , baashangaho omuriro gw'amakara gutarikirweho ebyenyanja , n'emigaati eri aho .
43021010	Yesu abagira ati : Nimureete aha byenyanja ebi mwakwatsa .
43021011	Simooni Petero yaagaruka omu bwato , yaanyurura akatimba , yaakahitsya aha nkungu kaijwire ebyenyanja bihango igana na makumi ataano na bishatu : kandi nobu byabaire biri bingi bityo , kwonka akatimba tikaracwekire .
43021012	Yesu abagira ati : Nimwije murye ekyakasheeshe . Haza tihaabaho n'omwe omu batendekwa owaayehangire kumubuuza ati : Beitu ori oha ? Bakamanyira kimwe ku ari Mukama .
43021013	Yesu atyo aija , akwata omugaati , agubaha , n'ebyenyanja atyo .
43021014	Ogwo gukaba omurundi gwa kashatu Yesu kweyoreka abatendekwa be , yaaheza kuzooka omu bafiire .
43021015	Ku baaherize kurya eky'akasheeshe , Yesu yaabuuza Simooni Petero ati : Simooni mwene Yohaana , nonkunda okukira aba ? Amugarukamu ati : Eego , Mukama wangye ; noomanya ku ndikukukunda . Yesu amugira ati : Riisa abaana b'entaama bangye .
43021016	Ayongyera amubuuza omurundi gwa kabiri ati : Simooni mwene Yohaana , nonkunda ? Onu amugarukamu ati : Eego , Mukama wangye ; noomanya ku ndikukukunda . Yesu amugira ati : Reeberera entaama zangye .
43021017	Bwanyima amubuuza omurundi gwa kashatu ati : Simooni mwene Yohaana , nonkunda ? Petero kimusaasa ahabw'okumubuuza omurundi gwa kashatu ati Nonkunda ? Amugira ati : Mukama wangye , noomanya byona ; noomanya ku ndikukukunda . Yesu amugira ati : Riisa entaama zangye .
43021018	Buzimazima ninkugambira nti : Obu waabaire ori omutsigazi , okaba oyezirika , oza ei orikwenda ; kwonka ku oriba omugurusi , oryagorora emikono , ondi akuzirikye , akutware ei otarikwenda .
43021019	Ebyo akabigamba naayoreka emifeere ei Petero arifamu kuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinwa . Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo , yaamugira ati : Nkuratira .
43021020	Petero ahinduka , areeba omutendekwa , ou Yesu yaabaire akunda , abakuratiire , niwe ogwo owaamwegamiire omu kifuba nibarya , akamubuuza ati : Mukama , nooha oraakureebye ?
43021021	Petero , ku amureeba , abuuza Yesu ati : Mukama wangye , mbwenu shi ogu aryaba ata ?
43021022	Yesu amugarukamu ati : Ku ndaabe niinyenda ngu agumeho okuhitsya obu ndiija , iwe ekyo noofa ki nakyo ? Ekyawe n'okunkuratira .
43021023	Bwanyima orukuru rwabuga omuri beene waabo , ku ogwo mutendekwa atarifa . Haza Yesu ataragizire ngu Yohaana tarifa , kureka ati : Ku ndaabe niinyenda ngu agumeho okuhitsya obu ndiija , iwe ekyo noofa ki nakyo ?
43021024	Ogwo mutendekwa niwe arikuhamya ebyo byona , kandi niwe yaabihandiikire ; reero nitumanya ngu ebi arikuhamya n'eby'amazima .
43021025	Hariho n'ebindi bingi ebi Yesu yaakozire ; kuri noogira ngu byona bikahandiikwa , ningira ngu ensi yoona tekubaasize kuhikwamu bitabo byona ebyakuhandiikirwe .
44001001	Iwe Teofilo , omu kitabo kyangye ekyabadize , nkahandiika byona ebi Yesu yaakozire , n'ebi yaayegyeise okwiha aha kutandika ,
44001002	okuhitsya aha izooba eri yaatwariirweho omu iguru , obwo aherize kuragiirira omuri Mutima Orikwera entumwa ze ezi yaabaire yaatooraine .
44001003	Ku yaaherize kufa , yaabeeyoreka emirundi mingi omu miringo erikuhamya ku ahuriire , kandi yaamara ebiro makumi ana naababonekyera , naabagambira eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga .
44001004	Ku yaabaire ari hamwe nabo aha byokurya , yaabeehanangiriza okutaruga muri Yerusalemu , kureka okutegyererezayo eki Ishe yaaraganiise . Yaabagira ati : Nikyo ekyo eki mwahuriire ningambaho nti :
44001005	Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi , kwonka imwe , omu biro bitari bingi okwiha hati , muryabatizibwa na Mutima Orikwera .
44001006	Abatendekwa ku baabaire bateeraniire hamwe , baabuuza Yesu bati : Mukama waitu , obu nibwo bunaku obu oraagarurireho Isiraeli obugabe ?
44001007	Yaabagarukamu ati : Ti kyanyu kumanya obunaku , nari ebiro ebi Tata yaataisizeho obushoboorozi bwe .
44001008	Kwonka imwe , Mutima Orikwera ku aribaijaho , muryaheebwa amaani , kandi muryaba baakareebi bangye omuri Yerusalemu n'omuri Buyudaaya yoona , na Samariya n'okuhitsya ahu ensi egarukira .
44001009	Ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , yaatwarwa ahaiguru nibamureeba , ekicu kyarugaho kyamubakingira .
44001010	Ku baabaire bakihangire eiguru amaisho naagyenda , ahonaaho haaboneka abashaija babiri bajwaire ebirikwera , beemereire haihi nabo .
44001011	Baabagira bati : Imwe Banyagalilaaya ' mwe , ekibeemereize aha nimureeba ahaiguru ni ki ? Yesu ogwo owaabaihwaho akatwarwa omu iguru , nikwo arigaruka atyo nk'oku mwamureeba naazayo .
44001012	Batyo abatendekwa baagaruka Yerusalemu , nibaruga omu rushozi orurikwetwa orw'Emioliva , oruri haihi na Yerusalemu , nk'orugyendo orwabaire rugyendwa ahari Sabato .
44001013	Ku baahikire omuri orwo rurembo , baaza omuri kaanyinaabiri ei baabaire batwiremu ; obwo bari : Petero na Yohaana , Yakobo na Andereya , Filipo na Tomasi , Baritolomaayo na Matayo , Yakobo mwene Alufaayo na Simooni enkunzi y'eihanga , na Yuda mwene Yakobo .
44001014	Abo boona bakaguma nibashaba bataireho munonga omutima kandi bakwataniise , hamwe n'abakazi bamwe na Mariya nyina wa Yesu na barumuna ba Yesu .
44001015	Omu biro ebyo Petero akeemerera ahagati ya beene waabo , abaabaire bari nka igana na makumi abiri omuri okwo kweteerana , yaabagira ati :
44001016	Beene waitu , ebyahandiikirwe bishemereire kuhikiirizibwa , ebi Mutima Orikwera yaagambiise Daudi , naaranga ebiriba ahari Yuda owaayehaireyo kwebembera abaakwatsire Yesu .
44001017	Manya Yuda akaba naabarirwa omuriitwe , kandi akwataniise naitwe omu buheereza bwaitu obu .
44001018	Nk'oku murikumanya , empiiha zi baamuguririire ahabw'ekicumuro kye , akaziguramu omusiri . Yuda ogwo akagwa bucuzi , yaabaruka , amara gaayohoka ;
44001019	kyamanywa ab'omuri Yerusalemu boona . Nikyo ogwo musiri gwayeeteirwe Akeludama omu rurimi rwabo , amakuru ngu , Omusiri gw'Eshagama .
44001020	Manya omu kitabo kya Zaaburi kihandiikirwe ngu : Eka ye ehindukye eitongo , hatarigira omuntu owaagituuramu . Kandi ngu : Omurimo gwe gutwarwe ondi .
44001021	N'ahabw'ekyo tushemereire kutoorana omuntu , owaabaire atuura naitwe obunaku bwona obu Mukama waitu Yesu yaamazire naagyenda naitwe ;
44001022	omuntu owaabaire ari hamwe naitwe , okwiha obu Yohaana yaabaire naabatiza , okuhitsya obu Yesu yaatwihwaho akatwarwa omu iguru . Omuntu nk'ogwo ashemereire kukora hamwe naitwe , ari kareebi w'okuzooka kwa Yesu .
44001023	Ku baaherize kureeta amaziina abiri g'ab'okutooranwa , Yosefu orikwetwa Barisaba , ou eiziina rye rya kabiri ryabaire riri Yusito , na Matiya ,
44001024	baashaba bati : Ai Mukama , iwe omanya emitima y'abantu boona , otworekye ahari aba bombi , ou waatoorana kutwara obuheereza obu ,
44001025	n'omwoga gw'obutumwa ogu Yuda yaatsigireho , akaza omu mwanya ogumushemeire .
44001026	Mpaho baabateerera enteenyu , yaakwata Matiya ; yaayongyerwa aha ntumwa ikumi n'emwe .
44002001	Ekiro kya Pentekooti ku kyahikire , boona baashangwa bateeraniire omu mwanya gumwe .
