44002002	Ahonaaho baahurira okuhoorera nk'okw'omuyaga gw'amaani nikuruga omu iguru . Kwaijura enju yoona ei baabaire bashutamimu ,
44002003	kandi baareeba ekirikushusha endimi z'omuriro ; ezo ndimi zaayebaganisamu , zaaza ahari buri omwe omuribo .
44002004	Boona baijura Mutima Orikwera , baatandika kugamba endimi ezindi nk'oku Mutima yaabahaire kuzigamba .
44002005	Obwo omuri Yerusalemu hakaba harimu Abayudaaya abeeziriki omu diini , abaabaire barugire omu mahanga goona g'omu nsi .
44002006	Ahabw'okuhoorera okwo , boona baateeranira hamwe bashobeirwe , ahabw'okuba buri omwe omuribo akahurira abo bantu nibagamba omu rurimi rw'owaabo .
44002007	Baatangaara bagwire omu kahuriko nibagira bati : Beitu aba bantu boona abarikugamba bati ti Abagalilaaya ?
44002008	Mbwenu kyaruga hi buri omwe omuriitwe kuhurira nibagamba omu rurimi rwaitu rw'enzaarwa ?
44002009	Haza turi Abapariti , Abameedi , Abeelamu ; abatwire Mesopotamiya , Buyudaaya na Kapadokiya ; Abaponto n'Abaasiya ,
44002010	Abafurugiya n'Abapanfuliya ; Abanyamisiri n'ab'ebicweka bya Libiya ebyehinguririize Kureene ; otaireho n'abagyenyi abarugire Rooma , Abayudaaya , n'abataahiibwe omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya ,
44002011	Abakureete n'Abaharabu ; twena nitubahurira nibeegyesa omu rurimi rwaitu ebikuru ebi Ruhanga yaakozire .
44002012	Boona baatangaara bashobeirwe oku baraakishoboorore , nibabuuzana amakuru gaakyo .
44002013	Abandi baabashekyeerera , nibagira bati : Beetiihire viino y'omutahe .
44002014	Bwanyima Petero akeemerera na bari ikumi n'omwe , yaagambira ekimbuuro ky'abantu n'eiraka rihango ati : Imwe bantu ba Buyudaaya ' mwe , naimwe abatwire Yerusalemu , murekye kucuramirirwa , kureka mutegye okutu eki naaza kubagambira .
44002015	Abantu aba tibasinzire nk'oku murikuteekateeka ; bakaasinzire bata , egi eri eshaaha ya kashatu ya nyomushana ?
44002016	Manya eki nikyo kyarangirwe omurangi Yoeli , ati :
44002017	Ruhanga akagira ati : Omu biro by'aha muheru , ndyashuka Mutima wangye aha bantu boona . Batabani baanyu , na bahara baanyu baryaranga , abatsigazi baanyu baryabonekyerwa , n'abagurusi baanyu baroote ebirooto .
44002018	Kandi abahuuku bangye n'abazaana bangye omu biro ebyo nabo ndyabashukaho Mutima wangye , barangye .
44002019	Ndyayoreka eby'okutangaaza ahaiguru omu iguru n'obumanyiso ahansi omu nsi .
44002020	Eizooba riryahinduka omwirima , n'okwezi kube eshagama , ekiro kya Mukama ekikuru kandi eky'ekitiinisa kitakahikire .
44002021	Kandi obwo , weena orihoogyera eiziina rya Mukama , aryajunwa .
44002022	Bantu ba Isiraeli ' mwe , nimuhurire eki naaza kugamba : Yesu owa Nazareeti akaba ari omuntu ou Ruhanga yaabahamiize n'eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso , ebi yaamukoreise akiri omuriimwe , nk'oku mwena murikukimanya .
44002023	Yesu ogwo owaahairweyo ahariimwe , nk'enaama ya Ruhanga ei yaacumire oku yaabaire eri , n'oku yaakimanyire kitakabaireho , mukamukwata , mwamurekurira abantu abatategyekwa iteeka ryaitu , baamubamba . Mukamwita ,
44002024	kwonka Ruhanga yaamuzoora omu bafiire , yaamwiha omu buhuruzi bwa rufu , ahabw'okuba kikaba kitarikubaasika we kuguma omu maino gaayo .
44002025	Na Daudi nikwo yaamugambireho ati : Nyakubaho niwe mpanga amaisho obutoosha , tihariho kibaasa kuntengyeetsa yaaba anyine .
44002026	Nikyo omutima gwangye gwesingiriza , orurimi rwangye rukatyongooza , n'omubiri gwangye gukabukaara ,
44002027	ahabw'okuba toritsiga magara gangye okuzimu , nari okureka nkunzi yaawe kujunda .
44002028	Okaanyoreka omuhanda gw'amagara , oryampa okunanuka kwingi , ori hamwe naanye .
44002029	Beene waitu , tihariho orikuhakana , ngu tatenkuriitwe Daudi tarafiire , akaziikwa ; reeba , n'ekituuro kye kiri aha ahi tutwire .
44002030	Kwonka nk'oku yaabaire ari omurangi , akamanya ku Ruhanga yaamurahiriire endahiro , ngu omwe aha baijukuru aryamuhungurira , aze aha kitebe ky'obugabe .
44002031	Eki yaareebire kare ekyo , akakigambaho , nikwo kuzooka kwa Kristo . Niwe ogwo otaratsigirwe kuzimu , kandi ou omubiri gwe gutararekirwe kujunda .
44002032	Ruhanga akazoora Yesu ogwo omu bafiire , naitwe twena turi baakareebi baakyo .
44002033	N'ahabw'kyo , Yesu ku yaaherize kutunguurwa akaza aha mukono gwa buryo gwa Ruhanga , n'okuheebwa Mutima Orikwera ou Ishe yaamuraganiise , niwe yaashuka ekyo eki murikureeba n'eki murikuhurira .
44002034	Manya Daudi we takatembaga mu iguru : kwonka ebi niwe yaabigambire ati : Nyakubaho akagambira Mukama wangye , ati : Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo ,
44002035	okuhitsya obu ndigira abazigu baawe , endibatiro y'ebigyere byawe .
44002036	N'ahabw'ekyo ab'enju ya Isiraeli boona bamanyire kimwe ku Yesu ogwo ou mwabambire , Ruhanga yaamuhindwire Mukama kandi Kristo .
44002037	Ku baahuriire ekyo , baayomeserezibwa omu mutima , baagira Petero n'entumwa ezindi bati : Beene waitu , tugire tuta ?
44002038	Petero yaabagarukamu ati : Mwegarukyemu , buri omwe omuriimwe abatizibwe omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo , mubone kusaasirwa ebibi byanyu ; kandi nimwija kuheebwa ekiconco kya Mutima Orikwera .
44002039	Ahabw'okuba okuraganisibwa okwo n'okwanyu n'abaana baanyu n'abandi boona abari hare , boona abu Mukama Ruhanga waitu aryeyetera .
44002040	Petero yaamara omwanya muraingwa naabashoboororera bingi , kandi yaabeehanangiriza ati : Mwerokore , murugye omu b'obusingye obu obuhabire .
44002041	Mpaho abaikiriize ebigambo bye baabatizibwa . Eryo izooba abantu nk'enkumi ishatu baayongyerwa aha mubaro gwabo .
44002042	Abo bakaguma nibeezirikira ebi entumwa zirikubeegyesa , nibakwatanisa nazo , nibacwamu nazo omugaati kandi nibashaba nazo .
44002043	Eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso bwingi ebyabaire nibikorwa entumwa , byareetera omuntu weena kutiina .
44002044	Abaikiriize abo boona bakaguma bari hamwe , nibakwatanisa omu bi batungire byona .
44002045	Bakaba batunda ebintu byabo n'ebi baine ; ebyarugamu babibagana , nibareeba aha bukyene bwa buri omwe .
44002046	Buri izooba bakaba baza kumwe omuri Nyaruju , kandi bateeranira hamwe omu maka gaabo kucwamu omugaati ; barya ebyokurya byabo bashemereirwe , baine omutima murungi ,
44002047	nibahimbisa Ruhanga kandi nibasiimwa abantu boona . Buri izooba Mukama yaaguma naabongyeraho abarikujunwa .
44003001	Eizooba rimwe Petero na Yohaana ku baabaire nibaza omuri Nyaruju ya Mukama kushaba , aha shaaha ya mwenda ya nyomushana ,
44003002	baareeba abaheekire omuntu nibamurabyaho . Ogwo muntu akaba azairwe ari ekirema , kandi buri izooba bakaba bamuta aha irembo rya Nyaruju , eririkwetwa Eirembo Erirungi , ngu abone kusheega abarikutaahamu .
44003003	Ogwo mushaija , ku yaareebire Petero na Yohaana nibaza kutaaha omuri Nyaruju , yaabashaba .
44003004	Petero na Yohaana bombi baamutsimba eriisho , baamugira bati : Tuhangye amaisho .
44003005	Ahonaaho yaabahanga amaisho aine amatsiko g'okutunga eki baraamuhe .
44003006	Kwonka Petero yaamugira ati : Nyowe tiinyine feeza nari ezaabu , kureka eki nyine nikyo ndaakuhe ; omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareeti , gyenda .
44003007	Petero atyo amukwata omukono gwa buryo , amwimutsya . Ahonaaho ebigyere bye n'obukongoijo bwe bihama ,
44003008	abandaituka , ayemerera , atandika kugyenda ; ataaha nabo omuri Nyaruju naagyenda , naayemurika , naahimbisa Ruhanga .
44003009	Abantu boona bamureeba naagyenda kandi naahimbisa Ruhanga .
44003010	Ku baamanyire ngu niwe mushaija ori , owaabaire ashutama naasheegyera aha Irembo Erirungi erya Nyaruju , boona baagwa omu katangaaro , batarikubaasa kushoboorora ekyamubaho .
44003011	Omushaija ogwo ku yaabaire akiramatiire ahari Petero na Yohaana omu kisasi ekirikwetwa ekya Solomooni , abantu boona baabaizira nibairuka , bari omu katangaaro kahango .
44003012	Petero ku yaabareebire , yaabagambira ati : Imwe Baisiraeli ' mwe , ahabw'enki eki nikibatangaaza ? Nari shi , nimutushamaaririra ki , okashusha oti niitwe twamugyendesa ahabw'amaani gaitu , nari ahabw'obushongore bwaitu ahari Ruhanga ?
44003013	Ruhanga wa Aburahamu , Isaaka na Yakobo , Ruhanga wa baatataitwe , niwe yaahimbisisa omuheereza we Yesu , ou mwahaireyo mukamwehakanira omu maisho ga Pilaato , owaabaire yaacwiremu kumurekura .
44003014	Niimwe mwatabaariize Orikwera kandi Ohikiriire ; hoona niimwe mwashabire omwitsi kurekurwa ,
44003015	mukaita okomookwaho amagara . Kwonka Ruhanga akamuzoora omu bafiire , kandi niitwe baakareebi baakyo .
44003016	Mwbenu eiziina rye n'okuriikiriza nibyo byagarura amaani omuri ogu mushaija , ou murikureeba ari aha , kandi ou murikumanya . Buzimazima okwikiriza Yesu nikwo kwagaruramu ogu mushaija amagara , nk'oku mwena murikureeba .
44003017	Mbwenu , beene waitu , nimmanya imwe n'abeebembezi baanyu ekyo ku mwakikoreise obushema ;
44003018	ahabw'okuba okwo nikwo Ruhanga yaahikiiriize eki yaagambiise kare abarangi boona , ngu Kristo we aryabonabonesibwa .
44003019	Mbwenu mwegarukyemu , mukubuukire Ruhanga , ebibi byanyu biihweho . Obwo nibwo Mukama araabahe obunaku bw'okuruhuukiramu ,
44003020	akabooherereza Kristo ou yaabateekateekyeire .
44003021	Niwe Yesu origuma omu iguru okuhitsya okugarurwa busya kwa byona , oku Ruhanga yaarangiise abarangi be abarikwera .
44003022	Manya Musa akagira ati : Mukama Ruhanga aryabaimukiza omurangi nkaanye , naamwiha omuri beene waanyu . Mushemereire kuhurira kyona eki arikubagambira .
44003023	Omuntu weena otarihurira murangi ogwo , aryacuubwa omu ihanga rye .
44003024	N'eky'amazima , abarangi boona abaarangire okwiha ahari Samueli n'okweyongyerayo , bakagamba aha biro ebi .
44003025	Imwe muri abaana b'abarangi , kandi abahunguzi b'endagaano ei Ruhanga yaaragaine na baatataitwe , obu yaagira Aburahamu ati : Omu ruzaaro rwawe , nimwo enganda zoona ez'omu nsi ziriheerwa omugisha .
44003026	Niimwe Ruhanga yaabandize kwimukiza omuheereza we , akamutuma kubaha emigisha , naiha buri omwe omuriimwe omu mitwarize yaanyu emibi .
44004001	Petero na Yohaana ku baabaire nibakigamba n'abantu , baayecura abahongyerezi baine omukuru w'abarinzi ba Nyaruju hamwe n'Abasadukaayo .
44004002	Abo bakagwisibwa kubi okuhurira entumwa ezo zombi nizeegyesa abantu , kandi nizibarangirira ku okuzooka kw'abafiire kubonekyeire omuri Yesu .
44004003	Batyo baabakwata , baabarindira omu kihome okuhitsya omu kasheeshe , ahabw'okuba bukaba bwabaire omwabazyo .
44004004	Kwonka baingi omu baahuriire obutumwa bwabo , bakaikiriza ; omubaro gwona ogw'abaikiriza gwayeyongyera , gwahika nk'enkumi itaano .
44004005	Aha izooba eryakuratsireho , abategyeki , abakuru b'enganda , n'abahangu b'eiteeka bakateeranira omuri Yerusalemu ,
44004006	hamwe na Anasi omuhongyerezi omukuru , Kayaafa , Yohaana , Alekisandero , na boona ab'omuryango gw'abahongyerezi abakuru .
44004007	Baayemereza ezo ntumwa omu maisho gaabo , baatandika kubabuuza bati : Imwe bashaija ' mwe , ni bushoboorozi ki obubakoreise eki , kandi mukikozire omu iziina ry'oha ?
44004008	Petero aijwire Mutima Orikwera nikwo kubagambira ati : Imwe bategyeki b'abantu n'abakuru b'enganda ' mwe ,
44004009	eri izooba ku muraabe nimutubuuza ekitukoreise eky'embabazi aha kirema n'oku kikiziibwe ,
44004010	mbwenu , imwe mwena hamwe n'abantu ba Isiraeli boona , mumanye eki : eiziina rya Yesu Kristo owa Nazareeti , ou mwabambire aha musharaba , Ruhanga akamuzoora omu bafiire , eiziina rye eryo niryo rikirize ogu muntu oyemereire omu maisho gaanyu .
44004011	Yesu ogwo niwe ibaare eri imwe abombeki mwayangire , rikahinduka obuhamizo bw'enju .
44004012	Kandi tihariho ndiijo u twakutungiramu okujunwa , ahabw'okuba omu maziina goona ageetwa abantu omu nsi , tihariho rindi iziina eri turi ab'okujunirwamu .
44004013	Ab'eishengyero ku baareebire obumanzi bwa Petero na Yohaana , haza nibabamanya ku bari abantu b'obutoosha abateegyesiibwe , baatangaara , kandi baabamanya ku baabaire batuura na Yesu .
44004014	Kwonka ku baareebire omuntu okiziibwe abeemereire aha rubaju , baaburwa eki baraabatabaarize .
44004015	Nikwo kubaragiira kwemerera aheeru y'eishengyero , bo bakaguma nibahanuura bonka na bonka ,
44004016	nibabuuzana bati : Mbwenu aba bantu tubagire tuta ? Ahabw'okuba akamanyiso akarikutangaaza kakozirwe abo bantu omu maisho g'ab'omuri Yerusalemu boona , ensi yoona neereeba , kandi titurikubaasa kukeehakana .
44004017	Kwonka ahabw'okwenda kubazibira kwongyera kubuzya ekyo kintu omu bantu , ka tubateise , barekyere aho kugambira omuntu weena omuri eryo iziina .
44004018	Batyo baabeeta , baabeehanangiriza kutagaruka kugamba bundi , nari kwegyesa omu iziina rya Yesu .
44004019	Kwonka Petero na Yohaana baabagarukamu bati : Naimwe mukireebe ku kiraabe kihikire omu maisho ga Ruhanga , okubahurira imwe okukira okuhurira Ruhanga .
44004020	Titurikubaasa kutagamba ebi twareebire n'ebi twahuriire .
44004021	Eishengyero ryagaruka ryabeehanangiriza , bwanyima ryabarekura . Manya tibarareebire buryo bw'okubahaisa ekifubiro , ahabw'okuba abantu boona bakaba nibahimbisa Ruhanga ahabw'ekibaireho .
44004022	Ahabw'okuba ogwo muntu owaakoreirweho aka kamanyiso k'okukizibwa , akaba arengize emyaka makumi ana y'obukuru .
44004023	Petero na Yohaana ku baaherize bati kurekurwa , baaza omu b'ekigombe kyabo , baabateekyerereza byona ebi abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru omu ihanga babagambiire .
44004024	Ku baabihuriire , boona hamwe baimukiza Ruhanga eiraka nibamushaba bati : Nyakusinga , niiwe waahangire eiguru n'ensi n'amayanja na byona ebirimu .
44004025	Niiwe waagambiire omuri Mutima Orikwera , okagambisa tataitwe Daudi omuheereza waawe , oti : Beitu n'enki ekireeteire amahanga kwimukiirira , n'abantu kuza omu naama zitaine muhoho ?
44004026	Abagabe b'ensi nibatenga orugamba , n'abategyeki nibacuma enaama y'okurwanisa Nyakubaho n'omusiigwa we .
44004027	N'ekya buzima , omuri oru rurembo Herode na Pontio Pilaato bakakwatanisa n'Abanyamahanga n'abantu ba Isiraeli , kurwanisa omuheereza waawe Ohikiriire Yesu ou waasiigire ,
44004028	obwo nibahikiiriza eki waamaririire ira omu maani gaawe n'omu bwengye bwawe ngu kibeho .
44004029	Mbwenu Mukama , reeba okukangisa kwabo , ohwere abaheereza baawe , bagambe ekigambo kyawe n'obumanzi bwingi .
44004030	Gorora omukono gwawe okize , kandi oikirize obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza bikorwe omu iziina ry'omuheereza waawe Ohikiriire Yesu .
44004031	Ku baaherize kushaba , omwanya ogu baabaire bateeraniiremu gwatengyeeta ; boona baijura Mutima Orikwera , baatandika kugamba ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'obumanzi .
44004032	Ekigombe kyona eky'abaikiriza kikaguma kikwataniise n'omutima gumwe . Tihariho owaabaire agira obunyakantu aha bi atungire , ahabw'okuba byona ebi baabaire batungire bikaba biri ebyabo boona hamwe .
44004033	Entumwa zaagumizamu n'amaani maingi nizigamba eby'okuzooka omu bafiire kwa Mukama Yesu , kandi zoona zaaguma nizisiimwa munonga .
44004034	Tihariho n'omwe omuribo owaabaire agira eki akyenire . Manya abaabaire baine ebibanja nari amaju , bakaba babitunda , batwara empiiha ezaabirugamu ,
44004035	bazimurikira entumwa ; reero zibaganisibwa , ziheebwa buri omwe nk'okwetenga kwe oku kwabaire kuri .
44004036	Hakaba hariho Omuleevi , enzaarwa ya Kupuro orikwetwa Yosefu , ou entumwa zaakubize Barinaba ( amakuru gaaryo ngu Kiteeramuhimbo ) .
44004037	Akaba aine ekibanja , yaakitunda , yaareeta empiiha zaakyo yaazimurikira entumwa .
44005001	Mbwenu hakaba hariho omushaija orikwetwa Ananiya . We n'omukazi we Safiira baikirizana kutunda aha bintu byabo .
44005002	Kwonka Ananiya ogwo yaatsigaza ekicweka ky'empiiha ezaarugiremu , omukazi we naakimanya ; yaareeta ezaatsigaireho , yaazimurikira entumwa .
44005003	Petero nikwo kumugira ati : Ananiya , Sitaane akwitsire ata omutima kubeiha Mutima Orikwera , okatsigaza ekicweka ky'empiiha z'ekibanja ?
44005004	Obu obaire okikiine , kibaire kitari ekyawe ? Kandi ku oherize kukitunda , empiiha zibaire zitari ezaawe kuzikoresa eki orikwenda ? Ekiteekateeko eki kikurugiire hi ? Tiwaabeiha bantu , kureka waabeiha Ruhanga .
44005005	Ananiya ku yaahuriire ebigambo ebyo , yaayetuura ahansi , yaakinuka . Ekyo kyatiinisa munonga boona abaakihuriire .
44005006	Abatsigazi baimuka , bazinga omutumbi gwe omu mwenda , baagushohoza , baaguziika .
44005007	Ku haahingwireho eshaaha nka ishatu , omukazi we yaija atarikumanya kyabaho .
44005008	Petero amwomesereza , naamugira ati : Ngambira , ogu nigwo mubaro gw'empiiha zi mwaiha omu kibanja ? Onu amugarukamu ati : Eego , nigwo ogwo .
44005009	Petero nikwo kumugira ati : Ahabw'enki iwe na baro mwikirizaine kugyeza Mutima wa Mukama ? Ekibakoreise ekyo ni ki ? Ohuriire egyo mitsindo ? Abo n'abaaruga kuziika baro ; mbwenu naiwe baaza kukushohoza .
44005010	Ahonaaho ogwo mukazi yaayetuura aha bigyere bya Petero , yaakinuka . Abatsigazi abo ku baataahiremu , baashanga yaafiire ; baamushohoza aheeru , nawe baamuziika aha rubaju rwa iba .
44005011	Ekyo kyatiinisa munonga ekigombe ky'abaikiriza n'abandi boona abaakihuriire .
44005012	Obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza bingi bikaba bikorwa entumwa omu bantu . Abaikiriza boona bakaba bateeranira omu kisasi kya Solomooni n'omutima gumwe .
44005013	Hakaba hatabaho n'omwe otari w'abaabo owaabaire ayehanga kuteerana nabo , nobu abantu baabaire babasiima munonga .
44005014	Kandi omubaro gw'abashaija n'abakazi abaikiriize Mukama gukaguma nigukanya ;
44005015	n'okutwara baatwara abarwaire baabo , baabarambika omu nguuto aha bitanda n'omu butanda , ngu abamwe aharibo bakaahikwaho ekinyimanyimi kya Petero , yaaba naahingura .
44005016	Kandi abantu bakaba bahimintika , nibaruga omu birorero ebihereereire Yerusalemu , bareetsire abarwaire baabo n'abarikwitwa kubi ebyago , haza boona bakira .
44005017	Bwanyima omuhongyerezi omukuru hamwe n'ab'omu kigombe ky'Abasadukaayo abu yaabaire aine , baimuka ahabw'eihari ,
44005018	baakwata entumwa , baazita omu kihome ekya boona .
44005019	Kwonka nyekiro maraika wa Nyakubaho yaigura enyigi z'ekyo kihome ; kandi ku yaabaire naabashohoza , yaabagira ati :
44005020	Mugyende , mwemerere omuri Nyaruju , mugambire abantu ebigambo byona eby'amagara masya .
44005021	Batyo baakora nk'oku baagambiirwe , baaza omuri Nyaruju nibwaba , baatandika kwegyesa . Omuhongyerezi omukuru ku yaizire , we n'abarikumukwatsa baayeta eishengyero erikuru ryona erya Isiraeli ; baatuma aha barinzi b'ekihome kubareetera ezo ntumwa .
44005022	Kwonka abakungu abaatumirwe ku baahikire omu kihome , baashanga batarimu , batyo baagarukayo , baabiteekyerereza abaabatumire bati :
44005023	Twashanga ekihome kikingiire kimwe , n'abarinzi bari aha miryango ; kwonka ku twakomoorora orwigi , twashanga hatarimu muntu n'omwe .
44005024	Omukuru w'abarinzi ba Nyaruju hamwe n'abahongyerezi abakuru ku baahuriire egyo nkuru , baatangaara batarikumanya oku abo bantu baabaire n'ekiraarugyemu .
44005025	Bwanyima haija omuntu , yaabareetera amakuru , naagira ati : Abashaija bu mutaire omu kihome , obwa hati beemereire omuri Nyaruju nibeegyesa abantu .
44005026	Ogwo mukuru w'abarinzi ba Nyaruju nikwo kugyenda n'abashaija be akareeta ezo ntumwa . Kwonka baatiina kubakwatisa amaani , ngu abantu batakaabateera amabaare .
44005027	Ku baabareetsire omu maisho g'eishengyero , omuhongyerezi omukuru yaababuuza ,
44005028	ati : Titurabeehanangiriize kutashubira kwegyesa omu iziina ry'ogwo muntu ? Mbwenu eki , mukozire ki ? Yerusalemu mugibugize enyegyesa yaanyu kandi nimureebeka mumaririire kuba niitwe mwataho orubanja rw'okufa kw'ori muntu .
44005029	Petero n'ezindi ntumwa nabo baamugarukamu bati : Manya itwe tushemereire kworobera Ruhanga okukira okworobera abantu .
44005030	Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe niwe yaazoire Yesu ogwo , ou mwaitsire mumuhanikire aha muti .
44005031	Mbwenu Ruhanga akamutunguura , yaamuta aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo kuba Omwebembezi kandi Omujuni , ngu abone kuhaisa Abaisiraeli okweteisa n'okusaasirwa ebibi .
44005032	Itwe turi baakareebi b'ebyo byona hamwe na Mutima Orikwera ou Ruhanga yaahaire abarikumworobera .
44005033	Ku baahuriire ebyo , ekiniga kyabacwa amaraka , baayenda kubaita .
44005034	Kwonka omwe aha b'eishengyero , Omufarisaayo orikwetwa Gamalieli , omwegyesa w'eiteeka kandi orikusiimwa abantu boona , akeemerera , yaashaba ku baba bashohoize abo bashaija aheeru .
44005035	Bwanyima yaagambira ab'eishengyero ati : Imwe bashaija ba Isiraeli ' mwe , mwerinde oku muraatwaze aba bantu .
44005036	Omu biro byahingwire , hakaba hariho Teuda owaabaire mubi rurangaanwa , akeehindura mukuru , abantu nka magana ana baamukuratira . Kwonka ku yaitsirwe , abaabaire nibamukuratira baataataana , ebyabo byagarukira aho .
44005037	Kandi hoona , omu biro by'orubaro , hakaba hariho Yuda Omunyagalilaaya , owaayetungiire abantu baingi b'okumukwatsa . Kwonka nawe akaitwa , abakuratsi be boona baataataana .
44005038	Mbwenu obwengye bu ndikubaha , n'okubareka bakagyenda . Enaama yaabo egi n'omurimo gwabo ku biraabe birugire omu bantu , nibiija kuhwaho byonka .
44005039	Kwonka ku biraabe birugire ahari Ruhanga , timurikwija kubaasa kubizibira , kureka nimwija kweshanga nimurwanisa Ruhanga .
44005040	Obwengye bu yaabahaire baabusiima , baagaruka baayeta ezo ntumwa , baaragiira kubaasha , baabeehanangiriza kutagarukira kugamba omu iziina rya Yesu , bwanyima baabarekura .
44005041	Batyo baaruga omu maisho g'eishengyero , nibeesiima ahabw'okuhiirwa bakahemurwa nibaturwa eryo iziina .
44005042	Baaguma nibeegyesa kandi nibarangirira buri izooba omuri Nyaruju n'omu maju g'abantu eby'Amakuru Marungi ga Yesu Kristo .
44006001	Omu bunaku obwo , omubaro gw'abaikiriza ku gwagyenzire nigukanya , Abayudaaya abarikugamba Oruguriiki baayetomboitera Abayudaaya abrikugamba Oruheburaayo omu by'okugabura okwa buri izooba , ahabw'okuba abafaakazi baabo bakaba batarikwetwaho .
44006002	N'ahabw'ekyo eikumi na babiri baayeta abaikiriza boona kuteerana , baabagambira bati : Tikihikire itwe okureka kurangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga , tukahugira aha kugabura ebyokurya .
44006003	Mbwenu , imwe beene waitu , mwetooranemu abantu mushanju abarikusiimwa , abaijwire Mutima n'obwengye , tubakwatse omurimo ogu .
44006004	Reero itwe nitwija kwemarira aha kushaba n'okwegyesa ekigambo kya Ruhanga .
44006005	Abaateeraine boona baasiima ekyo kigambo , baatoorana Sitefano , omuntu oine okwikiriza kwingi kandi oijwire Mutima Orikwera , na Filipo , Porookoro , Nikanoori , Timooni , Parimena , na Nikola owa Antiokiya , owaahindukire akataaha omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya .
44006006	Baabareeta omu maisho g'entumwa , zaabashabira , zaabataho engaro .
44006007	Ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyayeyongyera kubuga ; omubaro gw'abaikiriza gwakanya munonga omuri Yerusalemu , n'abahongyerezi baingi munonga baikiriza kukuratira enyikiriza egyo .
44006008	Sitefano , ou Ruhanga yaahaire emigisha mingi n'amaani , akatandika kukora eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso bikuru omu bantu .
44006009	Reero abantu baija baahakanisa Sitefano ogwo ; abamwe nibaruga omu iteeraniro eririkwetwa ery'Abaarekwirwe n'ab'ery'Abakureene n'ab'ery'Abaalekisanderiya n'abandi abaarugire Kilikiya na Asiya .
44006010	Kwonka tibarabaasize kumusinga , ahabw'okuba akaba aine obwengye kandi na Mutima amuhaire eby'okugamba .
44006011	Batyo baaguriirira ab'okumubeiherera bati : Tukahurira naagamba eby'okurogota ahari Musa n'ahari Ruhanga .
44006012	Ku baaherize kuteerana abantu hamwe n'abakuru omu ihanga n'abahangu b'eiteeka , baamugwaho kigurukano , baamukwata , baamutwara omu maisho g'eishengyero .
44006013	Okwo niyo baareeteire baamushinja b'ebishuba , abaagizire bati : Ogu mushaija tayosha kugamba kubi aha mwanya ogurikwera n'aha iteeka ryaitu .
44006014	Tukamuhurira naagira ngu Yesu owa Nazareeti naija kucwekyereza omwanya ogu , n'okuhindura emigyenzo ei Musa yaatutsigiire .
44006015	Boona ab'omu ishengyero baahanga Sitefano amaisho , kandi ahamaisho ge haashusha nk'ahamaisho ga maraika .
44007001	Omuhongyerezi omukuru akabuuza Sitefano ati : N'eky'amazima , nikwo kiri ?
44007002	Onu yaagarukamu ati : Beene waitu na baataata , nimuhurire ! Ruhanga ow'ekitiinwa akabonekyera tataitwe Aburahamu , akiri Mesopotamiya , atakatwire Harani ,
44007003	yaamugira ati : Ruga omu nsi yaanyu , n'omu b'oruganda rwanyu , oze mu nsi ei ndikworeka .
44007004	Atyo yaaruga Kalidaaya , yaatuura Harani . Bwanyima ishe ku yaafiire , Ruhanga yaamwihayo , yaamureeta omu nsi egi ei mutwiremu obwa hati .
44007005	Ruhanga taramuhaire nangwa n'ah'okuta ekigyere omuri egi nsi , ahu arikweta ahakwe ahabwe ; kwonka akamuraganisa kugimuha , na bwanyima ebe ey'abaijukuru , nobu araabe yaabaire ari encwekye .
44007006	Ebigambo ebi Ruhanga yaamugambiire naagamba nawe , nibigira ngu , abaijukuru baryazaahibwa omu rindi ihanga , ei baribeera abahuuku , bakamarayo emyaka magana ana nibahatwa .
44007007	Kandi ati : Kwonka eihanga eiribahindura abahuuku ndyaricwera orubanja , bwanyima barugyeyo , bandamize omu mwanya ogu .
44007008	Atyo Ruhanga yaakora na Aburahamu endagaano eyaahamiibwe omugyezo gw'okusharwa . Omutabani Isaaka ku yaazairwe , Aburahamu yaamushara aha kiro kya munaana . Isaaka nawe nikwo yaashazire Yakobo , na Yakobo akashara atyo baatataitwe ikumi na babiri .
44007009	Baatataitwe abo bakagirira Yosefu eihari , baamuguza abaamutwaire Misiri kuba omuhuuku . Kwonka Ruhanga yaaguma nawe ,
44007010	yaamurabya omu busaasi bwe bwona , yaamuha obwengye obwamureeteire kushongoka ahari Faraaho omugabe wa Misiri . Faraaho akahindura Yosefu ogwo omutegyeki mukuru wa Misiri , yaamuha n'okureeberera ekikaari kye kyona .
44007011	Bwanyima enjara ekateera Misiri yoona na Kanaani , yaazireetera omugango mwingi ; baatataitwe baabura ekyokurya .
44007012	Yakobo , ku yaahuriire ngu Misiri hariyo engano z'okushaka , yaayoherezayo baatataitwe omurundi gw'okubanza .
44007013	Bwanyima aha murundi gwa kabiri , Yosefu yaayetondera bakuru be , kandi obuzaare bwe bwamanywa Faraaho .
44007014	Mpaho Yosefu nikwo kutuma kureeta Yakobo ishe n'ab'oruganda rwe boona , abantu makumi mushanju na bataano ;
44007015	atyo Yakobo yaashuuma Misiri . We na baatataitwe ku baaherize kugwayo ,
44007016	emitumbi yaabo yaatwarwa Shekemu , yaaziikwa omu kituuro eki Aburahamu yaabaire aguzire ahari batabani ba Hamori omuri Shekemu .
44007017	Obu obunaku bw'okuhikiiriza eki Ruhanga yaabaire araganiise Aburahamu bwabaire buri haihi kuhika , eihanga ryaitu rikaba ryakanyire munonga omuri Misiri ,
44007018	okuhitsya obu omugabe musya , owaabaire atarikumanya Yosefu , yaagiire aha ngoma omuri Misiri .
44007019	Akeehindukiriza ab'eihanga ryaitu , akaita kubi baatataitwe , naabagyemesereza kunaga abeereere baabo , ngu batakaagumaho .
44007020	Obwo nibwo Musa yaazaarwa , ari omwana murungi orikusiimwa Ruhanga . Akamara ameezi ashatu naarererwa omwa ishe ;
44007021	kandi ku baaherize kumunaga , muhara wa Faraaho yaamutwara , yaamworora nk'omwana we .
44007022	Musa yaayegyesibwa atyo eby'obwengye bw'Abanyamisiri byona , yaaba omushaija w'amaani omu bi arikugamba n'omu bi arikukora .
44007023	Musa ku yaahikize emyaka makumi ana y'obukuru , yaagira ekiteekateeko ky'okuza kureeba abantu b'eihanga rye Abaisiraeli .
44007024	Ku yaareebire omwe omuribo naatwazibwa kubi , yaamurwanaho , yaamuhoorera , yaita Omunyamisiri .
44007025	Akateekateeka ngu beene ishe nibaija kumanya ku niwe Ruhanga atumire kubaiha omu buhuuku , kwonka bo tibaakimanya .
44007026	Eizooba eryakuratsireho , ku yaashangire bamwe omuribo nibarwana , yaateeraho kubagarukanisa , yaabagira ati : Bagyenzi bangye , ka muri eishe-emwe , ahabw'enki nimushaagizana ?
44007027	Kwonka omushaija owaabaire naashaagiza mugyenzi we , yaamwesha naagira ati : N'oha owaakutaireho kuba omutegyeki kandi omuramuzi waitu ?
44007028	Nooyenda kuunyita nk'oku oitsire Omunyamisiri nyomwabazyo ?
44007029	Musa ku yaakihuriire , yaahunga , yaaza kutuura omu nsi ya Midiyani , ei yaazaariire abatabani babiri .
44007030	Ku haahingwireho emyaka makumi ana , maraika yaabonekyera Musa omu ndimi z'omuriro , ogwabaire nigwakira omu rushaka omu ihamba , haihi n'Orushozi Sinai .
44007031	Musa ku akireeba , kimutangaaza . Ku airira haihi kukyetegyereza , ahurira eiraka rya Nyakubaho nirimugira riti :
44007032	Niinye Ruhanga wa baashwenkuru , Ruhanga wa Aburahamu na Isaaka na Yakobo . Musa atetema , atiina kureebayo obundi .
44007033	Nyakubaho amugira ati : Juura enkaito zaawe , ahabw'okuba omwanya ogu oyemereiremu n'ogurikwera .
44007034	Buzimazima ndeebire oku abantu bangye barikwitwa kubi omuri Misiri , mpuriire entsinda yaabo ; hati naija kubaiha omu buhuuku . Mbwenu ija , nkutume Misiri .
44007035	Musa ori , ou baayangire obu baagira bati : N'oha owaakutaireho kuba omutegyeki kandi omuramuzi waitu , mbwenu niwe Ruhanga yaatuma kuba omwebembezi kandi omucunguzi , naahwerwa maraika owaamubonekyeire omu rushaka .
44007036	Niwe Musa owaaherize kukora eby'okutangaaza n'obumanyiso omuri Misiri , akabaihayo naabarabya omu Nyanja Erikutukura n'omu ihamba , okumara emyaka makumi ana .
44007037	Kandi Musa ogwo niwe yaagambiire Abaisiraeli ati : Ruhanga aryabaimukiza omurangi nkaanye , arugye omuri beene waanyu .
44007038	Niwe ogwo owaabaire aine Abaisiraeli obu baateranira omu ihamba , hamwe na maraika owaamugambiriire aha Rushozi Sinai , kandi akagamba na baatataitwe . Niwe ogwo owaakwatsiibwe ebigambo by'amagara kubituha .
44007039	Ogwo niwe baatataitwe baayangire kworobera , bakamwesha ; omu mitima yaabo bakagaruka Misiri ,
44007040	nibagira Arooni bati : Tukorere baaruhanga , batwebembere , ahabw'okuba titurikumanya oku Musa , owaatwihire omuri Misiri , abaire .
44007041	Batyo baaheesha ekimasha , baahongyera ekyo kishushani ebitambo , bashemerererwa ekyo kintu ki baayekoreire .
44007042	Ruhanga nikwo kubatsigaho , akabareka , bakaramya amahe g'eby'omu iguru , nk'oku ebyahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'abarangi birikugira ngu : Imwe b'enju ya Isiraeli ' mwe , nimugira ngu omu ihamba eri mwamaziremu emyaka makumi ana , niinye mwahongyeire ebihongwa , mukantambira n'ebitambo ?
44007043	Ngaaha , manya ebi mwaheekire aha mabega , n'eihema rya Moleki hamwe n'enyonyoozi y'emandwa Refani , ebyo bishushani ebi mwakozire kuramya . N'ahabw'ekyo ndyabazaasya , mbahinguze Babulooni .
44007044	Baatataitwe obu baabaire bakiri omu ihamba , bakaba baine Eihema ry'Obutaaho bwa Ruhanga eryabaire rikozirwe nk'oku Ruhanga yaaragiire Musa , naamugambira kurikora naareebera aha rugyero oru yaamworekire .
44007045	Eryo ihema baatataitwe bakaguma nibaritsigirana , okuhitsya obu Yoshua yaarihikize omu nsi ei twakubwire , tuginyagire amahanga agu Ruhanga yaabingiremu nitukihikamu . Ryaguma omwo okuhitsya omu busingye bwa Daudi ,
44007046	owaashongokire ahari Ruhanga , akamushaba kumwikiriza kumwombekyera Nyaruju ya Ruhanga wa Yakobo ;
44007047	Solomooni nobu araabe niwe yaayombekire egyo nju .
44007048	Kwonka Rukiraboona we tatuura mu nju eyombekirwe emikono y'abantu , nk'oku Mukama yaagambiire omu murangi ati :
44007049	Eiguru n'ekitebe kyangye ky'obugabe , n'ensi n'endibatiro yangye . Mbwenu ni nju ki ei mwakuunyombekyera ? Ni mwanya ki ogu mwakumbonereza kuhuumuriramu ?
44007050	Ebyo byona tiinye naabikozire n'omukono gwangye ?
44007051	Imwe ntahurira ' mwe , ab'emitima egangaire n'amatu gaigaire nk'ag'Abanyamahanga , obutoosha mwangira Mutima Orikwera nka baatataitwe oku baabaire bagira .
44007052	Harabaireho omurangi n'omwe ou baatataitwe batarahiiganiise ? Omu biro byahingwire bakaita entumwa za Ruhanga ezaarangire eby'okwija kw'Orikwera we Ohikiriire , ou imwe mwareebize mukaita ,
44007053	imwe , abaahairwe eiteeka murireeteirwe baamaraika , haza mukanga kuryorobera .
44007054	Ab'eishengyero ku baahuriire ebyo , ekiniga kyabacwa amaraka , baanenera Sitefano amaino .
44007055	Na Sitefano ogwo aijwire Mutima Orikwera yaaranzya omu iguru , yaareeba Ruhanga ow'ekitiinwa , na Yesu amwemereire aha rubaju rwa buryo .
44007056	Yaagira ati : Nindeeba eiguru rishuuruukire , n'Omwana w'omuntu ayemereire aha rubaju rwa Ruhanga orwa buryo .
44007057	Boona ku baahuriire ekyo , baayogoorekana , baayekwata aha matu , baamweshukaho ,
44007058	baamushohoza aheeru y'orurembo , baamuteera amabaare . Baamushinja be baanaga emyenda yaabo aha bigyere by'omutsigazi orikwetwa Saulo .
44007059	Ku baabaire nibateera Sitefano amabaare , yaahooga ati : Ai Mukama Yesu , yakiira amagara gangye .
44007060	Atyo yaatsimba amaju , yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Ai Mukama , otabatura ekibi eki . Ku yaaherize kugamba ekyo , yaakaba . Na Saulo yaasiima okwitwa kwe .
44008001	Eryo izooba ab'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Yerusalemu baatandika kuhiiganisibwa munonga . Boona , okwihaho entumwa , baataataanira omu byanga bya Buyudaaya na Samariya .
44008002	Kwonka abantu abarikutiina Ruhanga baaziika Sitefano ogwo , baamucurira munonga .
44008003	Saulo nawe yaakora kyona eki arikubaasa kuhwerekyereza abaikiriza , yaataaha omuri buri nju , yaakwata abashaija n'abakazi , yaaboohereza omu kihome .
44008004	Abo baikiriza abaataataine bakagyendagyenda nibabuzya Amakuru Marungi .
44008005	Omwe omuribo ni Filipo , owaagiire omu kirorero ky'omuri Samariya , akabagambira ebya Kristo .
44008006	Ekimbuuro ky'abantu , ku baahuriire ebi Filipo arikugamba , baareeba n'obumanyiso obu arikukora , baikiriza n'omutima gumwe ebi arikwegyesa .
44008007	Kandi baingi abaabaire batembirwe ebyago byabarugaho nibyamuza , na baingi abaabaire bazingazingirwe n'abarema baakizibwa .
44008008	Haabaho okushemererwa kwingi omuri ekyo kirorero .
44008009	Kwonka omuri ekyo kirorero hakaba harimu omushaija orikwetwa Simooni , owaabaire naakora emigyereko , naatangaaza Abanyasamariya . Akaba naayeyeta omuntu mukuru ,
44008010	kandi boona okuruga aha muto okuhika aha mukuru baamwemamu , nibagira bati : Ogu niwe maani ga Ruhanga agarikwetwa Rugambwa .
44008011	Ekyo bakakikora ahabw'okuba akaba amazire nabo omwanya muraingwa naabakorera egyo migyereko .
44008012	Kwonka ku baikiriize Amakuru Marungi , agu Filipo yaabagambiire aha by'obukama bwa Ruhanga n'aha by'eiziina rya Yesu Kristo , abashaija n'abakazi baabatizibwa .
44008013	Simooni nawe yaikiriza . Ku yaaherize kubatizibwa , yaaguma na Filipo naareeba obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza ebikuru ebi Filipo yaabaire naakora , kandi nibimutangaaza .
44008014	Omuri Yerusalemu entumwa ku zaahuriire ngu ab'omu Samariya baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga , zaabatumaho Petero na Yohaana .
44008015	Nabo ku baahikireyo , baashabira Abanyasamariya kuheebwa Mutima Orikwera ,
44008016	ahabw'okuba hakaba hatariho n'omwe omuribo ou yaabaire yaizireho , kureka bakaba babatiziibwe , omu iziina rya Mukama Yesu kwonka .
44008017	Batyo Petero na Yohaana baabataho engaro , baaheebwa Mutima Orikwera .
44008018	Simooni ku yaareebire baaheebwa Mutima ahabw'entumwa kubataho engaro , yaaha Petero na Yohaana empiiha ,
44008019	naagira ati : Naanye mumpe obushoboorozi nk'obwo , weena ou ndaateho engaro aheebwe Mutima Orikwera .
44008020	Petero yaamugarukamu ati : Haza ogira ngu ekiconco kya Ruhanga nikigurwa empiiha ? Kakyengyere n'ezo mpiiha zaawe !
44008021	Ekyo tokiinemu mugabo kandi tori w'okukibagana , ahabw'okuba omutima gwawe tiguri gye omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
44008022	Yeteise ekyo kibi kyawe , oshabe Mukama akusaasire ahabw'okuteekateeka otyo .
44008023	Manya nindeeba ku oitsirwe eihari , kandi ku obohirwe enjegyere z'ekibi .
44008024	Simooni nikwo kubagarukamu ati : Naimwe munshabire ahari Mukama , ebyo ebi mwagamba hatagira ekyambaho .
44008025	Ku baaherize kugamba ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'okukihamya , baagaruka Yerusalemu nibarangirira ab'omu byaro bya Samariya Amakuru Marungi .
44008026	Maraika wa Nyakubaho yaagambira Filipo ati : Imuka , oze ogw'obukiizi-bwa-buryo , otoore omuhanda gw'eihamba , ogurikuruga Yerusalemu nigurunduka Gaaza .
44008027	Atyo yaimuka yaagyenda . Mbwenu hakaba hariho Omunyaetiopiya omushaahu , owaabaire agiire Yerusalemu kuramya , ari omutegyeki omu kikaari kya Kandaake , Omugabekazi wa Etiopiya , kandi ari omubiiki we omukuru .
44008028	Obwo akaba ari omu rugyendo rwe naagaruka owaabo . Ku yaabaire ashutami omu kigaari kye , yaashoma ekitabo kya Isaaya omurangi ,
44008029	Mutima yaagambira Filipo ati : Irooko ohikye ekigaari kiriya .
44008030	Filipo ku yaakihikire , yaamuhurira naashoma ekitabo kya Isaaya omurangi ; yaamubuuza ati : Beitu ebi orikushoma noobyetegyereza ?
44008031	Onu yaamugarukamu ati : Nimbaasa nta kubyetegyereza , ntaine orikubinshoboororera ? Atyo ayeta Filipo kuza omu kigaari , ashutama nawe .
44008032	Mbwenu ekicweka ky'omu Byahandiikirwe eki yaabaire naashoma , kikaba nikigira kiti : Akaba nk'entaama erikutwarwa omu ibaagiro ; yaaba nk'akataama akatateeza kari omu maisho g'orikukashara ebyoya . Nawe nikwo ataraashamize kanwa ke .
44008033	Akabundikwa , yaabura ow'okumurwanaho . N'oha orishoboorora ab'oruzaaro rwe , amagara ge omu nsi ku garaabe gaacwirweho !
44008034	Omushaahu nikwo kuhindukira Filipo akamugira ati : Ngambira , omurangi naayegambaho , nari naagamba aha ndiijo muntu ?
44008035	Filipo yaatandikira aha kicweka ekyo eky'omu Byahandiikirwe , okuhitsya obu yaamushoboororeire eby'Amakuru Marungi ga Yesu .
44008036	Ku baagumiizemu , baarugaho baahika aha maizi . Ogwo mushaahu yaagira ati : Amaizi ka gari aha , ekirikunzibira kubatizibwa ni ki ?
44008037	[ Ndi Filipo , ati : Ku oraabe noikiriza n'omutima gwawe gwona nikibaasika . Agarukamu ati : Niinyikiriza ku Yesu ari Omwana wa Ruhanga . ]
44008038	Atyo aragiira ab'ekigaari kwemerera . Bwanyima Filipo n'omushaahu baragara omu maizi , Filipo amubatiza .
44008039	Ku baagatuuhuukiremu , Filipo yaatwarwa Mutima wa Mukama ; omushaija ogwo omushaahu tiyaamucwa ryera bundi ; yaagumizamu omuhanda ashemereirwe munonga .
44008040	Filipo ku yaagiire kugira ati , yaayeshanga yaahikire Azooto ; yaagumizamu orugyendo rwe naarangirira abantu Amakuru Marungi omuri buri kirorero , yaarugaho yaahika Kaisaariya .
44009001	Omu biro ebyo Saulo akaba naahayira abatendekwa ba Mukama kubaita . Yaaza ow'omuhongyerezi omukuru ,
44009002	yaamushaba amabaruha g'okutwarira ab'omu mateeraniro g'omuri Damasiko , ngu gamuhe obushoboorozi bw'okukwata n'okutwara Yerusalemu abarikukuratira Omuhanda gwa Mukama boona , yaaba bashaija nari abakazi , abu araashangyeyo .
44009003	Ku yaabaire naaza Damasiko , ari haihi kuhika omuri ekyo kirorero , ahonaaho haija ekimurinkano , ekirikuruga omu iguru , kyamwehinguririza .
44009004	Yaagwa ahansi , yaahurira eiraka eririkugira riti : Saulo , Saulo , nompiiganisiza ki ?
44009005	Nawe yaabuuza ati : Niiwe oha , Mukama wangye ? Eiraka ryamugarukamu riti : Niinye Yesu ou orikuhiiganisa .
44009006	Mbwenu imuka , oze omu kirorero , niyo oraagambirirwe eki oraakore .
44009007	Abashaija abaabaire nibagyenda nawe baayemerera babuzirwe eky'okugamba , ahabw'okuba bakahurira eiraka , kwonka tibaareeba muntu n'omwe .
44009008	Saulo yaimuka ahansi , haza ku yaabuurwire amaisho , tiyaahweza n'akakye ; abantu nikwo kumukwatira ekihimbo , bakamutwara Damasiko .
44009009	Akamara ebiro bishatu atarikuhweza , kandi atarikurya nobu kwakuba okunywa .
44009010	Mbwenu hakaba hariho omutendekwa orikwetwa Ananiya , owaabaire atwire Damasiko . Omutendekwa ogwo akabonekyerwa , yaahurira Mukama naamweta ati : Ananiya . Onu ati : Ndi aha , Mukama wangye .
44009011	Mukama yaamugira ati : Imuka , oze mu muhanda ogurikwetwa Ogugororokire , obuurize omu b'oruganda rwa Yuda , omuntu orikwetwa Saulo , orugire Taruso . Omuri aga magingo naashaba ,
44009012	kandi yaabonekyeirwe ku omuntu orikwetwa Ananiya arikwija kutaahamu , akamutaho engaro kumuhumuura .
44009013	Ananiya amugarukamu ati : Mukama wangye , abantu baingi ka bangambiire eby'ogwo mushaija , n'oku abaire naakora kubi munonga abarikwera baawe omuri Yerusalemu .
44009014	Na mbwenu aizire aha aine obushoboorozi obu ahairwe abahongyerezi abakuru , kuboha omuntu weena orikuhoogyera eiziina ryawe .
44009015	Mukama yaamugarukamu ati : Nobu kiraabe kiri kityo , hoona ozeyo , ahabw'okuba omushaija ogwo niwe nyetooraniire ahabwa eiziina ryangye omu Banyamahanga , omu bagabe baabo n'omu bantu ba Isiraeli .
44009016	Manya niinyija kumworeka oku ari ow'okubonabona ahabwangye .
44009017	Mpaho Ananiya atyo agyenda , ataaha omu nju , ata engaro ahari Saulo , naagira ati : Munyaruganda Saulo , naatumwa Mukama Yesu okureebekyeire noija kunu , ngu ohumuukye , oijure Mutima Orikwera .
44009018	Ahonaaho Saulo oshusha oti akabubi kaamukokooka aha maisho , mpaho ahumuuka , aimuka , abatizibwa .
44009019	Ku aheza kurya , agarukwamu amaani . Saulo ku yaamazire ebiro bikye n'abatendekwa omuri Damasiko ,
44009020	yaatandika kwegyesa omu mateeraniro , ku Yesu ari Omwana wa Ruhanga .
44009021	Boona abaamuhuriire baatangaara nibagira bati : Beitu ogu t'omushaija obaire naahiiganisiza omuri Yerusalemu abarikuhoogyera eryo iziina ? Kandi ekimureetsire , t'okubakwata akabatwarira abahongyerezi abakuru bakomirwe ?
44009022	Saulo akongyera kutunga amaani , yaaremeseza kimwe Abayudaaya aba Damasiko , naahamya ku Yesu ari Kristo .
44009023	Ku haahingwireho ebiro bingi , Abayudaaya baacuma enaama y'okumwita ;
44009024	haza egyo naama yaamanywa Saulo . Ahabw'okwenda kumwita , baaguma bamugwereire aha marembo nyomushana na nyekiro .
44009025	Kwonka abakuratsi be baamutwara nyekiro , baamurengyeza aha kisiika nibamushuumiza omu kigagara .
44009026	Saulo ku yaahikire Yerusalemu , yaateeraho kwehitsya abatendekwa , kwonka boona baamutiina , ahabw'okutaikiriza ngu nawe buzimazima n'omutendekwa .
44009027	Barinaba nikwo kumutwarira entumwa , akabashoboororera oku Mukama yaabonekyeire Saulo ogwo , akagamba nawe ari omu rugyendo , kandi n'oku Saulo yaarangiriire n'obumanzi omu iziina rya Yesu omuri Damasiko .
44009028	Okwiha obwo , Saulo yaatandika kugyenda nabo omuri Yerusalemu yoona
44009029	naarangirira omu iziina rya Mukama atarikutiina . Mbwenu ku yaaherize kugamba n'Abayudaaya abarikugamba Oruguriiki n'okuhakana nabo , baamuhiiga kumwita .
44009030	Abanyaruganda ku baakimanyire , baamutwara Kaisaariya , bwanyima baamwohereza Taruso .
44009031	Ab'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Buyudaaya yoona , Galilaaya na Samariya baatsigara baine obusingye , nibatiina Ruhanga omu mitwarize yaabo ; reero ahabw'okuheebwa Mutima Orikwera , baakanya kandi baahama .
44009032	Petero akagyenda naataayaayira abarikwera boona , yaahika n'omu batwire Luda .
44009033	Okwo niyo yaashangire omushaija orikwetwa Aineya , owaabaire amazire emyaka munaana azingazingirwe , atarikuruga ha kitanda .
44009034	Petero yaamugira ati : Aineya , Yesu Kristo yaakukiza ; imuka oyeyarire . Ahonaaho yaimuka .
44009035	Boona abaabaire batwire Luda na Sharooni baamureeba , baahinduka , baaba aba Mukama .
44009036	Omuri Yopa hakaba hariyo omutendekwakazi orikwetwa Tabita , omu Ruguriiki niwe Dorika , owaabaire ateeganda kukora ebirungi n'okuhwera abanaku .
44009037	Omu biro ebyo akarwara , yaafa . Baamwozya , baamuta omu kishengye eky'omuri kaanyinaabiri .
44009038	Manya Luda teri hare na Yopa . N'ahabw'ekyo abatendekwa ku baahuriire ngu Petero niyo ari , baamutumaho abashaija babiri , nibamugira bati : Ija ahonaaho otuhikyeho .
44009039	Petero nikwo kugyenda nabo . Ku yaahikireyo , baamutwara omuri kaanyinaabiri egyo , ei abafaakazi baamuturukire oku n'oku nibarira , nibamworeka ebiteeteyi n'ebindi bijwaro ebi Dorika yaabaziire akiri hamwe nabo .
44009040	Petero yaababinga boona omu kishengye , yaatsimba amaju , yaashaba Ruhanga . Ku yaaherize , yaahindukira ogwo mukazi ofiire , yaamugira ati : Tabita , yemerera . Onu yaabuuruura amaisho , yaagata ahari Petero , yaashutama .
44009041	Petero yaamukwata omukono , yamwemereza , bwanyima yaayeeta abaikiriza n'abafaakazi , yaamubooreka ahuriire .
44009042	Aba Yopa boona baahurira egyo nkuru ; baingi baikiriza Mukama .
44009043	Petero yaamara ebiro omuri Yopa , naaraara omw'omuhazi w'empu orikwetwa Simooni .
44010001	Omuri Kaisaariya hakaba harimu omushaija orikwetwa Korinelio , omukuru w'omutwe gw'omu ihe ry'Abarooma ogurikwetwa ogw'Abaitaliya .
44010002	Korinelio ogwo akaba ari omunyadiini , we n'ab'eka ye nibatiina Ruhanga . Akaba agabira Abayudaaya abooro aha bintu bye , kandi ashaba Ruhanga obutoosha .
44010003	Eizooba rimwe nk'aha shaaha ya mwenda akabonekyerwa , yaareeba butunu maraika wa Ruhanga naataaha omu nju ye , naamweta ati : Korinelio !
44010004	Onu yaamuhanga amaisho aitsirwe obwoba , yaamwetaba ati : N'enki , Mukama wangye ? Maraika yaamugarukamu ati : Ruhanga asiimire okushaba kwawe n'okugaba kwawe , naiwe yaakwijuka .
44010005	Mbwenu tuma abantu Yopa , beeteyo omushaija orikwetwa Simooni Petero ,
44010006	orikuraara omwa Simooni omuhazi w'empu , ou enju ye eri aha rubaju rw'enyanja .
44010007	Maraika owaagambire ebyo ku yaagyenzire , Korinelio yaayeta babiri aha baheereza be , hamwe n'omuserukare omunyadiini ow'omu baserukare be abarikumurinda .
44010008	Yaabagambira ekyabaho , bwanyima yaabatuma Yopa .
44010009	Eizooba eryakuratsireho , ku baabaire nibakigyenda , batsigaizeyo orugyendo rukye kuhika ekirorero , aha shaaha nk'eya mukaaga , Petero yaatemba aha mutwe gw'enju kushaba .
44010010	Ago magingo yaagira enjara , yaayenda kurya . Ku baabaire nibakiboneza ebyokurya , yaabonekyerwa nk'orikuroota ,
44010011	yaareeba eiguru rishuuruukire , kandi ekintu ekirikushusha omwenda muhango nikushuuma kuhika ahansi , nikirengyerera aha nshonda zaakyo ina ,
44010012	kirimu emiringo yoona ey'enyamaishwa n'ey'enyonyi z'omu mwanya n'ebirikugyendesa enda .
44010013	Mpaho ahurira eiraka nirimugira riti : Petero , imuka , obiite , obirye .
44010014	Petero agarukamu ati : Mbirimba , Mukama wangye ! Nyowe tinkaryaga kintu kyona ekirikuzira nari ekihagaro .
44010015	Kwonka eiraka rigaruka rimugira riti : Eki Ruhanga yaayerize , otarikyeeta ekirikuzira .
44010016	Ekyo kyayekuratana kityo kashatu . Bwanyima ogwo mwenda gwona gwanyururwa , gwagarukayo omu iguru ahonaaho .
44010017	Petero ku yaabaire akishobeirwe amakuru g'eki yaareeba , abashaija abaabaire batumirwe Korinelio baayegaranjura aho . Bakaba baahabwize ahu enju ya Simooni eri ; batyo baija , baayemerera aha rwigi ,
44010018	nibabuuza bati : Aha hariho omugyenyi orikwetwa Simooni Petero ?
44010019	Obwo Petero ku yaabaire naakyebuuza kumanya amakuru g'ebi yaayorekwa , Mutima yaamugira ati : Reeba , hariho abashaija bashatu abarikukusherura .
44010020	Rahuka oshuume , kandi otabangaanisa kugyenda nabo , ahabw'okuba niinye naabatuma kwija aha .
44010021	Petero atyo ashuuma , abagira ati : Niinye ou murikusherura ; beitu ekyabareeta ni ki ?
44010022	Nabo bamugarukamu bati : Korinelio omukuru w'abaserukare , omuntu ohikiriire , orikutiina Ruhanga kandi orikusiimwa Abayudaaya boona , ahabwirwe maraika orikwera kukweta n'okukutwara owe , ngu ahurire ebi oraagambe .
44010023	Petero atyo abataasya omu nju , abaha oburaaro . Ku bwaseesire , yaimuka , yaagyenda nabo ashendekyereziibwe bamwe aha banyaruganda ba Yopa .
44010024	Kaisaariya bakagihika aha izooba eryakuratsireho . Baashanga Korinelio abategyereize , ayetsire abanyabuzaare n'abanyamukago kubaho .
44010025	Petero ku yaabaire naakihika ahari egyo nju , Korinelio yaashohora kumutangirira , yaatsimba amaju aha bigyere bye , yaajuumara kumuramya .
44010026	Kwonka Petero amwimutsya , amugira ati : Imuka , naanye ndi omuntu nyabuntu .
44010027	Baagyenda nibagaaniira , baataaha omu nju , baashangamu baingi abaabaire bateeraniiremu .
44010028	Petero yaabagira ati : Nimumanya ku kirikuzira Abayudaaya kweturaaniza n'abantu b'erindi ihanga n'okubataayaayira . Kwonka Ruhanga akinshoboororeire gye , ku ntashemereire kweta omuntu weena ekirikuzira nari ekihagaro .
44010029	Nikyo ntangiire kwija baanyeeta . Mbwenu nu , niinyenda kumanya eki muunyeeteire .
44010030	Korinelio amugarukamu ati : Ebiro bina ebihingwire , nk'eshaaha mwenda z'omu mwabazyo , mbaire ndi omu nju yangye ninshaba ; ku ngiire kugira nti , naareeba omu maisho gangye omushaija ojwaire ebirikumwamwatikana ,
44010031	yangira ati : Korinelio , Ruhanga ahuriire okushaba kwawe , kandi yaijuka okugaba kwawe .
44010032	Mbwenu tuma Yopa , oyeteyo Simooni Petero , orikuraara omwa Simooni omuhazi w'empu , aha rubaju rw'enyanja .
44010033	Naanye nikwo kukutumaho ahonaaho , kandi waakora gye kwija . N'ahabw'ekyo twena twateeranira aha omu maisho ga Ruhanga kuhurira ebi Mukama akuragiire kutugambira .
44010034	Petero nikwo kubagambira ati : Mbwenu naamanya Ruhanga ku atashoroora mu bantu ,
44010035	kureka omuntu weena owa ibara ihanga omutiina akakora ebihikire , niwe asiima .
44010036	Ruhanga akooherereza Abaisiraeli ekigambo kye , kubamanyisa Amakuru Marungi g'obusingye , naakirabya omuri Yesu Kristo , Mukama w'abantu boona .
44010037	Ningira ngu nimumanya ebyabaireho omuri Buyudaaya ebya Yesu owa Nazareeti , nk'oku yaatandikiire omuri Galilaaya , Yohaana yaaherize kurangirira eby'okubatizibwa .
44010038	Ruhanga akamusiigisa Mutima Orikwera , hamwe n'amaani . Mbwenu ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akaba ari hamwe nawe , Yesu ogwo akaba agyenda hoona naakora ebirungi , kandi naakiza boona abaabaire nibaitwa kubi Sitaane .
44010039	Reero nyowe n'abu nyine , turi baakareebi b'ebyo byona ebi Yesu yaakoreire omuri Buyudaaya n'omuri Yerusalemu , n'oku baamwitsire bamuhanikire aha muti .
44010040	Kwonka aha kiro kya kashatu Ruhanga akamuzoora , yaamubaasisa kureebwa ,
44010041	ti bantu boona , kureka baakareebi abu Ruhanga yaatooraine kare . Manya niitwe baakareebi abaariire nawe , tukanywa nawe aherize kuzooka omu bafiire .
44010042	Bwanyima akaturagiira ku turangirira abantu be n'okubahamiza ku Ruhanga yaamutaireho kuba omuramuzi w'abahuriire n'abafiire .
44010043	Abarangi boona niwe barikuhamya , nibagira ngu weena orikumwikiriza aryasaasirwa ebibi ahabw'eiziina rye .
44010044	Petero ku yaabaire naakigamba ebyo , Mutima Orikwera yaashuuma ahari boona abaabaire bamutegire okutu .
44010045	Abaikiriza abashazirwe abaabaire baizire na Petero , boona baatangaara kureeba Abanyamahanga nabo nibashukwaho ekiconco kya Mutima Orikwera .
44010046	Manya bakabahurira nibagamba endimi z'endugamahanga kandi nibahimbisa Ruhanga . Petero nawe nikwo kugira ati :
44010047	Ebyo hariho orikubaasa kwima aba bantu amaizi g'okubabatiza , baaherize kutunga Mutima Orikwera nkaitwe ?
44010048	Atyo aragiira ku babatizibwa omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo . Bwanyima bamushaba kuguma nabo ebiro bikye .
44011001	Entumwa hamwe n'abanyaruganda ab'omuri Buyudaaya bakahurira ngu Abanyamahanga nabo baikiriize ekigambo kya Ruhanga .
44011002	Petero ku yainamukire Yerusalemu , ab'ekigombe ky'abashazirwe baamuhaahuuza ,
44011003	nibagira bati : Tuhuriire ngu obaire nootaayaayira abatashazirwe kandi noorya nabo ; nikwo ?
44011004	Petero yaabagarukamu naabashoboororera buri kimwe nk'oku byakurataine .
44011005	Yaatandika ati : Eizooba rimwe ku naabaire ndi omu rurembo rwa Yopa ninshaba , naabonekyerwa ekirikushusha omwenda muhango , nikishuuma kuhika ahansi kikwatsirwe enshonda zaakyo ina . Omwenda ogwo gukahika ahansi haihi naanye .
44011006	Ku naagwetegyereize , naareeba gurimu emiringo yoona ey'enyamaishwa ezirikugyendesa amaguru n'ezirikugyendesa enda n'ezirikugurukira omu kaabunga .
44011007	Bwanyima naahurira eiraka eririkungira riti ; Petero , imuka , oite , orye .
44011008	Kwonka naagarukamu nti : Mbirimba , Mukama wangye ! Tihakabahoga kirikuzira nari ekihagaro ekiragiire omu kanwa kangye .
44011009	Eryo eiraka ryagamba obwa kabiri niryema omu iguru , riti : Eki Ruhanga yaayerize otarikyeeta ekirikuzira .
44011010	Ekyo kyayekuratana kityo kashatu . Bwanyima ogwo mwenda gwanyururwa , gwagarukayo omu iguru .
44011011	Omuri ago magingo , abashaija bashatu baahika aha nju ei naabaire nindaaramu , batumirwe nibaruga Kaisariya kuunyakiira ,
44011012	na Mutima yangambira kugyenda nabo ntarikubangaanisa . Abanyaruganda aba mukaaga nabo baagyenda naanye , twataaha omw'ogwo mushaija .
44011013	Yaatugambira ku areebire maraika ayemereire omu nju ye , akamugira ati : Tuma omuri Yopa , oyeeteyo omuntu orikwetwa Simooni Petero ,
44011014	akwiniire obutumwa oburikwija kukujuna n'eka yaawe yoona .
44011015	Ku naabaire ninkitandika nti kugamba , Mutima Orikwera yaabaijaho nk'oku yaatwizireho bwabiso ,
44011016	kandi naijuka ku Mukama yaagizire ati : Yohaana akabatiza n'amaizi , kwonka imwe muryabatizibwa na Mutima Orikwera .
44011017	Obwo naamanya ekiconco eki Ruhanga abahaire , ku nikyo kimwe n'eki yaatuhaire obu twaikiriza Mukama Yesu Kristo . Mbwenu nyowe nkaba ndi oha owaakuzibiire Ruhanga ?
44011018	Ku yaabagambiire ebyo , baatuuza . Baahimbisa Ruhanga nibagira bati : Buzimazima Ruhanga ahaire n'Abanyamahanga okwegarukamu okurikutungisa amagara .
44011019	Abaikiriza abaataataine nibahunga okuhiiganisibwa okwabaire ahari Sitefano , bakagyenda , baahika Foinikiya na Kupuro na Antiokiya , obwo nibarangirira Abayudaaya bonka ekigambo kya Ruhanga .
44011020	Kwonka bamwe omu baarugire Kupuro na Kureene , bakaza Antiokiya , baatandikirayo kwegyesa Abaguriiki , nibabagambira Amakuru Marungi ga Mukama Yesu .
44011021	Mukama yaabakwatsa ; abantu baingi abaikiriize baakubuukira Mukama .
44011022	Ekigombe ky'Abakristo eky'omuri Yerusalemu , ku kyahuriire ebyo , kyatuma Barinaba kuza Antiokiya .
44011023	Ku yaahikireyo , yaareeba oku Ruhanga ahaire abo bantu emigisha , yaashemererwa . Yaabeehanangiriza boona kuguma bari abeesigwa kandi ab'amazima ahari Mukama n'omutima gwabo gwona .
44011024	Barinaba ogwo akaba ari omushaija murungi , oijwire Mutima Orikwera n'okwikiriza . Abandi bantu baingi baayehongyera Mukama .
44011025	Bwanyima Barinaba yaaza Taruso kusherura Saulo .
44011026	Ku yaamuboine yaamureeta Antiokiya . Bombi baamarayo omwaka gwona bari hamwe n'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza baayo , nibeegyesa abantu baingi . Antiokiya , niyo abaikiriza baabandiize kwetwa Abakristo .
44011027	Ku baabaire bakiri okwo , abarangi bamwe baashuuma Antiokiya nibaruga Yerusalemu .
44011028	Omwe aharibo orikwetwa Agabo , akarangisibwa Mutima ku harikwija kubaho enjara omu nsi yoona . Haza ekyo kyabaho omu busingye bwa Kalaudio .
44011029	Abaikiriza nikwo kucwamu kutwekyera abanyaruganda abari Buyudaaya eby'okubakwatsa , buri omwe yaahayo eki arikubaasa .
44011030	Ekyo baakikora , baabitweka Barinaba na Saulo kubikwatsa abakuru b'omu kigombe ky'abaikiriza .
44012001	Omu biro ebyo Omugabe Herode akatandika kuhiiganisa bamwe omu b'ekigombe ky'Abakristo .
44012002	Yaitsa Yakobo mukuru wa Yohaana rurara .
44012003	Ku yaareebire ekyo Abayudaaya baakisiima , yaaragiira kukwata na Petero . Ekyo kikabaho omu biro by'Obugyenyi bw'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe .
44012004	Atyo akwata Petero , amuta omu kihome , kandi ataho emiteeko ena y'abaserukare bana bana kumurinda nibaihaihana . Obwo Herode akaba naayenda kumureeta omu maisho g'abantu kutonganisibwa , Obugyenyi bw'Okuhingurwaho bwahwaho .
44012005	Obunaku bwona obu Petero yaamazire ari omu kihome , ekigombe ky'Abakristo kikaguma nikimushabira ahari Ruhanga kitaireho omutima .
44012006	Ekiro ki Herode yaabaire araariire kumucweraho orubanja , Petero ogwo akaba agwejegyereire ahagati y'abaserukare babiri , bamuboheise enjegyere ibiri , kandi obwo n'abarinzi barindiire aha irembo ry'ekihome .
44012007	Ahonaaho maraika wa Nyakubaho yaamubonekyera ; akashengye koona kaayaka . Yaateerateera Petero omu rubaju , yaamusisiimura naagira ati : Rahuka kwimuka ! Enjegyere zaamuruga aha mikono , zaaragara .
44012008	Maraika atyo amugira ati : Yezirikye orukoba rwawe , ojware enkaito . N'onu akora atyo . Maraika agaruka amugira ati : Jwara omunagiro gwawe , onkurate .
44012009	Mpaho Petero ashohora , amukurata , kwonka atarikumanya ki maraika arikukora , yaaba kiri kyo ; ateekateeka ngu shana yaabonekyerwa .
44012010	Baagyenda nibaraba aha barinzi b'okubanza n'aba kabiri , baahika aha irembo ry'ebyoma eririkushohorera ow'orurembo . Ryayeigura ryonka , baashohora , baagumizamu omuhanda okuhitsya obu maraika yaamurugireho .
44012011	Obwo nibwo Petero yaagarukirwemu obwengye , akagira ati : Mbwenu naamanyira kimwe ku Mukama atumire maraika we , akanjuna Herode na byona ebi Abayudaaya babaire nibagira ngu nibiija kumbaho .
44012012	Ku yaaherize kukyetegyereza , yaagumizamu , yaaza omwa Mariya nyina Yohaana-Mariko , ei abantu baingi baabaire bateeraniire nibashaba .
44012013	Yaakongoota aha rwigi rw'eirembo , omwishiki omuheereza orikwetwa Rooda yaija kureeba .
44012014	Ku amanya eiraka riri erya Petero , okushemererwa kwenda kumwita ; omu mwanya gw'okwigura orwigi , airuka naagaruka omu nju kugambira abarimu ku Petero ayemereire aha irembo .
44012015	Bamugira bati : Ohugire omutima . Kwonka we ayangisiriza ati : N'eky'amazima . Bwanyima bagira bati : Ogwo nu ni maraika we !
44012016	Petero ku yaabaire naakiiguza , batyo baigura orwigi , baamureeba , baatangaara munonga .
44012017	Yaabahunamisisa omukono kandi yaabateekyerereza oku Mukama yaamwiha omu kihome . Yaayongyeraho n'eki ati : Mugambire mutyo Yakobo n'abanyaruganda . Atyo abatsigaho , aza ahandi .
44012018	Ku bwaseesire haabaho akaimukiiriro kahango omu baserukare ahabw'okutamanya oku Petero abaire .
44012019	Herode yaateeraho kumuronda , kwonka yaaremwa ; yaatonganisa abarinzi , yaaragiira kubaita . Bwanyima Herode ogwo yaaruga Buyudaaya , yaashuuma Kaisaariya , yaagumayo .
44012020	Herode akaba agwereirwe kubi Abatuuro n'Abasidoni . Ab'endembo ezo zombi baamwijaho baaherize kwenywanisa na Bulasito , omukuru w'abambari be , owaababaasiise kumushaba obusingye . Manya ensi yaabo akaba etungirwe ebyokurya ebi baabaire bashaka omu nsi y'ogwo mugabe .
44012021	Aha kiro ekyatairweho , Herode akajwara ebijwaro bye by'obugabe , yaasingama aha kitebe , yaagira ebi yaagambira abantu be .
44012022	Abantu nikwo kumushunga nibagira bati : Orikugamba ni Ruhanga , ti muntu !
44012023	Omuri ako kaanya maraika wa Nyakubaho amuteera , amugwisaho naamutura okutaha Ruhanga ekitiinwa , n'onu ariibwa enyogori , afa .
44012024	Ekigambo kya Ruhanga kikongyera kuhama n'okubuga , baingi baakiikiriza .
44012025	Barinaba na Saulo ku baaherize omurimo gwabo , baagarukayo , nibaruga Yerusalemu baine Yohaana-Mariko .
44013001	Omu kigombe ky'Abakristo ekya Antiokiya , hakaba harimu abarangi n'abeegyesa ; Barinaba , Simeoni orikwetwa Nyakairaguju , taho Lukio owa Kureene , na Manaeni owaayoroirwe hamwe n'ow'eishaza Herode , na Saulo .
44013002	Eizooba rimwe ku baabaire nibashaba Ruhanga kandi nibeesiibyakwo , Mutima Orikwera yaagira ati : Niinyenda munshoroorere Barinaba na Saulo , bakore omurimo ogu mbeeteire .
44013003	Batyo ku baaherize kwesiibyakwo n'okushaba , baabataho engaro , baaboohereza .
44013004	Bwanyima Saulo na Barinaba ku baaherize kutumwa Mutima Orikwera , baashuuma Seleukiya , ei baarugire nibatoora ogw'enyanja , bakaza aha kirwa Kupuro .
44013005	Ku baahikire Salami , baarangirira ekigambo kya Mukama omu mateeraniro g'Abayudaaya ; obwo baine Yohaana-Mariko naabakwatsa .
44013006	Ku baaherize kucwekanisa ekirwa , baahika Paafo , baabuganayo Omuyudaaya omukozi w'emigyereko , kandi omurangi w'ebishuba orikwetwa Bari-Yesu .
44013007	Bari-Yesu ogwo akaba ari munywani w'omutegyeki omukuru Serigio-Paulo ow'ekyo kirwa , owaabaire ari omushaija ohwerize munonga . Ogwo mutegyeki mukuru akeeta Barinaba na Saulo , yaabashaba ku bamugambira ekigambo kya Ruhanga .
44013008	Kwonka Eluma , amakuru ngu , omukozi w'emigyereko , yaateeraho kubazibira , ngu ogwo mutegyeki omukuru atakaikiriza , akahinduka .
44013009	Mpaho Saulo , orikwetwa Paulo , aijwire Mutima Orikwera , yaamutsimba eriisho ,
44013010	yaamugira ati : Iwe mwana wa Sitaane ' we , iwe muzigu w'ekyeetwa ekihikiriire , iwe oijwire obugobya n'obubi , ahabw'enki otarikurekyera aho kukiikamya emihanda ya Mukama egororokire ?
44013011	Mbwenu reeba , omukono gwa Mukama gwaza kukuteera , ohume , omare ebiro otarikureeba izooba . Omuri ako kacu Eluma ashwekwa oruho n'omwirima , abandagira naasherura ow'okumukwatira ekihimbo .
44013012	Ogwo mutegyeki omukuru ku yaareebire ekyakorwa , yaikiriza naatangaarira ebi baayegyeise ahari Mukama .
44013013	Paulo na bagyenzi be bakatoora ogw'enyanja , baaruga Paafo baaza Periga ey'omuri Panfuliya , ei Yohaana-Mariko yaataaniire nabo , akagaruka Yerusalemu .
44013014	Abandi baagumizamu okuruga Periga okuhitsya obu baahikire Antiokiya ey'omuri Pisidiya . Ku baabaire bakiri okwo , ahari Sabato baaza omu iteeraniro , baashutama .
44013015	Eby'eiteeka n'eby'abarangi ku byaherize kushomwa , abakuru b'eiteeraniro baabatumaho bati : Beene waitu , ku muraabe mwine eki murikwenda kugambira abateeraniire aha kubagumya , mukigambe .
44013016	Paulo nikwo kwemerera , akabaretsya n'omukono , akatandika kugamba ati : Imwe Baisiraeli ' mwe , naimwe abatiina Ruhanga , nimuntegye okutu :
44013017	Ruhanga w'eihanga ryaitu Isiraeli akatoorana baatataitwe , yaatunguura abantu baitu obu baabaire batwire omu nsi ya Misiri . Bwanyima ahabw'amaani ge yaabaihayo ;
44013018	yaabareeberera bari omu ihamba emyaka nka makumi ana .
44013019	Ku yaaherize kucwekyereza amahanga mushanju ag'omuri Kanaani , yaabaha egyo nsi , yaaba eyaabo , baamarayo emyaka nka magana ana na makumi ataano .
44013020	Ebyo ku byahwaire , yaabaha abaramuzi , baagumizamu okuhitsya aha murangi Samueli .
44013021	Bwanyima baashaba kuheebwa omugabe ; Ruhanga yaabaha Saulo mwene Kiishi ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini , yaabategyekyera emyaka makumi ana .
44013022	Ogwo ku yaamwihire aha ngoma , yaayemeka Daudi kuba omugabe waabo , ou yaagambireho ati : Nyeboneire Daudi mwene Yese , omuntu ori nk'oku omutima gwangye gurikwenda , orikora byona ebi nyenda .
44013023	Ruhanga , okuhikiiriza eki yaaraganiise , akaimukiza Isiraeli omwe ahari baijukuru ba Daudi , niwe Yesu Omujuni .
44013024	Ogwo obu yaabaire atakaizire . Yohaana akarangirira Abaisiraeli boona okwegarukamu n'okubatizibwa .
44013025	Yohaana ku yaabaire naamariiriza omurimo gwe gw'omuri egi nsi , yaagira ati : Tindi ogwo ou murikuteekateeka ngu ndi we ; we andi enyima ankuratiire , kandi tinshemereire kumukomoorora enkaito .
44013026	Imwe beene waitu ab'oruzaaro rwa Aburahamu , naimwe mwena abatiina Ruhanga , obutumwa obu obw'okujunwa , niimwe bwaiziire .
44013027	Eki abantu ba Yerusalemu n'abategyeki baabo baakozire ahabw'okutamanya Yesu , nobu kwakuba okushoboorokyerwa ebyagambirwe abarangi ebishomwa buri Sabato , bakabihikiiriza nibamucwera orubanja .
44013028	Nobu baraabe batarareebire ekishemereire kumwitisa , hoona bakashaba Pilaato kumwita .
44013029	Ku baaherize kuhikiiriza byona ebyamuhandiikirweho , baamuhanura aha musharaba , baamuziika omu kituuro .
44013030	Kwonka Ruhanga yaamuzoora omu bafiire ;
44013031	yaamara ebiro bingi naabonekyera abaarugire nawe Galilaaya bakaza Yerusalemu ; kandi nibo abo hati abarikumujurira omu bantu .
44013032	Twaija aha kubagambira Amakuru Marungi ag'ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise baatataitwe ,
44013033	akabihikiiriza ahariitwe baijukuru baabo naazoora Yesu omu bafiire , nk'oku kyahandiikirwe omuri zaaburi eya kabiri kiti : Ori Omwana wangye ; eri izooba naakuzaara .
44013034	Ekirikuhamya ngu Ruhanga akamuzoora omu bafiire , tarigaruka kujunda , nikyo ekyo eki yaagambire kare ati : Ndyabaha emigisha ehamire kandi erikwera ei naaraganiise Daudi .
44013035	Akagambira n'omu kyevugo ekindi ati : Toriikiriza Orikwera waawe kujunda .
44013036	Mbwenu Daudi omu biro bye ku yaaherize kukora emirimo ei Ruhanga yaamuteekateekyeire yaafa , yaaziikwa na baishe , yaajunda .
44013037	Kwonka ogwo ou Ruhanga yaazoire omu bafiire tarajunzire .
44013038	Beene waitu , mumanye ku okusaasirwa ebibi kurikurangirirwa ahabwa Yesu ogwo .
44013039	Kandi weena orikwikiriza Yesu , naihwaho orubanja rw'ebibi byona , ebi eiteeka rya Musa ritarabaasize kumwihaho .
44013040	N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde mutakaahikwaho ebi abarangi baarangire nibagira bati :
44013041	Imwe bashungi ' mwe , nimureebe , mutangaare kandi muhwerekyerere ! Manya omu biro byanyu ninkora eki mutakwikiriize , nobu mwakukigambiirwe .
44013042	Paulo na Barinaba ku baabaire nibaruga omuri eryo iteeraniro , abaamwo baabashaba ebi baabarangirira kugaruka kubibagambira ahari Sabato erikwija .
44013043	Oruteerane ku rwayaabuukire , Abayudaaya baingi hamwe n'abaataahiibwe omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya abarikutiina Ruhanga , baakuratira Paulo na Barinaba ; kandi omu kugaaniira kwabo , Paulo na Barinaba baabeehanangiriza kuguma bahamiire omuri rukundo ya Ruhanga .
44013044	Sabato eyaakuratsireho , haihi ab'orurembo rwona bakateerana kuhurira ekigambo kya Ruhanga .
44013045	Abayudaaya ku baareebire ebimbuuro by'abantu , baitwa eihari , baatandika kujuma n'okuhakanisa ebi Paulo yaagambire byona .
44013046	Bwanyima Paulo na Barinaba baabagambira n'obumanzi bati : Niimwe tubandiizeho kurangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga , kwonka mbwenu ahabw'okuba mwakyanga , kandi nimugira ngu timushemereire kutunga amagara agatahwaho , twaza kugarura omu Banyamahanga .
44013047	Manya ekyo nikyo Mukama yaaturagiire kukora obu yaagira ati : Naakutaho kuba orumuri omu Banyamahanga , okujuna kwangye kubone kuhika omu nsi yoona .
44013048	Abanyamahanga ku baakihuriire , baashemererwa munonga , baahimbisa ekigambo kya Ruhanga ; kandi boona abu yaateekateekyeire amagara agatahwaho , baikiriza .
44013049	Ekigambo kya Mukama kyabuga kityo omu nsi egyo yoona .
44013050	Kwonka Abayudaaya baimukiiriza abakazi ab'ekitiinwa abarikutiina Ruhanga , hamwe n'abantu abakuru ab'omuri orwo rurembo , batyo baahiiganisa Paulo na Barinaba , baababinga omu kyanga kyabo .
44013051	Ezo ntumwa nazo nikwo kubakunkumurira omucuucu gw'omu bigyere byazo , zikaza Ikonio .
44013052	Kwonka abatendekwa baayo baijura okushemererwa na Mutima Orikwera .
44014001	N'omuri Ikonio nikwo kyabaire . Paulo na Barinaba ku baagiire omu iteeraniro ry'Abayudaaya , baagamba ebigambo birikuhika aha njoka , byareetera Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki baingi munonga kwikiriza .
44014002	Kwonka Abayudaaya abamwe baayanga kwikiriza , baata omu Banyamahanga omutima mubi kwanga abaikiriza .
44014003	Paulo na Barinaba baamarayo omwanya nibarangirira ebya Mukama batarikutiina , na Mukama ebi baagambire aha kiconco kye eky'embabazi yaabihamisa obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza .
44014004	Abantu b'omu rurembo bakeebaganisamu ; abamwe baagwera orubaju rw'Abayudaaya , abandi orw'Entumwa .
44014005	Ekyarugiremu Abanyamahanga n'Abayudaaya bakwataniise n'ab'obushoboorozi , baacuma enaama y'okubarwanisa n'okubateera amabaare .
44014006	Entumwa ku zaakihuriire , zaahungira Lusitura na Deribe , ebirorero by'omuri Lukaoniya n'omu byanga ebihereeraine nabyo ,
44014007	ei zaagambiire Amakuru Marungi .
44014008	Omuri Lusitura hakaba hariyo omuntu owaabaire atarikubaasa kugyenda ahabw'okuzaarwa n'ebigyere biramaire .
44014009	Ogwo muntu akahurira Paulo naagamba . Paulo ku yaamureebire naayesiga ngu naabaasa kukizibwa ,
44014010	yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Imuka oyemerere n'ebigyere byawe . Ogwo murema yaabandatuka , yaatandika kugyenda .
44014011	Ekimbuuro ky'abantu ku baareebire eki Paulo yaakora , baayomba omu rurimi rwabo rw'Orulukaoniya bati : Aba bantu ni baaruhanga abatwiziremu beehindwire abantu !
44014012	Barinaba baamukubya Zeusi , kandi Paulo owaabaire ari omugambi mukuru , baamweta Herume .
44014013	Abahongyerezi ba Zeusi , ou endaaro ye yaabaire eri omu maisho g'orurembo , ahabw'okwenda ngu abantu boona batambe nabo ekitambo , baareeta aha marembo enimi zijwekirwe ebishaba by'ebirabyo .
44014014	Barinaba na Paulo , ku baahuriire ebyabaho , baatagura ebijwaro byabo , baayeshuka omu bantu nibagamba n'eiraka rihango bati :
44014015	Bashaija ' mwe , n'enki ekirikubakoresa ebyo ? Naitwe turi abantu nyabuntu nkaimwe . Tubareeteire Amakuru Marungi , ngu murekye ebitaine mugasho , mwehongyere Ruhanga ohuriire , owaahangire eiguru n'ensi n'enyanja na byona ebirimu .
44014016	Omu busingye bw'aba ira , akaikiriza buri ihanga kwekorera ebyaryo nk'oku ririkwenda ;
44014017	kwonka shi imwe , tiyaabareka kugumira aho mutaine kirikumubahamiza omu birungi ebi abakorera ; abagwisiza enjura kuruga omu iguru , abeereza emyaka yaanyu omu bunaku bwayo , abaha ebyokurya hamwe n'okushemererwa .
44014018	Nobu baagambire ebyo , bakabura hakye kuremwa kuzibira abo bantu kubatambira ekitambo .
44014019	Bwanyima hakaija Abayudaaya bamwe nibaruga Antiokiya na Ikonio ; baayosya abantu kurwanisa entumwa . Baateera Paulo amabaare , baamukurura , baamushohoza aheeru y'orurembo nibateekateeka ngu yaafa .
44014020	Abaikiriza ku baamwehinguririize , yaimuka , yaagaruka omu rurembo . Aha izooba eryakuratsireho , we na Barinaba baaza Deribe .
44014021	Ku baaherize kugamba ebigambo by'Amakuru Marungi omuri ekyo kirorero , baatungamu omubaro muhango gw'abakuratsi , baagaruka Antiokiya nibaraba Lusitura na Ikonio .
44014022	Baagumya abaikiriza baayo nibabeehanangiriza kuhamira omu kwikiriza bati : Twena turi ab'okuhikwaho eby'oburemeezi bingi , tutakataahire mu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
44014023	Ku baaherize kutooranira buri kigombe ky'Abakristo abakuru baakyo , obwo nibashaba kandi nibeesiibyakwo , baabakwatsa Mukama ou baikiriize .
44014024	Paulo na Barinaba bakaraba Pisidiya , baahika Panfuliya .
44014025	Ku baaherize kurangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga omuri Periga , baashuuma Ataliya .
44014026	Omu kurugayo , baatoora ogw'enyanja nibaza Antiokiya , ei bwabiso baabaire babakwatsiize embabazi za Ruhanga ahabw'omurimo ogu baakozire obwo .
44014027	Ku baahikireyo bati , baateerana ab'ekigombe ky'Abakristo , baabateekyerereza byona ebi Ruhanga yaabakoreise , kandi n'oku yaiguriireho Abanyamahanga omuhanda gw'okwikiriza .
44014028	Batyo baaguma n'abakuratsi okumara ebiro .
44015001	Bwanyima abantu bamwe bakaruga Buyudaaya , baayegyesa abanyaruganda , bati : Ku muraabe mutashazirwe nk'oku eiteeka rya Musa ririkuragiira , timurikubaasa kujunwa .
44015002	Ekyo kyabareetera empaka . Paulo na Barinaba ku baaherize kumara omwanya muraingwa nibahakana n'abo bantu , kyahamibwa ngu Paulo ogwo na Barinaba n'abandi ab'omu kigombe ky'Abakristo , bainamukye Yerusalemu kuhanuura ahari ekyo kigambo hamwe n'entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga .
44015003	Ab'ekigombe ky'Abakristo boona baabaraga . Ku baabaire nibaraba Foinikiya na Samariya , baagambira abaayo oku Abanyamahanga bahindukire bakaba Abakristo ; egyo nkuru yaagwisa gye munonga abanyaruganda boona .
44015004	Ku baahikire Yerusalemu , baayakiirwa ab'ekigombe ky'Abakristo hamwe n'entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga ; nabo baabateekyerereza byona ebi Ruhanga abakoreise .
44015005	Kwonka bamwe omu Bafarisaayo abaabaire baikiriize , baahakana nibagira bati : Abanyamahanga bashemereire kusharwa n'okwegyesibwa kukuratira eiteeka rya Musa .
44015006	Entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga baateerana kwetegyereza ekyo kigambo .
44015007	Ku baaherize kumara omwanya muraingwa nibahanuura , Petero yaayemerera , yaabagambira ati : Beene Tata , mwena nimumanya gye ku omu biro byahingwire , Ruhanga yaabantoorainemu , ngu ndangirire Abanyamahanga Amakuru Marungi babone kwikiriza .
44015008	Buzimazima Ruhanga omanya ebiri omu mutima gwa buri muntu , akabahamiza ku arikubasiima , yaabaha Mutima Orikwera , nk'oku yaamutuhaire .
44015009	Ruhanga taroorekire mutaano gwaitu nabo , akeeza emitima yaabo ahabw'okwikiriza .
44015010	Tikikaagwisa kubi Ruhanga imwe hati ku mwakwekoreza abo baikiriza omutwaro ogu itwe nari baatatenkuriitwe batarabaasize kwekorera ?
44015011	Manya itwe twikiriza ngu tujunwa ahabw'embabazi za Mukama Yesu nkabo .
44015012	Ekyo kikahunamya boona abaabaire bateeraniireho , baatega okutu Barinaba na Paulo nibashoboorora eby'obumanyiso byona n'eby'okutangaaza ebi Ruhanga yaabakoreise omu Banyamahanga .
44015013	Abo ku baaherize kugamba , Yakobo nawe yaagamba ati : Beene tata , muntegye okutu .
44015014	Simeoni yaaheza kubagambira oku Ruhanga yaateekateekire kwetooranira abantu kuba abe ab'envuma , naabaiha omu Banyamahanga .
44015015	Ekyo buzimazima nikiikirizana n'ebi abarangi baagambire , ahabw'okuba Ebyahandiikirwe nibigira biti :
44015016	Ebyo ku birihwa , ndyagaruka nyombekye busya enju ya Daudi eyaagwire , ngyombekye busya ahi yaasheenyukire , ngigarureho .
44015017	Haza obwo abandi bantu n'Abanyamahanga boona abarikwetererwa eiziina ryangye , nibwo barisherura Mukama .
44015018	Mukama owaatumanyiise ebyo okwiha iranaira , nikwo arikugamba .
44015019	Yakobo agumizamu ati : Ka ngire nti : Omu mwanya gw'okureetera oburemeezi Abanyamahanga abahindukire , bakaba aba Ruhanga ,
44015020	tubahandiikire nitubagambira kwetantara ekintu kyona ekihagaziibwe ebishushani , ebikwatiraine n'obushambani , n'enyama y'enyamaishwa zihotoirwe , n'orwamba .
44015021	Ahabw'okuba okwiha ira ebyahandiikirwe Musa bigira ababyegyesa omu buri kirorero , kandi bishomerwa omu mateeraniro buri Sabato .
44015022	Bwanyima entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga bakahamya kutoorana abajwekyerwa b'okutuma Antiokiya hamwe na Paulo na Barinaba . Ekigombe kyona eky'Abakristo kyakisiima ; baatoorana Yuda orikwetwa Barisaba na Silaasi , abantu abakuru omu banyaruganda ,
44015023	baabakwatsa ebaruha erikugira eti : Itwe beene waanyu , entumwa n'abakuru omu ihanga , nitubaramutsya , imwe abanyaruganda , Abanyamahanga ab'omuri Antiokiya na Siriya na Kilikiya .
44015024	Nituhurira ngu hariho bamwe abaarugire omuriitwe , abaabarabaniisemu , bakababuza obusingye ahabw'ebi barikwenda ngu mukore : haza tutarabaragiire .
44015025	N'ahabw'ekyo tukaikirizana tuteeraine , kutoorana abajwekyerwa , tukababooherereza hamwe na Barinaba na Paulo , abu turikusiima munonga ,
44015026	abaahaireyo amagara gaabo ahabw'eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
44015027	Mbwenu twabatumaho Yuda na Silaasi , abaraabagambire nibahamya ebi tuhandiikire omu baruha egi .
44015028	Kisiimirwe Mutima Orikwera , naitwe okutabeekoreza gundi mutwaro , ogurikukira ebi ebirikwetengyerwa kimwe .
44015029	Mushemereire kwetantara ebitambiirwe ebishushani orwamba , enyama y'enyamaishwa ezihotoirwe , n'ebikwatiraine n'obushambani . Ku muraayerinde ebyo , nimuba mukozire gye . Mugumeho !
44015030	Abaatumirwe bakaimutsya orugyendo baaza Antiokiya , ei bateeraniire ab'ekigombe boona , bakabakwatsa ebaruha .
44015031	Ku baagishomire , baashemerererwa munonga ebirikubagumya ebyabaire bigirimu .
44015032	Yuda na Silaasi ahabw'okuba abarangi , bakagambira abo banyaruganda ebigambo bingi by'okubagumya n'okubagaruramu amaani .
44015033	Abo bombi bakateerayo ebiro , bwanyima abanyaruganda baabaraga nibabendeza obusingye , batyo baagarukayo aha baabatumire .
44015034	[ Kwonka Silaasi we yaasiima kutsigarayo . ]
44015035	Kandi Paulo na Barinaba baaguma Antiokiya hamwe n'abandi baingi nibeegyesa kandi nibarangirira ekigambo kya Mukama .
44015036	Ku haahingwireho ebiro , Paulo yaagira Barinaba ati : Ka tugarukyeyo , tutaayaayire ebirorero byona ebi twarangiriiremu ekigambo kya Mukama , tureebe abanyaruganda oku bari .
44015037	Barinaba yaayenda ngu bagyende na Yohaana-Mariko ,
44015038	kwonka Paulo tiyaasiima kugyenda n'ogwo muntu owaabatsigireho Panfuliya , akanga kukwatanisa nabo omu murimo gwabo .
44015039	Ku baaherize kugira empaka z'okucwana , baataana . Barinaba yaatoora ogw'enyanja na Mariko , baaza Kupuro .
44015040	Paulo we , ku yaabaire atakaimukize , yaatoorana Silaasi kugyenda nawe ; abanyaruganda baamukwatsa Ruhanga kumurindisa embabazi ze .
44015041	Yaaraba Siriya na Kilikiya , naahamya ebigombe by'Abakristo baayo .
44016001	Paulo ku yaarugireyo , yaaza Deribe na Lusitura . Okwo hakaba hariyo omwikiriza orikwetwa Timoteeho , ou nyina yaabaire ari Omuyudaayakazi kandi aikiriize , kwonka ishe ari Omuguriiki .
44016002	Kandi Timoteeho ogwo abanyaruganda aba Lusitura na Ikonio bakaba bamugambaho gye .
44016003	Mbwenu Paulo ku yaayenzire ngu bagyendane , yaamushara . Ekyo yaakikora ahabw'okuba Abayudaaya b'omu byanga ebyo boona bakaba nibamanya ishe ku ari Omuguriiki .
44016004	Ahi baabaire bahika nibaraba omu birorero , bahamiza abantu ebyahinguziibwe entumwa n'abakuru omuri Yerusalemu , kandi babeehanangiriza kuguma nibabikuratira .
44016005	Ekyo kyareetera ebigombe by'Abakristo kwongyera kuhamira omu kwikiriza n'okukanya buri izooba .
44016006	Paulo na Silaasi bakaraba omu nsi ya Furugiya na Galatiya , obwo Mutima Orikwera abagambiire kutarangirira kigambo kya Ruhanga omuri Asiya .
44016007	Ku baahikire aha nyatano ya Musiya , baayenda kugicwekanisa kuza Bituniya . Mutima wa Yesu ku yaabazibiire ,
44016008	baaraba omuri Musiya , baashuuma , baaza Turoa .
44016009	Nyekiro Paulo yaabonekyerwa , naareeba Omunyamakedoniya ayemereire naamweshengyereza ati : Yambuka , oije Makedoniya , otuhwere .
44016010	Ku yaaherize kubonekyerwa , titurahwamire , twatebeekanisa eby'orugyendo rw'okwambuka kuza Makedoniya , obwo nituhamya ku Ruhanga atwetsire kubatwarira Amakuru Marungi .
44016011	Ku twatoire ogw'enyanja nituruga Turoa , twagumizamu twaza Samoturakiya . Eizooba eryakuratsireho , twaza Neapoli ;
44016012	twarugayo twahika Filipi , orurembo rukuru rwa Makedoniya , oru Abarooma baakubwire . Ku haahingwireho ebiro bikye turi omuri orwo rurembo ,
44016013	ahari Sabato twashohora nituraba omu irembo , twaza aha rubaju rw'omugyera , ahi twateekateekire ngu niho bashabira . Twashutama , twagaaniira n'abakazi abaabaire bateeraniireho .
44016014	Omuri abo bakazi hakaba harimu orikwetwa Ludiya , omukazi oramya Ruhanga , owaarugire omu kirorero kya Tiyatira , omutunzi w'emyenda ya bujwa . Akatutega okutu , Mukama yaashashaanura omutima gwe , yaikiriza ebi Paulo yaagambire .
44016015	We n'eka ye , ku baaherize kubatizibwa , yaatweshengyereza naagira ati : Ku muraabe nimumanya ngu ndi omwikiriza wa Mukama nyakabara , mwije mundaarire . Yaatugyemesereza .
44016016	Ku twabaire nituza omu mwanya gw'okushabiramu , twabugana omuzaana owaabaire aragura , akareetera bakama be emikimbo ei abantu baabaire bamutaashura .
44016017	Yaatandika kukuratira Paulo naitwe , naayamuza ati : Aba bantu n'abaheereza ba Ruhanga Rukiraboona , baizire kubarangirira omuhanda gw'okujunwa .
44016018	Akaguma naagira atyo buri izooba , okuhitsya obu izooba rimwe Paulo yaasambisiirwe , akahinduka , akagira ekyo kyago ati : Ninkuragiira omu iziina rya Yesu Kristo , ruga ahari ogwo mwishiki . Ekyago kyamurugaho omuri ako kaanya .
44016019	Bakama be ku baareebire hatakiriho matsiko g'okumutungamu ezindi mpiiha , baakwata Paulo na Silaasi , baabakurubana , baabatwarira ab'obushoboorozi omu kajagiro .
44016020	Okwo niyo baabatabaaririize omu maisho g'abaramuzi , nibagira bati : Abantu aba n'Abayudaaya , nibarabanisamu ekirorero kyaitu .
44016021	Nibeegyesa emicwe erikuzibirwa eiteeka ryaitu , ei itwe Abarooma tutarikwikiriza , kandi etari mu mitwarize yaitu .
44016022	Ekimbuuro ky'abantu baakwatanisa nabo kubarwanisa , abaramuzi baaragiira ku babajuura , bakabateera ebyasha .
44016023	Ku baaherize kubaasha , baabata omu kihome , baaragiira omukuru waakyo kubarinda obutaita riisho .
44016024	Nawe ahabw'okukuratira ebi yaaragiirwa , yaabata omu kihome eky'endugu ; amaguru gaabo yaagata omu nkomo .
44016025	Ekyo kiro omu itumbi , Paulo na Silaasi ku baabaire nibashaba kandi nibeeshongora eby'okuhimbisa Ruhanga , obwo ezindi mbohe zibategire amatu ,
44016026	ahonaaho haabaho omutsitsa mwingi , ogwatengyetsize ekihome n'obuhamizo bwakyo . Enyigi zoona zaiguka , n'enjegyere ezaabaire zikomire embohe zoona zaaragara .
44016027	Omukuru w'ekihome ku yaasisiimukire , yaashanga enyigi zirangaire , yaasyorayo rurara kweita , naateekateeka ngu embohe zaatoroka .
44016028	Kwonka Paulo yaayamuza n'eiraka rihango ati : Oteekora kubi , twena turi aha .
44016029	Mukuru w'ekihome yaatuma kureeta amatabaaza , yaayetuura omu nju , yaagwa omu maguru ga Paulo na Silaasi naatetema ,
44016030	yaabashohoza aheeru , yaabagira ati : Bakama bangye nshemereire kukora ki , nkabona kujunwa ?
44016031	Baamugira bati : Ikiriza Mukama Yesu , nibwo oraajunwe n'eka yaawe .
44016032	Kandi baamugambira ekigambo kya Mukama hamwe na boona abaabaire bari omu ka ye .
44016033	Omuri eryo itumbi yaabatwara kuboozya obuhuta , yaabatirizibwayo n'ab'eka ye boona .
44016034	Kandi yaabatwara owe , yaabaha ebyokurya ; yaashemererwa hamwe n'ab'eka ye boona , ahabw'okuhinduka bakaikiriza Ruhanga .
44016035	Ku bwaseesire , abaramuzi Abarooma baaragiira abakuru b'ekihome bati : Murekure abo bashaija .
44016036	Omukuru w'ekihome yaabigambira Paulo , ati : Abaramuzi baaragiira ku tubarekura ; mbwenu mwegyendere n'obusingye .
44016037	Paulo yaabagarukamu ati : Oti enki ? Itwe enzaarwa za Rooma batuteereire omu maisho g'abantu batakabandize kututonganisa , baataho n'okututa omu kihome , mbwenu nibagira ngu nibaija kuturekura bwesherekye ? Ngaaha ! Babe nibo baija bakatushohoza .
44016038	Ebyo abarinzi b'ekihome baabigambira abaramuzi . Nabo baatiina munonga ahabw'okuhurira ngu abo bashaija n'enzaarwa za Rooma .
44016039	Baija baabeehohoora , baabashohoza , baabeeshengyereza kuruga omuri ekyo kirorero .
44016040	Batyo baaruga omu kihome , baaza omwa Ludiya ei baashangire abanyaruganda boona , bakabagumya , bwanyima bakagyenda .
