44017001	Paulo na Silaasi bakaraba Anfipoli na Apoloniya , baarugaho baahika Tesalonika , ei Abayudaaya baabaire bainemu eiteeraniro .
44017002	Paulo nk'oku omucwe gwe gwabaire guri , yaabeetondera . Aha Sabato ishatu ezaakurataine , yaahakana nabo naajuriza Ebyahandiikirwe ,
44017003	naashoboorora kandi naahamya ku Kristo yaabaire ari ow'okubonabonesibwa n'okuzooka omu bafiire . Yaagaruka yaabagira ati : Yesu ou ndikubarangirira niwe Kristo .
44017004	Abamwe omuribo bakashoboorokyerwa , baakwatanisa na Paulo na Silaasi , n'Abaguriiki baingi abarikutiina Ruhanga , hamwe n'abakazi abanyamaziina batari bakye .
44017005	Kwonka Abayudaaya ku baitsirwe eihari , baayeteerana n'abantu babi b'omu bizengyerezi by'omu katare , baimukiiriza ekimbuuro ky'abantu , baajagaraza ekirorero kyona . Baataahirira ab'omwa Yasooni , ngu bakaashangamu Paulo na Silaasi , babakurura , babatwara ahu abantu boona bateeraniire .
44017006	Kwonka tibaashangamu ondi weena , kureka Yasooni n'abanyaruganda bamwe ; baabakurubana , baabahitsya omu maisho g'abakuru b'ekirorero , nibayogoora bati : Abantu ababaire nibajuumika ensi yoona , mbwenu baahika n'aha ,
44017007	kandi Yasooni niwe abaire naabaraaza , haza nibagomera ebiragiro bya Kaisaari byona , nibagira ngu hariho ondi mugabe orikwetwa Yesu .
44017008	Abanyakirorero hamwe n'abanyaishengyero baayo ku baahuriire ekyo kirego , baayagaara ,
44017009	baaragiira Yasooni n'abandi kugira eki baabakwatiriza , batakabarekwire .
44017010	Obwire ku bwaizire buti , abanyaruganda baayohereza ahonaaho Paulo na Silaasi ngu baze Beroya . Ku baahikireyo bati , baataaha omu iteeraniro ry'Abayudaaya .
44017011	Abaayo ahabw'okugira omutima murungi okukira aba Tesalonika , baajwahukira ekigambo n'ekihika , buri izooba baaguma nibashwijuma Ebyahandiikirwe , kureeba yaaba kiri eky'amazima .
44017012	Abayudaaya baingi baikiriza hamwe n'Abaguriikikazi baingi ab'ekitiinwa , n'abashaija batari bakye .
44017013	Abayudaaya ba Tesalonika ku baahuriire ngu Paulo naarangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'omuri Beroya , baazayo kurabanisamu abantu n'okubajagaraza .
44017014	Abanyaruganda nikwo kwohereza Paulo ahonaaho kuza aha nyanja ; Silaasi na Timoteeho bo baatsigarayo .
44017015	Abaashendekyereize Paulo bakamuhitsya Ateene , baagaruka n'obutumwa bwe , ku Silaasi na Timoteeho bamushangayo ahonaaho nk'oku kirabaasikye .
44017016	Paulo ku yaabaire akitegyerereize Silaasi na Timoteo omuri Ateene , yaashaasha munonga kureeba orwo rurembo rwona rwijwire ebishushani ebirikuramibwa .
44017017	Yaaguma naahakanira omu iteeraniro n'Abayudaaya n'Abanyamahanga abarikutiina Ruhanga , kandi omu kajagiro buri izooba ahakana na weena owaamwizira .
44017018	Nangwa n'abanyabwengye bamwe , abarikwetwa Abeepikuro n'Abasitoiki baahakana nawe . Abamwe baagira bati : Beitu egi ngambi ya maingi , ebyo neemanya ebi erikugamba ? Reero ahabw'okwegyesa ahari Yesu n'eby'okuzooka , abandi bati : Nooshusha oti n'omuntu orikubuzya orukuru rw'ebya baaruhanga abu kunu tutarikumanya .
44017019	Baamweta ku agyenda nabo omu ishengyero erikuru ei baamugiriire bati : Egi nyegyesa nsya ei obaire noogambaho , mbwenu okaagitushoboororera ?
44017020	Bimwe omu bi ogambire bitutangaarize , tukaayenzire kumanya amakuru gaabyo .
44017021	Manya ekishemeza Abaateene n'Abanyamahanga abarutwiremu , n'okugaaniira aha bintu bisya ebihangire , hamwe n'okuhurira eki barikubigambaho .
44017022	Paulo nikwo kwemerera ahagati y'eishengyero erikuru , akagamba ati : Imwe bashaija ba Ateene ' mwe , mperize kwetegyereza ku muri ab'ediini munonga .
44017023	Manya ku mbaire ningyendagyenda omu rurembo rwanyu , niinyetegyereza ebi murikuramya , naareeba eitambiro erihandiikirweho ngu : N'erya Ruhanga otarikumanywa . Mbwenu Ruhanga ou ndikurangirira , buzimazima niwe ogwo ou muramya mutarikumumanya .
44017024	Ruhanga owaahangire ensi yoona n'ebigirimu , niwe Nyakubaho w'eiguru n'ensi , tatuura mu ndaaro ezombekirwe emikono y'abantu .
44017025	Tabangirwa bantu nk'oine eki akyenire , ahabw'okuba boona niwe abaha amagara n'omwitsyo na buri kintu .
44017026	Akahanga amahanga g'omu nsi yoona , gaakomooka aha muntu omwe . Yaagateeraho ebiro bi garaamare , n'enyatano zaago ahi ziraagarukire .
44017027	Akakora ekyo , ngu amahanga goona gabone kusherura Ruhanga nigabandagira , okuhitsya obu garimugwaho . Kwonka shi , tari hare n'omuntu weena omuriitwe ;
44017028	ahabw'okuba Omuriwe nimwo tutungira amagara tukagyenda kandi tukagumaho , nk'oku abahandiiki baanyu abamwe baagizire bati : Naitwe turi abaana be .
44017029	Nk'oku turi abaana ba Ruhanga , titwine ky'okwekwatsa kugira ngu Ruhanga naashusha ezaabu , efeeza nari eibaare , ebisharwirwe bikaringirikwa omuntu .
44017030	Ebyo Ruhanga akabirenzya amaisho abantu bakiri abashema ; kwonka mbwenu naaragiira abantu boona ahi bari hoona ngu beegarukyemu .
44017031	Ahabw'okuba akataho ekiro eki omuntu ou yaataireho aricwereraho ensi yoona orubanja omu mazima , kandi ekyo akakihamiza abantu boona obu yaazoora ogwo muntu omu bafiire .
44017032	Ku baahuriire Paulo yaagamba eky'okuzooka omu bafiire , bamwe aharibo ensheko zaabeegyeka ; abandi baagira bati : Tukaayenzire kuhurira ekyo nookigambaho obundi .
44017033	Paulo atyo abarugaho .
44017034	Kwonka habaho bamwe abaamwekomireho , bakaba abaikiriza ; omuribo harimu Dionisio ow'eishengyero erikuru n'omukazi orikwetwa Damari , hamwe n'abandi .
44018001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , Paulo yaaruga Ateene , yaaza Korinto ,
44018002	ei yaabugaine Omuyudaaya orikwetwa Akwila , enzaarwa ya Ponto . We n'omukazi we Purisikila nibwo baabaire barugire juba Italiya , ahabw'okuba Rubambansi Kalaudio akaba aragiire Abayudaaya boona kuruga omuri Rooma . Paulo nikwo kuza kubataayaayira ;
44018003	kandi ku yaashangire bari abakozi b'amahema ab'omwoga nk'ogwe , yaaguma nabo nibakora kumwe .
44018004	Buri Sabato akaba ahakanira omu mateeraniro , naateeraho kwikirizisa Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki .
44018005	Silaasi na Timoteeho ku baaherize kwija nibaruga Makedoniya , Paulo yaamara omwanya gwe gwona omu kurangirira , naagambira Abayudaaya ku Yesu ari Kristo .
44018006	Ku baatandikire kumutariza n'okumujuma , yaakunkumura omunagiro gwe , naagira ati : Eshagama yaanyu ebe niimwe yaatukurira ! Nyowe ndi mwere . Okwiha hati naaza omu Banyamahanga .
44018007	Atyo arugayo aza omu nju ya Tito Yusito owaabaire aramya Ruhanga . Enju ye ekaba ehereeraine n'eiteeraniro .
44018008	Kurisipo omukuru w'eiteeraniro , we n'ab'eka ye boona baikiriza Mukama . Abakorinto baingi munonga abaahuriire Paulo , nabo baikiriza kandi baabatizibwa .
44018009	Ku bwabaire buri nyekiro , Mukama yaabonekyera Paulo , yaamugira ati : Otatiina , guma ogambe kandi otahunama .
44018010	Nkwine kandi tihariho muntu weena oraakukore kubi , ahabw'okuba omu rurembo oru , nyinemu abantu baingi abari aha rubaju rwangye .
44018011	N'ahabw'ekyo Paulo yaagumayo naarangirira ekigambo kya Mukama okumara ameezi ikumi na munaana .
44018012	Galio ku yaabaire ari omutegyeki mukuru wa Akaiya , Abayudaaya baacuma enaama y'okukwata Paulo , baamutwara omu iramuriro .
44018013	Baagira bati : Ogu mushaija nitumutabaariza orubanja rw'okwosya abantu kuramya Ruhanga omu buryo butarikwikirizibwa iteeka .
44018014	Paulo ku yaabaire atakagambire , Galio yaagira Abayudaaya ati : Imwe Bayudaaya ' mwe , nimuhurire ! Ekyo kuri kyaba kiri ekishobyo ky'okushaazya nari ekicumuro , nkaabaire nyine obwiho kw'okubahurira .
44018015	Kwonka mbwenu empaka zaanyu ku ziraabe ziri aha bigambo n'aha maziina n'aha iteeka ryanyu mwenka , muzeemarire . Nyowe tinkaayenzire kucwa orubanja rw'ebintu nk'ebyo .
44018016	Atyo ababinga omu iramuriro .
44018017	Ahonaaho nabo bahindukana Sositene , omukuru w'eiteeraniro , baamuteerera omu maisho g'enju y'eiramuriro ; Galio ebyo byona abihugaho .
44018018	Bwanyima Paulo ku yaaherize kuteerayo ebiro , yaaraga abanyaruganda , yaatoora ogw'enyanja , yaaza Siriya aine Purisikila na Akwila . Ku yaabaire ari Kenkereya , yaamwerayo eishokye nk'oku yaabaire ahigire .
44018019	Ku baahikire Efeso , yaabatsigayo . Yaataaha omu iteeraniro wenka , yaahakana n'Abayudaaya .
44018020	Ku baamushabire ku abooshera ebindi biro , yaayanga .
44018021	Kwonka ku yaagiire kurugayo , yaabagira ati : Ruhanga yaaba akunzire , ndyagaruka . Atyo atoora ogw'enyanja , aruga Efeso .
44018022	Yaayambukira Kaisaariya , yaaza kuramutsya ekigombe ky'Abakristo , bwanyima yaataaha Antiokiya .
44018023	Okwo yaamarayo ebiro bikye atakagumiizemu rugyendo rwe , orw'okuraba omu nsi y'Abagalatiya n'omuri Furugiya , naagumya abaikiriza boona .
44018024	Ago magingo Omuyudaaya orikwetwa Apolo , enzaarwa ya Alekisanderiya , owaabaire ari omugambi murungi kandi orikumanya munonga Ebyahandiikirwe , akahika Efeso .
44018025	Kwonka nobu araabe yaabaire ayegyesiibwe eby'Omuhanda gwa Mukama , kandi naarangirira n'omuhimbo ebya Yesu n'okubyegyesa gye , hoona akaba naamanya eby'okubatiza kwa Yohaana byonka .
44018026	Purisikila na Akwila ku baamuhuriire naagambisa obumanzi omu iteeraniro , baamutwara , baayongyera kumwegyesa eby'Omuhanda gwa Ruhanga .
44018027	Apolo ku yaatungire ekiteekateeko ky'okwambuka kuza Akaiya , abanyaruganda baamugumya , baahandiikira abaikiriza baayo kumwakiira . Ku yaahikireyo , yaakwatsa munonga abaikiriize ahabw'okuhwerwa Ruhanga ,
44018028	ahabw'okuba akahakanisisa amaani Abayudaaya omu maisho g'abantu , kandi yaabashoboororera naayema omu Byahandiikirwe ku Yesu ari Kristo .
44019001	Apolo ku yaabaire akiri Korinto , Paulo yaagyenda naaraba omu kyanga kya ruguru , yaahika Efeso ei yaashangire abatendekwa bamwe .
44019002	Ku yaababuurize ati : Mukaheebwa Mutima Orikwera obu mwaikiriza ? Baamugarukamu bati : Ngaaha , nangwa titukahuriraga ku hariho Mutima Orikwera .
44019003	Agaruka ababuuza ati : Mbwenu shi mukabatizibwa muta ? Bati : Tukabatizibwa okwa Yohaana .
44019004	Paulo ati : Okubatiza kwa Yohaana kukaba kuri okw'abeegarukiremu kandi akaba ayehanangiriza abantu ngu baikirize ogwo orikwija amukuratiire , niwe Yesu .
44019005	Ku baahuriire ekyo , baabatizibwa omu iziina rya Mukama Yesu .
44019006	Kandi Paulo ku yaabataireho ati emikono , Mutima Orikwera yaabaijaho ; baatandika kugamba endimi n'okuranga .
44019007	Boona bakaba bari nka ikumi na babiri .
44019008	Bwanyima Paulo yaaza omu iteeraniro , yaagambiramu n'obumanzi , kandi yaahakaniramu n'obwengye kubaikirizisa eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga . Yaamara ameezi ashatu naakora atyo ,
44019009	okuhitsya obu bamwe omu baabaire nibamuhurira baagangaire , bakanga kwikiriza . Ku baatandikire bati kuhakanisiza eby'Omuhanda gwa Mukama omu maisho g'abantu , yaataana nabo , yaatwara abatendekwa be kwehereera , kandi buri izooba baaguma nibahanuurira omu kishengye kya Turaano eky'okwegyesezamu .
44019010	Yaagumizamu naakora atyo kumara emyaka ebiri ; ekyarugiremu , abantu b'omuri Asiya boona Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki , baahurira ekigambo kya Mukama .
44019011	Ruhanga akakoresa Paulo eby'okutangaaza by'omutaano .
44019012	Bakaba batwara ebitambaara n'emitanda ebyabaire bimuhikaho , babikoza aha barwaire , bakira endwara , n'ebyago bibarugaho .
44019013	Abandi Bayudaaya abaabaire bagyenda nibabinga ebyago , bakateeraho kukoresa eiziina rya Mukama Yesu aha bantu abaabaire batembirwe ebyago , nibagira bati : Ninkuragiira omuri Yesu ou Paulo arangirira .
44019014	Omuri abo abaakikozire , hakaba harimu abatsigazi mushanju , batabani b'Omuyudaaya Sikeeva omuhongyerezi omukuru .
44019015	Ekyago kyabagarukamu kiti : Yesu nimmumanya na Paulo nimmumanya ; kwonka imwe muri baahi ?
44019016	Ogwo mushaija oriho ekyago nikwo kubagurukira , akaikarira ow'okubanza , akataho n'ondi , akabajuguta ; bakahunga omuri egyo nju bajwaire busha kandi bahutaire munonga .
44019017	Abantu boona ab'omuri Efeso , Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki , ku baakihuriire , baatiina munonga ; haza eiziina rya Mukama Yesu ryaheebwa ekitiinwa kihango .
44019018	Baingi aha baikiriize , baija , baayatura ebi baabaire nibakora , baabitondoora byona .
44019019	Kandi abaabaire nibakora eby'obufumu , barundaana ebitabo byabo baabyokyeza omu maisho g'abantu . Obuguzi bwabyo bukabariirirwa , bwahitsya ebicweka by'efeeza obukumi butaano .
44019020	Kityo ekigambo kya Mukama kyayongyera kubuga n'amaani , kitarikuteerwa ha mutwe .
44019021	Ebyo byona ku byahwaire Paulo yaamariirira kugaruka Yerusalemu , naaraba Makedoniya na Akaiya . Yaagira ati : Ku ndaabe naaherize kuhikayo , niinyija kuza na Rooma .
44019022	Atyo yaatuma babiri aha bahwezi be , Timoteeho na Eraasito kumwebembera kuza Makedoniya , we akitsigaire omuri Asiya .
44019023	Omu bunaku obwo hakabaho akaimukiiriro k'akabi , akakwatiraine n'eby'Omuhanda gwa Mukama .
44019024	Omuheesi w'eby'efeeza orikwetwa Demetirio , owaabaire naaheesesa abanyamyoga baingi ebishushani by'endaaro za ruhangakazi Aritemi ,
44019025	akataho oruteerane ruhango rw'abantu be n'abandi abarikukora omurimo nk'ogwe . Yaabagira ati : Bashaija ' mwe , nimumanya omurimo gw'okuheesha ogu ku nigwo gutwemereizeho .
44019026	Mbwenu muherize kureeba nainga kuhurira , ti muri Efeso yonka , kureka n'ahandi hoona omuri Asiya , ku omushaija ogu Paulo ayohize kandi ahindwire abantu baingi munonga , naabashoboororera oku baaruhanga abakozirwe engaro batari baaruhanga n'akakye .
44019027	Eki tikirikwita bushuubuzi bwonka , kureka n'endaaro y'emandwakazi yaitu rugambwa Aritemi nikiija kugimaramu ensha , kandi tikiribura kwihaho kitiinwa ky'emandwakazi erikuramibwa omuri Asiya yoona n'ahandi hoona omu nsi .
44019028	Ebigambo ebyo bikabaitsa ekiniga , baatandika kwamuza bati : Aritemi w'Abeefeso niwe rugambwa !
44019029	Orurembo rwona rwaimukiirira , omutwe gw'abantu gwayeshuka omu kizaaniro , gwabindirana Abamakedoniya babiri , Gaayo na Arisitariko , abu Paulo yaabaire agyenda nabo .
44019030	Paulo yaayenda kuza omuri abo bantu kubaretsya , kwonka abatendekwa tibaamukundira .
44019031	Kandi na bamwe aha bakungu bakuru ba Asiya , abaabaire bari banywani be , baamutumaho nibamweshengyereza kutaza mu kizaaniro akeenaga omu kabi .
44019032	Obwo buri omwe akaba naayomba okwe , okuhitsya obu abaabaire bateeraniireho baabuzirwe kumanya ekiriho , n'abaingi batarikumanya ki beeteirwe .
44019033	Abayudaaya baayoha Alekisandero omu maisho gaabo . Ab'omu kimbuuro ky'abantu ku baimukize akaari k'okumuhigika , yaabaretsya n'omukono , ngu akaagira eki yaashoboororera abantu .
44019034	Kwonka ku baamanyire Alekisandero ku ari Omuyudaaya , baayamuza n'eiraka rimwe , bagumize bati : Aritemi ow'Abeefeso niwe rugambwa ! Baagumizamu batyo okuheza eshaaha ibiri .
44019035	Omuhandiiki ku yaaherize kucureeza ogwo mutwe gw'abantu , yaabagira ati : Imwe Banyaefeso ' mwe , hariho omuntu otarikumanya ngu orurembo rw'Abeefeso nirwo rurinda eiramizo rya Aritemi omukuru rugambwa , kandi n'ekishushani kye ekyarugire omu iguru ?
44019036	Ekyo tihariho n'omwe orikukihakanisa , kandi timushemereire kwimukiirira nari okukorera eryo ekintu nimurahukiiriza .
44019037	Abashaija aba abu mwareeta tibacumwire , kandi tibarogotsire ha mandwakazi yaitu .
44019038	Demetirio n'abanyamyoga bu aine ku baraabe baine ou barikufa nawe , hariho amaramuriro n'abategyeki bakuru , babe niyo baatwara orubanja rwabo .
44019039	Kandi ku muraabe mwine ebi murikwenda kubabuuza , mubibabuurize omu ruteerane rw'obutoosha .
44019040	Manya naitwe tukaateebwaho orubanja rw'okujagarara ahabw'ebyabaho eri izooba . Tihariho ky'okwekwatsa ekyakitukoresa , kandi titwine ky'oburyo ekyatureetera kuteeranira aha .
44019041	Ku yaaherize kugamba atyo , yaaragiira oruteerane kuyaabuuka .
44020001	Akajagararo ku kaahwaire , Paulo yaayeeta abaikiriza , yaabagambira eby'okubagumya , yaabaraga , yaimutsya orugyendo kuza Makedoniya .
44020002	Ku yaaherize kuraba omuri ebyo byanga , n'okubagambira ebigambo bingi by'okubagumya , yaaza Buguriiki .
44020003	Okwo amarayo ameezi ashatu . Ku yaabaire naayenda kutemba obwato kuza Siriya , Abayudaaya bacuma enaama y'okumwita . Nawe nikwo kucwamu kugaruka enyima akatoora ogwa Makedoniya .
44020004	Obwo akaba ashendekyereziibwe Sopateeri , mwene Puuro owa Beroya ; na Arisitariko na Sekundo Abatesalonika ; Gaayo owa Deribe na Timoteeho na Tukiko na Turofimo aba Asiya .
44020005	Boona baatwebembera nibaza Turoa ei baatutegyerereize .
44020006	Naitwe twaruga Filipi turi omu bwato , ebiro by'Emigaati Etatumbisiibwe biherize kuhwaho . Twabugabuganira nabo Turoa , hahingwireho ebiro bitaano ; okwo twamarayo ebiro mushanju .
44020007	Aha kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki , tukateerana kurya kumwe omugaati , Paulo owaabaire arariire kugyenda bwasheesha , yaagumizamu naagamba nabo , bwarugaho bwaba eitumbi .
44020008	Ekishengye ky'ahaiguru eki twabaire tuteeraniiremu , kikaba nikyakwamu amatabaaza maingi .
44020009	Paulo ku yaagumiizemu naagamba , omutsigazi orikwetwa Eutuko , owaabaire ashutami aha ndeebareebo y'edirisa , yaahungira , oturo twarugaho twamurembya , yaahanantuka omuri kaanyinaashatu , yaayetuura ahansi . Bamwihaho afiire .
44020010	Paulo yaashuuma , yaajuumarira ogwo mwojo , yaamubumbatira , yaagira ati : Murekye kutiina , akihuriire .
44020011	Atyo agarukayo omu kishengye ky'ahaiguru , acwamu omugaati , aryaho , agumizamu naagamba okuhitsya obu yaarugireyo nibwaba , akagyenda .
44020012	Bwanyima baatwara ogwo mwojo ahuriire , omutima gwabagaruka omunda .
44020013	Itwe nu tukatemba obwato , twaza Aso kwakiirirayo Paulo , ahabw'okuba we akaba acwiremu kutoora ogw'ebigyere .
44020014	Ku yaatushangire Aso , twamuta omu bwato , twagumizamu twahika Mituleene .
44020015	Ku bwaseesire , twarugayo , twahika ahashungaine na Kiyo . Aha kiro kya kabiri twahika Samosi , kandi eizooba eryakuratsireho twayegaranjura Mileeto .
44020016	Obwo Paulo akaba amaririire kutaraba Efeso , ngu atakaakyerererwa omuri Asiya . Manya akaba aine obwira , ngu kyaba nikibaasika , abe omuri Yerusalemu aha kiro kya Pentekooti .
44020017	Paulo ku yaabaire ari Mileeto , yaatuma aha bakuru b'ekigombe ky'Abakristo ba Efeso kumushangayo .
44020018	Ku baahikireyo , yaabagambira ebigambo ebi ati : Nimumanya oku emitwarize yangye yaabaire eri , naaba kubaijamu omuri Asiya ,
44020019	oku naabaire mpeereza Mukama n'obucureezi bwingi , kandi nimumanya obusaasi n'ebihikiirizi ebyangwireho ahabw'enaama mbi z'Abayudaaya .
44020020	Tindarekire kubakorera kintu kyona ekibainiire omugasho omu kubarangirira n'okubahabura , muteeraniire hamwe kandi muri n'omu maka gaanyu ,
44020021	obwo niinyehanangiriza Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki okweteisiza Ruhanga n'okwikiriza Mukama waitu Yesu .
44020022	Hati nimureeba ku ndikugyemwa Mutima kuza Yerusalemu ntarikumanya birambeho naahikayo ;
44020023	kureka omu buri kirorero ki ndabiremu , Mutima Orikwera ammanyiise gye , ku ndi ow'okuteebwa omu kihome n'okuhiiganisibwa .
44020024	Kwonka nyowe tiinyine ki ndikutiina omuri ebyo byona , n'amagara gangye tindikugeeta kantu , kizima niho ndikuhikiiriza orugyendo rwangye n'omurimo ogu Mukama Yesu yampaire , nikwo kuhamya Amakuru Marungi ag'embabazi za Ruhanga .
44020025	Mbwenu nimmanyira kimwe ku hatariho n'omwe omuriimwe , abu naahikireho nimbuzya eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga , orincwa eryera obundi .
44020026	N'ahabw'ekyo hati nimbahamiza ku ndi mwere ahariimwe mwena oku mwingana ,
44020027	ahabw'okuba nkabamanyisa eby'enaama ya Ruhanga byona ntarikwebarira .
44020028	Mwerinde kandi murinde obusyo bwona obu Mutima Orikwera yaabakwatsize kureeberera , okuba abariisa b'ekigombe kya Mukama , eki yaayecunguriire n'eshagama ye wenka .
44020029	Nimmanya gye ngu ku ndigyenda , emishega enshaarizi eryabataahirira , kandi obwo busyo teribugirira saasi .
44020030	Nangwa n'omuriimwe haryarugamu abantu abarihabisa abaikiriza .
44020031	N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde , kandi mwijukye ku naamazire naimwe emyaka eshatu , ntarikwosha nyomushana na nyekiro nimpabura buri omwe n'amarira .
44020032	Hati nimbakwatsa Ruhanga n'ekigambo kye eky'embabazi . Abahamye , abahe omwanya ogu mwateekateekyeirwe omu beeziibwe boona .
44020033	Nyowe tinkashabaga muntu weena kasente nari eky'okujwara .
44020034	Manya mwena nimumanya ku emikono yangye egi niyo yaabaire empaisa eby'okutunga hamwe n'abu naabaire nyine .
44020035	Ebyo byona nkabikora kubooreka ku tushemereire kukoresa amaani , ngu tubone kuhwera abatagaine , obwo nitwijuka ebigambo bya Mukama Yesu , owaagizire ati : Okugaba kwine omugisha okukira okuheebwa .
44020036	Paulo ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , yaatsimba amaju nabo boona , baashaba .
44020037	Obwo , boona bakaba nibarira , nibarengyeza Paulo emikono omu maraka , nibamunywegyera .
44020038	Ekyakizire kubareetera obusaasi n'okubagambira ngu tibarimucwa ryera bundi . Batyo baamushendekyereza , baamuhitsya aha bwato .
44021001	Bwanyima ku twaherize kutaana nabo , twatoora ogw'enyanja , twagumizamu tutyo , twahika Koosi . Eizooba ryakuratsireho , twahika Rooda . Okwo niyo twarugire nituza Patara ,
44021002	ei twashangire obwato burikuza Foinikiya , tukaburagaramu , tukagyenda .
44021003	Ku twaherize kuranzya Kupuro , twagitsiga orubaju rwa bumosho , twaza Siriya . Twarugayo twahika Tuuro , ahabw'okuba niyo baabaire nibaza kuteekuururira esika omu bwato .
44021004	Ku twaherize kubona abaikiriza , twamaraho ebiro mushanju . Ahabw'okuhaburwa Mutima , baagambira Paulo kutaza Yerusalemu .
44021005	Kwonka obunaku ku bwahikire , twaimutsya orugyendo . Boona hamwe n'abakazi n'abaana baatushendekyereza , okuhitsya obu twarugire omuri ekyo kirorero . Ku twahikire aha nkungu y'enyanja , twatsimba amaju twashaba . Bwanyima ku twaherize kuragana ,
44021006	twaza omu bwato , nabo baagarukayo owaabo .
44021007	Orugyendo rwaitu rw'okuruga Tuuro ku rwahwaire , twahika Putolemaida , ei twaramukiize abanyaruganda , tukabaraarira ekiro kimwe .
44021008	Ku bwaseesire twarugayo , twahika Kaisaariya . Twaraba ahari Filipo omurangirizi w'Amakuru Marungi , omwe ahari bari omushanju , twamuraarira .
44021009	Akaba aine bahara be bana enshugaane , bari abarangikazi .
44021010	Ku twabaire tumazireyo ebiro , haija omurangi orikwetwa Agabo , naaruga Buyudaaya .
44021011	Yaakwata orukoba rwa Paulo yaarwekomesa ebigyere n'emikono , yaagira ati : Oku nikwo Mutima Orikwera arikugamba ati : Mukama w'orukoba oru naija kukomwa atyo Abayudaaya b'omuri Yerusalemu , bamuheyo omu Banyamahanga .
44021012	Ekyo ku twakihuriire , itwe n'abandi boona abaabaire bariho , twayehanangiriza Paulo kutaza Yerusalemu .
44021013	Yaatugarukamu ati : Mbwenu ekyo nimukora ki ; haza muza aho , murira ngu muncwe entegye ? Manya nyowe tiinyeteekateekyeire kukomwa kwonka , kureka n'okufeera omuri Yerusalemu ahabw'eiziina rya Mukama Yesu .
44021014	Mpaho ku ayanga kutworobera , tumureka tugira tuti : Mukama eki arikwenda kikorwe .
44021015	Ebyo ku byahwaire , twakoma ebyaitu , twainamuka twaza Yerusalemu .
44021016	Bamwe omu baikiriza ba Kaisaariya baatushendekyereza , baatuhitsya aha nju y'Omunyakupuro ou twabaire nituza kuraarira , orikwetwa Munasooni , omwe aha baikiriza abaabandize .
44021017	Ku twahikire tuti omuri Yerusalemu , abanyaruganda baatutangirira n'okushemererwa kwingi .
44021018	Ku bwaseesire , Paulo yaagyenda naitwe kureeba Yakobo , kandi abakuru b'ekigombe ky'Abakristo boona bakaba bariyo .
44021019	Ku yaaherize kubaramutsya , yaabateekyerereza byona ebi Ruhanga yaamukoreise omu Banyamahanga .
44021020	Nabo ku baabihuriire , baahimbisa Ruhanga . Kwonka baamugira bati : Munyaruganda , iwe nooreeba oku enkumi n'enkumi z'Abayudaaya bahindukire bakaikiriza ; haza boona nibeezirika kukuratira eiteeka .
44021021	Kwonka bahuriire ku orikwegyesa Abayudaaya boona abatwire omu Banyamahanga kutsigaho eiteeka rya Musa ; kandi ngu noobagambira ku kitarikuragiirwa kushara batabani baabo , nari okukuratira emicwe y'eihanga .
44021022	Mbwenu tugire tuta ? Manya boona tibarikubura kuteerana , ku baraahurire ngu oizire .
44021023	Hati kora eki turikukuhabura . Aha twineho abashaija bana abaahigire ;
44021024	obatware , oyeyeze hamwe nabo , oihure byona eby'okubamwa eishokye . Ekyo nikiija kumanyisa boona ku ebi baakugambireho bitari by'amazima , kandi naiwe obutoosha ku okuratira eiteeka .
44021025	Mbwenu Abanyamahanga abaikiriize tuherize kubahandiikira , twabamanyisa ebi twahingwize , ku bashemereire kwetantara ebitambiirwe ebishushani , orwamba , enyama y'ebihotoirwe , n'ebikwatiraine n'obushambani .
44021026	Aha izooba eryakuratsireho , Paulo yaatwara abo bashaija , yaayezibwa nabo . Yaataaha omuri Nyaruju kumanyisa obunaku obu ebiro by'okwezibwa biraahweremu , ku nibwo ekihongwa kya buri omwe kiriheebwayo .
44021027	Ebiro ebyo omushanju ku byabaire biri haihi kuhwaho , Abayudaaya bamwe abaarugire Asiya baareeba Paulo omuri Nyaruju . Baimukiiriza abantu , baamukwata ,
44021028	nibayogoora bati : Imwe Baisiraeli ' mwe , nimutuhe emikono ! Ogu niwe mushaija oza buri hantu , akarangirira abantu naahakanisa eihanga ryaitu , eiteeka n'omwanya ogu . Mbwenu ataahize Abaguriiki omuri Nyaruju , atyo yaahagaza omwanya ogu ogurikwera !
44021029	Ekyo bakakigamba , ahabw'okuba bakaba baareebire Turofimo Omunyaefeso ari hamwe na Paulo omu rurembo , baateekateeka ngu Paulo amutaahize omuri Nyaruju .
44021030	Orurembo rwona rwajagarara , abantu baayooka , baakwata Paulo , baamukurubana , baamushohoza aheeru ya Nyaruju , ahonaaho enyigi zaakingwa .
44021031	Bakiba nibenda kumwita , enkuru ehika omukuru w'eihe , ku Yerusalemu yoona yaajagarara .
44021032	Ahonaaho ayeta abaserukare n'abakuru baabo , boohokyera abo bantu ; nabo ku bareeba omukuru w'eihe n'abaserukare , barekyera aho kuteera Paulo .
44021033	Ogwo omukuru w'eihe ku yaahikire Paulo , yaamukwata , yaaragiira ku bamukomesa enjegyere ibiri , yaabuuza ati : Ogu n'oha , kandi akozire ki ?
44021034	Bamwe omuri ekyo kimbuuro ky'abantu bagarukamu nibabuuza , bamwe eki , n'abandi ekindi ; orwari rwabo rumuremesa kushoboorokyerwa eki barikugamba , nawe nikwo kuragiira ku batwara Paulo omu kigo ky'abaserukare .
44021035	Ku baahikize Paulo aha bitembezo , ekyo kimbuuro ky'abantu kyayeyongyera kugira ekishinjo , abaserukare nikwo kumukiriza ;
44021036	abantu boona bakaguma babakuratiire nibayogoorekana bati : Mumwite !
44021037	Kwonka Paulo ku yaabaire arangariire kutaahibwa omu kigo , yaabuuza omukuru w'eihe ati : Noonyikiriza kugira eki naakugambira ? Onu ati : Biri noogamba Oruguriiki ?
44021038	Tiiwe Munyamisiri ori ogomeise abantu ebiro ebi , akatwara omu ihamba abashaija enkumi ina abaitsi b'abantu ?
44021039	Paulo amugarukamu ati : Nyowe ndi Omuyudaaya enzaarwa y'omu rurembo Taruso orw'omuri Kilikiya . Naakweshengyereza , nyikiriza ngire eki naagambira abantu .
44021040	Onu amwikiriza . Paulo nikwo kuretsya abantu n'omukono ayemereire aha bitembezo . Boona ku baacecekire , yaabagambira omu Ruheburaayo .
44022001	Mpaho Paulo agambira Abayudaaya ati : Beene waitu na baataata , nimuhurire ebi naaza kubagambira niinyetonganira .
44022002	Ku baahuriire yaabagambira omu Ruheburaayo , baaceceka okukiraho . Paulo yaabagira ati :
44022003	Ndi Omuyudaaya enzaarwa ya Taruso omuri Kilikiya . Nkakurira omuri orwo rurembo , naatendekwa Gamalieli kukuratira eiteeka rya baatataitwe nk'oku riri . Buzimazima nkaba nyine omuhimbo gw'ebya Ruhanga nk'oku mugwine hati .
44022004	Nkahiiganisa ab'Omuhanda ogu n'amaani gangye goona , naaboha abakazi n'abashaija , naabataisa omu kihome .
44022005	Ekyo omuhongyerezi omukuru n'oruteerane rwona orw'abakuru omu ihanga nibakihamya . Manya bakampa n'ebaruha kuzitwarira beene waabo omuri Damasiko . Nkazayo ngu nyiheyo embohe , nzireete Yerusalemu , zifubirwe .
44022006	Ku naabaire ninkigyenda , ndi haihi kuhika Damasiko , nk'omu ihangwe , ahonaaho naayakirwa ekimurinkano kihango nikiruga omu iguru , kyanyehinguririza .
44022007	Naagwa ahansi , naahurira eiraka niringira riti : Saulo , Saulo , nompiiganisiza ki ?
44022008	Naanye naagarukamu nti : Ori oha , Mukama wangye ? Nawe yangira ati : Niinye Yesu owa Nazareeti , ou orikuhiiganisa .
44022009	Abantu bu naabaire nyine , baakareeba ekyo kimurinkano , kwonka tibarahuriire iraka ry'orikugamba naanye .
44022010	Naagira nti : Mukama wangye , mbwenu nkore ki ? Mukama yangarukamu ati : Imuka , oze Damasiko , okwo niyo oraagambirirwe byona ebi oteekateekyeirwe kukora .
44022011	Ekyo kimurinkano kikaaka munonga , kyampumya , bagyenzi bangye nikwo kunkwatira ekihimbo , nkabona kuhika Damasiko .
44022012	Omushaija orikwetwa Ananiya , omunyadiini orikukuratira eiteeka kandi orikusiimwa Abayudaaya boona abatwireyo ,
44022013	akaija kundeeba . Yaanyemerera aha rubaju , yangira ati : Mwene tata Saulo , humuuka . Ahonaaho naahumuuka , naamureeba .
44022014	Bwanyima yangira ati : Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe akutooraine kumanya ebi akunda , n'okureeba Ogwo Ohikiriire , kandi n'okuhurira eiraka rye .
44022015	Manya noija kuba kareebi we omu bantu boona , noohamya ebi waareebire n'ebi waahuriire .
44022016	Kandi mbwenu oteekirwe ki ? Imuka , obatizibwe , oyogibweho ebibi byawe noohoogyera eiziina rye .
44022017	Ku naaherize kugaruka Yerusalemu , naaza omuri Nyaruju kushaba ; ahonaaho naashusha nk'orikuroota ,
44022018	naareeba Mukama . Yangira ati : Rahuka , orugye Yerusalemu juba , ahabw'okuba abaamwo tibarikwija kwikiriza ebi orikungambaho nonjurira .
44022019	Naamugarukamu nti : Mukama wangye , nibamanya ku naabaire ngyendagyenda omu mateeraniro , ninta omu kihome abarikukwikiriza kandi nimbateera ebyasha .
44022020	Nobu baita Sitefano omujurizi waawe , nkaba nyemereireho niinyikirizana n'abarikumwita , ndinzire ebijwaro byabo .
44022021	Nawe nikwo kungira ati : Irooko , nkutume hare omu Banyamahanga .
44022022	Abantu bakaguma bamutegire okutu , okuhitsya obu yaagambire ebyo bigambo , bakatandika kuyogoora bati : Ogwo mushaija nimumwihe aha butaka ! Tashemereire kugumaho !
44022023	Obwo bakaba nibatokoorekana , nibahungyeetsa eminagiro yaabo , kandi nibatuumuura omucuucu ahaiguru .
44022024	Omukuru w'eihe Omurooma nikwo kuragiira kumutaasya omu kigo , n'okumuteera ebyasha kumutakisa , abone kumanya ekirikutokoorekanisa kityo Abayudaaya .
44022025	Ku baaherize kumukoma , Paulo yaabuuza omukuru orikurinda , ati : Omu iteeka nimwikirizibwa kuteera omuntu ebyasha , ari Omurooma kandi atakatonganisiibwe ?
44022026	Ogwo mukuru w'abaserukare ku akihurira , agyenda abiteera omukuru w'eihe , ati : Ebyo noomanya eki orikukora ? Manya ogu mushaija n'Omurooma .
44022027	Omukuru w'eihe nikwo kwija akamubuuza ati : Ngambira , kwokwo ori Omurooma ?
44022028	Paulo amugarukamu ati : Eego , nikwo ndi . Omukuru w'eihe agarukamu ati : Nyowe okutunga oburooma bukancwera ebintu . Paulo nawe ati : Manya nyowe nkabuzaarirwamu .
44022029	Mbwenu obwo abaabaire nibenda kumutakisa , bamurugaho ahonaaho , kandi omukuru w'eihe , ku amanya ngu abohire Omurooma , atiina munonga .
44022030	Eizooba eryakuratsireho , ahabw'okwenda kumanya eky'amazima eki Abayudaaya barikumutabaaririza , ogwo mukuru w'eihe aragiira ku babohoorora Paulo , kandi aragiira abahongyerezi abakuru n'ab'eishengyero boona kuteerana ; atyo areeta Paulo , amwemereza omu maisho gaabo .
44023001	Paulo ahamya amaisho ab'eishengyero , atandika kugamba ati : Banyaruganda , okuhitsya eri izooba ntuura nintwaza gye omu maisho ga Ruhanga , ntaine kirikunshinja .
44023002	Ku yaagambire ekyo , Ananiya omuhongyerezi omukuru yaaragiira abeemereire Paulo haihi , kumuteera aha munwa .
44023003	Paulo yaamugira ati : Iwe kisiika kisiigirwe einoni ' we , Ruhanga naiwe aryakuteera ! Oshutami aha kitebe kuncwera orubanja nk'oku eiteeka riri , haza oragiira kunteera kunu kitarikwikirizibwa ?
44023004	Abaabaire bamwemereire aha rubaju bagira bati : Ka noojuma omuhongyerezi mukuru wa Ruhanga !
44023005	Paulo agarukamu ati : Beene tata , naaba ntarikumanya ku ari omuhongyerezi omukuru , manya ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Otarijuma omutegyeki w'eihanga ryawe .
44023006	Paulo ku yaamanyire ngu abateeraniire aho , abamwe n'Abasadukaayo , abandi n'Abafarisaayo , yaagambira Eishengyero n'eiraka rihango , ati : Beene waitu , nyowe ndi Omufarisaayo kandi omwana w'Abafarisaayo . Nintabaarizibwa ahabw'okuba itwe twikiriza ngu abafiire baryazooka .
44023007	Ku yaabaire yaaheza ati kugamba ekyo , Abafarisaayo n'Abasadukaayo baimutsya empaka , eishengyero ryayecwamu kabiri .
44023008	Manya Abasadukaayo bagira ngu , tihariho kuzooka kandi tihariho baamaraika nobu yaakuba emitima ; haza kunu Abafarisaayo babiikiriza byonshatu .
44023009	Haabaho orwari rwingi , bamwe aha bahangu b'eiteeka ab'omu kigombe ky'Abafarisaayo baayemerera , baabahakanisa n'amaani bati : Titurikureeba eki ogu mushaija ashobize . Shana Mutima nari maraika akaaba niwe amugambiire !
44023010	Empaka ku zaarambire , omukuru w'eihe yaatiina , ngu batakaanyururana Paulo bakamutaanyaguza , yaaragiira engabo ze kushuuma , zimubasikure , zimutware omu kigo .
44023011	Nyekiro Mukama yaamubonekyera , yaamugira ati : Hama ! Nk'oku wambeera kareebi omuri Yerusalemu , obe nikwo waatwaza n'omuri Rooma .
44023012	Ku bwaseesire , Abayudaaya baayeteerana : baacuma enaama nibahiga ku batarikwija kurya nari kunywa okuhitsya obu baraite Paulo .
44023013	Abaacumire egyo naama bakaba nibeeshumba ahari makumi ana .
44023014	Baaza aha bahongyerezi abakuru n'aha bakuru omu ihanga , baabagira bati : Twahigira kimwe ku tutarikwija kurabya kantu mu kanwa , tutakaitsire Paulo .
44023015	Mbwenu imwe hamwe n'eishengyero , ekyanyu n'okushaba omukuru w'eihe kumubareetera , mushushe nk'abarikwenda kwetegyereza gye eby'orubanja rwe ; reero ekyaitu n'okweteekateeka tukamwita atakabahikire .
44023016	Kwonka mwihwa wa Paulo yaahurira egyo naama y'okumugwera ; yaaza omu kigo , yaagigambira Paulo ,
44023017	N'onu yaayeeta omwe omu bakuru b'abaserukare igana , yaamugira ati : Twara omutsigazi ogu aha mukuru w'eihe , aine eki arikwenda kumugambira .
44023018	Yaamutwara , yaamuhitsya omukuru w'eihe , yaagira ati : Paulo embohe yaanyeta , yanshaba kukureetera omutsigazi ogu , ngu aine eki arikwenda kukugabira .
44023019	Omukuru w'eihe nikwo kumukwata omukono , akamuta aha rubaju , akamubuuza ati : Nooyenda kungambira ki ?
44023020	Onu ati : Abayudaaya baacuma enaama y'okushaba kureeta Paulo omu ishengyero nyencakare , nk'abarikwenda kubuuririza gye eby'orubanja rwe .
44023021	Kwonka iwe otabaikiriza kukubeihabeiha , ahabw'okuba hariho abantu barikweshumba ahari makumi ana abamugwereire , kandi baherize kuhiga ngu tibarirya , tibarinywa , kureka baaheza kumwita . Na mbwenu bariyo beeteekateekire , bategyereize eki oraagambe .
44023022	Omukuru w'eihe atyo araga ogwo mwojo naamwehanangiriza ati : Otagira ou waagambira ku waabimmanyisa .
44023023	Bwanyima omukuru w'eihe akeeta babiri aha bakuru b'abaserukare , yaabagira ati : Muteekateekye abaserukare magana abiri , hamwe n'ab'embaraasi makumi mushanju n'ab'amacumu magana abiri , baze Kaisaariya shaaha ishatu za nyekiro .
44023024	Haza mutungire Paulo embaraasi z'okutemba , mumutwarire Felikisi omutegyeki omukuru , atahikirweho kabi .
44023025	Yaahandiika n'ebaruha erikugira eti :
44023026	Ow'ekitiinwa Omutegyeki Omukuru Felikisi , nyowe Kalaudio-Lusiya , ninkuramutsya .
44023027	Omushaija ogu akwatsirwe Abayudaaya , kandi bakaamwitsire kuri ntahikireho n'abaserukare bangye nkamuhunzya , ahabw'okuba maanyire ku ari Omurooma .
44023028	Ahabw'okwenda kumanya eki barikumutabaariza , mmutwaire omu maisho g'eishengyero ryabo ,
44023029	naashanga eki barikumutura kiine akakwate n'ebi barikufa omu by'eiteeka ryabo , kwonka ataine rubanja orushemereire kumwitisa nari kumutaisa omu kihome .
44023030	Ku mmanyire ngu bamwiniire enaama y'okumwita , naarahuka kumukwoherereza , kandi naamanyisa abarikumutabaariza ku bagambira omu maisho gaawe eki barikufa nawe . Ogumeho .
44023031	Abaserukare baakora nk'oku baaragiirwa , baatwara Paulo nyekiro , baamuhitsya Antipatiri .
44023032	Ku bwaseesire , baamutsigira ab'embaraasi kugumizamu nawe bo baagaruka omu kigo .
44023033	Ku baahikire Kaisaariya , baaha ogwo mutegyeki omukuru ebaruha , kandi baamukwatsa Paulo .
44023034	Ogwo mutegyeki omukuru ku yaashomire egyo baruha , yaamubuuza ekyanga ki arikurugamu . Ku amanya ngu naaruga Kilikiya ,
44023035	amugira ti : Orubanja rwawe niinyija kuruhurira baakitabaaza baahika aha . Atyo aragiira ku bamurindira omu kikaari kya Herode .
44024001	Ku haahingwireho ebiro bitaano , Ananiya omuhongyerezi omukuru , yaija n'abakuru omu ihanga hamwe n'ow'okubatonganira orikwetwa Terutuulo ; baatabaariza Paulo omu maisho g'omutegyeki omukuru . Ku baamwetsire , Terutuulo yaatandika kumutabaariza ati :
44024002	Ow'ekitiinwa Felikisi , eihanga eri nirikusiima ahabw'okurireetera obusingye bwingi , n'ebindi ebi okora kurishemeza .
44024003	Ebyo byona nitubiikiriza , kandi obutoosha ahi turi hoona nitubikusiimira munonga .
44024004	Ntakusiibiizeyo , ninkushaba otuhurireho kakye .
44024005	Okukugambira amazima , tureebire ngu omushaija ogu atunyangaraize munonga ; naarabanisamu Abayudaaya omu nsi yoona , kandi niwe mwebembezi w'ekigombe ky'Abanazareeti .
44024006	Ataireho n'okuhagaza Nyaruju , nikwo kumukwata [ ngu tumucwere orubanja nk'oku eiteeka ryaitu riri .
44024007	Kwonka Lusiya , omukuru w'eihe , yaabitaahamu , yaamutwaka n'amaani .
44024008	Yaaragiira abarikumutabaariza kwija aha omu maisho gaawe . ] Na ' mbwenu ku oraamubuuze , nibwo oraayemanyire amazima ga byona ebi turikumutabaariza .
44024009	Abayudaaya nabo baakwatanisa nawe nibahamya ebyo ku nikwo biri .
44024010	Omutegyeki omukuru ku yaasimiize Paulo ngu agambe , onu yaagira ati : Nimmanya ku omazire emyaka mingi noocwera abantu b'ensi egi emanja . Mbwenu nikyo ndikwetonganirira omu maisho gaawe nyine obwesigye .
44024011	Iwe wenka ku oraabuuze , noija kumanya ku hatakahingwireho biro birikweshumba ikumi na bibiri nyinamukire Yerusalemu kuramya .
44024012	Kandi ti kyamazima okugira ngu baranshangire nimpakana n'omuntu weena , nari ningomesa abantu , yaaba muri Nyaruju , yaaba mu mateeraniro , nari ahandi hoona omu rurembo .
44024013	N'ebi barikuntabaariza hati , tibaine buhamya bwabyo .
44024014	Eki ndikwemera omu maisho gaawe n'eki : Nyowe ndamya Ruhanga wa baatatenkuriitwe , ninkuratira Omuhanda gwe , ogu bo barikweta ogw'ekigombe ekyecwireho , obwo niinyikiriza byona ebiri omu iteeka kandi n'ebyahandiikirwe abarangi .
44024015	Obwo nyine amatsiko omuri Ruhanga nkabo , ku haribaho okuzooka kw'abahikiriire n'abatahikiriire .
44024016	Omuri ebyo nkora kyona eki ndikubaasa kugira omutima gutarikushinjwa obunaku bwona ahari Ruhanga n'aha bantu .
44024017	Ku haahingwireho emyaka , naareetera abanaku b'eihanga ryangye eby'okubahwera n'okureeta emitoijo .
44024018	Ku naabaire ninkibikora , banshanga omuri Nyaruju , naaherize kwezibwa , ntainemu bantu kandi ntaine bu njagaraize . Kwonka Abayudaaya abaarugire Asiya ,
44024019	nibo baakwizire aha , bakantabaariza ku baakuba baine eki barikufa naanye .
44024020	Nangwa n'aba abari aha , bagambe ekicumuro eki baareebire nikinsinga , obu baanyemereza omu maisho g'eishengyero .
44024021	Kureka kimwe kyonka eki naagambire nyemereire omu maisho gaabo , nikyo ekyo eky'okuzooka kw'abafiire , eki murikuntonganisa hati omu maisho gaanyu .
44024022	Mpaho Felikisi owaabaire naamanya gye eby'ogwo Muhanda , ku yaahuriire ekyo , orubanja yaarurinza agandi mazooba , naagira ati : Lusiya , omukuru w'eihe , ku araabe yaizire , nibwo ndaahurire orubaja rwawe .
44024023	Atyo yaaragiira omukuru w'abaserukare igana kuguma arinzire Paulo ari enkwatwa , kwonka atarikukumwakumwa kandi batarikuzibira bantu be kwija kumushuura .
44024024	Ku haahingwireho ebiro , Felikisi yaija n'omukazi we Durusila Omuyudaayakazi . Yaatuma , baareeta Paulo ; yaamutega okutu , yaahurira ebi arikwegyesa aha by'okwikiriza Kristo Yesu .
44024025	Kwonka Paulo ku yaatandikire kugamba aha by'okuhikiirira n'eby'okwerinda n'eby'ekiro ky'okucwererwaho orubanja okuribaho , Felikisi yaatiina , yaamugira ati : Mbwenu obwa hati ogyende ; ku ndikwenda ndyakweta .
44024026	Obwo bwona akaba aine amatsiko , ngu Paulo naija kumuha enguzi , nikyo yaagumiire naamweta atyo kaingi kugaaniira nawe .
44024027	Emyaka ebiri ku yaahwaireho , omwanya gwa Felikisi gwagiibwamu Porikio-Fesito ; kandi Felikisi ogwo , ahabw'okwenda kusiimwa Abayudaaya , yaatsiga Paulo omu kihome .
44025001	Fesito ku yaabaire amazire ebiro bishatu ahikire omu ishaza , yaaruga Kaisaariya , yainamuka Yerusalemu .
44025002	Abahongyerezi abakuru n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya baamugambira eby'orubanja rwa Paulo ,
44025003	nibamushaba n'ekihika kubakorera eky'embabazi , akabareetera Paulo Yerusalemu , babone kumugwera bamwitire omu muhanda .
44025004	Kwonka Fesito yaabagarukamu ku Paulo arikwija kuguma Kaisaariya ari omu kihome , kandi ku we arikwija kugarukayo juba .
44025005	Yaayongyera yaabagira ati : K'abaine obushoboorozi omuriimwe bashuume hamwe naanye , kandi ku haraabe hariho ekintu kyona eki ogwo mushaija yaashobize , bamutabaarize .
44025006	Ku yaamazire nabo ebiro bitarikweshumba ahari munaana nari ikumi , yaashuuma Kaisaariya . Aha izooba eryakuratsireho , yaashutama aha kitebe kye ky'oburamuzi , yaaragiira ku bareeta Paulo .
44025007	Ku baamureetsire bati , Abayudaaya , abaabaire barugire Yerusalemu baamwehinguririza nibamutabaariza bingi , kandi eby'amaani ebi bo batarabaasize kuhamya .
44025008	Paulo we yaayetonganira ati : Nyowe tinkakoraga kintu kyona ekirikuhenda eiteeka ry'Abayudaaya , nari okushobya ahari Nyaruju , nainga okucumura ahari Kaisaari .
44025009	Fesito ahabw'okwenda kusiimwa Abayudaaya , yaagira Paulo ati : Noikiriza kwinamuka Yerusalemu , kuba niyo waatonganisizibwa emanja ezi omu maisho gangye ?
44025010	Kwonka Paulo yaamugarukamu ati : Nyowe nyemereire omu maisho g'ekitabe ky'eiramuriro erya Kaisaari , niho nshemereire kutonganisizibwa . Naiwe nookimanya gye ku ntaine kintu kyona eki ndashobeize Abayudaaya .
44025011	Ku ndaabe niinyomeserezibwa orubanja rwona orw'okuunyitisa , ntaruga aha , muunyite . Kwonka ebi aba bantu barikuntabaariza ku biraabe bitarimu nsha , tihariho oine obushoboorozi bw'okubandekurira . Nyowe naajurira ahari Kaisaari .
44025012	Fesito ku yaaherize kwehanuuza aha bahabuzi be , yaamugarukamu ati : Waajuriire ahari Kaisaari ; owa Kaisaari obe niyo waaza .
44025013	Ku haahingwireho ebiro , omugabe Aguripa na Berinike baahika Kaisaariya kutangirira Fesito .
44025014	Baateerayo ebiro . Fesito nikwo kuteekyerereza ogwo mugabe eby'orubanja rwa Paulo , naagira ati : Aha hariho omushaija ou Felikisi yaatsigire omu kihome .
44025015	Naanye ku naabaire ndi Yerusalemu , abahongyerezi abakuru hamwe n'abakuru b'Abayudaaya baamutabaariza , nibenda ngu acwerwe orubanja rumusingye .
44025016	Kwonka naabagira nti : Ti mucwe gw'Abarooma kucwera omuntu orubanja , baakimutabaariza batariho , kandi atakaikiriziibwe kwetonganira orubanja rubarikumutura .
44025017	N'ahabw'ekyo ku baizire aha , naanye tinaasiibyayo . Aha izooba eryakuratsireho , naashutama aha kitebe omu iramuriro , naaragiira ku bareeta ogwo mushaija .
44025018	Abarikumutabaariza ku baayemereire , tibaamutabaariza rubanja rwona orubi nk'oku naabaire ninteekateeka .
44025019	Kureka baamutonganisa ebitari bimwe ebikwatiraine n'ediini yaabo , n'eby'omushaija owaafiire orikwetwa Yesu , ou Paulo yaabaire naagira ngu ahuriire .
44025020	Nyowe ku naashobangiriirwe kutaaha omu bintu nk'ebyo , naamubuuza ku araabe naikiriza kuza Yerusalemu , akaba niyo yaabitonganisizibwa .
44025021	Kwonka Paulo yaajurira ahari Rubambansi , ngu abe niwe yaamucwera orubanja ; naanye nikwo kuragiira ku arindwa , okuhitsya obu ndimwoherereza Kaisaari .
44025022	Aguripa yaagira Fesito ati : Naanye nkaayenzire kuhurira ogwo muntu . Onu ati : Orabumuhurire nyencakare .
44025023	Ku bwaseesire , Aguripa na Berinike baizira omu kitiinwa kingi , baataaha omu iramuriro bashagatiirwe abakuru b'amahe n'abanyamaziina b'omuri orwo rurembo ; mpaho Fesito yaaragiira ku bareeta Paulo .
44025024	Bwanyima Fesito ogwo yaagira ati : Nyakusinga Aguripa , naimwe mwena abateeraniire aha , nimureeba omu maisho gaanyu omushaija ou Abayudaaya boona ab'omuri Yerusalemu n'ab'aha banshabire nibandigitirira kandi nibatokoorekana , ngu tashemereire kurekwa akagumaho .
44025025	Nyowe ahabwangye nkareeba ku ataine kicumuro ki arakozire eky'okumwitisa ; kwonka we ku yaajuriire ahari Rubambansi , naacwamu eky'okumwoherezayo .
44025026	Kandi nk'oku ntaine kishoboorokire eky'okuhandiikira Rubambansi omugabe aha by'ogu mushaija , nikyo naamureetera omu maisho gaanyu mwena , munomuno omu maisho gaawe , Nyakusinga Aguripa , ngu mbone kutunga eki ndaahandiikye .
44025027	Manya nindeeba ku kitahikire kwohereza embohe , ntoorekire manja zirikugitabaarizibwa .
44026001	Mpaho Aguripa agira Paulo , ati : Hati noikirizibwa kwetonganira . Paulo nawe nikwo kwimutsya omukono , akatandika kwetonganira , ati :
44026002	Nyakusinga Aguripa , ningira ngu naahiirwa okureeba eri izooba naaza kwetonganira omu maisho gaawe emanja zoona ezi naatabaariziibwe Abayudaaya ,
44026003	kandi okukira munonga ahabw'okuba noomanyira kimwe eby'emicwe n'empaka z'Abayudaaya . N'ahabw'ekyo ninkweshengyereza , ogumisirize , ompurire .
44026004	Abayudaaya boona nibamanya eby'emitwarize yangye okwiha omu buto , kandi naaba kutandika , nibamanya eby'amagara gangye ndi omu bantu b'eihanga ryangye n'omuri Yerusalemu .
44026005	Okwiha ira nibammanya kandi nibabaasa kukihamya , baaba nibenda , ku naabaire nkuratira ekigombe ekirikukiza ebindi kuhitsya emigyenzo y'ediini yaitu , kandi ku nyowe mba Omufarisaayo .
44026006	Mbwenu hati nintonganisibwa ahabw'okugira amatsiko aha ki Ruhanga yaaraganiise baatataitwe , ekyaraganisiibwe
44026007	ab'enganda zaitu ikumi na ibiri kukitunga , baaba nibeezirika kuramya Ruhanga nyomushana na nyekiro . Ahabw'ago matsiko , Nyakusinga , nikyo Abayudaaya barikuntonganisiza .
44026008	Mbwenu imwe Bayudaaya ' mwe , ahabw'enki nimugira ngu Ruhanga okuzoora abafiire n'ekintu eki mutarikubaasa kwikiriza ?
44026009	Nyowe nkaba nteekateeka ngu gukaba guri omurimo gwangye kukora kyona eki ndikubaasa kurwanisa eiziina rya Yesu owa Nazareeti .
44026010	Ekyo nkakikorera omuri Yerusalemu ; naata abahikiriire baingi omu kihome , obwo abahongyerezi abakuru bampaire obushoboorozi ; kandi ku baabaire bacwerwa orw'okwitwa , naanye nkisiima .
44026011	Emirundi mingi nkaba ngyenda nindaba omu mateeraniro , mbaha ebiheneso , obwo ninteeraho kubagyema , ngu beehakane enyikiriza yaabo . Okumanya ku naabaire mbagirira ekiniga kihango , nkaba ntaho n'okubakurata omu ndembo z'agandi mahanga .
44026012	Omu hururu emwe nk'ezo , ku naabaire ninza Damasiko , mpairwe obushoboorozi kandi ntumirwe abahongyerezi abakuru ,
44026013	Nyakusinga , ku bwabaire bwaba eihangwe nkwaitse ningyenda , naareeba okwaka okurikumurinkana kukira okw'eizooba kwaruga omu iguru . Kwayaka munonga kuunyehinguriirize nyowe n'abu naabaire ningyenda nabo .
44026014	Twena twagwa ahansi , reero naahurira eiraka niringambira omu Ruheburaayo , riti : Saulo , Saulo , nompiiganisiza ki ? Nooyeruhiza busha kuteera omuhunda omugyere .
44026015	Ntyo ngira nti : Ori oha , Mukama wangye ? Mukama angarukamu ati : Niinye Yesu ou orikuhiiganisa .
44026016	Kwonka imuka , oyemerere , ahabw'okuba eki naakubonekyerera n'eki : Naakutoorana kuba omuheereza wangye , kandi kareebi w'okuhamya oku wandeeba , n'ebindi ebi ndikweyorekyeramu .
44026017	Ndyakujuna ab'eihanga ryawe Abaisiraeli , nkwihe n'omu mikono y'Abanyamahanga abu naaza kukutumamu .
44026018	Obahumuure , barugye omu mwirima , baze omu mushana , baimuure Sitaane , beehongyere Ruhanga , kandi ahabw'okuunyikiriza basaasirwe ebibi byabo , batungye omugabo hamwe n'abeeziibwe .
44026019	N'ahabw'ekyo , Nyakusinga Aguripa , nyowe tinkubaasize kugomera okwo kubonekyerwa kwarugire omu iguru .
44026020	Mpaho naakora eki ntakukozire , naatandikira aho kurangirira ab'omuri Damasiko , naataho aba Yerusalemu n'ab'omuri Buyudaaya yoona kandi n'Abanyamahanga , nimbeehanangiriza kweteisa n'okukubuukira Ruhanga , nibakora ebishemereire abeegarukiremu .
44026021	Ekyo nikyo Abayudaaya bankwatiire ndi omuri Nyaruju , bakenda kuunyita .
44026022	Kwonka ahabw'okurindwa Ruhanga , nkyemereireho n'okuhitsya eri izooba , nimpamiza abakuru n'abato , kandi ebi ndikugamba bitari bindi , kureka ebi abarangi na Musa baagambire ngu biryabaho :
44026023	ku Kristo aribonabonesibwa kandi ahabw'okuba ow'okubanza kuzooka omu bafiire ku Abayudaaya hamwe n'Abanyamahanga aribahwezesa .
44026024	Ku yaabaire yaahika ahari ekyo naakyetonganira , Fesito yaagamba n'eiraka rihango ati : Paulo , ka waayanjuka ! Manya okwega munonga kwawe nikwo kukwanjwire omutima .
44026025	Paulo amugarukamu ati : Ow'ekitiinwa Fesito , tiinyanjukire , kureka ebi ndikugamba n'amazima gonka .
44026026	Omugabe ebi naabimanya , na hati nimmugambira ntaine keekyengo , ahabw'okuba nimpamya ku ebi byona arikubimanya ; kandi tindabikoreire mu keehogo .
44026027	Nyakusinga Aguripa , noikiriza eby'abarangi ? Hoona nimmanya ku orikubiikiriza .
44026028	Aguripa nikwo kugira Paulo ati : Ebishi , waaburaho kakye kumpindura Omukristo !
44026029	Paulo amugarukamu ati : Yaaba bikye nari bingi , kwonka nyowe eki ndikushaba Ruhanga , tiiwe wenka , kureka n'abandi mwena abampuriire eri izooba , mube nkaanye okwihaho eby'ezi njegyere .
44026030	Mpaho omugabe aimuka hamwe n'omutegyeki omukuru na Berinike n'abandi boona abaabaire bashutami nabo .
44026031	Ku baaherize kuyaabuuka , baagambirana bonka , bati : Ogu mushaija taine ki akozire ekishemereire kumwitisa nari kumukomesa .
44026032	Aguripa nawe yaagira Fesito ati : Ogu muntu akaarekwirwe , kuri atarajuriire hari Kaisaari .
44027001	Ku kyaherize kuhamibwa ngu tutoore ogw'enyanja kuza Italiya , Paulo n'embohe ezindi baabakwatsa omukuru w'abaserukare orikwetwa Yulio , ow'omu ihe rya Rubambansi .
44027002	Twatemba emeeri eya Aduramuito , eyaabaire neeza kuraba aha nyambukiro z'omwegyeego gwa Asiya , twatoora ogw'enyanja , obwo twine Arisitariko , Omunyamakedoniya owa Tesalonika .
44027003	Eizooba eryakuratsireho , twahika Sidoni ; okwo Yulio yaagirira Paulo embabazi , yaamwikiriza kwegaba omuri banywani be kuruhuukirayo .
44027004	Ku twarugire okwo , twagaruka twaza omu nyanja , kandi ahabw'omuyaga kutureetwa omu maisho , twagyenda nitwekiikuura ekirwa kya Kupuro ,
44027005	twacwekanisiza enyanja ahari Kilikiya na Panfuliya , twahika Muura ey'omuri Lukiya .
44027006	Okwo niyo omukuru w'abaserukare igana yaashangire emeeri erikuruga Alekisanderiya neeza Italiya , akagitutamu .
44027007	Tukamara ebiro nitugumizamu mpora , okuhitsya obu twahikire haihi na Kuniido twakabire . Ahabw'omuyaga kutatwikiriza kuhikayo , twatoora ogurikwekiikuura ekirwa kya Kureete , haihi n'enkokora ya Salumoone .
44027008	Twaitanisa nitwekiikuura , okuhitsya obu twahikire omwanya gurikwetwa Nyambukiro-nungi , haihi n'ekirorero Lasaya .
44027009	Ebiro bingi ku byahingwireho , orugyendo rw'omu nyanja rwaba orw'akabi . Ebiro by'okwesiibyakwo byashangwa byahingwire . Paulo nikwo kubahabura ,
44027010	ati : Bakama bangye , oku ndikureeba orugyendo oru nirwija kuba orw'akabi , ti kusiisikarirwa bintu na meeri byonka , kureka n'okufeerwa amagara gaitu .
44027011	Kwonka omukuru w'abaserukare igana yaata omutima aha by'omukuru w'abavugi b'emeeri na mukama waayo , okukira okuguta aha bi Paulo yaagambire .
44027012	Kandi ahabw'enyambukiro egyo kutaba nungi kumariramu ebiro by'embeho , abaingi baasiima kugumizamu , ngu ebyo biro babimarire Foinikiya , enyambukiro ya Kureete erikureeba orubaju rwa buryo n'orwa bumosho eza burengyerwa-izooba .
44027013	Akayaga karikuheheeza ku kaahuuhire nikaiha omu bukiizi-bwa-buryo , baateekateeka ngu eki baaba nibenda kyaba kwo , baatsibura emeeri , yaatandika kugyenda neeraba aha rubaju rwa Kureete haihi n'enkungu .
44027014	Kwonka ku haabaire hatakahingwireho mwanya muhango , baateerwa omuyaga gw'amaani maingi , ogwetwa ogwa bukiizi-bwa-bumosho bwa burugwa-izooba , ogwaizire nigucwekanisa ekirwa .
44027015	Emeeri yaaremwa kugyema ei gwabaire nigureetwa . Naitwe nikwo kugureka gukaba nigwo gwatutwara .
44027016	Twayekiika omu mwegyeego gw'akarwa kakye akarikwetwa Kauda , bwanyima twabona kuhamiza akaato aha meeri twaherize kufa kubi munonga ;
44027017	baakatembya aha meeri , baakagikomeraho n'emirunga y'ebyoma nibagigyehinguririza . Kandi ku baatiinire kushaayira omu musheenyi gw'enkungu za Suriti , batsibura emeeri ngu batwarwe omuyaga .
44027018	Ku twacurangiibwe munonga omuyaga , aha izooba eryakuratsireho baatandika kunaga esika omu nyanja .
44027019	Kandi aha izooba rya kashatu , baatambika n'emikono yaabo ebirikugyendesa emeeri .
44027020	Ku twamazire ebiro bingi tutarikureeba izooba , nobu zaakuba enyonyoozi , kandi n'eihunga ritatuurize , twahwera kimwe amatsiko g'okukira .
44027021	Ku haahingwireho ebiro bingi bataine ki barikurya , Paulo yaabeemerera ahagati , yaabagira ati : Bagyenzi bangye , kuri mwampuriire , mukareka kuruga Kureete mukaakizire okusiisikarirwa oku kwona hamwe n'okufeerwa ebintu .
44027022	Kwonka mbwenu nimbeehanangiriza , murekye kwehwa amatsiko . Tihariho orikwija kufa omuriimwe , kureka emeeri yonka .
44027023	Manya eki kiro maraika wa Ruhanga , ou ndi owe kandi ou ndamya , anyemereire aha rubaju ,
44027024	yangira ati : Paulo , otatiina ; ori ow'okwemerera omu maisho ga Kaisaari , kandi ahabwawe Ruhanga naija kurinda boona abari naiwe omu bwato , bakire .
44027025	Reero nu , bagyenzi bangye , mugume . Niinyesiga Ruhanga , buzimazima ebintu nibiija kuba nk'oku mmanyisiibwe ;
44027026	kwonka nitwija kugira ekirwa ki twanagwaho .
44027027	Aha kiro kya ikumi na bina , ku twabaire turi omu nyanja Aduriya nitucurangibwa omuyaga , nk'omu itumbi , abarimbi baakyenga ku hariho ensi ei bari haihi kuhikaho .
44027028	Baagyera oburaingwa bw'amaizi obw'okuzimu , bwaba ebigyere igana na makumi abiri kandi ku baagyenzireho akaanya , baagaruka baagyera , baashanga buri makumi mwenda .
44027029	Kwonka ahabw'okutiina ngu tutakaayehonda aha rukiri , baatambika ahansi ebitsibo bina , nibeema aha isinga ry'enyima , baahumbya ngu busheeshe .
44027030	Abarimbi bamwe ku baateireho kucwa omu meeri , bashuumya obwato omu nyanja nk'abarikutambika ebitsibo aha isinga ryayo ery'omu maisho .
44027031	Paulo yaagira omukuru w'abaserukare igana n'abaserukare be , ati : Aba bantu ku baraabe batagumire mu meeri , timuri b'okukira .
44027032	Abaserukare nikwo kushara emirunga y'obwato , bakabureka bukagyenda .
44027033	Ku bwabaire buri haihi kutaagurukana , Paulo yaabeehanangiriza boona kugira eki baarya , yaabagira ati : Hati mwahitsya ebiro ikumi na bina mushobeirwe , mwemereize omutima , mwitsirwe enjara , mutaine ki murikurya .
44027034	Mbwenu nimbeehanangiriza mugire eki mwarya ; nikyo kiraabahe amaani , kandi tiharikwija kugira kashokye na kamwe akaraabure aha mitwe yaanyu mwena .
44027035	Ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , yaakwata omugaati , yaasiimira Ruhanga omu maisho gaabo boona , yaagucwamu , yaatandika kurya .
44027036	Boona baagarukwa omutima omunda , baarya .
44027037	Twena abaabaire bari omuri egyo meeri tukaba turi abantu magana abiri na makumi mushanju na mukaaga .
44027038	Ku baaherize kurya baiguta , baanaga engano omu nyanja ngu emeeri eyanguhirwe .
44027039	Ku bwaseesire , abarimbi tibaamanya nsi ei bahikireho , kwonka baayetegyereza ku guri omukono gw'enyanja oguriho enyambukiro y'omusheenyi ; baayenda kuba niho baahikiza emeeri , kyaba nikibaasika .
44027040	Mpaho baakomoorora ebitsibo , baabitsiga omu nyanja , kandi omuri ako kaanya baayuzya emirunga y'ebirikubogora emeeri . Bwanyima baahanika eitanga ry'omu maisho , boorekyeire ei omuyaga gurikutoora , baagyema enyambukiro .
44027041	Kwonka ku baahikire ahu emishumba erikubugabuganira , egyo mishumba yaabatwara , yaabahitsya ahu amaizi gari magufu , emeeri yaashaaya . Eisinga ery'omu maisho ryayecumitamu ryahamiramu , obwo ery'enyima ryatandika kushatashaturwa ebingonzi birikwehuura .
44027042	Abaserukare baaza omu naama y'okwita embohe , ngu hatakaagira owaaziha , akatoroka .
44027043	Kwonka mukama waabo ahabw'okwenda kukiza Paulo , yaabazibira kukora eki baabaire nibenda . Yaaragiira abarikubaasa kuziha , ku baba nibo baabanza kwetuura omu nyanja , bakambuka ;
44027044	reero abandi babakurate bari aha mbaaho nari aha bishatuka by'emeeri . Batyo boona baahika aha nkungu buhooro .
44028001	Ku twaherize kuhika aha nkungu buhooro , twamanya ku ekyo kirwa kirikwetwa Malita .
44028002	Abatuuzi baayo baatukunira okutakareebwaga . Baatwakiira n'okushemererwa kwingi , kandi ahabw'enjura eyaabaire yaatandikire kugwa , n'obunaku buri obw'embeho , baatuhembera omuriro .
44028003	Paulo ku yaarundaine omuganda gw'enku , yaazita , aha muriro , haatimbiramu empiri neehunga ekibiga ky'omuriro , yaamuramata aha ngaro .
44028004	Enzaarwa z'egyo nsi ku baareebire ekyo kikooko nikimureereetera aha ngaro , baagambirana bati : Ogu muntu buzima n'omwitsi w'abantu . Akizire enyanja ; buhitsya ya Ruhanga terikumureka akagumaho .
44028005	Kwonka we ekyo kikooko yaakikunkumurira omu muriro atabaireho kabi ,
44028006	nobu abantu baateekateekire ngu naija kuzimba juba , nari shi agwe aho afeereho . Ku baaherize kutegyereza omwanya muhango , baareeba ataabaho kabi , baatandika kuteekateeka okundi , nibagira bati : Ogu ni ruhanga ?
44028007	Haihi n'aho hakaba hariho mahiro y'omukungu w'ekyo kirwa orikwetwa Pubulio . Yaatwakiira , yaatukunira munonga okumara ebiro bishatu .
44028008	Omu bunaku obwo ishe wa Pubulio akaba arambiire arwaire omushwija n'esheshe . Paulo yaazayo kumureeba , yaashaba Ruhanga , yaamutaho engaro , yaamukiza .
44028009	Ekyo ku kyabaireho , abandi barwaire b'ahari ekyo kirwa nabo baija , baatambirwa .
44028010	Abaayo bakatuha ekitiinwa kingi ; kandi ku twagiire kuza omu bwato , baatamu eby'entanda byona ebi twabaire nitwetenga .
44028011	Ku haahwaireho ameezi ashatu , twatoora ogw'enyanja turi omu meeri eriho akashushani k'Empasha , eyaabaire erugire Alekisanderiya , ehungiire ebiro by'embeho aha kirwa .
44028012	Twahika Surakuusa , twamarayo kashatu .
44028013	Twarugayo , twagyenda nitwekiikuura , twahika Reegio . Ku twabaire twateerayo ekiro kimwe , haija omuyaga gw'Obukiizi-bwa-buryo ; aha kiro kya kabiri twahika Puteoli ,
44028014	ei twashangire abanyaruganda , bakatushaba kumara nabo ebiro mushanju , bwanyima tukeegaranjura Rooma .
44028015	Abanyaruganda ku baahuriire ngu twahikayo , baija baatubuganira aha Kajagiro ka Api n'aha Maju Ashatu g'Okucumbikamu . Paulo ku yaabareebire , yaasiima Ruhanga , omutima gwamugaruka omunda .
44028016	Ku twahikire omuri Rooma , Paulo yaikirizibwa kweraaza , aine omuserukare orikumurinda .
44028017	Ku haahingwireho ebiro bishatu , Paulo yaayeta Abayudaaya ba Rooma abakuru kuteerana . Ku baateeraine , yaabagira ati : Beene waitu , nobu ndaabe ntaine ki naashobeize abantu , nari okushiisha emicwe ya baatatenkuriitwe , kwonka nkakwatirwa omuri Yerusalemu , naateebwa omu mikono y'Abarooma .
44028018	Ku bantonganiise , baashanga ntaine rubanja rw'okuunyitisa , baayenda kundekura .
44028019	Kwonka Abayudaaya baayanga , naanye nikwo kujurira ahari Kaisaari , ntaine ki ndikwenda kutabaariza ab'eihanga ryangye .
44028020	Mbwenu nikyo naashabira kubareeba n'okugamba naimwe ; ahabw'okuba eki Isiraeli etuura etegyereize , nikyo kinteisize omuri ezi njegyere .
44028021	Nabo baamugarukamu bati : Itwe titukatungaga baruha zirikuruga Buyudaaya ezirikukugambaho , nobu yaakuba omuntu w'owaanyu orahikire aha kutugambira enkuru mbi ahariiwe , nari kukutebyaho kubi .
44028022	Mbwenu tukaayenzire ku oba niiwe waatugambira ebyawe oku byemi . Itwe eki turikumanya aha kigombe eki , n'eki abantu barikugambaho kubi hoonahoona .
44028023	Mpaho Abayudaaya baaragaana na Paulo erindi izooba ; kandi baija baingi ahari eryo izooba omu nju ei yaabaire acumbikiremu . Yaabashoboororera ebye , naabahamiza eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga kandi naateeraho okubaikirizisa Yesu , obwo naajuriza eby'eiteeka rya Musa n'ebyahandiikirwe abarangi . Ebyo akabibagambira okwiha omu kasheeshe okuhitsya omu mwabazyo .
44028024	Abamwe baabiikiriza , kwonka abandi baabyanga .
44028025	Batyo tibaikirizana . Reero ku baabaire nibaimuka kugyenda , Paulo yaabagambira eky'aha muheru ati : Mutima Orikwera ka yaagambire gye , obu yaagambira baashwenkuriimwe naakirabya omu murangi Isaaya , ati :
44028026	Irooko , oze omuri eryo ihanga , origambire oti : Okuhurira kwo muryahurira , kwonka timurishoboorokyerwa . Okureeba kwo muryareeba , kwonka timuryetegyereza .
44028027	Ahabw'okuba emitima y'ab'eihanga eri ebaire ebitsire , amatu gaabo nigahurira kubi , n'amaisho gaabo bagahumiize , ngu batakaareebesa ago maisho gaabo , bakahuriza amatu gaabo , bakeetegyerezesa emitima yaabo , bakampindukira , nkabakiza .
44028028	Paulo ayongyera abagira ati : Mbwenu mukimanye ku obutumwa bw'okujuna kwa Ruhanga bwoherereziibwe Abanyamahanga kandi nibaija kubuhurira .
44028029	[ Ku yaaherize kugamba ebyo , abo Bayudaaya baamurugaho nibahakana munonga bonka na bonka . ]
44028030	Paulo akamara emyaka ebiri yoona omu nju ei yaabaire apangiise . Yaaguma naayakiira boona abaabaire baija kumutaayaayira ,
44028031	naabarangirira eby'obukama bwa Ruhanga , kandi naayegyesa ebya Mukama Yesu Kristo ataine keekyengo , kandi hatariho muntu n'omwe orikumuzibira .
45001001	Nyowe Paulo , omuheereza wa Kristo Yesu , owaayeetsirwe kuba entumwa , nkashoroorerwa kurangirira Amakuru Marungi
45001002	agu Ruhanga yaaraganisiize ira omu Byahandiikirwe Ebirikwera , naagarabya omu barangi be .
45001003	Ago Makuru Marungi nigagamba aha Mwana we owaazairwe omu buntu ari mwijukuru wa Daudi ,
45001004	kandi omu bwaruhanga ahabw'okuzooka kwe omu bafiire , akahamibwa ku ari Omwana wa Ruhanga oine obushoboorozi . Niwe Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu ,
45001005	owaatuhaire omugisha gw'okuba entumwa , ngu tubone kuhitsya amahanga goona aha kworoba okuruga omu kumwikiriza .
45001006	Naimwe muri omuri abo abaayeetsirwe kuba aba Kristo Yesu .
45001007	Mbwenu imwe mwena abakundwa ba Ruhanga ab'omuri Rooma , abaayeetsirwe kuba abarikwera , nimbendeza emigisha n'obusingye , ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe na Mukama Yesu Kristo .
45001008	Okubanza ninsiima Ruhanga wangye omuri Yesu Kristo ahabwanyu mwena , ahabw'okuba okwikiriza kwanyu nikurangaanwa omu nsi yoona .
45001009	Nyowe mpeereza Ruhanga n'omutima gwangye gwona , nindangirira Amakuru Marungi g'Omwana we . Niwe areeba oku ntuura nimbaijuka obutoosha omu kushaba kwangye ;
45001010	nimmweshengyereza , ngu ku araabe naakisiima , aha muheru gwa byona , mbahikyeho buhooro .
45001011	Manya nyine orushusho rw'okubareeba , ngu nkaabareetera ekiconco kya Mutima kubahamya .
45001012	Nikwo kugira ngu tubone kugumyana n'okwikiriza kwaitu twembi , okwanyu n'okwangye .
45001013	Banyaruganda , niinyenda mumanye ku kaingi naayenzire kwija owaanyu , ngu omurimo gwangye gukaabaanamu ebijuma nk'oku gwabyanire omu bandi Banyamahanga ; kwonka n'okuhitsya hati nkiine ebinzibiire .
45001014	Manya nyowe , Abaguriiki n'abatari Baguriiki , abeegyesiibwe n'abateegyesiibwe , boona mbaineho eibanja .
45001015	N'ahabw'ekyo naimwe abari omuri Rooma , niinyenda munonga kubarangirira Amakuru Marungi .
45001016	Manya nyowe Amakuru Marungi tigankwatsa nshoni , ahabw'okuba n'amaani agu Ruhanga ajunisa omuntu weena orikwikiriza , okubandiza aha Bayudaaya na bwanyima aha Baguriiki .
45001017	Ahabw'okuba omuri ago Makuru nimwo hareebekyera okuhikiirira okuruga ahari Ruhanga . Okuhikiirira okwo Ruhanga akutuha ahabw'okwikiriza , kandi kugumizamu kweyongyera nitwikiriza , nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu : Ohikiriire ahabw'okwikiriza aryagira amagara .
45001018	Kwonka Ruhanga ayema omu iguru kufubira abatamutiina . Nibo bantu enyabibi abazindazindisa amazima eby'okutahikiirira kwabo .
45001019	Manya ebibaasa kumanywa ahari Ruhanga bibashoboorekyerwa , ahabw'okuba akabibooreka .
45001020	Ensi yaaba kuhangwa , entuura ye etareebwa , nikwo kugira ngu obushoboorozi bwe obutahwaho n'obwaruhanga bwe , bireeberwa gye omu bi yaahangire ; n'ahabw'ekyo baba bataine ky'okwekwatsa .
45001021	Manya nobu baraabe baamanyire Ruhanga , hoona tibaramuhimbiise nka Ruhanga nari okumusiima ; kureka bakahungutuka ebiteekateeko , emitima yaabo ebitsire yaashwekwa omwirima .
45001022	Batyo omu kweyeta abanyabwengye baaba ebifamutima .
45001023	Omu mwanya gw'okuramya Ruhanga otafa , baaramya ebishushani by'abantu abafa n'eby'enyonyi n'eby'enyamaishwa n'eby'ebigyendesa enda .
45001024	Nikyo Ruhanga yaabarekyeire , emitima yaabo ekaruruuhira eby'enshoni , bakahemura emibiri yaabo bonka na bonka .
45001025	Omu mwanya gw'amazima ga Ruhanga bakatamu ebishuba , bakaramya ebihangirwe , bakabiheereza okukira Omuhangi ohimbisibwa ebiro byona ! Amiina .
45001026	Nikyo Ruhanga yaabarekyeire bakategyekwa okwetenga kwabo kubi : abakazi baabo baareka ebi emibiri yaabo yaahangiirwe , baagikoresa ebitari by'obuhangwa ;
45001027	abashaija nibakora eby'enshoni aha bandi bashaija , batyo baayereetera ekifubiro ekishemereire obufamutima bwabo .
45001028	Kandi ku baayangire nkana kweta ahari Ruhanga , Ruhanga nawe nikwo kubareka bakagira emitima efiire kukora ebitahikire .
45001029	Baijura emiringo yoona ey'okutahikiirira : obubi ; omururu , eitima . Baijura eihari , obwitsi , entongani , obugobya , obwinazi . Baaba abanyaanyaatsi ,
45001030	abagambuurana , abanga Ruhanga , ab'amaryo , abeetunguura , abeemanya , abagunja ebibi , abatahurira bazaire ,
45001031	abafu b'omutima , abaita-ndagaano , abateeta ha bantu , abatagira saasi .
45001032	Abo nobu baraabe bamanya orubanja oru Ruhanga acwera abakora nk'ebyo ku bashemereire kufa , hoona tibagarukira ha kubikora kwonka , kureka bataho n'okusiima abarikubikora .
45002001	N'ahabw'ekyo , iwe muntu ' we ocwera ondi orubanja , toine ky'okwekwatsa . Manya omu kurumucwera , naiwe oba noorwesingisa , ahabw'okuba naiwe kirucwa okora nk'ebyo .
45002002	Nitumanya ku orubanja oru Ruhanga acwera abakora nk'ebyo , ruba ruhikire .
45002003	Iwe muntu ' we ocwera abakora nk'ebyo orubanja , haza naiwe noobikora , nooteekateeka ngu oryakira orubanja oru Ruhanga arikucwera ?
45002004	Nainga shi nooyekiitira embabazi ze enyingi n'okukwata mpora kwe n'okugumisiriza kwe , haza otarikumanya ku ezo mbabazi za Ruhanga nizo zikureetera kwegarukamu ?
45002005	Kwonka ahabw'okugangaara kw'omutima gwawe ogutarikwenda kweteisa , oyebiikiire ekiniga ekiribaho aha kiro ky'ekiniga , eki Ruhanga arishuuruuriraho encwa ye y'orubanja ehikiriire ,
45002006	akazimuurira buri omwe nk'ebi yaakozire oku biri .
45002007	Obwo abenda kutunga ekitiinwa n'okusiimwa n'okutafa , abagumisiriza nibakora ebirungi , aryabaha amagara agatahwaho .
45002008	Abandi ab'empaka kandi abatoorobera mazima , kureka bakeeroha omu bibi , Ruhanga aryabafubira n'ekiniga .
45002009	Omuntu weena okora ebibi , aryabonabonesibwa , areebe enaku , okubandiza aha Muyudaaya okuhika aha Muguriiki .
45002010	Kandi omuntu weena okora ebirungi , aryaheebwa ekitiinwa , asiimwe kandi agire obusingye , okubandiza aha Muyudaaya okuhika aha Muguriiki .
45002011	Manya Ruhanga tashoroora mu bantu .
45002012	Boona abaakozire ebibi batarikumanya iteeka , baryahwerekyerera batarikuturwa iteeka . Kandi boona abaakozire ebibi nibamanya eiteeka , baryacwerwa orubanja nk'oku eiteeka riri .
45002013	Ahabw'okuba abahurira eiteeka kwonka , tibo bahikiriire ahari Ruhanga , kureka abakora ebi eiteeka riragiira , nibo baribarwa kuba abahikiriire .
45002014	Abanyamahanga abatagira iteeka , omu buhangwa ku bakora eki eiteeka riragiira , bo bonka beebeera eiteeka , nobu baba bataine eryo iteeka .
45002015	Booreka ku eki eiteeka ryenda , kihandiikirwe omu mitima yaabo . Haza obwo eiraka ry'omu mitima yaabo riba nirikihamya , kandi ebiteekateeko byabo biba nibibashinja nari nibibahakanira .
45002016	Nikwo kiriba n'aha izooba eri Ruhanga aricwisizaho Yesu Kristo orubanja rw'ebi abantu baakozire omu mubonano , nk'oku kiri omu Makuru Marungi agu naatumirwe kurangirira .
45002017	Kwonka iwe oyeyeta Omuyudaaya , okabukaarira omu iteeka , okeehimbisiza omuri Ruhanga ;
45002018	okamanya ebi arikwenda , okasiima ebirikukira oburungi ahabw'okwegyesibwa eby'omu iteeka ;
45002019	iwe oyesiga ku ori omwebembezi w'empumi kandi ohwezesa abari omu mwirima ,
45002020	omuhabuzi w'abataine bwengye , omwegyesa w'abaana bato , ahabw'okuba omu iteeka okumanya kwona n'amazima goona nimwo biba .
45002021	Mbwenu iwe , oyegyesa abandi , toyeyegyesa ? Iwe , orangirira abandi okutaiba , oiba ?
45002022	Iwe , ogira ngu omuntu tashemereire kushambana , oshambana ? Iwe , onuga ebishushani ebiramibwa , oiba eby'omu ndaaro ?
45002023	Iwe , oyehimbisiza omu iteeka , ogayisa Ruhanga noorihenda ?
45002024	Manya kikahandiikwa ngu Eiziina rya Ruhanga nirijumwa omu Banyamahanga ahabwanyu .
45002025	N'ekya buzima , okusharwa nikugasha waaba noohitsya eiteeka , kureka ku orikuhenda eiteeka , biri okusharwa kwawe kwahinduka nk'otakasharwaga .
45002026	Mbwenu shi omuntu otashazirwe ku araabe naahitsya ebiragiro by'omu iteeka , Ruhanga tarikwija kumubara nk'oshazirwe ?
45002027	Nari omuntu otashazirwe mubiri , kwonka akahitsya eby'omu iteeka , tarikusingisa orubanja iwe orikuhenda eby'omu iteeka , haza oine ebyahandiikirwe omu iteeka kandi oshazirwe ?
45002028	Manya Omuyudaaya kashushu tiwe ogwo oreeberwa omu byaharuguru ; n'okusharwa okw'amazima tikwo okwo okw'aharuguru aha mubiri .
45002029	Kureka Omuyudaaya kashushu niwe ogwo ow'omunda ; n'okusharwa okw'amazima n'okw'omu mutima kutari kw'omu bihandiiko by'eiteeka , kureka okw'omuri Mutima . Okusiimwa kw'ogwo muntu tikuruga ha bantu , kureka ahari Ruhanga .
45003001	Mbwenu shi Omuyudaaya naakiza ki abandi ? Nainga shi okusharwa nikugasha ki ?
45003002	Nibigasha munonga omu miringo yoona . Eky'okubanza , Abayudaaya nibo baakwatsiibwe ebigambo bya Ruhanga .
45003003	Mbwenu shi tugambe ki , abamwe ku baraabe batarabaire beesigwa ? Okutaba beesigwa kwabo kuryazibira Ruhanga okuba omwesigwa ?
45003004	Rubuuza ! Manya Ruhanga aba ow'amazima , nobu omuntu weena aba omunyakishuba , nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu : Oba ohikire omu bigambo byawe , kandi osinga , baaba nibakucwera orubanja .
45003005	Okutahikiirira kwaitu ku kuraabe nikworeka ku Ruhanga acwa orubanja omu bwinganisa , mbwenu shi tugambe ki ? Tugire ngu Ruhanga ku atufubira , aba atahikire ? Ningamba nk'oku abantu bagamba - -
45003006	Rubuuza ! Ku yaakuba atari mwinganisa , akaacwera ata ensi orubanja ?
45003007	Mbwenu shi ebishuba byangye ku biraabe nibireetera amazima ga Ruhanga kukiraho kworekwa ahabw'ekitiinwa kye , ahabw'enki nincwerwa orubanja nk'omusiisi ?
45003008	Kandi n'enki ekituzibira kukora ebibi , ngu harugyemu ebirungi ? Manya ekyo nikyo bamwe batubeiherera , ngu nikwo tugamba . Abo bantu kihikire okucwerwa orubanja rukabasinga .
45003009	Mbwenu tugire tuta ? Ebyo itwe Abayudaaya twine eki turikukiza abandi ? Ngaaha , n'akakye ! Ahabw'okuba tuherize kuhamya ku abantu boona , Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki , bategyekwa ekibi ,
45003010	nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu : Tihariho ohikiriire , nangwa n'omwe ;
45003011	tihariho orikwetegyereza , nari orikusherura Ruhanga .
45003012	Boona bakahaba , boona hamwe bakahinduka entakimazire . Tihariho orikukora gye , nangwa n'omwe .
45003013	Emimiro yaabo n'ebituuro byashami . Baryarya n'endimi zaabo . Ebi bagamba ni bibi nk'obushegu bw'encwera .
45003014	Akanwa kaabo kaijwire okukyeena n'obushaarizi .
45003015	Barahuka kusaasa abantu n'okubaita .
45003016	Ei baza yoona batsigayo okuhwerekyereza n'enaku .
45003017	Tibamanya kutuurana gye n'abantu omu busingye .
45003018	Okutiina Ruhanga tikuri mu biteekateeko byabo .
45003019	Nitumanya ku byona ebi eiteeka rigamba , bikwata aha bu ririkutegyeka , kuzibira abantu kugira eby'okwekwatsa , kureka ab'omu nsi yoona kuba ab'okucwerwa Ruhanga orubanja .
45003020	Manya omu maisho ge tihariho muntu n'omwe oribarwa kuba ohikiriire ahabw'okuhitsya ebiri omu iteeka , ahabw'okuba ekibi kimanywa ahabw'eiteeka .
45003021	Kwonka hati hareebekire ku hariho okuhikiirira okurikuruga ahari Ruhanga , okutarikwema mu iteeka ; kandi eiteeka n'abarangi nibikuhamya .
45003022	Nikwo kuhikiirira kwa Ruhanga ahabw'okwikiriza Yesu Kristo , okuheebwa boona abamwikiriza . Haza boona nibaingana ,
45003023	ahabw'okuba boona bakashiisha , baafeerwa kuhika ahari Ruhanga ow'ekitiinwa ,
45003024	kureka baheerwa busha okuhikiirira ahabw'embabazi ze , ahabw'okucungurwa okuri omuri Kristo Yesu .
45003025	Yesu ogwo omu kufa kwe akateebwaho kuba ekarabo y'ebibi by'abamwikiriza . Okwo nikwo Ruhanga yaayorekire ku ari ohikiriire . Manya omu kugumisiriza kwe , ebibi ebyakozirwe ira
45003026	akabirenzya amaisho , ngu abone kworeka omu biro ebi ku aba ohikiriire , kandi ku aha okuhikiirira omuntu weena oikiriza Yesu .
45003027	Mbwenu aho ekirikutwehimbisisa kirahi ? Tikiriho . Ahabw'enki ? Ahabw'ebi tukora ? Ngaaha , kureka ahabw'okwikiriza .
45003028	Ahabw'okuba nituhamya ku omuntu aheebwa okuhikiirira ahabw'okwikiriza , kutari habw'okukora ebirikuragiirwa eiteeka .
45003029	Nainga shi Ruhanga n'ow'Abayudaaya bonka ? Abanyamahanga bo ti waabo ? Eego kwo , n'owaabo nabo .
45003030	Manya Ruhanga aba omwe , aha abashazirwe okuhikiirira naihirira aha kwikiriza kwabo , n'abatashazirwe akubaha ahabw'okwikiriza kwabo .
45003031	Mbwenu shi eiteeka nituriihaho ahabw'okwo kwikiriza ? Nikikabure ! Kureka niturihamya .
45004001	Mbwenu shi tugambe ki aha byabaire ahari Aburahamu , tataitwe omu mubiri ?
45004002	Manya Aburahamu kuri yaahairwe okuhikiirira ahabw'ebi yaakozire , akaagizire eky'okwehimbisizaho , kwonka ahari Ruhanga tarakigizire .
45004003	Mbwenu Ebyahandiikirwe nibigamba ki ? Nibigira biti : Aburahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga , ekyo kyamubarirwa kuba okuhikiirira .
45004004	Manya weena okora omurimo , ebihembo bye tibimubarirwa nk'ebimuheereirwe busha , kureka nk'enyihurano .
45004005	Kandi oteegamira bi arikukora , kwonka akaikiriza Ruhanga oyeza abasiisi akabahindura abarungi , okwikiriza Ruhanga kwe nikwo kumureetera okuhikiirira .
45004006	Nk'oku Daudi nawe yaarangire omugisha oguheebwa omuntu ou Ruhanga abara kuba ohikiriire , ataine bi akozire ati :
45004007	Ka n'ab'omugisha abasaasiirwe ebishobyo byabo , bakaihwaho ebibi byabo !
45004008	Ka n'ow'omugisha omuntu ou Mukama atabarira kibi !
45004009	Mbwenu ogwo mugisha guba ogw'abashazirwe bonka , nari n'ogw'abatashazirwe nabo ? Twagira tuti : Okwikiriza kwa Aburahamu kukamureetera kubarwa kuba ohikiriire .
45004010	Mbwenu shi kukamubarirwa ryari ? Yaashazirwe nari atakashazirwe ? Tikuramubariirwe yaashazirwe , kureka atakashazirwe .
45004011	Bwanyima nikwo kusharwa . Ekyo kikaba akamanyiso k'okuhamya okuhikiirira , oku yaatungire ahabw'okwikiriza atakashazirwe . Mpaho nawe nikwo kuba ishenkuru wa boona abaikiriza batashazirwe , bakabarwa kuba abahikiriire .
45004012	Kandi ngu abe ishenkuru w'abashazirwe , abatafiire kusharwa kwonka , kureka kandi abagyendera omu kirari ky'okwikiriza oku tataitwe Aburahamu yaabaire aine atakashazirwe .
45004013	Manya Aburahamu n'abaijukuru tibararaganisiibwe kuhungura ensi ahabw'okuhitsya eby'omu iteeka , kureka ahabw'okuhikiirira okwarugire omu kwikiriza kwabo .
45004014	Abahamira aha iteeka kuri nibo bahunguzi , okwikiriza biri n'okwa busha , n'okuraganisa biri tikwine mutambo .
45004015	Manya eiteeka ritureetera okufubirwa Ruhanga ; kandi ahu eiteeka ritari , tihabaho kurihenda .
45004016	Nikyo okwo kuhikiirira kukomookyera aha kwikiriza , ngu okuraganisa kubone kuba okw'embabazi kandi kuhamize baijukuru be boona , ti abo bonka abaramatira aha iteeka , kureka n'abo abaine okwikiriza nk'okwa Aburahamu . Manya Aburahamu niwe tataitwe twena ,
45004017	nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu : Nkakutaho kuba ishenkuru w'amahanga maingi . Aburahamu ogwo ekyo akakiraganisibwa Ruhanga ou yaikiriize , niwe ogwo ozoora abafiire kandi oragiira ebitariho bikabaho .
45004018	Aburahamu akaikiriza , yaagira amatsiko omu mwanya gw'okugahwa , ngu abone kuba Ishenkuru w'amahanga maingi , nk'oku yaagambiirwe ati : Oruzaaro rwawe ruryaba rutyo .
45004019	Kwonka taratentebukire mu kwikiriza , nobu yaareebire omubiri gwe guri nk'oguhwaireyo , ahabw'okuba akaba ahikize emyaka y'obukuru nka igana ; na Saara ari engumba .
45004020	Kandi tiharabaireho kutaikiriza okwamureeteire kubangaanisa eki Ruhanga yaaraganiise , kureka akongyera kugira okwikiriza kuhamire , haza yaaha Ruhanga ekitiinwa .
45004021	Manya akaba naahamiza kimwe ku Ruhanga arikubaasa kukora eki yaaraganiise .
45004022	Nikyo okwikiriza kwe kwamureeteire kubarwa ku ari ohikiriire .
45004023	Kwonka ebigambo ebirikugira biti : Kukamureetera kubarwa kuba ohikiriire , tibirahandiikirwe habwe wenka ,
45004024	kureka n'ahabwaitu . Naitwe okwo kuhikiirira kuryatubarirwa : itwe abaikiriza ogwo owaazoire Yesu Mukama waitu omu bafiire .
45004025	Niwe ogwo owaahairweyo kwitwa ahabw'ebibi byaitu , kandi akazooka ngu abone kutuhaisa okuhikiirira .
45005001	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku tubarwa kuba abahikiriire ahabw'okwikiriza , twine obusingye ahari Ruhanga ahabwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo ,
45005002	owaatureeteire kusiimwa Ruhanga ahabw'okwikiriza oku twine . N'ahabw'ekyo nitushemererwa ahabw'amatsiko g'okubagana aha bya Ruhanga .
45005003	Haza tikyo kyonka , kureka nitwongyeraho n'okwesiimira omu by'obusaasi ; nitumanya ku eby'obusaasi birugwamu okugumisiriza ;
45005004	n'okugumisiriza kukarugwamu okugira emicwe ehamire ; kandi okugira emicwe ehamire kukatureetera okugira amatsiko ,
45005005	n'ago matsiko tigatureebya , ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akatuha Mutima Orikwera owaatushukire omu mitima rukundo ya Ruhanga .
45005006	Manya ku twabaire tukiri enshoberwa , omu bunaku buhikire , Kristo yaatufeera , itwe abatatiina Ruhanga .
45005007	Kigumire omuntu kufeera ohikiriire ; nangwa shana akaayemera kufeera ow'emicwe mirungi .
45005008	Kwonka Ruhanga ayoreka rukundo ye ahariitwe , ahabw'okuba ku twabaire tukiri abasiisi , Kristo yaatufeera .
45005009	Mbwenu nk'oku twaherize kuheerwa okuhikiirira omu kufa kwe , nikwo turyeshumbyaho kujunwa ahabwe , tukakira ekiniga kya Ruhanga .
45005010	Ahabw'okuba ku turaabe twagarukanisiibwe na Ruhanga okufa kw'Omwana we tukiri abazigu be , mbwenu hati obu twagarukaine nawe , amagara ge nigaija kukizaho okutujuna .
45005011	Kandi ti ekyo kyonka , kureka nitutaho n'okwesiimira omuri Ruhanga , ahabwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , otuhaisize hati okwo kugarukana .
45005012	Nk'oku ekibi kyaizire omu nsi ahabw'omuntu omwe , ekyo kibi kikareeta okufa ; nikyo rufu yaahikiire aha bantu boona , ahabw'okuba boona bakashiisha .
45005013	Buzimazima eiteeka ritakatairweho , ekibi kikaba kiri omu nsi , kandi ahu eiteeka ritari , ekibi tikibarirwa muntu .
45005014	Kwonka shi rufu ekategyeka abantu okwiha ahari Adamu , okuhitsya ahari Musa ; nangwa n'abatarasiisire nk'oku Adamu yaacumwire , Adamu ogwo owaabaire ari ekyeshusha ky'ori , owaabaire ari ow'okwija .
45005015	Kwonka ekiconco kya Ruhanga ekyaheereirwe busha , tikiri nk'ekyo kicumuro kya Adamu . Ahabw'okuba ekicumuro ky'omuntu omwe , ku kiraabe kyareeteire baingi kufa , embabazi za Ruhanga n'ekiconco kya busha eky'omuntu omwe Yesu Kristo , nikwo byakirizeho bityo okushaagaana omuri baingi .
45005016	Kandi ekyo kiconco kya Ruhanga tikiri nk'ebyarugire omu kicumuro kye kimwe kikareetera abantu kusingwa orubanja . Kwonka ebicumuro bingi by'abantu ku byakozirwe , haabaho ekiconco ki batashemereire , eky'okubaihaho orubanja .
45005017	Ekicumuro ky'omuntu omwe , ku kiraabe kyareeteire rufu kwema ahabw'ogwo muntu , n'abaakiira embabazi za Ruhanga ezishaagaine n'ekiconco ky'okuhikiirira , nikwo barikizaho kwemekwa omu magara masya ahabw'omuntu omwe Yesu Kristo .
45005018	Kandi nk'oku ekicumuro ky'omuntu omwe kyareeteire abantu boona okusingwa orubanja , n'eky'okuhikiirira eki omuntu omwe yaakozire , nikwo kireetera kityo abantu boona kwihwaho orubanja n'okutunga amagara .
45005019	Ahabw'okuba nk'oku okutahurira kw'omuntu omwe kwareeteire baingi kuba abasiisi , n'okuhurira kw'omuntu omwe nikwo kurireetera baingi kuba abahikiriire .
45005020	Manya eiteeka ku ryaizire , ryakanyisa ebicumuro , kwonka shi oku ebicumuro byarengyesereize kukanya , nikwo n'embabazi za Ruhanga zaakirizeho kukanya ,
45005021	kandi nk'oku ekibi kyategyekyeire omu kufa , n'embabazi za Ruhanga nikwo zitegyekyera omu kuhikiirira , zikatuhitsya omu magara agatahwaho , ahabwa Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu .
45006001	Mbwenu tugambe ki ? Turi ab'okuguma omu kibi , ngu embabazi za Ruhanga zibone kukanya ?
45006002	Nikikabure ! Itwe abaafiire aha kibi , nitubaasa tuta kukigumamu ?
45006003	Timurikumanya ku itwe twena abaabatiziibwe omuri Kristo Yesu , twabatiziibwe ngu tufe nawe ?
