45006004	Manya ku twabatiziibwe , twaziikwa hamwe nawe , twafa , ngu nk'oku Kristo yaazoirwe omu bafiire obushoboorozi bw'ekitiinwa kya Ishe , naitwe tubone tutyo kugyendera omu magara masya .
45006005	Reero ku turaabe twateerainwe nawe omu kufa nk'okwe , nikwo turiteeranwa nawe tutyo omu kuzooka nk'okwe .
45006006	Nitumanya ngu omuntu waitu owa ira akabambwa aha musharaba hamwe nawe , ngu omubiri ogukora ekibi guhwerekyerezibwe , turekye kugaruka kuba abahuuku b'ekibi obundi .
45006007	Manya ofiire , aba atakitegyekwa kibi .
45006008	Naitwe , ku turaabe twafiire hamwe na Kristo , nitwikiriza ngu turyamereera nawe .
45006009	Ahabw'okuba nitumanya ngu nk'oku Kristo yaazookire omu bafiire , tarifa bundi ; rufu tekimutegyeka .
45006010	Okufa oku yaafiire , akafa aha kibi rimwe yaaheza ; kwonka amagara agu aine , againe ahari Ruhanga .
45006011	Naimwe nikwo mushemereire kwebara nk'abafiire aha kibi , kandi abahuriire ahari Ruhanga omuri Kristo Yesu .
45006012	N'ahabw'ekyo mutaikiriza ekibi kutegyeka omu mibiri yaanyu efa , mukoorobera okwetenga kwayo kubi .
45006013	Murekye kurekurira engingo zaanyu ekibi kuba ebikwato by'okukoresa ebitahikire , kureka mwerekurire Ruhanga nk'abahuriire , abarugire omu bafiire , kandi engingo zaanyu muziheyo ahari Ruhanga kuba ebikwato by'okukoresa eby'okuhikiirira .
45006014	Manya ekibi tikiribategyeka , ahabw'okuba timurikutegyekwa iteeka , kureka embabazi za Ruhanga .
45006015	Mbwenu shi , tukore ebibi , ngu ahabw'okuba titurikutegyekwa iteeka , kureka embabazi za Ruhanga ? Rubuuza !
45006016	Timurikumanya ngu ogwo ou mweha nk'abahuuku kuhurira , muba muri abahuuku b'ogwo ou muhurira , yaaba b'ekibi ekitwara omu kufa , yaaba b'okuhurira okutwara omu kuhikiirira ?
45006017	Kwonka Ruhanga naakasingye , kureeba imwe abaabaire bari abahuuku b'ekibi , mbwenu mubaire abarikworobera enyegyesa ei mwahairwe , mwihire aha mutima ;
45006018	kandi ku mwaihirwe omu kibi , mwahinduka abahuuku b'okuhikiirira .
45006019	Ningamba nk'omuntu ahabw'obweremwa bwanyu bw'obuntu . Nk'oku mwabaire murekurira engingo zaanyu eby'enshoni , n'ebindi ebirikukiraho obubi , mbwenu mube nikwo mwazirekurira eby'okuhikiirira ebireeta okwezibwa .
45006020	Manya obu mwabaire mukiri abahuuku b'ekibi , eby'okuhikiirira bikaba bitaine ki bibakwatiire .
45006021	Mbwenu obwo mukaihamu karungi ki omuri ebyo ebirikubakwatsa enshoni obwa hati ? Manya omuheru gwabyo n'okufa .
45006022	Mbwenu hati obu mwihirwe omu buhuuku bw'ekibi , mukaba abahuuku ba Ruhanga ; ekiraarugyemu n'okwezibwa , reero aha muheru gwakwo mukatunga amagara agatahwaho .
45006023	Manya ebihembo by'ekibi n'okufa ; kwonka ekiconco ki Ruhanga aheera busha , n'amagara agatahwaho omuri Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu .
45007001	Banyaruganda , timurikumanya ku eiteeka ritegyeka omuntu akihuriire ? ningambira abarikumanya eiteeka .
45007002	Manya omukazi oshweirwe , eiteeka rimuragiira kuguma na iba , iba ogwo akihuriire ; kwonka iba ku afa , ogwo mukazi aba atakitegyekwa iteeka rya iba .
45007003	Nikwo kugira ngu ku aguma n'ondiijo mushaija iba akiriho , ayetwa omushambani ; kwonka iba ku afa , aba atakitegyekwa eryo iteeka , kandi ku ashwerwa ondiijo mushaija , obwo aba atari mushambani .
45007004	Naimwe , banyaruganda , nikwo mwafiire mutyo aha iteeka omu mubiri gwa Kristo , ngu mubone kuba ab'ondiijo , ogwo owaazoirwe omu bafiire , haza tubone kwanira Ruhanga ebijuma .
45007005	Obu twabaire tukiri omu buhangwa bw'omubiri , okwetenga kwagwo okubi okwimukiirizibwa eiteeka , kukaba kukorera omu ngingo zaitu , kwanira rufu ebijuma .
45007006	Kwonka hati titwakitegyekwa eryo iteeka , ahabw'okuba tukafa ahari ebyo ebyabaire bituhindwire abahuuku , ngu tubone kuheereza twine amagara masya aga Mutima , tutarikutegyekwa bihandiiko by'eiteeka erya ira .
45007007	Mbwenu tugambe ki ? Tuti : Eiteeka n'ekibi ? Ngaaha ! Kwonka tinkumanyire kibi , kuri eiteeka ritarakimmanyiise . Tinkumanyire kyeetwa okwetenga okubi , kuri eiteeka ritaragizire riti : Otaryetenga kubi .
45007008	Kwonka ekibi ku kyaboneire obwiho omu kiragiro , kyaimukiiriza omuriinye okwetenga kw'emiringo yoona . Manya ahu eiteeka ritari , ekibi kiba kitaine bwiho .
45007009	Nyowe , obu eiteeka ryabaire ritariho , nkaba mpuriire , kwonka ekiragiro ku kyaizire , ekibi kyahimbuuka ,
45007010	naanye naafa . Ekyo kiragiro ekyabaire kiri eky'okundeetera amagara , kyandugiramu rufu .
45007011	Ahabw'okuba ekibi ku kyaboneire omu kiragiro obwiho , kyangobeza , kyanyita nikyema omuri ekyo kiragiro .
45007012	N'ahabw'ekyo , eiteeka niryera , n'ebiragiro nibyera , bihikire kandi ni birungi .
45007013	Mbwenu ekirungi nikyo kyandeeteire okufa ? Ngaaha ! Kureka ekibi nikyo kyakundeeteire nikiraba omu kirungi , ngu ekibi kibone kweyoreka ku kiri kibi , kandi ahabw'ekiragiro , ekyo kibi kibone kuba kibi kirengyesereze .
45007014	Nitumanya eiteeka ku ririho ahabw'eby'omutima ; kwonka nyowe nyine omubiri , ndi omuhuuku w'ekibi .
45007015	Eki nkora tinkyetegyereza , ahabw'okuba eki nyenda tikyo nkora , kureka eki nyanga nikyo nkora .
45007016	Mbwenu ku ndaabe ninkora eki ntenda , biri niinyikiriza ku eiteeka riba rirungi .
45007017	N'ahabw'ekyo tiinye nkikora , kureka n'ekibi ekintuuramu ;
45007018	ahabw'okuba nimmanya ngu omuriinye , nikwo kugira ngu omu buntu bwangye , ku hatabamu karungi koona . Manya nobu nyenda kukora ekirungi , kwonka mbura agakikora .
45007019	Ekirungi eki nyenda tikyo nkora , kureka ekibi eki ntenda nikyo nkora .
45007020	Reero ku ndaabe nkora eki ntenda , nikwo kugira ngu tiinye nkikora , kureka n'ekibi ekintuuramu .
45007021	N'ahabw'ekyo nshanga hariho eiteeka , ngu ku mba niinyenda kukora ekirungi , ekibi kimba haihi .
45007022	Manya omu mutima gwangye nsiima eiteeka rya Ruhanga ;
45007023	kwonka omu ngingo zangye , nshangamu erindi iteeka eririkurwanisa ery'omu bwengye bwangye , rimpindura omuhuuku w'eiteeka ry'ekibi ekituura omu ngingo zangye .
45007024	Ai bambe , nyowe omuntu enshoberwa ! N'oha orinjuna ogu mubiri gw'okufa ?
45007025	Ruhanga naakasingye kureeba ngu nyine Omujuni Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu ! Reero nu , nyowe nyenka omu bwengye bwangye nkoresibwa eiteeka rya Ruhanga , kwonka omu buntu bwangye nkoresibwa eiteeka ry'ekibi .
45008001	Mbwenu hati abari omuri Kristo Yesu tibaakiine rubanja .
45008002	Manya eiteeka rya Mutima , ohaisa amagara abari omuri Kristo Yesu , rikaanyiha omu buhuuku bw'okutegyekwa eiteeka ry'ekibi n'okufa .
45008003	Eki eiteeka ritarabaasize ahabw'okuremesibwa omubiri , Ruhanga akakikora ; yaayohereza Omwana we buzima , aine omubiri nk'ogwaitu ogukora ekibi , kuba ekihongwa ahabw'ekibi , kandi omu mubiri yaasingisa ekyo kibi orubanja .
45008004	Ruhanga ekyo akakikora , ngu ebi eiteeka ririkuturagiira kukora bibone kuhikiiririzibwa omuriitwe , abatakuratira by'omubiri , kureka ebya Mutima .
45008005	Manya abakuratira ebi omubiri gubenza , bategyekwa omubiri gwabo . Kwonka aboorobera ebi Mutima arikubagambira , bategyekwa ebya Mutima .
45008006	Okutegyekwa ebi omubiri gutwenza kurugwamu okufa ; kandi okutegyekwa ebi Mutima ayenda kureeta amagara n'obusingye .
45008007	Manya okukuratira ebi omubiri gwenda , kureetera omuntu kuba omuzigu wa Ruhanga , ahabw'okuba tayorobera iteeka rya Ruhanga , kandi kwo buzima tikirikubaasika ;
45008008	na boona abategyekwa omubiri tibabaasa kugwisa gye Ruhanga .
45008009	Kwonka imwe , buzimazima Mutima wa Ruhanga ku araabe atuura omuriimwe , timuri mu mubiri , kureka muri omuri Mutima . Manya weena otaine Mutima wa Kristo , biri t'owe .
45008010	Mbwenu Kristo ku araabe ari omuriimwe , biri omubiri gufiire ahabw'ekibi , kwonka omutima guhuriire ahabw'okuhikiirira .
45008011	Mutima wa Nyakuzoora Yesu omu bafiire ku araabe atuura omuriimwe , ogwo owaazoire Kristo Yesu omu bafiire , emibiri yaanyu ey'okufa aryagiha amagara ahabwa Mutima we otuura omuriimwe .
45008012	N'ahabw'ekyo , banyaruganda , twine eibanja , ritari ry'omubiri ngu tukuratire ebyagwo
45008013	ahabw'okuba ku murikukuratira eby'omubiri muryafa ; kwonka Mutima ku arikubahwera , mwaita ebi omubiri gukora , muryaba abahuriire .
45008014	Manya boona abahaburwa Mutima wa Ruhanga nibo baana ba Ruhanga .
45008015	Timurahairwe mutima gw'obuhuuku kugaruka kutiina , kureka mukaheebwa Mutima owaabahindwire abaana , otwetesa ati : Abba ! Taata !
45008016	Mutima wenka niwe ahamya hamwe n'omutima gwaitu , ku turi abaana ba Ruhanga .
45008017	Ku turaabe turi abaana , biri turi abahunguzi ba Ruhanga , kandi ab'okuhungura hamwe na Kristo , twaba nitubonabona hamwe nawe , ngu tubone kuheebwa ekitiinwa hamwe nawe .
45008018	Ninteekateeka ngu okubonabona okw'omu biro ebi , tikurikwinganisibwa n'ekitiinwa ekiritushuuruurirwa .
45008019	Ahabw'okuba ebihangwa byona bituura bitegyereize Ruhanga n'ekihika , kumurika abaana be .
45008020	Manya ebyo bihangwa bikaragiirwa kutegyekwa ebitaine mugasho ti habw'okweyendera kwabyo , kureka ahabw'ogwo owaaragiire ku bitegyekwa bityo bituura biine amatsiko ,
45008021	ahabw'okuba ebyo bihangwa biryaihwa omu buhuuku bw'okujunda , bibagane aha busingye n'ekitiinwa eby'abaana ba Ruhanga .
45008022	Nitumanya ngu n'okuhitsya hati ebihangwa byona bituura nibitsinda , kandi nibishaasha kumwe nk'ebirikurumwa kuzaara .
45008023	Haza ti bihangwa byonka , kureka naitwe abatungire emiganuro ya Mutima , ekiconco ky'okubanza kya Ruhanga , nitutsinda tutegyereize Ruhanga kutuhindura abaana be , n'okutucungura .
45008024	Okujunwa oku twajunirwe , tutuura twine amatsiko g'okukuhikaho . Manya okugirira amatsiko ekirikureebwa , ago gaba gatari matsiko . Mbwenu shi n'oha ogirira amatsiko eki arikureeba ?
45008025	Kwonka ku tugirira amatsiko eki tutarikureeba , tukitegyereza n'okugumisiriza .
45008026	Kandi na Mutima nikwo atuhwera atyo omu bweremwa bwaitu , ahabw'okuba titumanya kushaba nk'oku kitushemereire . Mutima ogwo wenka niwe atutonganira ahari Ruhanga n'okutsinda okwine eigamba .
45008027	Kandi Ruhanga ogwo ocaaka emitima y'abantu , amanya eki Mutima arikwenda ; ahabw'okuba Mutima atonganirira abarikwera ahari Ruhanga , kandi nk'oku Ruhanga akunda .
45008028	Nitumanya ngu abakunda Ruhanga , kandi abeetwa nk'oku enaama ye eri , byona ebibahikaho bikwatanisa kubarugiramu ebirungi .
45008029	Ahabw'okuba abu yaamanyire ira batakabaireho , nibo yaatooraine kushushanisibwa n'Omwana we , ngu Omwana we ogwo abone kuba omujigaijo omu banyaruganda baingi .
45008030	Boona abu yaatooraine batakabaireho , nibo yaayeetsire ; kandi abu yaayeetsire , nibo yaahaire okuhikiirira . N'abu yaahaire okuhikiirira , nibo yaahaisize ekitiinwa .
45008031	Mbwenu shi ebyo tubigambeho ki ? Ruhanga ku araabe ari aha rubaju rwaitu , n'oha oriturwanisa akatubaasa :
45008032	Ogwo otarasaasiire Mwana we buzima , kureka akamuhayo ahabwaitu twena , aryazibirwa ki kutuha ebintu byona hamwe nawe ?
45008033	N'oha oritabaariza entoore za Ruhanga ? Ni Ruhanga obaihaho orubanja .
45008034	N'oha oribacwera orubanja rukabasinga ? Ni Kristo Yesu owaafiire akataho n'okuzooka omu bafiire , kandi ori aha rubaju rwa Ruhanga orwa buryo , ataireho n'okututonganira !
45008035	Mbwenu nu , n'oha oritutaanisa na rukundo ya Kristo ? N'omunyangararo , n'enaku , n'okuhiiganisibwa , n'enjara , n'okujwara busha , n'akabi , nainga shi rurara ?
45008036	Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Tusiiba nitwitwa ahabwawe , nitubarwa nk'entaama embaagwa .
45008037	Kwonka omuri ebyo byona tusingwire okutakareebwaga ahabw'Ogwo owaatukunzire .
45008038	Manya nimpamiza kimwe ku hatariho kintu kyona : yaaba rufu , yaaba magara , yaaba baamaraika , yaaba bategyeki , yaaba ebiriho , yaaba ebiribaho , yaaba b'obushoboorozi ,
45008039	nobu byakuba eby'omu iguru nari eby'okuzimu , nainga ekintu kyona ekyahangirwe , ekiribaasa kututaanisa na rukundo ya Ruhanga , eri omuri Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu .
45009001	Ningamba amazima omuri Kristo ntarikubeiha . Omutima gwangye nigumpamiza omuri Mutima Orikwera ,
45009002	ku nyine obusaasi bwingi n'enaku ezitarikutuuza omu mutima .
45009003	Manya nkaayenzire nkyeenwe kandi mbe encuubwa ahari Kristo ahabwa beene waitu , ab'oruganda rwangye omu buzaare .
45009004	Nibo Baisiraeli abaahairwe omugisha gw'okuba abaana ba Ruhanga , bakaheebwa ekitiinwa n'endagaano n'eiteeka n'emigyenzo y'okuramya , kandi n'ebyaraganisiibwe .
45009005	Nibo baijukuru ba baatatenkuriitwe , abu eihanga ryabo omu mubiri rikomookwamu Kristo . Ruhanga otegyeka byona , ahimbisibwe ebiro byona . Amiina .
45009006	Kwonka tikwo kugira ngu eki Ruhanga yaaraganiise kikarema kuhikiirizibwa . Manya ti boona abakomooka omuri Isiraeli abari Abaisiraeli ;
45009007	kandi ti boona abari abaana ba Aburahamu , ngu ahabw'okuba n'abaijukuru . Kwonka ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Baijukuru baawe baryayetererwa Isaaka .
45009008	Ekyo nikimanyisa ngu abazairwe omu mubiri tibo baana ba Ruhanga , kureka abazairwe nk'oku kyaraganisiibwe , nibo babarwa kuba abaijukuru .
45009009	Ahabw'okuba ekyo ekyaraganisiibwe kikagira kiti : Omu bunaku nk'obu , ndyagaruka , kandi Saara aryazaara omutabani .
45009010	Haza tikyo kyonka , kureka na Rebeka ku yaabaire abakire enda y'empasha , agitwekirwe omushaija omwe , Isaaka tatenkuriitwe .
45009011	Nobu baabaire batakazairwe , kandi batakakozire kirungi nari kibi , kwonka Ruhanga ahabw'okwenda kugumizamu enaama ye y'okutoorana , kutari habw'emirimo , kureka ahabw'okwetwa ,
45009012	Rebeka ogwo akagambirwa ati : Kakuru aryaheereza Kato .
45009013	Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Yakobo nkamukunda , kwonka Esau naamwanga .
45009014	Mbwenu shi tugambe ki ? Ngu Ruhanga tainganisa ? Rubuuza !
45009015	Manya akagira Musa ati : Ndyagirira embabazi ou ndyenda kuzigirira , kandi ngirire esaasi ou ndyenda kugigirira .
45009016	N'ahabw'ekyo ti ky'okweyendera kw'omuntu nari ahabw'okwehenenga kwe , kureka n'eky'embabazi za Ruhanga .
45009017	Ahabw'okuba omu kyahandiikirwe , Ruhanga akagambira Faraaho ati : Eki naakutunguuriire , n'okwenda ngu nkworekyereho obushoboorozi bwangye , haza eiziina ryangye ribone kurangaanwa omu nsi yoona .
45009018	N'ahabw'ekyo Ruhanga agirira embabazi ou ayenda kuzigirira , kandi agangaaza omutima gw'ou ayenda ngu gugangaare .
45009019	Noija kungira oti : Ahabw'enki Ruhanga naakibarira abantu ebishobyo ? Mbwenu n'oha owaakumwangira kukora eki arikwenda ?
45009020	Beitu shi , muntu ' we , niiwe oha orikugarurira Ruhanga ? Omusinga nigubaasa kubuuza ogunogoire guti : Ahabw'enki ombumbire oti ?
45009021	Hari omunogoozi w'enyungu taine bushoboorozi aha ibumba , kunogoora omu mugoma gwaryo orwabya rw'ekitiinwa nari orurikugaywa ?
45009022	Manya Ruhanga akenda kworeka ekiniga kye n'obushoboorozi bwe . Atyo yaagumisiriza n'embabazi ze enyingi enyabya ezi ainiire ekiniga , ezirangariire kuhwerekyerezibwa .
45009023	Kandi akenda kworeka ekitiinwa kye ekingi aha nyabya ezi ainiire embabazi , ezi yaateekateekyeire ekitiinwa okwiha ira .
45009024	Mbwenu ezo nyabya niitwe , abu yaayetsire ; ti mu Bayudaaya bonka , kureka n'omu Banyamahanga .
45009025	Nk'oku arikugira omuri Hoseya ati : Abaabaire batari bangye , ndyabeeta eihanga ryangye . N'ou naabaire ntarikukunda , ndyamweta enkundwakazi .
45009026	Nahi baagambiriirwe bati : Timuri ihanga ryangye , niho baryeterwa abaana ba Ruhanga ohuriire .
45009027	Na Isaaya naatongyeza Isiraeli n'eiraka rihango ati : Omubaro gw'abaana ba Isiraeli nobu guringana omusheenyi gw'aha nyanja , kwonka abakye abaritsigaraho nibo barijunwa ;
45009028	ahabw'okuba Mukama taribura kuhikiiriza juba eki yaagambire aha b'omu nsi .
45009029	Kandi nk'oku Isaaya yaarangire ati : Kuri Mukama ow'amahe ataratutsigiireho ruzaaro , tukaabaire nka Sodoma , tushushana na Gomora .
45009030	Mbwenu shi tugambe ki ? Manya Abanyamahanga abatarakuratiire kuhikiirira , bakahika aha kuhikiirira , nikwo kuhikiirira okuruga omu kwikiriza .
45009031	Kwonka Abaisiraeli , abaasherwire eiteeka ry'okubahitsya aha kuhikiirira okwo , bakaremwa kurihitsya .
45009032	Ahabw'enki ? Ahabw'okuba tibarakukuratiire nibeema omu kwikiriza , kureka nibeema omu bi barikukora . Batyo baateerwa entsibo aha ibaare eriteeza entsibo ,
45009033	nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu : Reeba , ninta omuri Siyooni eibaare eririkuteeza entsibo , n'orukiri orurikugwisa ; kandi weena orikumwikiriza , tariitwa nshoni .
45010001	Banyaruganda , eki omutima gwangye gurikwenda , kandi eki ndikushabira Abaisiraeli ahari Ruhanga , nikyo eki , ngu bajunwe .
45010002	Nimpamya ku bainiire Ruhanga omuhimbo , kwonka gutarimu kushoboorokyerwa ,
45010003	ahabw'okuba ku bataramanyire kuhikiirira okuruga ahari Ruhanga , baayenda kuhamya okuhikiirira okwabo , tibaayorobera kuhikiirira kwe .
45010004	Manya omuri Kristo nimwo eiteeka ryahikiiririziibwe , ngu weena orikumwikiriza abone kuheebwa okuhikiirira .
45010005	Musa akahandiika aha kuhikiirira okuruga omu iteeka ati : Omuntu orikuhitsya ebyakwo , kuryamuhaisa amagara .
45010006	Kwonka okuhikiirira okuruga omu kwikiriza , nikugira kuti : Otagira omu mutima gwawe , oti : N'oha oritemba omu iguru ? Nikwo kugira ngu okushuumya Kristo ahansi .
45010007	Nari shi , oti : N'oha orishuuma okuzimu ? Nikwo kugira ngu okwiha Kristo omu bafiire .
45010008	Beitu ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kita ? Nikigira kiti : Ekigambo kikuri haihi omu kanwa kaawe n'omu mutima gwawe . Nikyo kigambo ky'okwikiriza eki turangirira .
45010009	Ahabw'okuba ku oryatura n'akanwa kaawe , oti : Yesu ni Mukama , kandi waikiriza omu mutima gwawe ku Ruhanga yaamuzoire omu bafiire , oryajunwa .
45010010	Manya omuntu aikiriza n'omutima , reero aheebwa okuhikiirira ; ayatura n'akanwa , reero aheebwa okujunwa .
45010011	Ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Weena omwikiriza tariitwa nshoni .
45010012	Ahabw'okuba tihariho mutaano gw'Omuyudaaya n'Omuguriiki : manya Mukama ogwo omwe niwe Mukama wa boona , kandi atungisa boona abamuhoogyera .
45010013	Nk'oku ekyahandiikirwe kirikugira kiti : Weena orihoogyera eiziina rya Mukama aryajunwa .
45010014	Kwonka baryamuhoogyera bata , batakamwikiriize ? Kandi baryamwikiriza bata , batakamuhurirahoga ? Baryahurira bata , hatariho murangirizi ?
45010015	Kandi baryarangirira bata , batatumirwe ? Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Ka ni birungi ebigyere by'abarikurangirira Amakuru Marungi !
45010016	Kwonka ago Makuru Marungi abagataho omutima ti boona ; ahabw'okuba Isaaya naagira ati : Mukama , n'oha owaikiriize ebi twarangiriire ?
45010017	N'ahabw'ekyo okwikiriza kuruga omu byahurirwa , n'ebyahurirwa biruga omu kurangirira Kristo .
45010018	Kwonka ka mbuuze . Tibarahuriire ? Buzimazima bakahurira . Manya Eiraka ryabo rikahika omu nsi yoona , n'ebigambo byabo byahurirwa ab'aha muheru gw'ensi .
45010019	Kandi ka mbuuze : Abaisiraeli tibarabyetegyereize ? Musa niwe yaabandize kugira ati : Ndyabaitsa eihari aha bantu abatari ihanga ; mbakwatse ekiniga aha ihanga eritaine bwengye .
45010020	Na Isaaya naayehangaana agira ati : Nkabonwa abataransherwire ; naayeyoreka abatarambuuririize .
45010021	Kwonka ahari Isiraeli naagira ati : Eizooba ryona nkasiiba ntegire emikono eihanga eritahurira kandi erigomi .
45011001	Mbwenu ka mbuuze : Ruhanga akacwera kimwe abantu be ? Rubuuza ! Manya naanye ndi Omuisiraeli , ow'oruzaaro rwa Aburahamu , ow'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini .
45011002	Ruhanga taracwire bantu be , abu yaamanyire ira . Timurikumanya eki Ebyahandiikirwe birikugamba ahari Eliya , obu yaarega Abaisiraeli ahari Ruhanga ? Ati :
45011003	Mukama , reeba , baitsire abarangi baawe , baasheenya amatambiro gaawe , mbwenu niinye ntsigaireho nyenka , kandi naanye nibenda kuunyita .
45011004	Beitu Ruhanga akamugarukamu ata ? Ati : Nyetsigariize abantu kashanju abatakatsimbiraga Baali amaju .
45011005	Na mbwenu omu bunaku obu nikwo kiri . Hariho abatsigaireho abaatoorainwe ahabw'embabazi .
45011006	Reero ku baraabe baatoorainwe ahabw'embabazi , biri tibaratoorainwe ahabw'ebi baakozire . Kuri kyabaire kityo , biri obwo embabazi tizaakubaire mbabazi .
45011007	Mbwenu shi tugire tuta ? Manya Abaisiraeli tibaratungire ki baabaire nibenda . Abatoorainwe bo bakakitunga , kwonka abandi emitima yaabo yaagangaazibwa ,
45011008	nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Ruhanga akabaha emitima ehugire , amaisho gatarikureeba , n'amatu gatarikuhurira n'okuhitsya eri izooba .
45011009	Na Daudi akagira ati : Ekiihuro kyabo ka kibahindukire omutego n'oruriba n'obusya ; bibe nibyo byaba enzimuurano yaabo !
45011010	Amaisho gaabo ka gagiibweho oruho , gabure kureeba , n'emigongo yaabo ogiinikye ebiro byona .
45011011	Nikyo ndikubuuriza nti : Ebyo bakateerwa entsibo ngu bagwe ? Nikikabure ! Kwonka okushobya kwabo kukareetera Abanyamahanga okujunwa okwitsize Abaisiraeli eihari .
45011012	Okucumura kwabo ku kuraabe kwatungiise ensi yoona , n'okutentebuka kwabo kwatungiise Abanyamahanga , kaashwa okugarurwaho kwabo boona ?
45011013	Mbwenu ningambira imwe Abanyamahanga , nk'oku ndi entumwa aha Banyamahanga , nimpaisiriza obutumwa bwangye ,
45011014	ngu mbone kwitsa beene waitu Abayudaaya eihari , haza njune bamwe omuribo .
45011015	Okucuubwa kwabo ku kuraabe kwareeteire ensi yoona kugarukana na Ruhanga , mbwenu okwakiirwa kwabo kuryashura ki ! Kureka okuzooka omu bafiire bakagira amagara .
45011016	Esaano y'omuganuro ku eba eri erikwera , n'ekiihuro kyona nikwo kiba ; kandi omuzi ku guba guri ogurikwera , n'amataagi nago nikwo gaba .
45011017	Mbwenu amataagi gamwe ku garaabe gahagwirweho , kandi iwe , omutookwa gw'omuti gw'omuoliva ogw'omu ishwa , okahagikwa omu mwanya gwago , okariisibwa hamwe nago ebirikuruga omu mizi yaagwo ,
45011018	toshemereire kwehimbisiza ahari ago mataagi . Ku oraabe nooyehimbisa , ijuka ku omuzi gutakumezireho , kureka ku niiwe ogumezireho .
45011019	Noobaasa kugira oti : Amataagi gakahagurwaho , ngu mbone kuhagikwamu .
45011020	Ekyo n'eky'amazima ; gakahagurwaho ahabw'okutaikiriza kwago ; kwonka iwe , ekikwemereizeho n'okwikiriza . N'ahabw'ekyo oteehimbisa , kureka guma otiine .
45011021	Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga ku araabe atarasaasiire mataagi g'obuhangwa , naiwe tarikusaasira .
45011022	Yetegyereze embabazi n'okutagira saasi ebya Ruhanga ; okutagira saasi kwe aha bagwire , n'okugira embabazi ahariirwe , waaba ozigumiremu . Kwonka ku oriba otazigumiremu , naiwe oryahagurwaho .
45011023	Nangwa na bari , ku baraabe batagumiire mu kutaikiriza , baryahagikwamu ; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga naabaasa kugaruka kubahagikamu .
45011024	Mbwenu iwe , ku oraabe waahagwirwe aha muti gw'omuoliva omu buhangwa ogw'omu ishwa , okahagikwa omu muti gw'omuoliva ogubyairwe , ogu otaine buzaare nagwo , kaashwa amataagi g'obuhangwa agarikugaruka kuhagikwa omu muti gwago ogw'omuoliva !
45011025	Banyaruganda , niinyenda ku mumanya eri ibanga , ngu murekye kwemanya ; ahabw'okuba bamwe omu Baisiraeli bakagangaara , kandi baryaguma bagangaire okuhitsya obu Abanyamahanga boona baritwijamu .
45011026	Abaisiraeli nabo baryajunwa boona , nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Omujuni aryaruga Siyooni , aihe ahari Yakobo okutatiina Ruhanga ;
45011027	Kandi egyo niyo eriba endagaano yangye nabo , ku ndibaihaho ebibi byabo .
45011028	Bo , omu kureebera aha Makuru Marungi , baba abazigu ba Ruhanga , ngu imwe mubone kugaikiriza . Kwonka omu kureebera aha kutooranwa baba enkundwa , ahabwa baishenkurubo .
45011029	Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga taha na nyamwaka , kandi tateera kiganja ou yaayeta .
45011030	Naimwe , ira mukagomera Ruhanga , kwonka hati mugiriirwe embabazi ahabw'okugoma kwabo .
45011031	Mbwenu nabo bagomire , ngu embabazi ezi mwagiriirwe , nabo bazigirirwe .
45011032	Manya Ruhanga akabarira abantu boona obugomi , ngu abone kugirira boona embabazi .
45011033	Ebishi , obutungi bwa Ruhanga n'obwengye bwe n'okumanya kwe tibiine bugarukiro ! Emicwere ye k'etarikucondoozibwa , n'emitwarize ye k'etarikushoboororwa !
45011034	Mbwenu n'oha oramanyire ebiteekateeko bya Mukama ? N'oha oramuhabwire ?
45011035	Nainga n'oha oramuhaire ekiconco ngu nawe amugarurire ?
45011036	Manya byona niwe bikomookaho , niwe abibaisaho , kandi niwe bihereraho . Aheebwe ekitiinwa ebiro byona ! Amiina .
45012001	N'ahabw'ekyo , banyaruganda , nimbeshengyereza ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga , muheyo emibiri yaanyu kuba ebitambo ebihuriire , ebirikwera kandi ebirkusiimwa Ruhanga ; haza okwo nikwo kumuramya omu mazima .
45012002	Murekye kushushanisibwa n'ab'ensi egi , kureka muhindurwe nimugarurwa busya omu biteekateeko byanyu , mubone kuhamya ebi Ruhanga ayenda : ebirungi ebirikusiimwa , kandi ebihikiire kimwe .
45012003	Ahabw'omugisha ogu naahairwe , ningambira buri omwe omuriimwe okuteeteekateekaho okukira oku ari , kureka okweteekateekaho omu buryo buhikire buri omwe nk'orugyero rw'okwikiriza oku Ruhanga yaamuhaire rurikwingana .
45012004	Ahabw'okuba nk'oku omu mubiri gumwe twinemu engingo nyingi , haza ezo ngingo zoona zitagira mirimo erikushushana ,
45012005	naitwe nikwo turi . Nobu turaabe turi baingi , kwonka turi omubiri gumwe omuri Kristo , kandi buri omwe n'orugingo rwa mugyenzi we .
45012006	Nk'oku twine ebiconco bitarikushushana ahabw'emigisha ei twahairwe , ka tubikorese . Ku buraabe buri oburangi , turangye nk'okwikiriza kwaitu oku kuri .
45012007	Ku buraabe buri obuheereza , tuheereze . Orikwegyesa ate omutima aha kwegyesa kwe .
45012008	Orikwezirikisa abandi atemu omuhimbo ; orikugaba agabe n'obufura ; orikutegyeka akwezirikire , n'orikukora eby'embabazi abikore ashemereirwe .
45012009	K'okukundana kwanyu kube okw'amazima . Mwangye ekibi , muhamire aha kirungi .
45012010	Mukundane na rukundo y'abanyaruganda ; omu kuhaana ekitiinwa , buri muntu ayeshumbyeho okukiha mugyenzi we .
45012011	Omu bweziriki mutaryeganda , muheereze Mukama n'omutima ogushashaanukire .
45012012	Mushemererwe mwine amatsiko , mugumisirize muri omu busaasi , mugume mushabe obutoosha .
45012013	Muhe aha byanyu kukyenuura abarikwera , mukunire abagyenyi .
45012014	Mushabire emigisha abarikubahiiganisa , mubashabire emigisha kandi murekye kubakyeena .
45012015	Mushemererwe hamwe n'abarikushemererwa , murire hamwe n'abarikurira .
45012016	Mutuurane mwine omutima gumwe ; mutaryetunguura , kureka mugyendere hamwe n'abataine kitiinwa ; mutarigira orwemanyo .
45012017	Mutaryehoorera enzigu , kureka mute omutima aha kukora ebi abantu boona barikureeba ngu ni birungi .
45012018	Ku kiraabe nikibabaasikira , mutuurane n'abantu boona n'obusingye .
45012019	Abakundwa , mutaryehoorera enzigu , kureka murekyere Ruhanga kucwa orubanja : ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa kiti : Okuhoora enzigu n'okwangye ; niinye ndihoora , nikwo Mukama arikugamba .
45012020	N'ahabw'ekyo omuzigu waawe ku ariba aine enjara , omuhe ekyokurya ; ku arigira eiriho , omuhe ekyokunywa ; ahabw'okuba omu kukora otyo , nooba omurunzire amakara garikwotsya aha nda .
45012021	Otarisingurwa ekibi , kureka ekibi okisinguze ekirungi .
45013001	Omuntu weena ayorobere abaine obushoboorozi bw'okutegyeka , ahabw'okuba tihariho butegyeki obutaruga hari Ruhanga ; kandi abategyeki abariho bakateebwaho Ruhanga .
45013002	N'ahabw'ekyo ogomera abategyeki , aba agomeire ekyatairweho Ruhanga , kandi abagoma beesingisa orubanja .
45013003	Manya abategyeki tibaba b'okutiinisa abarikukora gye , kureka abarikukora kubi . Nooyenda kutatiina orikutegyeka ? Mbwenu nu kora gye , haza naija kukusiima .
45013004	Manya we n'omuheereza wa Ruhanga ow'okukureetera ebirungi . Kwonka ku oraakore kubi , tiina , ahabw'okuba takwatira busha rurara . N'omuheereza wa Ruhanga kufubira owaakora kubi .
45013005	N'ahabw'ekyo mushemereire kworoba , ti habw'okutiina ekiniga kya Ruhanga kwonka , kureka n'ahabw'okuhaburwa omutima .
45013006	Nikyo muheera emishoro , ahabw'okuba nabo n'abaheereza ba Ruhanga abeehayo kukora ogwo murimo .
45013007	Mwihure boona ebi barikubaihuza : abarikushoza omushoro mugubahe , abarikuhooza empooza mugibahe , ab'okutiinwa mubatiine , ab'ekitiinwa mukibahe .
45013008	Mutarigira eibanja aha muntu weena , kureka ery'okukundana ; ahabw'okuba okunda mutaahi we , aba ahikiriize eiteeka .
45013009	Manya ebiragiro bigira biti : Otarishambana , Otariita , Otariiba , Otaryetenga kubi , n'ebindi biragiro , byona biteeranirwa omu kigambo ekirikugira kiti : Kunda mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda .
45013010	Oine rukundo takora mutaahi we kubi , n'ahabw'ekyo rukundo niyo ehikiiriza eiteeka .
45013011	Kandi ekindi , nimumanya ku obu nibwo bunaku , eshaaha yaahika , imwe kusisiimuka omu turo ; ahabw'okuba okujunwa kutwiriire haihi okukira obu twaikiriza .
45013012	Ekiro kyahwaire , bwagiire kusheesha . Mbwenu ka turekyere aho kukora eby'omu mwirima ; tujware eby'okurwanisa eby'omushana .
45013013	Tutwaze gye nk'oku kitwazibwa nyomushana , tutarikwecuutiira byokurya , tutarikusinda , tutarikushambana n'okukora eby'enshoni , tutarikutongana n'okugirirana eihari .
45013014	Kureka mwekwate Mukama Yesu Kristo , murekye kuha omubiri obwiho bw'okukora ebibi bi gurikwetenga .
45014001	Otaine maani mu kwikiriza , mumwakiire , mutarikumuteeza mpaka omu bi arikuteekateeka .
45014002	Hariho oikiriza ngu naabaasa kurya ibara kintu , haza ow'okwikiriza kukye arya emboga zonka .
45014003	Orikurya ekintu nanka arekye kugaya otarikukirya , n'otarikukirya arekye kucwera orubanja orikukirya , ahabw'okuba Ruhanga yaaherize kumwakiira .
45014004	Mbwenu iwe , niiwe oha orikucwera omuheereza w'ondi orubanja ? Eky'okwemerera kwe nari okugwa kwe kiri ahari Mukama we ; kandi aryayemerera ahabw'okuba Mukama we niwe arikubaasa kumwemerezaho .
45014005	Omuntu omwe ateekateeka ngu ekiro kimwe ni kikuru okukira ekindi , haza ondiijo agira ngu ebiro byona nibingana . Ka buri omwe agire obusingye bw'okuhamira aha ki arikuteekateeka ngu kihikire .
45014006	Orikukuza ekiro akikuza kuhaisa Mukama ekitiinwa , n'orikurya nawe arya kuhaisa Mukama ekitiinwa , ahabw'okuba asiima Ruhanga ; kandi n'otarya ayezibira kurya ahabw'okuhaisa Mukama ekitiinwa kandi asiima Ruhanga .
45014007	Manya omuriitwe tihariho obaho ahabwe wenka , kandi tihariho ofa ahabwe .
45014008	Ku tubaho , tubaho ahabwa Mukama , kandi ku tufa , tufa ahabwa Mukama . N'ahabw'ekyo yaaba tubaho , yaaba tufa , turi aba Mukama .
45014009	Ekyo nikyo Kristo yaafeereire kandi akazooka omu bafiire , ngu abone kuba Mukama w'abafiire n'abahuriire .
45014010	Mbwenu shi noocwerera ki mwene sho orubanja ? Nari shi noogayira ki mwene sho ? Manya twena turyayemerera omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'eiramuriro ekya Ruhanga .
45014011	Ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa kiti : Mukama naagira ati : Nk'oku ndi Nyakubaho , buri muntu aryantsimbira amaju , na ibara muntu aryaimutsya eiraka ahimbise Ruhanga
45014012	N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu weena omuriitwe aryayetonganira ahari Ruhanga .
45014013	Mbwenu nu ka turekye kugaruka kucwererana emanja , kureka nangwa tumaramaze okutataho ekirikuteeza mwene waitu entsibo , nari ekirikumugwisa .
45014014	Nimmanya kandi nimpamiza kimwe omuri Mukama Yesu , ku hatariho kirikuzira ahabwakyo , kureka kiba ekirikuzira ahari ogwo orikuteekateeka ngu nikizira .
45014015	Kwonka mwene sho ku araabe naakorwa kubi ebi orikurya , nooba otakimwiniire mitwarize ya rukundo . Otarireka mugyenzi waawe ou Kristo yaafeereire , kuhwerekyerera ahabw'ebi orikurya .
45014016	N'ahabw'ekyo , imwe eki murikusiima , kirekye kureetera abandi kukigambaho kubi .
45014017	Manya obukama bwa Ruhanga tibuba byokurya na byokunywa , kureka buba okuhikiirira n'obusingye n'okushemererwa , ebiruga omuri Mutima Orikwera .
45014018	Oheereza atyo Kristo , niwe agwisa gye Ruhanga akasiimwa n'abantu .
45014019	N'ahabw'ekyo ka tugire emitwarize erikureeta obusingye kandi twombekane .
45014020	Otaita omurimo gwa Ruhanga ahabw'ekyokurya . Ebintu byona omu mazima biba ebishemeire , kwonka ekibi n'omuntu kuteeza abandi entsibo ahabw'eki arikurya .
45014021	Haakiri okutarya nyama , nari okutanywa viino , nari okutakora kindi kyona ekirikuteeza mwene sho entsibo .
45014022	Okwikiriza oku oine , guma nakwo n'enaama yaawe na Ruhanga ! N'omuhiirwa otarikwecwera rubanja omu bi arikuteekateeka ngu bihikire .
45014023	Kwonka orya naabangaanisa asingwa orubanja , ahabw'okuba akikora omutima gwangire ; manya kyona ekitaruga mu kwikiriza kiba ekibi .
45015001	Itwe abaine amaani , tushemereire kuhwera abatagaine , kutari kwegwisa gye twenka .
45015002	Reka buri omwe omuriitwe agwise gye mutaahi we ahabw'okumugasira n'okumuhamya .
45015003	Ahabw'okuba Kristo nawe tareegwisize gye , kureka akagira nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Ebijumo by'abaakujumire niinye byagwereire .
45015004	Manya byona ebyahandiikirwe ira bikahandiikwa kutwegyesa , ngu tugire amatsiko ahabw'okugumisiriza n'okuhuumurizibwa ebyo Byahandiikirwe .
45015005	Mpaho nu Ruhanga , okomookwaho okugumisiriza n'okuhuumuriza , abahe okugira omutima gumwe , nk'oku Kristo Yesu ayenda ,
45015006	mubone kuhimbisa Ruhanga , Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo n'omutima gumwe n'eiraka rimwe .
45015007	Mwakiirane nk'oku Kristo yaabaakiire , Ruhanga abone kuheebwa ekitiinwa .
45015008	Manya nimbagambira nti : Kristo akaba omuheereza w'abashazirwe , kworeka amazima ga Ruhanga , ngu abone kuhikiiriza ebi yaaraganiise baatatenkuriitwe .
45015009	Kandi ngu Abanyamahanga baboone kuhimbisa Ruhanga ahabw'embabazi ze , nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : N'ahabw'ekyo ndyakuhimbisiza omu Banyamahanga , nyeshongore eby'okuhimbisa eiziina ryawe .
45015010	Kandi kiti : Banyamahanga ' mwe mushemererwe hamwe n'abantu be !
45015011	Kandi kiti : Imwe Banyamahanga mwena , musingize Nyakubaho , naimwe amahanga goona mumuhimbise !
45015012	Na Isaaya ayongyera agira ati : Ow'oruzaaro rwa Yese aryaija , aimukye kutegyeka Abanyamahanga ; n'abo Banyamahanga bamugiremu amatsiko .
45015013	Ruhanga okomookwaho amatsiko abaijuze okushemererwa n'obusingye ahabw'okumwikiriza , mubone kugira amatsiko gashaagaine ahabw'amaani ga Mutima Orikwera .
45015014	Banyaruganda , nimpamiza kimwe ku mwijwire emicwe mirungi , ku mwine okumanya kuhikire , kandi ku murikubaasa kuhaburana .
45015015	Kwonka banyaruganda , aha bintu bimwe naabahandiikira n'obumanzi , nimbaijutsya ku Ruhanga yangiriire embabazi .
45015016	Nkaba omuheereza wa Kristo Yesu omu Banyamahanga , ninkora omurimo gw'obuheereza bw'okurangirira Amakuru Marungi ga Ruhanga , ngu Abanyamahanga babone kuba empongano erikusiimwa Ruhanga , kandi eyeziibwe Mutima Orikwera .
45015017	N'ahabw'ekyo omuri Kristo Yesu nyine ekirikuunyehimbisisa ahabw'omurimo ogu nkoreire Ruhanga .
45015018	Manya tinkaayehanga kugamba aha kindi kyona , kureka aha bi Kristo yaakoreire omuriinye , kureetera Abanyamahanga kworobera Ruhanga , omu bi naagambire n'omu bi naakozire ,
45015019	ahabw'amaani g'eby'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza , n'amaani ga Mutima Orikwera . Nikyo naabaasiize kurangirira kimwe Amakuru Marungi ga Kristo , okuruga Yerusalemu n'okwehinguririza , nkarugaho nkahika Iliiriko .
45015020	Ekyo kikanteera omuhimbo kurangirira Amakuru Marungi omu myanya ei eiziina rya Kristo ryabaire ritakarangiriirwemu , ngu ntakaayombeka aha musingi gw'ondiijo ,
45015021	kureka ngu kibe nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Aryareebwa abatakamugambirwahoga , n'abatakamuhurirahoga baryamwetegyereza .
45015022	Ekyo nikyo kyanzibiire kaingi kwija owaanyu .
45015023	Kwonka hati nk'oku ntakiine ky'okukora omuri ebi byanga , kandi nk'oku mmazire emyaka mingi nyine ekihika ky'okwija owaanyu ,
45015024	mbwenu ku ndiba ninza Spaniya , nyine amatsiko g'okubarabaho nkabareeba . Kandi ku ndimara naimwe ebiro bikye , naabahwa orushusho , muryantungira eby'okunkwatsa omu rugyendo rwangye .
45015025	Kwonka obwa hati ninza Yerusalemu kutwarira abarikwera eby'okubahwera .
45015026	Ahabw'okuba Abakristo ba Makedoniya n'aba Akaiya bakasiima kuha aha byabo , kuhwera abooro ab'omu barikwera ba Yerusalemu .
45015027	Ekyo bakasiima kukikora kandi buzimazima babaineho eibanja ; ahabw'okuba Abanyamahanga ku baraabe baabagaine nabo ebirungi by'omutima , bashemereire kubakwatsa n'omu by'omubiri .
45015028	N'ahabw'ekyo ku ndimariiriza ebyo , naaheza kubahitsyaho ebyarundainwe , ndyabarabaho ninza Spaniya .
45015029	Kandi nimmanya ngu ku ndiba niinyija owaanyu , ndyaijana emigisha ya Kristo eijuriire kimwe .
45015030	Mbwenu banyaruganda , nimbeehanangiriza ahabwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo n'ahabwa rukundo ya Mutima Orikwera , ku mwezirikira hamwe naanye kunshabira ahari Ruhanga .
45015031	Munshabire ngu mbone kukira abatarikwikiriza ab'omuri Buyudaaya , kandi n'eby'obuhwezi ebi ndikutwara Yerusalemu bibone kusiimwa abarikwera .
45015032	Haza Ruhanga ku araasiime , mbone kwija owaanyu nshemereirwe , nduhuukire omuriimwe .
45015033	Ruhanga , okomookwaho obusingye , agume naimwe mwena ! Amiina .
45016001	Nimbakwatsa Foibe munyaanyaitwe , omuhwezi ow'omu kigombe ky'abaikiriza ba Kenkereya .
45016002	Mumwakiire omuri Mukama nk'oku kishemereire abarikwera , kandi mumuhwere omuri kyona eki ariba akyenire , ahabw'okuba abaire naahwera baingi , naanye ntabuziremu .
45016003	Mundamukize Purisika na Akwila , abakozi bagyenzi bangye , abu tuheereza kumwe Kristo Yesu ,
45016004	abaayogire amagara gaabo ngu nkize agangye . Tibarikusiimwa nyowe nyenka , kureka n'ebigombe by'abaikiriza byona eby'omu Banyamahanga .
45016005	Mundamukize n'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza eky'omu nju yaabo . Mundamukize munywani wangye Epeneeto , owaabandize kuhindukira Kristo omuri Asiya .
45016006	Mundamukize Mariya , owaabahendekyeire munonga .
45016007	Muramutsya Anderoniko na Yuniya , beene waitu abu naabaire nyine omu kihome ; abantu rugambwa omu ntumwa kandi abambandiize kuba Abakristo .
45016008	Muramutsye Ampuliyato , munywani wangye omuri Mukama .
45016009	Muramutsye Urubaano , omukozi mugyenzi waitu omuri Kristo , hamwe na Sitaaku , munywani wangye .
45016010	Muramutsye Apele orikusiimwa okuba Omukristo omwesigwa . Muramutsye ab'omuka ya Arisitobulo .
45016011	Mundamukize na Herodioni ow'oruganda rwangye . Muramutsye n'abo abari omuri Mukama ab'omu ka ya Narikiso .
45016012	Muramutsye Turufaina na Turufoosa , abakozi omuri Mukama . Mundamukize omukundwa Peresi , owaakozire munonga omuri Mukama .
45016013	Muramutsye Ruufo , ekibaaju omuri Mukama , na nyina owambeeraire maawe .
45016014	Mundamukize Asinkurito , Filegooni , Herume , Paturoba , Heruruma n'abanyaruganda abari hamwe nabo .
45016015	Muramutsye Filoologo , Yuliya , Neereo na munyaanya , taho na Olumpa , n'abarikwera boona abari hamwe nabo .
45016016	Muramukanisane okunywegyerana okurikwera . Ebigombe by'abaikiriza Kristo byona nibibaramutsya .
45016017	Banyaruganda , naabeehanangiriza , mwerinde abarikureeta eby'okubataanisa n'okubaremesa , ebirikuhakanisa enyegyesa ei mwayegyesiibwe ; mubeetantare .
45016018	Ahabw'okuba ab'omuringo ogwo tibakorera Mukama waitu Kristo , kureka enda zaabo . Kandi emitima y'abataine bugobya , bagibeihabeihesa okugamba karimi karungi n'okuteera ekimama .
45016019	Manya nk'oku okworoba kwanyu kurangainwe hoona , nikyo ndikubashemererwa . Kwonka niinyenda ku muba abanyabwengye aha kirungi , kandi abataine buryarya aha kibi .
45016020	Reero Ruhanga Mukama okomookwaho obusingye naija kurahuka kusiitagurira Sitaane ahansi y'ebigyere byanyu . Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe !
45016021	Timoteeho , omukozi mugyenzi wangye , naabaramutsya ; Lukio na Yasooni na Sosipateeri mwene waitu , nabo nibabaramutsya .
45016022	Naanye Teritio , owaahandiika ebaruha egi , nimbaramutsya omuri Mukama .
45016023	Gaayo , orikunkunira hamwe n'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza kyona ekiteeranira owe naabaramutsya . Eraasito , omubiiki w'empiiha z'orurembo , na mwene waitu Kwarito nibabaramutsya .
45016024	[ Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe mwene ! Amiina . ]
45016025	Mbwenu omuri Yesu Kristo , ka tuhimbise Ruhanga , ogira obwengye wenka , orikubaasa kubagumya . Ago nigo Makuru Marungi agu ngamba nindangirira Yesu Kristo , kandi niryo ibanga eryabaire risherekirwe okwiha iranaira ,
45016026	kwonka hati rishuuruirwe . Ruhanga otahwaho niwe yaaragiire ku rimanyisibwa ab'amahanga goona , ngu baikirize kandi boorobe ; haza ekyo nikyo ebyahandiikirwe abarangi birikugamba .
45016027	Mbwenu Ruhanga ogwo aheebwe ekitiinwa obutwire bwona ! Amiina .
46001001	Nyowe Paulo , ou Ruhanga yaakunzire kweta kuba entumwa ya Kristo Yesu , hamwe na mwene waitu Sositene ,
46001002	nitubahandiikira imwe ab'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga ab'omuri Korinto , mwena abaayeetsirwe kuba abantu ba Ruhanga , abari abe ahabw'okukwatanisibwa na Kristo Yesu , kandi abaayetsirwe hamwe n'abarikwera boona abari hoonahoona , abahoogyera eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , Mukama waabo kandi Mukama waitu .
46001003	Nitubendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe , na Mukama Yesu Kristo .
46001004	Obutoosha ninsiima Ruhanga ahabwanyu , ahabw'embabazi zi yaabagiriire omuri Kristo Yesu ,
46001005	kureeba ngu omu miringo yoona mukahindurwa abatungi omuriwe , omuri byona ebi murikugamba n'omuri byona ebi murikumanya
46001006	nk'ebirikuhamya Kristo oku byahamiibwe omuriimwe .
46001007	N'ahabw'ekyo tihariho kiconco kya Mutima kyona eki mubuzirwe , mutegyereize okushuuruuka kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo ,
46001008	oribahangaana okuhitsya aha muheru , mukashangwa mutaine rubanja aha kiro kya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
46001009	Ruhanga , owaabeetsire kukwatanisa n'Omwana we Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu , n'omwesigwa .
46001010	Beene Taata , nimbeehanangiriza omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , mwena ku mwikirizana , mukareka kwecwamu , kureka mukakwatanisa mwine omutima gumwe n'ebiteekateeko bimwe .
46001011	Manya banyaruganda , nkagambirwa ab'owa Kulowe ku mwine empaka .
46001012	Eki ndikumanyisa n'eki : omwe omuriimwe naagira ati : Ndi owa Paulo ; ondi ati : Ndi owa Apolo ; ondiijo ati : Ndi owa Keefa ; n'ondi ati : Ndi owa Kristo .
46001013	Mbwenu shi , Kristo abaganisiibwemu ? Ebyo imwe , Paulo arababambiirwe aha musharaba ? Nari shi mukabatizibwa omu iziina rya Paulo ?
46001014	Ninsiima Ruhanga ahabw'okuba tindabatiize n'omwe omuriimwe , kureka Kurisipo na Gaayo ,
46001015	ngu omuntu weena atakaagira ngu mukabatizibwa omu iziina ryangye .
46001016	Eego kwo , nkabatiza n'ab'eka ya Sitefana . Okwihaho abo , tindikumanya yaaba hariho ondiijo ou ndabatiize .
46001017	Manya Kristo tarantumire kubatiza , kureka okurangirira Amakuru Marungi , ntarikugambisa bigambo by'obwengye bw'abagambi barungi , ngu omusharaba gwa Kristo gurekye kubura ensha .
46001018	Manya ekigambo omusharaba kibeera abarikuhwerekyerera obushema , kwonka itwe abarikujunwa kitubeera amaani ga Ruhanga .
46001019	Ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa kiti : Ndyacwekyereza obwengye bw'abanyabwengye ; n'okwetegyereza kw'abarikwetegyereza nkuhindure busha .
46001020	Mbwenu omunyabwengye arahi ? Omwegyesa w'eiteeka arahi ? Omuhakani w'obusingye obu arahi ? Ruhanga shi , tarahindwire obwengye bw'ensi egi obushema ?
46001021	Ahabw'okuba omu bwengye bwa Ruhanga , ab'ensi ku baaremirwe kumumanyisibwa obwengye bwabo , Ruhanga akasiima kujuna abaikiriza naakoresa obushema obu turangirira .
46001022	Manya Abayudaaya benda obumanyiso , n'Abaguriiki basherura obwengye .
46001023	Kwonka itwe turangirira Kristo owaabambirwe aha musharaba , ou Abayudaaya bateerwaho entsibo , Abanyamahanga bakamweta omushema .
46001024	Kwonka aha beetsirwe , Abayudaaya n'Abaguriiki , Kristo aba amaani ga Ruhanga n'obwengye bwa Ruhanga .
46001025	Ahabw'okuba obushema bwa Ruhanga bukira obwengye bw'abantu , n'amaani makye ga Ruhanga gakira amaani g'abantu .
46001026	Manya banyaruganda , mwetegyereze okwetwa kwanyu . Ti baingi omuriimwe abaine obwengye nk'emitindo y'ensi oku eri , ti baingi abaine obushoboorozi , ti baingi ab'ekitiinwa .
46001027	Kureka Ruhanga akatoorana ebishema omu nsi kuhemura abanyabwengye , yaatoorana ebitaine maani omu nsi kuhemura ebigaine .
46001028	Ruhanga akatoorana ebitarikwetwaho n'ebirikugaywa omu nsi , nangwa n'ebitariho , kuhindura busha ebiriho ,
46001029	ngu hatakaagira omuntu weena owaayehimbisa omu maisho ge .
46001030	Niwe bukomooko bw'amagara gaanyu omuri Kristo Yesu , ou yaataireho kuba obwengye bwaitu , okuhikiirira kwaitu , n'okwezibwa kandi n'okucungurwa kwaitu .
46001031	N'ahabw'ekyo , nk'oku kyahandiikirwe : Orikwehimbisa , k'ayehimbisize omuri Mukama .
46002001	Beene Taata , obu naija owaanyu , tindaizire nindangirira eby'enaama ya Ruhanga nk'omugambi murungi kandi ow'obwengye .
46002002	Ahabw'okuba nkamaramaza kutamanya kindi omuriimwe , kureka Yesu Kristo , ogwo owaabambirwe aha musharaba .
46002003	Nkaba ntuura naimwe ntaine maani , kandi nyine obwoba bwingi nintetema .
46002004	Emigambire yangye n'okurangirira kwangye bikaba bitari bigambo by'obwengye ebirikwikirizisa abantu , kureka ebirikworekyerwamu amaani ga Mutima ,
46002005	ngu okwikiriza kwanyu kuteegamira obwengye bw'abantu , kureka amaani ga Ruhanga .
46002006	Kwonka eby'obwengye byo tubigambira abahamire omu by'omutima , obwo bwengye nobu buraabe butari bw'ab'ensi egi , nari obw'abategyeki b'ensi egi ab'okuhwaho .
46002007	Kureka twata enaama ya Ruhanga , kandi tumanyisa obwengye bwe obusherekirwe , obu yaataireho ebintu byona bitakabaireho ahabw'okutuhaisa ekitiinwa .
46002008	Omu bategyeki b'egi nsi , tihariho n'omwe owaabumanyire ; ahabw'okuba kuri baabumanyire , tibaakubambire Mukama w'ekitiinwa aha musharaba .
46002009	Kwonka buri nk'oku kyahandiikirwe ngu : Ebi eriisho ritakareebaga , ebi okutu kutakahuriraga , ebitakataahaga mu mutima gw'omuntu , nibyo Ruhanga yaacumiire abamukunda .
46002010	Kandi ebyo , itwe Ruhanga akabitushuuruurira omuri Mutima . Ahabw'okuba Mutima acondooza byona , nangwa n'ebya Ruhanga ebitacodoozibwa .
46002011	Ni muntu ki omanya ebi ondiijo arikuteekateeka , kureka omutima gwa kibiteekateeka . Na mbwenu tihariho omanya ebiteekateeko bya Ruhanga , kureka Mutima wa Ruhanga .
46002012	Kandi itwe omutima ogu twahairwe ti gw'ensi egi , kureka tukaheebwa Mutima owaarugire ahari Ruhanga , ngu tubone kumanya ebiconco bi Ruhanga atugabira .
46002013	Nibyo tugamba tutabyegyesiibwe bwengye bw'abantu , kureka tubyegyesiibwe Mutima , nitushoboororera abaine Mutima ogwo eby'amazima ebikwatiraine nawe .
46002014	Omuntu nyabuntu taikiriza bya Mutima wa Ruhanga ; ahabw'okuba bimubeera eby'obushema , kandi tabaasa kubyetegyereza , ahabw'okuba bishoboororwa omu buryo bwa Mutima .
46002015	Oine Mutima ashoboorora byona , kwonka we tashoboororerwa muntu weena .
46002016	Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Mbwenu n'oha oramanyire ebi Mukama arikuteekateeka , haza abone kumuhabura ? Kwonka itwe twine ebiteekateeko bya Kristo .
46003001	Mbwenu beene Taata , nyowe tindabaasize kubagambira nk'abantu abarikutegyekwa Mutima , kureka nk'abarikutegyekwa omubiri , kandi nk'abeereere abaikiriize Kristo juba .
46003002	Nkabagaburira amate , bitari byokurya bigumire , ahabw'okuba mukaba mutakabibaasize ; nangwa na hati timukabibaasize ,
46003003	ahabw'okuba mukiri ab'omubiri . Mbwenu shi omuriimwe , ku haraabe hakirimu eihari n'empaka , biri timuri ab'omubiri , abarikutwaza nk'abantu nyabuntu ?
46003004	Hari omwe ku arikugira ati : Ndi owa Paulo ; ondiijo ati : Ndi owa Apolo ; biri obwo timuri abantu nyabuntu ?
46003005	Mbwenu Apolo ni ki ? Na Paulo ni ki ? Ka n'abaheereza abaabareeteire kwikiriza , nka buri omwe oku Mukama yaamuteekateekyeire .
46003006	Manya nyowe nkabyara , Apolo yaitirira , kwonka Ruhanga niwe yaabikurize .
46003007	N'ahabw'ekyo obyara nari oitirira ti kintu , kureka Ruhanga obikuza .
46003008	Obyara n'oitirira nibaingana , kandi buri omwe aryaheebwa ebihembo nk'oku yaakozire .
46003009	Manya itwe turi abakwataniise nitukorera Ruhanga . Imwe muri omusiri gwa Ruhanga , muri ekyombeko kye .
46003010	Nk'omurimo ogu Ruhanga yantumire kukora oku guri , nk'omwombeki omunyabwengye nkataho omusingi , ondiijo yaagwombekyeraho . Buri omwe ayerinde oku araagwombekyereho .
46003011	Manya tihariho n'omwe obaasa kutaho ogundi musingi , kureka ogwo ogwatairweho , niwe Yesu Kristo .
46003012	Mbwenu ahari ogwo musingi , omuntu ayombekyesaho ezaabu , efeeza , amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi , ebiti , obunyaatsi , nari embuba .
46003013	Kwonka omurimo gwa buri muntu guryareebeka aha kiro ki Mukama arigworekyeraho . Manya omuriro gw'ahari ekyo Kiro guryayerura omurimo gwa buri muntu , gugugyeze kandi gworekye nk'oku guri .
46003014	Ou ekyombeko kye kyayombekirwe ahari ogwo musingi ogurigumaho , aryaheebwa ebihembo .
46003015	Ou ekyombeko kye kirisya , kikayonga , aryafeerwa ; nobu we arijunwa , kwonka kuri nk'okuraba omu muriro .
46003016	Timurikumanya ku muri Nyaruju ya Ruhanga , kandi Mutima wa Ruhanga ku atuura omuriimwe ?
46003017	Weena oricwekyereza Nyaruju ya Ruhanga , Ruhanga aryamucwekyereza . Ahabw'okuba Nyaruju ya Ruhanga neeyera , kandi Nyaruju egyo niimwe .
46003018	Hatagira owaayebeiha : omuriimwe ku haraabe harimu orikweteekateekaho kuba omunyabwengye omu muringo gw'ensi egi , ayegire omushema , abone kuba ow'obwengye .
46003019	Manya obwengye bw'omu nsi egi , ahari Ruhanga buba obushema . Ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa kiti : Ruhanga akwatira abanyabwengye omu mengye gaabo ;
46003020	kandi kiti : Mukama amanya ku ebiteekateeko by'abanyabwengye bitagira muhoho .
46003021	N'ahabw'ekyo hatarigira owaayehimbisa ahabw'abantu . Manya ebintu byona n'ebyanyu :
46003022	yaaba Paulo , yaaba Apolo nari Keefa , yaaba nsi , yaaba magara nari rufu ; yaaba biriho nari ebiribaho , byona n'ebyanyu ;
46003023	naimwe muri aba Kristo , na Kristo n'owa Ruhanga .
46004001	Oku nikwo omuntu ashemereire kututwaza , nk'abaheereza ba Kristo , n'abarikujunaanwa eby'amabanga ga Ruhanga .
46004002	Manya ekyetengwa aha barikujunaanwa n'okushangwa bari abeesigwa .
46004003	Kandi imwe okuncwera orubanja , nari okurucwerwa ekyetwa eiramuriro ry'abantu , ahariinye n'akantu kakye . Nangwa naanye tindwecwera .
46004004	Nobu ndaabe ntaine ki ndikwemanyaho ekirikunshinja , kwonka ekyo tikirikuunyihisaho rubanja . Mukama niwe arikuruncwera .
46004005	N'ahabw'ekyo mutaricwa orubanja obunaku butakahikire , Mukama atakaizire ; niwe ogwo oryanika ebisherekirwe omu mwirima , akashuuruura enaama z'omu mutima ; haza obwo nibwo Ruhanga arisiima buri muntu nk'oku kimushemereire .
46004006	Banyaruganda , ebyo naabyegambaho na Apolo nimbarengyeza , ngu mutwegyereho kugira emitwarize erikuhikaana n'Ebyahandiikirwe , ngu hatagira omuriimwe owaayetunguura , naasiima omuntu omwe okukira ondiijo .
46004007	N'oha okureebamu eki abandi bataine ? Oine ki eki otarahairwe ? Mbwenu ku oraabe waakihairwe , nooyehimbisiza ki nk'otarakihairwe ?
46004008	Ebishi muherize kwiguta ! Ebishi muherize kuba abatungi ! Ebishi , muherize kuba abagabe mutatwine ! Nakabaasibwa ki muba abategyeki , naitwe tutegyeka hamwe naimwe !
46004009	Manya ninteekateeka ngu itwe entumwa Ruhanga atworekire nk'abarikuhereeruka aha bandi boona , twaba nk'abacwereirwe orw'okufa ; ahabw'okuba tubaire ab'okushungwa ensi na baamaraika n'abantu .
46004010	Itwe turi abashema ahabwa Kristo , kwonka imwe muri abanyabwengye omuri Kristo . Itwe turi abataine maani , kwonka imwe muri ab'amaani ; imwe nimuheebwa ekitiinwa , kwonka itwe nitugaywa .
46004011	N'okuhitsya aga magingo twine enjara n'eiriho , tujwaire obucancabari , nituteerwa empi , titwine butaaho ,
46004012	kandi twehenenga nitukoresa emikono yaitu . Ku tujumwa , twendeza emigisha ; ku tuhiiganisibwa , tugumisiriza ;
46004013	ku tubeihererwa , tuteeraho kugarukanisa ; n'okuhitsya hati tuhindukire efa y'omu nsi n'ekumbwe y'ebintu byona .
46004014	Ebyo tinaabibahandiikira kubahemura , kureka okubahuguura nk'abaana bangye abakundwa .
46004015	Manya nobu muraabe mwine abahabuzi enkumi n'enkumi omu by'amagara g'obukristo , kwonka mwine shoimwe omwe . Manya nyowe , omu by'amagara gaanyu g'obukristo , nkaba shoimwe nimbarangirira Amakuru Marungi .
46004016	N'ahabw'ekyo nimbeehanangiriza ku muntooreza .
46004017	Nikyo naabatumiraho Timoteeho , omwana wangye omukundwa kandi omwesigwa omuri Kristo , kubaijutsya emitwarize yangye ey'omuri Kristo , nk'oku ngyegyesa hoonahoona omuri buri kigombe ky'Abakristo .
46004018	Abamwe nibeeraata kushusha oti tindiija waanyu .
46004019	Kwonka ndi ow'okwija juba , Mukama yaaba akisiimire , haza nyereebere amaani g'abo banyamaryo , bitari bi barikugamba kusha .
46004020	Ahabw'okuba obukama bwa Ruhanga tiburi mu bigambo , kureka omu kukora n'amaani .
46004021	Mbwenu nimusiima ki ? Ngu nyije owaanyu n'omunyaafu , nari nyije n'omutima ogwine rukundo n'obucureezi ?
46005001	Nikigambwa hoona , ku omuriimwe harimu omucwe gw'obushambani , kandi obw'omuringo ogutashangwa nangwa n'omu bakaafiiri ; omushaija okushwera muka ishe .
46005002	Haza mwehimbisa ! Timushemereire kushaasha ? Omuntu okozire ekyo kintu n'ow'okucuubwa .
46005003	Nyowe nobu ndaabe ntari hamwe naimwe omu mubiri , ndi hamwe naimwe omu mutima . Kandi nk'ori naimwe ,
46005004	omu iziina rya Mukama Yesu , ogwo muntu okozire ekyo kihagaro mperize kumucwera orubanja . Ku muraateerane , naanye nimba ndi hamwe naimwe omu mutima hamwe n'amaani ga Mukama waitu Yesu ,
46005005	ogwo muntu mumurekurire Sitaane , omubiri gwe guhwerekyerere , amagara ge g'omutima gabone kujunwa aha Kiro kya Mukama Yesu .
46005006	Okwehimbisa kwanyu tikuhikire . Timurikumanya ku akatumbisa kakye katumbisa eisyanga ryona ?
46005007	Mweihemu ekitumbisa ekya ira , mubone kuba eisyanga risya ; manya timurimu kitumbisa . Ahabw'okuba , Kristo Omwana gw'Entaama gw'Okuhingurwaho kwaitu akatambwa .
46005008	N'ahabw'ekyo ka tugume tugire omugyenzo gw'obugyenyi obwo , tutaine kitumbisa ekya ira , ekitumbisa eky'eitima n'obubi ; kureka emigaati etatumbisiibwe , etarimu buryarya kandi ey'amazima .
46005009	Nkabahandiikira omu baruha yangye ku mutashemereire kukwatanisa n'abakora eby'obushambani ;
46005010	ntarikugira ngu abashambani b'ensi egi , nari abanyamururu n'abanyagi , nainga abaramya ebitari Ruhanga , ahabw'okuba ku kyakuba kityo mukaaba ab'okuruga omu nsi .
46005011	Kwonka eki naabahandiikiire n'okutakwatanisa na weena oyetwa omunyaruganda , ku araabe ari omushambani , omunyamururu , orikuramya emandwa , omujumi , omusinzi nari omunyagi nobu kwakuba okurya n'omuntu nk'ogwo .
46005012	Mbwenu shi n'ekyangye kucwera ab'aheeru orubanja ? Ruhanga niwe arirubacwera . Kwonka shi imwe timushemereire kucwera ab'omu kigombe kyanyu orubanja ? Mwihe omuriimwe ogwo muntu mubi .
46005013	
46006001	Mbwenu omuriimwe ku haakubaho oine eki arikufa na mugyenzi we , akaayetuuma amutabaariza omu maisho g'abatahikiriire , omu mwanya gw'okumutabaariza omu maisho g'abarikwera ?
46006002	Timurikumanya ku abarikwera nibo baricwera ensi orubanja ? Ensi ku muraabe niimwe murigicwera orubanja , nimuremwa kucwa emanja nkye nk'ezo ?
46006003	Timurikumanya ku turicwera baamaraika emanja ? Reero kaashwa ebikwatiraine n'amagara aga !
46006004	Mbwenu shi ku muraabe mwine emanja nk'ezo , ahabw'enki nimuzitwarira abatarikusiimwa kigombe ky'abaikiriza ?
46006005	Ekyo naakigamba kubaitsa enshoni . Nikibaasika okutabaho omunyabwengye omuriimwe kushoboorora abanyaruganda ,
46006006	kureka omunyaruganda kutabaariza omunyaruganda mugyenzi we omu maisho g'abataikiriza ?
46006007	Okutabaarizana mwenka na mwenka nikyoreka ku muremirwe . Ahabw'enki mutarikufa kushaagizibwa ? Ahabw'enki mutarikufa kuryangatanisibwa ?
46006008	Kwonka niimwe murikushaagiza abandi , mukaryangatanisa nangwa n'abanyaruganda beene waanyu !
46006009	Timurikumanya ku abatahikiriire bataritaaha mu bukama bwa Ruhanga ? Murekye kwebeiha , abakora ebikwatiraine n'obushambani ; abarikuramya emandwa , abashambani n'ebitingwa ,
46006010	abashuma n'abanyamururu , abasinzi n'abajumi , nobu baakuba abanyagi , tibaritaaha mu bukama bwa Ruhanga .
46006011	Kandi bamwe omuriimwe nikwo mwabaire muri , kwonka mukoogibwa , mwayezibwa , mwaheebwa okuhikiirira omu iziina rya Mukama Yesu Kristo n'omuri Mutima wa Ruhanga waitu .
46006012	Byona nimbiikirizibwa , kwonka ebiine omugasho ti byona . Byona nimbiikirizibwa , kwonka tinditegyekwa kintu na kimwe .
46006013	Ebyokurya bibaho ahabw'enda , n'enda ebaho ahabw'ebyokurya , kwonka Ruhanga aryabihwerekyereza byombi , kinu na kiri . Omubiri tiguriho habwa ebikwatiraine n'obushambani , kureka ahabwa Mukama , na Mukama niwe mukama waagwo .
46006014	Reero Ruhanga owaazoire Mukama waitu omu bafiire , naitwe aryatuzoora n'amaani ge .
46006015	Timurikumanya ku emibiri yaanyu eri engingo za Kristo ? Mbwenu shi ntware engingo za Kristo , nzihindure engingo za maraaya ? Rubuuza !
46006016	Nari shi , timurikumanya ngu oteerana na maraaya , bombi baba omubiri gumwe ? Manya kikahandiikwa kiti : Ababiri baryaba omubiri gumwe .
46006017	Kandi oteerana na Mukama aba omutima gumwe nawe .
46006018	Mugume mwetantare ebikwatiraine n'obushambani . Ekibi ekindi kyona eki omuntu akora kiba kitaine kakwate na mubiri , kwonka oshambana akora ekibi ekishiisha omubiri gwe .
46006019	Timurikumanya ku omubiri gwanyu guri Nyaruju ya Mutima Orikwera ori omuriimwe , ou mwahairwe Ruhanga ? Manya timuriho habwanyu ;
46006020	mukagurwa n'obuguzi bwingi . N'ahabw'ekyo muhaise Ruhanga ekitiinwa omu mibiri yaanyu .
46007001	Mbwenu aha bi mwampandiikiire , ni kirungi omushaija okutaba na mukazi .
46007002	Kwonka ahabw'okwerinda obushambani , buri mushaija agire omukazi we , na buri mukazi agire omushaija we .
46007003	Omushaija ashemereire kuha omukazi we eki yaamushwereire , n'omukazi nawe ashemereire kutwaza atyo iba .
46007004	Ahabw'okuba omukazi tategyeka mubiri gwe , kureka gutegyekwa iba ; n'omushaija tategyeka mubiri gwe , kureka gutegyekwa omukazi we .
46007005	Murekye kwimana , kureka shana mwaba muragaine okumara omwanya nanka , ngu mubone kwemarira omu kushaba Ruhanga ; bwanyima mugarukye kuteerana , Sitaane atakaabatega ahabw'okuremwa kwezibira .
46007006	Eki ninkibagambira nk'orikubahabura , kutari kubaragiira .
46007007	Nkaayenzire mwena mube nkaanye ; kwonka buri omwe aine ekiconco kye ahabwe , eki yaahairwe Ruhanga ; omwe okwe n'ondi okwe .
46007008	Abatakashweraine , n'abafaakazi , ningira nti kikaabaire kirungi baguma batyo , nkaanye ;
46007009	kwonka ku baraabe batarikubaasa kwezibira , bashwerane . Ahabw'okuba embu y'okubugumwamu akarigiijo , haakiri okushwerana .
46007010	Kandi abashweraine nimbaragiira , tiinye , kureka Mukama , nti : Omukazi tashemereire kutaana na iba ,
46007011	kwonka ku araakikore , agumire aho atashweirwe , nainga shi agarukane na iba ; n'omushaija tashemereire kushenda mukazi we .
46007012	Abandi niinye ndikubagambira , ti Mukama , nti omunyaruganda ku araabe aine omukazi otari mwikiriza , ogwo mukazi yaasiima kuguma nawe , iba tashemereire kumushenda .
46007013	N'omukazi omunyaruganda , ku araabe aine iba otari mwikiriza , ogwo mushaija yaasiima kuguma nawe , ogwo mukazi tashemereire kutaana nawe .
46007014	Ahabw'okuba omushaija otari mwikiriza ayezibwa ahabw'omukazi we , n'omukazi otari mwikiriza ayezibwa ahabwa iba . Ku kyakuba kitari kityo , abaana baanyu bakaabaire bari abatashemeire , kwonka hati n'abarikwera .
46007015	Mbwenu omwe ahari bombi , otari mwikiriza , ku araabe naayenda kutaana , ataane ; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akatweta ngu tugire obusingye .
46007016	Iwe mukazi ' we , noomanyira hi ku otarijuna baro ? Iwe mushaija ' we , noomanyira hi ku otarijuna mukazi waawe ?
46007017	Buri omwe k'atwaze nk'oku Mukama yaamuteekateekyeire , omu ki Ruhanga yaamweteiremu . Ekyo ninkitaho kuba ekiragiro omu bigombe by'abaikiriza byona .
46007018	Ku haraabe hariho owaayetsirwe yaashazirwe , arekye kwenda kweihaho okusharwa kwe . Ku haraabe hariho owaayetsirwe atakashazirwe , arekye kwenda kusharwa .
46007019	Manya okusharwa nari okutasharwa ti kintu , kureka okukuratira ebiragiro bya Ruhanga .
46007020	Buri omwe ashemereire kuguma nk'oku yaabaire ari obu yaayetwa .
46007021	Ku oraabe waayetsirwe ori omuhuuku , ekyo kitakusaasa ; kwonka ku oraabe noobaasa kurekurwa , orekurwe .
46007022	Manya owaayetsirwe omuri Mukama ari omuhuuku , aba ari ou Mukama ahaire obusingye . Kandi n'owaabaire ari ow'obusingye obu yaayetwa , aba omuhuuku wa Kristo .
46007023	Mukagurwa n'obuguzi bwingi , murekye kuba abahuuku b'abantu .
46007024	N'ahabw'ekyo , beene Taata , buri muntu agume omu maisho ga Ruhanga nk'oku yaabaire ari obu yaayetwa .
46007025	Aha bikwatiraine n'abatashweraine , timbiineho kiragiro kya Mukama , kureka ningamba eki ndikuteekateeka nk'omwesigwa ahabw'embabazi za Mukama .
46007026	Kwonka ninteekateeka nti , ahabw'eby'oburemeezi ebibaho , haakiri omuntu kuguma nk'oku ari .
46007027	Okomirwe aha mukazi ? Reka nu kwenda kutaana nawe . Tokomirwe ha mukazi ? Reka nu kwenda kushwera .
46007028	Ku orikushwera , nooba otakozire kibi ; n'omwishiki ku arikushwerwa , naaba atakozire kibi . Kwonka abarikushwerana baryagira omunyangararo omu nsi , kandi nkaayenzire kugubakiza .
46007029	Banyaruganda , eki ndikugamba nikyo eki : Obunaku bwagyenda nibufunda ; mbwenu okwiha hati abaine abakazi babe nk'abataine ,
46007030	n'abarikucura babe nk'abatarikucura , n'abarikushemererwa babe nk'abatarikushemererwa ; abarikugura babe nk'abataine by'okugura ,
46007031	n'abarikukoresa eby'ensi babe nk'abatarikubikoresa ; ahabw'okuba omuhango gw'ensi egi guhwaho .
46007032	Niinyenda ngu murekye kwemereza omutima . Manya otaine mukazi ata omutima aha bya Mukama , oku araamugwise gye .
46007033	Kwonka oine omukazi ayemerereza eby'ensi omutima , oku araagwise gye omukazi we ;
46007034	atyo aba kaakuri na kaakunu . Kandi omukazi otashweirwe , nari omwishiki otakashweirwe , ata omutima aha bya Mukama , oku araabe oyeeziibwe omu mubiri n'omu mutima . Kwonka omukazi oshweirwe ayemerereza eby'ensi omutima , oku araagwise gye iba .
46007035	Ekyo naakibagambira ahabw'okubagasira . Ntarikwenda kubakoma , kureka okubooreka ebihikire , ngu mubone kwehayo mukaheereza Mukama n'omutima gumwe .
46007036	Omushaija ku araabe naateekateeka ngu tarikutwaza gye mwishiki ou arikugamba obugyenyi , kandi atari - kubaasa kwezibira , haza kiri eky'okuba kityo , akore eki arikusiima ; bashwerane - - ti kibi .
46007037	Kwonka ohamiire kimwe omu mutima , ataine kirikumugyema kushwera , kandi orikubaasa kutegyeka omubiri gwe , yaamariirira kimwe omu mutima kureka ou arikugamba obugyenyi kuguma ari omwishiki , naaba akozire gye .
46007038	N'ahabw'ekyo orikushwera ou arikugamba obugyenyi naakora gye , kwonka orikureka kumushwera naaba akozire gye okukiraho .
46007039	Omukazi akomwa ahari iba obunaku bwona obu iba aba akiriho ; kwonka iba ku afa , ogwo mukazi aine obusingye kushwerwa ou arikwenda , kwonka kibe omuri Mukama .
46007040	Mbwenu nk'oku ndikureeba , ku yaakuguma nk'oku ari , akaaba gye okukiraho . Kandi ninteekateeka ngu naanye nyine Mutima wa Ruhanga .
46008001	Mbwenu aha bikwatiraine n'ebyokurya ebihongyeirwe ebishushani , nituhamya ku twena twine okumanya . Okumanya nk'okwo kuteera ebihagi , kwonka rukundo yo ehangaana .
46008002	Weena oteekateeka ngu aine eki arikumanya , aba atakamanyire nk'oku ashemereire kumanya .
46008003	Kwonka omuntu ku akunda Ruhanga , Ruhanga nawe amumanya .
46008004	Mbwenu aha bikwatiraine n'okurya ebihongyeirwe ebishushani ; nitumanya ku ebishushani bitabaho , kandi ku hatariho Ruhanga ondi kureka Ruhanga omwe .
46008005	Nobu haraabe hariho ebyetwa baaruhanga omu iguru n'omu nsi , nk'oku buzimazima hariho baaruhanga baingi n'abakama baingi ,
46008006	kwonka ahabwaitu hariho Ruhanga omwe , Taata , ou ebintu byona bikomookaho , naitwe ou tubaho ahabwe ; kandi hariho Mukama omwe Yesu Kristo , obaisaho byona , naitwe akatubaisaho .
46008007	Kwonka okwo kumanya , ti boona abakwine . Abantu abamwe n'okuhitsya hati ku barya ebyokurya nk'ebyo , bateekateeka ngu baarya ebihongyeirwe ebishushani . Emitima yaabo eba etahamire , batyo bateekateeka ngu ebyo byokurya byabahagaza .
46008008	Manya ebyokurya tibyo bitusiimisa ahari Ruhanga , ahabw'okuba ku tuba tutabiriire titugira ki tufeerwa , kandi ku tubirya titugira ki twongyerwaho .
46008009	Kureka mwerinde , okubirya kwanyu nari okutabirya kutakaateeza entsibo abaine okwikiriza kutahamire .
46008010	Mbwenu iwe omuntu oyetegyereize , ondiijo ow'omutima gutahamire ku yaakukureeba nooriira omu ndaaro y'ekishushani , takaatetuuka akarya ebyokurya bihongyeirwe ebishushani ?
46008011	Reero ogwo muntu otahamire akahwerekyerera atyo ahabw'okumanya kwawe , haza ari mwene waanyu ou Kristo yaafeereire .
46008012	Manya ku mukora ekibi ahari beene waanyu , mwahutaaza emitima yaabo etahamire , muba mukozire ekibi ahari Kristo .
46008013	N'ahabw'ekyo ebyokurya ku byakuba nibigwisa mwene waitu , tindigira bu ndiire enyama n'akakye , mbone kutagwisa mwene waitu .
46009001	Tindi ow'obusingye ? Tindi entumwa ? Tindareebire Yesu Mukama waitu ? Timuri ebyana by'omurimo gwangye omuri Mukama ?
46009002	Nobu ndaabe ntari ntumwa aha bandi , kwonka shi ahariimwe nikwo ndi , ahabw'okuba niimwe ky'okuhamizaho eky'obutumwa bwangye omuri Mukama .
46009003	Oku nikwo kwetonganira kwangye aha barikumpakanisa :
46009004	itwe shi , tituri b'okuheebwa ebyokurya n'ebyokunywa ?
46009005	Nituzibirwa kugyenda n'omukazi munyaanyaitwe , nk'ezindi ntumwa na barumuna ba Mukama na Keefa oku bagira ?
46009006	Nari shi niinye nyenka na Barinaba abarikuragiirwa kukora eby'okwetunga ?
46009007	N'oha oza aha rugamba , akeegurira eby'okumukwatsa ? N'oha obyara emizaabibu omu musiri , atarye bijuma byayo ? N'oha oriisa obusyo , atanywe mate gaabwo ?
46009008	Mbwenu ebyo nimbigamba nk'omuntu-nyabuntu , nari shi eiteeka tikwo rigira ?
46009009	Manya kikahandiikwa omu iteeka rya Musa kiti : Otariboha akanwa k'endaaho neejunga enjuma . Endaaho shi Ruhanga nizo arikusaasibwa ?
46009010	Buzimazima tiitwe arikugambaho ? Manya kikahandiikwa ahabwaitu , ahabw'okuba omuhingi ahinga aine amatsiko , n'omuhuuzi ahuura aine amatsiko g'okubagana aha bishaarwirwe .
46009011	Itwe ku turaabe twababibiremu ebirungi by'omutima , nimugira ngu kiremeire munonga kubagyeshamu eby'okuhwera omubiri ?
46009012	Abandi ku baraabe babatungaho ebi babenza , kaashwa itwe ? Kwonka itwe titurakoreise obwo bushoboorozi , kureka twemera byona , ngu tutakaateera aha mutwe Amakuru Marungi ga Kristo .
46009013	Timurikumanya abaheereza omuri Nyaruju ya Ruhanga ku nimwo baiha ebyokurya , n'abaheereza aha itambiro ku babagana aha bitambiirweho ?
46009014	Na Mukama waitu nikwo yaaragiire , ngu abarangirira Amakuru Marungi batungwe eby'Amakuru Marungi .
46009015	Kwonka nyowe tinkakoresaga obwo bushoboorozi , kandi eki tinaakihandiika ngu mbone kutunga eby'okunkwatsa nk'ebyo . Haakiri nfe , okukira omuntu weena okuunyaka ekirikuunyesiimisa .
46009016	Manya ku ndangirira Amakuru Marungi , ekyo tikiinyesiimisa ; ahabw'okuba ningyemeserezibwa kukikora . Ninkaitwe enaku ku naakuba ntarangiriire Makuru Marungi !
46009017	Manya ekyo ku ndikukikora nyekundiire , nintunga ebihembo . Kwonka ku ndikuba nteekundiire , nimba nkwatsiibwe omurimo ogu ndaagire eki naagutungaho .
46009018	Mbwenu obwo ebihembo byangye ni biba biri biiha ? Nigwo mugisha gw'okurangiririra busha Amakuru Marungi , ntarikukoresa bushoboorozi bwangye bwona oburikuunyikirizibwa omu Makuru Marungi .
46009019	Nobu ndaabe ntarikutegyekwa muntu weena , nkeehindura omuhuuku ahari boona , ngu mbone kuhindura baingi .
46009020	Aha Bayudaaya nkatwaza nk'Omuyudaaya ; aha barikutegyekwa eiteeka nkaba nk'orikutegyekwa eiteeka , nyowe nobu ndaabe ntarikutegyekwa , iteeka kwonka ngu mbone kuhindura abarikutegyekwa iteeka .
46009021	Aha batarikutegyekwa iteeka , nkaba nk'otarikutegyekwa iteeka , kutari kugira ngu tindikworobera iteeka rya Ruhanga , ahabw'okuba nintegyekwa eiteeka rya Kristo ngu mbone kuhindura abatategyekwa iteeka .
46009022	Aha bataine maani nkaba nk'otaine maani , ngu mbone kuhindura abataine maani . Ahari boona nkeehindura byona , ngu omu buryo bwona mbone kurokora bamwe .
46009023	Ebyo byona mbikora ahabw'Amakuru Marungi , ngu mbone kubagana aha migisha yaago .
46009024	Timurikumanya ngu omu mpaka z'okwiruka , boona abairuka bahigana , kwonka oheebwa ekihembo ku aba omwe ? Naimwe nu mwirukye mutyo mubone kukitunga .
46009025	Manya omuzaani weena orikuhakana ayerinda omuri byona . Haza ekyo bakikora kutunga ekirunga ekirikusiisikara , kwonka itwe twitanira ekitarikusiisikara .
46009026	Nangwa naanye nikwo nyiruka ntyo ntarikwirukira eryo ; nikwo nteera entomi , ntari nk'orikuteera busha ,
46009027	kureka nyasha omubiri gwangye ngu ngutegyekye , nyentsya ku ndiba naaherize kurangirira abandi , ndekye kubarwa ntahikire .
46010001	Banyaruganda niinyenda mumanye ku baatataitwe boona baasangiirwe ekicu ; ku boona baarabire omu Nyanja ;
46010002	ku boona baabatiriziibwe omuri ekyo kicu n'omuri Musa ;
46010003	ku boona baariire aha kyokurya kimwe eky'omutima ,
46010004	bakanywa aha kyokunywa kimwe eky'omutima . Manya boona bakanywa ekirikuruga omu rukiri rw'amagara orwabaire rubakurata , haza orwo rukiri akaba ari Kristo .
46010005	Kwonka abaingi omuribo Ruhanga tarabasiimire ; nikyo baahwerekyerereire omu ihamba .
46010006	Ebyo byona bikaba biri eky'okureeberaho , ngu turekye kwetenga ebibi nkabo oku baabyetengire .
46010007	Murekye kuba abaramya ebishushani , nka bamwe omuribo oku baabiramize ; nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Abantu bakashutama kurya n'okunywa , kandi baimuka kuzina .
46010008	Turekye kukora ebikwatiraine n'obushambani , nk'abamwe omuribo oku baabikozire , haza hakafa abantu obukumi bubiri n'enkumi ishatu eizooba rimwe .
46010009	Turekye kugyeza Mukama , nk'abamwe omuribo oku baamugyerize , bakaitwa enjoka .
46010010	Turekye kwetomboita , nk'abamwe omuribo oku baayetomboitsire , bakamarwaho omucwekyerezi .
46010011	Mbwenu ebyo byona bikababaho kuba eky'okureeberaho , kandi bikahandiikwa kutuhabura , itwe abariho omu busingye obu obw'aha muheru .
46010012	N'ahabw'ekyo orikuteekateeka ngu ayemereire , ayerinde atagwa .
46010013	Tihariho kyosyo ekirabahikireho ekitashangwa mu bantu . Manya Ruhanga n'omwesigwa , taribareka mukoohibwa ebi mutarikubaasa ; kwonka omuri okwo kwohibwa aryabateeraho oburyo bw'okukira , ngu mubaase kukwemera .
46010014	N'ahabw'ekyo , bagyenzi bangye abakundwa , mwetantare okuramya ebishushani .
46010015	Nimbagambira nk'abaine obwengye , naimwe mwetegyereze eki ndikugamba .
46010016	Ekikopo ky'omugisha eki tusiimira Ruhanga , tikwo kukwatanisiza omu shagama ya Kristo ? Omugaati ogu tucwamu , tikwo kukwatanisiza omu mubiri gwa Kristo ?
46010017	Manya omugaati guba gumwe , naitwe nobu turi baingi , turi omubiri gumwe , ahabw'okuba twena tubagana ahari ogwo mugaati gumwe .
46010018	Mureebere aha mitwarize y'Abaisiraeli : abarya ebitambirwe , tibo bakwatanisiza aha itambiro ?
46010019	Mbwenu ngambe ki ? Ngire nti ebihongyeirwe ebishushani n'ekintu , nari shi ebishushani n'ekintu ?
46010020	Ngabusha ! Kureka nimmanyisa ku ebi abakaafiiri batamba , babihongyera emandwa , atari Ruhanga . Tindikwenda ku mukwatanisa n'emandwa .
46010021	Timurikubaasa kunywa aha kikopo kya Mukama , kandi mukanywa n'ahaky'emandwa . Timurikubaasa kubagana ahaby'aha meeza ya Mukama , kandi mukabagana n'aha by'ey'emandwa .
46010022	Mbwenu nitwenda kwitsa Mukama eihari ? Hoona shi nitumukiza amaani ?
46010023	Byona nibiikirizibwa , kwonka ebiine omugasho ti byona . Byona nibiikirizibwa , kwonka ebikuza ti byona .
46010024	Omuntu weena agume arekye kweyendeza , kureka ayendeze mutaahi we .
46010025	Kyona ekigurwa omu itundiro ry'enyama , mugume mukirye mutaine ki murikwekyenga .
46010026	Ahabw'okuba ensi n'eya Mukama na byona ebigirimu .
46010027	Omu batarikwikiriza , ku harigira owaabeeta aha bugyenyi , mwasiima kuzayo , kyona eki baribareetera mukirye mutaine ki murikwekyenga .
46010028	Kwonka ku haribaho owaabagira ati : Eki kihongyeirwe emandwa ; mutarikirya ahabw'ogwo owaabamanyisa n'ahabw'okushinjwa - -
46010029	eki ndikugamba n'okushinjwa okwe , kutari okwawe . Mbwenu ahabw'enki obugabe bwangye nibutegyekwa okushinjwa kw'omu mutima gw'ondiijo ?
46010030	Ku ndaabe ndya ninsiima , ahabw'enki abantu bampaahuuza ahabw'eki naasiimira ?
46010031	N'ahabw'ekyo yaaba nimurya nari nimunywa , nainga mwine eki murikukora kyona , mubikore ahabw'okuhaisa Ruhanga ekitiinwa .
46010032	Mutarigwisa kubi Abayudaaya nari Abaguriiki , nainga ekigombe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga ,
46010033	nkaanye oku nteeraho kugwisa gye abantu boona omuri byona ebi nkora , ntarikusherura by'okwegasira nyenka , kureka eby'okugasira abaingi ngu babone kujunwa .
46011001	Muntooreze , nkaanye oku ntooreza Kristo .
46011002	Nimbasiima ahabw'okuunyijuka omuri byona n'okugumizamu nimukuratira ebi naabeegyeise .
46011003	Kwonka niinyenda mumanye ku Kristo aba omutwe gwa ibara mushaija , kandi ku omushaija aba omutwe gw'omukazi we , na Ruhanga ku aba omutwe gwa Kristo .
46011004	Omushaija weena orikushaba Ruhanga , nari orikuranga ayetwekyereire , naaba ahemwire omutwe gwe .
46011005	N'omukazi weena orikushaba Ruhanga , nari orikuranga ateetwekyereire , naaba ahemwire omutwe gwe ; nikyo kimwe nk'oku omutwe gwe gwakuba gumweire .
46011006	Omukazi ku araabe ateetwekyereire , haakiri ashare eishokye ; kwonka omukazi ku kiraabe nikimuhemura okusharwa eishokye nari okutegwa , ayetwekyerere .
46011007	Manya omushaija tashemereire kwetwekyerera , ahabw'okuba we n'ekyeshusha kya Ruhanga kandi ekitiinwa kye ; kwonka omukazi we n'ekitiinwa ky'omushaija .
46011008	Ahabw'okuba omushaija tarahangirwe naaruga omu mukazi , kureka omukazi niwe yaarugire omu mushaija .
46011009	N'omushaija tarahangiirwe mukazi , kureka omukazi niwe yaahangiirwe omushaija .
46011010	Omukazi nikyo ashemerereire kwetwekyerera ahabwa baamaraika .
46011011	Nobu kiraabe kiri kityo , omuri Mukama omukazi tabaho ahatari mushaija , n'omushaija tabaho ahatari mukazi .
46011012	Ahabw'okuba nk'oku omukazi yaahangirwe naaruga omu mushaija , n'omushaija nawe azaarwa omukazi ; kandi byona biruga ahari Ruhanga .
46011013	Naimwe mukyereebere ; kihikire omukazi kushaba Ruhanga ateetwekyereire ?
46011014	Nangwa n'emicwe y'obuntu terikubeegyesa , ngu omushaija ku areka eishokye rye ryacucuza kimuhemura ?
46011015	Haza omukazi ku agira eishokye riraingwa , rimureetera okwesingiza ? Ahabw'okuba eishokye rye akariheebwa kumushweka .
46011016	Ku haraabe hariho orikwenda kukihakanisa , amanye ngu emitwarize nk'egyo titugiine , nangwa n'ebigombe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga tibigiine .
46011017	Mbwenu ka mbahabure eki , ntarikubasiima , ahabw'okuba ku muteerana , ebirugamu ti biba birungi , kureka biba bibi .
46011018	Eky'okubanza , ku muteerana muri ekigombe ky'abaikiriza , mpurira ngu mwebaganiisemu ; haza naanye ekyo nkaakiikiriza .
46011019	Manya okutaikirizana n'okw'okubaho , ab'amazima omuriimwe babone kumanywa .
46011020	Ku muteerana hamwe , eki murya ti bugyenyi bwa Mukama .
46011021	Ahabw'okuba ku muba nimurya , buri muntu arya ebyokurya bye atategyereize bandi ; haza obwo omwe aine enjara n'ondi asinzire .
46011022	Mbwenu shi , timugira maka g'okuriiramu n'okunyweramu ? Nari nimugaya ekigombe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga , mwitsa enshoni abaine ebi bakyenire ? Mbagambire ki ? Mbasiime ? Ngaaha , omuri ekyo tindikubasiima .
46011023	Manya eki naahairwe Mukama , naanye nikyo naabahaire ekirikugira ngu Mukama Yesu aha kiro eki yaareebeziibweho , akakwata omugaati ;
46011024	ku yaaherize kusiima yaagucwamu , yaagamba ati : Ogu n'omubiri gwangye oguraaheebweyo ahabwanyu . Mugume mukore mutyo kuunyijukiraho .
46011025	N'ekikopo atyo , ku baaherize kurya , yaagamba ati : Ekikopo eki n'endagaano nsya ey'eshagama yangye . Mugume mukore mutyo mwaba nimuginywa kuunyijukiraho .
46011026	Manya buri murundi ku murya ogu mugaati , mukanywa n'eki kikopo , muba nimuranga okufa kwa Mukama okuhitsya obu ariija .
46011027	N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu weena orirya omugaati ogwo , akanywa ekikopo kya Mukama atashemereire , aryasingwa orubanja rw'okuhagaza omubiri n'eshagama ebya Mukama .
46011028	Mbwenu , omuntu ayeshwijume , abone kurya aha mugaati ogwo n'okunywa aha kikopo ekyo .
46011029	Ahabw'okuba orya kandi akanywa ateetaire ha mubiri gwa Mukama , aba ayeriiriire kandi ayenywereire okusingwa orubanja .
46011030	Nikyo baingi omuriimwe baburiirwe amaani bakarwara , n'abamwe bakafa .
46011031	Kuri twecwera orubanja omu mazima , titwakurucwereirwe .
46011032	Kwonka ku turucwerwa Mukama , atuhana ngu turekye kusingwa orubanja hamwe n'ab'ensi .
46011033	N'ahabw'ekyo banyaruganda , ku muraagume mwateerana kurya , mutegyerezane
46011034	oraabe aine enjara abanze ariire omuka mutakaateerana mukakora eky'okubareetera kusingwa orubanja . Reero ebindi ndyabishoboorora naija .
46012001	Beene Taata , ebikwatiraine n'ebiconco bya Mutima , tindikwenda ngu mutabimanya .
46012002	Nimumanya ngu obu mwabaire mukiri abakaafiiri , mukaba muhabisibwa , mutwarwa omu bishushani ebitarikubaasa kugamba .
46012003	N'ahabw'ekyo niinyenda ku mumanya ngu tihariho ogambisibwa Mutima wa Ruhanga owaakugira ati : Yesu naakakyeenwe ! Kandi tihariho n'omwe ogira ati : Yesu ni Mukama , atakigambisiibwe Mutima Orikwera .
46012004	Mbwenu hariho ebiconco by'emiringo etari emwe , kwonka Mutima n'omwe .
46012005	Kandi hariho obuheereza bw'emiringo etari emwe , kwonka Mukama n'omwe .
46012006	Hariho n'okukora kw'emiringo etari emwe , kwonka Ruhanga n'omwe okoresa byona omuri boona .
46012007	Buri omwe areebekyerwamu Mutima ahabw'okugasira boona .
46012008	Omwe Mutima amugambisa eby'obwengye , ondiijo amugambisa eby'okumanya omu buryo bwa Mutima ogwo .
46012009	Ondiijo , Mutima niwe omwe , amuha okwikiriza ; ondiijo , Mutima omwe ogwo amuha ebiconco by'okukiza .
46012010	Ondiijo Mutima amuha kukora eby'okutangaaza , ondi oburangi , ondiijo okubaasa kumanya omutaano gw'emitima . Ondiijo Mutima amuha okugambira omu miringo y'endimi , n'ondi kushoboorora amakuru g'ezo ndimi .
46012011	Ebyo byona bikoresibwa Mutima ogwo omwe , ogabira buri muntu okwe nk'oku arikwenda .
46012012	Mbwenu nk'oku omubiri guba gumwe gukagira engingo nyingi , haza ezo ngingo z'ogwo mubiri , nobu ziba nyingi , zikaba omubiri gumwe , na Kristo nikwo ari atyo .
46012013	Ahabw'okuba tukabatizibwa omuri Mutima omwe , twaba omubiri gumwe yaaba Bayudaaya nari Abaguriiki ; yaaba bahuuku nari ab'obusingye kandi twena twanywaisibwa ahari Mutima omwe .
46012014	Manya omubiri tigugira rugingo rumwe kureka nyingi .
46012015	Ekigyere ku kyakugira kiti : Ahabw'okutaba ngaro , tindi w'aha mubiri . Ekyo tikikaakihindura kutaba ky'aha mubiri .
46012016	N'okutu ku kwakugira kuti : Ahabw'okutaba riisho , tindi w'aha mubiri . Ekyo tikikaakihindura kutaba ky'aha mubiri .
46012017	Omubiri gwona ku gwakuba eriisho , okuhurira kukaaruga hi ? Omubiri gwona ku gwakuba okutu , okukaga kukaaruga hi ?
46012018	Kwonka nk'oku kiri , Ruhanga akata engingo omu mubiri , buri rumwe omu mwanya gwarwo nk'oku yaayenzire .
46012019	Zoona kuri zaabaire orugingo rumwe , omubiri gukaabaire hi ?
46012020	Kwonka nk'oku kiri , hariho engingo nyingi , haza kunu omubiri guri gumwe .
46012021	Eriisho tirikaagira engaro riti : Tindikukwetenga ! Nari omutwe kugira ebigyere guti : Tindikubeetenga !
46012022	Nangwa n'engingo z'omubiri ezireebeka nk'ezitaine maani , nizo zikira kwetengwa .
46012023	Engingo z'omubiri ezireebeka nk'ezitaine maani , nizo tukira kwetaho ; n'engingo z'omubiri ezi tutataho mutima munonga , nizo tukira kuha ekitiinwa kingi . Reero engingo zaitu eziitsa enshoni , nizo tujwarira ,
46012024	eki engingo zaitu ezitaitsa enshoni ziteetenga . Nikwo Ruhanga yaatebeekaniise atyo omubiri , akaha ebicweka ebirikugaywa ekitiinwa ekirikukiraho ,
46012025	ngu omu mubiri harekye kubamu okutakwatanisa , kureka ngu ezo ngingo zigume zisaasibwane ;
46012026	orugingo rumwe rukishaasha , zoona zikasaasira hamwe ; orugingo rumwe rukiheebwa ekitiinwa , zoona zikashemerererwa hamwe .
46012027	Mbwenu naimwe muri omubiri gwa Kristo , na buri omwe n'orugingo rwagwo .
46012028	Kandi hariho abu Ruhanga yaataire omu kigombe ky'abaikiriza : ab'okubanza n'entumwa , aba kabiri n'abarangi , aba kashatu n'abeegyesa , taho abakozi b'eby'okutangaaza , n'abaine obushoboorozi bw'okukiza , n'abahwezi n'abategyeki , n'abagambi b'endimi zitari zimwe .
46012029	Mbwenu abo boona n'entumwa ? Boona n'abarangi ? Boona n'abeegyesa ? Boona n'abakozi b'eby'okutangaza ?
46012030	Boona nikwo baine ebiconco by'okukiza ? Boona bagambira omu ndimi ? Boona bazishoboorora ?
46012031	N'ahabw'ekyo mwitanire ebiconco ebirikweshumbaho . Haza mbwenu ka mboorekye ekirikukira byona oburungi .
46013001	Nobu naakugamba endimi z'abantu nangwa n'eza baamaraika , kwonka ntaine rukundo , nkaaba ndi nk'ekyoma ky'omuringa ekirikurangira , nari nk'enshandaazo erikushandaaza kubi eiraka .
46013002	Nobu naakuba nyine ekiconco ky'oburangi , nkamanya amabanga goona , nkagira okwetegyereza kwona , kandi nobu naakuba nyine okwikiriza kwona okwakumbaasisa kuhigura enshozi , kwonka ntaine rukundo , nkaaba ntari kantu .
46013003	Nobu naakugabira abooro ebi nyine byona kubariisa , kandi nobu naakuhayo omubiri gwangye kwokibwa , kwonka ntaine rukundo , tikiine ki kyakungasira .
