46013004	Rukundo egumisiriza kandi egira embabazi . Rukundo tegira ihari nari emyehimbiso ;
46013005	teyetuguura nari okugira ekikabuko . Rukondo teyeyendeza , tegwisibwa kubi busha , tegira nziika ;
46013006	teshemerererwa kutahikiirira , kureka eshemerererwa amazima .
46013007	Rukundo eyemera byona , eikiriza byona , egira amatsiko ahari byona , egumisiririza byona .
46013008	Rukundo tehwaho , kwonka oburangi bwo buryahwaho , endimi zirugyeho n'okumanya kuhweho .
46013009	Ahabw'okuba okumanya kwaitu n'okw'ekitega , n'oburangi bwaitu nabwo n'obw'ekitega ;
46013010	kwonka okuhikiiririzibwa kimwe ku kuriija , eby'ekitega biryahwaho .
46013011	Obu naabaire ndi omwana , nkaba ngamba nk'omwana , nyetegyereza nk'omwana , nteekateeka nk'omwana ; kwonka ku naakuzire naareka eby'obwana .
46013012	Manya obwa hati nitureebera omu ndeeberwamu , tutarikuhweza gye ; kwonka obwo turyareebana butunu . Mbwenu nimmanyaho ekicweka , kwonka obwo ndyamanyira kimwe nk'oku Ruhanga ammanyira kimwe .
46013013	Mbwenu ebigumaho n'ebi byonshatu : okwikiriza n'amatsiko na rukundo ; kwonka ekirikubikira ni rukundo .
46014001	Mwitanire rukundo , mwetengye munonga ebiconco bya Mutima , munomuno eky'okuranga .
46014002	Ahabw'okuba ogambira omu rurimi , tagambira bantu , kureka agambira Ruhanga . Tihariho omwetegyereza ; eby'amabanga ebi agamba abigambisibwa Mutima .
46014003	Kwonka ogwo oranga , agambira abantu eby'okubombeka n'okubateera omuhimbo n'okubahuumuriza .
46014004	Ogambira omu rurimi eyehamya wenka ; kwonka oranga ahangaana ekigombe ky'abaikiriza .
46014005	Mwena nkaayenzire ku mugambira omu ndimi , kwonka okukiraho nkaayenzire ku muranga . Ahabw'okuba omurangi akira ogambira omu ndimi , kureka haagira owaazishoboorora , ngu ekigombe ky'abaikiriza kibone kwombekwa .
46014006	Mbwenu , banyaruganda , ku naakwija owaanyu ningambira omu ndimi nkaabagasira ki naaba ntabagambiire ebi nshuuruuriirwe , nari ebi ndikumanya , nari ebi ndikuranga , nainga ebi ndikwegyesa ?
46014007	Nangwa n'ebitaine magara ebiteerwa bikagamba , nk'esheegu nari ekidongo , ku biba bitataaniise maraka gaabyo , omuntu amanya ata ekyateerwa ?
46014008	N'enzamba ku yaakugamba eiraka ritarikwetegyerezibwa , n'oha owaakweteekateeka kuza aha rugamba ?
46014009	Naimwe nikwo kiri . Ku murikugambira omu rurimi orutarikwetegyerezibwa , omuntu naabaasa ata kumanya ekyagambwa ? Manya nimuba nimushusha nk'abarikugambira omuyaga .
46014010	N'ekya buzima hariho endimi nyingi omu nsi , kandi tihariho na rumwe orutagira ki rurikumanyisa .
46014011	Kwonka ku nkuba ntarikumanya eki orwo rurimi rurikumanyisa , biri ndi omunyamahanga ahari ogwo orikugamba , kandi nawe n'omunyamahanga ahariinye .
46014012	Naimwe nu nk'oku murikwitanira kutunga ebiconco bya Mutima , mwezirikire kutunga ebiconco ebirikweshumbyaho kwombeka ekigombe ky'abaikiriza .
46014013	N'ahabw'ekyo orikugambira omu rurimi ashemereire kushaba Ruhanga , abone kubaasa kurushoboorora .
46014014	Manya ku nshabira omu rurimi , omutima gwangye gushaba , kwonka obwengye bwangye bugumira aho butyo .
46014015	Mbwenu shi ngire nta ? Niinyija kushabisa omutima , kandi nshabise n'obwengye . Niinyija kweshongoza omutima , kandi nyeshongoze n'obwengye .
46014016	Kyaba kitari ekyo , ku orikusiima noogambisibwa Mutima , omuntu otarikushoboorokyerwa eki orikugamba , naabaasa ata kugira ati : Amiina , aha ki waasiimira ?
46014017	N'ekya buzima nooba osiimire gye Ruhanga , kwonka ondiijo tarikugasirwa .
46014018	Ninsiima Ruhanga ahabw'okuba mwena nimbakiza kugambira omu ndimi .
46014019	Kwonka omu ruteerane nkaayenzire kugambisa obwengye bwangye ebigambo bitaano , mbone kugasira abandi , okukira okugambira omu rurimi ebigambo kakumi .
46014020	Beene Taata , mutaba abaana omu bwengye , kureka mube abeereere omu bibi ; kwonka omu bwengye mube bakuru .
46014021	Omu iteeka kikahandiikwa kiti : Ndyagambira eri ihanga , ningambisa abantu b'endimi zitari zaaryo n'eminwa y'Abanyamahanga , nangwa nabwo obwo tibarimpurikiza nikwo Mukama arikugira .
46014022	N'ahabw'ekyo endimi ziba akamanyiso ti habw'abaikiriza , kureka ahabw'abatari baikiriza . Haza oburangi bwo tibuba habw'abatari baikiriza , kureka ahabw'abaikiriza .
46014023	Mbwenu nu , ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ku kyakuteerana , boona baagambira omu ndimi , haza abatari b'abaabo nari abatari baikiriza baataahamu , tibakaagira bati : Beitu shi mugwire eiraro ?
46014024	Kwonka boona ku baakuba nibaranga , haza otari mwikiriza nari otari munyakigombe yaataahamu , boona baamwemeza kandi boona baamucwera orubanja ,
46014025	enaama ze z'omu mutima zikaashuuruuka . Haza obwo ajuumara ahansi , aramya Ruhanga kandi agamba butunu ati : Buzimazima Ruhanga ari omuriimwe .
46014026	Beene taata , mbwenu bibe bita ? Ku muteerana , omwe aba aine ekyeshongoro , ondi eky'okwegyesa , ondi eki ashuuruuriirwe , ondiijo okugambira omu rurimi , nari ondiijo eby'okurushoboorora . Haza ebyo byona bigume bikorwe ahabw'okwombeka ekigombe ky'abaikiriza .
46014027	Ku haraabeho orikugambira omu rurimi , ka babe babiri bonka , nari barekye kurenga ahari bashatu , kandi nibaihaihana ; haza hagire owaabishoboorora .
46014028	Kwonka ku haraabe hatariho w'okushoboorora , ka buri omwe acecekye omuri orwo ruteerane , ayegambire kandi agambire Ruhanga .
46014029	K'abarangi bagambe babiri nari bashatu , reero abandi bagyeragyeranise ebyagambwa .
46014030	Omwe omu bari aho ku yaakushuuruurirwa , owaaba naagamba ahuname .
46014031	Manya mwena nimubaasa kuranga nimwihaihana , boona babone kwega n'okuteerwa omuhimbo .
46014032	Kandi emitima y'abarangi etegyekwa abarangi .
46014033	Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga taba Ruhanga w'omujuyango , kureka ow'obusingye . Nk'oku kiri omu bigombe byona eby'abarikwera ,
46014034	abakazi omu nteerane bagume bahuname . Ahabw'okuba tibarikwikirizibwa kugamba , kureka okuguma beeceererekire nk'oku eiteeka ririkuragiira .
46014035	Ku baraabe baine eki barikwenda kumanya , bakibuurize baibabo omuka . Ahabw'okuba n'eky'enshoni omukazi kugambira omu ruteerane .
46014036	Mbwenu shi ekigambo kya Ruhanga niimwe kyakomookireho , nari niimwe kyahikireho mwenka ?
46014037	Ku haraabe hariho omuntu weena orikweteekateekaho ngu n'omurangi ogambisibwa Mutima , amanye ku ebi naabahandiikira biri ekiragiro kya Mukama .
46014038	Omuntu weena eki ku araabe atarikukiikiriza , nawe tarikwikirizibwa .
46014039	N'ahabw'ekyo banyaruganda , mwetengye munonga ekiconco ky'okuranga , kandi mutazibira okugambira omu ndimi ;
46014040	kwonka byona bigume bikorwe gye omu buteeka .
46015001	Beene Taata , ka mbaijutsye Amakuru Marungi agu naabarangiriire mukagaikiriza , kandi agu muhamiiremu ,
46015002	haza agabajuna mwaba mugagumize nk'oku naagabarangiriire kitari ekyo , biri mukaikiririza busha .
46015003	Manya nkabahitsyaho ekintu kikuru naanye eki naahairwe , ekirikugira ngu Kristo akafa ahabw'ebibi byaitu nk'Ebyahandiikirwe oku birikugira ,
46015004	akaziikwa kandi akazooka omu bafiire aha kiro kya kashatu , nk'Ebyahandiikirwe oku birikugira ,
46015005	reero ngu akabonekyera Keefa , bwanyima eikumi na babiri .
46015006	Yaagaruka yaabonekyera abanyaruganda abarikweshumba ahari magana ataano omu bunaku bumwe ; baingi aharibo bakiriho , nobu abandi baraabe bafiire .
46015007	Reero yaabonekyera Yakobo , na bwanyima entumwa zoona .
46015008	Kandi aha muheru gwa boona , yaabonekyera naanye akatoroogo .
46015009	Ahabw'okuba niinye rwabutontori rw'entumwa , otashemereire kwetwa ntumwa , ahabw'okuba nkahiiganisa ekigombe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga .
46015010	Kwonka ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga , oku ndi nikwo ndi , kandi embabazi zi yangiriire tizirabaire za busha . Nangwa nkakora munonga okukira ezo ntumwa zoona ; kwonka tiinye , kureka embabazi za Ruhanga eziinyemamu .
46015011	Yaaba nyowe , yaaba ezo ntumwa , nikwo turangirira , kandi naimwe mukaikiriza .
46015012	Mbwenu Kristo ku araabe naarangirirwa ngu akazooka omu bafiire , bamwe omuriimwe nibabaasa bata kugira ngu tihariho kuzooka kw'abafiire ?
46015013	Ku haraabe hatariho kuzooka kw'abafiire , biri Kristo tarazoirwe mu bafiire ;
46015014	na Kristo ku araabe atarazoirwe mu bafiire , biri okurangirira kwaitu n'okwa busha , n'okwikiriza kwanyu n'okwa busha .
46015015	Nangwa naitwe nituba turi baakareeba ba Ruhanga ab'ebishuba , ahabw'okuba tukahamya ku Ruhanga yaazoire Kristo omu bafiire ou atarazoire , ku kiraabe kiri eky'amazima ngu abafa tibazooka .
46015016	Abafa ku baraabe batazooka , biri Kristo tarazoirwe mu bafiire .
46015017	Na Kristo ku araabe atarazoirwe mu bafiire , biri okwikiriza kwanyu n'okwa busha kandi mukiri omu bibi byanyu .
46015018	Reero nu n'abaagwejegyereire omuri Kristo bakahwerekyerera .
46015019	Kuri Kristo tumwinemu amatsiko g'okutugasira omu magara aga gonka , tukaabaire ab'okugirirwa esaasi okukira abandi boona .
46015020	Kwonka omu mazima Kristo akaba omuganuro gw'okuzoorwa omu bafiire , kuhamiza abaagwejegyeire nabo ku barizoorwa omu bafiire .
46015021	Manya nk'oku okufa kwareetsirwe omuntu omwe , n'okuzooka kw'abafiire nikwo kwareetsirwe omuntu omwe .
46015022	Kandi nk'oku boona abaine akarande na Adamu bafa , nikwo boona abaine akarande na Kristo bariba abahuriire .
46015023	Kwonka buri omwe omu rubu rwe ; Kristo niwe muganuro ; bwanyima ku ariija , abe bakurateho .
46015024	Reero emperu eryarugaho ehikye , akwatse Ruhanga Ishe obukama , yaaheza kumaraho obutegyeki bwona n'obushoboorozi bwona n'amaani goona .
46015025	Ahabw'okuba Kristo n'ow'okutegyeka , okuhitsya obu ariribatiirira abazigu be boona .
46015026	Haza omuzigu orihereeruka kucwekyerezibwa ni rufu .
46015027	Manya Ruhanga akamuha kutegyekyera byona ahansi y'ebigyere bye . Kwonka nobu kirikugirwa kiti : Ebintu byona bikamuheebwa kubitegyeka , nikimanywa ku ogwo owaabimuhaire kubitegyeka byona atarikubarirwamu .
46015028	Ebintu byona ku biriheza kuteebwa omu butegyeki bwe , na Mwana ekiti aryategyekwa owaabimutegyekyeise ; haza Ruhanga abone kuba byona omuri boona .
46015029	Ku kiraabe kitari kityo , abantu bagasirwa ki , ku babatizibwa ahabw'abafiire ? Abafiire ku baraabe batazooka n'akakye , ahabw'enki abantu babatizibwa ahabw'abo abafiire ?
46015030	Kandi naitwe ahabw'enki twenaga omu kabi buri kaanya ?
46015031	Beene Taata , ahabw'okwesingiza oku mbainemu omuri Kristo , nindahira Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu , nyowe ku nfa buri izooba !
46015032	Nyowe nk'omuntu nyabuntu , ku ndaabe naarwaine n'enyamaishwa omuri Efeso , nikingasira ki ? Abafa ku baraabe batazooka , reero nu ka turye , ka tunywe , ahabw'okuba nyencakare turi ab'okufa .
46015033	Murekye kubeihwabeihwa ; manya ekigombe kiriisa etaabe .
46015034	Nimuhuguukye , murekyere aho kukora ebibi . Ka mbagambire eki kubaitsa enshoni ; bamwe omuriimwe tibarikumanya Ruhanga .
46015035	Ebyo , omuntu akaabuuza ati : Abafa bazooka bata ? Baryaija na mubiri nyabaki ?
46015036	Iwe mushema ' we ! Manya ei obiba temera yaaba etafiire .
46015037	Kandi ei obiba ti mubiri ogu erigira , kureka enjuma kusha , gira nk'ey'engano nari ey'ezindi njuma .
46015038	Kwonka Ruhanga agiha omubiri nk'oku arikwenda , kandi buri muringo gw'embibo aguha omubiri ogwayo ahabwagwo .
46015039	Manya emibiri yoona teshushana ; hariho ogw'abantu , hariho ogw'enyamaishwa , hariho ogw'enyonyi , n'ogundi ogw'ebyenyanja .
46015040	Hariho emibiri ey'omu iguru , kandi hariho n'ey'omu nsi , haza ekitiinwa eky'ey'omu nsi ; haza ekitiinwa eky'ey'omu iguru kiri okwakyo , n'eky'ey'omu nsi kiri okwakyo .
46015041	Hariho okwaka kw'eizooba n'okundi okw'okwezi kandi n'okundi okw'enyonyoozi , nangwa enyonyoozi teshushana na ngyenzi yaayo omu kwaka .
46015042	Nikwo kiri n'aha kuzooka kw'abafiire . Omubiri guziikwa guri ogw'okujunda , guzoorwa guri ogw'okutajunda .
46015043	Guziikwa nigunugwa , guzoorwa n'ekitiinwa . Guziikwa guhwairwemu amaani , guzoorwa gugaine .
46015044	Guziikwa guri omubiri gw'obuntu , guzoorwa guri omubiri gw'omutima . Ku haraabe hariho omubiri gw'obuntu , biri hariho n'omubiri gw'omutima .
46015045	Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Adamu , omuntu w'okubanza , akahinduka omuntu oine amagara . Adamu owa bwanyima yaahinduka Mutima Rugabamagara .
46015046	Kwonka eky'omutima tikyo kibanza , kureka habanza eky'omubiri , reero hakurataho eky'omutima .
46015047	Omuntu w'okubanza akaruga omu itaka ry'ensi , ari omuntu w'omucuucu ; omuntu owa kabiri we akaruga omu iguru .
46015048	Owaarugire omu mucuucu nk'oku yaabaire ari , n'ab'ensi nikwo bari ; kandi ow'omu iguru nk'oku ari , n'ab'eiguru nikwo bari .
46015049	Nk'oku twine ekyeshusha ky'owaarugire omu mucuucu , nikwo turigira ekyeshusha ky'owaarugire omu iguru .
46015050	Banyaruganda , ka mbagambire eki : abakiine omubiri n'eshagama tibabaasa kutaaha mu bukama bwa Ruhanga , nobu gwakuba omubiri ogujunda kuhika ei okutajunda kutuura .
46015051	Mbwenu ka mbaatire eibanga . Twena titurifa , kureka twena turyahindurwa ,
46015052	omu kaanya kakye nk'ak'okuhumbya eriisho , aha nzamba y'aha muheru . Obwo enzamba eryagamba , abafiire bazoorwe batakijunda , naitwe tuhindurwe .
46015053	Manya omubiri ogu ogujunda n'ogw'okuhinduka ogutajunda , kandi omubiri ogufa n'ogw'okuhinduka ogutafa .
46015054	Obwo ogujunda ku gurihinduka ogutajunda , n'ogufa gwahinduka ogutafa , nibwo ekyahandiikirwe kirihikiiririra kimwe ekirikugira kiti : Rufu ekasingurwa , yaamirwa .
46015055	Iwe Rufu , obusinguzi bwawe burahi ? Iwe Rufu , oruvuri rwawe rurahi ?
46015056	Manya oruburi rwa rufu n'ekibi , kandi amaani g'ekibi n'eiteeka .
46015057	Kwonka Ruhanga naakasingye otusinguriza omuri Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
46015058	N'ahabw'ekyo , beene Taata abakundwa , muhame mutarikunyiganyiga ; mugumizemu obutoosha kukora omurimo gwa Mukama , nimumanya ngu omuri Mukama okwehenenga kwanyu ti kwa busha .
46016001	Mbwenu aha bikwatiraine n'okurundaanira abarikwera eby'okubakwatsa , mutwaze nk'oku naaragiire ebigombe by'abaikiriza eby'omuri Galatiya .
46016002	Buri kiro ky'okubanza omu wiiki , ibara muntu omuriimwe agire eki yaiha aha bi atungire , akibiikye nk'oku kiraamubaasikire , haza eby'okurundaana birekye kukorwa obu nyizire .
46016003	Reero ku ndiija , ndyayohereza abu muriba musiimire omu baruha kutwara ekiconco kyanyu Yerusalemu .
46016004	Ku kirireebeka ngu kishemereire naanye kuzayo , ndyagyenda nabo .
46016005	Ndyabazindukira naaheza kuraba Makedoniya , ahabw'okuba niinyenda kurabayo .
46016006	Kandi shana nkaaguma naimwe , nangwa mmarirayo ebiro by'embeho , haza munkwatsa kugumizamu orugyendo rwangye ei ndaaze yoona .
46016007	Manya hati tindikwenda kubareeba nk'orikubarabaho kusha , kureka nyine amatsiko g'okumara naimwe ebiro , Mukama akunzire .
46016008	Kwonka ndyaguma Efeso okuhitsya ahari Pentekooti ,
46016009	ahabw'okuba ntungire omugisha muhango kukorayo omurimo gw'omugasho , nobu haraabe hariyo baingi abatarikuunyendeza .
46016010	Timoteeho ku ariija okwo , mumwehitsye , abone kuguma naimwe atetuurukire , ahabw'okuba naakora omurimo gwa Mukama nkaanye .
46016011	N'ahabw'ekyo hatagira owaamugaya . Mumukwatse , agumizemu orugyendo rwe n'obusingye , abone kugaruka ahi ndi ; ahabw'okuba mmutegyereize hamwe n'abanyaruganda .
46016012	Aha bya mwene Taata Apolo , nkamwehanangiriza munonga kubataayaayira hamwe n'abanyaruganda abandi ; kwonka buzimazima tarasiimire kwija okwo obwa hati , kureka aryaija yaatunga omwanya .
46016013	Mugume nimureeba , muhamire omu kwikiriza , mube emanzi , mube ab'amaani .
46016014	Byona ebi muraakore , mubikorese rukundo .
46016015	Mbwenu beene Taata , nimumanya ku ab'eka ya Sitefana nibo baabandize kuhinduka omuri Akaiya , kandi bakeehayo kuheereza abarikwera .
46016016	Nimbeehanangiriza munonga ku mworobera abantu nk'abo na buri weena orikwehenenga naakora nabo .
46016017	Nkashemererwa obu Sitefana na Forutunaato na Akaiko baija , ahabw'okuba bakakora eki mwakukozire muriho ;
46016018	banduhuura omutima , naimwe baagubaruhuura . Abantu nk'abo mubahe ekitiinwa .
46016019	Ebigombe by'abaikiriza b'omuri Asiya nibibaramutsya . Akwila na Purisika hamwe n'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza eky'omu nju yaabo nibabaramutsya munonga omuri Mukama .
46016020	Abanyaruganda boona nibabaramutsya . Muramukanisane okunywegyerana okurikwera .
46016021	Endamutsyo egi , nyowe Paulo , naagyehandiikira n'omukono gwangye .
46016022	Ku haraabe hariho otarikukunda Mukama akyeenwe . Ai Mukama waitu ija !
46016023	Embabazi za Mukama Yesu zigume naimwe !
46016024	Mwena nimbakunda omuri Kristo Yesu ! Amiina .
47001001	Nyowe Paulo , ou Ruhanga yaasiimire kuba entumwa ya Kristo Yesu , na Timoteeho mwene waitu , nituhandiikira ekigombe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga eky'omuri Korinto , hamwe n'abarikwera boona ab'omuri Akaiya yoona .
47001002	Nitubendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebya Ruhanga Tataitwe , na Mukama Yesu Kristo .
47001003	Ruhanga kandi Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , Taata ow'embabazi kandi Ruhanga ow'okugumibwa kwona , ahimbisibwe .
47001004	Niwe ogwo otugumya turi omu busaasi bwaitu bwona , ngu naitwe tubone kugumya abari omu busaasi bw'omuringo gwona , nitubagumya n'ebyo ebi Ruhanga yaatugumiise .
47001005	Manya nk'oku okubonabona kwa Kristo kushaagaana omuriitwe , n'okuhuumurizibwa kwaitu omuri Kristo nikwo kushaagaana .
47001006	Ku tureeba enaku , tuzireeba ngu imwe muhuumurizibwe kandi mujunwe . Reero ku tuhuumurizibwa , kiba kityo ngu naimwe muhuumurizibwe okuhuumurizibwa oku mutunga , nimwemera enaku ezi tureeba .
47001007	Nikyo tubainiiremu amatsiko gahamire ; ahabw'okuba nitumanya ngu nk'oku mukwatanisa naitwe omu kubonabona kwaitu , nikwo muribagana naitwe omu kugumibwa kwaitu .
47001008	Beene Taata , titurikwenda ngu mutamanya enaku zi twareebeire omuri Asiya . Manya zikatwita munonga , okukira oku twakubaasize kuzeemera ; twarugaho twahwera kimwe amatsiko g'okukira .
47001009	Buzimazima tukateekateeka ngu tucwereirwe orubanja rw'okufa . Ekyo kikabaho kutureetera okuteeyesiga , kureka okwesiga Ruhanga ozoora abafiire .
47001010	Niwe yaatujunire omu kabi kahango katyo k'okufa , kandi aryatujuna : niwe twineho amatsiko ku ariguma naatujuna .
47001011	Naimwe mugume mutuhwere nimutushabira , ngu omugisha ogu twahairwe ahabw'okushaba kw'abaingi , baingi bagusiimire Ruhanga ahabwaitu .
47001012	Manya okwesiima kwaitu nikwo oku , nituhamya omu mitima yaitu , ku omu nsi omu , na munomuno ahariimwe , twagizire emitwarize erikwera kandi ey'amazima ahari Ruhanga , etari y'obwengye bw'ab'ensi , kureka eruga omu mbabazi za Ruhanga .
47001013	Ahabw'okuba titubahandiikira kindi , kureka ebyo ebi murikubaasa kushoma mukeetegyereza . Nyine amatsiko ngu muryamanyira kimwe ,
47001014	nk'oku mubaire mwamanyireho ekicweka ; kandi ngu muryatwehimbisisa , nk'oku turibeehimbisisa , aha Kiro kya Mukama Yesu .
47001015	Ahabw'ago matsiko , nkenda kuba niimwe naabanza kutaayaayira , ngu mubone kushemererwa kabiri .
47001016	Nkenda kubataayaayira ninza Makedoniya , kandi mbarabeho nindugayo , ngu naimwe mubone kunshendekyereza ninza Buyudaaya .
47001017	Obu naayenda kukora ekyo , nimugira ngu nkaba nimpindahinduka ? Ngu ku nteekateeka kugira eki naakora , nkikora nk'omuntu w'ensi orahukirwa kugira ati : Eego , kandi handi hakye , ati : Ngaaha ?
47001018	Nindahira Ruhanga ow'amazima , ku ekigambo kyaitu kitakabaga Eego , na Ngaaha .
47001019	Ahabw'okuba Omwana wa Ruhanga Yesu Kristo , ou Silivaano na Timoteeho naanye twabarangiriire , takabaga Eego na Ngaaha ; kureka omuriwe obutoosha ni Eego .
47001020	Manya byona ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise biba Eego omuriwe . Nikyo tugirira omuriwe tuti : Amiina , kuhaisa Ruhanga ogwo ekitiinwa .
47001021	Ruhanga niwe atuhamya hamwe naimwe ku twine amagara omuri Kristo , kandi niwe yaatutooraine ,
47001022	akatutaho akamanyiso ke , haza akatuha Mutima we omu mitima yaitu , kuba omukwato ogurikutuhamiza ebi atubiikiire .
47001023	Kwonka Ruhanga niwe mujurizi wangye ekyanzibiire kugaruka Korinto n'okubasaasira ,
47001024	kutari kugira ngu nitwenda kutegyekyesa okwikiriza kwanyu eikama , kureka okuba abarikukwatanisa naimwe ngu mushemererwe , ahabw'okuba mutuura muri abahamire omu kwikiriza kwanyu .
47002001	N'ahabw'ekyo nkamariirira kutagaruka okwo kubasaasa .
47002002	Mbwenu nyowe ku ndaabasaase , n'oha orandeetere okushemererwa , kureka t'ogwo ou nsaasize ?
47002003	Ekyo nikyo naabahandiikiriire , ngu ku ndaije , ndekye kusaasa abaakubaire nibandeetera okushemererwa , ahabw'okuba nkagira obwesigye ahariimwe mwena , ngu ku ndaashemererwe , mwena mushemererwe .
47002004	Manya nkabahandiikira nyine obusaasi bwingi n'obujune omu mutima kandi n'amarira maingi , ntarikwenda kubasaasa , kureka okubamanyisa ku mbainiire rukundo nyingi .
47002005	Ku haraabe hariho owaareetsire obusaasi , tiinye yaasaasize nyenka , kwonka aha rundi rubaju ntarengyesereize mwena akabasaasa .
47002006	Omuntu nk'ogwo ekifubiro eki yaahairwe abaingi nikimara .
47002007	N'ahabw'ekyo mukaamusaasiire mumugumya , areka kwitwa obusaasi burengyesereize .
47002008	Nikyo ndikubeeshengyerereza ngu mugarukye kumuhamiza ku murikumukunda .
47002009	Nikyo naabahandiikiriire kureeba yaaba nimworoba omuri byona .
47002010	Manya weena ou musaasira , naanye mmusaasira . Naanye eki naasaasiire , ku kiraabe kiriho , nkakisaasira ahabwanyu omu maisho ga Kristo ,
47002011	ngu Sitaane atakaatuhita ; ahabw'okuba nitumanya gye amengye ge .
47002012	Obu naaza Turoa kurangirira Amakuru Marungi ga Kristo , nkashanga orwigi ruunyiguriirwe kukorera Mukama .
47002013	Kwonka tindagizire buhuumure mu mutima , ahabw'okuba tindashangireyo mwene waitu Tito . Ntyo naabaraga , naaza Makedoniya .
47002014	Mbwenu Ruhanga naakasingye , otusinguriza obutoosha omuri Kristo . Akatubaasisa kutaamiranisa hoona omugaju gw'okumumanya .
47002015	Ahabw'okuba itwe , omu barikujunwa n'omu barikuhwerekyerera , turi omugaju gwa Kristo ogurikutaamiranira Ruhanga .
47002016	Aha barikuhwerekyerera , turi ekinuuko kya rufu ekireeta okufa ; aha barikujunwa , turi omugaju gw'amagara ogureeta amagara . Mbwenu ebyo n'oha owaakubibaasa ?
47002017	Manya tituri nka baingi ababungiza eryo ekigambo kya Ruhanga ; kwonka itwe ahabw'okutumwa Ruhanga tugamba tutaine buryarya omu maisho ge , turi abaheereza ba Kristo .
47003001	Nimugira ngu nitutandika kugaruka kwegamba marungi ? Nari nitwenda ebaruha z'okutusiimisa , ezimuhandiikiirwe nari ezi muhandiikire , nk'oku abandi bagira ?
47003002	Imwe mwenka niimwe baruha yaitu y'okutusiimisa , ehandiikirwe omu mitima yaanyu , erikumanywa ekashomwa abantu boona .
47003003	Kandi nimureebwa butunu ku muri ebaruha ya Kristo ei yaatutwekire , etahandiikisiibwe bwino , kureka Mutima wa Ruhanga ohuriire ; ti ha bishate by'eibaare , kureka aha mbari z'emitima y'abantu .
47003004	Obu nibwo bwesigye obu tugira ahari Ruhanga omuri Kristo .
47003005	Tikugira ngu itwe nitwemarira , kushusha oti ekintu kyona niitwe kirikurugaho . Manya okwemarira kwaitu kuruga ahari Ruhanga .
47003006	Niwe yaatubaasiise kuba abaheereza b'Endagaano Ensya , etari mu iteeka erihandiikirwe , kureka erya Mutima ; ahabw'okuba eiteeka erihandiikirwe riita , kwonka Mutima aha amagara .
47003007	Amateeka gakasharurwa omu nyuguta aha mabaare , haza omu kugaha haareebeka ekitiinwa . Ekyo kitiinwa nobu kiraabe kyabaire nikihwerera , kwonka kikaba kingi , kyaremesa Abaisiraeli kureeba Musa ahamaisho , ahabw'okuba hakaba nihamurinkana munonga . Mbwenu okuheebwa ago Mateeka , ku kuraabe kwaizire n'ekitiinwa kirikwingana kityo ,
47003008	okuheebwa Mutima ka kurigira ekitiinwa ekirikukiraho !
47003009	Obuheereza obw'okusingisa orubanja ku buraabe bwagizire ekitiinisa , kaashwa obuheereza obuhaisa okuhikiirira !
47003010	N'ahabw'ekyo ekyabaire kiine ekitiinisa buri , mbwenu tikyakikiine ahabw'okuba kikamarwaho ekitiinwa ekirikukikirira kimwe .
47003011	Manya ekyo ekyahwereire , ku kiraabe kyaizire n'ekitiinwa , eky'entuura ka kishemereire kugira ekitiinwa akirikukikirira kimwe !
47003012	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku twine amatsiko nk'ago , twine obumanzi bwingi .
47003013	Tituri nka Musa owaayeshwekire ahamaisho , ngu Abaisiraeli batakaareeba muheru y'ekyo kimurinkano kirikuhwerera .
47003014	Okwiha obwo baaguma bari ebitsire omu kwetegyereza kwabo , n'eri izooba ku baba nibashoma endagaano eya ira , ekyo kyesangizo kiguma kitashuurwirwe , ahabw'okuba omuri Kristo wenka , kiihwaho .
47003015	N'ekya buzima na hati ebya Musa ku bishomwa , eky'okwesangiza kiguma kishwekire emitima yaabo .
47003016	Kwonka omuntu ku ahindukira Mukama , ekyo ky'okwesangiza kirugaho .
47003017	Mbwenu Mukama ogwo niwe Mutima , kandi ahi Mutima wa Mukama ari , habaho obugabe .
47003018	Naitwe twena , ku tuba tuhangire amaisho nitwetegyereza ekitiinwa kya Mukama , nitworeka ekinyimanyimi kyakyo , tuteesangiire hamaisho , tuba nituhindurwa kushushana nawe omu kitiinwa ekiguma nikikanya ; kandi ekyo kikorwa Mukama , niwe Mutima .
47004001	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku twine obuheereza obu twakwatsiibwe ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga , titurikucweka ntegye .
47004002	Tukanga eby'enshoni ebikorerwa endugu , n'okugira emitwarize y'obugobya nari okugoreka ekigambo kya Ruhanga . Kureka ahabw'okugamba amazima butunu , tukaayenzire abantu boona batusiimire aha mutima omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
47004003	Kandi Amakuru Marungi gaitu , ku garaabe nigashwekyererwa , nigashwekyererwa ahari abo bonka abarikuhwerekyerera .
47004004	Nibo abo abataikiriza , abu ruhanga w'ensi egi yaarindagiize omutima , akababuza kureeba omushana gw'Amakuru Marungi ag'ekitiinwa kya Kristo , oba ekyeshusha kya Ruhanga .
47004005	Manya titwerangirira twenka , kureka turangirira Yesu Kristo ku ari Mukama , naitwe ku turi abaheereza baanyu ahabwa Yesu .
47004006	Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga owaagizire ati : Omushana ka gujwere omu mwirima , niwe yaayakiire omu mitima yaitu kutumurikira , ngu tumanye ekitiinwa kye ekireeberwa omuri Kristo .
47004007	Kwonka eitungo eryo , itwe abariine turi enyungu z'eibumba , kworeka ku amaani agatakareebwaga gari aga Ruhanga , gatari gaitu .
47004008	Tureebesibwa enaku embaju zoona , kwonka tituburwa bwehigiro ; tushoberwa , kwonka titwehwa matsiko .
47004009	Twine abazigu baingi , kwonka tituburwa banywani baitu . Kandi nobu obundi tusaasibwa munonga , kwonka tituhwerekyerezibwa .
47004010	Obutoosha tugyenda twine okufa kwa Yesu omu mibiri yaitu , ngu amagara ge gabone kureebekyera omu mibiri yaitu .
47004011	Ahabw'okuba ku tuba tukiriho , tuguma nituheebwayo kwitwa ahabwa Yesu , ngu amagara ge gabone kureebekyera omu mibiri yaitu ey'okufa .
47004012	N'ahabw'ekyo rufu ekorera omuriitwe , kwonka amagara gakorera omuriimwe .
47004013	Nk'oku twine omutima gw'okwikiriza nk'ogw'owaahandiikire ati : Nkaikiriza , nikyo naagambiire ; naitwe nitwikiriza , nikyo turikugambira .
47004014	Nitumanya ngu owaazoire Mukama Yesu omu bafiire , naitwe aryatuzoora hamwe na Yesu , atute omu maisho ge hamwe naimwe .
47004015	Ahabw'okuba byona biriho ahabwanyu , ngu ei embabazi za Ruhanga ziraagarukire kukanya omu bantu , nabo niyo baraagarukire kusiima , Ruhanga akaheebwa ekitiinwa .
47004016	N'ahabw'ekyo titwehwa matsiko . Omuntu waitu ow'aharuguru nobu araabe naagyenda naahwa aha magufa , omuntu waitu ow'omunda ahindurwa musya buri izooba .
47004017	Manya okureebesibwa enaku oku okukye kandi okw'akaanya , nikututebeekanisiza ekitiinwa kihango ekitarihwaho kandi ekitarikwerengwa .
47004018	Ahabw'okuba tituhanga maisho bintu ebireebeka , kureka ebitareebeka . Manya ebireebeka bihwaho , kwonka ebitareebeka tibihwaho .
47005001	Nitumanya ngu eihema eri ery'omu nsi , nigwo mubiri ogu tutuuramu , ku ririkamburwa , twine ekindi kyombeko eki Ruhanga aha , niyo nju etombekirwe mikono , ey'obutwire bwona omu iguru .
47005002	N'ekya buzima obwa hati nitutsinda , kandi nitwetenga kujwekwa ekijwaro kyaitu eky'omu iguru ,
47005003	ngu ku turaakijware , turekye kushangwa tujwaire busha .
47005004	Manya ku tuba tukiri omuri eri ihema , tutsinda turemereirwe ; ti habw'okwenda kujuurwa , kureka okwongyerwa kujwekwa , ngu ekifa kibone kumirwa amagara .
47005005	Kandi owaatuteekateekyeire ekyo ni Ruhanga , owaatuhaire Mutima kutuhamiza .
47005006	Nikyo tugumira omutima obutoosha ; ahabw'okuba nitumanya ngu ku tuba tukiri owaitu omuri ogu mubiri , tuba turi hare na Mukama .
47005007	Manya omu magara aga tugyendera omu kwikiriza , kutari okureeba .
47005008	Tutuura tugumire omutima , kandi tukaayenzire haakiri okutaana n'omubiri ogu , tukaza kutuura na Mukama .
47005009	N'ahabw'ekyo yaaba tukiri egi , nainga tutakiriho , ekyaitu n'okuteeraho kumugwisa gye .
47005010	Manya twena turi ab'okuboneka omu maisho g'ekitebe kya Kristo eky'eiramuriro rye , buri muntu abone kuzimuurirwa ebirungi nari ebibi , nk'oku yaakozire akiine omubiri .
47005011	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku turikumanya ku kihikire kutiina Mukama , nituteeraho kwikirizisa abantu ; kwonka Ruhanga niwe arikumanya oku turi , kandi nyine amatsiko ngu naimwe omu mitima yaanyu nimumanya oku ndi .
47005012	Titurikwenda kugaruka kwegamba marungi ahariimwe , kureka okubaha eby'okubeesiimisa ahabwaitu , ngu mubone kugarukamu abeehimbisa ahabw'ebirikureebwa , bitari by'omu mutima .
47005013	Ku turaabe tuhugire omutima , tuguhugire ahabwa Ruhanga ; ku turaabe tutebeekaine , tutebeekaine ahabwanyu .
47005014	Manya rukundo ya Kristo niyo etuhuguura , ahabw'okuba nituhamya ku omwe yaafeereire boona , n'ahabw'ekyo boona bakafa .
47005015	Kandi akabafeera boona , ngu abariho barekye kugumaho ahabwabo , kureka ahabw'ogwo owaabafeeraire akabazookyera .
47005016	Okwiha hati titwakimanyira muntu weena mu buntu . Nobu turaabe twamanyire Kristo omu buntu , mbwenu titwakimumanya tutyo .
47005017	N'ahabw'ekyo omuntu weena ku aba ari omuri Kristo , aba ekihangwa kisya . Ebya kare bihwaho , haza byona bihinduka bisya .
47005018	Ebyo byona biruga ahari Ruhanga owaatwegarukanisiize omuri Kristo , akatukwatsa omurimo gw'okugarukanisa .
47005019	Nikwo kugira ngu , Ruhanga omuri Kristo akaba naayegarukanisa ab'omu nsi , atarikubabarira bibi byabo , kandi akatukwatsa obutumwa bw'okugarukanisa .
47005020	Reero nu turi entumwa za Kristo , Ruhanga naayehanangiririza omuriitwe . Naitwe nitubeeshengyereza omu iziina rya Kristo , mugarukane na Ruhanga .
47005021	Kristo otakamanyaga kibi , Ruhanga akamuhindura ekibi ahabwaitu , ngu omuriwe tutungye okuhikiirira kwa Ruhanga .
47006001	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku turikukorera hamwe na Ruhanga , nitubeehanangiriza okutatungira busha embabazi ze .
47006002	Ahabw'okuba agira ati : Nkakutega okutu omu bunaku buhikire , naakuhwera aha izooba ry'okujunirwaho . Mbwenu hati nibwo bunaku obuhikire , mbwenu hati niryo izooba ry'okujunirwaho !
47006003	Titwenda kuteeza muntu weena entsibo , ngu obuheereza bwaitu burekye kushangwamu ebishobire .
47006004	Kureka omuri byona nitweyoreka ku turi abaheereza ba Ruhanga : omu kugumisiriza munonga , omu kubonabonesibwa , omu birikutugumira , omu bihikiirizi ,
47006005	omu kwashwa , omu kuteebwa omu bihome , omu bujagararo , omu mirimo erikurusya , omu kuraara aha kiro n'omu kwitwa enjara .
47006006	Kandi nitweyoreka ku turi abaheereza ba Ruhanga ahabw'oburikwera , ahabw'okumanya , ahabw'okugumisiriza , ahabw'embabazi ; kandi ahari Mutima Orikwera tugira rukundo etaine buryarya ,
47006007	tugamba eby'amazima , tuhangaanwa amaani ga Ruhanga , tukwaitse ebikwato by'okuhikiirira eby'okurwanisa n'eby'okwekingiza .
47006008	Omu kuheebwa ekitiinwa n'omu kugaywa , omu kugambwaho kubi n'omu kugambwaho gye , nitutwazibwa nk'abanyabishuba , haza turi ab'amazima ;
47006009	nk'abatarikumanywa , kunu nitumanywa gye ; nk'abarikufa , haza tuhuriire ; nk'abafubiirwe , haza tutaitsirwe ,
47006010	nk'abari omu busaasi , kwonka abatuura bashemereirwe ; nk'abooro , kwonka abarikutungisa baingi ; nk'abataine kantu , kwonka abaine byona .
47006011	Imwe Bakorinto ' mwe , twabagambira bwerure , emitima yaitu eshashaanukire .
47006012	Tiitwe turikubakumakuma , kureka niimwe murikwekumakumisa ebi murikuteekateeka .
47006013	Nimbagambira nk'abaana bangye , mbwenu naimwe nimutushashaanukire nk'oku twabashashaanukiire .
47006014	Mutarikwatanisa n'abataikiriza . Mbwenu okuhikiirira kwine kakwate ki n'okutahikiirira ? Nari omushana gukwatanisa guta n'omwirima ?
47006015	Nari Kristo akwatanisa ata na Beliyaali ? Nainga shi omwikiriza akwatanisa ata n'otari mwikiriza ?
47006016	Nyaruju ya Ruhanga eikirizana eta n'ebishushani ? Manya itwe turi Nyaruju ya Ruhanga ohuriire ; nk'oku Ruhanga yaagizire ati : Ndyabatuuramu , mbagyendagyendemu . Ndyaba Ruhanga waabo , nabo babe abantu bangye .
47006017	Kandi Mukama naagira ati : N'ahabw'ekyo mubarugyemu mwetaanise nabo Mutarikora aha kintu kyona ekihagaire . Naanye nibwo ndibaakiira .
47006018	Ndyaba shoimwe , naimwe mube batabani bangye na bahara bangye ; nikwo Mukama Rukiraboona arikugira .
47007001	Abakundwa , nk'oku twine ebyaraganisiibwe ebyo , ka tweyozyeho byona ebishiisha omubiri n'omutima , tubone kubeera kimwe abarikwera omu kutiina Ruhanga .
47007002	Mutushashaanurire emitima yaanyu . Titwine u turashaagiize , titwine u turasiisiire , kandi titwine u turagobeize .
47007003	Ekyo tindikukigamba kubahaahuuza , ahabw'okuba nkaba naabagambiire ku mututuura aha mutima mukwataniise naitwe , yaaba mu kufa , yaaba mu kuba abahuriire .
47007004	Nimbeesiga munonga , kandi nimuunyesiimisa ! Nobu turabe twine enaku zirikwingana ki , hoona nyijwire obuhuumure , kandi amashemererwa n'ag'okuunyita .
47007005	Nangwa nobu twahikire Makedoniya , emibiri yaitu teragizire bu ehuumura , kureka tukagira obusaasi embaju zoona - - engamba aheeru n'obwoba omunda .
47007006	Kwonka Ruhanga ohuumuriza enshoberwa , akatuhuumuriza ahabw'okwija kwa Tito .
47007007	Ti habw'okwija kwe kwonka , kureka kandi n'ahabw'okuhuumurizibwa oku imwe mwamuhuumuriize . Manya akatuteekyerereza eby'orushusho rwanyu n'okutonzya kwanyu n'omuhimbo gwanyu ebi muunyiniire ; haza ekyo kyandeetera okwongyera kushemererwa .
47007008	Nangwa nobu ndaabe naabagwisize kubi omu baruha yangye , ekyo tindikukyefuuza nobu ndaabe naakyefuurize ahabw'okuba nimmanya ku egyo baruha yaabagwisize kubi okumara akaanya kakye .
47007009	Kwonka hati ninshemererwa , ti habw'okuba ngu mukagwisibwa kubi , kureka ahabw'okuba okuguubwa kubi kwanyu kukabareetera okwegarukamu . Manya mukashaasha nk'oku Ruhanga asiima ; itwe titwagira ki twabafeereza .
47007010	Ahabw'okuba okugira obusaasi nk'oku Ruhanga asiima , kureeta okwegarukamu okuhitsya aha kujunwa , kandi tikwefuuzisa ; kwonka okugira obusaasi nk'okw'ab'ensi , kurugwamu okufa .
47007011	Mbwenu nimureebe eki okwo kushaasha , nk'oku Ruhanga asiima , kwabareeteire : oku mwataireho munonga omutima kwehohoora , oku mwagwirwe kubi , oku mwatiinire , oku mwagizire ekihika , oku mwayezirikire , n'oku mwayehaireyo kufubira okozire kubi . Omuri ebyo byona mukeeyoreka ku mutaine rubanja omuri ekyo kintu .
47007012	Manya nobu naabahandiikiire , ti habw'owaakozire kubi , nari owaakozirwe kubi , kureka ngu omuhimbo gwanyu ogu mutwiniire , guboorekwe butunu omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
47007013	N'ahabw'ekyo tukahuumurizibwa . Otabazire kuhuumurizibwa kwaitu okwo , tukongyera kushemererwa ahabw'okushemererwa kwa Tito , ou imwe mwena mwagarwire omutima omunda .
47007014	Manya ku ndaabe naamworekire oku murikuunyesiimisa , ekyo tikirampemwire ; ahabw'okuba nk'oku byona ebi twabagambiire byabaire eby'amazima , n'okwesiima kwaitu ahari Tito nikworekyera kimwe ku kuri okw'amazima .
47007015	Kandi ku arikwijuka okworoba kwanyu mwena , n'oku mwamwakiire mwine obwoba n'okutetema , omutima gwe gwongyera kubahwerayo .
47007016	Naanye ninshemererwa , ahabw'okuba omuri byona nimbaasa kubeesigira kimwe .
47008001	Beene Taata , nitwenda ku mumanya emigisha ya Ruhanga , ei yaahaire ebigombe by'abaikiriza ab'omuri Makedoniya .
47008002	Ahabw'okuba omu kugyezibwa munonga okw'okubonabonesibwa bakagira okushemererwa kutakareebwaga , kwabareetera okugaba n'obufura , kunu bari abooro munonga .
47008003	Ahabw'okuba nk'oku ndikubajurira , bakagaba nk'obwekoro bwabo oku buri , nangwa baakizaho , kandi beekundiire .
47008004	Bakatweshengyereza munonga kwikirizibwa kukwatanisa n'abarikuhwera abarikwera
47008005	haza tibaakora nk'oku twabaire nituteekateeka , kureka baabanza kweha Mukama , kandi ahabw'okukunda kwa Ruhanga , baatweha .
47008006	Naitwe nikwo kushaba Tito ku amariiriza omuriimwe ogwo murimo gw'embabazi , ogu yaabaire yaatandikire .
47008007	Na mbwenu nk'oku mutakirwa omuri byona omu kwikiriza , omu kugamba gye , omu kumanya , omu kuta omutima ahari byona , n'omu kutugirira rukundo , mureebe ngu timwakirwa n'omuri ogu murimo gw'embabazi .
47008008	Ekyo tindikukigamba nk'orikubaragiira , kureka okuhamya nindeebera aha bweziriki bw'abandi , yaaba rukundo yaanyu eri ey'amazima .
47008009	Ahabw'okuba nimumanya embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , ngu nobu araabe yaabaire ari omutungi , kwonka ahabwanyu akahinduka omworo , abone kubatungisisa obworo bwe .
47008010	Kandi omuri ekyo nimbahabura nti : kikaabaire kirungi muheza eki mwatandikire omwaka oguhingwire , kutari kukikora kwonka , kureka kukikora mwekundiire .
47008011	Mbwenu ekihika kyanyu ky'okwenda kukikora kireeberwe aha kukiheza , nimukora aha bi mutungire .
47008012	Manya ekihika ky'okwenda kukikora , ku muraabe mukiine , nikiikirizibwa nk'oku omuntu atungire , kutari nk'oku atatungire .
47008013	Tindikugira ngu abandi banguhirwe , imwe muremeererwe .
47008014	Kwonka ahabw'obwinganisa , ebyanyu ebi mushaagize omu biro ebi , bibamarire obukyene bwabo ; n'ebyabo ebi barishaazya , naimwe bibamarire obukyene bwanyu , habone kubaho obwinganisa .
47008015	Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Owaashanguriize bingi tarashaagizeho , n'owaarundaine bikye taine ki yaabuzirweho .
47008016	Kwonka Ruhanga asiimwe , oha Tito omutima gw'okubeetaho munonga nk'ogu tubainiire .
47008017	Ahabw'okuba taraikiriize ki twashabire kyonka , kureka ahabw'okugira omuhimbo gwe ahabwe , naija kwija owaanyu ayekundiire .
47008018	Mbwenu hamwe nawe twabatumaho omunyaruganda orikumanywa munonga ebigombe by'abaikiriza boona ahabw'okurangirira Amakuru Marungi .
47008019	Kandi t'ekyo kyonka , kureka atoorainwe ebigombe by'abaikiriza , kuguma naagyenda naitwe omu murimo ogu ogw'embabazi , ogu turikukora ahabw'okuhaisa Mukama ekitiinwa , n'okworeka omutima murungi ogu twine .
47008020	Nitwerinda ngu hatakaagira owaatuhaahuuza , naatutura oku turikukoresa ebyo biconco by'obufura .
47008021	Ahabw'okuba eki turikugyenderera n'okukora ebirikusiimwa , ti Mukama wenka , kureka ebirikusiimwa n'abantu .
47008022	Kandi hamwe nabo twabatumaho omunyaruganda ondi , ou tugyerize kaingi , tukashanga ari omweziriki omuri bingi , kandi hati oyongyeire kuba omweziriki okukira oku atuura , ahabw'okuba naabeesiga munonga .
47008023	Tito we , n'omukozi mugyenzi wangye , ou turikukora kumwe omurimo gw'okubaheereza ; kandi abanyaruganda baitu abo , n'entumwa z'ebigombe by'abaikiriza , ezihaisa Kristo ekitiinwa .
47008024	N'ahabw'ekyo muboorekye ekirikuhamya rukundo yaanyu , n'ekirikutureetera kwesiima ahabwanyu , ebigombe by'abaikiriza bibone kukimanya .
47009001	Tikirikuunyetengyesa kubahandiikira aha bikwatiraine n'eby'okukwatsa abarikwera ;
47009002	ahabw'okuba nimmanya ku mutuura mweteekateekire . Haza ekyo kindeetera kweraatira Abamakedoniya nimbagira nti : Abaakaiya okwiha omu mwaka oguhingwire batuura beeteekateekire . Obweziriki bwanyu nibwo butaire abaingi omuribo omuhimbo .
47009003	Kwonka naabatumaho abanyaruganda , ngu okwesiima kwaitu ahabwanyu omuri ekyo kintu kutakaaba okwa busha , haza mushangwe mweteekateekire nk'oku naakigambire ,
47009004	Abamakedoniya bakiija hamwe naanye , baashanga muteeteekateekire tukahemuka tiitwe - - twenka , nangwa naimwe - - ahabw'okuba nitubeesiga ekirengyesereize .
47009005	Nikyo naareebeire ngu nikyetengwa kushaba abanyaruganda kwija okwo owaanyu kuntangayo , ngu bateekateekye bukiri kare ekyo kiteekateekirwe , kitari ky'okugyemwa , kureka eky'okwekundira .
47009006	Eki ndikugamba n'eki : orikubiba naateera nkye , aryagyesha bikye ; n'orikubiba naateera nyingi , aryagyesha bingi .
47009007	Buri omwe akore nk'oku ateekateekire omu mutima gwe , atarikunyomwa nari okugyemwa , ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akunda ogaba ashemereirwe .
47009008	Manya Ruhanga naabaasa kubaha emigisha ya buri muringo eshaagaine , ngu obutoosha mushangwe mwine ebirikubamara , haza mubone kugaba bingi munonga ahabwa buri murimo gwona omurungi .
47009009	Nk'oku kyahandiikirwe kiti : Agabisa obufura naagabira abooro ; okuhikiirira kwe kugumaho ebiro byona .
47009010	Ogwo oha omubibi embibo akamuha n'omugaati gw'okurya , aryabaha embibo zaanyu , azikuze , ateho n'okukanyisa eby'obufura bwanyu ebi mwerize .
47009011	Naimwe muryatungisibwa omu buryo bwona , mubone kugira obufura bwingi oburireetera Ruhanga kusiimwa ahabwaitu .
47009012	Manya okukora omurimo ogwo tikukyenuura barikwera kyonka , kureka kandi kureetera eby'okusiima Ruhanga kusheesheka .
47009013	Haza omurimo ogwo ogu muraakore nigwija kworeka okwikiriza kwanyu ku kuhamire , kandi kureetera baingi kusiima Ruhanga munonga ahabwanyu okworobera Amakuru Marungi ga Kristo agu mwaikiriize , n'ahabw'okuhayo ebyanyu n'obufura ahabwabo n'ahabw'abandi boona .
47009014	Kandi baryabashabira babainiire rukundo , ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga nyingi eziri omuriimwe .
47009015	Ruhanga naakasingye ahabw'ekiconco kye ekitashoboororwa .
47010001	Nyowe Paulo ou mugira ngu nyehumbaarika ndi hamwe naimwe , kwonka ngu mba ow'amaani ahariimwe mbari hare nimbeeshengyereza ahabw'obucureezi n'okutwaza gye ebya Kristo .
47010002	Nimbashaba , ngu ku ndiba mbaine , ndekye kuba ow'okugambisa amaani , agu nkukoreise aha bantu bamwe abatuteekateekaho kubi , ngu nitutwaza nk'ab'ensi .
47010003	Nobu turi abantu nk'abandi , kwonka titurwana nk'ab'ensi .
47010004	Manya eby'okurwanisa byaitu eby'orugamba ti biba by'ab'ensi , kureka bigira amaani ga Ruhanga kusheenyagura ebigo .
47010005	Tumaraho empaka na ibara kintu kyona ekyetunguura kuhakanisa okumanya Ruhanga ; kandi nitugomoora buri kiteekateeko kworobera Kristo .
47010006	Ku muraaheze kworobera kimwe , tweteekateekire kufubira ekyeetwa obugomi kyona .
47010007	Naimwe mukireebe . Omuntu ku araabe naahamya ngu n'owa Kristo , aijukye ku naitwe turi aba Kristo nkawe .
47010008	Manya nobu naakurengyesereza kwehimbisa ahabw'obushoboorozi bu Mukama yaatuhaire kubombeka , kutari kubakambura , tikikaanyitsa nshoni .
47010009	Nyowe tinkaayenzire kushusha nk'orikubatiinisa n'amabaruha .
47010010	Ahabw'okuba nibagira bati : Amabaruha ge gagumire kandi n'ag'amaani ; kwonka omu kyemerero n'ow'amaani makye , kandi emigambire ye neegaywa .
47010011	Abari nk'abo bamanye ngu ebi tugambira omu baruha tutariho , nibyo tukora turiho .
47010012	Itwe titurikwenda kwebarira omu barikwehimbisa , nari kweringaaniza nabo . Manya bo ku beegyeragyeranisa , baayeringaanisa bonka na bonka , beeshanga bataine ki barikumanya .
47010013	Kwonka itwe titurikwija kwehimbisa tutaine bugarukiro , kureka nitugumira aha rugyero oru Ruhanga yaatuteeraireho kuhika n'ahariimwe .
47010014	Titurikurenga rugyero orwo nk'abatarabahikireho . Manya niitwe twabandize kuteera omuhanda gwona tukaija owaanyu , tubareeteire Amakuru Marungi ga Kristo .
47010015	Titurikwehimbisiza ha bi abandi baakoreire omu byanga bitari byaitu , kwonka twine amatsiko , ngu ei okwikiriza kwanyu kurigarukira kukanya , niyo omurimo gwaitu omuriimwe gurigarukira kuhanguha .
47010016	Obwo nibwo turirangirira Amakuru Marungi omu bindi byanga ebiiriireyo , tutarikwehimbisa habw'omurimo oguherize kukorwa omu kyanga ky'ondi .
47010017	Mbwenu orikwehimbisa , ayehimbisize omuri Mukama .
47010018	Manya omuntu orikwegamba marungi tiwe arikwikirizibwa , kureka ogwo orikusiimwa Mukama .
47011001	Nkaayenzire mungumisiririze omu bushema bwangye obukye . Buzimazima nimungumisiririze !
47011002	Manya mbainiire eihato nk'oku Ruhanga aribainiire ; ahabw'okuba nkabaraganisa kubahingira muri nk'omugore oshugaine , orikushwerwa omushaija omwe wenka , niwe Kristo .
47011003	Kwonka nintiina , ngu nk'oku enjoka yaabeihabeihire Eva n'obugobya bwayo , ebiteekateeko byanyu nibiija kuhabisibwa , munagye okweheera kimwe Kristo omu mazima .
47011004	Manya ku haakubaho owaija akarangirira Yesu ondi , otari u twarangiriire , nainga ku mwakutunga Mutima ondi , otari u mwatungire , nainga ku mwakwikiriza agandi Makuru Marungi , gatari gu mwaikiriize , mukaarahuka kubiikiriza .
47011005	Nyowe ningira ngu ezo ntumwa rugambwa tiziine ki zirikunkiza n'akakye .
47011006	Nangwa nobu ndaabe ntari mugambi murungi , kwonka tikwo ndi omu bwengye ; kandi ekyo tukakibashoboororera omu buryo bwona n'omu bintu byona .
47011007	Mbwenu shi nkakora kubi obu naayebundika , ngu imwe mutunguukye , nkarangirira Amakuru Marungi ga Ruhanga mutaine ki mumpaire ?
47011008	Ebigombe by'abaikiriza ebindi nkabiihaho eby'okunkwatsa , ngu mbone kubahwera imwe .
47011009	Kandi ku naabaire ntwire naimwe ndi omukyene , tindaremereire muntu weena , ahabw'okuba ebi naabaire nkyenire nkabiheebwa abanyaruganda abaarugire Makedoniya . Ntyo naayanga kubaremeerera omu buryo bwona ; kandi ndyaguma nyangire .
47011010	Nk'amazima ga Kristo oku gari omuriinye , tihariho kirinzibira kwehimbisa ahabw'ekyo omu byanga bya Akaiya .
47011011	Ahabw'enki ? Ahabw'okutabakunda ? Ruhanga naamanya ku ndikubakunda .
47011012	Kandi eki ndikukora niinyija kugumizamu ninkikora , ngu mbone kwihaho orwekwatso rw'abarikugira ngu omu butumwa bwabo obu barikwehimbisizamu , nibakora nkaitwe oku turikukora .
47011013	Manya abantu nk'abo n'entumwa z'ebishuba , abakozi engobya , barikwehindura entumwa za Kristo .
47011014	Kandi tikirikutangaaza , ahabw'okuba nangwa na Sitaane ayehindura maraika w'omushana .
47011015	N'ahabw'ekyo ti ky'okutangaarira kureeba abagaragwa be nibeehindura abaheereza by'eby'okuhikiirira . Muheru yaabo eryaba nk'ebi barikukora .
47011016	Ningaruka kugamba nti : Hatagira owaagira ngu ndi omushema ; nangwa nobu mwakunteekateekaho mutyo , muunyikirize nk'omushema , naanye mbone kwehimbisaho kakye .
47011017	Eki naaza kugamba , tindikukigambisibwa Mukama , kureka ninkigamba nk'omushema , niinyesiga ku nyine ekirikuunyehimbisisa .
47011018	Nk'oku baingi beehimbisa ahabw'eby'ensi , naanye ka nyehimbise .
47011019	Ahabw'okuba imwe mugumisiririza abashema mushemereirwe , haza kunu imwe muri ab'obwengye .
47011020	Manya mugumisiririza omuntu yaabahindura abahuuku , nari yaabanyaga , nainga yaabahita , nari yaayetunguura , nainga yaabateera oruhi rw'amaisho .
47011021	Mbwenu ka ngambe nk'oine enshoni , ku ebyo twabibaireho ab'amaani makye ! Kwonka ekihimbya omuntu weena kwetunguura - - ka ngambe nk'omushema naanye - - kimpimbya kwetunguura .
47011022	Bo n'Abaheburaayo ? Naanye nikwo ndi . N'Abaisiraeli ? Naanye nikwo ndi . Ni baijukuru ba Aburahamu ? Naanye nikwo ndi .
47011023	N'abaheereza ba Kristo ? Naanye nikwo ndi n'okukiraho - - ka ngambe nk'omushazi - - nimbakira omu kukora munonga , nimbakira omu kuteebwa omu bihome , omu kuteerwa ebyasha bitarikubarwa , kandi kaingi mbuzire hakye kufa .
47011024	Abayudaaya bakanteera emirundi etaano ebyasha makumi ashatu na mwenda .
47011025	Nkateerwa enkoni kashatu , nkateerwa amabaare omurundi gumwe . Emeeri zikanfaho kashatu , naaraara omu nyanja kandi naagisiibamu .
47011026	Omu ngyendo zangye eza kaingi , nkahikwaho akabi k'emigyera , akabi k'abanyagi , akabi ku naareeteirwe ab'eihanga ryangye , akabi ku naareeteirwe ab'eihanga ryangye , akabi ku nareeteirwe Abanyamahanga , akabi omu rurembo , akabi omu ihamba , akabi aha nyanja n'akabi k'abanyaruganda engobya .
47011027	Omu kwehenenga n'omu kugumirwa , omu kuraara aha kiro kaingi ntagwejegyeire , omu kwitwa enjara n'eiriho , kaingi ntaine kokurya , omu kwitwa embeho ntaine ky'okwefubika .
47011028	Kandi okwongyera ahari ebyo , buri izooba ntuura ndemereirwe okwemerereza omutima ebigombe by'abaikiriza byona .
47011029	N'oha oba ow'amaani makye , naanye ntabe ntyo ? N'oha oteezibwa entsibo , naanye ntashaashe ?
47011030	Ku ndaabe ndi ow'okwehimbisa , niinyija kwehimbisa ahabw'amaani gangye makye .
47011031	Ruhanga Ishe wa Mukama Yesu , ohimbisibwa ebiro byona , naamanya ku ntarikubeiha .
47011032	Reeba , omuri Damasiko , omutegyeki mukuru w'Omugabe Areta akarinda orurembo rwa Damasiko ngu ankwate .
47011033	Kwonka bakanta omu kitukuru , bandabya omu dirisa , banshuumiza aha kisiika , naamwoga ntyo omu mikono .
47012001	Ndi ow'okwehimbisa , nobu kuraabe kutaine mugasho , kwonka ka mpikye aha by'okworekwa n'okushuuruurirwa Mukama .
47012002	Nimmanya omuntu Omukristo , owaatwairwe omu iguru rya kashatu emyaka ikumi n'ena ehingwire yaaba yaabaire ari omu mubiri nari atagurimu , shinta , Ruhanga niwe arikukimanya .
47012003	Kandi nimmanya ogwo muntu ku yaatwairwe omu mwanya gw'obunanukye yaaba ari omu mubiri nari atagurimu , shinta , Ruhanga niwe arikukimanya ;
47012004	haza akahurirayo ebigambo ebitarikubaasa kushoboororwa , kandi ebi omuntu atakaagamba .
47012005	Ahabw'omuntu ogwo niinyija kwehimbisa , kwonka ahabwangye tindikwehimbisa , kureka okwehimbisiza omu maani gangye makye .
47012006	Nobu naakwehimbisa , tinkaaba mushema , ahabw'okuba nimba ningamba amazima . Kwonka ka nkirekye , hatakaagira owanteekateekaho okukira ebi andeebamu , nari ebi ampuriraho .
47012007	Kandi okugira ngu ndekye kwetunguura ahabw'okushuuruurirwa kwingi okw'omutaano , nkateebwa eihwa omu mubiri , riri entumwa ya Sitaane , kuguma nirincumita , ngu ndekye kwetunguura okukira oku kinshemereire .
47012008	Nkeeshengyereza Mukama kashatu ngu rinkuukyemu .
47012009	Kwonka yangira ati : Obubangizi bwangye nibukumara ; ahabw'okuba amaani gangye gahikiiririzibwa omu bweremwa . Nikyo ndigumira niinyehimbisa nshemereirwe ahabw'obweremwa bwangye , amaani ga Kristo gabone kungumamu .
47012010	N'ahabw'ekyo ahabwa Kristo nimmarirwa omu bweremwa , omu kujumwa , omu birikungumira , omu kuhiiganisibwa n'omu bihikiirizi . Manya ku mba ndi omweremwa , nibwo mba ow'amaani .
47012011	Eego , mbaire ndi omushema ! Kwonka niimwe mwakingyemire . Manya niimwe mwakubaire ab'okunsiima ahabw'okuba nobu ndaabe ntaine ku ndi , hoona ezindi ntumwa rugambwa tiziine ki zirikunkiza n'akakye .
47012012	Obumanyiso obw'entumwa nyakabara bukakorerwa omuriimwe omu kugumisiriza kwingi , omu kukora eby'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza n'eby'amaani .
47012013	Mbwenu ni kintu ki eki mutarahairwe nk'ebindi bigombe by'abaikiriza , kureka eky'okugira ngu nyowe tindabaremereire ? Munsaasire okwo kutainganisa .
47012014	Mbwenu nyeteekateekire kwija owaanyu omurundi gwa kashatu ; kandi tindikwija kubanyuunyuuta , ahabw'okuba ebyanyu tibyo ndikwizirira , kureka niimwe ndikwizirira . Manya abaana tibo bashemereire kubiikira abazaire baabo eby'okubahwera , kureka abazaire nibo babibiikira abaana .
47012015	Nyowe ndyaguma mpeyo ebyangye , kandi naanye nyeheereyo kimwe ahabwanyu nshemereirwe . Mbwenu ei ndagaarukire kubakunda munonga , niyo muraagarukire kunkunda kakye ?
47012016	Nimwikiriza ngu nyowe tindabaremereire ; kwonka kandi mugira ngu nkaba omunyabwengye naabagobeza , naabahita .
47012017	Mbwenu imwe omuri abo abu naabatumireho , hariho eki naabaryangataniise ?
47012018	Nkeehanangiriza Tito kwija okwo , kandi naayohereza mwene waitu kugyenda nawe . Mbwenu Tito aine eki arabaryangataniise ? Titurakozire n'omutima gumwe ? Tituratwarize nka kuri ?
47012019	Ebyo omwanya ogu gwona mubaire nimuteekateeka ngu nitwetonganira omu maisho gaanyu ? Abakundwa , mumanye ngu byona ebi turikugamba , tubigambira omu maisho ga Ruhanga , nk'oku Kristo yaakubigambire ahabw'okubagasira .
47012020	Eki ndikutiina n'okwija shana nkabashanga muri nk'oku mutarikwenda . Obundi shana mukaashangwa mwine entongane , eihari , ekiniga , okuharikana , okubeihererana , okugambuurana , amaryo n'okujagarara .
47012021	Kandi nintiina , ngu ku ndiija okwo obundi , Ruhanga wangye aryancwa amaryo omu maisho gaanyu , mbe ow'okucurira baingi abaakozire ebibi ; bakanga kwegarukamu kureka obushambani n'ebikwatiraine nabwo , n'okurya enshoni ahabw'ebi baabaire bakora .
47013001	Ogu n'omurundi gwa kashatu ogu ndaiziremu owaanyu kubareeba ; manya kikahandiikwa kiti : Buri rubanja rushemereire kuhamibwa obujurizi bwa baamushinja bashatu nari babiri .
47013002	Nkateisa abaakozire ebibi bwabiso kandi n'abandi boona . Na mbwenu nobu ntariho , nimbateisa omu ruzinduko rwangye rwa kabiri , nti : Ku ndiija obundi , tindibasaasira
47013003	ahabw'okuba mutuura nimwenda eky'okuhamizaho ku Kristo agambira omuriinye . Kristo ogwo tabatwaza na maani makye , kureka aba ow'amaani omuriimwe .
47013004	Manya nobu yaabambirwe aha musharaba ari ow'amaani makye , kwonka aba ohuriire ahabw'amaani ga Ruhanga . Naitwe turi ab'amaani makye omuriwe , kwonka omu mitwarize yaitu naimwe turyaba abahuriire hamwe nawe ahabw'amaani ga Ruhanga .
47013005	Mweshwijume , mureebe yaaba mukihamiire omu kwikiriza . Mwegyeze mwenka . Hari timurikumanya ku Yesu Kristo ari omuriimwe ? kureka biri muremirwe ekyo kigyezo !
47013006	Nyine amatsiko ngu nimwija kumanya ku tutararemirwe .
47013007	Kwonka nitushaba Ruhanga ngu murekye kushiisha - - tikugira ngu tureebekye nk'abaasingwire ekigyezo , kureka ngu imwe mukore ekihikire , itwe nobu turaabe nitushusha nk'abaremirwe .
47013008	Ahabw'okuba titubaasa kukora ekintu kyona ekihakanisa amazima , kureka ekigarwanirira .
47013009	Manya itwe nitushemererwa twaba turi ab'amaani makye , kwonka imwe mukaba ab'amaani . Eki turikushaba , n'okwenda ngu mube abahikiire kimwe .
47013010	Ebi naabibahandiikira ntari hamwe naimwe , ngu ku ndiija , ndekye kuba ow'omwaga omu kukoresa obushoboorozi obu Mukama yampaire kubombeka , kutari kubakambura .
47013011	Beene Taata , eky'aha muheru , mugumeho . Mwitanire okuba abahikiire kimwe . Mwete aha bi ndikubeehanangiriza , mugire omutima gumwe , mugume n'obusingye , na Ruhanga okomookwaho rukundo n'obusingye , aryaguma naimwe .
47013012	Muramukanisane okunywegyerana okurikwera . Abarikwera boona nibabaramutya .
47013013	
47013014	Embabazi za Mukama Yesu Kristo , n'okukunda kwa Ruhanga , n'okukwatanisa kwa Mutima Orikwera bigume naimwe mwena .
48001001	Nyowe Paulo entumwa otaratairweho bantu , nobu kwakuba okutumwa omuntu , kureka Yesu Kristo na Ruhanga Ishe owaamuzoire omu bafiire
48001002	n'abanyaruganda boona abari hamwe naanye , twabahandiikira , imwe ebigombe by'abaikiriza ab'omuri Galatiya .
48001003	Nitubendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Taata na Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo ,
48001004	owaayehaireyo ahabw'ebibi byaitu , kutwiha omu buhuuku bw'obusingye obu obubi , nk'oku Ruhanga Tataitwe yaasiimire ,
48001005	Ruhanga ogwo ahimbisibwe ebiro byona . Amiina .
48001006	Ni kintangaaza oku murahukire kutsigaho ogwo owaabeeteise embabazi za Kristo , mukaikiriza agandi Makuru Marungi agatari go .
48001007	Tikwo kugira ngu hariho agandi Makuru Marungi , kwonka hariho abarikubarabanisamu , nibenda kukiikamya Amakuru Marungi ga Kristo .
48001008	Manya nobu yaakuba itwe , nari maraika orugire omu iguru , yaabarangirira Amakuru Marungi agatari agu twabarangiriire , akyeenwe !
48001009	Nk'oku twabagambiire bwabiso , na hati nikwo ndikugaruka kukigamba nti : Ku harigira owaabarangirira Amakuru Marungi gatari ago agu mwaikiriize , akyeenwe !
48001010	Beitu shi nyowe niinyenda kusiimwa abantu , nari Ruhanga ? Nainga shi ninteeraho kugwisa gye abantu ? Manya kuri naabaire ninkigwisa gye abantu , tinkubaire muhuuku wa Kristo .
48001011	Beene Taata , niinyenda ku mumanya ngu Amakuru Marungi agu naarangiriire , tigarakomookire mu bantu .
48001012	Ahabw'okuba tindagaihire ha muntu weena , nari okugeegyesibwa , kureka nkagashuuruurirwa Yesu Kristo .
48001013	Manya mukahurira eby'amagara gangye agaabandize nkiri omu diini y'Ekiyudaaya ; oku naahiiganiise n'amaani ekigombe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga , nkateeraho kukihwerekyereza ,
48001014	n'oku naayeyongyeire munonga omu by'ediini y'Ekiyudaaya , nkabikiza baingi ab'ekingano kyangye omu b'eihanga ryangye , nyiniire emigyenzo ya baatatenkuru omuhimbo muhango .
48001015	Kwonka Ruhanga owanshoroire ntakazairwe , akaanyeta ahabw'embabazi ze ,
48001016	ku yaasiimire kunshuuruurira Omwana we , ngu mbone kumurangirira omu Banyamahanga , tindeehanwize ha bantu nyabuntu ,
48001017	nobu kwakuba okwinamuka Yerusalemu kwehanuuza aha bambandiize kuba entumwa , kureka nkaza Buharabu ; na bwanyima naagaruka Damasiko .
48001018	Ku haahingwireho emyaka eshatu , nainamuka Yerusalemu kureeba Keefa , naaguma nawe okumara ebiro ikumi na bitaano .
48001019	Kandi tindareebire n'omwe aha zindi ntumwa , kureka Yakobo murumuna wa Mukama .
48001020	Ebyo ebi naabahandiikira , nindahira Ruhanga orikundeeba , ku ntarikubeiha !
48001021	Bwanyima nkaza omu byanga bya Siriya na Kilikiya .
48001022	Haza obwo nkaba ntakamanyirwe bigombe by'abaikiriza Kristo ab'omuri Buyudaaya oku ndikushusha .
48001023	Bakaba bahurira kwonka abarikugira bati : Owaabaire atuhiiganisa , hati naarangirira enyikiriza ei yaagyerizeho buri kucwekyereza .
48001024	Batyo baahimbisa Ruhanga ahabwangye .
48002001	Bwanyima ku haahingwireho emyaka ikumi n'ena , naagaruka nainamuka Yerusalemu na Barinaba , naatwara na Tito .
48002002	Okwo nkazayo ahabw'okushuuruurirwa Ruhanga ngu nzeyo . Naashoboororera omu mubonano abaabaire bari abanyamaziina , eby'Amakuru Marungi agu ndangirira Abanyamahanga , ngu ntakaaba nk'orikwirukira busha , nari owairukiire busha .
48002003	Nangwa na Tito , ou naagyenzire nawe , nobu araabe yaabaire ari Omuguriiki , tibaramugyemesereize kusharwa .
48002004	Kwonka eky'okusharwa kikareetwa beene waitu ab'ebishuba , abaareetsirwe omuriitwe bwesherekye , bakatutaahamu kukyenguuza eby'obusingye bwaitu obu twine omuri Kristo Yesu , ngu batugarure omu buhuuku .
48002005	Beene waitu abo tituraikirizaine nabo , nangwa n'akaanya kakye , ngu amazima g'Amakuru Marungi gabone kurindwa ahabwanyu gatahindukire .
48002006	Kandi abo abaabaire nibagambwa ku bari abanyamaziina , tibaine ki baanyongyeireho - - manya bo okuba batyo tikwine ki kunkwatiire , ahabw'okuba Ruhanga tashoroora .
48002007	Nangwa bakeetegyereza ku nyowe naakwatsiibwe kurangirira abatashazirwe Amakuru Marungi , nk'oku Petero yaakwatsiibwe kugarangirira abashazirwe .
48002008	Manya owaabaasiise Petero kuba entumwa aha bashazirwe , niwe yambaasiise kuba entumwa aha Banyamahanga .
48002009	Mpaho Yakobo na Keefa na Yohaana , abaabaire nibamanywa ku bari enyomyo , ku baashoboorokyeirwe omugisha ogu naahairwe , nyowe na Barinaba , baatuha engaro , kuhamya ku bakwataniise naitwe , ngu itwe tuze omu Banyamahanga , nabo baze omu bashazirwe .
48002010	Kureka eki baatwehanangiriize n'okwijuka abooro , kandi naanye ekyo nikyo naabaire ntaho omutima kukora .
48002011	Kwonka Keefa ku yaahikire Antiokiya , naamuhakanisa nitureebana , ahabw'okuba akareebeka butunu ashobize .
48002012	Manya , abaatumirwe Yakobo obu baabaire batakaizire , akaba arya n'Abanyamahanga . Kwonka ku baizire , yaayehinya , yaabeecwaho , ahabw'okutiina ab'ekigombe ky'abashazirwe .
48002013	N'Abayudaaya abandi baatooreza oburyarya bwe ; nangwa na Barinaba yaatwarirwa omuri obwo buryarya bwabo .
48002014	Kwonka ku naareebire emitwarize yaabo etarikugyendera ha mazima g'Amakuru Marungi , naagambira Petero omu maisho gaabo boona , nti : Beitu iwe Omuyudaaya , ka nootwaza nk'Abanyamahanga , kutari nk'Abayudaaya . Mbwenu noobaasa ota kugyemesereza Abanyamahanga kutwaza nk'Abayudaaya ?
48002015	Itwe nobu turaabe turi Abayudaaya enzaarwa , abatari Banyamahanga abasiisi ,
48002016	kwonka nitumanya ku omuntu ataheebwa kuhikiirira ahabw'okuhitsya emigyenzo y'eiteeka , kureka ahabw'okwikiriza Yesu Kristo . Nangwa naitwe tukaikiriza Kristo Yesu , ngu tubone kuheebwa Ruhanga okuhikiirira ahabw'okwikiriza Yesu ogwo , kutari habw'okukora emigyenzo y'eiteeka . Manya tihariho muntu n'omwe oriheebwa okuhikiirira ahabw'okukora emigyenzo y'eiteeka .
48002017	Mbwenu itwe , ku turaabe tuteeraho kutungira okuhikiirira omuri Kristo , tukashangwa turi abasiisi , nikwo kugira ngu Kristo naakwatsiza ekibi ? Nikikabure !
48002018	Kwonka ku ndaabe ningaruka kwombeka ebi naasheenyire , biri niinyeyoreka ku ndi enshobya .
48002019	Ahabw'okuba nyowe ahabw'eiteeka nkaba ofiire aha iteeka , ngu mbone kuba ohuriire ahari Ruhanga .
48002020	Nyowe nkabambwa hamwe na Kristo . Ndiho , ntakiri nyowe ori , kureka Kristo niwe ari omuriinye ; n'amagara agu nyine hati omu mubiri , ngaine ahabw'okwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga owankunzire , akeehayo ahabwangye .
48002021	Nyowe tindikuhindura busha embabazi za Ruhanga . Manya okuhikiirira kuri kwabaire nikureetwa eiteeka , Kristo akaafeereire busha .
48003001	Imwe Bagalatiya ' mwe , abashema ! N'oha owaabarogire ? Imwe abaayorekirwe butunu Yesu Kristo abambirwe aha musharaba !
48003002	Ka mbabuuze eki kyonka , nti : Mukaheebwa Mutima ahabw'okuhikiiriza eiteeka , nari ahabw'okuhurira Amakuru Marungi mukaikiriza ?
48003003	Biri kwo muri abshema ? Mukatandika na Mutima , mbwenu mwahereeruka n'omubiri ?
48003004	Bingi bityo ebi mwarabiremu bikaba ebya busha ? Buzimazima tikwo kiri .
48003005	Ruhanga ku abaha Mutima , akorera omuriimwe eby'okutangaaza . Mbwenu shi ebyo abikora ahabw'okuba ngu nimuhitsya eby'omu iteeka , nari ahabw'okuhurira Amakuru Marungi mukaikiriza ?
48003006	Na Aburahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga , kyamubarirwa kuba okuhikiirira .
48003007	N'ahabw'ekyo mumanye ngu abaikiriza nibo baba abaana ba Aburahamu .
48003008	N'ebyahandiikirwe , ku byarangize ngu Abanyamahanga nabo Ruhanga aryabaha okuhikiirira ahabw'okwikiriza , byarangirira Aburahamu Amakuru Marungi bukiri kare , nibigira biti : Omuriiwe amahanga goona garyaheebwa omugisha .
48003009	N'ahabw'ekyo , abaine okwikiriza baheebwa omugisha hamwe na Aburahamu owaikiriize .
48003010	Manya boona abeesiga okukora eby'omu iteeka batuura omu mukyeeno , ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa kiti : Omuntu weena otarikuguma naakuratira byona ebyahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'eiteeka , akabihitsya , akyeenwe !
48003011	N'ahabw'ekyo nikyetegyerezibwa ku hatariho muntu oheebwa Ruhanga okuhikiirira ahabw'eiteeka ; ahabw'okuba ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Ohikiriire ahabw'okwikiriza aryagira amagara .
48003012	Kwonka eiteeka tirikomooka mu kwikiriza , ahabw'okuba ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Orikuhitsya eby'eiteeka biryamuhaisa amagara .
48003013	Kristo akatucungura omu mukyeeno gw'eiteeka obu yaakyeenwa ahabwaitu , ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa kiti : Weena orihanikwa aha muti , akyeenwe .
48003014	Ekyo kikakorwa kityo , ngu omugisha ogu Ruhanga yaaraganiise Aburahamu guheebwe niguruga omuri Kristo Yesu , ngu naitwe ahabw'okwikiriza tubone kutunga Mutima ou Ruhanga yaaraganiise .
48003015	Banyaruganda , ka mbahe eky'okureeberaho eky'omu bantu . Tihariho oihaho okuraga kw'omuntu , nari okukwongyeraho kwaherize kuhamibwa .
48003016	Mbwenu ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise , akabiraganisa Aburahamu n'omwijukuru . Tikirikugira ngu , n'abaijukuru , oti ni baingi ; kureka nikigamba ahari omwe , kiti : Na mwijukuru waawe , kandi ogwo niwe Kristo .
48003017	Eki ndikumanyisa nikyo eki : Eiteeka eryatairweho haahingwireho emyaka magana ana na makumi ashatu , tiriihaho ndaagano ei Ruhanga yaahamize bwa biso , ngu ribone kuhindura busha ekyaraganisiibwe .
48003018	Ahabw'okuba obuhunguzi kuri bubaho ahabw'eiteeka , tibukaabaho habw'okuraganisa ; kwonka Ruhanga akabuheera Aburahamu omu kuraganisa .
48003019	Mbwenu shi eiteeka rikateerwaho ki ? Rikongyerwaho ahabw'okworeka oku okushiisha kuri , okuhitsya obu omwijukuru owaakoreirwe egyo ndagaano ariija . Kandi rikarabibwa ahari baamaraika , ryahika omu mikono y'omuteeranizi .
48003020	Haza omuteeranizi taba w'omwe , kwonka Ruhanga aba omwe .
48003021	Mbwenu shi eiteeka nirihakanisa ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise ? Nikikabure ! Ahabw'okuba eiteeka kuri ryahairwe , ngu niribaasa kuhaisa amagara , okuhikiirira kukaabaireho ahabw'eiteeka .
48003022	Kwonka Ebyahandiikirwe nibihamya ku ebintu byona biri omu buhuuku bw'ekibi , ngu ekyaraganisiibwe ahabw'okwikiriza Yesu Kristo kibone kuheebwa abarikwikiriza .
48003023	Manya okwikiriza obu kwabaire kutakaizire , tukaba nitutegyekwa eiteeka nitukumwakumwa , tutegyereize okwikiriza okwabaire nikwija kushuuruurwa .
48003024	N'ahabw'ekyo eiteeka rikaba riri omworozi waitu okuhitsya obu Kristo yaizire , ngu okwikiriza kubone kutuhaisa okuhikiirira .
48003025	Mbwenu obu okwikiriza kwaizire , titwakitegyekwa ogwo mworozi .
48003026	Manya ahabw'okwikiriza Kristo Yesu , mwena muri abaana ba Ruhanga .
48003027	Eego , boona omuriimwe abaabatiziibwe kuba na Kristo , mukajwekwa Kristo ogwo .
48003028	Tihaakiriho Muyudaaya nari Omuguriiki ; tihaakiriho muhuuku nari ow'obusingye ; tihaakiriho mushaija nari omukazi ; ahabw'okuba mwena muri bamwe omuri Kristo Yesu .
48003029	Reero ku muraabe muri aba Kristo , biri muri baijukuru ba Aburahamu , abahunguzi nk'oku kyaraganisiibwe .
48004001	Ningira ngu omuhunguzi , ku aba akiri muto , taine ki akiza omuhuuku , nobu araabe aba ari mukama w'ebintu byona .
48004002	Kureka aguma naategyekwa aboorozi n'abakuza , okuhitsya obu obunaku obwatairweho ishe buhika .
48004003	Naitwe nikwo kiri . Obu twabaire tukiri abaana bato , tukaba turi abahuuku b'ebihangwagashani .
48004004	Kwonka obunaku ku bwahikiire kimwe , Ruhanga yaatuma Omwana we owaazairwe omukazi , kandi owaabaire naategyekwa eiteeka ry'Abayudaaya .
48004005	Ogwo Mwana akaija kucungura abaabaire nibategyekwa eiteeka , ngu tubone kuhindurwa abaana ba Ruhanga .
48004006	Okuhamya ku muri abaana , Ruhanga akoohereza Mutima w'Omwana we omu mitima yaitu , orikweteramu ati : Abba ! Taata !
48004007	N'ahabw'ekyo tokiri muhuuku , kureka omwana . Kandi nk'oku ori omwana wa Ruhanga , nawe naija kukuha ebi abiikira abaana be .
48004008	Ira , obu mwabaire mutarikumanya Ruhanga , mukaba muri abahuuku b'ebitari baaruhanga omu buhangwa .
48004009	Kwonka mbwenu nk'oku mwamanyire Ruhanga , nari shi nk'oku mwamanyirwe Ruhanga , nimubaasa muta kugarukira ebihangwagashani , ebitagira maani kandi ebinaku , ebi murikwenda ngu bigarukye bibahindure abahuuku baabyo ?
48004010	Reeba , nimugyenza ebiro n'ameezi n'obunaku n'emyaka .
48004011	Nintiina nti shana ebi naabakoreire , nkaaba naahendekyeire busha .
48004012	Banyaruganda , nimbeeshengyereza , mube nkaanye , ahabw'okuba naanye mbaire nkaimwe . Timwine ki mwanyitsize .
48004013	Nimwijuka ku omu kubanza , okurwara kwangye nikwo kwampaisize omugisha gw'okubarangirira Amakuru Marungi .
48004014	Nobu egyo ndwara yangye yaabagangize timurangayire , nobu kwakuba okunnuga ; kureka mukaanyakiira nka maraika wa Ruhanga , nari nka Kristo Yesu .
48004015	Mbwenu okushemererwa ku mwagizire obwo , kukaitira hi ! Ahabw'okuba nimbahamiza nti , kuri kyabaire nikibaasika , mukaayeihiremu amaisho gaanyu mugampa .
48004016	Mbwenu shi mpindukire omuzigu waanyu ahabw'okubagambira amazima ?
48004017	Abo bantu nibabeekundisa , kutari kubendeza birungi . Nibenda kubantaanisaho , ngu naimwe mubakunde .
48004018	Ni kirungi obutoosha imwe okukundwa abandi bantu , baaba nibabakundira ebirungi , kitari bu ndi hamwe naimwe bwonka .
48004019	Baana bangye abakundwa , abu ndikugaruka kugirira obusaasi nk'obw'omukazi orikurumwa , okuhitsya obu Kristo aritondwa omuriimwe !
48004020	Nkaayenzire kuba hamwe naimwe obwa hati , nkahindura emigambire yangye , ahabw'okuba munshobeire .
48004021	Imwe abarikwenda kutegyekwa eiteeka , nimungambire : Timuhurira eki eiteeka ririkugamba ?
48004022	Manya kikahandiikwa , ngu Aburahamu akaba aine abatabani babiri : omwe w'omuzaana n'ondi ow'omukazi nyaiteeka .
48004023	Kwonka omutabani ow'omuzaana akazaarwa omu buntu , haza omutabani ow'omukazi nyaiteeka yaazaarwa ahabw'okuraganisibwa .
48004024	Mbwenu ekyo ni nk'enfumu : abo bakazi nibamanyisa endagaano ibiri . Emwe ekaruga aha Rushozi Sinai : yaazaarira obuhuuku , niwe Hagari .
48004025	Hagari ogwo niwe Rushozi Sinai oruri Buharabu . Naashushanisibwa na Yerusalemu eriho obwa hati , ahabw'okuba ari omu buhuuku n'abaana be .
48004026	Kwonka Yerusalemu ey'omu iguru niwe mukazi nyaiteeka , kandi niwe maaweitwe .
48004027	Ahabw'okuba kikahandiikwa kiti : Shemererwa , iwe ngumba ' we etazaara ! Yamuza , oteere akaari , iwe otakarumwaga ! Ahabw'okuba omukazi otsigirweho aine abaana baingi okukira omukazi oine iba .
48004028	Mbwenu , banyaruganda , itwe turi abaana abaaraganisiibwe nka Isaaka .
48004029	Kandi nk'oku omu bunaku obwo owaazairwe omu buntu yaahiiganiise owaazairwe ahabwa Mutima wa Ruhanga , na mbwenu nikwo kiri .
48004030	Kwonka ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kita ? Nikigira kiti : Binga omuzaana n'omutabani , ahabw'okuba mutabani w'omuzaana tarihungura na mutabani w'omukazi nyaiteeka .
48004031	N'ahabw'ekyo , banyaruganda , tituri baana b'omuzaana , kureka ab'omukazi nyaiteeka .
48005001	Kristo akatwiha omu buhuuku ngu tugire obusingye ; n'ahabw'ekyo muhame , murekye kugaruka omu nkomo y'obuhuuku .
48005002	Mbwenu , nyowe Paulo , nimbagambira nti : ku muraasharwe , Kristo naaba atakibainiire mugasho .
48005003	Ningaruka kuhamiza omuntu weena oikiriza kusharwa , ku aba ow'okuhitsya eby'omu iteeka byona .
48005004	Imwe abarikwenda kuheebwa okuhikiirira ahabw'eiteeka , mwecwire ahari Kristo mwagwa , mwateishuka embabazi za Ruhanga .
48005005	Kwonka itwe , Mutima niwe atubaasisa kugira amatsiko g'okuheebwa okuhikiirira ahabw'okwikiriza .
48005006	Manya ku tuba turi omuri Kristo Yesu , okusharwa nari okutasharwa ti kintu , kureka okwikiriza okurikukoresibwa rukundo .
48005007	Ka mwabaire nimugyenda gye ! Mbwenu n'oha owaabazibiire kworobera amazima ?
48005008	Okwo kwikiriza kubeihwabeihwa tikurarugire hari ogwo owaabeetsire .
48005009	Ekitumbisa kikye kitumbisa eisyanga ryona .
48005010	Nimbeesiga omuri Mukama , ngu nimwija kugira ebiteekateeko nk'ebyangye . Kwonka ogwo orikubarabanisamu aryayereetera okusingwa orubanja , nobu yaakuba ari oha .
48005011	Mbwenu , banyaruganda , ku ndaabe ninkirangirira eby'okusharwa , ahabw'enki nimpiiganisibwa ? Nikwo kugira ngu obwo enkongi y'omusharaba neeba eihirweho .
48005012	Nkaahenwa ki abo abarikubarabanisamu beeshahurira kimwe !
48005013	Mbwenu banyaruganda , mukeeterwa obugabe ; kwonka obwo bugabe bwanyu mutabuhindura orwekwatso rw'okukora eby'okwetenga kw'omubiri , kureka mugume muheerezane nimukundana .
48005014	Manya eiteeka ryona rihikiiririzibwa omu kigambo kimwe eki : Kunda mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda .
48005015	Kwonka ku muraabe nimurumana , kandi nimushonshomerana , mwerinde mutamaranaho .
48005016	Nimbagambira nti : Mugume mugyende nimwebemberwa Mutima , haza obwo nibwo mutarihaazya ebyetengwa omubiri .
48005017	Ahabw'okuba ebi omubiri gwetenga birwanisa Mutima ; n'ebi Mutima ayenda birwanisa omubiri . Manya byombi birwanisana , ngu mutakaakora ebi murikwenda .
48005018	Kwonka ku muba mwebembeirwe Mutima , muba mutarikutegyekwa iteeka .
48005019	Mbwenu ebikorwa omubiri nibimanywa : obushambani n'ebikwatiraine nabwo , okurya enshoni ,
48005020	okuramya emandwa , okuroga , obuzigu , okurwana , eihari , ekiniga , okuharikana , okwebaganisamu , okugwera orubaju ,
48005021	eitima , obusinzi , enkyeera , n'ebiri nk'ebyo . Nimbahuguura , nk'oku naabahugwire kare , ku abakora ebiri nk'ebyo batariheebwa bukama bwa Ruhanga .
48005022	Kwonka ebigirwa abaine Mutima n'ebi : okukunda , okushemererwa , obusingye , okugumisiriza , embabazi , oburungi , obwesigwa ,
48005023	obucureezi , okwebarira . Haza ebiri nk'ebyo tihariho iteeka eririkubihakanisa .
48005024	Kandi aba Kristo Yesu bakabamba omubiri gwabo aha musharaba n'okwetenga kwagwo okubi n'amairu gaagwo .
48005025	Mutima ku araabe niwe atubaisaho , ka tugume tugyende atwebembeire .
48005026	Turekye kwetunguura n'okugwisana kubi , nari okugirirana eihari .
48006001	Banyaruganda , omuntu ku yaakushangwa akozire ekibi nanka , imwe aba Mutima , mumuhane n'omutima gw'obucureezi . Buri omwe omuriimwe ayerinde ; manya naiwe noobaasa kwohibwa otyo .
48006002	Mubangirane emitwaro yaanyu , mubone kuhikiiriza mutyo eiteeka rya Kristo .
48006003	Ahabw'okuba omuntu weena oyeteekateekaho kuba ekintu , haza ataine oku ari , aba naayebeiha .
48006004	Ka buri omwe ashwijume emitwarize ye , haza ku araayereebemu ekirikumwehimbisisa , kibe eky'omuriwe wenka , kitari ky'omuri mutaahi we .
48006005	Manya buri muntu aryayekorera omutwaro gwe wenka .
48006006	Weena orikwegyesibwa ekigambo kya Ruhanga , k'abagane ebirungi byona n'orikumwegyesa .
48006007	Muteebeiha , Ruhanga tagaaniizibwa ; manya eki omuntu abiba , nikyo agyesha .
48006008	Ahabw'okuba orikubibira omu mubiri gwe , ogwo mubiri aryagugyeshamu okujunda . Kwonka orikubibira omuri Mutima , aryagyeshera omuri Mutima amagara agatahwaho .
48006009	Mbwenu ka turekye kuruha nitukora ebirungi , ahabw'okuba obunaku ku burihika turyagyesha , twaba tuteehwaire matsiko .
48006010	N'ahabw'ekyo nu nk'oku tukiine omwanya , ka tukorere abantu boona ebirungi , na munonga ab'oruganda rw'abaikiriza .
48006011	Nimureebe oku naabahandiikira omu nyuguta mpango n'omukono gwangye ,
48006012	Manya abarikwenda kurangaanwa omu by'omubiri , nibo barikubagyemesereza kusharwa ahabwa kimwe kyonka , ngu batakaahiiganisibwa nibaturwa omusharaba gwa Kristo .
48006013	Nangwa n'abasharwa nabo tibahitsya by'omu iteeka , kwonka benda ngu musharwe , babone kwesiima ahabw'emibiri yaanyu .
48006014	Kwonka nikikabure ! nyowe kugira ekirikuunyehimbisa , kureka omusharaba gwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo ogwareeteire ensi kubambwa ahariinye , naanye nkagibambwaho .
48006015	Ahabw'okuba okusharwa nari okutasharwa ti kintu , kureka okuba ekihangirwe ekisya .
48006016	Obusingye n'embabazi bibe ahari boona abaraakuratire eki naabahabura , kandi n'aha Baisiraeli aba Ruhanga .
48006017	Okwiha hati hatarigira owanganzya ; ahabw'okuba ntuura nyine enkojo za Yesu aha mubiri gwangye .
48006018	Banyaruganda , embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe . Amiina .
49001001	Nyowe Paulo , ou Ruhanga yaasiimire kuba entumwa ya Kristo Yesu , nimpandiikira abarikwera kandi abeesigwa omuri Kristo Yesu , abari omuri Efeso .
49001002	Nimbendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe na Mukama Yesu Kristo .
49001003	Ruhanga Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , owaatuheeraire emigisha omuri Kristo , akatuha ebirungi byona ebya Mutima omu iguru , ahimbisibwe .
49001004	Ruhanga ogwo niwe yaatutooraniire omuri Kristo , ensi etakahangirwe , ngu tubone kuba abarikwera , kandi abataine kamogo omu maisho ge . Ahabw'okutukunda ,
49001005	akatutoorana tutakabaireho , ngu tuhindukye abaana be omuri Yesu Kristo , nk'enaama ye ei yaasiimire oku eri .
49001006	Ekyo akakikora ngu tubone kusiima embabazi ze ez'ekitiinwa , ezi yaatugambiriire omu Mwana we ogwo ou akunda .
49001007	Omuri Kristo nimwo tucungurirwa ahabw'okufa kwe , tukasaasirwa ebibi byaitu , nk'embabazi za Ruhanga enyingi munonga ,
49001008	ezi yaatugiriire oku ziri .
49001009	Manya omu bwengye bwona n'omu kwetegyereza , Ruhanga akatumanyisa eibanga ry'ebi ayenda , nk'enaama ei yaacumire kukorera omuri Kristo oku eri .
49001010	Niyo naama ey'okuteeranira omuri Kristo byona eby'omu iguru n'eby'omu nsi , obunaku bukihika , Kristo akaba omutwe gwabyo .
49001011	Omuri Kristo , nk'oku enaama za Ruhanga ohikiiriza byona n'okusiima kwe oku kuri ,
49001012	itwe abaabandize kugira amatsiko omuri Kristo , tukatooranwa kuguma nitusingiza ekitiinwa kye .
49001013	Omuriwe naimwe abaahuriire ekigambo ky'amazima , Amakuru Marungi g'okujunwa kwanyu , kandi mukaikiriza Kristo , mukateebwaho Ruhanga akamanyiso , mwahamibwa Mutima Orikwera owaaraganisiibwe .
49001014	Mutima ogwo niwe mukwato gw'ebi Ruhanga yaaturaganiise . Kandi ogwo mukwato gutuhamiza ku Ruhanga ariheera kimwe abe obugabe bwijwire , ekitiinwa kye kikabona kuhimbisibwa .
49001015	N'ahabw'ekyo ku naahuriire eby'okwikiriza kwanyu omuri Mukama Yesu , n'oku murikukunda abarikwera boona ,
49001016	tiinyosha kusiima Ruhanga ahabwanyu . Nimbaijuka omu kushaba kwangye ,
49001017	ngu Ruhanga wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , Tataitwe ow'ekitiinwa , abahe Mutima oraabatemu obwengye , akabashuuruurira Ruhanga ogwo , mukamumanya .
49001018	Ninshaba ngu emitima yaanyu emurikirwe , mubone kumanya amatsiko agu yaabeeteire , n'obwingi bw'emigisha ye ey'okutangaaza , ei yaaraganiise abantu be ,
49001019	n'oku amaani ge agataine bugarukiro gakorera omuriitwe abaikiriza . Ago maani nigo gamwe na gari
49001020	agu yaakoreise obu yaazoora Kristo omu bafiire , akamushutamya aha rubaju rwe rwa buryo omu iguru .
49001021	Okwo niyo Kristo ategyekyera ab'obushoboorozi n'ab'amaani n'ab'obugabe bwona ; naakirira kimwe amaziina goona ag'ab'obushoboorozi , omu busingye obu n'omu buriija .
49001022	Ruhanga akata ebintu byona ahansi y'ebigyere bya Kristo , yaamuhindura omutwe gwa byona eby'omu kigombe ky'abaikiriza .
49001023	Ekyo kigombe ky'abaikiriza nigwo mubiri gwa Kristo , ogu Ruhanga ahikiiririzamu kimwe boona na byona .
49002001	Kandi naimwe akabahindura abahuriire obu mwabaire mufeeraire omu bicumuro n'omu bibi byanyu .
49002002	Ebibi ebyo nibyo mwabaire mugyenderamu , nimukuratira emitwarize mibi y'ensi egi ; kandi nimutegyekwa mukama w'emitima ey'omu kaabunga . Nigwo mutima hati ogurikukorera omu barikugomera Ruhanga .
49002003	Naitwe twena ira tukaba nitubarirwa omuri abo bagomi , nitukuratira okwetenga okubi okw'omubiri gwaitu , nitukora ebi ogwo mubiri gurikwenda , kandi nitukuratira ebi gurikutwenza . N'ahabw'ekyo omu buhangwa tukaba turi ab'okufubirwa Ruhanga nk'abandi bantu .
49002004	Kwonka Ruhanga ogira embabazi nyingi , ahabwa rukundo mpango ei yaatukunzire ,
49002005	nobu turaabe twabaire tufeeraire omu bicumuro byaitu , akatuhindura abahuriire hamwe na Kristo Manya naimwe mukajunwa ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga .
49002006	Ahabw'okuteeranwa na Kristo Yesu , Ruhanga akatuzoora hamwe nawe , yaatushutamya hamwe nawe omu iguru .
49002007	Ekyo akakikora ngu omu busingye oburiija , ayorekyere embabazi ze enyingi ezishaagaine omuri rukundo ei yaatugiriire omuri Kristo Yesu .
49002008	Manya obu mwaikiriza , mukajunwa ahabw'embabazi za Ruhanga ; kutari imwe kukyekorera , kureka kiri engabirano ya Ruhanga ,
49002009	etaruga mu bi omuntu akozire , ngu hatakaagira owaayehimbisa .
49002010	Twena turi ebintu ebi Ruhanga yaakoreise emikono ye . Mbwenu omuri Kristo Yesu , Ruhanga akatuhanga ngu tukore ebirungi ebi yaatuteekateekyeire ira kuguma nitubikora .
49002011	N'ahabw'ekyo , imwe Banyamahanga ' mwe , omu buzaarwa , mwijukye ku abashazirwe aha mubiri n'engaro baabaire babeeta abatashazirwe .
49002012	Obwo mukaba mutaine Kristo , muri Abanyamahanga aha ihanga rya Isiraeli ; mutaine kakwate na ndagaano z'ebyaraganisiibwe , mutaine matsiko kandi omu nsi mutaine Ruhanga .
49002013	Kwonka hati ahabw'okuteeranwa na Kristo Yesu , imwe , ira abaabaire bari hare , okufa kwe kubairiize haihi .
49002014	Manya niwe busingye bwaitu , owaatuhindwire twembi : Abayudaaya n'Abanyamahanga kuba bamwe , akasheenyaho ekisiika ky'obuzigu ekyabaire kitutaaniise ,
49002015	akahayo omubiri gwe naihaho eiteeka eririmu ebiragiro n'ebyatairweho , ngu omuriwe abaabaire bari Abayudaaya n'Abanyamahanga abahangyemu eihanga rimwe erisya , areete atyo obusingye ;
49002016	kandi twembi atugarukanise na Ruhanga , turi omubiri gumwe ahabw'omusharaba , amareho atyo obuzigu .
49002017	Naimwe abaabaire bari hare , akaija yaabarangirira obusingye , yaaburangirira n'abaabaire bari haihi ;
49002018	ahabw'okuba twembi niwe atubaasisa kwehikira Taata omuri Mutima omwe .
49002019	N'ahabw'ekyo timwakiri Banyamahanga nari abahinguzi , kureka muri abatuuzi hamwe n'abarikwera , kandi ab'omuka ya Ruhanga .
49002020	Muri abombekirwe aha musingi gw'entumwa n'abarangi . Kristo nyakabara niwe ibaare rikuru ery'obuhamizo ,
49002021	ou ekyombeko kyona kiteeranirwamu , kikarugwamu Nyaruju erikwera omu Mukama ,
49002022	ou naimwe mwombekirwemu kuba obutaaho bwa Ruhanga omuri Mutima .
49003001	N'ahabw'ekyo nyowe Paulo , embohe ya Kristo Yesu , imwe Abanyamahanga , nimbashabira ahari Ruhanga .
49003002	Ningira ngu mukahurira oku naakwatsiibwe omurimo gw'embabazi za Ruhanga ahabwanyu ,
49003003	n'oku eibanga rye naarimanyiire omu kushuuruurirwa , nk'oku naabibahandiikiireho omu bigufu .
49003004	Ku muraabishome , nibwo muraashoboorokyerwe oku naayetegyereize eby'eibanga rya Kristo ,
49003005	eritaramanyisiibwe bantu b'obundi busingye , nk'oku hati Mutima arishuuruuriire abarikwera be entumwa n'abarangi .
49003006	Nikwo kugira ngu Abanyamahanga nabo n'abahunguzi hamwe naitwe , n'engingo z'omubiri gumwe , kandi abakwataniise naitwe omu bi Ruhanga yaaturaganisiize omuri Kristo Yesu , nibimanyisizibwa omu Makuru Marungi .
49003007	Naanye ahabw'ekiconco ky'emigisha ya Ruhanga ei naahairwe ahabw'amaani ge agaabaire nigakorera omuriinye , nkahindurwa , naaba omuheereza w'ago Makuru Marungi .
