49003008	Nyowe nobu ndaabe nimpereerukayo omu barikwera boona , kwonka nkaheebwa omugisha gw'okurangirira Abanyamahanga eby'obutungi bwa Kristo obuteetegyerezibwa ,
49003009	kandi n'okushoboororera boona oku enaama y'eibanga , eryasherekirwe okwiha ira ryona omuri Ruhanga owaahangire byona , eshemereire kuhikiirizibwa
49003010	ngu omu biro ebi , ab'obutegyeki n'ab'obushoboorozi ab'omu myanya y'omu iguru , babone kumanyisizibwa , omu kigombe ky'abaikiriza , eby'obwengye bwa Ruhanga obw'emiringo yoona .
49003011	Nk'oku Ruhanga yaakicumire okwiha ira ryona , akakihikiiririza omuri Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu ,
49003012	otuhaisa obumanzi n'obwesigye bw'okwehikira ahari Ruhanga ahabw'okumwikiriza .
49003013	N'ahabw'ekyo nimbashaba murekye kwehwa amatsiko ahabw'enaku ezi ndikureeba ahabwanyu , ahabw'okuba ekyo nikibahaisa ekitiinwa .
49003014	N'ahabw'ekyo nintsimbira Ruhanga Taata amaju ,
49003015	ou enganda zoona ez'omu iguru n'ez'omu nsi zeetererwa ,
49003016	nimmushaba ngu nk'obwingi bw'ekitiinwa kye oku buri , abahe okugumibwa amaani ga Mutima we ,
49003017	Kristo abone kutuura omu mitima yaanyu ahabw'okwikiriza . Ninshaba ngu mutsimbe emizi omuri rukundo mugihamiremu ,
49003018	haza mubone kwetegyereza hamwe n'abarikwera boona obuhango , n'oburaingwa , n'obwemi , n'obucuzi ebya rukundo ya Kristo .
49003019	Eego , ninshaba ku mumanya rukundo ye egyo erengire okumanya kwona , mubone kwijurizibwa kimwe okwijura kwona okwa Ruhanga okuhikire .
49003020	Ogwo obaasa kukora ebirikukirira kimwe ebi tushaba , nari ebi tuteekateeka , ahabw'amani ge agakorera omuriitwe ,
49003021	aheebwe ekitiinwa omu kigombe ky'abaikiriza , omu kuteeranwa kwaitu na Kristo Yesu , omu b'oruzaaro oru n'oruriguma nirukuratanaho ebiro n'ebiro . Amiina .
49004001	N'ahabw'ekyo , nyowe embohe ya Mukama , nimbeeshengyereza , mugire emitwarize eshemereire okwetwa oku mwayeeteirwe Ruhanga .
49004002	Mugume nimwebundika , nimwecureeza , nimugumisiriza , nimwehangaanirana omuri rukundo ,
49004003	nimwezirika kugumyaho obumwe bwa Mutima , mukwatanisiibwe obusingye .
49004004	Manya omubiri ni gumwe na Mutima n'omwe , nk'oku mwine amatsiko gamwe agu mwayeteirwe .
49004005	Mukama n'omwe , okwikiriza ni kumwe , okubatizibwa ni kumwe ;
49004006	Ruhanga n'omwe , kandi niwe Ishe wa boona , okira boona , okoresa byona , kandi ori omuri byona .
49004007	Kwonka kandi buri omwe omuriitwe akaheebwa ekiconco ky'omutaano , nk'oku Kristo yaamugyereire .
49004008	Nikyo ekyahandiikirwe kyagiriire kiti : Ku yaatembire omu iguru , yaatwara enkwatwa , yaaha abantu ebiconco .
49004009	Okugira ngu , akatemba , nikimanyisa ki ? Nikwo kugira ngu akabanza kushuuma okuzimu ?
49004010	Ogwo owaashuumire , niwe yaatembire , akatungamira eiguru ryona , ngu abone kwijuza ebintu byona .
49004011	Abamwe akabaha kuba entumwa , abandi kuba abarangi , abandi kuba abarangirizi b'Amakuru Marungi , abamwe kuba abariisa , n'abandi kuba abeegyesa .
49004012	Ekyo akakikora ngu abarikwera batebeekanisizibwe omurimo gw'obuheereza , haza babone kwombeka omubiri gwa Kristo .
49004013	N'ahabw'ekyo twena turyahika aha kugira obumwe omu kwikiriza n'okumanya Omwana wa Ruhanga , tukagate , tuhikye aha rugyero rwa Kristo oruhikire .
49004014	Reero turekyere aho kuba abaana barikuzongibwa oku n'oku , bakatwarwa buri muyaga gw'enyegyesa y'abantu enyabwengye , abababeihabeihesa obugobya n'oburyarya .
49004015	Kureka tugire emitwarize y'amazima erimu rukundo . Omuri byona tukurire omuri Kristo oba omutwe .
49004016	Kristo ogwo niwe areetera omubiri gwona kuteeranwa , gukakwatanisibwa engingo zaagwo ezi gwahairwe , buri rugingo rukiba nirukora gye omurimo gwarwo , rukareetera omubiri kukura , gukeeyombeka omuri rukundo .
49004017	Mbwenu eki ninkigamba kandi ninkihamya omuri Mukama nti : murekyere aho kugira emitwarize nk'ei Abanyamahanga bagira omu biteekateeko byabo ebitaine mugasho .
49004018	Obwengye bwabo butuura butimbire omwirima , bataine kakwate n'eby'amagara ga Ruhanga , ahabw'obutamanya obureetwa obugangaazi bw'emitima yaabo .
49004019	Tibakiine nshoni , bari nk'ebiti , baine omururu gw'okukora ebihagaro by'emiringo yoona .
49004020	Kwonka imwe , tikwo mwayegire mutyo Kristo .
49004021	Buzimazima mukamuhuriraho kandi nk'abe mukeegyesibwa amazima nk'oku gari omuri Yesu .
49004022	Mbwenu nu murekye entuura yaanyu ya kare , eyaasiisirwe okwetenga okurimu obugobya ,
49004023	reero emitima yaanyu n'ebiteekateeko byanyu bihindukye bisya .
49004024	Mugire entuura nsya , eyaahangirwe neeshusha Ruhanga , eri ehikiriire kandi erikwera omu mazima .
49004025	N'ahabw'ekyo murekye ebishuba ! Buri muntu agambe eby'amazima na mutaahi we . Manya turi engingo z'omubiri gumwe .
49004026	Ku haakugira ekyabaitsa ekiniga , mwerinde kirekye kubakoresa ekibi , eizooba rikarenga mukikiine .
49004027	Mutariha Sitaane obwiho .
49004028	Omushuma arekye kugaruka kwiba , haakiri akore n'amaani , naakoresa emikono ye ebihikire , haza abone kutunga eby'okuhwera abakyene .
49004029	Ekigambo kyona ekirikushiisha kitariruga omu kanwa kaanyu , kureka kibe ekirungi ekirikwombeka , ekirikuhikaana n'ebiriho , kibone kureetera abarikukihurira emigisha .
49004030	Kandi mutarigwisa kubi Mutima Orikwera wa Ruhanga , ahabw'okuba Mutima niwe kamanyiso akarikworeka ku muri aba Ruhanga , okuhitsya aha kiro ky'okucungurirwaho .
49004031	Obushaarire bwona n'ekiniga n'okuguubwa kubi n'okutongana n'okubeihererana n'eitima biihirwe kimwe omuriimwe .
49004032	Haakiri mube ab'embabazi , ab'esaasi , kandi musaasirane nk'oku Ruhanga yaabasaasiriire omuri Kristo .
49005001	N'ahabw'ekyo mutooreze ebya Ruhanga nk'abaana abakundwa ,
49005002	kandi mugire emitwarize erimu rukundo , nk'oku Kristo yaatukunzire , akeehayo ahabwaitu ahari Ruhanga , kuba empongano n'ekitambo ebirikutaamiranira Ruhanga omugaju .
49005003	Kwonka obushambani n'eby'enshoni byona , nari okwetenga okubi bitarigambwaho omuriimwe ; ahabw'okuba ebyo tibishemereire barikwera .
49005004	Hataribaho ebihagaro , nari okugaaniira eby'obushema , nainga okugambira eryo ebitahikire ; haakiri habeho okusiima Ruhanga .
49005005	Mumanyire kimwe ngu tihariho mushambani , nari orikukora eby'enshoni , nari orikururuuhira eby'ensi bikaba emandwa ye oine obuhunguzi omu bukama bwa Kristo kandi n'omu bwa Ruhanga .
49005006	Hatarigira owaababeihabeihesa ebigambo bitaine nsha , ahabw'okuba ebyo nibyo bireetera Ruhanga kugirira entahurira ekiniga .
49005007	N'ahabw'ekyo mutarikwatanisa nabo .
49005008	Manya ira mukaba muri ab'omwirima , kwonka hati muri ab'omushana ,
49005009	ahabw'okuba omushana gurugwamu oburungi bwona n'okuhikiirira n'amazima .
49005010	Muteereho kumanya ebigwisa gye Mukama .
49005011	Mutarikwatanisa n'ebikorerwa omu mwirima ebitaine mugasho , kureka mubyanikye butunu .
49005012	Manya n'eky'enshoni nangwa n'okugamba aha bi bakorera okwo omu mubonano .
49005013	Ekintu kyona ekyakirwa omushana kireebwa , ahabw'okuba kyona ekyakirwa omushana kikareebwa , kiba omushana .
49005014	Nikyo kigambirwa kiti : Sisiimuka , iwe ogwejegyeire , ozookye omu bafiire , Kristo akwakire .
49005015	N'ahabw'ekyo mwerinde emitwarize yaanyu , murekye kuba nk'abataine bwengye , kureka nk'abanyabwengye .
49005016	Mutafiisa busha omwanya , ahabw'okuba ebiro ebi ni bibi .
49005017	N'ahabw'ekyo mutaba abashema , kureka mumanye eki Mukama arikwenda .
49005018	Murekye kusinda viino erugwamu okuteezibira , kureka mwijure Mutima .
49005019	Mugaaniirirane eby'omu zaaburi ebirikwera , n'ebyeshongoro , n'ebigunjano ebibatairwemu Mutima ; obwo nimweshongorera Mukama , nimunihiiza amaraka n'omutima gwanyu gwona .
49005020	Ahabwa byona mugume musiime Ruhanga Taata omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
49005021	Mworoberane ahabw'okutiina Kristo .
49005022	Abakazi mugume mworobere baabaroimwe , nk'oku mworobera Mukama .
49005023	Manya omushaija aba omutwe gw'omukazi , nk'oku Kristo aba omutwe gw'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ; nigwo mubiri gwe , kandi we wenka niwe mujuni waakyo .
49005024	Nk'oku ekigombe ky'abaikiriza kyorobera Kristo , n'abakazi nikwo bashemereire kworobera baibabo .
49005025	Naimwe bashaija ' mwe , mukunde abakazi baanyu , nk'oku Kristo yaakunzire ekigombe ky'abaikiriza , akeehayo ahabwakyo .
49005026	Ekyo akakikora ngu abone kuhongyera Ruhanga ekyo kigombe , naakoresa ekigambo kye , yaaherize kuboneza ekyo kigombe naakyogyesa amaizi ,
49005027	ngu kibone kumumurikirwa kiine ekitiinwa , kitaine kabara , nobu gwakuba omufunya , nainga ekiri nk'ekyo ; ngu kibone kuba ekirikwera kandi ekitaine kamogo .
49005028	N'abashaija nikwo bashemereire kukunda abakazi baabo , nk'oku bakunda emibiri yaabo ahabwabo . Okunda omukazi we biri naayekunda .
49005029	Ahabw'okuba tihariho muntu orangire omubiri gwe ahabwe , kureka agugaburira , agucuma , nk'oku Kristo atwaza ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ;
49005030	manya turi engingo z'omubiri gwe .
49005031	Ekyahandiikirwe kigira kiti : Nikyo omushaija atsigiraho ishe na nyina , akahamira aha mukazi we , bombi bakaba omubiri gumwe .
49005032	Eri n'eibanga rikuru , eri nyowe ndikuhamya ku ririkumanyisa Kristo n'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza .
49005033	Mbwenu ka buri muntu akunde omukazi we nk'oku ayekunda , n'omukazi nawe k'agume atiine iba .
49006001	Abaana , muhurire abazaire baanyu omuri Mukama , ahabw'okuba kihikire .
49006002	Otiine sho na nyoko ; ekyo nikyo kiragiro ky'okubanza ekirimu ekyaraganisiibwe ,
49006003	ngu obone kuba gye n'okumereera omu nsi .
49006004	Imwe abazaire , murekye kugwisa kubi abaana baanyu , kureka muboorore nimubategyeka kandi nimubeegyesa ebya Mukama .
49006005	Abahuuku , mworobere bakama baanyu ab'omu nsi , nimutiina kandi nimutetema n'omutima gutaine buryarya , nk'abarikworobera Kristo .
49006006	Ekyo mukikore mutarikwenda kureebwa nari kusiimwa abantu , kureka nk'abahuuku ba Kristo , nimukora ebi Ruhanga arikusiima mwihire aha mutima .
49006007	Muheereze n'omutima murungi nk'abarikukorera Mukama , ti nk'abarikukorera abantu .
49006008	Nimumanya ngu ekirungi kyona eki omuntu akora , nikyo Mukama arimuzimuurira , yaaba ari omuhuuku nari ow'obusingye .
49006009	Naimwe bakama b'abahuuku , mube nikwo mwatwaza mutyo abahuuku baanyu mutarikubakangisa . Nimumanya Mukama waabo kandi owaanyu ku ari omu iguru , haza we ku atashoroora mu bantu .
49006010	Eky'aha muheru , mube abahamire omuri Mukama , muhamiibwe obushoboorozi bw'amaani ge .
49006011	Mwejunise eby'okurwanisa byona ebya Ruhanga , mubone kwemera obugobya bwa Sitaane .
49006012	Manya titurikurwanisa bantu nyabuntu , kureka niturwanisa amahe g'emitima mibi ey'omu kaabunga , ey'abakuru , ey'ab'obushoboorozi n'ey'abategyeki b'omuri egi nsi y'omwirima .
49006013	N'ahabw'ekyo mukwate eby'okurwanisa byona ebi muhairwe Ruhanga , mubone kugagungira aha izooba ribi , haza ku muriheza kukora byona , mwemerere muhamire .
49006014	Mpaho mwemerere mwezirikire amazima omu nda , mujwaire okuhikiirira aha kifuba nk'ekyoma ky'okwekingiza .
49006015	Mujware omu bigyere enkaito , mubone kwetebeekanisiza okurangirira Amakuru Marungi g'obusingye .
49006016	Okukira byona , mukwate engabo y'okwikiriza , eraababaasise kuraaza emyambi y'omuriro yoona ey'Omubi .
49006017	Kandi mujware enkofiira y'okujunwa , mukwaitse na rurara ya Mutima , nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga .
49006018	Obutoosha mugume mushabe nimweshengyereza Ruhanga kubahwera , kandi nimushabira omuri Mutima . N'ahabw'ekyo mugume nimureeba , nimugumizamu kushabira abarikwera boona .
49006019	Naanye munshabire , mbone kutunga eby'okugamba , kandi mbigambise obumanzi , nindangirira eibanga ry'Amakuru Marungi ,
49006020	agu ndi entumwa yaago ndi omu nkomo , mbone kugarangirira n'obumanzi , nk'oku kinshemereire .
49006021	Mbwenu ahabw'okwenda ngu mumanye oku ndi n'eki ndikukora , mwene waitu omukundwa Tukiko , kandi omuheereza omwesigwa omuri Mukama , aryabateekyerereza byona .
49006022	Nikyo naamubatumiraho ngu mumanye oku turi , kandi ngu abagarure omutima omunda .
49006023	Obusingye n'okukunda hamwe n'okwikiriza , ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Taata na Mukama Yesu Kristo , bibe aha banyaruganda boona .
49006024	Kandi boona abakunda Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo na rukundo etahararuka , Ruhanga abagirire embabazi .
50001001	Nyowe Paulo na Timoteeho , abaheereza ba Kristo Yesu , twabaramutsya abarikwera mwena omuri Kristo Yesu , abari Filipi hamwe n'abareeberezi n'abahwezi ,
50001002	nitubendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe na Mukama Yesu Kristo .
50001003	Ninsiima Ruhanga wangye ahi mbaijukira hoona ,
50001004	kandi omu kushaba kwangye kwona okw'obutoosha , mbashabira mwena nshemereirwe .
50001005	Manya okwiha aha kutandika n'okuhitsya hati , mutuura mukwataniise naanye omu by'okubuzya Amakuru Marungi .
50001006	Nimpamiza kimwe ku Ruhanga , owaatandikire omurimo murungi omuriimwe , ariguhikiiriza aha Kiro kya Yesu Kristo .
50001007	Nyowe kihikire okubateekateekaho ntyo mwena . Manya muntuura aha mutima ahabw'okuba mwena mukwatanisiza hamwe naanye omugisha gw'okuba embohe , n'okurwanirira Amakuru Marungi kandi n'okugahamya .
50001008	Ruhanga nandeeba ku ntarikubeiha naaba ningira nti : Mwena mbainiire orushusho , nimbakunda na rukundo erikuruga ahari Kristo Yesu .
50001009	Kandi ninshaba ngu rukundo yaanyu egume neekanyira omu kumanya n'omu kwetegyereza kwona ,
50001010	mubone kusiima ebirikukiraho oburungi . Haza aha Kiro kya Kristo mushangwe nimwera kandi mutaine kamogo ,
50001011	mwine emicwe mirungi ei Yesu Kristo wenka abaasa kubatungisa , mukahaisa Ruhanga ekitiinwa n'okumuhimbisisa .
50001012	Banyaruganda , niinyenda mumanye ku ebyambaireho , buzima kwo byareeteire Amakuru Marungi kwongyera kubuga .
50001013	Ekyo kikamanywa n'abaserukare boona abarikurinda ekikaari n'abandi boona , ku naabohirwe ninturwa okuba omuheereza wa Kristo .
50001014	Kandi abaingi omu banyaruganda , okubohwa kwangye okwo kukabareetera kuhamira omuri Mukama ; baayongyera kugira obumanzi bw'okugamba ekigambo kya Ruhanga batarikutiina .
50001015	N'ekya buzima , bamwe nibarangirira Kristo ahabw'eihari n'okutarirana , kwonka abandi bamurangirira n'omutima murungi .
50001016	Haza ekyo , banu bakikoresibwa rukundo , ahabw'okuba nibamanya ku Ruhanga yantaireho kurwanirira Amakuru Marungi .
50001017	Kwonka bari , Kristo bamurangirira n'omutima gurikurwanirira orubaju , batari b'amazima ; nibenda kuunyongyera obusaasi ndi omu nkomo .
50001018	Mbwenu ekindi ninfa ki ? Kristo ku yaakuba naarangirirwa omu buryo bwona , yaaba mu kwegiza , yaaba mu mazima , nyowe ka ninshemererwa .
50001019	Eego , kandi ndyashemererwa , ahabw'okuba nimmanya ngu ahabw'okushaba kwanyu n'ahabw'okuhwerwa Mutima wa Yesu Kristo , ndyarugaho mpikye aha kurekurwa .
50001020	Ekyo nikyo ntegyereize n'ekihika , kandi nyine amatsiko ku ntarikwitwa nshoni n'akakye , kureka nk'oku kiri hati kandi nk'oku kituura obutoosha , Kristo aryaguma naahimbisibwa n'obumanzi bwingi omu mubiri gwangye , yaaba mpuriire nari nfiire .
50001021	Manya ahariinye okubaho ni Kristo , kandi okufa nikungasira okukiraho .
50001022	Mbwenu ku kyakuba kiri okugumaho omu mubiri , ekyo kikandugiramu okukora emirimo y'omugasho . Kwonka aho ninshoberwa eki ndaatoorane .
50001023	Manya byombi nibinta omu kangakaizi . Nkaayenzire kuruga omu nsi kuza kuguma na Kristo , ahabw'okuba ekyo nikikirira kimwe ebindi .
50001024	Kwonka shi ahabwanyu nyowe okugumaho omuri ogu mubiri , nikyo kirikukira kwetengwa .
50001025	Mbwenu ekyo ninkihamya , kandi nimmanya ku ndikwija kugumaho , nkaguma naimwe mwena , haza mukongyerwaho okwikiriza , mukakushemerererwamu .
50001026	N'ahabw'ekyo ku ndiija owaanyu obundi , muryatunga eky'okwehimbisizaho omuri Kristo Yesu .
50001027	Kwonka hoona , k'emitwarize yaanyu ebe eshemereire Amakuru Marungi ga Kristo . Haza yaaba nyija okwo nkabareeba nari ntaija , mpurire ngu mwemereire muhamire n'omutima gumwe n'ebiteekateeko bimwe , nimukwatanisa ahabw'okuba mukaikiriza ago Makuru Marungi .
50001028	Mutarigira obu mutiinisiibwe abazigu baanyu . Ekyo nikiboorokyera kimwe ku bo barihwerekyerera , kwonka imwe mukajunwa ; haza ekyo kiryaruga ahari Ruhanga .
50001029	Manya timurahairwe mugisha gw'okwikiriza Kristo kwonka , kureka n'okubonabonesibwa ahabwe .
50001030	Mbwenu obwo nimurwana orugamba nk'oru mwandeebire nindwana , kandi n'oru murikuhurira ninkirwana na hati .
50002001	Amagara agu twine omuri Kristo ku garaabe nigatuteera omuhimbo , nigatwenegyezamu rukundo , nigatuha okukwatanisiza omuri Mutima , nigatureetera okukundana n'okugirirana esaasi ,
50002002	mbwenu nu muhikiirize okushemererwa kwangye , mwine ebiteekateeko bimwe , rukundo emwe , mukwatanisiize kimwe , kandi mwine omutima gumwe .
50002003	Mutarikora ekintu kyona nimutarirana nari nimwetunguura , kureka mwebundikye nimuteekateeka ahari bagyenzi baanyu nk'abarikubakira .
50002004	Omuntu weena arekye kuhugira aha bye wenka , kureka ayete n'aha by'abandi .
50002005	Mugire omutima nk'ogu Kristo yaabaire aine :
50002006	We n'obu araabe yaabaire ari omu rugyero rwa Ruhanga tarateekateekire okwingana kwe na Ruhanga ku kiri ekintu ky'okuhamiraho .
50002007	Kureka akeihaho ekitiinwa , yaaba nk'omuhuuku , yaazaarwa nk'abantu .
50002008	Kandi ku yaareebekire ari omuntu , yaayebundika , yaataho n'okworoba okwamureeteire kwemera okufa , nangwa akafeera n'aha musharaba .
50002009	Nikyo Ruhanga yaamutunguuriire munonga , akamuha eiziina ririkukira agandi goona ,
50002010	ngu boona ab'omu iguru n'ab'omu nsi n'ab'okuzimu ku baraahurire bati eiziina rya Yesu , batsimbe amaju ;
50002011	kandi ngu buri rurimi rwona rwature Yesu Kristo ku ari Mukama , kuhaisa Ruhanga Ishe ekitiinwa .
50002012	N'ahabw'ekyo , bagyenzi bangye abakundwa , nk'oku mwabaire mworoba obutoosha , na mbwenu mube nikwo mwahikiiriza okujunwa kwanyu nimutiina kandi nimutetema . Ti bu ndiho bwonka , kureka mukizeho munonga n'obu ntariho .
50002013	Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga niwe abatamu okukunda ebi asiima n'okubikora .
50002014	Mukore ebintu byona mutarikwetomboita , n'obu kwakuba okugira empaka .
50002015	Nibwo muriba abataine ky'okuhaahuuzibwa kandi abari mwere , muri abaana ba Ruhanga abataine kamogo , abatwire omu bantu b'obusingye obu , abakiikamire bakahaba . Imwe nimubaakiramu nk'enyonyoozi ezirikwakira ab'omu nsi .
50002016	Nimuhamira aha kigambo ky'amagara . Mpaho naanye aha izooba rya Kristo mbone kwesiima ku ntarairukangiire busha , n'obu kwakuba okuhendekyera busha .
50002017	Nangwa eshagama yangye n'obu yaakushukwa aha kitambo ekirikuhongwa , nikwo kwikiriza kwanyu , nkaananuka nshemererwa hamwe naimwe mwena .
50002018	Naimwe mushemererwe mutyo kandi mwesiime hamwe naanye .
50002019	Nyine amatsiko omuri Mukama Yesu kubatumaho Timoteeho juba , mbone kugarukwa omutima omunda , naamanya eby'owaanyu .
50002020	Manya tiinyine ondi ori nkawe , oraate munonga omutima aha byanyu .
50002021	Ahabw'okuba abandi boona bata omutima aha byabo bonka , bitari bya Yesu Kristo .
50002022	Kwonka omugasho gwa Timoteeho nimugumanya , ahabw'okuba omu by'Amakuru Marungi akaheereza hamwe naanye nk'oku omwana aheereza na ishe .
50002023	N'ahabw'ekyo nyine amatsiko g'okumwohereza ahonaaho naaheza kureeba oku birangyendere .
50002024	Kandi niinyesiga Mukama , ngu naanye ndyaija okwo juba .
50002025	Mbwenu ndeebire ku kinshemereire kubatumaho Epafuradiito , mwene waitu omukozi kandi omurwani mugyenzi wangye . We n'entumwa yaanyu onkorera eki ndikwetenga .
50002026	Manya atuura abainiire orushusho mwena , kandi kikamusaasa kumanya ngu mukahurira ku yaarwaire .
50002027	Kwokwo akarwara , yaabura hakye kufa , kwonka Ruhanga akamugirira embabazi . Haza tiwe yaazigiriire wenka , kureka naanye akazingirira , ngu obusaasi butakantembekyeranaho .
50002028	Nikyo ndikwongyerera kugira ekihika ky'okumubatumaho , ngu mubone kushemererwa ahabw'okugaruka kumureeba , kandi naanye ngarukwe omutima omunda .
50002029	N'ahabw'ekyo mumwakiire omuri Mukama n'okushemererwa kwingi . Abantu nk'abo mugume mubahe ekitiinwa .
50002030	Manya akaba arangariire kufa ahabw'omurimo gwa Kristo , naahayo amagara ge kuhikiiriza ebi mwakunkoreire .
50003001	Eky'aha muheru , beene Taata , mushemererwe omuri Mukama . Okugaruka kubahandiikira ebigambo bimwe na biri tikurikundusya , kandi nikubareetera okuhama .
50003002	Mwerinde embwa ! Mwerinde enkozi z'ebibi !
50003003	Manya niitwe bashare b'amazima , Mutima niwe atuhabura oku turaaramye Ruhanga . Okwehimbisa kwaitu kuba omuri Kristo Yesu . Titwesiga migyenzo y'aha mubiri .
50003004	Nangwa n'obu byakubaire eby'emigyenzo y'aha mubiri , nyowe tinkaagizire ki ndikutiina . Mbwenu ku kiraabe kiri eky'okwegamira emigyenzo y'aha mubiri , n'oha orikuginkiza ?
50003005	Nkasharwa aha izooba rya munaana , ndi ow'eihanga rya Isiraeli omu kuzaarwa , ow'oruganda rwa Benyamiini , Omuheburaayo nyakabara , Omufarisaayo omu by'okukuratira eiteeka ,
50003006	omu bweziriki nkahiiganisa ekigombe ky'abaikiriza , omu kuhikiirira kw'omu iteeka nkaba ntaine kacokore .
50003007	Kwonka ebyo ebyabaire biri eby'omugasho ahariinye nkabyeta ebifiire aha bwa Kristo .
50003008	Buzimazima nimbara ebintu byona kuba ebifiire ahabw'omugasho ogurikukirira kimwe , nigwo ogw'okumanya Kristo Yesu Mukama wangye . Ahabwe nyowe nkaikiriza kufeerwa ebintu byona naabyeta efa , ngu mbone kutunga Kristo
50003009	n'okuteeranirwa kimwe nawe . Kandi ngu nshangwe omuriwe ntaine kuhikiirira okwangye ahabwangye okwegamiire eiteeka , kureka okutungirwa omu kwikiriza Kristo . Nikwo kuhikiirira okuruga ahari Ruhanga okwegamira okwikiriza .
50003010	Eki ndikwenda n'okumanya Kristo , nkamanya n'amaani g'okuzooka kwe , nkakwatanisa nawe omu kubonabonesibwa , nkashushana nawe omu kufa kwe ;
50003011	kandi ku kiribaasika , mpikye n'aha kuzooka omu bafiire .
50003012	Tikwo kugira ngu ekyo naakitungire , nari ngu naahikiire kimwe ; kureka ningumizamu ngu nkitungye nk'oku naanye Kristo yantungire .
50003013	Banyaruganda , tindikugira ngu ekyo naakitungire , kureka eki ndikukora ni kimwe kyonka , niinyebwa ebindi enyima , ninkununkiriza ebindi omu maisho .
50003014	Ntyo ningumizamu kuhika aha kirikuhakanirwa , ngu mbone kutunga ekihembo ky'omu iguru , nigo magara agatahwaho , agu Ruhanga yaanyeteire omuri Kristo Yesu .
50003015	Mbwenu itwe , abaahamiire omu by'omutima , ekyo tukiteekateekyeho tutyo , kandi ku haraabe hariho ekindi eki murikuteekateekaho okundi , ekyo nakyo Ruhanga aryakibashuuruurira .
50003016	Kwonka eki twahikireho , ka tugumizemu nakyo .
50003017	Banyaruganda , muntooreze , kandi nk'oku turi eky'okureeberaho kyanyu , mwetegyereze abarikutwaza batyo .
50003018	Manya baingi abu naabagambiire kaingi , kandi abu ndikubagambira na hati ntaireho n'okurira , batuura bari ababisha b'omusharaba gwa Kristo .
50003019	Muheru yaabo n'okuhwerekyerera ; Ruhanga waabo n'enda , beehimbisiza omu birikubahemura , emitima bagimariire aha by'ensi .
50003020	Kwonka itwe owaitu n'omu iguru , ei tutegyereize omujuni Mukama Yesu Kristo kuruga ,
50003021	orihindura emibiri yaitu erikugaywa ekaba nk'ogwe ogw'ekitiinwa , naakoresa obushoboorozi obumubaasisa kwegomoororera ebintu byona .
50004001	N'ahabw'ekyo , banyaruganda , abu nkunda kandi abu nyiniire orushusho , okushemererwa kwangye kandi ekirunga kyangye , mwemerere muhamire mutyo omuri Mukama , imwe banyaruganda abakundwa .
50004002	Niinyeshengyereza Ewodiya , kandi niinyeshengyereza na Suntuke , ngu bagire omutima gumwe omuri Mukama .
50004003	Naiwe , omukozi mugyenzi wangye , ninkushaba ohwere abo bakazi , ahabw'okuba bakeehenenga munonga kubuzya Amakuru Marungi hamwe naanye , bakwataniise na Kelementi n'abandi bakozi bagyenzi bangye , abu amaziina gaabo gari omu kitabo kya Ruhanga eky'amagara .
50004004	Mushemererwe omuri Mukama obutoosha ; ningaruka kugira nti : mushemererwe !
50004005	Okugumisiririzana kwanyu kumanywe abantu boona ; manya Mukama ari haihi .
50004006	Mutaryamerereza omutima ekintu kyona , kureka omu buri kintu mugume mumanyise Ruhanga ebi murikwetenga , nimumushaba , nimumweshengyereza kandi nimumusiima .
50004007	Nibwo obusingye bwa Ruhanga oburengire okwetegyereza kwona , buraarindire emitima yaanyu n'ebiteekateeko byanyu omuri Kristo Yesu .
50004008	Eky'aha muheru , banyaruganda , byona eby'amazima , byona eby'ekitiinwa , byona ebihikire , byona ebishemeire , byona ebikundwa , byona ebisiimwa , ku haraabe hariho engyesho nungi , ku haraabe hariho ekishemereire kuhimbisibwa , ebyo mube nibyo mwaguma nimutaho omutima .
50004009	Ebi mwanyegireho , ebi mwantungireho , ebi mwampuriireho n'ebi mwandeebiremu mube nibyo mwaguma nimukora , kandi Ruhanga ow'obusingye aryaguma naimwe .
50004010	Ninshemererwa munonga omuri Mukama okureeba ngu murugireho mwagaruka kuunyetaho . N'ekya buzima mukaba nimuunyetaho ; kwonka mukaba mutakatungire mwanya .
50004011	Ti habw'okugira ngu ekyo ninkigambisibwa obukyene , ahabw'okuba nkeega okumarwa ebi nyine , n'obu naakuba ndi nta .
50004012	Mmanyiriire okutuubirwa , kandi mmanyiriire n'okutuubuukirwa . Omu buri kintu n'omu miringo yoona nyegire oburyo bw'okumarwa , yaaba hariho omweru , yaaba hariho enjara , yaaba nyine ebishaagire nari nkyenire .
50004013	Nimbaasa byona ndi omuri Kristo ompa amaani .
50004014	Kwonka mukakora gye kukwatanisa naanye omu busaasi bwangye .
50004015	Kandi , imwe Abafilipi , nimumanya ngu obu naatandika kurangirira Amakuru Marungi ninduga omu nsi yaanyu Makedoniya , tihariho kigombe ky'abaikiriza ekyakwataniise naanye omu by'okuha n'omu by'okuheebwa , kureka imwe mwenka .
50004016	Manya n'obu naabaire ndi Tesalonika , mukantwekyera eby'okumpwera , ti rimwe ryonka , kureka kabiri .
50004017	Ti kugira ngu nimbendaho ebiconco , kureka eki ndikwenda n'okureeba ngu ebi murikukora nibyongyera kubasiimisa .
50004018	Mbwenu hati mperize kutunga byona n'okukiraho ! Mpaagire ahabw'okuheebwa ebiconco ebi mwantwekyeire , bikareetwa Epafuradiito , bikaba omutoijo ogurikutaamirana omugaju , ekitambo ekirikusiimwa kandi ekirikugwisa gye Ruhanga .
50004019	Na Ruhanga wangye aryabamarira obukyene bwanyu bwona , nk'obutungi bwe oburikutangaaza oburi omuri Kristo Yesu oku buri .
50004020	Ruhanga waitu Tataitwe aheebwe ekitiinwa ebiro byona . Amiina .
50004021	Mundamukize abarikwera boona aba Kristo Yesu . Abanyaruganda abari hamwe naanye nibabaramutsya .
50004022	Abarikwera boona nibabaramutsya , munomuno ab'omu kikaari kya Kaisaari .
50004023	Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe .
51001001	Nyowe Paulo , ou Ruhanga yaasiimire kuba entumwa ya Kristo Yesu , hamwe na Timoteeho , omunyaruganda nitubaramutsya ,
51001002	imwe abarikwera , kandi beene waitu abeesigwa omuri Kristo abari Kolosai , nitubendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe .
51001003	Obutoosha ku tuba nitubashabira , tusiima Ruhanga Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
51001004	Manya tukahurira oku murikwikiriza Kristo Yesu , n'oku murikukunda abarikwera boona .
51001005	Haza ebyo byombi nimubireeterwa okugira amatsiko g'okutunga ebirungi ebibabiikiirwe omu iguru . Ago matsiko mukagahuriraho bwabiso omu kigambo ky'amazima , nigo Makuru Marungi .
51001006	Ago Makuru Marungi nigareeta emigisha kandi nigabuga omu nsi yoona , nk'oku naimwe gaababeeraire gatyo , okwiha aha izooba eri mwahuririireho embabazi za Ruhanga , mukazeetegyereza omu mazima .
51001007	Ebyo byona mukabyegyesibwa Epafura , omuheereza mugyenzi waitu omukundwa . Epafura ogwo n'omuheereza wa Kristo omwesigwa ahabwaitu ,
51001008	kandi niwe yaatugambiire ebya rukundo ei Mutima yaabatairemu .
51001009	N'ahabw'ekyo , okwiha obu twakihurira , titukooshaga kubashabira . Nitweshengyereza ngu mubone kumanyira kimwe ebi Ruhanga akunda , mwine obwengye bwona , kandi nimwetegyerezesibwa Mutima .
51001010	Nitubashabira kandi , ngu mugire emitwarize eshemereire Mukama , nimukora obutoosha ebirikumugwisa gye . Nibwo amagara gaanyu garibagasira nimukora eby'embabazi ebya ibara muringo , kandi nimweyongyera kumanya Ruhanga .
51001011	Nitubatengyera okuhamibwa amaani ga Ruhanga goona nk'oku obushoboorozi bwe obw'ekitiinwa buri , ngu mubone kwemera byona n'okubigumisiriza mushemereirwe .
51001012	Haza obwo nimusiima Taata owaabahindwire abashemereire kutunga omugabo hamwe n'abarikwera omu bukama bw'omushana .
51001013	Manya niwe yaatuzaahwire omu kutegyekwa omwirima , akatutaasya omu bukama bw'Omwana we omukundwa ,
51001014	ou tutungiramu okucungurwa n'okusaasirwa ebibi .
51001015	Yesu niwe kyeshusha kya Ruhanga otareebwa , omujigaijo gw'ebyahangirwe byona .
51001016	Manya omuriwe ebintu byona nimwo byahangiirwe , eby'omu iguru n'eby'omu nsi , ebireebwa n'ebitareebwa , yaaba baamaraika b'aha bitebe by'obugabe , yaaba bategyeki , yaaba bakama nari ab'obushoboorozi . Ebintu byona Ruhanga akabihangira omuriwe kandi ahabwe .
51001017	Niwe yaabaire ariho ebintu byona bitakabaireho ; kandi omuriwe ebintu byona nimwo biteeranira .
51001018	Niwe mutwe gw'omubiri , ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ; niwe ntandikiro , omujigaijo gw'abaazookire omu bafiire , ngu abone kuba ow'okubanza omuri byona .
51001019	Manya Ruhanga akasiima ngu obwaruhanga bwe bwona bube omuriwe ,
51001020	kandi ngu arabe omuriwe kwegarukanisiza ebintu byona , yaaba by'omu nsi nari eby'omu iguru ; naareeta obusingye ahabw'eshagama ei yaaseesire aha musharaba gwe .
51001021	Naimwe ira , mukaba mutaine na Ruhanga , kandi muri abazigu omu biteekateeko byanyu nimukora ebibi .
51001022	Kwonka mbwenu Ruhanga abeegarukanisiize omu mubiri gw'Omwana we , n'omu kufa kwe , ngu abone kubamurika omu maisho ge muri abarikwera , abataine kamogo , kandi abataine ky'okuhaahuuzwa .
51001023	Haza nikwo muriba mwaba mugumiizemu omu kwikiriza , muhamire kandi mutarikunyiganyiga , mutarikuruga ha matsiko g'Amakuru Marungi agu mwahuriire , agaarangiriirwe ebyahangirwe byona ebiri ahansi y'eiguru , agu naanye , Paulo , naahindukire omuheereza waago .
51001024	Hati ninshemererwa ahabw'okubonabona ahabwanyu , haza obwo nimpikiiriza omu mubiri gwangye ebibaire nibiburaho omu kubonabonesibwa kwa Kristo ahabw'omubiri gwe , nikyo kigombe ky'abaikiriza .
51001025	Ekyo kigombe nkahinduka omuheereza waakyo , nk'omurimo gwa Ruhanga ogu naahairwe ahabwanyu oku guri , ogw'okumanyisiza kimwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga .
51001026	Ekyo kigambo , niryo ibanga eryasherekirwe okwiha ira ryona n'obusingye bwona , kwonka hati eryorekirwe abarikwera be ,
51001027	abu Ruhanga yaatooraine kworeka oku eibanga eryo riri ery'ekitiinwa munonga omu Banyamahanga . Kandi eryo ibanga ni Kristo omuriimwe , oba amatsiko g'okuheebwa ekitiinwa !
51001028	Niwe turangirira nitwehanangiriza buri muntu weena , kandi nitwegyesa abantu obwengye bwona , ngu tubone kumurikira Ruhanga buri omwe yaaherize kuba ohamiire omuri Kristo .
51001029	Ekyo nikyo ndikwehenengyera niinyekaniika n'engoga zoona , ezi arikukoresa omuriinye n'amaani .
51002001	Mbwenu niinyenda ku mumanya oku ndikubeekaniikira munonga , imwe n'Abalaodikeya , n'abandi boona abatakandeebaga .
51002002	Ekyo ninkikora ngu emitima yaabo ebone kugumibwa , bakwatanisiize omuri rukundo , baheebwe obutungi bw'okwetegyerereza kimwe n'okumanya eibanga rya Ruhanga , niwe Kristo .
51002003	Omuriwe obutungi bwona obw'obwengye n'okumanya nimwo bwetindikire .
51002004	Ekyo naakigamba ngu hatakaagira owaababeihabeihesa ebigambo by'okweshwekyerera .
51002005	Manya nobu ndaabe ntabaine omu mubiri , kwonka ndi hamwe naimwe omu mutima , ninshemererwa kureeba oku mutebeekaine gye , n'oku muhamiire omu kwikiriza Kristo .
51002006	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku mwayakiire Kristo Yesu Mukama , mube nikwo mwaguma omuriwe ,
51002007	mutsimbire emizi kandi mwombekyeirwe omuriwe , muhamiire omu kwikiriza nk'oku mwayegyesiibwe , nimushaagaana omu kusiima .
51002008	Mwerinde hatakaagira owaababeihabeihesa ebigambo by'obwengye , n'oburyarya butarimu nsha , naakuratira emigyenzo y'abantu , nari ebihangwagashani by'omu nsi , kutari kukuratira Kristo .
51002009	Manya omuriwe , omu mubiri gwe , nimwo obwaruhanga bwona butuura .
51002010	Naimwe mukatungira omuriwe amagara gaijwire , ahabw'okuba niwe mutwe gw'abategyeki boona n'ab'obushoboorozi .
51002011	Kandi omuriwe mukasharwa okusharwa okutari kw'engaro , obu mwajuura omubiri gw'obuntu , nikwo kusharwa okwa Kristo .
51002012	Mukaziikwa hamwe nawe omu kubatizibwa , oku mwazookyeiremu hamwe nawe ahabw'okwikiriza ebi Ruhanga owaamuzoire omu bafiire , akora .
51002013	Naimwe abaabaire bafeeraire omu bibi , n'omu kutasharwa kw'omubiri gwanyu , Ruhanga akabahindura abahuriire hamwe nawe , yaaheza kutusaasira ebicumuro byaitu byona ,
51002014	n'okushushuraho ekihandiiko ekyabaire nikitwomesereza , n'eby'omu iteeka ebirikutwihuza . Ekyo kihandiiko akakiihaho , yaakibamba aha musharaba .
51002015	Kandi ahari ogwo musharaba , Kristo niho yaayakiire abategyeki n'ab'obushoboorozi ebikwato , akabashungisa butunu naabeesingurira we wenka .
51002016	N'ahabw'ekyo , hatarigira owaabacwera orubanja aha bikwatiraine n'ebyokurya n'ebyokunywa , nari ebikwatiraine n'ebiro by'amagyenyi , nainga okuboneka kw'okwezi nari Sabato .
51002017	Ebyo byona n'ekinyimanyimi ky'ebiriija , kwonka ekintu nyakabara ni Kristo .
51002018	Hataribaho abaabagira ngu timuhikire , ngu ahabw'okuba bo nibeecwendeeka kandi nibaramya baamaraika , nibeesiga eby'okworekwa , baine ebihagi bya busha , ebirikureetwa ebiteekateeko ky'obuntu .
51002019	Abantu nk'abo baba batakihamira hari Mutwe , oriisa omubiri gwona , akagukwatanisisa engingo zaagwo n'emitsi yaagwo , gukakura nigunyeetsibwa Ruhanga .
51002020	Ku muraabe mwafeeraire hamwe na Kristo aha bihangwagashani by'omu nsi , ahabw'enki nimutwaza nk'abakiri ab'ensi ? Ahabw'enki nimworobera ebiragiro ebirikugira biti :
51002021	Otakwataho ! Otarozaho ! Otakoraho !
51002022	Haza ebyo byona biri ebihwaho nibikoresibwa , mukakuratira ebyaragiirwe abantu n'eby'enyegyesa yaabo !
51002023	Manya ebyo omu mazima nooshusha oti n'eby'obwengye ahabw'okuteera abantu omuhimbo gw'okwehaayo , n'okwecwendeeka n'okusaasa omubiri , kwonka tibiine mugasho n'akakye omu kuzibira okwetenga kw'omubiri .
51003001	Mbwenu nu , ku muraabe mwazoirwe hamwe na Kristo , musherure ahaby'omu iguru , ei Kristo ari , ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo orwa Ruhanga .
51003002	Mute omutima aha by'omu iguru , bitari by'omu nsi ,
51003003	ahabw'okuba mukafa kandi amagara gaayu gasherekirwe na Kristo omuri Ruhanga .
51003004	Kristo magara gaitu , ku ariboneka , naimwe muryareebwa hamwe nawe omu kitiinwa .
51003005	N'ahabw'ekyo mwite eby'ensi ebiri omu ngingo zaanyu : obushambani , eby'enshoni , okwimukiirira kw'omubiri , okwetenga okubi , n'okururuuhira eby'ensi bikaba emandwa yaanyu .
51003006	Haza ebyo nibyo bireetera Ruhanga kufubira abatarikumuhurira .
51003007	Kandi nibyo mwabaire mugyenderamu , obu mwabaire mukibirimu .
51003008	Kwonka mbwenu ebi byona mubirekye : ekiniga , okuguubwa kubi , eitima , okubeiherera abandi n'okugamba eby'enshoni .
51003009	Mutaribeihana , ahabw'okuba mukayeihaho entuura eya ira n'emitwarize yaayo ;
51003010	mwagira entuura ensya . Egyo ntuura nsya , Ruhanga owaagihangire aguma naagyongyera kugihindura nsya omu kumushusha , ngu mubone kumanyira kimwe nkawe .
51003011	Obwo nihaba hatakiriho Muguriiki na Muyudaaya , oshazirwe n'otashazirwe , omunyamahanga ; Omunyashiita , omuhuuku n'ow'obusingye , kureka Kristo niwe byona , kandi ari omuri byona .
51003012	Mbwenu nk'entoore za Ruhanga , abarikwera kandi abakundwa , mugirirane esaasi , embabazi , obucureezi , okutwaza mpora n'okugumisiriza .
51003013	Ku haraabe hariho oine eki arikufa na mugyenzi we , bagumisiririzane kandi basaasirane . Nk'oku Mukama yaabasaasiire , naimwe mube nikwo mwasaasirana .
51003014	Ahari ebyo byona , mwongyereho rukundo ekomerana ebintu byona , bikakwatanisiza kimwe .
51003015	Mbwenu obusingye bwa Kristo , obu mwayeteirwe kuba engingo z'omubiri gumwe , ka butegyekye omu mitima yaanyu ; haza mugume musiime .
51003016	Ekigambo kya Kristo ka kigume omuriimwe kihundiriire , nimwegyesana kandi nimuhanana omu bwengye bwona ; nimweshongora zaaburi ezirikwera , n'ebyeshongoro n'ebigunjano ebibateirwemu Mutima , nimusiima Ruhanga omu mitima yaanyu .
51003017	Kyona eki muraagambe n'eki muraakore , mukikore omu iziina rya Mukama Yesu , nimusiima omuriwe Ruhanga Taata .
51003018	Abakazi , mugume mworobere baabaroimwe , nk'oku kishemereire ab'omuri Mukama .
51003019	Abashaija , mukunde abakazi baanyu , kandi murekye kubaitsa omwaga .
51003020	Abaana , muhurire abazaire baanyu omu buri kintu , ahabw'okuba ekyo kigwisa gye Mukama .
51003021	Abazaire b'abaana , murekye kugwisa kubi abaana baanyu , batakaahahaara omutima .
51003022	Abahuuku , mworobere bakama baanyu ab'omu nsi omuri byona , mutarikubakorera ngu mureebwe , nk'abarikwenda kusiimwa abantu , kureka mubaheereze n'omutima gutaine buryarya nimutiina Mukama .
51003023	Kyona eki muraakore , mukikore mwihire aha mutima , nk'abarikuheereza Mukama batari bantu .
51003024	Nimumanya ngu Mukama aryabaha obuhunguzi kuba ebihembo byanyu , ahabw'okuba nimuheereza Mukama Kristo .
51003025	Manya enkozi y'ebibi eryabizimuurirwa , kandi Mukama tashoroora mu bantu .
51004001	Naimwe abakama , muheereze abahuuku baanyu ebihikire omu bwinganisa , nimumanya naimwe ku mwine Mukama omu iguru .
51004002	Mugumizemu omu kushaba , mutarikuhuga kandi nimusiima Ruhanga .
51004003	Haza obwo naitwe mugume mutushabire , Ruhanga abone kutwiguriraho omuhanda gw'okurangirira Amakuru Marungi , n'okugamba eibanga rya Kristo eryantaisize omu kihome ,
51004004	ngu mbone kurishoboorora gye nk'oku kinshemereire .
51004005	Abatakaikiriize mubatwarize gye n'obwengye , mutarikufiisa busha mugisha ogu mwine .
51004006	Ebigambo byanyu bibe ebirikugwisa gye , ebirungirwemu omwonyo , mubone kumanya oku muraagarukyemu buri omwe .
51004007	Tukiko naija kubagambira byona ebyambaireho . We n'omunyaruganda omukundwa , omuheereza omwesigwa , kandi omukozi mugyenzi wangye omuri Mukama .
51004008	Eki naamubatumiraho , n'okwenda ngu mumanye oku turi kandi naimwe abagumye .
51004009	Hamwe nawe naabatumaho Onesimo , mwene Taata omwesigwa , omukundwa , kandi ow'omu baanyu . Nibaija kubateekyerereza byona ebibaireho kunu .
51004010	Arisitariko , embohe mugyenzi wangye , naabaramutsya ; na Mariko mwihwa wa Barinaba , ou naabagambiireho ku araije , mumwakiire .
51004011	Na Yesu oyetwa Yusito , naabaramutsya . Omu bakozi bagyenzi bangye ahabw'obukama bwa Ruhanga , abo nibo bonka ab'omu bashazirwe , haza bakampuumuza .
51004012	Epafura ow'abaanyu , omuhuuku wa Kristo Yesu , naabaramutsya . Obutoosha ataho munonga omutima kubaijuka omu kushaba kwe , ngu mugume muhamire kandi nimwikiririza kimwe kuhitsya byona ebi Ruhanga akunda .
51004013	Nimbahamiza ku abakoreire munonga , imwe n'Abalaodikeya , kandi n'ab'omuri Hierapoli .
51004014	Luka omufumu omukundwa , na Deemasi nibabaramutsya .
51004015	Mundamukize abanyaruganda abari Laodikeya . Mundamukize na Nunfa , hamwe n'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza eky'omu nju ye .
51004016	Mbwenu ebaruha egi ku muraaheze kugishoma , mugitwekyere ab'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza aba Laodikeya , bagishome . Kandi naimwe mushome ebaruha eraarugye Laodikeya .
51004017	Reero mugire Arukiipo muti : Oyezirikye kuhitsya obuheereza obu waakwatsiibwe omuri Mukama .
51004018	Nyowe Paulo , niinye naahandiika endamutsyo egi n'omukono gwangye . Mugume mwijukye oku nkiri omu nkomo . Embabazi za Ruhanga zigume naimwe !
52001001	Nyowe Paulo na Silivaano na Timoteeho , nituhandiikira ab'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ba Tesalonika , abari omuri Ruhanga Taata na Mukama Yesu Kristo , nitubendeza emigisha n'obusingye .
52001002	Obutoosha tusiima Ruhanga ahabwanyu mwena , n'okubagambaho kaingi omu kushaba kwaitu .
52001003	Nitwijuka omu maisho ga Ruhanga waitu kandi Tataitwe ebi mukora , ahabw'okwikiriza n'okwehenenga okurimu rukundo , kandi n'amatsiko agahamire omuri Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
52001004	Banyaruganda nitumanya ku Ruhanga abakunda kandi ku yaabatooraine .
52001005	Manya ku twabarangiriire Amakuru Marungi , bikaba bitari bigambo bugambo , kureka gakaba garimu amaani omuri Mutima Orikwera , kandi tukaba nitumanya ku gari ag'amazima . Nimumanya oku twabaire nitutwaza tubarimu ngu tubagasire .
52001006	Haza naimwe mukatooreza emitwarize yaitu n'eya Mukama , mwaikiriza ekigambo nimubonabonesibwa munonga , kandi mushemereirwe ahabw'okuhwerwa Mutima Orikwera .
52001007	Mutyo mwaba eky'okureeberwaho abaikiriza boona ab'omuri Makedoniya n'omuri Akaiya .
52001008	Manya ekigambo kya Mukama ekyarugire omuriimwe , tikiragarukiire Makedoniya na Akaiya zonka , kureka enkuru y'okwikiriza Ruhanga kwanyu ekabuga hoona . Nikyo tutarikwetengyera kubigambaho .
52001009	Bo bonka batugambaho nk'oku mwatwakiire , n'oku mwarekire kuramya ebishushani , mukakubuukira Ruhanga ohuriire kandi ow'amazima kumuheereza ,
52001010	n'okutegyereza Omwana we kuruga omu iguru , ou yaazoire omu bafiire , niwe Yesu , otujuna ekishinjo kya Ruhanga ekirikwenda kwija .
52002001	Banyaruganda , imwe mwenka nimumanya ku tutarahendekyeire busha kwija owaanyu .
52002002	Nimumanya bwabiso ku twabonabonesiibwe tukahemangurirwa Filipi , kwonka Ruhanga waitu akatuha obumanzi bw'okubarangirira imwe Amakuru ge Marungi , n'obu turaabe twahakanisiibwe munonga .
52002003	Manya okurangirira kwaitu tikurikuruga mu buhabe , nari mu by'enshoni , nainga mu buryarya .
52002004	Ahabw'okuba nk'oku Ruhanga yaatusiimire akatukwatsa ago Makuru Marungi , naitwe nikwo turikugarangirira , ti habw'okugwisa gye Ruhanga , oshwijuma emitima yaitu .
52002005	Mbwenu nk'oku murikumanya , omu migambire yaitu titukamamarikaga , nari okushwekyerera ahabw'omururu , Ruhanga niwe mujuruzi waitu .
52002006	Titukendaga bantu kutuhimbisa , yaaba imwe nari abandi . N'obu twakubaire nitubaasa kubaremeerera nk'entumwa za Kristo ,
52002007	kwonka omuriimwe tukatwaza gye , nk'oku omurezi arera abaana be .
52002008	N'ahabw'ekyo , ahabw'okubakunda , tubataireho omutima , tukaba tweteekateekire kukwatanisa naimwe , ti by'Amakuru Marungi ga Ruhanga byonka , kureka b'eby'amagara gaitu , ahabw'okuba mukaba mwabaire abaitu b'aha mara .
52002009	Beene Taata , nimwijuka oku twabaire twehenenga , nitukora munonga nyomushana na nyekiro , ngu tutakaaremeerera omuntu weena omuriimwe , nitubarangirira Amakuru Marungi ga Ruhanga .
52002010	Muri baakareebi kandi na Ruhanga nikwo ari , ku emitwarize yaitu ahariimwe abaikiriza yaabaire eri erikwera , ehikiriire , kandi etaine ki erikuhaahuuzibwa .
52002011	Ahabw'okuba nimumanya nk'oku ishe w'abaana abatwaza , naitwe nikwo twayehanangiriize buri omwe omuriimwe , tukabateera omuhimbo , tukabahamiiriza ,
52002012	ngu mugire emitwarize erikusiimwa Ruhanga , obeeta kutaaha omu bukama bwe n'omu kitiinwa kye .
52002013	Nikyo turikusiimira Ruhanga kaingi , ahabw'okuba ku mwaikiriize ekigambo kye eki mwahuriire nitubagambira , mwakyakiira kitari nk'ekigambo ky'abantu , kureka omu mazima nk'oku kiri , ekigambo kya Ruhanga , ekirikukora omuriimwe abaikiriza .
52002014	Mbwenu , beene Taata , mukaba nk'ebigombe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga , aba Kristo Yesu ab'omuri Buyudaaya , ahabw'okuba ab'owaanyu bakabareebesa enaku nk'oku ebyo bigombe byazireebesiibwe Abayudaaya .
52002015	Manya bo nibo baitsire Mukama Yesu n'abarangi , bakatubinga , bakagwisa kubi Ruhanga , bakataho n'okurwanisa abantu boona .
52002016	Bakatuzibira kurangirira Abanyamahanga eby'okubareetera okujunwa ngu obutoosha babone kukorera kimwe ebyo bibi byabo . Kwonka aha muheru gwa byona Ruhanga akabahambya , yaabafubira .
52002017	Banyaruganda , nk'oku twamazire omwanya tutaine naimwe omu mubiri , kutari mu mutima tuteireho munonga n'orushusho rwingi okwenda kureebana naimwe ;
52002018	ahabw'okuba tukenda kwija owaanyu , nyowe Paulo nkateeraho kaingi , kwonka Sitaane yaatuzibira .
52002019	Mbwenu shi Mukama waitu Yesu ku ariija , amatsiko gaitu n'okushemererwa n'ekirunga ebiritwesiimisa omu maisho ge , ni biiha ? Tiimwe ?
52002020	Manya niimwe kitiinwa kyaitu kandi okushemererwa kwaitu .
52003001	N'ahabw'ekyo , ku twaremirwe kukigumisiririza , twasiima kutsigara Ateene twenka .
52003002	Nikwo kutuma mwene waitu Timoteeho , omuheereza wa Ruhanga omu kurangirira Amakuru Marungi ga Kristo , ngu abahamye omu kwikiriza kwanyu kandi abeehangaanise ,
52003003	ngu hatakaagira owaatenteburwa ezo naku . Naimwe ekyo nimukimanya ku turi ab'okuzireeba ,
52003004	ahabw'okuba obu twabaire tukibaine , tukabagambira bukiri kare ku turi ab'okubonabonesibwa ; nk'oku kibaireho kandi nk'oku murikukimanya .
52003005	N'ahabw'ekyo , ku naaremirwe kukigumisiririza , naabatumaho Timoteeho , ngu mbone kumanya oku okwikiriza kwanyu kuri , obwo nintiina nti , shana omwohi akaaba yaaboohize , okwehenenga kwaitu kukaba okwa busha .
52003006	Mbwenu Timoteeho , ku aizire naaruga okwo , yaatugambira enkuru nungi y'okwikiriza kwanyu n'okukunda kwanyu ; kandi yaatumanyisa ku obutoosha murikutwijuka mutwiniire rukundo n'orushusho rw'okutureeba , nkaitwe oku turubainiire .
52003007	N'ahabw'ekyo , banyaruganda , n'obu turaabe turi omu naku nyingi n'okubonabonesibwa , kwonka okwikiriza kwanyu kutugarwire omutima omunda .
52003008	Manya nituruhuuka mwaba muhamiire omuri Mukama .
52003009	Mbwenu tukaasiima tuta Ruhanga ahabw'okwo kushemererwa kwingi oku twine ahabwanyu omu maisho ge ?
52003010	Nitushaba tutaireho omutima nyomushana na nyekiro , ngu tubone kureebana naimwe butunu , n'okwijuririza ekibuzireho omu kwikiriza kwanyu .
52003011	Ruhanga waitu kandi Tataitwe wenka , na Mukama waitu Yesu nibakatushorongyeze omuhanda oguraatuhitsye okwo owaanyu .
52003012	Mukama abakanyisemu rukundo , eshaagaane , mugigirirane kandi mugigirire abantu boona , nkaitwe oku tugibagirira .
52003013	Reero Mukama waitu Yesu ogwo ahamye emitima yaanyu ; haza ku ariija hamwe n'abarikwera be boona , mushangwe mutaine ki murikuhaahuuzibwa , muri abarikwera omu maisho ga Ruhanga waitu kandi Tataitwe .
52004001	Banyaruganda , eky'aha muheru nitubeeshengyereza , kandi nitubeehanangiriza omuri Mukama Yesu tuti : nk'oku mwatwegyeireho oku mushemereire kutwaza n'okugwisa gye Ruhanga , nk'oku murikukora hati , mube nikwo mwagumizamu nimukora n'okukiraho .
52004002	Ahabw'okuba nimumanya ebi twabahabwire ahabwa Mukama Yesu .
52004003	Manya eki nikyo Ruhanga ayenda . Ayenda ngu mube abarikwera , abataine kakwate na by'obushambani .
52004004	Haza , nkabarikwera , buri omwe omuriimwe amanye okutwaza gye omukazi we naamuha ekitiinwa ,
52004005	kutari kutwarwa okwetenga kw'omubiri , nk'abakaafiiri abatamanya Ruhanga .
52004006	Hatarigira owaashaagiza mugyenzi we omu kintu ekyo , akamusiisira obwo burungi bwe . Ahabw'okuba Mukama aba omuhoozi w'enzigu , nk'oku buzimazima twabaire twabahabwire .
52004007	Manya Ruhanga taratweteire by'enshoni , kureka okuba abarikwera .
52004008	N'ahabw'ekyo weena oteeta hari ekyo , aba atagayire muntu , kureka Ruhanga , obaha Mutima we Orikwera .
52004009	Kwonka aha bikwatiraine n'okukundana kw'abanyaruganda , timurikwetenga kugira owaabibahandiikira , ahabw'okuba imwe mwenka Ruhanga yaaherize kubeegyesa okukundana ,
52004010	kandi buzimazima nimukunda abanyaruganda boona ab'omuri Makedoniya yoona . Reero nu , banyaruganda , nitubeehanangiriza n'okukiraho ,
52004011	mutuure mubukaire , mutaire omutima aha byanyu byonka , nimukoresa emikono yaanyu nk'oku twabaragiire ,
52004012	haza mubone kusiimwa ab'aheeru , mutarikutungwa by'omuntu weena .
52004013	Beene Taata , aha by'abaagwejegyeire , titukaayenzire kubareka mutabimanyire , ngu mutakaacuncubara nk'abandi abataine matsiko oku baba .
52004014	Manya nk'oku twikiriza ngu Yesu akafa kandi akazooka , n'abaagwejegyereire omuri Yesu nikwo Ruhanga aribareeta hamwe nawe .
52004015	N'ahabw'ekyo nitubagambira ekyagambirwe Mukama , ku itwe abahuriire abariba bakitsigaireho obu Mukama ariija , tutaribandiza abaagwejegyeire .
52004016	Ahabw'okuba haryabaho eiraka ririkuragiira , n'okweta kwa maraika omukuru n'okugamba kw'enzamba ya Ruhanga ; reero Mukama ashuume naaruga omu iguru , haza abaafeereire omuri Kristo babe nibo baabanza kuzooka .
52004017	Mpaho naitwe abahuriire , abariba batsigaireho , tutwarwe hamwe nabo omu bicu , tutangiririre Mukama omu kaabunga , kandi tutyo tugume nawe obutwire bwona .
52004018	N'ahabw'ekyo muhuumurizane n'ebyo bigambo .
52005001	Banyaruganda , eby'amagingo n'obunaku timurikwetenga kubihandiikirwa .
52005002	Ahabw'okuba naimwe mwenka nimumanya gye ku ekiro kya Mukama kiriija nk'omushuma wa nyekiro .
52005003	Abantu ku bariba nibagira ngu : Ni buhooro ; kandi ngu : Tihariho kabi , nibwo okuhwerekyerera kuribagwera kitaraariire , nk'ebisha oku bikwata omukazi orikurumwa , haza tiharigira owaahonokaho .
52005004	Kwonka , beene Taata , imwe timuri mu mwirima , ngu ekyo kiro kibagweho nk'omushuma .
52005005	Ahabw'okuba mwena muri abaana b'omushana , kandi aba nyomushana ; tituri ba nyekiro nari ab'omwirima .
52005006	N'ahabw'ekyo ka turekye kugwejegyera nk'oku abandi bagira , kureka tugume nitureeba tutasinzire .
52005007	Manya abagwejegyera bagwejegyera nyekiro , n'abasinda basinda nyekiro .
52005008	Kwonka itwe nk'oku turi aba nyomushana , ka tugume turekye kuba abasinzi . Tujware eky'okwekingiza aha kifuba , nikwo kwikiriza n'okukunda , kandi n'enkofiira , nigo matsiko g'okujunwa .
52005009	Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga taratuteekateekyeire kutumariraho ekishinjo , kureka ngu tujunirwe omuri Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo ,
52005010	owaatufeeraire ngu tugume hamwe nawe , yaaba turi abahuriire nari abafiire , aha kiro ki ariiziraho .
52005011	N'ahabw'ekyo mugumyane kandi mwombekane , nk'oku murikugira na hati .
52005012	Banyaruganda , nitubeeshengyereza ku muha ekitiinwa abarikubakorera nibeehenenga , nibabategyeka omuri Mukama kandi nibabahana .
52005013	Haza mubasiime munonga ahabw'omurimo gwabo mubainiire rukundo . Mutuurane nabo n'obusingye .
52005014	Kandi , banyaruganda , nitubeehanangiriza ku muhana abatatebeekaine , mukagumya abagwire enshazi , mukahwera abataine maani ; abo boona mubagumisiririze .
52005015	Mureebe ngu tihariho n'omwe omuriimwe orikuhoora mugyenzi we enzigu , kureka obutoosha mwitanire okukorerana gye , abandi boona .
52005016	Mushemererwe ebiro byona ,
52005017	mushabe obutoosha ,
52005018	kandi musiime omu birikubaho byona , ahabw'okuba ekyo nikyo Ruhanga abendeza omuri Kristo Yesu .
52005019	Mutaritsiza Mutima .
52005020	Mutarigaya eby'oburangi ,
52005021	kureka mukyenguuze byona , kandi muhamire aha kirungi ;
52005022	mwetantare ekibi ky'omuringo gwona .
52005023	Ruhanga Mukama w'obusingye wenka abeereze kimwe . Emitima yaanyu n'amagara gaanyu n'emibiri yaanyu birindwe biri gye . Haza aha kwija kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo mushangwe mutaine ki murikuhaahuuzibwa .
52005024	Manya ogwo owaabeetsire n'omwesigwa , kandi aryakikora .
52005025	Beene Taata , mutushabire .
52005026	Muramutsye abanyaruganda boona n'okunywegyerana okurikwera .
52005027	Nimbarahiza Mukama ku ebaruha egi eshomerwa abanyaruganda boona .
52005028	Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe .
53001001	Nyowe Paulo na Silivaano na Timoteeho nituhandiikira ab'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza aba Tesalonika , abari omuri Ruhanga Tataitwe na Mukama Yesu Kristo ,
53001002	nitubendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Taata na Mukama Yesu Kristo .
53001003	Beene Taata , tushemereire kusiima Ruhanga obutoosha ahabwanyu nk'oku kishemereire , ahabw'okuba okwikiriza kwanyu nikukura munonga , kandi n'okukundana kw'omuntu na mugyenzi we omuriimwe nikukanya .
53001004	N'ahabw'ekyo nimutwesiimisa omu bigombe by'abaikiriza Ruhanga , ahabw'okuhama kwanyu n'ahabw'okwikiriza omu kuhiiganisibwa kwanyu kwona n'omu kureebesibwa enaku , ebi murikugumisiririza .
53001005	Ekyo nikyoreka ku okucwa orubanja kwa Ruhanga kuri okw'oburyo , ngu mubone kushangwa muri abashemereire obukama bwe obu murikubonabonera .
53001006	Manya Ruhanga naareeba ngu n'eky'obwinganisa okubonabonesa abarikubabonabonesa ,
53001007	kandi naimwe abarikureebesibwa enaku okubaha ekihuumuro hamwe naitwe . Haza ebyo biryabaho obu Mukama Yesu arishuuruuka naaruga omu iguru aine baamaraika be ab'amaani ,
53001008	n'omuriro gurikunaga enkobe , kuhoora enzigu abatarikumanya Ruhanga , n'abatarikworobera Makuru Marungi ga Mukama waitu Yesu .
53001009	Baryaheebwa ekifubiro ky'okuhwerekyerera kw'ebiro n'ebiro , bacuubwe omu maisho ga Ruhanga n'omu kitiinwa ky'obushoboorozi bwe ,
53001010	ku ariija ahari ekyo Kiro kuhimbisibwa omu barikwera be , n'okutangaarirwa omu baikiriize boona , ahabw'okuba obuhamya obu twabahaire , mukabwikiriza .
53001011	Nikyo tutooshera kubashabira , ngu Ruhanga waitu abahindure abashemereire okweta kwe , kandi ahikiirize n'amaani ge ebirungi byona ebi mumaririire kukora , n'ebi murikukora ahabw'okwikiriza .
53001012	Haza eiziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu riryahimbisizibwa omuriimwe , naimwe omuriwe , nk'oku embabazi za Ruhanga waitu na Mukama Yesu Kristo ziri .
53002001	Mbwenu , beene Taata , nitwenda kubagambira aha bikwatiraine n'okwija kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , n'oku turiteeranwa kumubugana . Nitubeeshengyereza ,
53002002	mutarahuka kuhuruutuka omutima , nari okuhahaazibwa , yaaba oburangi , nari enkuru , nainga ebaruha , ebirikugambwa ngu birugire ahariitwe , kuhamya ku Ekiro kya Mukama kyahika .
53002003	Hatagira owaababeihabeiha omu muringo gwona ; ahabw'okuba ekyo Kiro tikirihika , obugomi butakabandize kubaho , n'ekyegyengye kitakabonekire . Niwe muntu w'okuhwerekyerera ,
53002004	ohakanisa ekyeetwa Ruhanga kyona nari ekiramibwa , akakyetunguuraho akasingama omuri Nyaruju ya Ruhanga , naayeyeta Ruhanga .
53002005	Timurikwijuka , obu naabaire nkibaine , ekyo ku naakibagambiire ?
53002006	Mbwenu nimumanya ekizibiire ebyo kubaho ; n'ahabw'okuba obunaku bwe tibukahikire .
53002007	Manya enaama y'obugomi yaaherize kucumwa , kwonka ekyo eky'okwenda kubaho , tikiribaho okuhitsya obu ogwo ariihwaho .
53002008	Haza obwo nibwo omubi arishuuruurwa , kandi Mukama Yesu akamwitsa omwitsyo gurikuruga omu kanwa ke , akamucwekyerezesa okuboneka kwe n'okwija kwe .
53002009	Ekyo kyegyengye kiryaija kireetsirwe Sitaane , kiine amaani maingi n'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza eby'ebishuba .
53002010	Reero abariba bari ab'okuhwerekyerera , ahabw'okwanga kukunda amazima bakajunwa , baryahabisibwa kubi .
53002011	Nikyo Ruhanga aribooherereza ekirikuhabisa eky'amaani , ngu baikirize eby'ebishuba .
53002012	Mpaho boona abataraikiriize mazima , bakashemerererwa okutahikiirira , babone kusingwa orubanja .
53002013	Beene Taata abakundwa Mukama , itwe tushemereire kusiima Ruhanga obutoosha ahabwanyu , ahabw'okuba Ruhanga ogwo akabatoorana kuba ab'okubanza kuhinduka , ngu mujunwe nimwezibwa Mutima kandi nimwikiriza amazima .
53002014	Ekyo akakibeetera naakoresa Amakuru Marungi agu twabareeteire , ngu mubone kutunga ekitiinwa kya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
53002015	N'ahabw'ekyo , beene Taata , mwemerere muhamire , kandi mugumiize kimwe emitwarize ei twabeegyeise , yaaba omu bi twabagambiire nari omu bi twabahandiikiire .
53002016	Mbwenu Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo wenka , na Ruhanga Tataitwe owaatukunzire , akatuha okuhuumuzibwa okutahwaho n'amatsiko marungi ahabw'embabazi ze ,
53002017	abahuumuze kandi abagumye omu birungi byona ebi mukora n'ebi mugamba .
53003001	Eky'aha muheru , beene Taata , mutushabire , ekigambo kya Mukama kirahukye kubuga , kandi kiheebwe ekiitinwa nk'oku kyabaire omuriimwe ,
53003002	naitwe tukire abantu abatahikiriire kandi ababi , ahabw'okuba abaikiriza ti boona .
53003003	Kwonka Mukama n'omwesigwa ; imwe aryabagumya kandi abarinde Omubi .
53003004	Twine obwesigye omuri Mukama ahariimwe , ku murikukora ebi turikubaragiira , kandi ku murigumizamu nimubikora .
53003005	Mukama ahuguurire emitima yaanyu omuri rukundo ya Ruhanga , n'omu kugumisiriza oku Kristo aha .
53003006	Mbwenu banyaruganda , nitubaragiira omu iziina rya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , ku mwetaanisa aha munyaruganda weena otenda kukora , kandi otarikukuratira mitwarize yaitu ei mwatwegyeireho .
53003007	Ahabw'okuba imwe mwenka nimumanya nk'oku mushemereire kututooreza . Manya obu twabaire turi hamwe naimwe , tukaba tutari beeremwa .
53003008	Titurariiriire busha kyokurya ky'omuntu weena , kureka tukaba tukora munonga , twecurenga nyomushana na nyekiro , ngu tutakaaremeerera omuntu weena omuriimwe .
53003009	Tikugira ngu tukaba tutahikire kubikorerwa , kureka tukenda kubooreka eby'okureeberaho omu mitwarize yaitu .
53003010	Nangwa nobu twabaire turi hamwe naimwe , tukabaha ekiragiro ekirikugira kiti : Otarikwenda kukora , atarya .
53003011	Mbwenu nituhurira ku bamwe omuriimwe batuura bari abeeremwa , nibajagajagira omu by'abandi , bataine ki barikukora .
53003012	Abantu nk'abo nitubaragiira kandi nitubeehanangiririza omuri Mukama Yesu Kristo , ku bakora emirimo yaabo batuurize ; bakeihiramu eky'okubatunga .
53003013	Beene Taata , omu kukora ebirungi mutarigira obu muruhire .
53003014	Ku haakugira owaayanga kworobera eki turikugamba omuri egi baruha , mumumanye kandi mutagira eki mwakwatanisamu nawe , haza ahemukye .
53003015	Mutamutwaza nk'omuzigu , kureka mumuhane nk'omunyaruganda .
53003016	Mukama nyakabara , okomookwaho obusingye , abahe obusingye obunaku bwona n'omu miringo yoona . Mukama agume naimwe mwena .
53003017	Nyowe Paulo , egyo ndamutsyo niinye naagihandiika n'omukono gwangye . Aka n'akamanyiso k'omu baruha yangye yoona , nikwo mpandiika .
53003018	Embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe mwena .
54001001	Nyowe Paulo , entumwa ya Kristo ahabw'okuragiira kwa Ruhanga Omujuni waitu n'okwa Kristo Yesu matsiko gaitu ,
54001002	ninkuramutsya iwe Timoteeho , omwana wangye buzima omu kwikiriza ; ninkwendeza emigisha n'embabazi n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Taata , na Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu .
54001003	Obu naabaire ninza Makedoniya , nkakwehanangiriza kuguma Efeso , ngu obone kuteisa abantu bamwe , barekye kwegyesa enyegyesa endi .
54001004	Obagambire barekyere aho kuhugira aha nfumu engunjano , n'okutondoora akarande k'oruzaaro rwa baishenkurubo ebitaine bugarukiro . Manya okutondoora okwo , omu mwanya gw'okutendeka abantu ebya Ruhanga ebiri omu kwikiriza , kuzaarukwamu empaka zonka .
54001005	Haza kunu eki turikugyenderera omu bi turikuragiira , ni rukundo erikuruga omu mutima gushemeire kandi ogutarikweshinja , n'okwikiriza okutarimu buryarya .
54001006	Kwonka abantu bamwe ahabw'okuteishuka ebyo , bakahabira omu mpaka zitaine mugasho .
54001007	Nibenda kuba abeegyesa b'eiteeka , batarikwetegyereza bi barikugamba n'ebi barikuhamya .
54001008	Mbwenu itwe nitumanya eiteeka ku riri rirungi , omuntu yaaba naarikoresa omu buteeka .
54001009	Tushemereire kwetegyereza ku eiteeka ritaratairweho ahabw'abahikiriire , kureka ahabw'abagomi n'abatahurira , abatari bashongore ahari Ruhanga n'abasiisi , ahabw'abatari barikwera n'abahagaza ebya Ruhanga ; ahabw'abaita baishebo n'abaita baanyinabo n'ahabw'abaitsi b'abandi bantu ;
54001010	ahabw'abashambani , abashambana bonka na bonka , n'abaiba abantu kubaguza , ahabw'ababeihi n'abarahizi b'ebishuba , n'ekindi kyona ekirikuhakanisa enyegyesa ehikire .
54001011	Egyo niyo nyegyesa erikwikirizana n'Amakuru Marungi ag'ekitiinwa aga Ruhanga ohimbisibwa , agu naakwatsiibwe .
54001012	Ninsiima Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu owampaire amaani g'okumuheereza , ahabw'okuba niwe yansiimire ku ndi omwesigwa , akantooranira ogwo murimo .
54001013	Nobu ndaabe ira naamurogotsireho , nkamuhiiganisa kandi nkamujuma , kwonka akangirira embabazi , ahabw'okuba ebyo nkabikoresa obutamanya ntakaikiriize .
54001014	Bwanyima Mukama waitu yangirira embabazi nyingi , hamwe n'okwikiriza na rukundo ebi tutungira omuri Kristo Yesu .
54001015	Ekigambo ekyo n'eky'okwesigwa kandi kishemereire kwikirizibwa , ekirikugira kiti : Kristo Yesu akaija omu nsi kujuna abasiisi , haza omuribo niinye rurangaanwa .
54001016	Kwonka eki naagiririirwe embabazi n'eki , ngu Yesu Kristo ayorekyere omuriinye omusiisi rurangaanwa , okugumisiriza kwe okutaine bugarukiro , haza mbone kuba eky'okureeberwaho abarimwikiriza , bakatunga amagara agatahwaho .
54001017	Omugabe w'ebiro n'ebiro , Ruhanga otafa , otareebwa kandi omwe wenka , ahimbisibwe kandi aheebwe ekitiinwa obusingye n'obusingye . Amiina .
54001018	Mwana wangye Timoteeho , ebi naakwehanangiriza ebyo ni nk'ebi abarangi baakugambireho , ngu ku biraakwezirikise , obone kurwana orugamba rurungi ,
54001019	ohamize okwikiriza n'omutima gutarikweshinja . Manya ahabw'okutenda kugira ogwo mutima murungi , abantu bamwe bakarohamya okwikiriza kwabo ;
54001020	omuribo ni Himenaayo na Alekisandero , abu naarekuriire Sitaane ngu bakaayega okutarogota .
54002001	Eky'okubanza kya byona , nimbeehanangiriza ku mushabira abantu boona , nimubeeshengyerereza , nimubatonganira , nimubasiimira ,
54002002	kandi nimushabira abagabe n'abandi boona abaine emyanya mikuru , tubone kubukaara twine obusingye , nitutiina Ruhanga kandi nitutwaza gye omu buryo bwona .
54002003	Ekyo ni kirungi kandi nikisiimwa omu maisho ga Ruhanga Omujuni waitu ,
54002004	oyenda abantu boona ku bajunwa bakamanya amazima .
54002005	Manya Ruhanga n'omwe , kandi omuteeranizi otuura ahagati ya Ruhanga n'abantu nawe n'omwe . Niwe muntu Kristo Yesu ,
54002006	owaayehaireyo kuba encungurano y'abantu boona ; haza ekyo akakihamya omu bunaku bwakyo obuhikire .
54002007	Nikyo naateereirweho kuba entumwa kandi omwegyesa w'Abanyamahanga , nimbarangirira eby'okwikiriza n'eby'amazima ningamba amazima , ntarikubeiha .
54002008	N'ahabw'ekyo niinyenda abashaija omu myanya yoona ku baguma bakashaba baimukize emikono eyezire , bataine kiniga nari entongane .
54002009	Kandi niinyenda abakazi ku baguma nibeehunda beerinzire , batarikurengyesereza , bajwaire ebijwaro ebibashemereire , batarikutsiba ishokye , nari okushagika eby'ezaabu nari eruuru , nainga ebijwaro by'obuguzi bwingi ;
54002010	kureka beehunde ebikorwa birungi , nk'oku kishemereire abakazi abanyadiini .
54002011	Omu kwegyesibwa , omukazi agume ahuname acureire .
54002012	Tindikwikiriza mukazi kwegyesa , nari kugira obushoboorozi aha bashaija ; ashemereire kuguma acecekire .
54002013	Manya Adamu niwe yaabandize kuhangwa , hakakurataho Eva ;
54002014	kandi Adamu tiwe yaabeihabeihirwe , kureka omukazi niwe yaabeihabeihirwe , akagwa omu kibi .
54002015	Kwonka omukazi omu kuzaara abaana aryajunwa , yaaba agumiizemu naikiriza aine rukundo , ari orikwera kandi aine emitwarize mirungi .
54003001	Ekigambo eki n'eky'amazima . Omuntu weena ku ayetenga ngu abe omureeberezi , biri ayetengire omurimo murungi .
54003002	Mbwenu omureeberezi ashemereire kutagira kintu kyona eki arikuhaahuuzibwa ; abe oshweire omukazi omwe , abe orikwerinda , orikwetegyereza , otarikugaywa efura , orikurahukirwa kwegyesa .
54003003	Arekye kuba omusinzi , ow'omwaga , kureka omucureezi , atari ntongani nari enkunzi y'empiiha .
54003004	Ashemereire kuba orikubaasa kutegyeka eka ye , abaana be nibamworobera kandi nibamuha ekitiinwa omu miringo yoona .
54003005	Mbwenu omuntu otarikubaasa kutegyeka eka ye , naabaasa ata kureeberera ekigombe ky'abaikiriza Ruhanga ?
54003006	Tashemereire kuba omuntu ohindukire Omukristo juba , atakaagira amaryo , akeetunguura , akasingwa orubanja orwasingire Sitaane .
54003007	Ekindi , ashemereire kuba omuntu orikugambwa gye ab'aheeru , batakaamucamura , akagwa omu mutego gwa Sitaane .
54003008	Abahwezi nabo bashemereire kuba abahikire , abatari b'endimi ibiri , abatari bantabo yaago , abataine mururu gw'okutunga .
54003009	Bashemereire kurinda eibanga ry'okwikiriza n'omutima murungi ;
54003010	kandi bashemereire kubanza kugyezibwa , bakyeyoreka bataine ki barikuhaahuuzibwa , bakabona kuheereza bari abahwezi .
54003011	Abahwezikazi nabo bashemereire kuba abahikire , abatarikubeiherera bandi , kureka abari abeerinzi kandi abeesigwa omuri byona .
54003012	Abahwezi babe buri omwe oshweire omukazi omwe , kandi babe abarikubaasa kutegyeka gye abaana baabo n'eka yaabo ;
54003013	ahabw'okuba abaheereza gye bari abahwezi beetungira eiziina rirungi , kandi bagira obwesigye bwingi oburikuhamya okwikiriza oku baine omuri Kristo Yesu .
54003014	Nyine amatsiko g'okwija owaanyu juba ; kwonka ebi naabikuhandiikira ngu
54003015	ku ndaabe naakyerereirwe , omanye oku abantu bashemereire kutwaza omu nju ya Ruhanga . Niryo iramizo rya Ruhanga ohuriire , enyomyo kandi obuhamizo obw'amazima .
54003016	Ahatari kubangaanisa , eibanga ry'ediini yaitu ni rikuru buzima , eririkugira riti : Akoorekwa aine omubiri , yaahamibwa Mutima ku ahikiriire , yaareebwa baamaraika , yaarangirirwa omu mahanga , yaikirizibwa ab'omu nsi , yaatwarwa omu iguru n'ekitiinwa .
54004001	Mbwenu Mutima naagamba butunu , ngu omu biro ebya bwanyima , bamwe baryatsigisibwa okwikiriza , bahugire aha mitima erikuhabisa , n'aha nyegyesa za Sitaane .
54004002	Abo bantu bahabisibwe oburyarya bw'ababeihi , abu emitima yaabo erikushusha oti esiriiziibwe Sitaane .
54004003	Nibo abo abazibira abantu kushwera , n'okurya ebyokurya nanka , haza Ruhanga yaahangire ebyo byokurya kuriibwa abamwikiriza . Nibo abarikumanya amazima , bakabirya nibabimusiimira .
54004004	Manya kyona ekyahangirwe Ruhanga kiba kirungi , kandi tihariho kizira , kyaba kyakiirwe n'okusiima .
54004005	Ahabw'okuba nikiba ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyeeziibwe n'okushaba .
54004006	Ebyo ku oraabishoboororere abanyaruganda , noija kuba omuheereza murungi wa Kristo Yesu , oyoroirwe ebigambo by'okwikiriza n'eby'enyegyesa nungi ei waakuratiire .
54004007	Guma oyetantare ebigano ebigunjano , ebirimu okutatiina Ruhanga kandi eby'orwanju . Yemanyiize okutiina Ruhanga .
54004008	Manya okwemanyiiza omu by'omubiri , nobu kuraabe kwine omugasho , kwonka okutiina Ruhanga kwine omugasho omu miringo yoona ; ahabw'okuba kutureetera kugira amatsiko omu magara aga n'omu magara agariija .
54004009	Ekyo kigambo n'eky'okwesigwa kandi kishemereire kwikiririzibwa kimwe .
54004010	Nikyo twehenengyerera tukeezirika , ahabw'okuba amatsiko gaitu tutuura tugataire ahari Ruhanga ohuriire , oba Omujuni w'abantu boona , munomuno ow'abarikwikiriza .
54004011	Ebyo guma obiragiire kandi obyegyese .
54004012	Hatarigira owaakugayira obutsigazi bwawe , kureka obe eky'okureeberwaho abaikiriza omu bigambo n'omu micwe , omu kukunda , omu kwikiriza n'omu kugira omutima murungi .
54004013	Guma oteho omutima kushomera abantu Ebyahandiikirwe , kubarangirira kandi n'okubeegyesa , okuhitsya obu ndiija .
54004014	Otarihuga aha kiconco eki oine , eki waahairwe ahabw'eki abarangi baagambire , obu abakuru baakutaho emikono .
54004015	Ebyo guma obikore kandi obiteho omutima , boona babone kureeba oku orikugyenda omu maisho .
54004016	Oyerinde omu mitwarize yaawe n'omu bi orikwegyesa ; haza obigumizemu , ahabw'okuba ku oraakore otyo , oryayejuna kandi ojune n'abarikukuhurira .
54005001	Otarikabukira omushaija mukuru , kureka omwehanangirize nka sho . Abatsigazi obatwaze nka barumuna baawe ;
54005002	abakazi bakuru obatwaze nka baanyoko ; n'abakazi bato nka banyaanyoko , obaineho omutima gwezire .
54005003	Abafaakazi , enfaakazi buzima , obahe ekitiinwa .
54005004	Omufaakazi ku araabe aine abaana nari abaijukuru , bashemereire kubanza kwega ebi ediini erikubaragiira kukorera eka yaabo , n'okuzimuurira abazaire baabo ; ahabw'okuba ekyo nikisiimwa Ruhanga .
54005005	Omufaakazi buzima , otsigaire wenka , aba ataire amatsiko ahari Ruhanga , haza aguma naayeshengyereza kandi naashaba nyomushana na nyekiro .
54005006	Kwonka ogwo oyemarira omu kwejaramya , aba afiire , nobu aba akihuriire .
54005007	Ekyo okibagambire , barekye kugira eki barikuhaahuuzibwa .
54005008	Omuntu weena otarikuha baabo eby'okubatunga , na munonga ab'omu ka ye , biri aba ayehakaine enyikiriza , kandi aba ari mubi okukira otarikwikiriza .
54005009	Hatarigira omufaakazi owaahandiikwa atakahikize myaka makumi mukaaga y'obukuru , kandi abe ari owaashweirwe omushaija omwe .
54005010	Ashemereire hoona kwetegyerezibwa yaaba aine ebirungi ebi akora , nk'okushangwa yaayoroire gye abaana be , akakunira abagyenyi , akanaabisa abarikwera ebigyere , akahwera abari omu busaasi ; kandi abe yaayehaireyo kukora ebirungi omu muringo gwona .
54005011	Kwonka guma oyangye kuhandiika abafaakazi bato omu rubu rw'abafaakazi , ahabw'okuba omubiri ku gubaremesa kweheerayo kimwe ahari Kristo , benda kugaruka kushwerwa .
54005012	Batyo beeshombera orubanja ahabw'okwita okuhiga kwabo okw'okubanza .
54005013	N'ekindi , bagira omuze gw'okutagira ki barikukora , baguma nibabungyeera omu maka , kandi ti kutagira ky'okukora kyonka , bataho n'okubuzya orukuru , nibeetaasya omu bitari byabo , nibagamba ebi batakugambire .
54005014	N'ahabw'ekyo , nkaayenzire abafaakazi bato bashwerwe , bazaare abaana , bareeberere amaka gaabo , barekye kuha abazigu obwiho bw'okutugambaho kubi .
54005015	Manya abamwe omuribo baateishukire nibakuratira Sitaane .
54005016	Omuntu weena omwikiriza , ku yaakuba aine abanyabuzaare abafaakazi , abe niwe yaabahwera , ekigombe ky'abaikiriza kirekye kuremeererwa , haza kibone kuhwera abafaakazi emburaburirwa .
54005017	Abakuru abarikutegyeka gye , ka bagume bamanywe ku bashemereire kwihurwa kabiri , na munonga abarikwecurenga nibarangirira kandi nibeegyesa .
54005018	Manya ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Otariboha akanwa k'endaaho neejunga obushiisha ; kandi kiti : Omukozi ashemereire ebihembo bye .
54005019	Otariikiriza omukuru kutabaarizibwa , kureka haaba hariho baamushinja babiri nari bashatu .
54005020	Kandi abagangaarira omu kibi , guma obahanire omu maisho g'abantu , abandi bantu babone kutiina .
54005021	Omu maisho ga Ruhanga n'aga Kristo Yesu n'aga baamaraika abarikwera , ninkuragiira ku oguma noorinda ebyo biragiro , otaine ou orikutetsa , nobu kwakuba okukora ekintu kyona noogwera orubaju .
54005022	Otarirahukiiriza kuta emikono aha muntu , nari okukwatanisa n'omuntu ondi omu bibi ; iwe ogume nooyera .
54005023	Rekyera aho kunywa amaizi gonka , kureka onywe viino nkye , ahabw'enda yaawe n'okurwaraguzibwa kwawe .
54005024	Ebibi by'abantu bamwe bireebwa butunu , bitakabahikize ha kucwerwa orubanja , kwonka eby'abandi bireebwa bwanyima .
54005025	Kandi n'ebirungi ebikorwa , nabyo bireebwa butunu , nangwa nobu biba bitakareebirwe , tibibaasa kuguma bisherekirwe .
54006001	Abo boona abari omu nkomo y'obuhuuku bagume bamanye ku bashemereire kuha bakama baabo ekitiinwa , eiziina rya Ruhanga n'enyegyesa yaitu bitakaacamurwa .
54006002	Abahuuku abaine bakama baabo abaikiriza , tibashemereire kwanga kubaha ekitiinwa , ngu niho bari abanyaruganda . Nangwa bashemereire kukizaho kubaheereza gye , ahabw'okuba abo abarikugasirwa obuheereza bwabo , n'abaikiriza kandi n'abakundwa . Ebyo guma obibeegyese kandi obibeehanangirize .
54006003	Omuntu weena oryegyesa okundi , atarikwikirizana na bigambo ebihikire ebya Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , n'enyegyesa ekwatiraine n'okutiina Ruhanga ,
54006004	biri naayetunguuzibwa amaryo , ataine ki arikumanya . Aba arwaire akanju k'okururuuhira empaka , n'okuhakana aha bigambo ebirugwamu eihari , entongane , okubeihererana , okuteekateekyerana kubi ,
54006005	n'okutonganira busha . Haza ebyo byona bikorwa abantu abasiisikaire obwengye , abatakiine mazima , abateekateeka ngu okutiina Ruhanga kuba oburyo bw'okwetungira amagoba .
54006006	Kwonka okushongoka ahari Ruhanga okurimu okumarwa kwine amagoba maingi .
54006007	Manya tituraijaine kintu mu nsi , kandi titurikubaasa kutwara kintu nitugirugamu .
54006008	Haza ku turaabe twine ebyokurya n'eby'okujwara , ebyo bitumare .
54006009	Kwonka abaruruuhira okutunga , bagwa omu kwohibwa n'omu mutego n'omu byetengo bingi ebitarimu bwengye , kandi eby'akabi ebirohamya abantu omu kuconcoboza n'omu kuhwerekyerera .
54006010	Manya okururuuhira empiiha kuba obukomooko bw'ebibi byona , ahabw'okuba ahabw'okururuuha okwo , bamwe barahabire bakaruga omu kwikiriza , bakeeshogoitesa enaku nyingi .
54006011	Mbwenu iwe omuntu wa Ruhanga , ebyo ogume obyetantare , okuratire okuhikiirira , okutiina Ruhanga , okwikiriza , okukunda , okugumisiriza , n'okutwaza mpora .
54006012	Rwana orugamba rurungi orw'okwikiriza , ohamye amagara agatahwaho , agu waayeteirwe obu waayatura gye noohiga omu maisho ga baakareebi baingi .
54006013	Ninkwehanangiriza omu maisho ga Ruhanga oha ebintu byona amagara , n'omu maisho ga Kristo Yesu owaahamize naagamba gye butunu omu maisho ga Pontio Pilaato ,
54006014	ku orinda eki naakuragiira , otaine kamogo kandi otarikuhaahuuzibwa , okuhitsya aha kuboneka kwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
54006015	Okwo kuboneka , Ruhanga aryakworeka omu bunaku bwakwo . Niwe mutegyeki wenka ohimbisibwa , Omugabe w'abagabe , Mukama w'abakama .
54006016	We wenka niwe aba otafa , kandi otuura omu mushana ogutahikwa . Tihariho muntu weena oramureebire , kandi tihariho oribaasa kumureeba . Ekitiinwa n'obutegyeki obutarihwaho bibe ebye . Amiina .
54006017	Yehanangirize abatungi b'omu nsi egi , barekye kwetunguura nari kuta amatsiko gaabo aha butungi obutarikwesigwa , kureka bagate ahari Ruhanga otutungisa ebintu byona atarikubariirira , ngu bitunanure .
54006018	Bashemereire kukora gye , bakaba abatungi omu birungi ebi barikukora , babe abagabi kandi efura .
54006019	Batyo beebiikire eitungo eriribabeera obuhamizo burungi omu biro ebiriija , bakabona kugumya amagara nyakabara .
54006020	Iwe Timoteeho , guma orinde eki waakwatsiibwe . Yetantare ebigaaniiro by'okuregyeta eby'abatatiina Ruhanga , n'empaka ezi beeta okumanya .
54006021	Haza bamwe ku baayesiimiraine okwo kumanya , baateishuka okwikiriza . Embabazi za Ruhanga zigume naimwe !
55001001	Nyowe Paulo , ou Ruhanga yaasiimire kuba entumwa ya Kristo Yesu , nkooherezibwa kurangirira amagara agaaraganisiibwe , agu tutungira omuri Kristo Yesu ,
55001002	ninkuramutsya iwe Timoteeho omwana wangye omukundwa , ninkwendeza emigisha , embabazi n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Taata , na Kristo Yesu Mukama waitu .
55001003	Ninsiima Ruhanga ou mpeereza n'omutima gwezire , nk'oku baatatenkuru baagizire .
55001004	Obutoosha musiima ku mba ninkwijuka omu kushaba kwangye , nyekiro na nyomushana . Niinyijuka amarira gaawe , kandi nyine orushusho rw'okukureeba , mbone kushemerererwa kimwe .
55001005	Nyijuka okwikiriza kwawe okw'amazima , oku Loisi nyokwenkuru na Euniike nyoko baabaire baine , kandi na hati nimpamya ku naiwe okwine .
55001006	Nikyo ndikukwijukiza ku oyenegyeza ekiconco kya Ruhanga ekiri omuriiwe , eki waatungire obu naakutaho emikono .
55001007	Manya Ruhanga taratuhaire mutima gw'obwoba , kureka ogw'amaani , na rukundo n'okwebariirira .
55001008	N'ahabw'ekyo otariitwa enshoni okugamba ebya Mukama waitu , nari okuzingirira nyowe embohe ye . Kureka okwatanise naanye okubonabonesibwa ahabw'Amakuru Marungi , nookwatsibwa amaani ga Ruhanga .
55001009	Manya niwe yaatujunire akatweta kuba abe , ti habw'ebi twakozire , kureka ahabw'enaama ye n'embabazi ezi yaatugiririire omuri Kristo Yesu iranaira .
55001010	Mbwenu ezo mbabazi zoorekyeirwe omu kuboneka kw'Omujuni waitu Kristo Yesu , owaacwekyereize rufu , akoorekyera omu Makuru Marungi amagara agatahwaho .
55001011	Ago Makuru Marungi nigo naateereirweho kuba omurangirizi , entumwa kandi omwegyesa ;
55001012	kandi nikyo ndikubonabonera ntyo . Kwonka tikirikuunyitsa nshoni , ahabw'okuba nimmanya ou naikiriize , kandi nimpamya ku arikubaasa kurinda eki naamukwatsize okuhitsya aha kiro kiri .
55001013	Guma okuratire eky'okureeberaho ky'ebigambo bihikire , ebi waahuriire ningamba , kandi ohamire omu kwikiriza n'omu kukunda ebiri omuri Kristo Yesu .
55001014	Ekirungi eki waakwatsiibwe , guma okirinde noohwerwa amaani ga Mutima Orikwera otuura omuriitwe .
55001015	Noomanya ku ab'omuri Asiya boona bantsigireho , haza barimu Fugelo na Herumogyene .
55001016	Mukama agirire ab'omuka ya Onesiforo embabazi , ahabw'okuba kaingi akanduhuura . Tarampemukireho ndi omu njegyere ,
55001017	kureka ku yaahikire Rooma , yansherura munonga , yaarugaho yambona .
55001018	Mukama amuhe okugirirwa embabazi ze aha kiro kiri ! Naiwe noomanya gye byona ebi yankoreire ndi Efeso .
55002001	Mbwenu nu , mwana wangye , guma ohamire noobangirwa amaani agari omuri Kristo Yesu .
55002002	Ebi waahuriire ningambira omu maisho ga baakareebi baingi , bikwatse abantu abeesigwa abaribaasa nabo kubyegyesa abandi .
55002003	Nk'oku ori omuserukare murungi wa Kristo Yesu , yemera eby'okubonabona kwawe .
55002004	Manya tihariho muserukare ori aha rugamba , oyetaasya omu mirabanamu y'abantu b'obutoosha , ahabw'okuba ekiba kimuri aha mutima , n'okugwisa gye owaamuhandiikire kuba omuserukare .
55002005	Omuzaani orikuhakana taheebwa kirunga yaaba atazaine naakuratira ebiragiro .
55002006	Omuhingi oteeganda niwe ashemerera kutunga omuganuro gw'ebi ayerize .
55002007	Ta omutima aha ki ndikugamba , haza Mukama naija kukuha okushoboorokyerwa byona .
55002008	Ijuka Yesu Kristo , n'okuzooka kwe omu bafiire , n'okuba mwijukuru wa Daudi , nk'Amakuru Marungi agu ndangirira oku garikugira .
55002009	Ahabw'ago Makuru Marungi , nikyo ndikubonabonera mbohesiibwe enjegyere nk'enkozi y'ebibi . Kwonka ekigambo kya Ruhanga kyo tikibohirwe .
55002010	N'ahabw'ekyo niinyemera byona ahabw'abatoorainwe , ngu nabo babone kutunga okujunwa n'ekitiinwa ekitahwaho ebiri omuri Kristo Yesu .
55002011	Ekigambo eki n'eky'okwesigwa ekirikugira kiti : ku turaabe twafiire hamwe nawe , biri turyaba abahuriire hamwe nawe .
55002012	Ku turikugumisiriza hamwe nawe , biri turyategyeka hamwe nawe . Ku turikumwoga , nawe aryatwoga .
55002013	Ku turaabe tutari beesigwa , we naaguma ari omwesigwa ahabw'okuba we tabaasa kwehakanisa .
55002014	Ebi ogume obibaijutsye noobeehanangiriza omu maisho ga Mukama , kwerinda okuhakana aha bigambo okutaine mugasho , kureka okuhwerekyereza abakuhurira .
55002015	Teeraho kusiimwa Ruhanga , ori omukozi otarikwitwa nshoni ahabw'ebi orikukora , kandi orikwegyesa gye ekigambo ky'amazima .
55002016	Guma oyetantare okuregyeta okurimu okutatiina Ruhanga , ahabw'okuba nikwongyera kureetera abantu okutamutiina .
55002017	Ebigambo byabo biryataniirira nk'ekookoro . Omuribo harimu Himenaayo ne Fileeto
55002018	abaateishukire amazima , bakagira ngu okuzooka omu bafiire kwaherize kubaho , batyo bakacuranzya okwikiriza kw'abamwe .
55002019	Kwonka omusingi ogu Ruhanga yaataireho guhamire , haza guriho akamanyiso . Nibyo bigambo ebirikugira biti : Mukama amanya abe Kandi biti : Weena oyatura eiziina rya Mukama arugye omu bibi .
55002020	Omuri nyaruju y'omuntu tihabamu bintu bya zaabu na feeza byonka , kureka habamu n'eby'ebiti n'eby'eibumba . Ebimwe bikoresibwa emirimo y'ekitiinwa , n'ebindi etari y'ekitiinwa .
55002021	Omuntu ku aryeyozyaho ebibi ebyo byona , aryaba ekintu ky'okukoresa eky'omutaano , ahabw'okuba naaba ayehaire mukama we kandi amwiniire omugasho , ashemeire kukoresibwa omurimo gwona omurungi .
55002022	N'ahabw'ekyo guma oyetantare okwetenga okubi okw'eminyeeto , okuratire okuhikiirira , okwikiriza , okukunda n'obusingye , hamwe n'abo abahoogyera Mukama baine omutima gwezire .
55002023	Otariikiriza kwetaasya omu mpaka z'obushema ezitaine buryo ; ahabw'okuba noomanya ku zirugwamu entongane .
55002024	Haza omuheereza wa Mukama tashemereire kuba entongani kureka okugirira buri muntu embabazi , ari omwegyesa w'engoga , orikugumisiriza ,
55002025	kandi orikuhana n'obucureezi abarikumuhakanisa , ngu shana Ruhanga akaabaha okwegarukamu , bamanya amazima ,
55002026	babona kuruga omu mutego gwa Sitaane , ogu abakwatiise kubakoresa ebi arikwenda .
55003001	Mbwenu omanye eki : omu biro by'aha muheru , haryabaho obunaku bw'akabi .
55003002	Manya abantu baryaba abarikwekunda , abarikururuuhira empiiha , abanyamaryo , abeetunguuzi , abajumi b'abantu , abagomera abaabazaire , entasiima , abatahikiriire ,
55003003	abataine saasi , abatarikwikaikanisibwa , ababeiherezi , abashiishagura ebyabo , enshaarizi , enyanga-birungi ,
55003004	endeebya , ebihanda , ab'ebihagi , abakunda okujarama kutari okukunda Ruhanga ,
55003005	abareebeka nk'abanyadiini , kwonka bakahakanisa obushoboorozi bwayo . Abantu nk'abo obeetantare !
55003006	Omuribo harimu abashenshera omu maka , bakahamba abakazi bafiire omutima abaremereirwe ebibi , kandi abarikutwarwa eby'okwetenga okubi ebitari bimwe ,
55003007	abatega buri muntu okutu , kwonka batahikye ha kumanya amazima .
55003008	Nk'oku Yanesi na Yamburesi baahakaniise Musa , n'abo bantu nikwo bahakanisa amazima nibo bantu abu obwengye bwabo bwasiisikaire , ababa ebikwangara by'okwikiriza .
55003009	Kwonka tibarigira bu bahikire hare , ahabw'okuba obushema bwabo buryamanywa boona , nk'obw'abo bashaija babiri .
55003010	Kwonka iwe , okakuratira okwegyesa kwangye , emitwarize yangye , eki ngyenderera omu magara gangye , okwikiriza kwangye , okugumisiriza kwangye , okukunda kwangye , n'okugumizamu kwangye ;
