55003011	okuhiiganisibwa kwangye n'okubonabona kwangye . Noomanya ebyambaireho ndi Antiokiya , na Ikonio , kandi na Lusitura ; oku naayemeire okwo kuhiiganisibwa ! Kwonka ebyo byona Mukama akabinkiza .
55003012	Manya boona abarikwenda kugira amagara agarimu okutiina Ruhanga , bakwataniise na Kristo Yesu , baryahiiganisibwa .
55003013	Kwonka abantu ababi n'ababeihabeihi baryayeyongyera kuba babi , babeihabeihe abandi , kandi nabo babeihabeihwe .
55003014	Kwonka iwe , gumira omu bi waayegire okaikiririza kimwe , noomanya owaabikwegyeise .
55003015	Manya okwiha omu buto okamanya Ebyahandiikirwe ebirikwera , ebyakuhabwire ku okujunwa kuri omu kwikiriza Kristo Yesu .
55003016	Ebyahandiikirwe byona bikahandiikisibwa Ruhanga , kandi biine omugasho omu kwegyesa eby'amazima , omu kuhakanisa obuhabe , omu kuhana n'omu kutendeka abantu omu by'okuhikiirira ,
55003017	ngu omuntu wa Ruhanga abone kuba ohikire , oine ebirikwetengwa kukora omurimo gwona omurungi .
55004001	Ninkwehanangiririza omu maisho ga Ruhanga na Kristo Yesu , oricwera abahuriire n'abafiire orubanja , kandi ahabw'okugaruka kwe n'obukama bwe ,
55004002	guma orangirire ekigambo n'omuhimbo , omu bunaku obushemereire n'obutashemereire . Ohane , oteise kandi oyehanangirize otarikwekanasha omu kugumisiriza n'omu kwegyesa .
55004003	Ahabw'okuba obunaku buryahika , obu abantu baryanga kuhurira enyegyesa y'amazima , kwonka ahabw'okugira amatu garikubaryaryata , baryayerundaanira ababeegyesa ebi barikwenda .
55004004	Amatu baryagahenderemu ebiti , ngu barekye kuhurira eby'amazima , bahabire omu kuhurira ebiteekyerezo ebigunzirwe .
55004005	Kwonka iwe , guma otuurize , oyemere okubonabonesibwa , okore omurimo gw'omurangirizi w'Amakuru Marungi , ohikize kimwe obuheereza bwawe .
55004006	Manya nyowe ndi haihi kutambwa nk'empongano y'ebyokunywa eshukwa aha itambiro ; obunaku bwangye bw'okuruga omu nsi buhikire .
55004007	Ndwaine orugamba rurungi , empaka z'okwiruka nziherize , ndinzire okwikiriza .
55004008	Eki ntsigaize n'okutunga ekirunga ky'okuhikiirira eki mbiikiirwe , eki Mukama , omuramuzi ohikiriire , arimpa ahari ekyo Kiro , kandi tiinye nyenka , kureka na boona abakunda okugaruka kwe .
55004009	Teeraho kwija juba ahi ndi .
55004010	Manya Demasi , ahabw'okukunda eby'ensi egi , akantsigaho , yaaza Tesalonika ; Keresensi yaaza Galatiya na Tito yaaza Dalumatiya .
55004011	Luka wenka niwe ntsigaire nawe . Ihayo Mariko , oije nawe , ahabw'okuba nangasira munonga omu murimo gw'obuheereza .
55004012	Tukiko nkamutuma Efeso .
55004013	Omu kwija onyijanire omunagiro gu naatsigire Turoa owa Karipo . Ondeetere n'ebitabo , munomuno eby'emizingo y'empu .
55004014	Alekisandero , omuheesi w'emiringa , akankora kubi munonga ; Mukama niwe arimuzimuurira ebi yaakozire .
55004015	Naiwe omwerinde , ahabw'okuba akarwanisa munonga eby'obutumwa bwaitu .
55004016	Omu kwetonganira kwangye okw'okubanza , tihaine wandwaineho , boona bakampungaho . Nkaabaasibwa ki bareka kukiturwa !
55004017	Kwonka Mukama akandwanaho , yampangaana kurangirira ekigambo omu bwijwire , ngu Abanyamahanga boona babone kukihurira . Ntyo naashahurwa omu kanwa k'entare .
55004018	Mukama aryaguma ankize akabi koona , kandi anjune , ndugyeho mpikye omu bukama bwe obw'omu iguru . Aheebwe ekitiinwa ebiro byona . Amiina .
55004019	Ndamukiza Purisika na Akwila , n'ab'omu ka ya Onesiforo .
55004020	Eraasito akatsigara Korinto , kandi Turofimo nkamutsiga Mileeto arwaire .
55004021	Teeraho nk'oku orikubaasa kwija ebiro by'embeho bitakahikire . Eubulo na Pudensi na Liino na Kalaudiya n'abanyaruganda boona nibakuramutsya .
55004022	Mukama agume naiwe . Embabazi za Ruhanga zigume naimwe .
56001001	Nyowe Paulo , omuheereza wa Ruhanga , kandi entumwa ya Yesu Kristo , naakuramutsya iwe Tito , omwana wangye buzima omu kwikiriza kwaitu twena , ninkwendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Taata , na Kristo Yesu Omujuni waitu . Manya nkatumwa kwenegyeza okwikiriza kw'entoore za Ruhanga , n'okubamanyisa amazima agarikuhikaana n'okumutiina ; obwo baine amatsiko g'okutunga amagara agatahwaho , agu Ruhanga otabeiha yaaraganiise iranaira . Haza omu bunaku buhikire Ruhanga ogwo , Omujuni waitu , akooreka ekigambo kye , yandagiira nankwatsa omurimo gw'okukirangirira .
56001002	
56001003	
56001004	
56001005	Eki naakutsigiire Kureete n'okwenda ngu ohikiirize ebyabaire bitakakozirwe , kandi n'okutaho abakuru omuri buri rurembo , nk'oku naakuragiire .
56001006	Ou oraagume waatoorana , abe ari omuntu otaine ki arikuhaahuuzibwa , oshweire omukazi omwe , ou abaana be bari abaikiriza , kandi abatarikwetwa birare nari entahurira .
56001007	Manya omureeberezi , nk'owaakwatsiibwe kureeberera eby'eka ya Ruhanga , ashemereire kuba otaine kirikumuhaahuuzibwa , otari munyamaryo , otarikurahuka kuguubwa kubi , nari omusinzi nari ow'omwaga , nainga orikururuuhira okutunga .
56001008	Kureka abe orikukunira abagyenyi , enkunzi y'ebirungi , orikwebariirira , omwinganisa , orikwera kandi orikutegyeka omubiri gwe .
56001009	Ashemereire kuhamira aha bigambo eby'amazima nk'oku yaabyegyesiibwe , haza abone kushoboororera abantu enyegyesa ehikire , n'okusinga abarikugihakanisa .
56001010	Manya hariho abantu baingi entahurira , abagamba busha kandi engobya , munomuno ab'omu kigombe ky'abashazirwe .
56001011	Abo bashemereire kuhunamibwa , ahabw'okuba nibasheenya amaka nibeegyesa ebi batakwegyeise , ngu babone kwetungira amagoba gakoire .
56001012	Omwe omuribo , omurangi w'abaabo , akagira ati : Abanyakureete obutoosha baba embeihi , enyamaishwa mbi , abanyanda-endiirabusha .
56001013	Kandi obwamushinja obwo n'obw'amazima . N'ahabw'ekyo obahane n'amaani , babone kuba abahikire omu kwikiriza ,
56001014	barereerere aho kuta omutima aha biteekyerezo ebigunjano eby'Ekiyudaaya , nari aha bi abanga amazima baragiira .
56001015	Aha bashemeire , byona biba ebishemeire ; kwonka aha basiisikaire n'abatarikwikiriza , tihariho kiba ekishemeire ; ahabw'okuba obwengye bwabo n'emitima yaabo bisiisikaire .
56001016	Beegamba ku barikumanya Ruhanga ; kwonka omu bi barikukora bamwehakana ; n'ab'okunugwa , entahurira kandi abatashemereire murimo gwona omurungi .
56002001	Kwonka iwe , guma oyegyese ebishemereire enyegyesa ehikire .
56002002	Yehanangirize abagurusi , barekye kusinda , babe abatarikwegiza , abarikwetegyereza , abahikire omu kwikiriza , omu kukunda n'omu kugumisiriza .
56002003	Abakaikuru nabo obeehanangirize otyo , bagire emitwarize y'abarikwera , batarikubeiherera bantu , nari okuba bantabo yaago ; kureka babe ab'okwegyesa ebirungi ,
56002004	babone kumanyiiza abakazi bato kukunda baibabo n'abaana baabo ;
56002005	babe abarikwetegyereza , abatarikushambana , abarikwecurengyera eka , ab'embabazi kandi abarikworobera baibabo , ekigambo kya Ruhanga kibone kutagaywa .
56002006	N'abatsigazi obeehanangirize otyo , babe abeerinzi .
56002007	Omu miringo yoona , guma oyeyorekye ori eky'okureeberaho omu birungi bi orikukora ; n'omu kwegyesa kwawe oyorekye ku ori ow'amazima kandi otarikwegiza .
56002008	Emigambire yaawe ebe ehikire etarikuhaahuuzibwa , orikukuhakanisa abone kwitwa enshoni , ataine kibi kyona eki arikutugambaho .
56002009	Yehanangirize abahuuku kworobera bakama baabo , n'okubananura omuri byona , batari b'okubahakanisa .
56002010	Tibashemereire kwibaguzibwa , kureka okworekyera kimwe obwesigwa obw'amazima ; batyo omuri byona babone kusiimisa enyegyesa ya Ruhanga Omujuni waitu .
56002011	Manya embabazi za Ruhanga zireebekire zaareetera abantu boona kujunwa .
56002012	Ezo mbabazi nizo zitwegyesa okureka eby'okuteeta hari Ruhanga n'okwetenga eby'ensi , tukaguma turi abeerinzi , abahikire kandi abarikutiina Ruhanga omu busingye obu .
56002013	Obwo tutegyereize eki twineho amatsiko marungi , nikwo kuboneka okw'ekitiinwa okwa Ruhanga waitu omukuru , kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo .
56002014	Kristo ogwo akeehayo ahabwaitu kutucungura omu kutahikiirira kwona , n'okweyereza abantu ngu babe abe ahabwe , baine omuhimbo gw'okukora ebirungi .
56002015	Ebyo obe nibyo waaguma nooyegyesa , nooyehanangiriza noohana n'obushoboorozi bwona . Hatarigira owaakugaya .
56003001	Guma oijutsye abantu baawe kworobera abategyeki n'abaine obushoboorozi , n'okubahurira beeteekateekire kukora omurimo gwona omurungi .
56003002	Batagirira omuntu weena ou baagambaho kubi . Bagume beetantare entongane , babe abacureezi , kandi boorekye abantu boona obufura .
56003003	Manya naitwe ira tukaba turi abashema , entahurira , abahabire , abarikutegyekwa okwetenga okubi n'amashemererwa ebitari bimwe , obwo nitumarira ebiro by'amagara gaitu omu itima n'omu ihari , nitwangwa abantu kandi nitwangana .
56003004	Kwonka embabazi za Ruhanga Omujuni waitu , na rukundo ye aha bantu , ku byareebekire ,
56003005	yaatujuna . Taratujunire habw'okuhikiirira kw'ebi twakozire , kureka ahabw'esaasi ye , naakoresa okwogibwa oku Mutima Orikwera atuheeramu okuzaarwa busya , tukatunga amagara masya .
56003006	Mutima ogwo Ruhanga akamutushukaho omu bushaagaine , naamurabya omuri Yesu Kristo Omujuni waitu ,
56003007	ngu tubone kuhikiirizibwa ahabw'embabazi ze , n'okugira amatsiko g'okutunga amagara agatahwaho .
56003008	Ekigambo ekyo n'eky'okwesigwa . Mbwenu niinyenda ebyo ku obihamisiriza , reero abaikiriize Ruhanga babone kuta omutima aha kwehenengyera okukora ebirungi . Ebyo ni birungi kandi nibigasira abantu .
56003009	Kwonka oyetantare empaka z'obufamutima , n'eby'okurondooza obuzaare , n'okuhakanira eryo , n'entongane ezikwatiraine n'eiteeka ; ahabw'okuba ebyo tibiine mugasho kandi n'ebya busha .
56003010	Orikureetera abandi kwecwaho , ku oraaheze kumuhana rimwe nari kabiri , omurekye .
56003011	Noomanya omuntu nk'ogwo ku ahabire , kandi ku ari enyabibi , orikwemanya ku asingirwe orubanja .
56003012	Ku ndaakutumeho Aritema nari Tukiko , teeraho kwija onshangye Nikopoli , ahabw'okuba niyo mpamize kumarira ebiro by'embeho .
56003013	Teeraho nk'oku orikubaasa kutungira Zeena omunyamateeka na Apolo eby'okubarahukiza orugyendo rwabo ; oreebe ngu tibaine ki babuzirwe .
56003014	Kandi abantu baitu ka beegye kwehenengyera kukora ebirungi , babone kutungira abakyenire eby'okubakwatsa , n'okutaba abataine mugasho .
56003015	Boona abu nyine nibakuramutsya . Naiwe oturamukize abarikutukunda abu tukwatiraine nabo omu kwikiriza . Embabazi za Ruhanga zigume naimwe mwena .
57001001	Nyowe Paulo , embohe ahabwa Kristo Yesu , na Timoteeho mwene waitu , twakuramutsya iwe Filemooni omukozi mugyenzi waitu omukundwa ,
57001002	na Apofiya munyanyaitwe , na Arikipo omuserukare mugyenzi waitu , n'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza eky'omwawe .
57001003	Nitubendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Tataitwe , na Mukama Yesu Kristo .
57001004	Obutoosha ku nkwijuka omu kushaba kwangye , nsiima Ruhanga wangye .
57001005	Manya mpurira okukunda n'okwesiga ebi oiniire Mukama Yesu n'abarikwera boona .
57001006	Kandi nshaba , ngu okukwatanisa n'abandi omu kwikiriza kwawe kurugwemu okwongyera kushoboorokyerwa ebirungi byona ebi tutungira omuri Kristo .
57001007	Mwene Taata , rukundo yaawe endeeteire okushemererwa kwingi , yangarura omutima omunda , ahabw'okuba oruhwire emitima y'abarikwera .
57001008	N'ahabw'ekyo , nobu ndaabe ndi mugyenzi waawe omuri Kristo , ntarikutiina kukuragiira kukora ekirikwetengwa ,
57001009	kwonka ahabwa rukundo , nkaasiimire kugira eki naakushaba . Eki nkaayenzire kukikushaba , nobu ndaabe nyowe Paulo , omujwekyerwa wa Kristo Yesu , hati ndi omu kihome ahabwe .
57001010	Ninkweshengyereza ahabw'omwana wangye Onesimo , ou mbaire ishe ndi omu kihome .
57001011	Ira akaba atakwiniire mugasho , kwonka hati buzimazima naakugasira , kandi naanye nangasira .
57001012	Mbwenu ngugwo naamukugarurira , nk'owaakugarurira orura rwangye buzima .
57001013	Nkaashemereirwe kuguma mmwine , ngu ampeereze omu mwanya gwawe ndi omu kihome , ninturwa Amakuru Marungi .
57001014	Kwonka nsiimire kutakora kintu kyona otaikiriize , ngu ekirungi kyawe kirekye kuba eky'okugyemwa , kureka eky'okweyendera .
57001015	Shana nikyo yaakurugiireho okumara omwanya mukye , ngu obone kumugarukanira kimwe ,
57001016	kwonka atakiri muhuuku , kureka naakiraho , ari omunyaruganda omukundwa ; munomuno ahariinye , kandi okukira munonga ahariirwe , okwatiraine nawe omu buntu n'omuri Mukama .
57001017	Mbwenu ku oraabe nombara ngu nkwatwaniise naiwe omu kwikiriza , mmwakiire nk'oku waakuunyakiire .
57001018	Ku araabe buzimazima aine eki arakushaagiize , nari akwineho eibanja ryona , obe niinye waariihuza .
57001019	Nyowe Paulo , naahandiika eki n'omukono gwangye . Niinyija kukwihura nyowe Paulo , ntagambire ku naiwe onyineho eibanja , kandi eryo ibanja niiwe nyakabara .
57001020	Eego , mwene taata , niinyenda ku onnanura omuri Mukama , okaruhuura omutima gwangye nk'omunyaruganda omuri Kristo .
57001021	Naakuhandiikira nyine obwesigye aha kworoba kwawe nimmanya ku orikwija kukora ebirikweshumba aha bi naagamba .
57001022	Kandi ekindi , onteguurire ekishengye ky'okucumbikamu , ahabw'okuba nyine amatsiko , ngu ahabw'okushaba kwanyu niinyija kurekurwa , mbagarukire .
57001023	Epafura , embohe mugyenzi wangye ahabw'okuturwa Kristo Yesu , naakuramutsya ;
57001024	Mariko , Arisitariko , Demasi na Luka abakozi bagyenzi bangye , nabo nibakuramutsya .
57001025	Embabazi za Mukama Yesu Kristo zigume naimwe .
58001001	Ira Ruhanga akaba agambira baatatenkuriitwe omu miringo mingi etari emwe , naaraba omu barangi .
58001002	Kwonka omu biro ebi ebihereerukire , itwe atugambiriire omu Mwana ou yaataireho kuba omuhunguzi w'ebintu byona .
58001003	Niwe kimurinkano ky'ekitiinwa kya Ruhanga , kandi ekyeshusha buzima ky'obwaruhanga bwe , ohigikisa ebintu byona ekigambo kye eky'amaani . Ku yaaherize kukora eky'okwozyaho ebibi , yaashutama aha rubaju rwa buryo orwa Nyakusinga omu iguru .
58001004	Mwana yaakiza atyo baamaraika obukuru , nk'oku eiziina eri yaatungire ririkukiriza kimwe agaabo ekitiinwa .
58001005	Mbwenu ni maraika ki ou Ruhanga aragizire ati : Niiwe Mwana wangye ; eri izooba naakuzaara ? Nainga shi ati : Ndyamubeera ishe , nawe ambeere omwana ?
58001006	Kandi hoona , obu Ruhanga yaareeta Omwana we omujigaijo omu nsi , akagira ati : Ka baamaraika ba Ruhanga boona bamuramye .
58001007	Haza ahari baamaraika yaagira ati : Ruhanga ahindura baamaraika be omuyaga , n'abaheereza be abahindura endimi z'omuriro .
58001008	Kwonka aha Mwana we , akagira ati : Ai Ruhanga , ekitebe kyawe ky'obugabe n'eky'ebiro n'ebiro ; obugabe bwawe obutegyekyesa obwinganisa .
58001009	Okunda okuhikiirira kandi oyanga okutahikiirira ; nikyo Ruhanga , Ruhanga waawe , akusiigiire amajuta okashemererwa okukira bagyenzi baawe , akakuha obunanukye bw'okusiigwa amajuta g'obugabe .
58001010	Kandi ati : Iwe Nyakubaho , omu kutandika okahanga ensi , n'eiguru waarikoresa engaro zaawe .
58001011	Ebyo biryahwaho , kwonka Iwe ogumaho . Byona biryakura nk'ekijwaro ,
58001012	oryabikuba nk'omunagiro , bihindukye nk'oku bahindura ebijwaro . Kwonka iwe , oguma ori nk'oku ori ; n'emyaka yaawe terihwaho .
58001013	Kandi ni maraika ki ou Ruhanga aragizire ati : Shutama aha rubaju rwangye rwa buryo , okuhitsya obu ndihindura abazigu baawe , endibatiro y'ebigyere byawe ?
58001014	Nbwenu baamaraika boona t'emitima erikuheereza Ruhanga , eyaatumirwe kukwatsa ab'okutunga okujunwa ?
58002001	Nikyo tushemereire kuta munonga omutima aha bi twahurira , ngu tutakaahaba tukabirugaho .
58002002	Ekigambo ekyarangiriirwe baamaraika kikareebeka kiri eky'amazima , kandi weena otarakikuratiire nari okukyorobera akatunga ekifubiro ekimushemereire .
58002003	Mbwenu itwe turyakira tuta , ku turiba tuteetaire ha kujunwa kukuru okurikwingana kutyo ? Mukama niwe yaabandize kukuturangirira , abaamuhuriire nabo baakutuhamiza .
58002004	Na Ruhanga yaataho okukuhamya n'obumanyiso n'eby'okutangaaza n'eby'amahano ebitari bimwe . Yaataho n'okugaba ebiconco bya Mutima orikwera , nk'oku arikwenda .
58002005	Manya baamaraika tibo Ruhanga yaahaire ensi eribaho kugitegyeka ei turikugambaho .
58002006	Ahandi omu Byahandiikirwe kikagambwa kiti : Omuntu ni kintu ki , iwe kumwijuka , nari omwana w'omuntu , iwe kumwetaho ?
58002007	Okamuhanga , yaabura hakye kwingana na baamaraika , waamujweka ekirunga ky'ekitiinwa n'okuhimbisibwa , waamwemeka kutegyeka ebi waakozire n'emikono yaawe ,
58002008	waata ebintu byona ahansi y'ebigyere bye . Mbwenu omu kutegyekyesa omuntu ebintu byona , tihaine kintu kyona eki yaatsigireho atakimutegyekyeise . Kwonka hati titukareebire omuntu naategyeka ebintu byona .
58002009	Kureka Yesu , owaagarwirwe ahansi ya baamaraika omwanya mukye , niwe turikureeba ajwekirwe ekirunga ky'ekitiinwa n'okuhimbisibwa , ahabw'okwemera obusaasi bw'okufa . Ruhanga ahabw'embabazi ze akakora ebyo byona , ngu Yesu afe ahabw'abantu boona .
58002010	Manya kikaba kihikire Ruhanga , ou ebintu byona bibaho ahabwe kandi obibaisaho , ngu omu kwenda kuhitsya abaana baingi aha kitiinwa , ashemereire kubanza kuhindura owaabareeteire okujunwa okuhikiire kimwe , naamurabya omu busaasi .
58002011	Ahabw'okuba ogwo oyeza , n'abo abeezibwa , boona baine obukomooko bumwe . Nikyo atarikwatirwa nshoni kubeeta beene ishe ,
58002012	naagira ati : Ndyarangirira eiziina ryawe omuri beene waitu nkuhimbisize omu ruteerane ruhango .
58002013	Kandi ahandi ati : Ndyamwesiga . N'ahandi ati : Reeba ndi aha hamwe n'abaana abu Ruhanga yampaire .
58002014	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku abaana bagira omubiri n'eshagama , na Yesu nikwo yaabaire omuntu nkabo . Ekyo akakikora ngu omu kufa kwe abone kucwekyereza ogwo ogira obushoboorozi bwa rufu , niwe Sitaane ;
58002015	kandi ngu aihe omu buhuuku abantu boona , abaabaire bamazire amagara gaabo goona bari abahuuku ahabw'okutiina okufa .
58002016	Manya baamaraika tibo aine nabo obuzaare , kureka abwine na baijukuru ba Aburahamu , nk'oku ekyahandiikirwe kirikugira .
58002017	N'ahabw'ekyo kikamushemerera kushushana na beene ishe omu miringo yoona , ngu abone kuba omuhongyerezi omukuru ow'embabazi , kandi omwesigwa omu kuheereza Ruhanga , naahongyerera ebibi by'abantu .
58002018	Ahabw'okuba we , nk'oku yaabonabonesiibwe atyo kandi akoohibwa , naabaasa kuhwera abo abarikwohibwa .
58003001	N'ahabw'ekyo , banyaruganda abarikwera , naimwe abaayetsirwe kubagana amagara g'omu iguru , muteekateekye munonga ahari Yesu entumwa , kandi omuhongyerezi omukuru ow'enyikiriza yaitu .
58003002	Akaba ari omwesigwa ahari ogwo owaamutaireho , nk'oku Musa nawe yaabaire ari omwesigwa omu nju ya Ruhanga yoona .
58003003	Kwonka Yesu akamanywa ku ashemereire kuheebwa ekitiinwa ekirikukira ekya Musa , nk'oku omwombeki w'enju agira ekitiinwa kirikukira eky'egyo nju .
58003004	Manya enju yoona egira omwombeki , kwonka omwombeki w'ebintu byona ni Ruhanga .
58003005	Mbwenu Musa akaba ari omwesigwa omu nju ya Ruhanga yoona , nk'omugaragwa w'okuhamya ebyabaire nibiija kugambwaho bwanyima .
58003006	Haza Kristo we akaba ari omwesigwa ahabw'okuba akaba ari omwana wa Ruhanga orikureeberera enju ye . Kandi egyo nju niitwe , twaba tuhamize obwesigye bwaitu kandi nitubwesiimira ahabw'ebi twineho amatsiko .
58003007	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku Mutima Orikwera arikugira ati : Eri izooba ku muraahurire eiraka rye ,
58003008	mutagangaaza emitima yaanyu nk'obu mwangomera aha kiro ky'okugyezibwa omu ihamba ,
58003009	ei baashwenkuriimwe bangyereize , n'obu baraabe baamazire emyaka makumi ana nibareeba ebi ndikukora .
58003010	Nikyo naagwisiziibwe kubi ab'obusingye obwo , nkagira nti : Obutoosha omu mitima yaabo bahaba ; tibakamanyaga mitwarize yangye .
58003011	Nikyo naarahiriire nyine ekiniga , nti : Tibaritaaha mu kihuumuro ki mbainiire .
58003012	Banyaruganda , mwerinde , omuriimwe hatakaabamu oine omutima mubi , ogutarikwikiriza , gukamureetera kuruga ahari Ruhanga ohuriire .
58003013	Kwonka buri izooba mugumyane obunaku butakarengire , omuriimwe hatagira owaagangaazibwa okubeihwabeihwa ekibi .
58003014	Ahabw'okuba tukwatanisiize omuri Kristo , twaba nituhamiza kimwe obwesigye bwaitu obwabandize , tukabuhitsya aha muheru .
58003015	Manya ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Eri izooba , ku muraahurire eiraka rye , mutagangaaza emitima yaanyu nk'obu mwangomera .
58003016	Mbwenu ni baahi abaahuriire , haza bakagoma ? T'abo boona abaarugire Misiri beebembeirwe Musa ?
58003017	Kandi abaamazire emyaka makumi ana nibamugwisa kubi ni baahi ? T'abo abaasiisire , abu emitumbi yaabo yaagwereraine omu ihamba ?
58003018	Kandi ni baahi abu yaarahiriire , ati : Tibaritaaha mu kihuumuro kimbainiire ? T'abo abaagomire ?
58003019	N'ahabw'ekyo nitureeba ku baaremirwe kutaahamu ahabw'okutaikiriza .
58004001	Mbwenu okuraganisa kw'okutaaha omu kihuumuro kya Ruhanga ku kuraabe kukiriho , ka twerinde , hatakaagira omuriimwe owaashangwa aremirwe kukihikaho .
58004002	Ahabw'okuba naitwe Amakuru Marungi gakatuhikaho , nkabo oku gaabahikireho . Kwonka obutumwa obu baahuriire tibwine ki bwabagasiire , ahabw'okuba abaabuhuriire bakashangwa bataine kwikiriza .
58004003	Manya itwe abaikiriza , tutaaha omuri ekyo kihuumuro , nk'oku yaagizire ati : Nikyo naagiriire ekiniga , nkarahira nti : Tibaritaaha mu kihuumuro kyangye ; n'obu emirimo ye eraabe yaahwaire obu ensi yaahangwa .
58004004	Manya ahandi akagamba aha kiro kya mushanju ati : Ruhanga akahuumura aha kiro kya mushanju , yaareka kukora emirimo ye yoona .
58004005	Kandi hoona aho niho yaagiriire ati : Tibaritaaha mu kihuumuro kyangye .
58004006	Bariya abaabandize kuhurira Amakuru Marungi , bakaremwa kukitaahamu ahabw'okutaikiriza kwabo . Kwonka hariho abandi abaikiriziibwe kukitaahamu , bakahuumura hamwe na Ruhanga .
58004007	Nikyo Ruhanga yaateereireho ekindi kiro ekirikwetwa Eri izooba , akakigambira omuri Daudi hahingwireho ebiro bingi , omu bigambo ebyaheza kugambwaho , ati : Eri izooba , ku muraahurire eiraka rye , mutagangaaza emitima yaanyu .
58004008	Manya kuri Yoshua yaabahikize omuri ekyo kihuumuro , Ruhanga takugambire bwanyima aha rindi izooba .
58004009	N'ahabw'ekyo hakiriyo ekihuumuro kya Sabato ekibiikiirwe abantu ba Ruhanga .
58004010	Ahabw'okuba weena otaaha omu kihuumuro kya Ruhanga , arekyera aho kukora emirimo ye , nk'oku Ruhanga yaarekire eye .
58004011	Reero nu , ka twezirikye kutaaha omuri ekyo kihuumuro , hatakaagira owaagwisibwa okugoma kw'omuringo nk'ogwo .
58004012	Manya ekigambo kya Ruhanga kiine amagara kandi nikikora ; kiine obwogi okukira rurara y'amoogi abiri . Nikicumita , kihika ei kitaanisiza omutima n'amagara , engingo n'omushokooro ; kandi kimanyira kimwe ebiteekateeko by'omuntu , n'ebi omutima gwe gurikwenda kukora .
58004013	Tihariho kihangirwe kyona ekisherekirwe omu maisho ga Ruhanga , kureka byona byerwirwe biri entangaare , omu maisho g'Ogwo ou turi ab'okweshoboororaho .
58004014	Mbwenu nk'oku twine omuhongyerezi omukuru , owaataahire omu iguru , niwe Yesu Omwana wa Ruhanga , ka tuhamire omu kwikiriza kwaitu oku twayatwire .
58004015	Ahabw'okuba titwine Muhongyerezi omukuru , otarikubaasa kusaasira hamwe naitwe omu bweremwa bwaitu , kureka ogwo owaayohiibwe omu miringo yoona nkaitwe , kwonka atakore kibi .
58004016	N'ahabw'ekyo , n'obwesigye bwingi , ka twirire haihi ekitebe kya Ruhanga ow'embabazi , tubone kugirirwa esaasi n'okutunga emigisha y'okutuhwera omu bunaku bu turikugyetengyeramu .
58005001	Manya omuhongyerezi omukuru weena otoorainwe omu bantu , ateebwaho kubamarira eby'akakwate kaabo na Ruhanga , kuhayo emitoijo n'ebitambo eby'okuhongyerera ebibi .
58005002	Naabaasa kutwaza gye abashema n'abahabire , ahabw'okuba nawe obweremwa bumuturukire oku n'oku .
58005003	N'ahabw'ekyo aba ow'okuhonga ebitambo ahabw'ebibi bye wenka , n'ahabw'ebyabandi bantu .
58005004	Kandi tihariho n'omwe oyeha obwo bukuru , atabweteirwe Ruhanga nk'oku Arooni yaabweteirwe .
58005005	Na Kristo tareetungwire kuba omuhongyerezi omukuru , kureka akateebwaho Ogwo owaamugizire ati : Ori Omwana wangye ; eri izooba naakuzaara .
58005006	Kandi n'ahandi naagira ati : Ori omuhongyerezi ow'orugyero rwa Melikizedeki , kandi nikwo origuma ebiro byona .
58005007	Yesu , omu biro bi yaamazire omu nsi , akashaba , yaayeshengyereza n'amarira , yaahoogyera Ruhanga owaakubaasize kumukiza okufa , kandi ahabw'okumutiina yaahurirwa .
58005008	N'obu araabe yaabaire ari Omwana wa Ruhanga , kwonka ebi yaabonabonesiibwe bikamwegyesa okworoba .
58005009	Ku yaaherize kuhikiiririzibwa kimwe , yaahinduka oreetera abamworobera boona kutunga okujunwa okutahwaho ;
58005010	obwo Ruhanga yaaherize kumurangirira ku ari omuhongyerezi omukuru ow'orugyero rwa Melikizedeki .
58005011	Ekyo twine bingi eby'okukigambaho , kwonka biine eishoboorora , ahabw'okuba muhindukire abatarikurahuka kushoboorokyerwa .
58005012	Omu bunaku obu , n'obu muraabe mushemereire kuba abeegyesa , kwonka nimwetenga kugira ow'okubeegyesa obundi ebigambo bya Ruhanga ebibandizibwaho . Nimwetenga amate , bitari byokurya bigumire .
58005013	Manya weena otungwa amate , aba akiri mubisi omu kigambo ky'okuhikiirira , ahabw'okuba n'omwana .
58005014	Kwonka ebyokurya ebigumire biba eby'abaahamire omu by'omutima , abaamanyire bukuru kutaanisa ekirungi n'ekibi .
58006001	N'ahabw'ekyo ka turekye kwegyesa ebya Kristo ebi twabandiizeho , tugumizemu kuhika aha by'abaahamire omu by'omutima . Turekye kugaruka kutaho omusingi gw'okweteisa ebifiire ebi twabaire nitukora , kandi n'eby'okwikiriza Ruhanga ,
58006002	n'okwegyesa eby'emigyenzo y'okweyeza , eby'okutaho engaro , eby'okuzooka kw'abafiire , n'eby'okucwerwa orubanja rwa bwamperayo .
58006003	Ekyo turyakikora Ruhanga ku ariba asiimire .
58006004	Manya abantu abaabaire baayakiirwe omushana gwa Ruhanga , bwanyima bakagwa , kiba kitakibaasika kubeeteisisa obwa kabiri , ahabw'okuba baba baarorize aha burungi bwa Ruhanga , kandi baatungire Mutima Orikwera .
58006005	Baba baarorize aha burungi bw'ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'aha maani g'obusingye oburiija .
58006006	Bwanyima bagwa , bagaruka babamba Omwana wa Ruhanga aha musharaba kandi bamuhemura butunu .
58006007	Ruhanga aha omugisha eitaka erihaaga enjura erigwireho kaingi , rikeeza ebimera ebirikugasira abaarihingire .
58006008	Kwonka eryo itaka ku rimeza amahwa n'amatojo , riba ritakiine mugasho , ryenagire omu kabi k'okukyeenwa Ruhanga , n'okucwekyerezibwa omuriro .
58006009	Kwonka , imwe abakundwa , n'obu turaabe nitugamba tutyo , ahabwanyu nituhamya ku mwine ebirungi ebirikukiraho , eby'okubahitsya aha kujunwa .
58006010	Manya Ruhanga n'omwinganisa , takaabaasa kurenzya amaisho ebi mukora , na rukundo ei mwayorekire ahabwe nimuheereza abarikwera , nk'oku murikukora na hati .
58006011	Nitwenda buri omwe omuriimwe ku ayoreka omuhimbo nk'ogwo okuhitsya aha muheru , obu ebi aineho amatsiko birihikiiririzibwa kimwe .
58006012	Titurikwenda ngu mube abarikweganda , kureka okuba nk'abo abaikiriza n'abagumisiriza , haza bakahungura ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise .
58006013	Manya Ruhanga , obu yaaraganisa Aburahamu , ahabw'okushangwa ataine ondiijo orikumukira ou akurahiire , akeerahira ,
58006014	naagira ati : Buzimazima ndyakuha omugisha , nkuzaarurukanise .
58006015	Reero Aburahamu , ku yaagumisiriize atyo , yaatunga eki yaaraganisiibwe .
58006016	N'ekya buzima , abantu barahira orikubakira , kandi ekibamara empaka n'okurahira .
58006017	Na Ruhanga , ku yaayenzire kuhamiza ab'okuhungura eki yaaraganiise , oku atahindura naama ye , yaagihamisa endahiro .
58006018	Ruhanga ogwo nikwo kukoresa ebintu bibiri ebitahinduka , ebi atabaasa kubeiheramu . N'ahabw'ekyo , itwe abaamuhungiireho , ebyo bintu byombi bituteera omuhimbo gw'okuhamira aha matsiko g'okutunga ebi yaaturaganiise .
58006019	Ago matsiko n'agaitu . Gari nk'enkondo eri omu mitima yaitu , kandi gahamiiremu kimwe . Googa omu mukingo , gahika endugu
58006020	ei Yesu , kateera-rume , yaatucwereire ekirari , ari omuhongyerezi omukuru ow'orugyero rwa Melikizedeki , kandi nikwo ariguma ebiro byona .
58007001	Melikizedeki ogwo akaba ari omugabe wa Saleemu , kandi omuhongyerezi wa Ruhanga Rukiraboona . Akabugana Aburahamu naaruga aha rugamba kwita abagabe , yaamushabira omugisha .
58007002	Aburahamu nawe yaamucweraho ekicweka kya ikumi ky'ebi yaabaire anyagire . Amakuru g'okubanza g'eiziina Melikizedeki , ngu n'omugabe w'okuhikiirira , kandi ngu n'omugabe wa Saleemu , amakuru ngu omugabe w'obusingye .
58007003	Omu Byahandiikirwe tibarikworeka ishe nari nyina , nainga akarande ka baishenkuru , n'obu kwakuba okworeka okuzaarwa kwe nari okufa kwe . Bamushushanisa nk'Omwana wa Ruhanga ; atuura ari omuhongyerezi ebiro byona .
58007004	Ebishi n'omuntu rugambwa , ou tatenkuriitwe Aburahamu yaahaire kimwe kya ikumi ky'eminyago !
58007005	Kandi baijukuru ba Leevi abo , abatunga omwoga gw'obuhongyerezi , baikirizibwa omu iteeka kutwara kimwe kya ikumi ekirikuruga omu bantu beene waabo , nabo nobu baraabe bari ab'orura rwa Aburahamu .
58007006	Kwonka ogwo muntu owaabaire atarikubakomookamu , Aburahamu akamutoijera kimwe kya ikumi , kandi yaashabira omugisha ogwo owaabaire yaaraganisiibwe .
58007007	Tihariho kubangaanisa , omuto niwe ashabirwa omukuru emigisha .
58007008	Omu bahongyerezi , kimwe kya ikumi kitungwa abantu abafa ; kwonka ahari Melikizedeki kikatungwa omwe obaho , nk'oku ekyahandiikirwe kirikugira .
58007009	Nangwa kikaabaasika kugambwa ngu na Leevi otunga bimwe bya ikumi , nawe eby'eikumi ebye akabitoijera omuri Aburahamu ;
58007010	ahabw'okuba akaba akiri omu shagama ya ishenkuru , obu Melikizedeki yaamubugana .
58007011	Mbwenu okuhikiirira ku kuraabe kwabaire nikubaasa kutungirwa omu buhongyerezi bw'Abaleevi , - obu abantu baatungiiremu eiteeka ondiijo muhongyerezi akaabaire naayetengyerwa ki kuruga omu rubu rwa Melikizedeki , atari ow'orubu orugambwaho orwa Arooni ?
58007012	Manya ku habaho okuhinduka omu buhongyerezi , biri n'omu iteeka hashemereire kubamu okuhinduka .
58007013	Orikugambwaho ebyo byona akaba ari ow'orundi ruganda , orwabaire rutakarugwamuga muntu n'omwe kuheereza aha itambiro .
58007014	Manya nikimanywa butunu ku Mukama waitu yaakomookire omuri Yuda , kandi Musa taine ki yaagambire aha bahongyerezi ekikwatiraine n'orwo ruganda .
58007015	Ekyo nikikira kweyoreka gye haabaho omuhongyerezi ondiijo orikushushana Melikizedeki .
58007016	Ogwo muhongyerezi akaba atatairweho naayema omu iteeka eirtairweho abantu ; kureka akaba omuhongyerezi ahabw'amaani g'amagara agatabaasa kuhwerekyerezibwa .
58007017	Manya ebyahandiikirwe nibigira biti : Ori omuhongyerezi ow'orugyero rwa Melikizedeki , kandi nikwo origuma ebiro byona .
58007018	Aha rubaju rumwe , ekiragiro ekyabandize nikiihwaho ahabw'okutagira maani na mugasho .
58007019	Manya eiteeka tiriine ki ryahikiize kimwe ; n'aha rundi rubaju , haateebwaho amatsiko agarikuhitaho , agatubaasisa kwiririra Ruhanga .
58007020	Kandi ekyo tikirabaireho ahatari ndahiro .
58007021	Manya abaabandize kuba abahongyerezi , bakatunga omwoga gwabo ahatari ndahiro , kwonka Yesu akabuheebwa n'endahiro erikugira eti : Mukama akarahira kandi tarihindura ki yaarahiire , ati : Ori omuhongyerezi , kandi nikwo origuma ebiro byona .
58007022	Ekyo nikyo kyahindwire Yesu kuba omwemererezi w'endagaano erikukira oburungi .
58007023	Abahongyerezi abaabandize bakaba baba baingi omu kukuratana , ahabw'okuba rufu ekaba ebazibira kugumizamu omwoga gwabo .
58007024	Kwonka Yesu , ahabw'okuba agumaho ebiro byona , nikyo atuurira aine obuhongyerezi bw'obutwire , obutarikubaasa kuhungurwa ondi .
58007025	N'ahabw'ekyo ebiro byona abaasa kujuna abairirira Ruhanga nibaraba omuriwe , ahabw'okuba obutoosha atuura naabeeshengyerereza .
58007026	Manya kikaba kihikire itwe kutunga omuhongyerezi omukuru nk'ogwo , orikwera , otahaahuuzibwa , otaine kamogo , otabarirwa mu basiisi , owaatungwirwe akakira eby'omu iguru byona .
58007027	We , tikirikumwetengyesa nk'abandi bahongyerezi abakuru kuhonga ebitambo buri izooba , okubanza aha bw'ebibi bye , na bwanyima ahabw'eby'abandi bantu . Ekyo we akakikora rimwe yaaheza , obu yaayehayo .
58007028	Buzimazima , eiteeka ritaho abantu ab'amaani makye kuba abahongyerezi abakuru ; kwonka ekigambo ky'endahiro ya Ruhanga , ekyaizire bwanyima y'eiteeka , kitaho Mwana owaahikiiriziibwe kimwe ebiro byona .
58008001	Mbwenu omu bi turikugamba , ekikuru nikyo eki : Omuhongyerezi ogwo omukuru ou twine ayemi ati : ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo orw'ekitebe ky'obugabe ekya Nyakusinga omu iguru .
58008002	N'omuheereza w'omu mwanya ogurikwera , kandi ow'omu ihema nyakabara , eritaratairweho muntu , kureka Mukama .
58008003	Manya omuhongyerezi omukuru weena ateebwaho kutoija emitoijo n'okuhonga ebitambo . N'ahabw'ekyo ogu Muhongyerezi mukuru waitu nawe ashemereire kugira eky'okuhonga .
58008004	Mbwenu kuri yaabaire ari omu nsi , takubaire muhongyerezi n'akakye , ahabw'okuba hariho abahongyerezi abahayo emitoijo nk'oku eiteeka riragiira .
58008005	Bo ebi bakora biba eky'okureeberaho , n'ekinyimanyimi ky'omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omu iguru . Manya Musa ku yaabaire naaza kutaho eihema , Ruhanga yaamuhabura naamugira ati : Oreebe ngu byona ebi oraakore , nibishushana n'ebi waayorekirwe aha rushozi .
58008006	Kwonka omu mazima , Kristo akaheebwa obuheereza oburikuhita obw'abaira , nk'oku endagaano ei arimu ari omuteeranizi wa Ruhanga n'abantu erikuhitaho , ahabw'okuba ekakorwa neehamira aha byaraganisiibwe ebirikukirayo oburungi .
58008007	Endagaano eyaabandize kuri yaabaire etaine kishobiremu , eya kabiri tekwetengirwe .
58008008	Manya Ruhanga , ku yaareebire omu bantu be ekishobire , yaagira ati : Nyakubaho naagira ati : Obunaku buryahika ndagaane endagaano nsya n'enju ya Isiraeli , kandi n'enju ya Yuda .
58008009	Egyo ndagaano ensya terishushana n'endagaano ei naaragaine na baishebo , obu naabakwata omukono nkabaiha omu nsi ya Misiri . Bo tibarahamiire ha ndagaano yangye , naanye nikyo ntarabeeteereireho ; nikwo Nyakubaho arikugira .
58008010	Nyakubaho naagira ati : Ebiro ebyo ku birihwaho , egi niyo ndagaano ei ndiragaana n'enju ya Isiraeli : Ndyata amateeka gangye omu biteekateeko byabo , ngahandiikye omu mitima yaabo ; kandi mbe Ruhanga waabo , nabo babe abantu bangye .
58008011	Tibaryegyesana buri muntu na mugyenzi we , nari buri muntu na mwene ishe , bati : Manya Mukama . Ahabw'okuba boona baryammanya , okwiha aha muto okuta aha mukuru .
58008012	Ndyabasaasira ebicumuro byabo , n'ebibi byabo tindibiijuka bundi .
58008013	Ruhanga ku arikugamba aha ndagaano ensya , biri ahangwire eyaabandize ; kandi kyona ekikura kikahanguura , kiba kiri haihi kuhwaho .
58009001	Nangwa n'endagaano eya ira ekaba egira emigyenzo y'okuramya , n'omwanya ogurikwera ogw'omu nsi .
58009002	Ahabw'okuba hakaba hariho eihema eritairweho , eri ekishengye kyaryo ekirikubandizibwaho kyabaire kibamu ekikondo ky'amatabaaza n'emeeza n'omugaati ogumurikiirwe Ruhanga ; nikyeetwa Omwanya Ogurikwera ;
58009003	omunda y'omukingo gwa kabiri hariyo eihema eririkwetwa Omwanya ogurikukirira kimwe Okwera .
58009004	Omwo hakaba harimu eitambiro ry'ezaabu ery'okwotereraho obubaani , n'eshanduukye y'endagaano eshwekirwe ezaabu embaju zoona . Egyo shanduukye ekaba ebamu orubindi rw'ezaabu orurimu emaanu , n'enkoni ya Arooni eyaaginire , kandi n'ebishate by'amabaare g'endagaano ;
58009005	ahaiguru yaayo hariho baakerubi b'ekitiinwa , basangiire ekitebe ky'okusaasira . Ebyo byona obwa hati titurikubaasa kubitondoora .
58009006	Ebyo ku byaherize kukorwa bityo , abahongyerezi baaguma nibataaha omu ihema eririkubandizibwaho , nibakoreramu emigyenzo yaabo y'obuhongyerezi .
58009007	Kwonka omu rya kabiri , omuhongyerezi omukuru wenka niwe yaabaire azamu , kandi akaba atazamu ataine shagama y'okwetambirira , n'okutambirira ebibi by'abantu .
58009008	Omuri ekyo , Mutima Orikwera naamanyisa ku omuhanda ogurikutaaha omu mwanya ogurikwera gutakaigukire , okwiha obu eihema ery'okubanza rikyemereireho .
58009009	Ekyo nikimanyisa obusingye obu oburiho . Okwihirira omuri ebyo , empongano n'ebitambo , ebitabaasa kuhikiiririza kimwe omutima gw'orikuramya , biheebwayo .
58009010	Biine akakwate n'ebyokurya n'ebyokunywa n'eby'okweyeza ebitari bimwe . Niyo migyenzo y'abantu buntu , eyaatairweho okuhitsya obu obunaku bw'okugarura ebintu busya burihika .
58009011	Kwonka Kristo ku yaizire ari omuhongyerezi omukuru ow'ebirungi ebiriija , yaaraba omu ihema eririkukira obukuru n'okuhikiirira - - eri ihema rikaba ritakozirwe na mikono , nikwo kugira ngu ritari ry'omu bihangirwe ebi .
58009012	Atyo yaataaha rimwe heza omu Mwanya ogurikukirira kimwe Okwera , atatwairemu shagama y'embuzi nari y'enyana , kureka eshagama ye wenka , haza yaatutungira okucungurwa okutarihwaho .
58009013	Okumiisiira abantu basiisikaire , eshagama y'embuzi n'ey'enimi kandi n'eiju ry'enyana ecwekyeize kimwe , ku kuraabe kweza omubiri ,
58009014	mbwenu shi eshagama ya Kristo owaayehaireyo omuri Mutima otahwaho , ataine kamogo ahari Ruhanga , terikukiraho kweza emitima yaanyu neegyozyaho ebikoro bifiire , haza mukabona kuheereza Ruhanga ohuriire ?
58009015	N'ahabw'ekyo , Kristo niwe muteeranizi w'endagaano ensya , ngu abaayetsirwe babone kutunga obuhunguzi obutahwaho obwaraganisiibwe . Okufa kwe okwabaireho , nikwo kubacungura omu bibi ebi baakozire bakiri omu ndagaano eya ira .
58009016	Manya okuraga tikuhikiirizibwa kiraga atakafiire .
58009017	Ahabw'okuba okuraga okwo kutandika kukora haabaho okufa , kandi tikugira maani nyakuraga akiriho .
58009018	N'ahabw'ekyo n'endagaano eyaabandize terahamiibwe ahatari shagama .
58009019	Ahabw'okuba Musa , ku yaaherize kurangirira abantu boona ebiragiro byona eby'omu iteeka , yaabakura eshagama y'enyana n'ey'embuzi n'amaizi n'ebyoya by'entaama ebirikutukura n'enyaweera , yaabimiisiira ekitabo ky'eiteeka n'abantu boona ,
58009020	naagira ati : Egi niyo shagama y'endagaano , ei Ruhanga yaabaragiire kukuratira .
58009021	Kandi omu muringo nigwo gumwe , egyo shagama yaagimiisiira eihema n'ebintu byona ebikoresibwa omu kuramya .
58009022	Buzimazima omu iteeka haihi ebintu byona byezibwa eshagama ; kandi ahatari kusheesha shagama , tihabaho kusaasirwa ebibi .
58009023	N'ahabw'ekyo , ebirikushusha eby'omu iguru , kikabyetengyesa kwezibwa egyo migyenzo . Kwonka eby'omu iguru byo byezibwa ebitambo ebirikuhita biri .
58009024	Manya Kristo tarataahire mu mwanya ogurikwera ogukozirwe n'emikono , oguri ekyeshusha ky'ogw'amazima ; kureka akataaha omu iguru nyaiteeka , ngu abone kuguma naareebeka omu maisho ga Ruhanga , kututonganira .
58009025	Kandi taragumire naayehayo kaingi , nk'oku omuhongyerezi omukuru ataaha omu Mwanya Ogurikwera buri mwaka n'eshagama etari ye .
58009026	Kuri kyabaire kityo , akaabaire ari ow'okuguma naabonabonesibwa okwiha aha kuhangwa kw'ensi . Kwonka mbwenu , aha muheru gw'obusingye obu , akareebeka rimwe yaaheza , ngu abone kwihaho ebibi naayetamba .
58009027	Abantu boona bakateerwaho okufa rimwe , na bwanyima bakacwerwa Ruhanga orubanja .
58009028	Na Kristo nikwo yaahairweyo rimwe , kwihaho ebibi bya baingi . Mbwenu aryareebeka omurundi gwa kabiri , ataiziriire kibi , kureka okujuna abariba bamutegyereize n'ekihika .
58010001	Manya eiteeka rikaba riri ekinyimanyimi ky'ebirungi ebyabaire nibyenda kwija , bitari ebiriho ebya nyamazima . N'ahabw'ekyo tibibaasa n'akakye kuhikiiririza kimwe abarikuramya baine ebitambo ebyabaire biheebwayo buri mwaka .
58010002	Ku kyakubaire kiri kityo , tibyakurekyeirwe aho kutambwa ? Abarikuramya kuri baayeziibwe rimwe heza , tibaakubaire nibeemanya ku baine ekibi .
58010003	Kwonka okuhayo ebyo bitambo kuba nikubaijutsya ebibi byabo buri mwaka .
58010004	Manya tikirikubaasika eshagama y'enimi n'ey'embuzi kwihaho ebibi .
58010005	Nikyo Kristo , obu yaija omu nsi , yaagiriire ati : Iwe torenzire kitambo na mpongano , kureka okanteekateekyera omubiri .
58010006	Empongano zicwekize , n'ebitambo by'okukarabira ebibi torabisiimire .
58010007	Naanye nikwo kugira nti : Ai Ruhanga , reeba , naija kukora eki okunda nk'oku kyampandiikirweho omu kitabo ky'eiteeka .
58010008	Aharuguru ku yaagizire ati : Torenzire kandi torasiimire bitambo na mpongano , n'obu zaakuba empongano ezicwekize nari eby'okuhongyerera ebibi nibyo ebyo ebiheebwayo nk'oku eiteeka riragiira ,
58010009	akongyera yaagira ati : Reeba , naija kukora eki okunda . Atyo Kristo yaihaho ebitambo ebya ira : omu mwanya gwabyo yaatamu ekitambo eky'okwehonga kwe .
58010010	Reero ahabwa Yesu Kristo kukora eki Ruhanga yaabaire naamwenza , twena tukeezibwa ahabw'ekitambo eki yaahongire rimwe heza , naahayo omubiri gwe .
58010011	Manya buri muhongyerezi ayemerera buri izooba naakora eby'omwoga gwe kuhayo kaingi ebyo bitambo ebitabaasiza kimwe kwihaho ebibi .
58010012	Kwonka Kristo , ku yaaherize kuhayo ekitambo kimwe kyonka eky'ebiro byona ahabw'ebibi , yaashutama aha rubaju rwa buryo orwa Ruhanga .
58010013	Okwiha obwo atuura ategyereize , okuhitsya obu abazigu be barihindurwa endibatiro y'ebigyere bye .
58010014	Manya omu kuhayo ekitambo kimwe kyonka , akahikiiririza kimwe ebiro byona abeezibwa .
58010015	Na Mutima Orikwera ekyo naakituhamiza . Okubanza akagira ati :
58010016	Nyakubaho naagira ati : Ebyo biro ku birihwaho , egi niyo ndagaano ei ndiragaana nabo : Ndyata amateeka gangye omu mitima yaabo , ngahandiikye omu biteekateeko byabo .
58010017	Kandi yaagaruka yaagira ati : Tindiijuka bundi bibi byabo n'ebicumuro byabo .
58010018	Manya ebibi ku bisaasirwa , haba hatakyetengyesa kubihongyerera .
58010019	N'ahabw'ekyo , banyaruganda , twine obwesigye bw'okutaaha omu Mwanya Ogurikwera ahabw'eshagama ya Yesu ;
58010020	obwo nituraba omu muhanda omusya kandi ogw'amagara , ogu yaatucweraire omu mukingo nigwo mubiri gwe .
58010021	Nk'oku twine omuhongyerezi omukuru orikutegyeka enju ya Ruhanga ,
58010022	ka twirire Ruhanga haihi n'omutima gw'amazima , twine okwikiriza okuhamiire kimwe , emitima yaitu eyogiibweho ebibi ebirikutushinja , n'emibiri yaitu eyogiibwe amaizi amarungi .
58010023	Ka tuhamize kimwe amatsiko gaitu agu tugamba butunu tutarikunyiganyiga ; ahabw'okuba owaaraganiise n'omwesigwa .
58010024	Tuteekateekye oku twakwezirikisana kukundana n'okukora ebirungi .
58010025	Haza tutarereera kuteerana hamwe nk'oku abamwe batwaza , kureka tugumyane , munomuno nk'oku murikureeba ngu ekyo kiro kiri haihi kuhika .
58010026	Manya ku tukora ebibi nkana twaherize kumanya amazima , haba hatakiriho kitambo ky'okuhongyerera ebibi ;
58010027	kureka tutsigarira kutegyereza n'obwoba ebiribaho , nibyo okucwerwa orubanja , n'omuriro gw'ekibabo oguryokyeza kimwe abagomi .
58010028	Omuntu ohenzire nkana eiteeka rya Musa ku ashinjwa baakareebi babiri nari bashatu , afa atagiriirwe saasi .
58010029	Mbwenu nimuteekateeka omuntu ogayire Omwana wa Ruhanga , akahagaza eshagama y'endagaano eyaamwerize , akaitsa ekiniga Mutima otuhitsyaho emigisha ya Ruhanga , tashemereire kuheebwa ekifubiro ekirikukiraho ?
58010030	Ahabw'okuba nitumanya owaagizire ati : Niinye nshemereire kugira enzigu ; niinye ndihoora . Kandi ati : Nyakubaho aryacwera abantu be orubanja .
58010031	Ka n'eky'eihano omuntu kugwa omu mikono ya Ruhanga ohuriire !
58010032	Kwonka mwijukye ebiro ebyahingwire , obu mwamurikiirwe , oku mwayemeire orugamba ruhango nimureebesibwa enaku .
58010033	Obundi nimushungisibwa , nimujumwa , kandi nimubonabonesibwa ; n'obundi nimubarirwa omu barikutwazibwa batyo .
58010034	Mukaba mugirira embohe esaasi , kandi mwikiriza kunyagwa ebintu byanyu mushemereirwe , ahabw'okuba mukaba nimumanya ku mwine eitungo eririkukiraho oburungi kandi eririkugumaho
58010035	Mutarinaga obwo bwesigye bwanyu oburimu ekihembo kihango .
58010036	Manya nikibeetengyesa okugumisiriza , mubone kukora eki Ruhanga arikwenda , n'okutunga ebi yaaraganiise .
58010037	Ahabw'okuba ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Hatsigaire omwanya mukye , Ogwo ow'okwija aije , kandi tarikwija kwikarayo .
58010038	Owangye ohikiriire aryagira amagara ahabw'okwikiriza ; kwonka ku arigaruka enyima tindimushemerererwa .
58010039	Mbwenu itwe tituri muri abo abagaruka enyima bakahwerekyerera , kureka turi omuri abo abaguma baine okwikiriza , bakakiza amagara gaabo .
58011001	Mbwenu okwikiriza nikwo kuhamiza kimwe ebi twineho amatsiko , kandi nikwo kutumanyisa ebibaho ebitarikureebwa ;
58011002	ahabw'okuba aba ira kukabareetera okusiimwa Ruhanga .
58011003	Okwikiriza nikwo kutureetera okushoboorokyerwa ku ensi yoona yaahangirwe ekigambo kya Ruhanga ; haza tukamanya ku ebirikureebwa byakozirwe nibiihwa omu bitarikureebwa .
58011004	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Abeeli akatambira Ruhanga ekitambo ekyasiimirwe Ruhanga okukira ekya Kaini . Haza kyamureetera kuhamibwa ku ari ohikiriire . Ekyo Ruhanga akakihamya naikiriza ebi Abeeli yaamutoijeire . Abeeli ogwo nobu araabe yaafiire , kwonka ahabw'okwikiriza kwe , na hati naakigamba .
58011005	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Enoka akatwarwa atafiire , kandi tiyaareebwa bundi ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akamutwara . Kwonka ekyahandiikirwe nikigira ngu , Enoka ogwo atakatwairwe , akaba asiimwa Ruhanga .
58011006	Haza ahu okwikiriza kutari tikibaasika kusiimwa Ruhanga . Manya weena orikwenda kwiririra Ruhanga , ashemereire kwikiriza ku ariho , kandi ku aha ebihembo abamusherura .
58011007	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Noa ku yaaherize kuhaburwa Ruhanga ebiribaho ebitakareebirwe , yaataho omutima , yaakora obwato bw'okujuna ab'eka ye . Okwo kwikiriza kukareetera ensi kusingwa orubanja , kandi Ruhanga yaamuha okuhikiirira okureetwa okwikiriza .
58011008	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Aburahamu , Ruhanga ku yaamweetsire kuruga owaabo , kuza omu nsi ei yaabaire naaza kuheebwa kuba empungurano , yaikiriza , atyo yaagyenda atarikumanya i arikuza .
58011009	Haza okwo kwikiriza kwamureetera kuguma naafurukira omu nsi ei Ruhanga yaamuraganiise , ari omunyaihanga . Akaba araara omu mahema hamwe na Isaaka na Yakobo , abaahungwire nawe ebi yaaraganisiibwe ;
58011010	ahabw'okuba Aburahamu akaguma ategyereize orurembo orwine emisingi , oru Ruhanga yaabaire acumire kandi arwombekire .
58011011	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Saara kikamubaasikira kubaka enda , nobu araabe yaabaire akaikwire ; ahabw'okuba akeesiga owaamuraganiise ku ari omwesigwa .
58011012	N'ahabw'ekyo ogwo muntu omwe Aburahamu , nobu yaabaire ari aha ncwamba za rufu , akakomookwamu abaijukuru baingi nk'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru , kandi bari nk'omusheenyi gw'aha rubaju rw'enyanja , ogutarikubaasa kubarwa .
58011013	Abo boona bakafa nibaikiriza , batakatungire ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise . Kwonka baabiranzya kandi baabigirira ekihika , haza baabaire nibeemanya ku bari abanyamahanga kandi abahinguzi omu nsi .
58011014	Manya abantu abagamba ebintu nk'ebyo , baba nibooreka ku barikusherura obutaka bwabo .
58011015	Kuri baajuzire ensi ei baabaire barugiremu , bakaabaasize kugarukayo .
58011016	Kwonka hati nibeetenga ensi erikukiraho oburungi , niyo y'omu iguru . N'ahabw'ekyo Ruhanga tikirikumwitsa nshoni kwetwa Ruhanga waabo , ahabw'okuba niwe yaabateekateekyeire orwo rurembo .
58011017	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Aburahamu ku yaagyeziibwe Ruhanga , yaahayo omutabani Isaaka kuba ekitambo . Aburahamu ogwo , ou Ruhanga yaaraganiise , akeemera kuhayo omwana we ogwo omwe wenka nyamunegyere kuba ekitambo ;
58011018	haza Ruhanga yaabaire omugizire ati : Omuri Isaaka nimwo baijukuru baawe baryeteerererwa .
58011019	Manya Aburahamu akamanyira aha mutima , ku Ruhanga aine obushoboorozi bw'okuzoora Isaaka omu bafiire . Na Ruhanga nikyo yaamugaruriire Isaaka nk'orugire omu bafiire .
58011020	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Isaaka akashabira Yakobo na Esau naabatengyera emigisha .
58011021	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Yakobo , atakafiire , akashabira abaana ba Yosefu omugisha , ayehigikire eifundo ry'enkoni ye naaramya Ruhanga .
58011022	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Yosefu ku yaabaire ari haihi kufa , yaagamba aha by'Abaisiraeli kuruga Misiri , kandi yaaragiira oku baritwaza omutumbi gwe .
58011023	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Musa ku yaaherize kuzaarwa , abazaire be baamusherekyera ameezi ashatu , ahabw'okuba bakareeba ku ari omwana murungi omu kureebwa , haza tibaatiina kiragiro ky'omugabe .
58011024	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Musa ku yaakuzire , yaayanga kwetwa mutabani wa muhara wa Faraaho .
58011025	Akasiima kwitwa kubi hamwe n'abantu ba Ruhanga , okukira okunanurwa amashemererwa g'ekibi ag'akaanya bwanya .
58011026	Akateekateeka okujumwa ahabwa Kristo ku kurimu eitungo ringi okukira amatungo ga Misiri ; ahabw'okuba akaba naaranzya ekihembo eki ariheebwa .
58011027	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Musa ogwo akaruga Misiri atarikutiina kiniga ky'omugabe , atyo yaagumizamu , amaisho agahangire Ruhanga otareebwa .
58011028	Ahabw'okwikiriza , akakora omugyenzo gw'Okuhingurwaho , yaamiisiira eshagama , ngu Omuhwerekyereza w'emijigaijo atakaabakoraho .
58011029	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Abaisiraeli bakambuka Enyanja Erikutukura , nk'abarikuraba ahoomire ; kwonka Abanyamisiri ku baateireho kugira batyo , baamirwa amaizi .
58011030	Ahabw'okwikiriza , ebigo bya Yeriko bikagwa , byaherize kumara ebiro mushanju nibyeziguurukwa Abaisiraeli .
58011031	Ahabw'okwikiriza , Rahabu maraaya taracwekyereeziibwe hamwe n'abagomi , ahabw'okuba akakunira ziri ntatsi .
58011032	Mbwenu ebindi ngambe ki ? Manya omwanya gukampwaho naaza kutebya ebya Gideoni , Baraki , Samusooni , Yefuta , ebya Daudi na Samueli kandi n'eby'abarangi .
58011033	Ahabw'okwikiriza , aba bantu bakasingura ensi z'abagabe , bakakora ebihikire , bakatunga ebi Ruhanga yaaraganiise . Entare bakaziigara akanwa ,
58011034	bakaraaza omuriro gurikubuguma , bakakira zaarurara z'obwogi . Bakatunga amaani , haza kunu baabaire batagaine ; bakaba amamanzi omu rugamba , bakabinga amahe g'abanyamahanga .
58011035	Abakazi abamwe bakagarurirwa abaabo bazoirwe omu bafiire . Abandi bantu bakaitwa kubi , bangire kurekurwa , ngu babone kuzooka baine amagara agarikuhitaho .
58011036	N'abandi bakagaaniizibwa , kandi baayashwa , baataho n'okubohesibwa enjegyere n'okuteebwa omu kihome .
58011037	N'abandi bakateerwa amabaare , baahirimburwa n'emishumeeno , baitwa na rurara . Bakazengyerera bajwaire empu z'entaama n'ez'embuzi baconcoboize nibabonabonesibwa , nibaitwa kubi
58011038	bakaba abu ensi etashemereire baazengyerera omu mahamba n'omu nshozi , nibaraara omu maaya n'omu nyanga z'omu itaka .
58011039	Kandi abo boona , n'obu baraabe baasiimirwe ahabw'okwikiriza kwabo , tibaratungire ki Ruhanga yaaraganiise .
58011040	Manya Ruhanga akaba atuteekateekyeire ekirungi ekirikuhitaho , ngu bo barekye kuhikiiririzibwa kimwe , itwe tutariho .
58012001	N'ahabw'ekyo , nk'oku twehinguririziibwe ekimbuuro kihango kityo ekya baakareebi , ka tujuure ekintu kyona ekirikuturemeerera , n'ekibi ekitwezingiriire . Ka twirukye empaka ezituteereirweho nitugumisiriza ,
58012002	obwo amaisho tugahangire Yesu , okomookwaho okwikiriza kwaitu kandi okuhikiiririza kimwe . Manya ahabw'okushemererwa okwabaire kumuteekateekyeirwe , akeemera omusharaba , yaagaya okuhemuka . Mbwenu ashutami aha rubaju rwa buryo rw'ekitebe ky'obugabe ekya Ruhanga .
58012003	Muteekateekye ahari Ogwo owaagumisiririze rwango , ei abasiisi baamugiriire ; haza murekye kuruha n'okugwa enshazi .
58012004	Omu kurwanisa ekibi , timukeehangaine kuhika n'aha kusheesha eshagama yaanyu .
58012005	Mbwenu shi mwebirwe eki Ruhanga arikubeehanangirizamu nk'abaana be ? Ekigira kiti : Mwana wangye , otagaya okuhana kwa Nyakubaho , n'obu kwakuba okucweka entegye , yaakufubira .
58012006	Ahabw'okuba Nyakubaho ou akunda , niwe ahana ; kandi ou ayeta omwana we , niwe ateera .
58012007	Manya muri ab'okugumisiriza mwaba nimuhanwa ; ahabw'okuba Ruhanga naabatwaza nk'abaana be . Mbwenu ni mwana ki , ou ishe atahana ?
58012008	Ku muraabe mutarikuhanwa nk'abandi boona , biri muri ebizaarwa , timuri baana .
58012009	Naitwe tukaba tugira baatataitwe omu nsi , batuhana kandi tubatiina . Mbwenu titushemereire kukizaho kworobera Tataitwe w'emitima , haza tukagira amagara ?
58012010	Manya baatataitwe bakaba batuhana okumara ebiro bikye , nk'oku baabaire benda . Kwonka Ruhanga atuhana ngu tugasirwe , tubone kubagana aha kuhikiirira kwe .
58012011	Mbwenu obwa hati , okuhanwa kwona nikushusha nk'okurikureeta obusaasi , kutari okugwisa gye . Kwonka bwanyima abakutendekirwemu kuryabarugiramu okuhikiirira n'obusingye .
58012012	Mwimutsye emikono yaanyu enoganogokire , muhamye amaju gaanyu agajogajogokire ,
58012013	n'ebigyere byanyu mubicwere emihanda egororokire ; abarikucumbagira barekye kuhendekyeramu , kureka bakire .
58012014	Mwitanire okugira obusingye n'abantu boona , kandi n'okwezibwa , ahabw'okuba tihariho orireeba Mukama ateeziibwe .
58012015	Mwerinde , hatakaagira owaayefeereza emigisha ya Ruhanga , omuzi gw'okusambisirwa gukabameramu , gukabaganzya , haza baingi gukabareetera okusiisikara .
58012016	Mwerinde , hatakaabaho omushambani , nari orikururuuhira eby'ensi nka Esau , owaagurize obuhunguzi bwe ekiihuro kimwe .
58012017	Nimumanya ngu bwanyima , ku yaayenzire kugarukana ogwo mugisha gw'obuhunguzi taraikiriziibwe , n'obu araabe yaagushabire naarira , ahabw'okuba akaba atakiine mugisha gw'okwegarukamu .
58012018	Mbwenu timwizire ha rushozi orurikuhikwaho , oruriho omuriro gurikubuguma , n'omwirima n'okwiririmba n'eihunga
58012019	n'eiraka ry'enzamba , kandi n'eiraka ry'ebigambo eryareeteire abaarihuriire kweshengyereza , ngu hatagira ebindi bigambo ebi baagambirwa .
58012020	Ahabw'okuba tibarabaasize kwemera kiragiro ekyabahairwe , nikigira kiti : Nangwa nobu eriba enyamaishwa , yaakora ahari oru rushozi , eryateerwa amabaare .
58012021	Buzimazima ebyabaire nibireebwa bikaba nibitiinisa . Nikyo Musa yaagiriire ati : Nyine obwoba , nintetema .
58012022	Kwonka imwe mwizire aha Rushozi Siyooni , omu rurembo rwa Ruhanga ohuriire , nirwo Yerusalemu ey'omu iguru , oru baamaraika abatarikubarwa bateeraniiremu nibashemererwa .
58012023	Mwizire omu ruteerane rw'emijigaijo eyaahandiikirwe omu iguru . Mwizire ahari Ruhanga omuramuzi wa boona , n'aha mitima y'abarikwera abaahikiiririziibwe kimwe .
58012024	Mwizire ahari Yesu omuteeranizi w'endagaano ensya , kandi n'aha shagama emiisiirwe , egamba ebirungi okukira eya Abeeli .
58012025	Mwerinde , mutanga kuhurira ogwo orikugamba . Ahabw'okuba abaayangire kuhurira owaabateisiize omu nsi , ku baraabe batarakizire , kaashwa itwe , ku twakwanga kuhurira orikututeisa naayema omu iguru !
58012026	Manya obwo eiraka rye rikatengyeetsa ensi ; kwonka mbwenu araganiise ati : Hatsigaireyo omurundi gumwe , ntengyeetse ti nsi yonka , kureka n'eiguru naryo .
58012027	Ekigambo ekyo : Hatsigaireyo omurundi gumwe , nikimanyisa okwihwaho kw'ebitengyeetsibwa , nibyo ebyahangirwe , ngu ebitatengyeetsibwa bibone kugumaho .
58012028	N'ahabw'ekyo nk'oku twine obukama obutabaasa kutengyeetsibwa , ka tusiime Ruhanga , kandi tumuramye nk'oku akunda , nitumutiina kandi nitumuha ekitiinwa .
58012029	Manya Ruhanga waitu n'omuriro ogurikurya busha .
58013001	Mugumizemu nimukundana nk'abanyaruganda .
58013002	Mutarireka kukunira abagyenyi , ahabw'okuba omuri ekyo hariho abaakuniire baamaraika batabamanyire .
58013003	Mugume mwijukye abari omu kihome , muri nk'abakirimu nabo , kandi mwijukye abarikwitwa kubi , ahabw'okuba naimwe mwine omubiri .
58013004	Obushwere bugume buheebwe ekitiinwa omu bantu boona , n'ekitanda ky'abashweraine kishemereire kuba ekitahagaziibwe . Manya abakora eby'enshoni , n'abashambani , Ruhanga aryabacwera orubanja .
58013005	Mugume mwerinde okururuuhira empiiha , munanurwe ebi mwine . Ahabw'okuba Ruhanga akagira ati : Tindikuhemukaho , n'obu kwakuba okukutsigaho .
58013006	Nikyo turikugambira n'obwesigye tuti : Mukama niwe muhwezi wangye , tinditiina . Mbwenu omuntu akaabaasa kungira ata ?
58013007	Mwijukye abeebembezi baanyu , abaabagambiire ekigambo kya Ruhanga . Mwetegyereze ebiruga omu mitwarize yaabo , haza mutooreze okwikiriza kwabo .
58013008	Manya Yesu Kristo tahinduka ; oku abaire ari nyomwabazyo , nikwo ari n'eri izooba , kandi nikwo ariguma ebiro byona .
58013009	Mutarihabisibwa enyegyesa zitari zimwe ezihangire . Haakiri mugire omutima oguhamiibwe amaani ga Ruhanga , etari migyenzo y'ebyokurya etaragasiire abaagikuratiire .
58013010	Manya twine eitambiro eritaikirizibwa kuriirwaho abarikuheereza omu ihema .
58013011	Ahabw'okuba enyamaishwa ezi eshagama yaazo omuhongyerezi omukuru atwara omu Mwanya Ogurikwera kuba ekitambo ky'okuhongyerera ekibi , emitumbi yaazo bagyokyeza aheeru y'orusiisira .
58013012	Na Yesu nikwo yaabonaboneire aheeru y'eirembo , ngu abone kweza abantu n'eshagama ye .
58013013	Naitwe nu , ka tushohore , tumushangye aheeru y'orusiisira , twemeire kujumwa ahabwe .
58013014	Omu nsi omu titwinemu rurembo rw'entuura , kureka nitusherura oruribaho omu biro ebiriija .
58013015	N'ahabw'ekyo ka tugume tuheereze Ruhanga ekitambo ky'okumuhimbisa , nitukirabya omuri Yesu , nikwo kwatura eiziina rye n'eminwa yaitu .
58013016	Kandi mutaryehuzya kukorera abantu ebirungi , n'okukwatanisa nabo ebi mutungire , ahabw'okuba ebitambo nk'ebyo bigwisa gye Ruhanga .
58013017	Mugume mworobere abeebembezi baanyu , mubahurire ; ahabw'okuba batuura nibareeberera amagara gaanyu , nk'abantu abarigabuuzibwa Ruhanga . Ekyo bakikora bashemereirwe , bataine naku z'aha mutima . Ku kyakuba kitabaire kityo , imwe mukaaba mutaine ki mugasiirwe .
58013018	Mutushabire . Nituhamya ku twine omutima gutarikweshinja , kandi nitwenda kutwaza gye omuri byona .
58013019	Munomuno nimbeehanangiriza kunshabira , Ruhanga abone kubangarurira juba .
58013020	Mbwenu Ruhanga okomookwaho obusingye , owaazoire Mukama waitu Yesu omu bafiire , Omuriisa w'entaama omukuru , ahabw'endagaano etarugaho ei yaahamiise eshagama ye ,
58013021	abahe ebirungi byona , mubone kukora ebirungi byona , mubone kukora ebi akunda , naakorera omuriitwe ebi asiima naabirabya omuri Yesu Kristo , oshemereire kuhimbisibwa ebiro byona . Amiina .
58013022	Banyaruganda , nimbeshengyereza mwehangaane , muhikiirize ebi naabehanangiriza . Manya naabahandiikira nincwera hagufu .
58013023	Mumanye ku omunyaruganda Timoteeho arekwirwe . Ku araabe yaizire juba , ndyaija nawe kubareeba .
58013024	Mundamukize abeebembezi baanyu boona , n'abarikwera boona . Abanyaruganda abarugire Italiya nibabaramutsya .
58013025	Embabazi za Ruhanga zigume naimwe mwena . Amiina .
59001001	Nyowe Yakobo , omuheereza wa Ruhanga kandi owa Mukama Yesu Kristo , nimbaramutsya imwe ab'enganda ikumi na ibiri ezaataataine .
59001002	Banyaruganda , ku muraagume mwahikwaho ebigyezo by'emiringo etari emwe , mubyemere mushemereirwe ,
59001003	ahabw'okuba nimumanya okugyezibwa kw'okwikiriza kwanyu kurugwamu okuhama .
59001004	Mbwenu murekye okwo kuhama kuhitsye omurimo gwakwo , mubone kuba abahikiire kimwe kandi abahamire omu by'omutima , abataine ki babuzirweho .
59001005	Omuriimwe ku haraabe hariho obuzirwe obwengye , abushabe Ruhanga oha abantu boona n'obufura ataine kanyomo , haza aryabuheebwa .
59001006	Kwonka ashabe aine okwikiriza atarikubangaanisa , ahabw'okuba abangaanisa ari nk'ekingonzi ky'enyanja ekitwarwa omuyaga gukakitooza oku n'oku .
59001007	Omuntu nk'ogwo arekye kuteekateeka ngu naija kugira eki yaatunga ahari Mukama ;
59001008	ahabw'okuba n'ow'emitima ebiri , kandi omu mitwarize ye yoona tahamire .
59001009	Omunyaruganda omworo ashemereire kwesiima , Ruhanga yaaba amutungwire .
59001010	N'omutungi nawe atyo , Ruhanga yaaba amubundikire . Manya omutungi aryahunduuka nk'orurabyo rw'ebishaka .
59001011	Eizooba ku rirugayo riine ekibiga kirikubabura , rihonzya ebimera , orurabyo rwabyo ruragara , n'oburungi bwabyo buhwaho . N'omutungi nikwo arihwa atyo amaizi omu bi arikwitanira .
59001012	Omuntu orikugumisiririza okugyezibwa aine omugisha , ahabw'okuba ku ariheza kukwemera , aryaheebwa ekirunga ky'amagara , eki Ruhanga yaaraganiise abamukunda .
59001013	Omuntu ku araayohibwe , arekye kugira ati : Naayohibwa Ruhanga . Manya Ruhanga tayohibwa kibi , kandi nawe wenka tagira ou ayosya ,
59001014	kureka buri muntu ayohibwa naabeihwabeihwa , kandi naatwarwa okwetenga kwe kubi .
59001015	Reero okwetenga okubi ku kutwara enda , kuzaara ekibi ; n'ekibi ku kikura , kizaara okufa .
59001016	Banyaruganda abakundwa , mutaribeihwabeihwa .
59001017	Engabirano yoona n'ekiconco kyona ekihikiire kimwe , biruga omu iguru owa Ruhanga Taata , Omuhangi w'ebyakira omu iguru , ou owe hatabayo kuhindahinduka nari okwiririmba .
59001018	Ahabw'okwekundira kwe akatubaisaho n'ekigambo ky'amazima , ngu tube emiganuro y'ebi yaahangire .
59001019	Banyaruganda abakundwa , mbwenu eki mukimanye ; k'omuntu weena abe orikurahuka kuhurira , kandi otarikurahukirwa kugamba n'okugira ekiniga .
59001020	Manya omuntu oine ekiniga tahitsya by'okuhikiirira ebi Ruhanga ayenda .
59001021	N'ahabw'ekyo mweiheho emicwe mibi yoona n'emitwarize mibi yoona . Mwakiire n'obucureezi ekigambo eki Ruhanga yaataire omu mitima yaanyu , ekirikubaasa kubajuna .
59001022	Mube abarikuhitsya ekyo kigambo , mutari abarikukihurira kusha , mukeebeihabeiha .
59001023	Manya weena ohurira ekigambo , kwonka atarikukihitsya , ashusha nk'omuntu owaayereebera omu ndeeberwamu .
59001024	Haza ku ayereeba yaagyenda , ayebwa ahonaaho oku arikushusha .
59001025	Kwonka oyetegyereza eiteeka erihikiire kimwe , niryo iteeka eritwiha omu buhuuku , haza akarihamiramu , atari muhurizi orikwebwa , kureka omukozi orikurihitsya , aryaheebwa Ruhanga omugisha omu bi arikukora .
59001026	Omuntu orikwemanya ngu n'omunyadiini , kwonka atarikutegyeka rurimi rwe , kureka akeebeihabeiha omu mutima , ogwo muntu ediini ye n'eya busha .
59001027	Ediini empuuhe kandi etasiisikaire mu maisho ga Ruhanga Tataitwe niyo egi : okushuura efuuzi n'abafaakazi bari omu naku , kandi n'okwerinda okushiishwa ensi .
59002001	Banyaruganda , nk'oku murikwikiriza Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo ow'ekitiinwa , mugume murekye kushoroora omu bantu .
59002002	Ka tugire ngu abantu babiri baija ahi muteeraniire , omwe ajwaire empeta z'ezaabu n'emyenda mirungi munonga ; n'ondi omworo ajwaire emyenda etaanyagurikire .
59002003	Mbwenu mwata omutima ahari ogwo ojwaire emyenda emirungi , mwamugira muti : Yeshutamire aha ; haza mwagira omworo muti : Yemerera hariya ; nari muti : Shutama aha , aha bigyere byangye .
59002004	Obwo nimuba mutashorooraine , mukeekirakiranisa ?
59002005	Banyaruganda abakundwa , nimuhurire . Hari , Ruhanga taratooraine booro b'omuri egi nsi , ngu babe abatungi b'okwikiriza , kandi abahunguzi b'obukama obu yaaraganiise abamukunda ?
59002006	Kwonka imwe nimuba mugayire ogwo mworo . Abatungi tibo babahata , bakababindirana nibabatwara omu maramuriro ?
59002007	Tibo abo abarogota aha iziina rirungi eri mwetererwa ?
59002008	Buzimazima ku muraabe nimuhitsya eiteeka rya Mukama , nk'oku ekyahandiikirwe kirikugira kiti : Kunda mutaahi waawe nk'oku oyekunda ; nimuba mukozire gye .
59002009	Kwonka ku murikushoroorana , biri mukozire ekibi , kandi eiteeka niriba ribasingiise orubanja , muri abasiisi .
59002010	Manya omuntu weena oremwa kuhitsya ekintu kimwe eky'omu iteeka , aba asingirwe orubanja rw'okutahitsya byona eby'omu iteeka .
59002011	Ahabw'okuba owaagizire ati : Otarishambana ; niwe yaagizire ati : Otariita . Ku orikuba otashambaine , kwonka waita , biri nooba ohenzire eiteeka .
59002012	N'ahabw'ekyo mugambe kandi mutwaze nk'ab'okucwerwa orubanja , nk'eiteeka eritwiha omu buhuuku oku riri .
59002013	Ahabw'okuba otagira mbabazi , aryacwerwa Ruhanga orubanja rutarimu mbabazi . Manya embabazi zitamba okusingwa orubanja .
59002014	Banyaruganda , mbwenu omuntu nikimugasira ki okugira ngu aine okwikiriza , haza ataine bi arikukora ? Ebyo okwikiriza kwe okwo nikubaasa kumujuna ?
59002015	Ku haakubaho omunyaruganda , omushaija nari omukazi , ojwaire kubi kandi ataine byokurya by'okumutunga buri izooba ,
59002016	omwe omuriimwe yaamugira ati : Yegyendere n'obusingye , otagatirwe kandi oigute , haza atamuhaire bi omubiri gwe gukyenire , ekyo nikiba nikigasha ki ?
59002017	N'ahabw'ekyo okwikiriza kwonka kwaba kutarimu kukora , biri n'okwa busha .
59002018	Shana hakaabaho owaagira ati : Iwe oine okwikiriza , naanye nyine ebi nkora . Mbwenu nyoreka okwikiriza kwawe okutakwatiraine n'ebi okora , naanye ahabw'ebi nkora , nkworekye okwikiriza kwangye .
59002019	Noikiriza Ruhanga ku ari omwe , haza obwo ni gye . Nangwa na baasitaane ekyo bakiikiriza bataho n'okutetema .
59002020	Mbwenu , iwe mushema ' we , nooyenda ku bakworeka ku okwikiriza kutarimu kukora kuba busha ?
59002021	Aburahamu tataitwe tarahikiriziibwe ahabw'eki yaakozire , obu yaahayo omutabani Isaaka aha itambiro ?
59002022	Aho nooreeba ku okwikiriza kwe kwagyendeire hamwe n'ebi yaakozire . Haza okwo kwikiriza kukahikiiririzibwa kimwe ebi yaakozire .
59002023	N'ahabw'ekyo ekyahandiikirwe kikahikiirizibwa , ekirikugira kiti : Aburahamu akaikiriza Ruhanga , ekyo kyamubarirwa kuba okuhikiirira .
59002024	Aho nimureeba ku omuntu ahikiirizibwa Ruhanga ahabw'ebi akora , kutari ahabw'okwikiriza kwonka .
59002025	Kandi shi Rahabu , maraaya ori , omu muringo ogwo nawe tarahikiiriziibwe Ruhanga ahabw'ebi yaakozire , obu yaakunira entatsi , akazitooza ogundi muhanda ?
59002026	Mbwenu nk'oku omubiri ogutarimu mutima guba ogufiire , n'okwikiriza okutarimu birikukorwa nikwo kuba okufiire .
59003001	Banyaruganda , hatarigira baingi omuriimwe abaayenda kuba abeegyesa , ahabw'okuba nimumanya ngu itwe abarikwegyesa turyacwerwa orubanja orurikukira orw'abandi .
59003002	Manya twena tushobya kaingi , kandi omuntu weena , ku yaakuba atarikushobya mu bi arikugamba , akaaba ari ohikiire kimwe , kandi orikubaasa kwetegyeka weena .
59003003	Nimumanya ngu ku tuta embaraasi ebyoma omu kanwa , ngu zitworobere , tuzitooza ahi turikwenda .
59003004	Mureebere n'aha meeri ; nobu ziba mpango zita , kandi nizitwarwa emiyaga y'amaani , kwonka engasya nkye munonga zizigarura hoona ahu omuvugi arikwenda ngu zitoore .
59003005	N'orurimi , nobu ruraabe ruri akagingo kakye , rwesiimirana ebintu bikuru . Ka n'eihano okureeba ekibira nikitwekwa akariro kakye , nobu kiba kiri kihango kita !
59003006	Orurimi narwo ruba omuriro . Omu ngingo zaitu nirwo ruba eiteeraniro ry'ebibi byona ; rushiisha omubiri gwona , rutweka obuhangwa bw'obuntu bwaitu bwona , n'omuriro ogu rukongyeeza okuzimu owa Nyamuteza .
59003007	Manya ekyeetwa enyamaishwa kyona , n'enyonyi , n'ebirikugyendesa enda , n'ebyenyanja , bibaasa kutegyekwa kandi birategyekirwe abantu .
59003008	Kwonka tihariho muntu orikubaasa kutegyeka orurimi oruba obubi butatuuza , orwijwire obushegu burikwita .
59003009	Turuhimbisisa Mukama Tataitwe , kandi turukyeenesa abantu abaahangiirwe omu nshusha ya Ruhanga .
59003010	Omuri ako kanwa , harugamu okuhimbisa n'okukyeena . Banyaruganda , ekyo tikishemereire kuba kityo .
59003011	Mbwenu shi enshuro emwe neebaasa kurugwamu amaizi amanure n'agarikushaarira ?
59003012	Banyaruganda , omutiini tigubaasa kwana ebijuma bya oliva , n'omuzaabibu kwana emitiini . N'amaizi g'omwonyo tigabaasa kurugwamu amarungi .
59003013	Omuriimwe n'oha oine obwengye kandi orikwetegyereza ? Ahabw'emitwarize ye mirungi , ayorekye ebi arikukora n'obucureezi oburimu obwengye .
59003014	Kwonka omu mitima yaanyu ku muraabe mwinemu eihari n'okweyendeza , murekye kwehimbisa , mukazindisa amazima ebishuba .
59003015	Obwengye nk'obwo tiburuga mu iguru , n'obw'omu nsi , n'obw'abantu nyabuntu , n'obwa Sitaane .
59003016	Manya ah'eihari n'okweyendeza biri , habaho okutatebeekana n'okukora ebibi bya ibara muringo .
59003017	Kwonka obwengye oburuga omu iguru , okubanza buba empuuhe , butaho kuba obw'obusingye , oburikutwaza gye , obwikiriza eby'oburyo , obwijwire embabazi n'ebirungi , obutarikugwera rubaju , kandi obutarimu buryarya .
59003018	Abareeta obusingye , babiba n'obusingye embibo ezeera okuhikiirira .
59004001	N'enki ekireeta engamba n'okurwana omuriimwe ? T'okwetenga kubi okurikurwanira omu ngingo zaanyu ?
59004002	Mwetenga ebintu ; ku bibaburira , mwita . Mwetenga eby'abandi : kwonka ku muremwa kubitunga , mutyo mutenga orugamba , haza murwana . Ebi mwenda timubitunga , ahabw'okuba timubishaba Ruhanga .
59004003	Mushaba , timuheebwa , ahabw'okuba mushaba kubi kubishiishagurira omu kwetenga kwanyu okubi .
59004004	Imwe bantu batari beesigwa mwe ! Timurikumanya ku okunywana n'ensi kuba obuzigu ahari Ruhanga ? N'ahabw'ekyo weena oyenda kuba munywani w'ensi , ayehindura omuzigu wa Ruhanga .
59004005	Nainga shi nimuteekateeka ngu ekyahandiikirwe kigambira busha , ku kigira kiti : Mutima ou Ruhanga yaatumire kutuura omuriitwe amugirira eihato .
59004006	Kwonka emigisha ei Ruhanga aha , nangwa neekiraho . Nikyo ekyahandiikirwe kirikugirira kiti : Ruhanga arwanisa abeetunguura , kwonka abeebundika abaha emigisha .
59004007	N'ahabw'ekyo mworobere Ruhanga ; mugungire Sitaane , nawe naija kubahunga .
59004008	Mwirire haihi Ruhanga , nawe aryabairira haihi . Imwe basiisi ' mwe , nimweze engaro zaanyu ; naimwe ab'emitima ebiri , mushemeze emitima yaanyu .
59004009	Mugire obusaasi , mucure kandi muganye . Esheko yaanyu ebe okucura , n'okushemererwa kwanyu kuhindukye amaganya .
59004010	Mwebundikye omu maisho ga Mukama , haza abatunguure .
59004011	Banyaruganda , mutarigambuurana . Ogambuura omunyaruganda nari omucwera orubanja , biri agambire kubi eiteeka , kandi aricwereire orubanja . Kwonka ku orikucwera eiteeka orubanja , nooba otarikuhitsya eryo iteeka , kureka okuricwera orubanja .
59004012	Ruhanga wenka niwe yaataireho eiteeka , kandi niwe aba omuramuzi waaryo . Niwe abaasa kujuna nari kucwekyereza . Mbwenu iwe , niiwe oha orikucwera mutaahi waawe orubanja ?
59004013	Nimuhurire , imwe abarikugira muti : Eri izooba nari nyencakare nituza omu rurembo nanka , tumareyo omwaka nitushuubura , twihemu amagoba ;
59004014	haza kunu mutarikumanya bya nyencakare . Mbwenu amagara gaanyu ni ki ? Manya muri nk'orwanyaanya orureebwa akaanya kakye , bwanyima rukaamuuka .
59004015	Haakiri mugire muti : Mukama ku araasiime , naitwe tukihuriire , nitwija kukora eki n'eki .
59004016	Omu mazima nimwehimbisa ahabw'amaryo gaanyu , haza okwo kwehimbisa ni kubi .
59004017	Weena omanya ekishemereire kukorwa , haza atakikore , kimubarirwa kuba ekibi .
59005001	Mbwenu imwe batungi mwe , nimuhurire ! Murire kandi mucure ahabw'enaku ezi murikwija kureeba .
59005002	Eitungo ryanyu rijunzire , n'ebijwaro byanyu biriirwe ebiyenje .
59005003	Ezaabu yaanyu n'efeeza yaanyu bikyereenyire , kandi omukyereenyo gwabyo guryabashinja , gurye omubiri gwanyu nk'omuriro . Eitungo ri mwayebiikiire riryabatukurira omu biro by'aha muheru .
59005004	Nimureebe ebihembo by'abakozi abaashaarwire emyaka yaanyu , ebi mwabaimire nimugobya , nibiborooga ; n'okuborooga kwabo kwahikire omu matu ga Mukama ow'amahe .
59005005	Mukatuura omu nsi mujarami kandi nimweshemeza , mwayegomorera eizooba ry'okwitwa .
59005006	Mukasingisiriza ohikiriire , mwamwita ; tiyaabangira .
59005007	N'ahabw'ekyo beene Taata , mugumisirize okuhitsya ahi Mukama ariizira . Manya omuhingi ategyereza n'okugumisiriza emisiri ye kumurugiramu emyaka y'omugasho . Haza agumisiriza atyo okuhitsya obu atunga enjura y'empangukano n'eya katumba .
59005008	Mbwenu naimwe mugumisirize mutyo . Mugume omutima , ahabw'okuba Mukama ari haihi kwija .
59005009	Banyaruganda , muteetomboiterana , mutakaacwerwa Ruhanga orubanja . Manya Omuramuzi ayemereire aha rwigi .
59005010	Banyaruganda , omu kubonabona n'omu kugumisiriza , mureebere aha barangi abaagambire omu iziina rya Mukama .
59005011	Mumanya ku abagumisiriza tubeeta abahiiriirwe . Mukahurira eby'okugumisiriza kwa Yobu , mwareeba eki Mukama yaagyendereire , oku aba ow'esaasi kandi ow'embabazi .
59005012	Kwonka banyaruganda , okukira byona , mutarirahira eiguru nobu yaakuba ensi , nari ekindi kirahiro kyona ; kureka murekye Eego yaanyu egume eri Eego , na Ngaaha yaanyu egume eri Ngaaha , mutakaayereetera okusingwa orubanja .
59005013	Omuriimwe ku haraabe harimu oine obusaasi , ashabe Ruhanga . Ku haraabe harimu oshemereirwe , ayeshongore eby'okuhimbisa .
59005014	Omuriimwe ku haraabe harimu orwaire , ayete abakuru b'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza , bamushabire nibamusiiga amajuta omu iziina rya Mukama .
59005015	Haza okwo kushaba okurimu okwikiriza kuryakiza ogwo muntu orwaire , Mukama amwinamure ; kandi ku araabe yaakozire ebibi , aryabisaasirwa .
59005016	N'ahabw'ekyo mwaturirane ebibi byanyu , kandi mushabirane , mubone kukizibwa . Okushaba kw'omuntu ohikiriire kugira amaani kandi kukora .
59005017	Omu buhangwa , Eliya akaba ari omuntu nkaitwe . Kwonka ku yaashabire munonga , ngu enjura erekye kugwa aha nsi , egyo njura yaamara emyaka eshatu n'ameezi mukaaga etagwire .
59005018	Bwanyima akagaruka yaashaba , eiguru ryagwisa enjura , n'ensi yaayeza emyaka yaayo .
59005019	Banyaruganda , omuntu weena omuriimwe ku yaakuhaba , yaateishuka amazima , kwonka haagira owaamugarura ,
59005020	amanye ngu weena orikugarura omusiisi , akamwiha ei ahabiire , aryajuna amagara ge kutafa , kandi ashwekye egogoro y'ebibi bye .
60001001	Nyowe Petero , entumwa ya Yesu Kristo , nimbaramutsya imwe abaazaahiibwe mukataataanira omuri Ponto , Galatiya , Kapadokiya , Asiya na Bituniya .
60001002	Manya mukatooranwa Ruhanga Taata okwiha ira , mwayezibwa Mutima , ngu mubone kworobera Yesu Kristo n'okumiisiirwa eshagama ye . Emigisha n'obusingye nibikakanye omuriimwe !
60001003	Ruhanga , Ishe wa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo , ahimbisibwe ! Ahabw'embabazi ze enyingi akatuzaara busya , ngu tugire amatsiko agahuriire ahabw'okuzoorwa omu bafiire kwa Yesu Kristo .
60001004	Ekyo nikitureetera amatsiko g'okutunga obuhunguzi obutaribaasa kuhwerekyerera , nobu kwakuba okusiisikara kandi obutarikuhunduuka , obu Ruhanga yaababiikiire omu iguru .
60001005	Manya imwe , ahabw'okwikiriza nimurindwa amaani ga Ruhanga , ngu mubone kutunga okujunwa okurangariire kushuuruurwa aha kiro ky'aha muheru .
60001006	Mbwenu ebyo mubishemerererwe , nobu muraabe hati nimumara akaanya kakye nimubonabonesibwa ebigyezo bitari bimwe .
60001007	Ebyo bigyezo n'eby'okwenda kuhamya ku okwikiriza kwanyu kuri okw'amazima . Manya n'ezaabu esiisikara , egyezibwa omuriro . N'okwikiriza kwanyu , okw'obuguzi bwingi okukira ezaabu , n'okw'okugyezibwa , ngu kubone kuhama . Reero obwo nibwo murisiimwa , mukaheebwa ekitiinwa kandi mukasingizibwa ahari ekyo kiro eki Yesu Kristo arishuuruukiraho .
60001008	Yesu ogwo , nobu muraabe mutakamureebaga , kwonka nimumukunda ; kandi nobu mutarikumureeba hati , kwonka nimumwikiriza , nimunanuka mwine okushemererwa okutarikubaasa kushoboororwa , kandi okw'ekiitinwa kingi .
60001009	Manya okwikiriza kwanyu okwo nikwo kureetera amagara gaanyu kujunwa .
60001010	Eby'okujunwa okwo , abarangi abaarangire eby'embabazi za Ruhanga , ezi mwabaire nimwija kugirirwa , bakabicondooza kandi baabibuuririza .
60001011	Bakateeraho kwenda kumanya obunaku n'omuringo ebi Mutima wa Kristo yaabamanyisiizemu , naabooreka bukiri kare eby'okubonabonesibwa kwa Kristo n'eby'ekitiinwa ekirikurataho .
60001012	Bakashuuruurirwa Ruhanga ku ebyo baabaire batarikubikora habwabo , kureka ahabwanyu . Nibyo ebyo ebi hati mugambiirwe abarikubarangirira Amakuru Marungi , nibakoresibwa Mutima Orikwera , owaatumirwe naaruga omu iguru . Nibyo ebyo kandi ebi baamaraika barikwenda munonga kwetegyereza .
60001013	N'ahabw'ekyo mwezirikye mutaireho omutima , mwerinde muteere kimwe amatsiko aha migisha ei muriheebwa obu Yesu Kristo arireebeka .
60001014	Nk'abaana abarikuhurira , murekye kushushana nk'oku mwabaire nimukitegyekwa okwetenga kubi okw'obushema bwanyu obwa ira ;
60001015	kureka mube abarikwera omu mitwarize yaanyu yoona , nk'oku Ruhanga owaabeetsire ari orikwera .
60001016	Manya kikahandiikwa kiti : Mube abarikwera , ahabw'okuba ndi orikwera .
60001017	Mbwenu omu kushaba Ruhanga kwanyu , ku muraabe nimweta Tataitwe , Ogwo ocwera omuntu weena orubanja atarikugwera rubaju , kureka naihirira aha bi yaakozire , mumare ebiro byanyu by'okuzaahira omuri egi nsi mwine emitwarize erikumutiina .
60001018	Nimumanya ku mutaracunguziibwe bintu ebihwaho , nk'efeeza n'ezaabu , kubaiha omu mitwarize etaine mugasho , ei mwaihire ahari baashwenkuriimwe ;
60001019	kureka mukacunguzibwa eshagama y'obuguzi bwingi eya Kristo , eri nk'ey'omwana gw'entaama ogutaine kamogo , nobu ryakuba eibara .
60001020	Kristo ogwo , ekyo Ruhanga akakimutooranira ira ensi etakahangirwe , kwonka akoorekwa omu bunaku bw'aha muheru ahabwanyu .
60001021	Ahabwe nimwikiriza Ruhanga owaamuzoire omu baafiire , akamuha ekitiinwa , ngu okwikiriza kwanyu n'amatsiko gaanyu bihamire omuri Ruhanga .
60001022	Mbwenu nk'oku muherize kweyeza nimukuratira amazima , kandi nimukunda abanyaruganda mutarikuryarya , mwezirikye kukundana mwihire aha mutima .
60001023	Mukazaarwa busya , mutazairwe mbibo erikujunda , kureka etarikujunda , nikyo kigambo kya Ruhanga ekihuriire kandi ekigumaho .
60001024	Manya ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Kyona ekyeetwa omuntu ni nk'obunyaatsi , n'oburungi bwakyo bwona ni nk'orurabyo rwabwo . Obunyaatsi buhonga , n'orurabyo ruhunduura .
60001025	Kwonka ekigambo kya Mukama kigumaho ebiiro byona . Ekyo kigambo nigo Makuru Marungi agu mwarangirirwe .
60002001	N'ahabw'ekyo mweiheho eitima ryona n'obugobya bwona n'oburyarya n'eihari n'okubeihererana kwona .
60002002	Nk'abeerere , mwetengye amate g'omutima agatafungwire , gabone kubakuza n'okubahitsya aha kujunwa .
60002003	Ahabw'okuba ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Mwarorize aha burungi bwa Mukama .
60002004	Mwije ahari ogwo eibaare erihuriire , eryayangirwe abantu , kwonka ahari Ruhanga , eryatoorainwe kandi ery'obuguzi bwingi .
60002005	Naimwe mube nk'amabaare agahuriire , mwombekirwe kuba obutaaho bwa Mutima , abahongyerezi abarikwera , abarikuhonga ebitambo by'omutima ebirikusiimwa Ruhanga omuri Yesu Kristo .
60002006	Manya omu Byahandiikirwe harimu ekirikugira kiti : Reeba , ninta omuri Siyooni eibaare ry'obuhamizo eritoorainwe kandi ery'obuguzi bwingi . Weena orikumwikiriza tariitwa nshoni .
60002007	Ahariimwe abarikwikiriza , eryo ibaare n'ery'obuguzi bwingi . Kwonka aha batarikwikiriza , ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Eibaare eri abombeki baayangire , rikahinduka obuhamizo bw'enju .
60002008	Kyongyera kiti : Ryaba eibaare eririteeza abantu entsibo , kandi orukiri oruribagwisa . Bateerwa entsibo ahabw'okuba tiboorobera kigambo , nk'oku baakiteekateekyeirwe Ruhanga .
60002009	Kwonka imwe muri oruganda orutoorainwe , abahongyerezi b'oruganda rw'omugabe , eihanga eirikwera , abantu ba Ruhanga ab'envuma , ngu mubone kworeka butunu ebikuru ebyakozirwe Ruhanga owaabeetsire , akabaiha omu mwirima , akabataasya omu mushana gwe ogurikutangaaza .
60002010	Ira mukaba mutari ihanga , kwonka hati muri eihanga rya Ruhanga . Ira mukaba mutakagiriirwe Ruhanga embabazi , kwonka hati muzigiriirwe .
60002011	Bakundwa ' mwe , nimbeeshengereza nk'abari omu ihanga kandi abazaahiire omu nsi egi , ku mwetantara okwetenga okubi okw'omubiri , okurikurwanisa amagara gaanyu .
60002012	Mugume mwine emitwarize mirungi omu Banyamahanga , reero bakiba nibenda kubagambuura ngu muri enkozi z'ebibi , bareebe ebirungi ebi mukora , bahimbise Ruhanga aha kiro eki ariiziraho .
60002013	Ahabwa Mukama , mugume mworobere abantu boona abarikubategyeka , yaaba ari Rubambansi ahabw'okuba niwe mukuru ;
60002014	nari ari omutegyeki omukuru otumirwe Rubambansi , kufubira abarikukora kubi n'okusiima abarikukora gye .
60002015	Manya eki Ruhanga akunda nikyo eki : ngu omu kukora gye kwanyu mwigare akanwa k'abashema abataine ki barikumanya .
60002016	Mube abantu abaine obusingye , kwonka obusingye bwanyu obwo butaba orwekwatso rw'okukora ebibi , kureka mugume mutwaze nk'abaheereza ba Ruhanga .
60002017	Muhe abantu boona eifubo , mukunde abanyaruganda , mutiine Ruhanga , kandi muhe Rubambansi ekitiinwa .
60002018	Imwe abaheereza , mworobere abakama baanyu nimubaheera kimwe ekitiinwa , ti b'embabazi n'abarikutwaza gye bonka , kureka n'abanyamwaga .
60002019	Ahabw'okuba omuntu asiimwa yaaba naagumisiriza obusaasi naijuka Ruhanga , haza obwo naaturwa busha .
60002020	Mbwenu nimusiimwaho ki , mwaba mwemeire okuteerwa , nibabatura okukora kubi ? Kwonka ku mukora ekirungi , mwayemera obusaasi obwabateebwaho ahabw'okukikora , Ruhanga naabasiima .
60002021	Manya ekyo nikyo mwayeteirwe , ahabw'okuba na Kristo akabonabona ahabwanyu , yaabatsigira eky'okureeberaho , ngu mubone kutoora ekirari kye .
60002022	Kristo tarakozire kibi , n'obugobya tiburareebekire mu kanwa ke .
60002023	Ku yaajumirwe , we tiyaajuma ; ku yaabonabonesiibwe , tiyaahayira ; kureka akeesiga Ruhanga ocwa emanja omu bwinganisa .
60002024	Kristo nyakabara akeekorera ebibi byaitu omu mubiri gwe aha musharaba , ngu tubone kufa aha kibi n'okuba abahuriire aha kuhikiirira . Obuhuta bwe nibwo bwabakirize .
60002025	Manya mukaba muhabire nk'entaama , kwonka hati mukubuukiire Omuriisa kandi Omureeberezi w'amagara gaanyu .
60003001	Naimwe bakazi ' mwe , mworobere baabaroimwe , ngu abamwe omuribo , nobu baraabe batarikwikiriza kigambo kya Ruhanga , bahindurwe emitwarize y'abakazi baabo , banu bataine ki babagambiire ,
