60003002	kureka baareeba emicwe yaanyu eshemeire kandi erimu okutiina Ruhanga .
60003003	Okwecuma kwanyu kurekye kuba okw'okweshemeza aharuguru : nimutsiba eishokye , nimwehunda eby'ezaabu , nimujwara ebiragaize aha bigyere .
60003004	Kureka okwo kwecuma kube okw'omunda omu mitima yaanyu okw'eihunde eritarikusiisikara , ery'omutima omucureezi kandi ogutuurize , ogw'obuguzi bwingi omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
60003005	N'abakazi aba ira abarikwera , abaabaire bata amatsiko omuri Ruhanga , bakaba beecuma batyo kandi boorobera baibabo ,
60003006	nka Saara oku yaabaire ayorobera Aburahamu naamweta mukama we . Naimwe hati muri bahara be mwaba nimukora gye , mutaine kintu kyona ekirikubatiinisa .
60003007	Naimwe bashaija ' mwe , mutuure n'abakazi baanyu mubainiire omwete , nimubaha ekitiinwa ; nimumanya ku bari enyabya zitagumire , kandi ku bari abahunguzi hamwe naimwe b'engabirano ya Ruhanga ey'amagara , okushaba kwanyu kubone kutateerwa ha mutwe .
60003008	Eky'aha muheru , mwena mugire omutima gumwe , mugirirane esaasi na rukundo y'enyina-emwe , mugire omutima gw'embabazi kandi omucureezi .
60003009	Mutarigarurirana ebibi nari okujumiirana , kureka mugume mushabirane emigisha . Manya ekyo nikyo Ruhanga yaabeeteire , ngu mubone kutunga emigisha .
60003010	Ahabw'okuba ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Orikweyendeza amagara n'okugira omuraaro murungi , azibire orurime rwe kugamba ebibi , n'akanwa ke kugamba eby'obugobya .
60003011	Ayetantare ebibi , akore ebirungi , asherure obusingye kandi abwitanire .
60003012	Manya Mukama ata amaisho aha bahikiriire , kandi amatu ge agatega okushaba kwabo . Kwonka enkozi z'ebibi aziteera ekitsyori .
60003013	Mbwenu n'oha owaakubakora kubi , mwaba mwine omuhimbo gw'okukora ebirungi ?
60003014	Ku mwakuba nimubonabonesibwa ahabw'okuhikiirira , nimuba mwine omugisha . Mutaritiina okukangisa kw'abantu , nobu kwakuba okwemereza omutima ;
60003015	kureka omu mitima yaanyu , mugume muhe Kristo ekitiinwa , abe Mukama waanyu . Obutoosha mugume mweteekateekire kushoboororera omuntu weena owaakubabuuza eby'amatsiko agu mugira .
60003016	Kwonka ekyo mukikore n'obucureezi nimuha Ruhanga ekitiinwa . Mugume mwine omutima gutarikweshinja ; haza abarikugamba kubi aha mitwarize yaanyu mirungi ei mwine omuri Kristo , ku baraabajume , bahemukye .
60003017	Haakiri mubonabonesibwe nimuturwa okukora ebirungi , Ruhanga yaaba akisiimire , okukira okuturwa okukora ebibi .
60003018	Manya Kristo akafa rimwe ahabw'ebibi byaitu yaaheza , ari ohikiriire ahabw'abatahikiriire , ngu abone kutuhitsya ahari Ruhanga , owaitsirwe omu mubiri , akahindurwa ohuriire omu mutima .
60003019	Omuri ogwo mutima nimwo yaagyendeire , akarangirira emitima y'abaafiire eyaabaire eri omu kihome .
60003020	Nibo ira abataroorobire , obu Ruhanga yaagumisiriza ategyereize omu biro bya Noa , obu emeeri yaabaire neekorwa , ei abantu bakye munaana baakiriiremu amaizi .
60003021	Mbwenu ago maizi gakaba gari ekyeshusha ky'okubatizibwa okurikubajuna imwe omu biro ebi . Okubatizibwa okwo tikuba kwozya nziro ha mubiri , kureka kuba okuhoogyera Ruhanga n'omutima gwezire , kukahaisa okujunwa ahabw'okuzooka kwa Yesu Kristo .
60003022	Niwe ogwo owaagiire omu iguru , kandi ori aha rubaju rwa Ruhanga orwa buryo , naategyeka baamaraika n'ab'obushoboorozi n'ab'amaani .
60004001	Nk'oku Kristo yaabonabonesiibwe omu mubiri , naimwe mwegumye mwine omutima nk'ogwe . Manya weena obonabona omu mubiri aba atakikora bibi ,
60004002	ngu abone kumara ebiro bye ebitsigaire akiine omubiri , atakitegyekwa kwetenga okubi okw'abantu , kureka ebi Ruhanga akunda .
60004003	Omu biro byahingwire mukamara omwanya muraingwa munonga nimukora ebi Abanyamahanga bakunda . Mukaba mwine emitwarize y'ebikwatiraine n'obushambani , n'okworobera okwetenga okubi okw'omubiri , n'obusinzi , n'okuraara enkyeera , n'okuramya ebishushani okurikuzira .
60004004	Nikitangaaza abo Banyamahanga kureeba hati mutarikukwatanisa nabo omu by'okwetaanyagura kutyo , nikyo barikubajumira .
60004005	Bo baryayetonganira ahari Ogwo oyeteekateekire kucwera abahuriire n'abafiire orubanja .
60004006	Nikyo Amakuru Marungi gaarangiririirwe n'abaafiire , ngu nobu baacwereirwe orubanja omu mubiri nk'abantu , kwonka bagume bari abahuriire omu mutima nka Ruhanga .
60004007	Emperu ya byona eri haihi . N'ahabw'ekyo mugume mwerinzire nimwebarira , mubone kubaasa kushaba Ruhanga .
60004008	Okukira byona , mugume nimukundana mutarikuhararukana , ahabw'okuba rukundo eshwekyerera ebibi bingi .
60004009	Mukunirane mutarikunyomwa .
60004010	Nk'oku buri omwe yaahairwe ekiconco , mubihweresane nk'abaakwatsiibwe okugaba emigisha ya Ruhanga etari emwe .
60004011	Weena oine eky'okugamba , agambe ebi Ruhanga amushuuruuriire . Weena orikuheereza , aheereze n'amaani agu Ruhanga amuhaire , omuri byona Ruhanga abone kuhimbisizibwa omuri Yesu Kristo , oheebwa ekitiinwa n'obutegyeki ebiro byona . Amiina .
60004012	Abakundwa , mutatangaazibwa omuriro ogurikubagyeza , mukaba nk'abaagwerwa akagwe .
60004013	Haakiri mushemererwe , ahabw'okuba mukwataniise na Kristo omu kubonabona kwe . Reero ekitiinisa kye ku kirishuuruurwa , nabwo mubone kushemererwa n'okunanuka .
60004014	Ku muraajumwe ahabw'eiziina rya Kristo , mwine omugisha ; ahabw'okuba Mutima ow'ekitiinwa , Mutima wa Ruhanga , ari ahariimwe .
60004015	Kwonka hatarigira n'omwe omuriimwe owaabonabonesibwa ahabw'okwita , nari okwiba , nari okukora bibi , nainga okwetaasya omu by'abandi ;
60004016	kureka oraabonabonesibwe ahabw'okuba Omukristo , arekye kwitwa enshoni . Haakiri ahimbise Ruhanga , ahabw'okwetwa eryo iziina .
60004017	Manya obunaku buhikire okucwa orubanja okutandikira aha b'omu nju ya Ruhanga . Mbwenu ku kuraabe niitwe kuraabandizeho , abo abatarikwikiriza Makuru Marungi ga Ruhanga baryashura ki ?
60004018	Nk'ekyahandiikirwe oku kirikugira kiti : Ohikiriire ku araabe naagumirwa okujunwa , otarikutiina Ruhanga n'omusiisi baryaba bata ?
60004019	N'ahabw'ekyo ababonabona nk'oku Ruhanga asiimire , bagume nibakora gye , kandi bakwatse amagara gaabo Omuhangi omwesigwa .
60005001	Mbwenu niinyehanangiriza abakuru omuriimwe . Naanye ndi omukuru mugyenzi waabo , kareebi w'okubonabonesibwa kwa Kristo , kandi orikubarirwa omuri abo abaritunga ekitiinwa ekirishuuruurwa .
60005002	Nimbagambira nti : Muriise obusyo bwa Ruhanga obu mwakwatsiibwe , mubureeberere mutarikugyemwa , kureka mwekundiire , nk'oku Ruhanga arikubendeza ; mutarikuburiisa nk'abaguririirwe , kureka mubwiniire omuhimbo .
60005003	Mutaritegyekyesa eikama abu mwakwatsiibwe , kureka mube eky'okureeberwaho obwo busyo .
60005004	Reero Omuriisa omukuru ku ariboneka , muryaheebwa ekirunga ky'ekitiinwa ekitarikuhunduuka .
60005005	Naimwe abato , mworobere abakuru . Mbwenu mwena , muhereezane , omuntu na mugyenzi we , nimwebundika , ahabw'okuba ekyahandiikirwe nikigira kiti : Ruhanga ayangira abeetunguura , kwonka abeebundika abaha omugisha .
60005006	N'ahabw'ekyo mwebundikye ahansi y'omukono gwa Ruhanga ogw'amaani , abone kubatunguura obunaku bwahika .
60005007	Ebyanyu byona ebibashobeire mubimwegyekyerere , ahabw'okuba naabataho omutima .
60005008	Mugume nimwebarira kandi nimureeba . Manya Sitaane omuzigu waanyu naazengyerere nk'entare erikutsinda , neesherura ou eraashonshomere .
60005009	Mumwangire , muhamiire omu kwikiriza kwanyu , nimumanya abanyaruganda abari omu nsi yoona nabo ku bahikwaho okubonbona nk'okwanyu .
60005010	Reero ku muriheza kubonabonesibwaho akaanya kakye , Ruhanga ow'embabazi zoona , owaabeeteire ekitiinwa kye ekitahwaho omuri Kristo , aryabagaruraho , abahamye kandi abagumye .
60005011	Ogwo abe niwe yaategyeka ebiro byona ! Amiina .
60005012	Naabahandiikira nincwera hagufu , nimpandiikisa Silivaano , ou ndikweta omunyaruganda omwesigwa . Nimbeehanangiriza kandi nimbahamiza ku ebyo biri embabazi za Ruhanga ez'amazima ; haza mube nizo mwahamiramu .
60005013	Ekigombe ky'abaikiriza eky'omuri Babulooni , nakyo ekyatoorainwe Ruhanga , nikibaramutsya . N'omwana wangye Mariko naabaramutsya .
60005014	Muramutsyane n'okunywegyerana okurikwera . Imwe mwena abari omuri Kristo , mugume n'obusingye !
61001001	Nyowe , Simooni Petero , omuheereza kandi entumwa ya Yesu Kristo , nimbahandiikira imwe abaatungire okwikiriza kw'obuguzi bwingi nk'okwaitu , nimukwiha mu kuhikiirira kwa Ruhanga waitu kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo .
61001002	Emigisha n'obusingye nibikakanye omuriimwe , nimumanya Ruhanga na Yesu Mukama waitu .
61001003	Mukama waitu ogwo , ahabw'amaani ge g'obwaruhanga , akatuha ebintu byona ebikwatiraine n'amagara n'okutiina Ruhanga , yaabituheera omu kumanya ogwo owaatwetsire kubagana aha kitiinwa kye n'aha burungi bwe .
61001004	Ebyo nibyo yaatuheerairemu ebiraganiso by'obuguzi bwingi kandi ebikuru , ngu ahabwabyo mubone kukira okusiisikara kw'omu nsi , okureetwa okwetenga okubi , kandi mube abarikubagana nawe obwaruhanga bwe .
61001005	N'ahabw'ekyo muteho munonga omutima kwongyera aha kwikiriza kwanyu emicwe mirungi , n'aha micwe mirungi okwetegyereza ,
61001006	n'aha kwetegyereza okwerinda , n'aha kwerinda okuhama , n'aha kuhama okutiina Ruhanga ,
61001007	n'aha kushongoka ahari Ruhanga mwongyereho okukundana , n'aha kukundana mwongyereho rukundo .
61001008	Haza ebyo ku murikubigira byashaagaana , nibibatambira okuba abataine mugasho nari abatarikwana , kureka nibibahitsya aha kumanyira kimwe Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
61001009	Manya weena obuzirweho ebyo , biri n'empumi erikureebera hagufu , kandi ayebirwe ku yaayogiibweho ebibi bye ebya ira .
61001010	N'ahabw'ekyo beene Taata , mwongyere kugira omuhimbo gw'okuhamya okwetwa kwanyu n'okutooranwa kwanyu . Manya ku murikutwaza mutyo , timurigira bu mugwire ;
61001011	kandi muryaikiririzibwa kimwe kutaaha omu bukama obutahwaho obwa Mukama waitu kandi Omujuni waitu Yesu Kristo .
61001012	Nikyo ntuura niinyendera kubaijutsya ebyo bigambo , nobu muraabe nimubimanya , kandi muhamiire omu mazima agu mwatungire .
61001013	Ninteekateeka ngu kihikire , naaba nkiine ogu mubiri , kuguma nimbateera omuhimbo nimbibaijutsya ;
61001014	ahabw'okuba nimmanya ku ndangariire kujuura ogu mubiri gwangye , nk'oku Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo yangambiire .
61001015	Kandi niinyija kutaho omutima kureeba ngu ku ndiheza kufa , mubone kuguma nimweijutsya ebyo bintu ahi biraayetengyerwe hoona .
61001016	Obu twabamanyisa eby'obushoboorozi bwa Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo n'okureebeka kwe , bikaba bitari bigano ebigunzirwe obwengye bw'abantu , kureka tukeereebera n'agaitu ekitiinwa kye ky'obukama .
61001017	Manya Ruhanga Taata akamuha ekitiinwa n'okuhimbisibwa , kandi n'eiraka rikamwizira niriruga omu kitiinwa kikuru ekya Ruhanga , nirigira riti : Ogu niwe Mwana wangye ou nkunda , kandi ou nshemerererwa munonga .
61001018	Eryo iraka tukarihurira niryema omu iguru , ahabw'okuba tukaba turi hamwe nawe aha rushozi orurikwera .
61001019	N'ahabw'ekyo twine ekigambo ky'oburangi ekihamire okukiraho . Nimwija kukora gye mwakitaho omutima , nk'oku baguta aha itabaaza ririkwakira ah'omwirima guri , okuhitsya obu omushekye gurijuguta , n'enyonyoozi y'omu busheeshe ekabonekyera omu mitima yaanyu .
61001020	Eky'okubanza mushemereire kumanya eki , ku hatariho burangi bw'omu Byahandiikirwe obu omuntu ashoboorora wenka ahabwe .
61001021	Manya tihakabahoga burangi obu omuntu areeteekateekyeire , kureka abantu bakaba bagamba ebirugire ahari Ruhanga , nibabigambisibwa Mutima Orikwera .
61002001	Nk'oku omu ihanga eri haimukiremu abarikwegira abarangi , n'abeegyesa b'ebishuba , n'omuriimwe nikwo baribaho . Baryabataasyamu bwesherekye enyegyesa y'akabi erikuhabisa , nangwa n'okwehakana Mukama waabo owaabacungwire ; batyo beereetere okucwekyerera kw'ahonaaho .
61002002	Haza baingi baryatooreza emicwe yaabo ekwatiraine n'eby'obushambani , bagayise omuhanda gw'amazima .
61002003	Ahabw'omururu gwabo baryabatungamu amagoba nibakoresa ebigambo by'obugobya . Manya okwiha ira okusingwa orubanja kwabo tikukatuuzaga , n'okucwekyerera kwabo tikukahungiraga .
61002004	Ruhanga tarasaasiire baamaraika abaasiisire , kureka akabanaga owa Nyamuteza , yaabata okuzimu omu mwirima ndindindi kurindirwayo okuhitsya obu baricwerwa orubanja .
61002005	Kandi tarasaasiire nsi ya ira obu yaahimintura omwegyemure aha nsi y'abatatiina Ruhanga , kureka akarokora Noa , omurangirizi w'eby'okuhikiirira , n'abandi bantu mushanju .
61002006	Bwanyima akacwa endembe za Sodoma na Gomora eiju , yaazicwera orubanja rw'okucwekyerera , ngu abariba batarikutiina Ruhanga bazireebereho .
61002007	Reero yaarokora Loti ohikiriire , owaabaire ashobeirwe munonga ahabw'emicwe ekwatiraine n'eby'obushambani bw'abantu babi .
61002008	Manya ogwo muntu ohikiriire , ebi yaareebire n'ebi yaahuriire abatwiremu nibakora ebitahikire , buri izooba bikaba bimureetera obujune bwingi omu mutima gwe omurungi .
61002009	Reero Mukama nikwo amanya kurokora omu kwohibwa abamushongokireho , n'okurindira abatahikiriire omu kifubiro , okuhitsya aha kiro ky'okucwererwaho orubanja ;
61002010	na munonga abo abeejaramya omu mururu gw'okwetenga kubi okw'omubiri , bakagaya obushoboorozi bwa Ruhanga . Abo beegyesa abarikuhabisa baba abantu abatagira ki batiina , ababa ebyegyengye , abataitwa nshoni kujuma ab'ebitiinwa .
61002011	Haza kunu baamaraika , nobu baraabe babakiza amaani n'obushoboorozi , tibabatabaariza mu maisho ga Nyakubaho nibabajuma .
61002012	Kwonka abo basiisi bari nk'enyamaishwa zitaine bwengye , ezitwarwa obuhangwa bwazo , ezaazaariirwe okukwatwa n'okwitwa . Bajumiirana ebi batarikumanya , haza baryacwekyerezibwa nkazo ,
61002013	babonabone ahabw'ebibi bi baakozire . Ekibananura n'okwejaramya omu magyenyi nyomushana . N'abantu abarikuhemura kandi abarikugayisa , abeejaramya nibarya hamwe naimwe .
61002014	Baine amaisho gaijwire obushambani , agataruha kukora ebibi . Beetereza abaine emitima etahamire . Baine emitima eyaamanyiriire kugira omururu . Ebishi n'abakyeenirwe !
61002015	Bakateishuka omuhanda guhikire , baahaba , baatoora omuhanda gwa Balaamu mwene Beori , owaayenzire kwetungira omukimbo gw'okukora ebitahikire .
61002016	Kwonka akateisibwa ahabw'ekibi kye , obu endogoya etagamba yaagambire nk'omuntu , ekatsina eiraro ry'ogwo murangi .
61002017	Abo bantu ni nk'amaziba gatarimu maizi , kandi ni nk'ebicu by'orumena ebitwarwa omuyaga ; omwanya gw'omwirima ndindindi gubabiikiirwe .
61002018	Ku baba nibagamba eby'okwetunguura ebitaine muhoho , boosya abandi bantu abarangariire bati kuhunga abatuura bahabire ; obwo nibabeetereza n'emibiri yaabo eruruuhira ebikwatiraine n'eby'obushambani .
61002019	Babaraganisa ku barikwija kuba ab'obusingye , haza bo bonka bari abahuuku b'emicwe mibi . Manya kyona ekikiza omuntu emikono , aba omuhuuku waakyo .
61002020	Ahabw'okuba ku baheza kuhunga ebihagaro by'ensi , ahabw'okumanya Mukama waitu kandi Omujuni Yesu Kristo , bagaruka babyerohamu , bibakoma kandi bibategyeka ; haza omuheru gwabo ogwa bwanyima guba mubi okukira ogw'okubanza .
61002021	Embu y'obwo , kuri bataramanyire muhanda gw'okuhikiirira , okukira okuheza kugumanya , bakaguteishuka , bakareka ebiragiro ebirikwera ebyabahairwe .
61002022	Ekyababaireho kiri nk'enfumu y'amazima erikugira eti : Embwa egarukira ebitanaki byayo . N'endiijo nfumu eti : Empunu , ku baheza kugyozya , eyekuringa omu shaabo .
61003001	Bagyenzi bangye abakundwa , mbwenu egi n'ebaruha yangye ya kabiri ei naabahandiikira . Omuri ago mabaruha gombi , mbaire ninteeraho kusisiimura emitima yaanyu etaine buryarya , nimbahuguura .
61003002	Niinyenda ku mwijuka ebyarangirwe abarangi abarikwera , n'ebiragiro bya Mukama waitu kandi Omujuni , ebi yaarabize omu ntumwa zaanyu .
61003003	Eky'okubanza kya byona , mushemereire kumanya eki , ngu omu biro by'aha muheru haryabaho abantu abarikutwaririzibwa okwetenga kwabo okubi .
61003004	Haza abo bantu baryabashekyerera imwe , nibagira bati : Ku yaaraganiise ngu aryaija , hati arahi ? Mbwenu shi baatatenkuriitwe baaba kufa , ebintu ka bituura nk'oku biri ensi yaaba kuhangwa !
61003005	Nibeehuzya nkana eky'amazima eki : Ku kare munonga Ruhanga yaahangiise ekigambo kye eiguru n'ensi kandi egyo nsi ku yaahangirwe neihwa omu maizi , ekateebwa ahagati yaago .
61003006	Haza ago maizi ku nigo gaarugirwemu omwegyemure , gukacwekyereza egyo nsi eyaabaire eriho obwo .
61003007	Kwonka ahabw'ekyo kigambo , eiguru n'ensi ebiriho hati , bituura bibiikiirwe omuriro , birinzirwe okuhitsya aha izooba ry'okucwererwaho orubanja n'okucwekyereza abantu abatatiina Ruhanga .
61003008	Mbwenu abakundwa , eki kitaribeeba : ku ahari Nyakubaho ekiro kimwe kiri nk'emyaka rukumi , n'emyaka rukumi eri nk'ekiro kimwe .
61003009	Nyakubaho tayeganda kuhikiiriza ebi yaaraganiise , nk'oku abamwe bateekateeka . Imwe atuura naabagumisiririza , atarikwenda muntu weena kuhwerekyerera , kureka ngu boona barugyeho beegarukyemu .
61003010	Buzimazima ekiro kya Mukama kiryaija nk'omushuma , eiguru rihweho nirihinda munonga , n'ebyarihangirwemu biyagibwe omuriro ; kandi ensi n'ebyagihangirwemu byokibwe ogwo muriro , bihweho .
61003011	Nk'oku ebyo bintu byona biri eby'okuyaga bityo , mushemereire kuba abantu ba muringo ki ? Mushemereire kuba abarikwera kandi abarikutiina Ruhanga omu mitwarize yaanyu ,
61003012	mutegyereize ekiro ky'okwija kwa Ruhanga , kandi mukiiniire ekihika . Manya ahari ekyo kiro , eiguru riryakoreera omuriro , riyagye , n'ebiririmu biyagibwe omuriro .
61003013	Kwonka nk'oku yaaturaganiise , tutuura tutegyereize eiguru erisya n'ensi ensya , ebituurwamu okuhikiirira .
61003014	Mbwenu nu , bagyenzi bangye abakundwa , nk'oku ebyo mubitegyereize , mugire omuhimbo , Mukama abashangye mutaine kabara nari akamogo , kureka mumwineho obusingye .
61003015	Mumanye ku okugumisiriza kwa Mukama waitu okwo kuri omugisha gwanyu gw'okujunwa . Na mwene waitu omukundwa Paulo , nikwo yaabahandiikiire , nk'oku obwengye bu yaahairwe buri .
61003016	Haza ebyo Paulo naabigambaho nk'oku ashangwa agira omu baruha ze zoona ; kandi zibamu bimwe ebigumire kwetegyereza , ebi abashema n'abatahamire bakiikamya , nk'oku bagira ebindi Ebyahandiikirwe , bikabarugiramu okuhwerekyerera .
61003017	N'ahabw'ekyo imwe bakundwa ' mwe , nk'oku mwamanya ebyo bukiri kare , mwerinde mutakaahabisibwa obuhabe bw'abo bagomi , mukafeerwa mukabura kuhama ;
61003018	kureka mukurire omu mbabazi za Mukama waitu kandi Omujuni Yesu Kristo n'omu kumumanya . Ahimbisibwe omu bunaku obu , n'obutwire bwona . Amiina .
62001001	Twabahandiikira aha bya Kigambo ow'amagara , owaabaire ariho okwiha omu kutandika , ou twahuriire , ou twayereebeire n'agaitu , kandi ou twayetegyereize , tukamukoraho n'engaro zaitu .
62001002	Ago magara gakoorekwa , twagareeba , turi baakareebi baago ; kandi naimwe nitubarangirira eby'ago magara agatahwaho , agaabaire gari hamwe na Taata kandi gakatworekwa .
62001003	Eki twareebire tukahurira , nikyo turikubarangirira , ngu mubone kukwatanisa naitwe . Manya okukwatanisa kwaitu kuba hamwe na Taata n'Omwana we Yesu Kristo .
62001004	Ebyo twabibahandiikira ngu mubone kushemerererwa kimwe .
62001005	Obu nibwo butumwa obu twahuriire Omwana we naagamba , naitwe tukabubarangirira : ku Ruhanga aba omushana , kandi omuriwe ku hatabamu mwirima n'akakye .
62001006	Ku tugira ngu nitukwatanisa nawe , haza kunu nitugyendera omu mwirima , biri nitubeiha , n'emitwarize yaitu eba etari y'amazima .
62001007	Kwonka ku tugyendera omu mushana , nkawe oku ari omu mushana , tukwatanisa buri muntu na mugyenzi we , kandi eshagama ya Yesu Omwana we etwozyaho ekibi kyona .
62001008	Ku tugira ngu titwine kibi , biri nitwebeiha kandi tuba tutari b'amazima .
62001009	Ku twatura ebibi byaitu , Ruhanga ahabw'okuba n'omwesigwa kandi ohikiriire , abitusaasira kandi atwozyaho ebitahikire byona .
62001010	Ku tugira ngu titwine kibi , tumuhindura omubeihi kandi n'ekigambo kye kiba kitari muriitwe .
62002001	Baana bangye abakundwa , ebi naabibahandiikira ngu murekye kukora ebibi . Kwonka omuntu weena ku araakore ekibi , amanye ku twine orikututonganira ahari Taata , niwe Yesu Kristo ohikiriire .
62002002	Kristo ogwo niwe karabo y'ebibi byaitu , haza ti byaitu byonka , kureka n'eby'ensi yoona .
62002003	Ku tworobera ebiragiro bya Ruhanga , nibwo tuhamya ku turikumumanya .
62002004	Orikwegamba ati : Nimmumanya , haza akagomera ebiragiro bye , aba ari omubeihi , kandi omuriwe haba hatarimu mazima .
62002005	Kwonka weena okuratira ekigambo kye , buzimazima rukundo ei agira ahari Ruhanga eba ehikiire kimwe . Aha niho tuhamiza ku turi omuri Ruhanga ;
62002006	orikwegamba ngu atuura omuri Ruhanga , ashemereire kutwaza nka Yesu Kristo oku yaabaire atwaza .
62002007	Baana bangye abakundwa , tindikubahandiikira kiragiro kisya , kureka ekya ira , eki mwahairwe omu kutandika . Ekyo kiragiro ekya ira n'ekigambo eki mwahuriire .
62002008	Kwonka mbwenu ekiragiro eki ndikubahandiikira ni kisya , kandi amazima gaakyo nigareeberwa omuri Kristo n'omuriimwe . Manya omwirima nigugyenda niguhwaho , n'omushana gwajwire .
62002009	Orikwegamba ngu ari omu mushana , haza akanga omunyaruganda , biri akiri omu mwirima .
62002010	Okunda omunyaruganda aguma ari omu mushana , kandi omuriwe tihabamu kirikuteeza ntsibo .
62002011	Kwonka oyanga omunyaruganda aba ari omu mwirima kandi omwirima ogwo nigwo agyenderamu , atarikumanya i arikuza , ahabw'okuba omwirima guba gumushwekire aha maisho .
62002012	Baana bangye abakundwa , nimbahandiikira ahabw'okuba ebibi byanyu bisaasiirwe ahabwa Yesu .
62002013	Imwe baataata , nimbahandiikira ahabw'okuba ogwo obaho okwiha omu kutandika nimumumanya . Naimwe batsigazi ' mwe , nimbahandiikira ahabw'okuba musingwire Omubi . Baana bangye abakundwa , naabahandiikira ahabw'okuba nimumanya Taata .
62002014	Imwe baataata , naabahandiikira ahabw'okuba ogwo obaho okwiha omu kutandika nimumumanya . Naimwe abatsigazi , naabahandiikira ahakw'okuba muri ab'amaani , n'ekigambo kya Ruhanga kituura omuriimwe kandi musingwire Omubi .
62002015	Mutarikunda ensi , nobu byakuba ebintu ebigirimu . Omuntu weena ku akunda ensi , okukunda Taata kuba kutamurimu .
62002016	Ahabw'okuba kyona ekiri omu nsi okururuuha kw'omubiri , n'okwetenga kubi okw'amaisho , n'okwesiimiranira eitungo tibiruga hari Taata , kureka biruga omu nsi .
62002017	Haza ensi ehwaho hamwe n'ebyayo ebi abantu beetenga ; kwonka okora ebi Ruhanga akunda , agumaho ebiro byona .
62002018	Baana bangye abakundwa , obunaku bw'aha muheru bwahika ! Mukahurira ngu omwangizi wa Kristo naija . Mbwenu hati abangizi baingi ba Kristo baizire ; ekyo nikyo kirikutumanyisa ku obunaku obu buri obw'aha muheru .
62002019	Abo bantu bakaturugamu , ahabw'okuba bakaba batari b'omu baitu . Manya kuri baabaire bari ab'omu baitu , bakaagumiizemu naitwe . Mbwenu bakaturugaho , ngu kimanywe ku hatariho n'omwe omuribo buzimazima owaabaire ari ow'ekigombe kyaitu .
62002020	Kwonka imwe , mukasiigwa amajuta Ogwo Orikwera , kandi mwena nimumanya amazima .
62002021	Naabahandikira ti habw'okugira ngu timurikumanya mazima , kureka ngu ahabw'okuba nimugamanya , kandi nimumanya ku hatariho kishuba ekiruga omu mazima .
62002022	Mbwenu omubeihi n'oha ? T'ogwo ohakana naagira ati : Yesu ti Kristo ? Omwangizi wa Kristo n'oyehakana Taata na Mwana .
62002023	Tihariho oyehakana Mwana , akagira ati : Taata . Weena oyatura ku arikwikiriza Mwana , biri aine Taata .
62002024	Eki mwahuriire okwiha omu kutandika , ka kibe nikyo kyaguma omuriimwe . Eki mwahuriire okwiha omu kutandika , ku kiraagume omuriimwe , nibwo muraagume omuri Mwana n'omuri Taata .
62002025	Kandi eki Kristo yaaturaganiise n'eki : amagara agatahwaho .
62002026	Ebyo naabibahandiikira ahabw'abo abarikwenda kubabeihabeiha .
62002027	Kwonka imwe , okusiigwa amajuta oku Kristo yaabasiigire kutuura omuriimwe . N'ahabw'ekyo timurikwetenga muntu weena kubeegyesa ; ahabw'okuba okusiiga oku yaabasiigire nikubeegyesa ebya buri kintu . Okwo kwegyesa n'okw'amazima kandi ti bishuba . Mbwenu mugume omuriwe , nk'oku mwayegyesiibwe .
62002028	Baana bangye abakundwa , mugume omuri Kristo . Reero ku ariboneka , tushangwe twine obwesigye , tutarikwitwa nshoni aha kiro ky'okwija kwe .
62002029	Ku muraabe nimumanya ngu Kristo aba ohikiriire , muhamye ku omuntu weena okora ebihikire aba azairwe Ruhanga .
62003001	Mureebe okukunda oku Taata yaatukunzire , itwe okwetwa abaana ba Ruhanga , haza nikwo turi . Eki ensi etarikutumanyira , n'ahabw'okuba teramumanyire .
62003002	Baana bangye abakundwa , hati turi abaana ba Ruhanga . Oku turiba tikukeetegyereziibwe , kwonka nitumanya ngu ku Kristo ariboneka , turyashushana nawe , ahabw'okuba turyamureeba nk'oku ari .
62003003	Weena omwineho ago matsiko , ayeyeza nkawe oku ari orikwera .
62003004	Weena okora ekibi aba agomeire eiteeka ; ahabw'okuba ekibi kiba okugomera eiteeka .
62003005	Nimumanya Kristo ku yaabonekire kwihaho ebibi , kandi omuriwe tihabamu kibi .
62003006	Weena oguma omuriwe , tagumizamu naakora ekibi . Kwonka weena ogumizamu naakora ekibi , biri takamureebaga , nobu kwakuba okumumanya .
62003007	Baana bangye abakundwa , hatarigira owaabahabisa ! Okora ebihikire aba ohikiriire , nka Kristo oku ari ohikiriire .
62003008	Oguma naakora ekibi aba owa Sitaane ; manya Sitaane okwiha omu kutandika akora ebibi . Eki Omwana wa Ruhanga yaabonekyeire n'okucwekyereza ebi Sitaane akora .
62003009	Weena ozairwe Ruhanga tagumizamu naakora ekibi , ahabw'okuba embibo ya Ruhanga eba eri omuriwe ; kandi tabaasa kugumizamu naakora ekibi , ahabw'okuba akazaarwa Ruhanga .
62003010	Aha , abaana ba Ruhanga n'abaana ba Sitaane niho bareeberwa : weena okora ebitahikire , nari otakunda munyaruganda , biri ti wa Ruhanga .
62003011	Manya obu nibwo butumwa obu mwahuriire okwiha omu kutandika , ngu tukundane .
62003012	Titushemereire kuba nka Kaini , owaabaire ari ow'Omubi , akaita omurumuna . Mbwenu akamwitira ki ? N'ahabw'okuba ebi yaabaire akora bikaba biri bibi , haza eby'omurumuna biri ebihikiriire .
62003013	Banyaruganda , kitabatangaaza kureeba ensi neebanga .
62003014	Ekirikutumanyisa ku twarugire omu kufa , tukataaha omu magara , niitwe okukunda abanyaruganda . Otakunda aguma ari ofiire .
62003015	Weena oyanga mwene ishe aba ari omwitsi : kandi nimumanya ku hatariho mwitsi ogira amagara agatahwaho omuriwe .
62003016	Aha niho turikumanyira rukundo oku eri : Kristo akahayo amagara ge ahabwaitu . Naitwe nu , tushemereire kuhayo amagara gaitu ahabwa beene waitu !
62003017	Mbwenu omuntu ku yaakuba atungire eby'ensi , akareeba mwene waabo aine ebi akyenire , haza akamwehuzya , obwo akaabaasa ata kugira ngu naakunda Ruhanga ?
62003018	Baana bangye abakundwa , turekye kukundisa ekimama n'orurimi , kureka tugire rukundo y'amazima , erikureeberwa omu bikorwa byaitu .
62003019	Aha niho turikumanyira ku turi ab'amazima , emitima yaitu yaaba etuurize omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
62003020	Manya emitima yaitu ku eba neetushinja , hoona tumanya Ruhanga ku ari mukuru okugikira , kandi ku arikumanya byona .
62003021	Baana bangye abakundwa , emitima yaitu ku eraabe etarikutushinja , biri twine obwesigye ahari Ruhanga .
62003022	Eki tumushaba kyona akituha , ahabw'okuba tworobera ebiragiro bye , kandi tukora ebi asiima .
62003023	Mbwenu eki nikyo kiragiro kye , ngu twikirize eiziina ry'Omwana we Yesu Kristo , kandi tukundane nka Kristo oku yaaturagiire .
62003024	Boona aboorobera ebiragiro bya Ruhanga baguma omuriwe , nawe aguma omuribo . Kandi ekitumanyisa ku ari omuriitwe , ni Mutima ou yaatuhaire .
62004001	Baana bangye abakundwa , mutariikiriza ibara mutima , kureka mugume mwetegyereze emitima , kureeba yaaba neeruga ahari Ruhanga . Manya abarangi baingi b'ebishuba baherize kushohora , baija omu nsi .
62004002	Aha niho muraamanyire Mutima wa Ruhanga : weena orikurangirira Yesu ku niwe Kristo owaizire aine omubiri , biri aine Mutima oruga ahari Ruhanga .
62004003	Kwonka weena otarikurangirira Yesu , biri taine Mutima oruga ahari Ruhanga . Ogwo ni mutima w'omwangizi wa Kristo , ou mwahuriire ngu naija , na mbwenu yaahikire omu nsi .
62004004	Baana bangye abakundwa , imwe muri aba Ruhanga , kandi abo barangi b'ebishuba mubasingwire , ahabw'okuba Mutima ori omuriimwe ni mukuru okukira mutima ori omu b'omu nsi .
62004005	Bo n'ab'ensi , n'ahabw'ekyo ebi bagamba n'eby'ensi , n'ensi ebatega okutu .
62004006	Itwe turi aba Ruhanga . Weena omanya Ruhanga atutega okutu ; kandi otari wa Ruhanga tatutega okutu . Aho niho turikumanyira Mutima ow'amazima na mutima orikuhabisa .
62004007	Baana bangye abakundwa , ka tukundane , ahabw'okuba rukundo ekomooka ahari Ruhanga . Manya oine rukundo , aba azairwe Ruhanga kandi amanya Ruhanga .
62004008	Otaine rukundo , tamanya Ruhanga , ahabw'okuba Ruhanga aba rukundo .
62004009	Mbwenu eki nikyo kyayorekire rukundo ya Ruhanga omuriitwe : akoohereza omu nsi Omwana we omwe nyamunegyere , ngu abone kutuhaisa amagara .
62004010	Okukunda nikwo oku : tikugira ngu niitwe twakunzire Ruhanga , kureka niwe yaatukunzire , akoohereza Omwana we kuba ekarabo y'ebibi byaitu .
62004011	Baana bangye abakundwa , Ruhanga ku araabe yaatukunzire atyo , naitwe tushemereire kukundana .
62004012	Tihariho muntu orareebire Ruhanga ; kwonka ku tukundana , Ruhanga aguma omuriitwe , na rukundo ye ehikiiririzibwa kimwe omuriitwe .
62004013	Aha niho tumanyira ku tuguma omuri Ruhanga , nawe akaguma omuriitwe , ahabw'okuba akatuha Mutima we .
62004014	Manya tukareeba kandi twahamya ku Taata yaayohereize Omwana we kuba Omujuni w'ensi .
62004015	Weena oyatura ku Yesu ari Omwana wa Ruhanga , Ruhanga aguma omuriwe , nawe omuri Ruhanga .
62004016	N'ahabw'ekyo nitumanya ku Ruhanga atwiniire rukundo kandi nitukiikiriza . Ruhanga aba rukundo , kandi weena oguma omuri rukundo , agume omuri Ruhanga , na Ruhanga aguma omuriwe .
62004017	Ekirikworeka ku rukundo ehikiiririziibwe kimwe omuriitwe , n'okuba twine obwesigye aha kiro ky'okucwererwaho orubanja ; ahabw'okuba emitwarize yaitu omuri egi nsi ni nk'eya Kristo .
62004018	Omuri rukundo tihabamu kutiina , ahabw'okuba rukundo ehikiire kimwe ebingamu okutiina kwona . Manya okutiina kugira akakwate n'ekiheneso , kandi orikutiina aba atakahikiiririziibwe kimwe omuri rukundo .
62004019	Tukunda , ahw'okuba Ruhanga niwe yaabandize kutukunda .
62004020	Omuntu ku arikugira ati : Ninkunda Ruhanga , kwonka yaayanga mwene ishe , biri n'omubeihi . Manya otakunda mwene ishe ou areeba , tabaasa kukunda Ruhanga ou atakareebaga .
62004021	Kandi eki nikyo kiragiro ki Kristo yaatuhaire , ngu okunda Ruhanga , ashemereire kukunda na mwene ishe .
62005001	Weena oikiriza ku Yesu niwe Kristo , biri n'omwana wa Ruhanga ; kandi weena okunda omuzaire , akunda n'omwana we .
62005002	Eki nikyo tumanyiraho ku tukunda abaana ba Ruhanga , twaba nitukunda Ruhanga kandi nitworobera ebiragiro bye .
62005003	Manya okukunda Ruhanga nikwo kworobera ebiragiro bye . Kandi ebiragiro bye tibirusya .
62005004	Ahabw'okuba weena ozairwe Ruhanga asingura ensi , kandi ekisingura ensi n'okwikiriza kwaitu .
62005005	Mbwenu osingura ensi n'oha ? T'ogwo oikiriza Yesu ku ari Omwana wa Ruhanga ?
62005006	Yesu Kristo ogwo niwe yaiziire omu maizi g'okubatizibwa , n'omu shagama y'okufa kwe . Taraiziire mu maizi gonka , kureka omuri byombi : amaizi n'eshagama .
62005007	Kandi Mutima niwe ahamya ku kiri eky'amazima , ahabw'okuba Mutima nigo mazima .
62005008	Hariho ebirikuhamya bishatu : Mutima , amaizi n'eshagama ; kandi ebyo byonsatu biikirizana .
62005009	Ku turaabe nitwikiriza ebi abantu bahamya , ebi Ruhanga ahamya nibikiraho obukuru . Manya oku n'okuhamya kwa Ruhanga oku yaahamize aha Mwana we .
62005010	Weena orikwikiriza Omwana wa Ruhanga aine obuhamya omu mutima gwe . Otarikwikiriza Ruhanga aba amuhindwire omubeihi , ahabw'okuba aba ataikiriize ebi Ruhanga yaahamize aha Mwana we .
62005011	Manya obu nibwo buhamya : Ruhanga akatuha amagara agatahwaho , haza ago magara gari omu Mwana we .
62005012	Oine Mwana biri aine amagara , otaine Mwana wa Ruhanga biri taine magara .
62005013	Imwe abaikiriza eiziina ry'Omwana wa Ruhanga , ebi naabibahandiikira ngu mumanye ku mwine amagara agatahwaho .
62005014	Kandi obu nibwo bwesigye obu tugira ahari Ruhanga , ngu ku tushaba ekintu kyona nk'oku asiima , atuhurira .
62005015	Kandi ku turaabe nitumanya ngu kyona eki tumushaba atuhurira , tumanya ngu twatungire ebi twamushaba .
62005016	Ku haakugira owaareeba omunyaruganda naakora ekibi ekitarikwita , amushabire , haza Ruhanga naija kumuha amagara . Kwonka ekyo n'eky'abakozire ekibi ekitarikwita . Hariho ekibi ekirikwita ; tindikugira ngu ekyo omuntu ashemereire kushaba Ruhanga ahabwakyo .
62005017	Okukora ekitahikire kyona kuba ekibi , kwonka hariho ekibi ekitarikwita .
62005018	Nitumanya ngu weena ozairwe Ruhanga tagumizamu naakora ekibi , kureka arindwa ogwo ou Ruhanga yaayezaariire , kandi Omubi tabaasa kumukoraho .
62005019	Nitumanya itwe ku turi aba Ruhanga , kandi ku ensi yoona erikutegyekwa Omubi .
62005020	Hoona nitumanya ku Omwana wa Ruhanga yaizire , akatuha okwetegyereza , ngu tubone kumanya Ruhanga ow'amazima . Mbwenu tuguma turi omuri Ruhanga ow'amazima , ahabw'okuba turi omu Mwana we Yesu Kristo . Ogwo niwe Ruhanga ow'amazima , kandi niwe magara agatahwaho .
62005021	Baana bangye abakundwa , mwerinde ebishushani ebirikuramibwa .
63001001	Nyowe omukuru , naakuhandiikira , iwe Mugore wangye owaatoorainwe , hamwe n'abaana baawe abu nkunda omu mazima . Tiinye nyenka orikukukunda , kureka n'abandi boona abamanya amazima .
63001002	Nigo mazima agatuura omuriitwe , haza agaritugumamu ebiro byona .
63001003	Emigisha n'embabazi n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ruhanga Taata , n'ahari Yesu Kristo Omwana we , bigume naitwe omu mazima n'omuri rukundo .
63001004	Nkashemererwa munonga okureeba ngu bamwe omu baana baawe nibagyendera omu mazima , nk'oku twaragiirwe Taata .
63001005	Mbwenu Mugore wangye , ninkweshengyereza , ntari nk'orikukuhandiikira ekiragiro kisya , kureka eki turahuriire okwiha omu kutandika , ekirikutugira ngu tukundane .
63001006	Manya okukunda nikwo oku : itwe okworobera ebiragiro bya Ruhanga . Ekiragiro eki murahuriire okwiha omu kutandika , nikyo eki : ngu mugume mwine rukundo .
63001007	Manya ababeihabeihi baingi baturugiremu baaza omu nsi . Nibo bantu abanga kuhamya ku Yesu Kristo yaizire aine omubiri . Omuntu nk'ogwo n'embeihabeihi kandi n'omuzigu wa Kristo .
63001008	Mwerinde mutakaafeerwa eki mwakoreire ; kureka mutungye ekihembo kihikire .
63001009	Omuntu weena orikurengyesereza atagumiire mu bi Kristo yaayegyeise , naaba ataine Ruhanga . Orikugumira omu bi Kristo yaayegyeise , aine Taata na Mwana .
63001010	Ku harigira owaija ahi muri , ataija n'egyo nyegyesa , mutarimutaasya omu nju , nobu kwakuba okumuramutsya .
63001011	Manya orimuramutsya aryaba akwataniise nawe omu bibi bi arikukora .
63001012	Nobu ndaabe nyine bingi by'okubahandiikira , tinkaayenzire kukoresa orupapura na bwino , ahabw'okuba nyine amatsiko g'okwija kubareeba n'okuganiira naimwe nitureebana , okushemererwa kwaitu kubone kwijurira kimwe .
63001013	Abaana ba murumuna waawe owaatoorainwe nibakuramutsya .
64001001	Nyowe omukuru , ninkuhandiikira , iwe Gaayo , ou nkunda omu mazima .
64001002	Mugyenzi wangye omukundwa , ninshaba ngu byona bikugyendere gye , ogire amagara marungi omu mubiri , nk'oku ori gye omu mutima .
64001003	Nkashemererwa munonga , ahabw'okuba bamwe omu banyaruganda ku baizire , bampamiza ku orikukuratira amazima , kandi kwokwo noogakuratira .
64001004	Tihariho kushemererwa okungira , okukira okuhurira ngu abaana bangye nibakuratira amazima .
64001005	Mugyenzi wangye omukundwa , okora ekintu ky'obwesigwa , ku oba nooheereza abanyaruganda omu muringo gwona , nobu baba bari abu otarikumanya .
64001006	Manya abo bahamiize ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ebya rukundo yaawe . Naakweshengyereza , guma obahe eby'okubakwatsa omu rugyendo rwabo , omu buryo bu Ruhanga arikusiima .
64001007	Bakaruga owaabo ahabwa Kristo , bangire kwakiira ekintu kyona eki Abanyamahanga baabaire nibenda kubaha .
64001008	Nikyo tushemerereire kukwatsa abantu nk'abo , ngu tubone kukwatanisa nabo omurimo gw'okubuzya amazima .
64001009	Nyine ebi mbaire naahandiikiire ekigombe ky'abaikiriza , kwonka Dioterefe , oitanira obukuru , taikiriza bi ndagiira .
64001010	Mbwenu ku ndiija , ndyabaijutsya ebi akora : oku arikumbeiherera nangambuura . Tagarukira aho , ataho n'okushenda abanyaruganda , nangwa n'okuzibira abarikwenda kubaakiira , kandi ababinga omu kigombe ky'abaikiriza .
64001011	Mugyenzi wangye omukundwa otaritooreza orikukora ebibi , kureka otooreze orikukora ebirungi . Okora ebirungi n'owa Ruhanga ; okora ebibi n'otakareebaga Ruhanga .
64001012	Demetirio , boona nibamugambaho gye , n'amazima nyakabara nigamuhamya . Naanye nikwo ndikumuhamya , kandi noomanya ku obuhamya bwangye buri obw'amazima .
64001013	Naaba nyine bingi by'okukuhandiikira , kwonka tinkaayenzire kubihandiikisa kacumu na bwino ,
64001014	ahabw'okuba nyine amatsiko g'okukureeba juba , tugaaniire nitureebana .
64001015	Ogume n'obusingye . Banywani baawe nibakuramutsya . Oturamukize banywani baitu buri omwe .
65001001	Nyowe Yuda , omuheereza wa Yesu Kristo ; kandi murumuna wa Yakobo , nimbahandiikira imwe abaayetsirwe , abarikukundwa omuri Ruhanga Taata , kandi abarindiirwe Yesu Kristo
65001002	Embabazi , obusingye na rukundo nibikakanye omuriimwe .
65001003	Bagyenzi bangye abakundwa , ku mbaire nyine ekihika ky'okubahandiikira aha by'okujunwa kwaitu twena , naareeba ningyemeserezibwa kubahandiikira nimbeehanangiriza ku murwanirira enyikiriza ei abarikwera baahairwe omurundi gumwe kikahwa .
65001004	Manya abantu bamwe beetaahize omuriimwe bwesherekye . Nibo abo abaagambirweho ira ku baricwerwa orubanja rukabasinga . N'abantu abatatiina Ruhanga , abahindura embabazi za Ruhanga waitu orwekwatso bakeehakana Omutegyeki waitu omwe wenka kandi Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo .
65001005	Mbwenu , nobu muraabe muramanyire ebyo byona , niinyenda kubaijutsya ku Mukama owaihire abantu be omu nsi ya Misiri , bwanyima yaacwekyereize abataraikiriize .
65001006	Na baamaraika abaarengize aha rugyero rw'obukuru bwabo , bakatsigaho obutuuro bwabo , ku Ruhanga ogwo yaabarindiire omu mwirima ndindindi , babohesiibwe enjegyere ezi batarirugamu obutwire bwona , okuhitsya obu ekiro kikuru ky'okucwererwaho orubanja kirihika .
65001007	Nk'oku ab'omuri Sodoma na Gomora , n'ezindi ndembo ezaabaire zihereeraine nazo , baaraayire batyo bakeeroha omu by'obushambani obutari bw'obuhangwa ; ezo ndembo zikaba eky'okureeberaho , niziheebwa ekifubiro ky'okwokibwa omuriro ogutaraara .
65001008	Omu muringo nk'ogwo , n'abo bantu nikwo bahagaza batyo emibiri yaabo , nibabeihwabeihwa ebirooto byabo , bakagaya obushoboorozi bwa Ruhanga , kandi bakajuma ab'ekitiinwa ab'omu iguru .
65001009	Haza kunu na Mikaeli omukuru wa baamaraika obu yaabaire naatongana na Sitaane , naahakana nawe aha by'omubiri gwa Musa , tareehangire kumucwera rubanja naamujuma , kureka akamugira ati : Mukama abe niwe yaakuhana .
65001010	Kwonka abo bantu bajuma ibara kintu eki batarikumanya , kandi n'ebi barikumanya nibatwarwa obuhangwa bwabo , nk'enyamaishwa zitagira bwengye , nibyo bibahwerekyereza .
65001011	Ebishi , baryakareeba ! Ahabw'okuba batoora omuhanda gwa Kaini , beeroha omu buhabe bwa Balaamu ahabw'okwetungisa , kandi bahwerekyerera omu bugomi bwa Koora .
65001012	Nibo bashiisha amagyenyi gaanyu ag'okukundana , barengyesereza omu kunywa bajarami bataine nshoni . Bari nk'ebicu bitarimu maizi ebitwarwa omuyaga , nari nk'emiti etariho bijuma omu ishaaruura , efiire kabiri , kandi erandukire .
65001013	Nainga nk'ebingonzi by'enyanja etarikutiinisa , nibabira eifuro ry'okuhemuka kwabo . Bari nk'enyonyoozi zirikuzengyerera , babiikiirwe okuguma omu mwirima ebiro byona .
65001014	Nibo Enoka ow'oruzaaro rwa mushanju okwiha ahari Adamu yaarangire naagira ati : Reeba , Mukama naija n'abarikwera be obukumi n'obukumi ,
65001015	kucwera abantu boona orubanja , n'okurusingisa abatatiina Ruhanga boona , ahabwa byona eby'okutamutiina ebi baacumwire omu muringo nk'ogwo ; kandi n'ahabw'ebigambo bibi ebi abasiisi abatamutiina baamurogotsireho .
65001016	Nibo abo abeetomboita , abatonzya , abategyekwa okwetenga kwabo okubi , abu akanwa kaabo kagamba eby'okwetunguura , abamamarika abantu , ngu bakaagira eki baabaihaho .
65001017	Bagyenzi bangye , kwonka mushemereire kwijuka ebi entumwa za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo zaarangire .
65001018	Zikabagira ziti : Omu biro by'aha muheru , haryabaho abashekyeerezi abarikutegyekwa okwetenga kwabo okubi , batarikweta ha bya Ruhanga .
65001019	Nibo abo abareeta okwetaanisamu , n'abantu b'ensi abataine Mutima wa Ruhanga .
65001020	Kwonka imwe bagyenzi bangye , mwehamize omu kwikiriza kwanyu okurikwera munonga , nimushabira omuri Mutima Orikwera .
65001021	Mugume omuri rukundo ya Ruhanga , mutegyereize embabazi za Mukama waitu Yesu Kristo kubahitsya omu magara agatahwaho .
65001022	Kandi mwikirizise abarikubangaanisa :
65001023	abamwe mubajune nimubashahura omu muriro ; n'abandi mubagirire esaasi nimubatiinirira , nangwa mwangye n'ekijwaro ekisiisirwe emicwe y'obushambani .
65001024	Mbwenu Ogwo orikubaasa kubarinda mutagwe , akabamurika omu maisho g'ekitiinwa kye , mutaine kamogo kandi mushemereirwe ,
65001025	Ruhanga ogwo wenka otujuna naaraba omuri Yesu Kristo Mukama waitu , aheebwe ekitiinwa n'obwanyakusinga n'obutegyeki n'obushoboorozi , nk'oku yaabaire abiine ira , na hati , n'ebiro byona ! Amiina .
66001001	Ebi n'ebyashuurwirwe Yesu Kristo , ebi Ruhanga yaamuhaire kworeka abaheereza be , ebiri eby'okubaho juba . Kristo ogwo akabimanyisa omuheereza we Yohaana naamutumaho maraika we .
66001002	Na Yohaana akagamba byona ebi yaareebire , naarangirira ebi Ruhanga yaamutumire ebi Yesu yaahamize .
66001003	Orikushoma ebigambo by'oburangi obu bikahurirwa , aine omugisha . N'abarikubitega okutu , bakoorobera ebihandiikirwemu , baine omugisha .
66001004	Nyowe Yohaana , naabahandiikira imwe ab'ebigombe mushanju by'abaikiriza eby'omuri Asiya : Nimbendeza emigisha n'obusingye ebikomooka ahari Ogwo oriho , owaabaire ariho , kandi oribaho ; n'ebiruga aha mitima mushanju etuura omu maisho g'ekitebe kye ky'obukama ;
66001005	n'ebiruga ahari Yesu Kristo , kareebi omwesigwa , owaabandize kuzoorwa omu baafiire , kandi otegyeka abagabe b'omu nsi . Yesu ogwo , owaatukunzire akatwiha omu bibi naatucunguza okufa kwe ,
66001006	akatuhindura ab'obukama n'abahongyerezi ahari Ruhanga we kandi Ishe ; naakaheebwe ekitiinwa n'obushoboorozi ebiro byona ! Amiina .
66001007	Reeba , naizira omu bicu ! Buri muntu aryamureeba , nangwa n'abaamucumitsire , kandi enganda zoona ez'omu nsi ziryamucurira . Buzima kwo ! Amiina .
66001008	Mukama Ruhanga omushoboorozi wa byona , naagamba ati : Niinye Alufa kandi Omega ; oriho , owaabaire ariho , kandi oribaho .
66001009	Niinye Yohaana mwene waanyu , okwataniise naimwe omuri Yesu , omu kuhiiganisibwa n'omu bukama bwe n'omu kugumisiriza . Nkaba ndi aha kirwa ekirikwetwa Patimo , ntuzirwe okurangirira ekigambo kya Ruhanga , n'okuhamiza abantu ebya Yesu .
66001010	Mbwenu aha kiro kya Mukama , Mutima ku yaabaire andiho , naahurira enyima yangye eiraka rihango nk'ery'enzamba ,
66001011	nirigira riti : Handiika omu kitabo ebi orikureeba , obyoherereze ebigombe mushanju eby'abaikiriza , nibyo ebi : Efeso , Simuruna , Perigamo , Tiyatira , Sarudi , Filadelufiya na Laodikeya .
66001012	Ntyo mpinduka kureeba owaabaire nangambira . Ku naahindukire , naareeba ebikondo mushanju by'amatabaaza eby'ezaabu .
66001013	Ahagati y'ebyo bikondo hakaba hariho orikushusha Omwana w'omuntu , ajwaire ekijwaro kiraingwa , kandi omu kifuba ayezirikiise omweko gw'ezaabu .
66001014	Omutwe gwe n'eishokye rye bikaba nibyera nk'ebyoya by'entaama njeru , nibyengyengyeta nk'orubaare , n'amaisho ge nigamurinkana nk'endimi z'omuriro ;
66001015	ebigyere bye biri nk'omuringa guzigwire , ogushemereziibwe omu iziiko ; n'eiraka rye nirihoorera nk'amaizi maingi ,
66001016	omu ngaro y'omukono gwe gwa buryo akwaitsemu enyonyoozi mushanju ; omu kanwa ke haarugamu rurara y'amoogi abiri , kandi ahamaisho ge nihashusha nk'eizooba ririkwaka omu ihangwe .
66001017	Ku naamureebire , naagwa aha bigyere bye nk'owaafa . Kwonka yantaho omukono gwe gwa buryo , yampuumuriza ati : Otatiina , niinye w'okubanza kandi ow'aha muheru ,
66001018	kandi ohuriire . Nkafa , kwonka hati ndi ohuriire ebiro byona , kandi nyine ebikomoorozo bya Rufu na Kuzimu .
66001019	Mbwenu handiika ebi waareeba , ebiriho hati n'ebiribaho bwanyima .
66001020	Amakuru gasherekirwe ag'enyonyoozi mushanju ezi waareeba omu mukono gwangye gwa buryo , n'ag'ebikondo mushanju by'ezaabu , nigo aga : enyonyoozi mushanju ni baamaraika b'ebigombe mushanju by'abaikiriza ; kandi ebikondo mushanju by'amatabaaza nibyo bigombe omushanju by'abaikiriza .
66002001	Handiikira maraika w'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Efeso oti : Ebi n'ebigambo byangye , nyowe okwaitse enyonyoozi mushanju omu ngaro y'omukono gwangye gwa buryo , kandi orikugyendagyendera ahagati y'ebikondo mushanju by'ezaabu . Ningira nti :
66002002	Nimmanya ebi orikukora , okwehenenga kwawe n'okugumisiriza kwawe nooyehangaana . Nimmanya ku otarikubaasa kugumisiririza babi , kandi ku waayetegyereize abarikweyeta entumwa , haza batari bo , reero okashanga bari ab'ebishuba .
66002003	Nimmanya ku ogumisiriza nooyehangaana , ku oyemera bingi ahabw'eiziina ryangye , kandi ku otakaruhaga .
66002004	Kwonka nyine eki ndikufa naiwe ; ahabw'okuba tokiine rukundo nk'ei waabaire ogira omu kubanza .
66002005	N'ahabw'ekyo ijuka ahi waahanantukire noogwa , oyegarukyemu , haza okore ebi waabaire nookora omu kubanza . Kitari ekyo , niinyija kwija ah'ori , nyihe eitabaaza ryawe omu mwanya gwaryo , kureka biri waayeteisa .
66002006	Kwonka eki ogira n'okwanga ebi Abanikola bakora , haza naanye nibyo nyanga .
66002007	Oine amatu , ahurire eki Mutima arikugambira ebigombe by'abaikiriza , ati : Orikusingura , ndyamwikiriza kurya aha muti gw'amagara , ogw'omu mwanya gw'obunanukye ogwa Ruhanga .
66002008	Handiikira maraika w'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Simuruna , oti : Ebi n'ebigambo by'ow'okubanza kandi ow'aha muheru , owaafiire haza akagaruka akaba ohuriire . Naagira ati :
66002009	Nimmanya obusaasi bwawe n'obworo bwawe - - kwonka ori omutungi ! Nimmanya ebi abeeyeta Abayudaaya bakubeiherera , haza batari bo ; kureka bari eiteeraniro rya Sitaane !
66002010	Otatiina ebi orikwija kubonabona . Reeba , Sitaane arangariire kuta bamwe omuriimwe omu kihome , ngu mugyezibwe , mumare ebiro ikumi muri omu kubonabonesibwa . Guma ori omwesigwa okuhitsya obu orifa , haza naanye ndyakuha ekirunga ky'amagara .
66002011	Oine amatu , ahurire eki Mutima arikugambira ebigombe by'abaikiriza ati : Orikusingura , okufa kwa kabiri tikwine ki kurimwitsa .
66002012	Handiikira maraika w'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Perigamo , oti : Ebi n'ebigambo by'Ogwo oine rurara y'amoogi abiri . Naagira ati :
66002013	Nimmanya ah'otuura , ku niho ekitebe ky'obukama bwa Sitaane kiri . Kwonka otuura okihamiire aha iziina ryangye , kandi tokeehakanaga ku orikuunyikiriza , nangwa n'omu biro bya Antipa , mushinja wangye omwesigwa , owaitiirwe owaanyu , ahi Sitaane atuura .
66002014	Kwonka nyine bikye ebi ndikufa naiwe : ahabw'okuba okwo oineyo bamwe abarikwikiriza enyegyesa ya Balaamu , owaahabwire Balaki kuta ekirikuteeza entsibo omu maisho g'Abaisiraeli , ngu barye ebihongyeirwe emandwa kandi ngu bakore ebikwatiraine n'obushambani .
66002015	Kandi hoona oine n'abandi abahamiire aha nyegyesa y'Abanikola .
66002016	Mbwenu nu , yegarukyemu . Kitari ekyo , niinyija kwija juba ah'ori , mbarwanise na rurara ey'omu kanwa kangye .
66002017	Oine amatu , ahurire eki Mutima arikugambira ebigombe by'abaikiriza , ati : Orikusingura , ndyamuha aha maanu esherekirwe , kandi mmuhe eibaare ririkwera , erihandiikirweho eiziina risya , eri omuntu weena atarikumanya , kureka ogwo owaaritunga .
66002018	Handiikira maraika w'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Tiyatira , oti : Ebi n'ebigambo by'Omwana wa Ruhanga , oine amaisho garikumurinkana nk'endimi z'omuriro , kandi ow'ebigyere bye biri nk'omuringa guzigwirwe . Naagira ati :
66002019	Nimmanya ebi okora : okukunda kwawe n'okwikiriza kwawe n'okuheereza n'okugumisiriza nooyehangaana . Nimmanya ebi ohereerukire kukora ebirikuhita ebyabandize .
66002020	Kwonka nyine eki ndikufa naiwe ! Nooreka ogwo mukazi Yezeebeli , orikweyeta omurangikazi , ahabisa abaheereza bangye naabeegyesa kukora ebikwatiraine n'obushambani , n'okurya ebihongyeirwe emandwa .
66002021	Nkamuha omwanya kwegarukamu , kwonka yaayanga kweteisa eby'obushambani bwe .
66002022	Reeba , niinyija kumutambika aha kitanda , areebereho enaku ; reero abu ashambana nabo mbareetere okubonabonesibwa kwingi , baaba bateeteisize ebi arikukora .
66002023	Ndyateera abaana be , mbagwiseho . Nibwo ebigombe by'abaikiriza byona birimanya ku niinye ncaaka ebiteekateeko n'emitima , nkazimuurira buri omwe omuriimwe ebishemereire ebi akozire .
66002024	Kwonka imwe , ab'omuri Tiyatira abaatsigara , abatarikwikiriza egyo nyengyesa , abatakamanyire eki abandi beeta amabanga ga Sitaane , nimbagambira nti : Tindikwija kubeekoreza gundi mutwaro .
66002025	Kureka mugumye eki mwine okuhitsya obu ndiija .
66002026	Orikusingura , akaguma naakora ebi ndikwenda okuhitsya aha muheru , ndyamuha obushoboorozi aha mahanga ,
66002027	nkaanye oku naabuhairwe Tata ; agategyekyese enkoni y'ekyoma , agaatagure nk'oku omunogoozi ayatagura enyungu z'eibumba .
66002028	Ndyamuha kandi enyonyoozi y'omu busheeshe .
66002029	Oine amatu , ahurire eki Mutima arikugambira ebigombe by'abaikiriza .
66003001	Handiikira maraika w'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Sarudi , oti : Ebi n'ebigambo by'Ogwo oine emitima mushanju ya Ruhanga n'enyonyoozi mushanju . Naagira ati : Nimmanya ebyawe byona : oine eiziina ry'okuba ohuriire , haza ori ofiire !
66003002	Sisiimuka ohamye ebikitsigaireho ebiri haihi kufa . Manya omu bi orikukora , tinkareebiremu kintu kyona ekihikiire kimwe omu maisho ga Ruhanga wangye .
66003003	N'ahabw'ekyo ijuka ebi waahairwe n'ebi waahuriire , obirinde kandi oyeteise . Ku oraabe otasisiimukire , ndyaija nk'omushuma , haza torimanya magingo gu ndikuhikiraho .
66003004	Kwonka omuri Sarudi okiinemu abantu bakye abatakasiisire bijwaro byabo . Abo baryagyenda naanye bajwaire ebirikwera , ahabw'okuba bakishemereire .
66003005	Orikusingura , aryajwekwa ebijwaro birikwera nkabo , kandi tindiiha iziina rye mu kitabo ky'amagara ; kureka ndyarigamba butunu omu maisho ga Tata n'omu ga baamaraika be .
66003006	Oine amatu , ahurire eki Mutima arikugambira ebigombe by'abaikiriza .
66003007	Handiikira maraika w'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Filadelufiya , oti : Ebi n'ebigambo by'Ogwo orikwera , ow'amazima , ogira ekikomoorozo kya Daudi ; oigura , hatagire waakinga ; kandi okinga , hatagire waigura . Naagira ati :
66003008	Nimmanya ebi okora : Reeba , naakuta omu maisho orwigi rwigwire , orutarikubaasa kukingwa muntu weena . Nimmanya ku ogira amaani makye , kwonka kandi okarinda ekigambo kyangye , tiwayehakana iziina ryangye .
66003009	Mbwenu reeba , ab'omu iteeraniro rya Sitaane , abeeyeta Abayudaaya , haza kunu bataribo , kureka nibabeiha , ndyabagyemesereza , baije bajuumare aha bigyere byawe , haza bamanye ku naakukunzire .
66003010	Nk'oku waarinzire ekigambo kyangye ekirikugira kiti : Gumisiriza nooyehangaana ; naanye ndyakurinda , orekye kuhikwaho obunaku bw'okugyezibwa okuribaho omu nsi yoona kugyeza abagitwiremu .
66003011	Reeba , niinyija juba ; hamiza kimwe eki oine , hatakaagira owaakwaka ekirunga kyawe .
66003012	Orikusingura , ndyamuhindura enyomyo y'omuri Nyaruju ya Ruhanga wangye , haza tarigirugamu n'akakye ; kandi ndyamuhandiikaho eiziina rya Ruhanga wangye , n'eiziina ry'orurembo rwa Ruhanga wangye . Niyo Yerusalemu ensya , eshuuma neeruga omu Iguru owa Ruhanga wangye ; mmuhandiikyeho n'eiziina ryangye erisya .
66003013	Oine amatu , ahurire eki Mutima arikugambira ebigombe ky'abaikiriza .
66003014	Handiikira maraika w'ekigombe ky'abaikiriza ab'omuri Laodikeya , oti : Ebi n'ebigambo bya Kibekwo , kareebi omwesigwa kandi ow'amazima , obutandikiro bw'ebi Ruhanga yaahangire . Naagira ati :
66003015	Nimmanya ebi okora : torikufuka kandi torikwotsya . Haakiri kuri waafukire nari okootsya !
66003016	Kwonka ahabw'okuba ori ekihorootsyo , otarikufuka nobu kwakuba okwotsya , niinyija kukutanaka , ondugye omu kanwa !
66003017	Manya noogira oti : Ndi omutungi , ngogyeire , tiinyine ki nkyenire . Haza kunu otarikumanya ku ori omunaku , ow'okugirirwa esaasi , omworo , empumi kandi ojwaire busha .
66003018	N'ahabw'ekyo ninkuhabura ku onguraho ezaabu eshemeziibwe omuriro , obone kuba omutungi ; kandi n'ebijwaro ebirikwera eby'okukujweka , obone kutaitwa nshoni z'okureebwa ojwaire busha . Ongureho n'omubazi gw'okuta omu maisho , obone kureeba .
66003019	Abu nkunda mbateisa , kandi mbahana . Mbwenu gira omuhimbo , oyegarukyemu .
66003020	Reeba , nyemereire aha rwigi niinyiguza . Omuntu weena ku araahurire eiraka ryangye , yaigura orwo rwigi , niinyija kutaahamu , ndye hamwe nawe , nawe arye hamwe naanye .
66003021	Orikusingura , ndyamwikiriza kushutama naanye aha kitebe kyangye ky'obukama , nk'oku naanye naasingwire , nkashutama na Tata aha kitebe kye ky'obukama .
66003022	Oine amatu , ahurire eki Mutima arikugambira ebigombe by'abaikiriza .
66004001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , naimutsya amaisho , naareeba omu iguru orwigi rumwe rwigwire ! Naahurira eiraka eri naabandize kuhurira niringambira nk'ery'enzamba , nirigira riti : Inamuka oije aha , nkworekye ebiraabeho , ebi byarugaho .
66004002	Ahonaaho naayeshanga ndi omuri Mutima , kandi reeba , ekitebe ky'obukama kikaba kitairwe omu iguru , kiriho okisingamiho .
66004003	Ogwo owaabaire akisingamiho akaba naayengyengyeta nk'eibaare ry'obuguzi bwingi erya yasipi n'erya saarudio . N'ekyo kitebe kye kikaba kyehinguririziibwe omuhanganzima gw'erangi erikushusha ey'eibaare rya simaragido .
66004004	Kandi ekyo kitebe ky'obukama kikaba kyehinguririziibwe ebindi bitebe by'obukama makumi abiri na bina , bishutamirweho abakuru makumi abiri na bana bajwaire ebirikwera , baine n'ebirunga by'ezaabu omu mitwe yaabo .
66004005	Omuri ekyo kitebe ky'obukama haarugamu emiryabo n'okugamba kw'enkuba n'okuhinda . Omu maisho gaakyo haayakiramu emuri mushanju z'omuriro ; niyo mitima mushanju eya Ruhanga .
66004006	Omu maisho g'ekyo kitebe ky'obukama hariho ekiri nk'enyanja y'ekirahuri , erikwogibwamu amaisho nk'eibaare rya kirisitaalo . Okwehinguririza ekyo kitebe , ahari buri rubaju rwakyo , hakaba hariho ebihangwa bina ebiine amagara , ebiijwire amaisho omu maisho n'enyima .
66004007	Ekihangwa ky'okubanza ekihuriire kikaba nikishusha entare . Ekihangwa kya kabiri ekihuriire kikaba nikishusha enimi . Ekihangwa kya kashatu ekihuriire kikaba kiine ahamaisho nk'ah'omuntu . Reero ekihangwa kya kana ekihuriire kikaba nikishusha empungu erikuguruka .
66004008	Ebyo bihangwa bina ebihuriire bikaba biine amapapa mukaaga buri kimwe , biijwire amaisho embaju zoona , omunda n'aheeru . Nyomushana na nyekiro bikaba nibyeshongora bitarikuremuura , biti : Orikwera , Orikwera , Orikwera , ni Mukama Ruhanga ow'obushoboorozi bwona , owaabaire ariho , oriho , kandi oribaho .
66004009	Ebyo bihangwa bihuriire , ku byabaire biha ekitiinwa Ogwo osingami aha kitebe , kandi obaho ebiro n'ebiro , byamuhimbisa kandi byamusiima ,
66004010	abo bakuru makumi abiri na bana bajuumara ahansi omu maisho g'Ogwo osingami aha kitebe ky'obukama , baramya Ogwo obaho ebiro n'ebiro . Banaga ahansi ebirunga byabo omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'obukama , nibeeshongora bati :
66004011	Mukama Ruhanga waitu , niiwe oshemereire kuheebwa ekitiinwa n'okuhimbisibwa n'obushoboorozi ; ahabw'okuba niiwe waahangire ebintu byona , haza ahabw'okusiima kwawe byabaho kandi byahangwa .
66005001	Reero omu ngaro ya buryo y'Ogwo osingami aha kitebe ky'obukama , nkareebamu omuzingo gw'ekitabo ekihandiikirwe omunda n'enyima , gukomirwe n'obumanyiso mushanju .
66005002	Bwanyima , nareeba maraika w'amaani , naaranga n'eiraka rihango ati : N'oha oshemereire kushuuruura omuzingo gw'ekitabo n'okubambuura obumanyiso bwakyo ?
66005003	Kwonka bambe , tiharabaireho n'omwe omu iguru nari omu nsi , nobu haakuba okuzimu y'ensi , owaabaasize kushuuruura ogwo muzingo nari okugureebamu .
66005004	Naanye nikwo kurira munonga ahabw'okubura oshemereire kushuuruura ogwo muzingo nari okugureebamu .
66005005	Bwanyima omwe aha bakuru bari , yangira ati : Otarira ! Reeba , entare y'omu ruganda rwa Yuda , ekitsitsa kya Daudi , akasingura ; mbwenu naabaasa kushuuruura ogwo muzingo , n'okubambuura obumanyiso bwagwo mushanju .
66005006	Reero ahagati y'ekitebe ky'obukama n'ebihangwa bina ebihuriire n'abo bakuru , nkareebaho Omwana gw'Entaama ayemereire , ari nk'oitsirwe . Akaba aine amahembe mushanju n'amaisho mushanju ; niyo mitima mushanju ya Ruhanga , etumwa omu nsi yoona .
66005007	Ogwo Mwana gw'Entaama atyo agyenda , aiha ogwo muzingo gw'ekitabo omu ngaro ya buryo y'ogwo osingami aha kitebe ky'obukama .
66005008	Ku yaaherize kwihamu ogwo muzingo , ebihangwa bina ebihuriire , n'abo bakuru makumi abiri na bana , byajuumara omu maisho g'ogwo Mwana gw'Entaama . Buri omwe akaba akwaitse ekidongo , n'orwabya rw'ezaabu orwijwire obubaani , nibyo by'okushaba by'abarikwera .
66005009	Batyo baayeshongora ekyeshongoro kisya , nibagira bati : Niiwe oshemereire kutwara omuzingo gw'ekitabo n'okubambuura obumanyiso bwagwo . Ahabw'okuba okaitwa , waacungurira Ruhanga abantu n'eshagama yaawe , ab'omu nganda zoona , n'endimi zoona , n'amahanga goona , n'ebyanga byona ,
66005010	Waabahindura oruganda rw'abahongyerezi b'okuheereza Ruhanga waitu , kandi baryategyeka omu nsi .
66005011	Bwanyima , ku naagiire kugira nti , naareeba baamaraika baingi , obukumi n'obukumi , enkumi n'enkumi , beehinguririize ekyo kitebe ky'obukama n'ebihangwa ebihuriire n'abo bakuru .
66005012	Haza naahurira nibagamba n'eiraka rihango , bati : Omwana gw'Entaama owaitsirwe , ashemereire kuheebwa obushoboorozi n'obutungi n'obwengye n'amaani n'ekitiinwa n'okuhimbisibwa n'okusingizibwa !
66005013	Kandi naahurira buri kihangwa kyona ekiri omu iguru n'omu nsi n'okuzimu y'ensi n'omu nyanja na byona ebibirimu , nibigira biti : Ogwo osingami aha kitebe ky'obukama hamwe n'Omwana gw'Entaama nibakasingizibwe , bakaheebwa ekitiinwa n'okuhimbisibwa n'obushoboorozi ebiro n'ebiro !
66005014	N'ebyo bihangwa bina ebihuriire byaikiriza nibigira biti : Kibe kwo ! Mpaho abo bakuru baajuumara ahansi , baaramya .
66006001	Omwana gw'Entaama ku yaabambwire kamwe aha bumanyiso omushanju , naareeba kandi naahurira kimwe aha bihangwa bina ebihuriire , nikigamba n'eiraka nk'ery'enkuba , kiti : Ija !
66006002	Ku naimukize nti amaisho , naareeba embaraasi rujeru , n'ogitembire aine obuta ; atyo yaaheebwa ekirunga , yaagyenda naasingura , ngu abone kusingurira kimwe .
66006003	Bwanyima Omwana gw'Entaama akabambuura akamanyiso ka kabiri , mpaho naahurira ekihangwa kya kabiri ekihuriire , nikigira kiti : Ija !
66006004	Reero haarugayo endiijo mbaraasi ruhogo ; ogitembire yaaheebwa obushoboorozi bw'okwiha obusingye omu nsi , ngu abantu baitane ; atyo yaaheebwa rurara mpango .
66006005	Omwana gw'Entaama ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka kashatu , naahurira ekihangwa kya kashatu ekihuriire , nikigira kiti : Ija ! Naanye ku nyimutsya amaisho , ndeeba embaraasi rwozi , n'ogitembire aine minzaani omu ngaro .
66006006	Ntyo mpurira ekiri nk'eiraka ririkwema ahagati y'ebihangwa bina ebihuriire , nirigira riti : Endengo y'engano n'ebihembo by'eizooba rimwe ; kandi n'endengo ishatu za sayiri nazo n'ebihembo by'eizooba rimwe ; kwonka amajuta na viino otabishiisha .
66006007	Omwana gw'Entaama ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka kana , naahurira eiraka ry'ekihangwa kya kana .
66006008	Ntyo nyimutsya amaisho , ndeeba embaraasi ruhuura , n'owaabaire agitembire naayetwa Rufu , na Kuzimu emukuratiire , kandi byaheebwa obushoboorozi aha kicweka kimwe kya kana eky'ensi , kukiitsa rurara n'enjara n'orufu n'enyamaishwa z'omu ishwa ez'omu nsi .
66006009	Reero Omwana gw'Entaama ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka kataano , naareeba ahansi y'eitambiro emitima y'abaitsirwe , nibaturwa ekigambo kya Ruhanga n'obujurizi obu baahaire .
66006010	Baahooga n'eiraka rihango , nibagira bati : Ai Mukama Nyakusinga , iwe orikwera kandi ow'amazima ! Oryahitsya hi otakacwereire rubanja abatwire omu nsi , okahoorera eshagama yaitu ?
66006011	Batyo buri omwe yaaheebwa ekanzu erikwera , baaragiirwa kumara omwanya gwiriireyo bakihuumwire , okuhitsya obu omubaro gw'abaheereza bagyenzi baabo , na beene waabo ab'okwitwa nkabo , gurihika .
66006012	Kandi nkareeba Omwana gw'Entaama naabambuura akamanyiso ka mukaaga . Obwo haabaho omutsitsa mwingi , eizooba ryairirimba , ryashusha nk'ekiguniya kirikwiragura , n'okwezi ekizooro kwatukura nk'eshagama .
66006013	Reero enyonyoozi z'ahaiguru zaagwa ahansi , nk'oku omutiini guragaza ebijuma byagwo omuri katumba , gwatengyeetsibwa eihunga .
66006014	Eiguru naryo ryahwaho , nk'oku omuzingo gw'ekitabo gukubwa ; buri rushozi na buri kirwa byaihwa omu myanya yaabyo .
66006015	Mpaho abagabe b'omu nsi n'abakungu n'abakuru b'amahe , n'abatungi n'ab'amaani , na buri muhuuku n'ow'obusingye , baayeshereka omu maaya n'omu nyanga z'omu nshozi .
66006016	Baatakira enshozi n'enkiri bati : Mutugwere mutusherekye amaisho g'Ogwo osingami aha kitebe ky'obukama , kandi mutukize ekiniga ky'Omwana gw'Entaama .
66006017	Manya ekiro kyabo kikuru ky'okucweraho orubanja kyahika . Mbwenu n'oha orikubaasa kukyemera ?
66007001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , naareeba baamaraika bana beemereire aha mbaju ina z'ensi , bakingiire emiyaga ena ey'omu nsi , ngu hatakaagira omuyaga gwahuuha ensi nari enyanja nainga omuti gwona .
66007002	Kandi naareeba maraika ondi naaruga ei izooba rituruka , aine akamanyiso ka Ruhanga ohuriire . Atyo ayeta n'eiraka rihango baamaraika abo abana , abaabaire bahairwe obushoboorozi bw'okushiisha ensi n'enyanja .
66007003	Reero maraika ogwo abagira ati : Mutashiisha ensi nari enyanja , nobu yaakuba emiti , okuhitsya obu turaaheze kuta akamanyiso aha buso bw'abaheereza ba Ruhanga waitu .
66007004	Ntyo mpurira omubaro gw'abaatairweho akamanyiso ka Ruhanga aha buso bwabo . Gukaba niguhika akasiriira kamwe n'obukumi buna n'enkumi ina , abaarugire omu buri ruganda rw'Abaisiraeli :
66007005	Ab'omu ruganda rwa Yuda abaatairweho akamanyiso , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ; ab'omu ruganda rwa Reubeeni , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ; ab'omu ruganda rwa Gaadi , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ;
66007006	ab'omu ruganda rwa Asheri , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ; ab'omu ruganda rwa Nafutaali , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ; ab'omu ruganda rwa Manaase , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ;
66007007	ab'omu ruganda rwa Simeoni , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ; ab'omu ruganda rwa Leevi , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ab'omuruganda rwa Isakaari , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ,
66007008	ab'omu ruganda rwa Zebuluuni , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ab'omu ruganda rwa Yosefu , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri ; ab'omu ruganda rwa Benyamiini abaatairweho akamanyiso , kakumi n'enkumi ibiri .
66007009	Ebyo ku byahwaire , naimutsya amaisho , naareeba ekimbuuro kihango ky'abantu , abu omuntu weena atarikubaasa kubara ! Bakaba barugire omu byanga byona n'omu nganda zoona n'omu mahanga goona n'omu ndimi zoona , beemereire omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'obukama n'omu maisho g'Omwana gw'Entaama , bajwaire ekanzu zirikwera , baine amataagi g'enkindo omu ngaro .
66007010	Baateera akaari n'eiraka rihango bati : Okujuna n'okwa Ruhanga waitu , osingami aha kitebe ky'obukama , kandi n'okw'Omwana gw'Entaama !
66007011	Reero baamaraika boona baayemerera beehinguririize ekyo kitebe , n'abo bakuru n'ebyo bihangwa bina ebihuriire . Baajuumara omu maisho g'ekyo kitebe ky'obukama , baaramya Ruhanga ,
66007012	nibagira bati : Amiina ! Ruhanga waitu asingizibwe , kandi aheebwe ekitiinwa n'obwengye n'okusiimwa n'okuhimbisibwa n'obushoboorozi n'amaani ebiro n'ebiro ! Amiina .
66007013	Mpaho omwe ahari abo bakuru ambuuza , naagira ati : Beitu aba abajwaire ekanzu zirikwera ni baahi , kandi baaruga hi ?
66007014	Naanye mmugarukamu nti : Mukama wangye , niiwe orikukimanya . Nawe angira ati : Aba nibo baarugire omu kubonabonesibwa kwingi , bakoozya ekanzu zaabo , bakazeereza omu shagama y'Omwana gw'Entaama .
66007015	Nikyo barikwemererera omu maisho g'ekitebe kya Ruhanga , nibamuheereza nyomushana na nyekiro omuri Nyaruju ye . Kandi Ogwo osingami oha kitebe ky'obukama , aryaguma nabo abasangiire .
66007016	Tibarigira njara bundi , nobu kwakuba okugira eiriho ; tibariitwa mushana , nobu kyakuba ekibabo kyagwo .
66007017	Ahabw'okuba Omwana gw'Entaama , ori ahagati y'ekitebe ky'obukama , aryaba omuriisa waabo , abeebembere , abahitsye aha nshuro z'amaizi g'amagara ; na Ruhanga abashushure amarira ahamaisho .
66008001	Omwana gw'Entaama ku yaabambwire akamanyiso ka mushanju , haabaho akaceceko omu iguru okumara nk'ekicweka ky'eshaaha .
66008002	Bwanyima naareeba baamaraika omushanju abeemerera omu maisho ga Ruhanga , kandi baahebwa enzamba mushanju .
66008003	Reero maraika ondiijo yaija , yaayemerera haihi n'eitambiro aine ekyotezo kya zaabu . Atyo aheebwa obubaani bwingi kubuhongyera Ruhanga , hamwe n'eby'okushaba by'abarikwera boona , akabyoterera aha itambiro ry'ezaabu eriri omu maisho g'ekitebe kye .
66008004	Mpaho omwika gw'obubaani , n'okushaba bicumbuuka nibiruga omu ngaro za maraika oyemereire omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
66008005	Bwanyima maraika ogwo yaatwara ekyo kyotezo , yaakiijuza omuriro ogwaruga aha itambiro , yaakinaga aha nsi omu nsi . Reero haabaho okugamba kw'enkuba , n'okuhinda n'ebirabyo n'omutsitsa .
66008006	Mbwenu baamaraika omushanju , abaabaire baine enzamba mushanju , baayeteekateeka kuziteera .
66008007	Maraika w'okubanza yaateera enzamba ye , haabaho orubaare n'omuriro bijwangire n'eshagama . Ku byagwire ahansi omu nsi , kimwe kya kashatu ky'ensi kyasya , na kimwe kya kashatu ky'emiti n'obunyaatsi bwona obubisi byasya .
66008008	Maraika wa kabiri ku yaateire enzamba eye , ekintu kirikushusha orushozi ruhango kirikwaka omuriro , kyanagwa omu nyanja .
66008009	Kimwe kya kashatu ky'enyanja kyahinduka eshagama , na kimwe kya kashatu ky'ebihangwa by'omu nyanja ebiine amagara kyafa , kandi kimwe kya kashatu ky'emeeri kyacwekyerezibwa .
66008010	Maraika wa kashatu ku yaateire eye nzamba , enyonyoozi rwaiguuga yaahanantuka omu iguru neeyaka nk'orumuri , yaagwera kimwe kya kashatu ky'emigyera n'enshuro z'amaizi .
66008011	Eiziina ry'egyo nyonyoozi ni Muravunga . Mpaho kimwe kya kashatu ky'amaizi kyacweka omuravunga , abantu baingi baafa ahabw'okunywa ago maizi , ahabw'okuba gakahindurwa agarikushaarira .
66008012	Maraika wa kana ku yaateire enzamba ye , kimwe kya kashatu ky'eizooba kyateerwa , hamwe na kimwe kya kashatu ky'okwezi , na kimwe kya kashatu ky'enyonyoozi . Ekyarugiremu : kimwe kya kashatu ky'okwaka kwabyo kyazima , kimwe kya kashatu kya nyomushana tikyahweza , na kimwe kya kashatu kya nyekiro kyaba kityo .
66008013	Ku naimukize nti amaisho , naahurira empungu neeyaniira munonga , neezeereerera hare omu kaabunga , neegira eti : Akagwe ! Akagwe ! Akagwe kaaza kugwera abari omu nsi , ezindi nzamba ku ziraagambe , ezi baamaraika abashatu bari haihi kuteera !
66009001	Maraika wa kataano ku yaateire enzamba ye , naareeba enyonyoozi yaahanantuka omu iguru , yaayetuura aha nsi . Egyo nyonyoozi , etyo eheebwa ekikomoorozo ky'omuhengyere gw'ekiina ekitaine bugarukiro .
66009002	Mpaho Nyonyoozi aigura omuhengyere gw'ekyo kiina . Omuri ogwo muhengyere haareetwamu omwika gurikucumbuuka nk'ogw'eiziiko rihango ; eizooba n'akaabunga byatimbwa omwirima ahabw'omwika gwareetsirwe omuri ogwo muhengyere .
66009003	Bwanyima omuri ogwo mwika haatimbiramu enzigye , zaateera ensi ; kandi zaaheebwa obushoboorozi nk'obw'ebinyabushegu .
66009004	Zaaragiirwa okutashiisha bunyaatsi , nari ekimezire kyona ekibisi , nainga omuti gwona , kureka okukora kubi abantu abataine kamanyiso ka Ruhanga aha buso bwabo .
66009005	Zaikirizibwa kubabonaboneseza ameezi ataano , kwonka zitarikubaita . Haza okusaasa kwazo kukaba kuri nk'oku ekinyabushegu kisaasa omuntu kyamutonera .
66009006	Reero omuri ago meezi ataano abantu baryasherura Rufu , kwonka tibarigibona ; beetengye okufa , haza Rufu ebahungye .
66009007	Omu mireebekyere , ezo nzigye zikaba nizishusha embaraasi ziteekateekyeirwe orugamba ; aha mitwe yaazo hariho ebirikushusha ebirunga by'ezaabu ; n'ahamaisho haazo nihashusha ah'abantu ;
66009008	obwoya bwazo buri nk'eishokye ry'abakazi , n'amaino gaazo gari nk'ag'entare .
66009009	Zikaba ziine engamba ezeemi nk'ebyoma by'okwekingiza aha kifuba , kandi okuhoorera kw'amapapa gaazo kuri nk'okw'ebigaari bingi ebirikukururwa embaraasi ezirikusyoka niziza aha rugamba .
66009010	Zikaba ziine emikira n'envuri nk'eby'ebinyabushegu , kandi obushoboorozi bwazo bw'okubonaboneseza abantu ameezi ataano buri omu mikira yaazo .
66009011	Zikaba ziine omugabe orikuzitegyeka , niwe maraika w'ekiina ekitaine bugarukiro , orikwetwa Abadooni omu Ruheburaayo , kandi omu Ruguriiki naayetwa Apolioni , amakuru ngu Omuhwerekyerezi .
66009012	Akagwe k'okubanza kaahwa ; mbwenu hakitsigaireyo obundi bugwe bubiri kwija .
66009013	Bwanyima maraika owa mukaaga akateera eye nzamba . Ntyo naahurira eiraka niryema omu burugu buna bw'eitambiro ry'ezaabu , eriri omu maisho ga Ruhanga .
66009014	Eryo iraka ryagambira maraika wa mukaaga owaabaire aine enzamba , riti : Rekura baamaraika abana ababoheirwe aha mugyera muhango Eufuraati !
66009015	Batyo baamaraika abo abana baarekurwa . Nibo abo abaabaire bateekateekyeirwe egyo shaaha n'ekyo kiro n'okwo kwezi n'ogwo mwaka , kwitiramu kimwe kya kashatu ky'abantu .
66009016	Omubaro gw'engabo z'abarikurwanira aha mbaraasi gukaba guri kakumi emirundi ebiri emirundi kakumi ; ogwo mubaro gwabo nkaguhurira .
66009017	Omuri okwo kworekwa kwangye , nkareeba nti ezo mbaraasi n'abazitembire . Bakaba bajwaire eby'okwekingiza aha kifuba eby'erangi erikutukura nk'omuriro , n'eya bururu nka saafiro , n'eya kinekye nka sulufuru , kandi emitwe y'ezo mbaraasi ekaba eri nk'ey'entare ; reero omuriro n'omwika na sulufuru nibiziruga omu kanwa .
66009018	Kimwe kya kashatu ky'abantu nikwo kyaitsirwe kityo ezo nfu ishatu : omuriro , omwika na sulufuru , ebyarugire omu kanwa k'ezo mbaraasi .
66009019	Manya obushoboorozi bwazo buri omu kanwa kaazo n'omu mikira yaazo . Egyo mikira ni nk'enjoka , eine emitwe , kandi niyo zihutaazisa .
66009020	Abandi bantu abataraitsirwe ezo nfu , tibareeteisize bi baakoreise engaro zaabo . Tibararekire kuramya ebyago n'ebishushani ebikozirwe omu zaabu n'omu feeza n'omu miringa n'omu mabaare n'omu biti , ebitarikubaasa kureeba nari kuhurira , nobu kwakuba okugyendesa amaguru .
66009021	Kandi tibareeteisize bibi byabo : obwitsi , oburogo , ebikwatiraine n'obushambani , nobu kwakuba okwiba kwabo .
66010001	Bwanyima nkareeba maraika ondiijo ow'amaani naashuuma naaruga omu iguru . Akaba ayehumbikire ekicu , omuhanganzima gugotsire omutwe gwe , ahamaisho ge nihaaka nk'eizooba , n'amaguru ge gari nk'enyomyo z'omuriro .
66010002	Akaba aine omu ngaro omuzingo gw'akatabo kakuburwire . Yaaribatisa ekigyere kye kya buryo aha nyanja , n'ekya bumosho aha nsi .
66010003	Yaayamuza n'eiraka rihango nk'ery'entare erikutsinda . Ku yaayamwize , enkuba omushanju zaagamba .
66010004	Ezo nkuba omushanju ku zaaherize kugamba , naanye ndangariire kuhandiika , naahurira eiraka niryema omu iguru nirigira riti : Otaata enaama y'ebi enkuba omushanju zaagamba , kandi otabihandiika !
66010005	Reero maraika ou naareebire aribatsi aha nyanja n'aha nsi , yaimutsya omukono gwe gwa buryo agworekyeize eiguru .
66010006	Yaarahira Ruhanga obaho ebiro n'ebiro , owaahangire eiguru n'ensi n'enyanja na byona ebibirimu , naagira ati : Tihaakiriho kukyerererwa !
66010007	Kureka maraika wa mushanju ku araateere enzamba ye , nibwo Ruhanga araahikiirize enaama ye , nk'oku yaakigambiire abaheereza be abarangi .
66010008	Mpaho eiraka ri naabaire naahuriire niryema omu iguru , ryagaruka ryangira riti : Irooko , oyakiire omuzingo , ogukubuururiirwe omu ngaro ya maraika oribatsi aha nyanja n'aha nsi .
66010009	Ntyo ngyenda , mpika maraika ogwo , mmushaba kumpa ogwo muzingo gw'akatabo . Nawe angira ati : Nkako , katware okarye . Omu nda nikaija kukushaarira , kwonka omu kanwa kakunurire nk'obwoki .
66010010	Ntyo nyiha omuzingo gw'ako katabo omu ngaro ya maraika , nkarya . Omu kanwa kannurira nk'obwoki , kwonka ku mpeza kukamira , omunda kanshaarira .
66010011	Reero agambira ati : Oshemereire kugaruka kuranga ebiriba aha bantu b'enganda nyingi , n'aha mahanga n'aha ndimi n'aha bagabe .
66011001	Bwanyima nkaheebwa orubingo rw'okugyeresa , orwemi nk'orubango . Reero haabaho owangira ati : Imuka , ogyere Nyaruju n'eitambiro , kandi obare abarikugiramizamu .
66011002	Kwonka otagyera ekibuga ekyehinguririize Nyaruju . Okirekye , ahabw'okuba kirekuriirwe Abanyamahanga , abaraije kuribatiirira orurembo orurikwera , okumara ameezi makumi ana n'abiri .
66011003	Reero baakareebi bangye babiri ndyabaha obushoboorozi bw'okumara ebiro rukumi na magana abiri na makumi mukaaga , nibaranga obutumwa bwa Ruhanga bajwaire ebiguniya .
66011004	Baakareebi abo bombi nibo miti emioliva ebiri , kandi ebikondo bibiri ebyemerera omu maisho ga Nyakubaho w'ensi .
66011005	Ku haakubaho owaayenda kubakora kubi , omuriro gukaabaruga omu kanwa , gumaraho abazigu baabo . Eego , weena orikwenda kubakora kubi , nawe ashemereire kwitwa .
66011006	Baine obushoboorozi bw'okukinga eiguru , ngu enjura erekye kugwa omu biro ebi barimara nibaranga . Kandi baine n'obushoboorozi bw'okuhindura amaizi eshagama , n'okuteeza ensi orufu rwa ibara muringo , ahi baryendera hoona .
66011007	Ku bariheza kuha obuhamya bwabo , ekinyamaishwa kiryatuuhuuka omu kiina kitaine bugarukiro , kibarwanise , kibasingure , kandi kibaite .
66011008	Reero , emitumbi yaabo egume erambiriraine omu nguuto rugyendwa ey'orurembo orukuru , orurikushushanisibwa na Sodoma na Misiri , oru Mukama waabo yaabambiirwemu aha musharaba .
66011009	Abantu batari bamwe , ab'enganda n'endimi n'amahanga , baryamara ebiro bishatu n'ekicweka nibashamaarira emitumbi yaabo , batarikwikiriza ku eziikwa .
66011010	Abatwire omu nsi baryabeeraatira , bashemererwe , kandi bahaane ebiconco , ahabw'okuba abo barangi bombi bakaba nibababonabonesa .
66011011	Kwonka ku haahingwireho ebiro bishatu n'ekicweka , omwitsyo gw'amagara oguruga owa Ruhanga gwabataahamu , baayemerera , haza abaabareebire baitwa obwoba .
66011012	Bwanyima abo barangi bombi baahurira eiraka rihango niryema omu iguru , nirigira riti : Nimwinamukye , mwije aha . Batyo baatemba omu iguru bari omu kicu , abazigu baabo nibabareeba .
66011013	Omuri ago magingo haabaho omutsitsa mwingi , kimwe kya ikumi ry'orurembo kyakumbagara ; abantu obukumi mushanju baafeera omuri ogwo mutsitsa ; reero abaahonokireho baitwa obwoba , baahimbisa Ruhanga w'omu iguru .
66011014	Mbwenu akagwe ka kabiri kaahwa , kwonka aka kashatu nikaija kubaho juba .
66011015	Bwanyima maraika owa mushanju yaateera eye nzamba , haabaho amaraka mahango omu iguru , nigagira gati : Obukama bw'ensi bwahinduka obukama bwa Nyakubaho waitu n'obwa Kristo we , kandi aryaguma aha ngoma ebiro n'ebiro !
66011016	Abakuru bari abiri na bana abashutama aha bitebe byabo by'obukama omu maisho ga Ruhanga , batyo baajuumara , baaramya Ruhanga ,
66011017	nibagira bati : Nitukusiima , Mukama Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona , iwe oriho , kandi owaabaire oriho , ahabw'okuba otwaire obushoboorozi bwawe obukuru , waaza aha ngoma .
66011018	Abanyamahanga kashanga ekabacwa amaraka , kwonka obunaku bwawe bwahika , obw'okucwera abafiire orubanja n'okubafubira , obw'okuzimuurira abaheereza baawe , nibo barangi n'abarikwera n'abatiina eiziina ryawe , abato n'abakuru ; kandi okacwekyereza abarikucwekyereza ensi .
66011019	Bwanyima Nyaruju ya Ruhanga ey'omu iguru yaigurwa , n'eshanduukye y'endagaano ye yaareebeka omuri Nyaruju ye ; haza haabaho emirabyo n'okuhinda n'okugamba kw'enkuba n'omutsitsa n'orubaare rwingi .
66012001	Mbwenu eky'okutangaaza kihango kikareebeka omu iguru ; omukazi ajwaire eizooba , n'okwezi kuri ahansi y'ebigyere bye , kandi aha mutwe gwe hariho ekirunga ky'enyonyoozi ikumi na ibiri .
66012002	Ogwo mukazi akaba aine enda ; ku yaabaire naarumwa , yaaboroogibwa ebisha by'okuzaara .
66012003	Kandi ekindi ky'okutangaaza ekirikutiinisa kikareebeka omu iguru ; kikaba kiri ekijoka kihango , kirikutukura , kiine emitwe mishanju n'amahembe ikumi , n'amahunde mushanju , buri rimwe ahari buri mutwe gwakyo .
66012004	Omukira gwakyo gwakukumba kimwe kya kashatu ky'enyonyoozi z'omu iguru , gwazinaga ahansi . Ekyo kijoka kyayemerera omu maisho g'ogwo mukazi owaabaire arangariire kuzaara , ngu kishonshomere omwana we , yaaheza ati kumuzaara .
66012005	Mpaho ogwo mukazi yaazaara omwana omwojo , owaabaire ari ow'okutegyekyesa amahanga goona enkoni y'ekyoma . Kwonka ogwo mwana we yaashahurwa , yaatwarwa owa Ruhanga , n'aha kitebe kye ky'obukama .
66012006	N'ogwo mukazi yaahungira omu ihamba eri Ruhanga yaabaire amuteekateekyeiremu omwanya , kuheerwayo eby'okumutunga , okumara ebiro rukumi na magana abiri na makumi mukaaga .
66012007	Mbwenu hakabaho orugamba omu iguru ; Mikaeli na baamaraika be baarwana n'ekijoka , kandi ekyo kijoka na baamaraika baakyo byabarwanisa .
66012008	Kwonka byasingurwa , kandi okwiha obwo byabingirwa kimwe omu iguru .
66012009	Ekyo kijoka kihango kyanagwa aheeru . Niyo njoka eya ira , eyetwa Omwohi nainga Sitaane , oyosya ab'omu nsi yoona . Sitaane ogwo hamwe na baamaraika be boona bakanagwa ahansi omu nsi .
66012010	Ntyo mpurira akaari omu iguru , nikagira kati : Mbwenu okujuna n'amaani n'obukama ebya Ruhanga waitu , hamwe n'obushoboorozi bwa Kristo we byaija ; ahabw'okuba omuregi wa beene waitu , otuura naabarega ahari Ruhanga waitu nyomushana na nyekiro , yaabingwa omu iguru .
66012011	Mbwenu bakamusingura ahabw'okufa kw'Omwana gw'Entaama , n'ahabw'ekigambo ky'obuhamya bwabo . Manya bakooga amagara gaabo , baahika nangwa n'aha kufa .
66012012	N'ahabw'ekyo , iwe iguru ' we , naimwe abaritwiremu , mushemererwe ! Kwonka iwe nsi ' we , naiwe nyanja ' we , muryakareeba ! Manya Omwohi yaabaijamu aine ekiniga kingi , naamanya ku aine omwanya mukye .
66012013	Ekijoka ku kyareebire kyanagwa ahansi omu nsi , kyahiiga ogwo mukazi owaazaire omwana omwojo .
66012014	Kwonka ogwo mukazi yaaheebwa amapapa abiri g'empungu mpango , ngu abone kuguruka , ahungire egyo njoka omu ihamba , aze omu mwanya ogu araaheerwemu eby'okumutunga , okumara omwanya n'emyanya n'ekicweka ky'omwanya .
66012015	Egyo njoka yaacwera enyima y'ogwo mukazi amaizi garikwingana omugyera , ngu omwegyemure gumuhiminture .
66012016	Kwonka ensi yaaha ogwo mukazi emikono ; yaayashama , yaamira omugyera ogu ekyo kijoka kyacweire .
66012017	Ekijoka nikwo kugirira ogwo mukazi ekiniga kingi , kikaza kurwanisa ab'oruzaaro rwe abakitsigaireho , aboorobera ebiragiro bya Ruhanga , bakahamya ebya Kristo .
66013001	Kityo kikeemerera aha musheenyi gw'enyanja . Kandi nkareeba ekinyamaishwa nikituuhuuka , nikiruga omu nyanja , kiine amahembe ikumi n'emitwe mushanju , n'amahunde ikumi aha mahembe gaakyo , n'eiziina ririkurogota aha mitwe yaakyo .
66013002	Ekyo kinyamaishwa ki naareebire kikaba nikishusha engwe , ebiganja byakyo biri nk'eby'edubu , akanwa kaakyo nikashusha ak'entare . Mpaho ekyo kinyamaishwa ekijoka kyakiha amaani gaakyo , n'ekitebe kyakyo eky'obugabe n'obushoboorozi bwingi .
66013003	Gumwe aha mitwe yaakyo gukaba nigushusha nk'ogwine obuhuta bw'okukiita . Kwonka obwo buhuta bwakyo bw'okukiita bwakira , ab'ensi yoona baakuratira ekyo kinyamaishwa nibakitangaarira .
66013004	Abantu baaramya ekijoka , ahabw'okuba kikaba kihaire ekinyamaishwa obushoboorozi bwakyo , kandi baaramya ekyo kinyamaishwa , nibagira bati : N'oha ori nk'eki kinyamaishwa , kandi n'oha owaakubaasa kukirwanisa ?
66013005	Reero ekyo kinyamaishwa kyaheebwa akanwa k'okugamba eby'okwetunguura n'eby'okurogota , kandi kyaikirizibwa kukoresa obushoboorozi bwakyo kumara ameezi makumi ana n'abiri .
66013006	Kityo kyayashamya akanwa kaakyo , kyarogota ahari Ruhanga , n'aha iziina rye , n'aha butaaho bwe , n'ahari abo abatuura omu iguru .
66013007	Kikairikizibwa kurwanisa abarikwera , n'okubasingura ; kyaheebwa obushoboorozi aha nganda zoona n'abantu boona n'endimi zoona n'aha mahanga goona .
66013008	Haza ekyo kinyamaishwa kiryaramibwa boona abatwire omu nsi , abu amaziina gaabo gatarahandiikirwe mu kitabo ky'amagara eky'Omwana gw'Entaama owaitsirwe , okwiha ensi yaaba kuhangwa .
66013009	Oine amatu , ahurire :
66013010	Weena ow'okutwarwa ari enkwatwa , azeyo omu bukwatwa . Weena oitsa rurara n'ow'okwitwa na rurara . Aho niho okugumisiriza n'okwikiriza kw'abarikwera kurikwetengyerwa .
