66013011	Bwanyima nkareeba ekindi kinyamaishwa nikifunduuka omu itaka , kiine amahembe abiri nk'ag'entaama , haza kyagamba nk'ekijoka .
66013012	Kikaba kiri omu maisho g'ekinyamaishwa ky'okubanza , nikitegyekyesa obushoboorozi bwakyo bwona ; nikigyemesereza ensi n'abagirimu kuramya ekinyamaishwa ky'okubanza ekyakizire obuhuta bw'okukiita .
66013013	Kyakora obumanyiso bukuru , nangwa n'okuragiira omuriro gukaruga omu iguru , gukagwa aha nsi omu maisho g'abantu .
66013014	Mbwenu ahabw'obumanyiso obu kyaikiriziibwe kukorera omu maisho g'ekyo kinyamaishwa , kibeihabeiha abatwire omu nsi , nikibaragiira kukora ekishushani ky'ekinyamaishwa kiri ekyahutaaziibwe rurara , kwonka kikaguma kihuriire .
66013015	Kikaikirizibwa n'okuta omwitsyo gw'amagara omuri ekyo kishushani ky'ekinyamaishwa ky'okubanza , ngu ekyo kishushani kibone kugamba n'okwitisa abarikwanga kukiramya .
66013016	Kandi hoona , abato n'abakuru , abatungi n'abooro , ab'obusingye n'abahuuku , kuteebwa akamanyiso aha mukono gwa buryo nari aha buso ,
66013017	ngu hatagira owaagura nari owaatunda , kureka yaaba aine ako kamanyiso . Niryo iziina ry'ekyo kinyamaishwa , nari enamba y'eiziina ryakyo .
66013018	Eki nikyetengyesa obwengye : orikwetegyereza , abariirire enamba y'ekyo kinyamaishwa , ahabw'okuba n'enamba y'omuntu : enamba yaakyo ni magana mukaaga na makumi mukaaga na mukaaga .
66014001	Ku naimukize amaisho , naareeba Omwana gw'Entaama ayemerereire aha Rushozi Siyooni , hamwe n'abantu akasiriira kamwe n'obukumi buna n'enkumi ina , abu aha buso bwabo haabaire hahandiikirweho eiziina rye n'eiziina rya Ishe .
66014002	Reero naahurira eiraka niryema omu iguru , riri nk'amaizi maingi garikuhoorera , kandi riri nk'okugamba kuhango kw'enkuba . Eryo iraka ri naahuriire rikaba riri nk'ery'abateezi b'enanga abarikuteera enanga zaabo .
66014003	Batyo baayeshongora ekyeshongoro kisya omu maisho g'ekitebe ky'obukama n'omu g'ebihangwa bina ebiine amagara , n'omu g'abakuru bari . Haza tiharabaireho n'omwe owaabaasize kwega ekyo kyeshongoro , kureka abo akasiriira kamwe n'obukumi buna n'enkumi ina , abacungwirwe .
66014004	Nibo bantu abarikwera abatareeteeraine na bakazi , bakaguma bari abashugaine . Nibo abo abakuratira Omwana gw'Entaama ahu aza hoona . Abo bakacungurwa , baihwa omu bandi bantu , baaba ab'okubanza omu bahongyerwa Ruhanga n'Omwana gw'Entaama .
66014005	Manya omu kanwa kaabo hakaba hatabamu bishuba , ahabw'okuba bakaba bataine kamogo .
66014006	Bwanyima nkareeba maraika ondi naazeereerera hare omu kaabunga aine Amakuru Marungi agatahwaho g'okurangirira abatwire omu nsi , ab'amahanga goona n'enganda zoona n'endimi zoona .
66014007	Atyo agamba n'eiraka rihango , ati : Mutiine Ruhanga mumuhe n'ekitiinwa , ahabw'okuba eshaaha ye y'okucweramu orubanja yaahika ; kandi muramye Omuhangi w'eiguru n'ensi n'enyanja n'enshuro z'amaizi .
66014008	Haakurataho maraika ondi owa kabiri , yaagira ati : Rugwire ! Rugwire Babulooni orukuru ! Orwo orwanywaisize amahanga goona viino y'ebikwatiraine n'obushambani bwarwo !
66014009	Reero maraika ondiijo owa kashatu yaakurataho naagamba n'eiraka rihango , ati : Omuntu weena oraaramye ekyo kinyamaishwa n'ekishushani kyakyo , akateebwa akamanyiso aha buso bwe , nari aha mukono gwe ,
66014010	nawe aryanywa viino y'ekiniga kya Ruhanga , erishukwa omu kikopo ky'ekiniga kye etafungwirwe , kandi aryabonabonesibwa na sulufuru erikubuguma , omu maisho ga baamaraika abarikwera , n'omu maisho g'Omwana gw'Entaama .
66014011	Omwika gw'okubonabonesibwa kwabo guryaguma nigucumbuuka ebiro n'ebiro ; kandi abaramya ekyo kinyamaishwa n'ekishushani kyakyo , n'omuntu weena oteebwaho akamanyiso k'eiziina ryakyo , tibarigira bu bahuumwire nyomushana na nyekiro .
66014012	Aho niho okugumisiriza kw'abarikwera , aboorobera ebiragiro bya Ruhanga , bakaikiriza Yesu , kurikwetengyerwa .
66014013	Kandi ntyo mpurira eiraka niryema omu iguru , nirigira riti : Handiika oti : Okwiha hati , abafeera omuri Mukama baine omugisha ! Eego , nikwo Mutima arikugira , ngu babone kuhuumura emirabanamu yaabo , ahabw'okuba ebi bakora bigyenda bibakuratiire .
66014014	Bwanyima nkaimutsya amaisho , naareeba ekicu kirikwera , n'okishutamiho naashusha omuntu , aine ekirunga ky'ezaabu aha mutwe , n'omusyo gw'obwogi omu ngaro .
66014015	Na maraika ondi yaaruga omuri Nyaruju , yaayeta n'eiraka rihango Ogwo oshutami aha kicu , ati : Gira omusyo gwawe , ogyeshe , ahabw'okuba obunaku bw'okugyesha bwahika , manya emyaka y'omu nsi eyezire .
66014016	Mpaho owaabaire ashutami aha kicu , yaatayo omusyo gwe aha nsi , egyo myaka y'omu nsi yaashaaruurwa .
66014017	Kandi maraika ondi yaaruga omuri Nyaruju y'omu iguru , nawe aine omusyo gw'obwogi .
66014018	Bwanyima maraika ondiijo yaarugayo naaruga aha itambiro , niwe maraika oine obushoboorozi aha muriro . Atyo ayeta n'eiraka rihango ogwo oine omusyo gw'obwogi , ati : Tayo omusyo gwawe , orundaane ebijuma by'emizaabibu y'omu nsi , ahabw'okuba bihiisize .
66014019	Mpaho maraika atayo omusyo gwe aha nsi , arundaana ebijuma byayo eby'emizaabibu , abitambika omu inyuukiro rihango rya viino y'ekiniga kya Ruhanga .
66014020	Haza binyuukirwa omuri eryo inyuukiro aheeru y'orurembo , birugwamu omutunga gw'eshagama , eijura , ehitsya obwemi oburikuhika aha kifunga ky'enkoba z'embaraasi , n'oburaingwa bwa kilomita nka magana ashatu .
66015001	Bwanyima , nkareeba omu iguru eky'amahano ekindi , kikuru kandi eky'okutangaaza . Nibo baamaraika mushanju abaine ebibonaboneso mushanju eby'okuhereeruka , ahabw'okuba omuribyo nimwo ekiniga kya Ruhanga kyahwereire .
66015002	Kandi nkareeba ekirikushusha enyanja y'ekirahuri , ejwangiremu omuriro , n'abaasingwire ekyo kinyamaishwa n'ekishushani kyakyo n'enamba y'eiziina ryakyo , beemereire aha rubaju rw'egyo nyanja y'ekirahuri , bakwaitse omu ngaro enanga zi Ruhanga yaabahaire ;
66015003	nibeeshongora ekyeshongoro kya Musa omugaragwa wa Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama , nibagira bati : Ai Mukama Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona , ebi okora ni bikuru kandi n'eby'okutangaaza ! Ai Mugabe w'amahanga , emitwarize yaawe ehikire kandi n'ey'amazima !
66015004	Ai Nyakubaho , n'oha otatiina iziina ryawe , akarihimbisa ? Manya niiwe wenka oba orikwera . Amahanga goona garyaija gakuramye , ahabw'okuba emicwere yaawe y'oburyo eyorekirwe .
66015005	Ebyo ku byahwaire , naareeba Nyaruju y'omu iguru , erimu eihema ry'obuhamya eigwire .
66015006	Haza omuri egyo nyaruju , haarugamu baamaraika omushanju , baine ebibonaboneso omushanju bajwaire ekanzu zirikwera za kitaani , beezirikire omu kifuba emyeko ya zaabu .
66015007	Kimwe aha bihangwa bina ebihuriire , kyaha baamaraika abo omushanju enyabya mushanju z'ezaabu , ziijwire ekiniga kya Ruhanga , obaho ebiro n'ebiro .
66015008	Reero nyaruju yaijura omwika , ogurikuruga omu kitiinisa kya Ruhanga n'omu maani ge . Tihaabaho n'omwe owaabaasa kugitaahamu , okuhitsya obu ebibonaboneso omushanju ebya baamaraika omushanju biraahweyo .
66016001	Bwanyima nkahurira eiraka rihango niryema omuri Nyaruju nirigambira baamaraika omushanju riti : Nimwirooko mushukye aha nsi ebiri omu nyabya mushanju z'ekishinjo kya Ruhanga .
66016002	Maraika ow'okubanza atyo agyenda , ashuka aha nsi ebiri omu rwabya orwe ; ebironda bibi kandi birikunuuka bikwata abantu abaabaire baine akamanyiso k'ekinyamaishwa , bakaramya ekishushani kyakyo .
66016003	Maraika owa kabiri ashuka ebiri omu rwabya orwe aha nyanja . Egyo nyanja eba nk'eshagama y'omuntu ofiire ; na ibara kintu ekihuriire ekyabaire kigirimu kyafa .
66016004	Maraika owa kashatu ashuka ebiri omu rwabya orwe aha migyera n'aha nshuro z'amaizi ; bicweka eshagama .
66016005	Ntyo mpurira maraika orikureeberera amaizi , naagira ati : Iwe orikwera , oriho , kandi owaabaire oriho , ori ohikire omu kucwa emanja .
66016006	Ahabw'okuba abantu bakasheesha eshagama y'abarikwera n'ey'abarangi , naiwe waabaha eshagama kuginywa . Haza ekyo kibashemereire !
66016007	Kandi nkahurira eiraka niryema aha itambiro nirigira riti : Eego , Mukama Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona , emicwere yaawe n'ey'amazima kandi ehikire .
66016008	Maraika owa kana yaashuka ebiri omu rwabya orwe aha izooba ; ryaikirizibwa kwokyesa abantu ekibabo kyaryo .
66016009	Abantu baayokibwa ekibabo ky'amaani , baakyeena eiziina rya Ruhanga , owaabaire aine obushoboorozi ahari ebyo bibonaboneso . Haza tibaayeteisa bibi byabo , ngu bamuhe ekitiinwa .
66016010	Maraika owa kataano nawe yaashuka ebiri omu rwabya orwe aha kitebe ky'obugabe eky'ekyo kinyamaishwa . Obugabe bwakyo bwashwekwa omwirima , abantu baasinika amaino ahabw'obusaasi bwingi .
66016011	Reero ahabw'obwo busaasi n'ebyo bironda , baakyeena Ruhanga ow'omu iguru . Haza tibaayeteisa bi baakozire .
66016012	Maraika owa mukaaga yaashuka ebiri omu rwabya orwe , aha mugyera guri omuhango Eufuraati . Amaizi gaagwo gaayoma , kucwera abagabe abarikuruga Burugwa-izooba omuhanda .
66016013	Bwanyima ndeeba emitima mibi eshatu , erikushusha ebikyere , neeruga omu kanwa k'ekijoka n'omu k'ekinyamaishwa n'omu k'omurangi w'ebishuba .
66016014	Egyo mitima n'ebyago , ekora obumanyiso , ekaza omu bagabe b'ensi zoona kubahuruza kuza aha rugamba aha kiro kikuru kya Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona .
66016015	Reeba , niinyija nk'omushuma ! Ebishi , omuntu orikuguma naareeba , akarinda ebijwaro bye , ngu atakaagyenda ajwaire busha , abantu bakareeba enshoni ze , aine omugisha !
66016016	Egyo mitima yaarundaanira abo bagabe omu mwanya gurikwera , ogurikwetwa Arimagedo omu Ruheburaayo .
66016017	Maraika owa mushanju yaashuka omu kaabunga ebiri omu rwabya rwe . Eiraka rihango ryayema aha kitebe ky'obukama eky'omuri nyaruju , nirigira riti : Kyahwa !
66016018	Haakurataho emirabyo n'okuhinda n'okugamba kw'enkuba n'omutsitsa mwingi , ogutakabahoga abantu baaba kubaho omu nsi . Ogwo mutsitsa nikwo gwabaire mwingi gutyo .
66016019	Orurembo orukuru rwabaganukamu ebicweka bishatu : endembo z'amahanga zaagwa , zaacwekyerera . Mpaho Ruhanga yaijuka Babulooni orurembo orukuru , kurucencesa ekikopo kya viino y'ekiniga kye .
66016020	Buri kirwa kyahunga , n'enshozi zoona zaabura .
66016021	Emengo z'orubaare rwingi , eziine oburemeezi bwa kiloguraamu amakumi ana , zaateera abantu niziruga omu iguru , okuhitsya obu abantu baarogotsire ahari Ruhanga , ahabw'ekibonaboneso ky'orwo rubaare . Ekyo kibonaboneso nikwo kyatiiniise kityo .
66017001	Bwanyima omwe ahari baamaraika omushanju , abaabaire baine enyabya omushanju , akaija yangira ati : Ija nkworekye orubanja orucwereirwe maraaya rurangaanwa , oshutami aha maizi maingi .
66017002	Niwe abagabe b'omu nsi baashambaine nawe , n'abatwire omu nsi bakasinda viino y'obushambani bwe .
66017003	Atyo maraika ogwo antwara omu ihamba ndi omuri Mutima . Mpaho ndeeba omukazi ashutami aha kinyamaishwa kirikutukura tukutuku , kihumbikirwe amaziina garikurogota , kiine emitwe mushanju n'amahembe ikumi .
66017004	Ogwo mukazi akaba ajwaire ebya bujwa n'ebirikutukura tukutuku , ayehunzire ezaabu n'amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi n'eruuru ; akwaitse omu ngaro ekikopo ky'ezaabu ekiijwire ebihagaro n'ebiitsa nshoni by'obushambani bwe .
66017005	Kandi aha buso bwe hahandiikirweho eiziina eri , eritarikumanywa makuru ; Babulooni orurembo orukuru , nyina wa baamaraaya , kandi ozaara ebihagaro by'omu nsi .
66017006	Ntyo ndeeba ogwo mukazi asinzire eshagama y'abarikwera n'ey'abajurizi abaitsirwe nibaturwa okuba aba Yesu . Ku mmureeba , ntangaara munonga .
66017007	Kwonka maraika angira ati : Ahabw'enki nootangaara ? Ka nkugambire amakuru g'ogwo mukazi , n'ag'ekinyamaishwa eki atembire , eky'emitwe mushanju n'amahembe ikumi .
66017008	Ekinyamaishwa eki waareeba , kikaba kiriho , mbwenu tikiriho , kandi nikiija kutuuhuuka omu kiina ekitaine bugarukiro , kize omu kuhwerekyerera . Reero abatwire omu nsi , abu amaziina gaabo gatahandiikirwe mu kitabo ky'amagara ensi yaaba kuhangwa , batangaarire okureeba ekyo kinyamaishwa , ahabw'okuba kikaba kiriho , mbwenu tikiriho , kwonka kiryaija .
66017009	Eki nikyetengyesa omutima gwine obwengye n'okwetegyereza . Emitwe mushanju nizo nshozi mushanju , ezi ogwo mukazi ashutamiho .
66017010	Kandi nibo bagabe mushanju , abu bataano aharibo baagwire , omwe ariho kandi ondi takaizire , kwonka ku ariija , n'ow'okumara akaanya kakye .
66017011	Reero ekinyamaishwa , ekyabaire kiriho mbwenu ekitariho , niwe mugabe wa munaana , kwonka kandi n'owa bari omushanju , haza nawe naija kuhwerekyerera .
66017012	Mbwenu amahembe ikumi agu waareeba , nibo bagabe ikumi abatakeemire , kwonka n'ab'okuheebwa obushoboorozi bw'obugabe okumara eshaaha emwe hamwe n'ekyo kinyamaishwa .
66017013	Baine enaama emwe y'okurekurira ekyo kinyamaishwa amaani gaabo n'obushoboorozi bwabo .
66017014	Reero baryarwanisa Omwana gw'Entaama , kwonka Omwana gw'Entaama aryabasingura , ahabw'okuba we , ni Mukama w'abakama kandi Omugabe w'abagabe ; haza abu aine , abaayeetsirwe , abaatoorainwe kandi abeesigwa , baryasingura hamwe nawe .
66017015	Maraika ogwo ayongyera angira ati : Amaizi gu waareeba ahi maraaya ashutami , nibo bantu b'emiringo mingi n'ebimbuuro n'amahanga n'endimi nyingi .
66017016	Kandi amahembe ikumi agu waareeba , go hamwe n'ekyo kinyamaishwa , biryayanga maraaya ogwo , bimutsigye wenka ari entangaare ; reero birye enyama y'omubiri gwe , bimwokyeze kimwe n'omuriro .
66017017	Manya Ruhanga akakita omu mitima yaabo , ngu bahikiirize enaama ye baine omutima gumwe , nibaha ekyo kinyamaishwa obushoboorozi bw'okutegyeka obugabe bwabo , okuhitsya obu ebigambo bya Ruhanga birihikiirizibwa .
66017018	Reero omukazi ou waareeba , nirwo rurembo orukuru orurikutegyeka abagabe b'omu nsi .
66018001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , naareeba maraika ondi naashuuma naaruga omu iguru , aine obushoboorozi bwingi ; ensi yoona yaamurinkanisibwa ekitiinwa kye .
66018002	Maraika ogwo yaayamuza n'eiraka rihango ati : Rugwire ! Rugwire ! Babulooni orurembo orukuru ! Ruhindukire obutaaho bw'ebyago , n'eikoobezo ry'emizimu yoona emibi , n'eicumbi ry'amahungu g'emiringo yoona erikunugwa .
66018003	Manya amahanga goona ganywaire viino y'akabugumo k'eby'obushambani bwarwo . Abagabe b'omu nsi bashambaine narwo , n'abashuubuzi b'omu nsi batungisiibwe ebintu by'okwejaramya kwarwo okurengyesereize .
66018004	Bwanyima naahurira erindi iraka niryema omu iguru , nirigira riti : Imwe bantu bangye ' mwe , nimururugyemu , mutakaakwatanisa narwo omu bibi byarwo , mukaheebwa narwo ebibonaboneso byarwo !
66018005	Manya ebibi byarwo bituumire , byahika aha iguru ; na Ruhanga yaijuka ebicumuro byarwo .
66018006	Murugire nk'oku rwagizire abandi ; muruzimuurire kabiri ebi rwakozire . Omu kikopo ki rwabajwangiizemu , murujwangizemu kabiri .
66018007	Nk'oku rwayehimbiise , rukarengyesereza omu kwegira gye ; naimwe mube nikwo mwarwihura okubonabona n'amaganya . Manya rutuura nirwegira ruti : Nyemi nk'omugabekazi , tindi mufaakazi kandi tindigira bu ncuzire !
66018008	N'ahabw'ekyo , ebibonaboneso byarwo : orufu , okucura n'enjara , nikwo birirwizira eizooba rimwe , rukookibwa omuriro ; ahabw'okuba Mukama Ruhanga orucwereire orubanja , n'ow'amaani .
66018009	Reero abagabe b'omu nsi , abaakozire narwo ebikwatiraine n'obushambani bakakuna narwo , ku barireeba omwika gwarwo nirusya , baryarucurira baruboroogyere .
66018010	Baryayemerera hangahari ahabw'okutiina ekibonaboneso kyarwo , bagire bati : Ai bambe , ai bambe , iwe rurembo rukuru ' we ! Iwe Babulooni orurembo rw'amaani ! Ekifubiro kyawe ka kyakwizira omu shaaha emwe !
66018011	Abashuubuzi b'omu nsi nabo nibarira kandi nibarucurira , ahabw'okuba tihaakiriho w'okugura eby'obushuubuzi byabo .
66018012	Tihaakiriho w'okugura eby'ezaabu , efeeza , amabaare g'obutungi bwingi n'eruuru ; emyenda ya kitaani enungi , n'eya bujwa n'eya riiri n'erikutukura ; emiringo yoona ey'ebiti by'emigaju ; ebintu byona eby'emiino , ebintu byona ebibaizirwe omu mbaaho z'obuguzi bwingi , eby'emiringa , eby'ekyoma , n'eby'amabaare garikwengyengyeta ;
66018013	omudarasiini , ebinuza ebyokurya , eby'emigaju , entsinda , n'obubaani ; viino , amajuta , essano y'obunono n'engano ; ente n'entaama ; embaraasi n'ebigaari , otaireho abahuuku n'abandi bantu enkwatwa .
66018014	Abo bashuubuzi baryarugira bati : Ebirungi bi waayetengire bikutsigireho ; ebintu byona ebinuzire n'ebirungi byawe bikuhwaireho , toribireeba bundi !
66018015	Reero abashuubuzi b'ebyo bintu abu rwatungiise , baryayemerera hangahari ahabw'okutiina ekibonaboneso kyarwo , barire kandi bacure bati :
66018016	Ai bambe , ai bambe , orwo rurembo rukuru orwajwaire emyenda mirungi ya kitaani n'eya bujwa n'erikutukura , rukeehunda ezaabu , n'amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi , n'eruuru !
66018017	Obwo butungi bwona bwahuuyuuka omu shaaha emwe ! Bakama b'emeeri boona n'abarikuzigyenderamu , abarimbi na boona abarikukorera omu nyanja eby'okwetunga , baayemerera hangahari ;
66018018	ku baareebire omwika gwarwo nirusya , baaborooga bati : Ebyo harabaireho orurembo orurikushusha nk'orurembo oru orukuru ?
66018019	Batyo baayeshuka eiju omu mutwe . Baaborooga nibarira kandi nibacura bati : Ai bambe , ai bambe , orwo rurembo rukuru orwatungiise boona abaine emeeri aha nyanja n'ebintu byarwo bingi ! Mbwenu omu shaaha emwe rwacwekyerezibwa !
66018020	Iwe iguru ' we ! Imwe abarikwera , n'entumwa n'abarangi , nimurweraatire ! Manya Ruhanga arufubiire ahabwanyu !
66018021	Bwanyima maraika w'amaani yaihayo eibaare eririkwingana orubengo ruhango , yaarirekyera omu nyanja , naagira ati : Na Babulooni orurembo orukuru , nikwo rurinagwa rutyo ahansi n'amaani , kandi tirurireebwa bundi .
66018022	Amaraka g'abateezi b'enanga n'ag'abeeshongozi n'aga'abateezi b'esheegu n'enzamba , tigarihurirwa bundi omuriiwe ; n'omunyamwoga weena tarigira bu areebirwe omuriiwe ; n'eiraka ry'emengo tirigaruka kuhurirwa omuriiwe .
66018023	Kandi omuriiwe tiharyakiramu tabaaza bundi , n'eiraka rya kishwera na kishwerwa tiririgaruka kuhurirwa omuriiwe . Manya abashuubuzi baawe nibo baabaire bari abantu rugambwa omu nsi , ahabw'okuba amahanga goona okaba ogabeihabeiheise oburogo bwawe .
66018024	Omuri orwo rurembo okwita abarangi n'abarikwera nimwo kwashangirwe , otaireho na boona abaitsirwe omu nsi .
66019001	Ebyo ku byahwaire , naahurira eiraka rihango eriri nk'ery'ekimbuuro kihango eky'ab'omu iguru niriteera akaari riti : Haleluya ! Okujuna n'ekitiinwa n'obushoboorozi n'ebya Ruhanga waitu !
66019002	Emicwere ye y'emanja n'ey'amazima kandi n'ey'oburyo ! Manya afubiire orurembo maraaya orukuru , orwasiisize ensi ebikwatiraine n'obushambani bwarwo . Mbwenu Ruhanga aruhoire , naarutura okwita abaheereza be .
66019003	Bongyera kandi bateera akaari bati : Haleluya ! Omwika gurikururugamu guryaguma nigucumbuuka ebiro n'ebiro !
66019004	Mpaho abakuru bari amakumi abiri na bana , hamwe n'ebihangwa biri ebina ebihuriire , baajuumara ahansi , baaramya Ruhanga osingami aha kitebe ky'obukama , nibagira bati : Amiina . Haleluya !
66019005	Reero eiraka ryayema aha kitebe ky'obukama , niryamuza riti : Musingize Ruhanga waitu , imwe mwena abagaragwa be , imwe abamutiina , abato n'abakuru !
66019006	Bwanyima nkahurira eiraka riri nk'ery'ekimbuuro kihango , eririkuhoorera nk'amaizi maingi , kandi eririkuhinda nk'enkuba z'amaani , nirigira riti : Haleluya ! Mukama Ruhanga waitu Ow'obushoboorozi bwona ari aha ngoma naategyeka !
66019007	Ka tushemererwe , tunanukye , tumuhe ekitiinwa ; ahabw'okuba obugyenyi bw'obushwere bw'Omwana gw'Entaama bwataaha . Omugore we ayeteekateekire .
66019008	Ayejwekire emyenda mirungi ya kitaani , erikwera kandi erikwengyengyeta manya kitaani egyo enungi nibyo by'okuhikiirira ebi abarikwera baakozire .
66019009	Maraika ogwo angira ati : Handiika oti : Baine omugisha abeetwa aha bugyenyi bw'obushwere bw'Omwana gw'Entaama . Kandi angira ati : Ebyo n'ebigambo bya Ruhanga eby'amazima .
66019010	Ntyo njuumara aha bigyere bye kumuramya , kwonka angira ati : Reka , ekyo otakikora ! Ndi omuheereza mugyenzi waawe , kandi owa beene waanyu abahamira aha bujurizi bwa Yesu . Ramya Ruhanga . Manya obujurizi bwa Yesu niyo ntima y'oburangi .
66019011	Bwanyima nkareeba eiguru rishuurwirwe , ntyo ndeeba embaraasi rujeru . Owaabaire agishutamiho akaba naayeetwa Mwesigwa kandi Mazima ; niwe acwa emanja , akarwana engamba omu kuhikiirira .
66019012	Amaisho ge nigashusha endimi z'omuriro , n'aha mutwe gwe hariho amahunde maingi , kandi hahandiikirweho eiziina eritaine muntu weena orikurimanya , kureka we wenka .
66019013	Ajwaire ekanzu ejabikirwe omu shagama , kandi eiziina eri arikwetwa ni Kigambo wa Ruhanga .
66019014	Reero amahe g'omu iguru , agajwaire emyenda ya kitaani erikwera kandi ecumire , gaamukuratira gatembire embaraasi zaarujeru .
66019015	Omu kanwa ke haarugamu rurara y'obwogi y'okutemesa amahanga ; kandi aryabategyekyesa enkoni y'ekyoma , aribatiirire einyuukiro rya viino y'ekiniga kingi kya Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona .
66019016	Aha kanzu ye n'aha kibero kye hahandiikirweho eiziina : Omugabe w'abagabe , Mukama w'abakama .
66019017	Bwanyima nkareeba maraika ayemereire omu izooba . Yaayeta n'eiraka rihango amahungu goona agazeereera ahaiguru omu kaabunga , ati : Nimwije , muteeranire aha bugyenyi bukuru bwa Ruhanga !
66019018	Mwije murye enyama z'abagabe n'ez'abakuru b'engabo , n'ez'amamanzi n'ez'embaraasi n'ez'abazitembire n'ez'abantu boona , ab'obusingye n'abahuuku , abakuru n'abato !
66019019	Ntyo ndeeba ekinyamaishwa kiri n'abagabe b'omu nsi , hamwe n'amahe gaabo , bateeraine kurwanisa ogwo oshutami aha mbaraasi n'eihe rye .
66019020	Haza ekyo kinyamaishwa kyakwatwa hamwe n'omurangi w'ebishuba , owaakoreire omu maisho gaakyo obumanyiso . Obwo bumanyiso nibwo yaabaire abeihabeihesa abaatairweho akamanyiso k'ekyo kinyamaishwa , bakaramya ekishushani kyakyo . Ekyo kinyamaishwa hamwe n'omurangi w'ebishuba byombi bihuriire , byanagwa omu nyanja y'omuriro erikwakisibwa sulufuru .
66019021	Abaatsigaireho baitwa rurara y'Ogwo oshutami aha mbaraasi , eyaarugire omu kanwa ke ; haza amahungu goona gaigutira kimwe enyama z'emitumbi yaabo .
66020001	Bwanyima nkareeba maraika ondi , naashuuma naaruga omu iguru , aine omu ngaro ekikomoorozo ky'ekiina ekitaine bugarukiro , n'orujegyere ruhango .
66020002	Atyo akwata ekijoka kiri , egyo njoka eya ira , niwe Mwohi kandi Sitaane , amuboha okumara emyaka rukumi .
66020003	Maraika ogwo amunaga omuri ekyo kiina kitaine bugarukiro , akikinga , akitaho n'enzibuuro kumukingiraniramu , ngu atakaabeihabeiha amahanga obundi , okuhitsya obu egyo myaka rukumi erihwaho ; kandi ngu egyo myaka ku erihwaho , abone kubohoororwa kumara akaanya kakye .
66020004	Reero naareeba ebitebe by'obukama bishutamirweho abaahairwe obushoboorozi kucwa emanja . Naareeba n'emitima y'abantu abaatemirweho emitwe , nibaturwa okuhamya Yesu hamwe n'ekigambo kya Ruhanga . Nibo abo abatararamize ekyo kinyamaishwa , nari ekishushani kyakyo ; kandi abataratairweho kamanyiso kaakyo aha buso bwabo , nari aha ngaro zaabo . Abo bantu baagaruka baaba abahuriire , baayema na Kristo emyaka rukumi .
66020005	Kwonka abandi baafiire , tibaagaruka kuba abahuriire okuhitsya obu egyo myaka rukumi yaahwaire . Okwo nikwo kuzooka kw'okubanza .
66020006	Aine omugisha kandi ka n'orikwera ogwo obarirwa omuri okwo kuzooka kw'okubanza ! Abari nk'abo , okufa kwa kabiri tikubaineho bushoboorozi ; kureka baryaba abahongyerezi ba Ruhanga n'aba Kristo , bategyekye hamwe nawe emyaka rukumi .
66020007	Egyo myaka rukumi ku erihwaho , Sitaane aryakomoororwa , arugye omu kihome kye .
66020008	Reero ashohore , abeihabeihe Googi na Magoogi : nigo mahanga agari ahantu hoona omu nsi . Haza ahuruze abantu baago kurwana orugamba . Abo bantu , obwingi bwabo buri nk'omusheenyi gw'enyanja .
66020009	Batyo bahurura , bateera ensi yoona oku eingana , beehinguririza orusiisira rw'abarikwera n'orurembo orukundwa . Kwonka omuriro guhanantuka omu iguru gubacwekyereza .
66020010	Na Sitaane ori owaababeihabeihire , anagwa omu nyanja y'omuriro ogurikwakisibwa sulufuru , ei ekinyamaishwa n'omurangi w'ebishuba byabaire binagirwemu , biri eby'okubonabonesibwa nyomushana na nyekiro ebiro n'ebiro .
66020011	Bwanyima nkareeba ekitebe ky'obukama kihango kirikwera , n'Ogwo owaabaire akishutamiho . Reero ensi n'eiguru byahunga nibiruga ahu ari , kwonka byaburwa obutooro .
66020012	Ntyo ndeeba abaafiire , abakuru n'abato , beemereire omu maisho g'ekyo kitebe ky'obukama . Mpaho ebitabo bishuuruurwa . N'ekindi kitabo nakyo kishuuruurwa , nikyo kitabo ky'amagara . Haza abaafiire baacwerwa orubanja nk'oku ebi baakozire , ebyahandiikirwe omuri ebyo bitabo , byabaire biri .
66020013	Reero enyanja yaareeta abaagifeereiremu . Rufu na Kuzimu byareeta abafu baabyo . Boona baacwerwa orubanja nk'ebi baakozire oku byabaire biri .
66020014	Bwanyima Rufu na Kuzimu byanagwa omu nyanja y'omuriro . Egyo nyanja y'omuriro nikwo kufa kwa kabiri .
66020015	Mpaho weena ou eiziina rye ryashangirwe ritahandiikirwe mu kitabo ky'amagara , yaanagwa omuri egyo nyanja y'omuriro .
66021001	Bwanyima nkareeba eiguru erisya n'ensi ensya . Manya eiguru ery'okubanza n'ensi ey'okubanza bikaba byahwaireho , kandi amayanja gatakiriho .
66021002	Naareeba n'orurembo orurikwera , niyo Yerusalemu ensya , neeshuuma neeruga omu iguru ahari Ruhanga , eteekateekirwe nk'omugore ocumiirwe iba .
66021003	Ntyo mpurira eiraka rihango niryema aha kitebe ky'obukama , nirigira riti : Reeba , mbwenu obutaaho bwa Ruhanga buri omu bantu ! Aryatuura nabo , babe abantu be , nawe wenka aryaguma nabo ari Ruhanga waabo .
66021004	Aryabaragaza amarira goona aha maisho , Rufu eryaba etakiriho , nobu kwakuba okucura nari okurira nainga obusaasi . Manya ebya ira biryaba byahwaireho .
66021005	Mbwenu Ogwo owaabaire ashutami aha kitebe ky'obugabe , yaagira ati : Reeba , ebintu byona nimbihindura bisya ! Atyo agira ati : Handiika ebi : Ebi bigambo n'eby'okwesigwa kandi n'eby'amazima .
66021006	Reero angira ati : Kyahikiirizibwa ! Niinye Alufa kandi Omega , obutandikiro n'obugarukiro . Weena oine eiriho , ndyamuheera busha amaizi agarikuruga aha nshuro y'amaizi g'amagara .
66021007	Weena orikusingura , aryahungura ebyo , kandi ndyaba Ruhanga we , nawe abe omwana wangye .
66021008	Kwonka abatiini n'abatarikwikiriza n'abakora ebihagaro n'abaitsi n'abakora ebikwatiraine n'obushambani n'abarogi n'abaramya ebishushani , n'ababeihi boona , omugabo gwabo guryaba enyanja erikwaka omuriro n'obuganga bw'ekibiriiti . Okwo nikwo kufa kwa kabiri .
66021009	Bwanyima hakaija omwe ahari baamaraika omushanju , abaabaire baine enyabya omushanju ziijwire ebibonaboneso omushanju ebirikuhereeruka . Maraika ogwo yangambira naagira ati : Ija , nkworekye Omugore , muk'Omwana gw'Entaama .
66021010	Atyo antwara aha rushozi ruhango kandi ruraingwa , ndi omuri Mutima . Anyoreka orurembo orurikwera , Yerusalemu , nirushuuma niruruga omu iguru ahari Ruhanga .
66021011	Rukaba nirumurinkanisibwa ekitiinwa kya Ruhanga . Okumurinkana kwarwo kukaba kuri nk'okw'eibaare ry'obuguzi bwingi erya yasipi , eririkwogibwamu amaisho nka kirisitaalo .
66021012	Rukaba rwine orugo ruhango ruraingwa , oruriho amarembo ikumi n'abiri , kandi ahari ago marembo hariho baamaraika ikumi na babiri , ago marembo gahandiikirweho amaziina g'enganda ikumi na ibiri z'Abaisiraeli ;
66021013	buri rubaju ruriho amarembo ashatu : oburugwa-izooba amarembo ashatu , obukiizi-bwa-bumosho amarembo ashatu , obukiizi-bwa-buryo amarembo ashatu n'oburengyerwa-izooba amarembo ashatu .
66021014	Kandi orugo rw'orwo rurembo rukaba rwine amabaare g'obuhamizo ikumi n'abiri , gariho amaziina ikumi n'abiri g'entumwa ikumi na ibiri ez'Omwana gw'entaama .
66021015	Maraika ogwo owaagambire naanye , akaba aine orubingo rw'ezaabu kugyeresa orwo rurembo n'amarembo gaarwo n'engo zaarwo .
66021016	Orwo rurembo embaju zaarwo ina zikaba nizingana , oburaingwa bwarwo nibingana n'obukiizi bwarwo . Atyo orwo rurembo arugyeresa orubingo rwe , ruhitsya kilomita enkumi ibiri na magana ana ; haza obwo , oburaingwa bwarwo n'obukiizi n'obwemi nibingana .
66021017	Agaruka agyera orugo rwarwo , ruhitsya mikono igana na makumi ana n'ena . Haza emigyerere y'abantu niyo maraika yaarugyeziremu .
66021018	Orugo orwo rukaba rwombekyesiibwe amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi aga yasipi , kandi orurembo rwo ruri ezaabu empuuhe , nirwogibwamu amaisho nk'ebirahuri .
66021019	Emisingi y'orugo rw'orwo rurembo ekaba ehunzirwe amabaare g'obuguzi bwingi aga ibara muringo . Ogw'okubanza guhunzirwe amabaare aga yasipi , ogwa kabiri aga saafiro , ogwa kashatu aga kalukeedoni , ogwa kana aga simaragido ,
66021020	ogwa kataano aga sarudoni , ogwa mukaaga aga saarudio , ogwa mushanju aga kirisoolito , ogwa munaana aga beerilo , ogwa mwenda aga topaazi , ogwa ikumi aga kirisoopuraso , ogwa ikumi na gumwe aga huwakinto , n'ogwa ikumi n'ebiri ag'ametisito .
66021021	Reero amarembo ikumi n'abiri gakaba gari eruuru ikumi na ibiri , buri irembo rikozirwe n'eruuru emwe . Haza enguuto y'orwo rurembo eri ezaabu empuuhe , neeyogibwamu amaisho nk'ekirahuri .
66021022	Omuri orwo rurembo tindareebiremu nyaruju , ahabw'okuba Mukama Ruhanga Ow'obushoboorozi bwona n'Omwana gw'Entaama nibo nyaruju yaarwo .
66021023	Orwo rurembo tirwetenga izooba nari okwezi kurwakira , ahabw'okuba ekitiinisa kya Ruhanga nikyo kirumurukisa , kandi Omwana gw'Entaama niwe aba orumuri rwarwo .
66021024	Amahanga g'omu nsi garyagyenda nigamurikirwa okwaka kwakyo , n'abagabe b'omu nsi baryarureetamu eby'obutungi bwabo .
66021025	Reero amarembo gaarwo tigarigira bu gakingirwe nyomushana ; kandi tiharibayo ekyeetwa ekiro .
66021026	Baryarureetamu ekitiinwa ky'amahanga n'eby'obutungi bwago .
66021027	Kwonka ekintu kyona ekitashemeire tikirirutaahamu , nobu yaakuba omuntu weena okora ebihagaro nari obeiha , kureka abo bonka abahandiikirwe omu kitabo ky'amagara , eky'Omwana gw'Entaama .
66022001	Bwanyima maraika akaanyoreka omugyera gw'amaizi g'amagara , ogurikwengyengyeta nk'eibaare rya krisitaalo , niguhimintika niguruga aha kitebe ky'obukama ekya Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama ,
66022002	niguraba ahagati y'enguuto y'orwo rurembo . Ahari buri rubaju rw'ogwo mugyera hariho omuti gw'amagara , ogwerwaho ebijuma emirundi ikumi n'ebiri , nigwana buri kwezi , n'amababi gaagwo gari ag'okutambira amahanga .
66022003	Omuri orwo rurembo , tiharibamu kintu kyona ekikyeenirwe . Ekitebe ky'obukama ekya Ruhanga n'eky'Omwana gw'Entaama nibyo biriba omuri orwo rurembo ; kandi abaheereza be baryamuramya .
66022004	Baryamureeba ahamaisho , n'eiziina rye rihandiikwe aha buso bwabo .
66022005	Haza okwo tiburiira bundi , tibaryetenga kwakirwa etabaaza nari eizooba , kureka Mukama Ruhanga niwe aribaakira ; haza baryategyeka obutwire bwona .
66022006	Bwanyima maraika akangira ati : Ebigambo ebyo n'eby'okwesigwa kandi n'eby'amazima . Mbwenu Mukama Ruhanga oha abarangi Mutima we , atumire maraika we kworeka abaheereza be eby'okubaho juba .
66022007	Haza yaagira ati : Reeba , niinyija juba ! Aine omugisha orikukuratira gye ebigambo by'oburangi eby'omu kitabo eki .
66022008	Nyowe Yohaana , niinye naayehuririire ebyo bigambo , nkataho n'okubireeba . Reero ku naabihuriire kandi naabireeba , naajuumara aha nsi y'ebigyere bya maraika owaabiinyorekire , kumuramya .
66022009	Kwonka we yangira ati : Reka , otakikora ! Manya ndi omuheereza mugyenzi waawe , kandi owa beene waanyu abarangi , n'ow'abo abata omutima aha bigambo by'omuri eki kitabo . Ramya Ruhanga !
66022010	Ayongyera angira ati : Yata enaama y'ebigambo by'oburangi ebiri omu kitabo eki , ahabw'okuba obunaku bw'ebyo bintu byona kuhikiirira buri haihi .
66022011	K'enkozi y'ebibi egume neebikora , osiisikaire agume asiisikaire , ohikiriire agume naakora ebihikire , n'orikwera aguma ari orikwera .
66022012	Yesu yaagira ati : Reeba , niinyija juba ! Nyine enzimuurano kuzimuurira omuntu weena ahabw'ebi yaakozire .
66022013	Niinye Alufa kandi Omega , ow'okubanza kandi ow'aha muheru ; obutandikiro kandi obugarukiro .
66022014	Baine omugisha aboozya ebijwaro byabo , bakaikirizibwa kurya ebijuma by'aha muti gw'amagara , n'okutaaha omuri orwo rurembo nibareetwa omu marembo .
66022015	Kwonka empabe n'abarogi n'enshambani n'abaitsi n'abaramya ebishushani , n'omuntu weena okunda ebishuba akaguma naabeiha , baryaguma aheeru yaarwo .
66022016	Nyowe Yesu , mbatumireho maraika wangye kubamanyisa ebyo , ngu bibone kugasira ebigombe by'abaikiriza . Niinye kitsitsa kya Daudi kandi omwijukuru . Niinye nyonyoozi y'omu busheeshe erikumurinkana .
66022017	Mutima hamwe na Mugore nibagira bati : Ija ! Ka weena orikuhurira ebi , agire ati : Ija ! Ka weena oine eiriho aije ! Ka weena orikwenda amaizi g'amagara , agatungire busha !
66022018	Nyowe Yohaana , niinyehanangiriza omuntu weena orikuhurira ebigambo by'oburangi ebiri omu kitabo eki nti : Weena owaakubyongyeraho , Ruhanga aryamwongyera ebibonaboneso ebyagambwaho omuri eki kitabo .
66022019	Kandi ku haakugira owaihaho ebigambo ebimwe eby'omu kitabo ky'oburangi obu , Ruhanga aryamwaka omugabo gwe ogw'aha muti gw'amagara n'ogw'omu rurembo orurikwera , ebyagambwaho omuri eki kitabo .
66022020	Orikuhamya ebyashuuruurwa ebyo byona , naagira ati : Buzimazima , niinyija juba ! Amiina ! Ai Mukama Yesu , ija !
66022021	Embabazi za Mukama Yesu zigume naimwe mwena . Amiina .
